author: Ilovebennjerry
title: Not enough brownies!
text:
Super good, don't get me wrong. But I came for the caramel and brownies, not the sweet cream. The packaging made it seem like brownies were packed and bountiful *crying frowny emoji* I'd say the taste of this was amazing, but the ratio of brownie to sweet cream was disappointing. Liked it regardless but probably won't buy again simply because it didn't live up to its promising package. I'll find another one that has a better ratio and wayyy more yummy chewy brownies.
Overall, good flavor, texture, idea, and brownies. Not so great caramel/sweet cream/ brownie RATIO. Just add more brownies. Please.

author: Sweettooth909
title: I’m OBSESSED with this pint!
text: I decided to try it out although I’m not a huge caramel fan, and the first buy was ok, didn’t like the caramel too much and for some reason that specific pint barely had any brownies! Like there were some on top but from the middle to the bottom? Zilch. Nada. Nothing! It was disappointing. But for some reason, I bought it again and I really do believe it was just that point bcuz the second one was glorious!! I had a big brownie chunk in EVERY bite. Plus the caramel didn’t bother me as much and I took a liking to it. Conclusion: I’m on my fifth pint, of the week and I’m going back to get my daily pint cus I’m kinda sick and need some happiness.

author: LaTanga71
title: My favorite...More Caramel Please
text: My caramel core begins to disappear about half way through. I only buy this for the caramel core. The first time I purchased this I was not even aware that there were blonde bits in there. You had me a salted caramel core, well this is the fourth pint that I have purchased and the caramel is plentiful at the top then it begins to get sparse about half way down at 3/4s of the way down its gone. It works out in my husbands favor because he doesn't care for the caramel so he gets to finish my pint while having a full pint of his choice. Please please please, its called salted caramel core for a reason. Let the caramel flow through the core. P.S. You could put a little extra in there, I totally would not mind.

author: chicago220
title: Obsessed!!!
text: Why are people complaining about the blonde brownies? If you don’t like blonde brownies, get ice cream with fudge brownies! I LOVE the blonde brownies and cannot get enough of them. This ice cream is by far my favorite. I have driven to multiple stores to try and find it... and when I do, I stock up! I’ve tried other flavors when I can’t find this one, and none of them even come close to making me as happy as this does! I’d say sometimes the caramel to brownie ratio is a little off at times (more brownies please!), but I’ll still always enjoy it nevertheless!

author: Kassidyk
title: Worst Ice Cream Ever!
text: This ice cream is worst ice cream I’ve ever tasted. I was beyond excited when I picked it up today and couldn’t wait to get home and try it. First the sweet cream ice cream has no flavour. But that’s fine I could get past that, but the salted caramel core is what’s really wrong. It’s disgusting and so salty it’s actually inedible. I’ve had ice cream before that I have really enjoyed but never to the point where I physically can not stomach it. I love salted caramel but this is just another level. I actually came here to read the reviews and see how others thought of it just in case mine was a bad batch. Never again!

author: Nikiera
title: Way Too Salty
text: I bought this last night to go with Louisiana Crunch cake because I was craving that salty and sweet flavor. Unfortunately, I was not thrilled with the salted caramel core of this ice cream. Usually, when you have salted caramel, the salt enhances the flavor of the caramel. The salt in this core OVERWHELMED everything, even the cake. It was disappointing to not enjoy my dessert and I doubt I'll be finishing this pint of ice cream, which is a shame because you should never have to throw away ice cream.

author: Mmelvin
title: Love this flavor, but...
text: This is definitely my favorite flavor, but recently, it does not have enough blonde brownie chunks. I'll go through at least half of the pint with just 1 or 2 chunks. It looks like plain ice cream with a salted caramel core. This has happened a lot lately, and it's so dissapointing. I've gotten to the point where I simply stopped buying it. Today, purchased two because they were on sale. It started the way it should be, with plenty of yummy chunks. Before I even got halfway as I was serving myself, no more chunks. After some digging around, I found 3 more way at the bottom. Please fix this! I love this ice cream, but it's pointless without the chunks.

author: Shay10
title: Really Wanted To Love This
text: I am not a chocolate person at all, and this was my very first time trying Ben & Jerry's, (Shame on me I'm 23 lol) so I was so excited to find a Caramel Ice Cream with BLONDE Brownie chunks instead of fudge. I really wanted to like this ice cream but I just couldn't. The Salted Caramel is a little too salty, In fact, I couldn't even eat the core, I just ate around it. I didn't really like the Sweet Cream Ice Cream, it didn't really have a taste to me, (Maybe Vanilla would be better). The only thing I loved about this Ice Cream were the Blonde Brownie Chunks, They were so delicious! I would love for this Ice Cream Recipe to be worked on, maybe I'll give it a try again in the future.

author: caramel4dayz
title: Could be better.
text: I LOVE caramel, so much so that I could eat it off a spoon, which was exactly what I was planning to do when I bought this ice cream. Unfortunately this caramel core is way too salty. I actually eat around it! I'm not a fan of the sweet cream ice cream flavor either; vanilla would've worked better. The blondie pieces were delicious but overall I'm disappointed. I really wanted to love this since I love Ben & Jerry's but this was not up to par with their other flavors!

author: RosaT777
title: Salted Caramel core had NO CARAMEL
text: I love all the Ben & Jerry’s flavor. But recently I been so disappointed of my favorite flavor salted core caramel. It has no core

author: Realeyes
title: Caramel ended 1/2 way through
text: The ice cream really didn’t taste like anything significant and then the caramel which carried the whole dessert ended half way through the cup :( very disappointed!

author: Nicole V
title: Core went about an inch into the pint
text: The core was absolutely delicious for about a scoop of icecream. Then there was no core for the entire rest of the pint. Huge disappointment.

author: deva
title: good on top...not so good the further down you get
text: I've seen this flavor multiple times at the grocery store the past few months and been tempted, finally pulled the trigger last week.

title: Oh dear
text: I feel like a dork writing a review for ice cream, but usually a pint only lasts us 3-5 days in our home and we were so disappointed with this one and it's still in the freezer a month later untouched. In addition, I love anything caramel but the salted caramel core was so overbearing, I honestly don't know how this made it on to be a final flavor after the taste testers tried it. It's just too salty. We scooped the caramel into the sink, but then the rest was just a little boring. I will still be a loyal B&J fan, but will be super hesitant when it comes to their caramel line.

author: BJBLU
title: Why aren’t the brownie bits chewy?
text: Hello. I just bought my 4th and 5th pints of salted caramel core while awaiting Hurricane Dorian to arrive. I will have to say that my son and I greatly enjoyed the first 3. Plenty of salty caramel (yum) and plenty of brownie bits that were chewy to the bite. However these last 2 pints that I just purchased do have plenty of caramel and brownie bits but they aren’t chewy. They are more crumbly to the bite. I’m not sure if the first 3 were a fluke or these last 2 weren’t right. Is the brownie supposed to be chewy or crumbly? These last 2 were disappointing for us and makes me question whether we should buy this kind again.

author: Buffaloed
title: No Regrets!
text: So it's the middle of June and I made an impromptu decision to get a small thing of ice cream during my shopping trip. I initially was thinking of going for a strawberry or peach flavor, but then I saw this pint and had a double take. I'd never try this flavor prior and man, I do not regret it. I love this pint. I love sweet cream and blonde brownie so this was a win-win. I like how to salted caramel is in the center so I have the ability to control how much I want in each bite. I do agree that the salted caramel is a bit on the salty side, but like I said, I have the control to put as little as I want in my scoop.

author: Calla
title: Perfection!
text: I'll be completely honest, I'm not generally a fan of caramel (it's just too sweet for me) but I gave this flavor a shot because of the sweet cream ice cream. As it turns out, the saltiness of the caramel core perfectly balances out the sweetness! I was pleasantly surprised by how much I enjoyed the salted caramel core. The blonde brownie chunks were also a nice touch and not too overwhelming. I feel like the ratio of mix ins to chunks was nicely balanced.

author: April DD
title: Wow just wow
text: Okay I was expecting an almost too salty weirdly over sweet ice cream but man was I wrong!!! No seriously!!! I started eating this ice cream and was transported to the first time I had gooey caramel pop corn... the ice cream was like eating sweet corn creamy and smooth and the chewy bits supposed to be brownie tasted like caramel pop corn that had gotten chewy and sweet soaked in ice cream.. then the salty caramel center was too good to even say but together the best caramel pop corn ice cream I have ever had.. even though I don’t know if that’s what they were going for lol.. my favorite flavor so far

author: FuzzyGut
title: So good, but...
text: This was my 1st pint of Salted Caramel Core but not my first Ben and Jerry’s Core pint. My first impression was that my core was HUGE! It was literally overflowing when I opened the pint! Wow! And the caramel itself was delicious; salty sweet and gooey! The sweet cream ice cream was very rich and cut through the sweet of the core nicely. My only issue was the blonde brownie bits. It’s not that they weren’t plentiful, I just really didn’t like the taste of them, which is sad because the rest of the pint was KILLER! The chocolate brownies in the other flavors are amazingly good so I was disappointed that these blonde ones weren’t very good and I ate around them. So, all in all, it was a good pint with amazing caramel, good ice cream and funky brownies.

author: SaltedCaramelLover
title: Favorite Flavor!
text:
This is my all time favorite flavor. For me it's the perfect combination of sweet and salty and its upsetting to see so many people hate on it. I think vanilla would be too over powering but everyone's taste buds are different. I do agree the blonde brownie bits have been lacking... but I'm an eat the entire pint kinda gal.. oops..sit down to a good movie and this is my go to snack to grab (wish it came in a dairy free option, but I live in WI so I suffer through being lactose intolerant all the time)
So in short, it is sweet and salty flavor. I always have a partial scoop of ice cream to core spoonful I eat and I guess I'm the weirdo that runs outta caramel before ice cream... oops xD

author: jordan3896
title: Too much
text: I love carmel so much and as soon as I saw carmel core I grabbed it off the shelf. The carmel tastes great and I love the ice cream and blonde brownie pieces in it!!! The only thing that is wrong with it is how much carmel they gave me. It was 3/4 carmel and 1/4 ice cream. It wasn’t a good balance and I probably won’t get it again.

author: CollegeGal
title: My Favorite Flavor- One of a Kind
text: I always wanted a flavor of ice cream that was tailored to the way my taste buds worked. Most ice cream flavors from other companies that have cookie dough in it is chocolate based, but Ben & Jerry’s has cornered the market: this cookie dough is caramel and butter and cookie based (or blondie if that’s the correct term)! I’ve been buying it almost every weekend at college for a year! Please keep this flavor, it makes me so happy. The fact that there’s a cookie dough flavor that is chocolate free is one of a kind and not many ice companies make that!

author: Margot
title: Core more like pencil line
text: I was so excited to try the “core” pints. The picture they show online makes it look like a decent size and width. The reality: the core of my salted caramel pint was the width of a pencil eraser tip. Incredibly disappointing and 100% not as advertised. I feel duped.

author: ne26
title: Core-full?
text: I bought this on sale and was excited to try it. While the ice cream is light and blondies are a nice treat, I wish there was more of a salted caramel core. Mine did not go down even halfway, which is a pity because I love salted caramel.

author: Rileyhd
title: Not terrible
text: I had to buy this to since they were all out of mint at the store...lots of Carmel Core which was a plus but no blondie chunks!!! Any were so tiny...very disappointed because Ben and jerrys rocks!!

author: Pasz
title: Why
text: I love this but where did my core go??????????????

author: TimR
title: Salty Caramel?
text: I know sweet cream ice cream probably wouldn't be a big seller but I wish B&J would make more flavors with a sweet cream base or just a plain sweet cream ice cream. When the flavor was 1st introduced I used to get this regularly but it got to a point I was throwing away most of the caramel because it was too salty. I will still occasionally purchase as there are no other flavors with sweet cream.

author: Cranky Yankee
title: Too salty
text: Bought this recently because my local target has stopped carrying Blondie Ambition, which was my favorite. I love the sweet-cream ice cream; my container didn't seem to have very many blondie chunks (which was disappointing, see previous) and the salted caramel core was overly salty. It was okay. I might buy it again but would rather have Blondie Ambition.

author: karen511
title: Ok..
text: I really wanted to like this flavor but it was quite disappointing. Halfway into the pint, the core pretty much disappeared. There was way too much at the top and it wasn't dispersed evenly throughout the ice cream. The caramel was also way too salty for my tastes. Also wished there were more brownie pieces, only found a few in the entire pint.

author: drewmar
title: Blonde brownies??
text: Couldn't find any in my pint. But the rest is fabulous, don't change a thing!

author: Tornado7
title: So disappointed!
text: I had a major craving for ice cream so of course I had to go to the store for some Ben and Jerry's! I was really excited about this flavor, but after a few bites I was gagging. It was too salty and there were barely any brownie chunks :/ I'm really sad this ice cream is going to go waste, but I'm not happy with my purchase at all.

author: Sunrise
title: Blondie Crumbs
text: Just bought this last night and like some of the other reviews there were only a few flecks of blondie. Mine was nothing like the photos. And so the combination of just ice cream and such salty caramel was disappointing and unbalanced. I don't know if the core extended to the bottom since I didn't eat enough to find out.

author: JandM
title: So Disappointed :(
text: I never thought I would not like a Ben & Jerry's flavor, but it's happened :( When my store didn't have my favorite flavor, I thought I would try the Salted Caramel Core - the description sounded great. Unfortunately, the caramel was *way* too salty - I ended up scooping it all out. The vanilla ice cream was good, but the brownie pieces had no flavor. I've never been disappointed by Ben & Jerry's before, but I guess there's a first for everything :(

author: ASaltyFan
title: They sure meant it when it said salted
text: The salted caramel core tastes like someone went a little too salt happy. There was just too much core in ratio with the ice cream an in addition to the bad core to ice cream ratio, the core was just too salty to handle. Please fix the core because the ice cream itself with the blonde brownie bits are delicious.

author: elephantsforever3
title: Horrible pint, bland brownies
text: I was excited for this ice cream because I love blondies and caramel, but it was the one flavor I've tried that I strongly dislike. The core didn't go deep at all and it was SO salty that it made me feel kind of sick. The brownies were dry and sparce and I barely could taste them. The base was alright, I guess. Really dissapointed. I think this flavor needs to be fixed or just stopped being made.

author: Rudy58
title: Best B&J Pint ever!
text: I've been hooked on this flavor for more than 2 weeks now. I wish I'd have known about it sooner lol! The Salted Caramel Core is very good and the Blonde Brownies make this product over the top. I do have one complaint though. I buy maybe 4 pints or more a week and everytime I open one and start eating them they are all different as far as how many brownie peices there are or the caramel. Sometimes there's a ton of salted caramel at the top which can be overwhelming and then it's gone half way down. Other times it's normal until you get about halfway and there nothing but the sweet cream ice cream with no caramel or brownies. It's always different, however I'm still in love with this flavor and I highly recommend it! Please B&J see if y'all can get them all the same lol

author: CollegeGal
title: My Favorite Flavor
text:
I always wanted a flavor of ice cream that was taylored to the way my taste buds worked. Most ice cream flavors from other companies that have cookie dough in it is chocolate based, but this cookie dough is caramel and butter and cookie based (or boo die if that’s the correct term) I’ve been buying it almost every weekend at college for a year!
Please keep this flavor, it makes me so happy. The fact that there’s a cookie dough flavor that is chocolate free is one of a kind and not many ice companies make that!

author: atik
title: Too salty
text: The blondie mix ins and sweet cream ice cream were nice, but I really wasn't a fan of the caramel core, because it was far too salty. You've got multiple reviews saying that it's too salty, please don't skim over those reviews. Please consider tweaking the recipe on this one so it's less salty.

author: jessiraes
title: Good in theory...
text: I usually love salted caramel foods, and I adore Ben & Jerry's decadent ice creams. The ice cream was excellent, the brownie pieces were yummy, but the caramel tasted way too salty! The salt is supposed to compliment the caramel, not overpower it. I'm pretty disappointed.

author: Linda895
title: Too salty
text: I love anything caramel. I was super excited when I saw the whole core was salted caramel. However it was way too salty, I even tried mixing it with the sweet cream ice cream and it was still too salty. It could also use more of the brownie, which was certainly delicious.

author: Aggs
title: My all time favorite ice cream!!!
text: I.JUST.LOVE this ice cream!!! if I eat ice cream, it must always be B&J salted caramel core! I think I'm addicted. It's a perfect combination between sweet and salty, plus delicious caramel and chewy chunks. I noticed that some pints don't have that much chunks but the vanilla ice cream itself is pretty yummy and honestly, I cannot stay mad for long haha! If B&J's ever discontinue this flavor, I think it could be the end of my world!

author: Andrew5
title: Absolutely fantastic
text: I bought this ice cream simply based on the fact that I was craving caramel. But with this wonderful ice cream, you get so much more. Not only is the Ice cream and blonde Brownies perfect...but the caramel is just so good. You almost want to save the caramel as long as you can because how perfect the flavor is. It's the perfect amounts of sweet and salty.

author: Curt
title: Way too salty
text: There must have been some sort of mistake with the amount of salt mixed into the caramel. Nobody would but that much saint into a desert. The pint it's still on our freezer. On a side note, Cherry Garcia is the best ice cream ever made.

author: Sheyla1110
title: SALTY!!!
text: Tried this flavor for the first time about two weeks ago it was delicious; But today I’m extremely disappointed. The core is so salty in this pint. I had other people try and they also agreed it was too salty. Don’t think I’m buying again.

author: Margaret
title: Too salty
text: I am a lover of all things caramel, and while the ice cream and the blonde bites were delicious, I found myself eating around the core because it was just too salty. Tasted like caramel flavored salt. Very disappointed in this flavor.

author: Ohlivia
title: I love it I love it.
text: Salted caramel core is in my top three. My eating tactic is to scoop the ice cream from the outside and then smash the back of the spoon into the core so when I take a bite the first thing I'm hit with is salty and then it's sweet.

author: Atsoli
title: Horrible!
text: My daughter picked up this flavor for me to try because I love Carmel. I have to say, this is the worst flavor I have ever had. The blonde fudge was bland but the salted Carmel was the worst. It was so salty that I couldn't eat it.

author: Ashley L
title: Has potential
text: I love Ben & Jerry and was excited about the Salted Caramel Core, BUT the caramel is WAY to salty. I even tried to eat it with more ice cream But the salty flavor is too powerful. Disappointed, I know Ben & Jerry could do better !

author: GodsGirl69
title: Caramel core was WAY to salty.
text:
Tried this for the very first time today. The caramel core was extremely salty. Way to salty to actually enjoy the caramel. Left a bad after taste.
On a positive note, the core was gooey and easy to scoop out with a spoon.

author: Mpitts
title: Not a fan of brownie chunks
text: I really can't stand the flavors with chunks of cookie/brownie. It seems like I'm eating something stale. I'm in the minority but I stopped going to a convenience store near me because all they carried were those types.

author: Raebirds
title: Too Salty for my buds
text: I had high hopes for this flavor, but the carmel core was way too salty. I was hoping for a sweeter kraft caramel taste. The blonde brownie bites were just okay...not much traditional brownie flavor. Won’t buy again.

author: Iceicecream430
title: Don’t buy this one!
text: I absolutely love Ben and Jerrys ice cream but this one was horrible. The picture looks like there will be tons and brownies and there were only 5 tiny bites in the whole pint. The caramel core was overly salty too.

author: Kaitie13
title: Where did the core go???
text:
So this used to be one of my favourite flavours! The Caramel is very salty and the blondie bits are very chewy but i love that!
The disappointment comes in the fact that the first few times i got this the core went right through to the very bottom! A thick gooey caramel all they way to the last bite. Each time I have gotten this since I have found the caramel to end sooner and sooner in the pint. This last container the caramel went about half way through .
Please bring back the core!!

author: Sparky
title: Core is misleading
text: I enjoyed the of flavor of the ice cream. But I was expecting much more caramel. When the label reads "Salted Caramel Core", I expected the caramel to be from the top to the bottom. At least that's what I think of the core to be. Like an apple core, it's in the middle from top to bottom. The core is the center of things.

author: gilderoy
title: the worst thing to ever be in my mouth
text: the caramel tastes like salty death. I think I have sodium poisoning from one bite. Gross as heck like why would you do this to people. Who let this pass the taste test??? Fr fr are y’alls tongues blind?

author: MikeA128
title: Used to love! Keyword’s “used to”
text: I found the salted caramel core shortly after discovering Karamel Sutra. Needless to say I fell in love! The flavors were amazing and the gooey salted caramel and blondie chunks went perfect together. Until the last 12, yes I said 12! Pints I bought, all fell short. They either had very few brownie chunks, the core stopped halfway through, or there was a pocket of air at the bottom where caramel should have been. I give up! I want my salted caramel, but not at 4.50/pt to be left unhappy.

author: Gabby
title: Didn't like it
text: I tried this ice cream when it first came out, didn't care for it. It seemed as though it was missing something and I really didn't like the salted caramel. I like the Karamel Sutra much better.

author: klyoliphant
title: Good ice cream, too salty
text: The sweet cream and blondie chunks were delicious, but the core was almost too salty to eat. The taste of salt was completely overpowering the caramel flavor. Good overall, just needs less salt.

author: DeeMarieT
title: Too salty
text: The core just tastes like salt with no caramel flavour. The ice-cream was floury & the blonde brownie pieces had no taste. Worst flavour I’ve ever had. Very disappointed. :(

author: Goodduncan
title: Love this-but need more
text:
I purchase this flavor A LOT. Probably too much honestly. I have lived this for a while. Recently the punts seem to be lacking be caramel core to the bottom of the pint and the blondies are missing. There’s like 2 spoons of the caramel and 3 pieces of blondie.
Like I said before, I live this flavor. I just hope the manufacturing can go back to when I first found this flavor and fell in love!

author: GAPat
title: Meh!
text: The ice-cream is disappointingly tasteless...why not use vanilla. The caramel us too salty and intense...why not swirled? The brownie bites were few and far between.

author: Jade_12
title: Brownies good, Caramel not so much
text: I love Ben and Jerrys! The brownies and ice cream were very good! The caramel was just overwhelmingly salty. I couldn't even eat it. Maybe it's just not for me. :(

author: Jmask
title: Very salty
text: I had looked forward to trying this flavor but found the core saltier than the ocean. As someone who loves caramel this is the worst caramel I have ever tried. I

author: VJRaye
title: SALTY!!
text: Typically I love salted caramel desserts (or caramel in general), so when I saw this ice cream I was eager to try it. That caramel core nearly knocked me over with its saltiness!! For me, it overpowered the combined flavor of sweet cream, brownies and caramel. I agree with the other reviewers, vanilla ice cream might have been a better balance. However, I do like the blondies. So close!! :-(

author: Drew C
title: Almost Delicious
text: the flavors are great and they work well together. Unfortunately, they do not work well with the core concept. The caramel would be much better if it were evenly distributed throughout the ice cream, rather than isolated in one huge pool. The blondies could pack a bit more flavor as well. So far, I have yet to have a variety of Ben & Jerry's core flavors that would not taste better if the flavors were evenly distributed. They almost taste like a cheap Ben & Jerry's knockoff.

author: USAFVeteran87
title: Great but really salty in the caramel core...
text: I bought this favor couple of days ago and thought what could be bad about a salted caramel core. Everything was great except the core was so salty that it drowned out the other favors. I do mean salty the 180 mg are in the caramel core. It left a nasty taste in my mouth. Anybody who needs to watch there salt intake shouldn't eat this ice cream favor.

author: Val3914
title: Salt core?
text: I bought this the other day and was so excited, but when I tried it, the core was way too salty. I love salted caramel, and all the other reviews rave about the core so I'm pretty confused.. Maybe I got a bad pint but it was like salt with an essence of caramel. Sooo overpoweringly salty; first time I've avoided a swirl or core :(

author: Kmorrow14
title: Please never discontinue.
text: I don't even understand how anyone could have anything bad to say about this ice cream. The sweat cream base is just the right about of sweet. The salted caramel core is almost bitter on it's own but when paired together they are such a great couple, plus the blondie bites! I am a digger and I never run out of these delicious gems. I will cry If they discontinue this one. For someone that doesn't want an overly sweet ice cream this is perfect.

author: Frankrizzo609
title: Perfect combination!
text: Honestly have no idea why people are complaining about this. There couldn’t have been a better pairing of delicious succulent sweet cream ice cream paired with blonde brownies and topped off with savoring salted caramel to make your taste buds smile with such joy. I’ve been buying a pint every week for the past 3 months and haven’t had the urge to try a different flavor. Please don’t ever discontinue this flavor it makes belly very happy

author: vtmaple
title: Shaken to the Core
text: My husband was away for the evening, and I felt like a little R&R so I headed to the store for some trusty B&J. I decided to go for a flavor I'd never tried. The description sounded so delicious. And delicious it was! Until, I discovered the core was no more than a dollop on top. At about an inch deep it just vanished, leaving me with nothing but the ice cream and blondies... pretty good stuff, but I'm disappointed at the lack of core.

author: MELA
title: Too Salty
text: That Salted Carmel Core is WAY WAY too Salty. I tired this when it firs came out and I hate it because it was too salty, but I decided to give it another try to see if the formula had been tweaked.. and nope, it has not. So So SO salty. Like others below, I scooped out the core and ate around what I could.

author: Nick
title: Great ice cream
text: This flavor is magnificent. The sweet cream ice cream works perfectly with the caramel and blondies. And the blondies are particularly great - soft and flavorful. I'm always scared that this flavor will go to the graveyard. Please, Ben and Jerry's, don't discontinue salted caramel core!

author: Shelby844
title: My parents by was disappointing
text: I wanted to try something new and thought this looked delicious. It was REALLY good, but less than half way down the “core” literally disappeared. I mean, the ice cream and blonde chi class were good. But I really bought it for the caramel core and kind of feel like I got jipped.

author: Laydgodiva
title: THEE BEST HANDS DOWN
text:
I LOVE this flavor!!!
I have been addicted to this since 2016!!!
It surpasses anything like it!
I love salted caramel ice cream. However it’s hard finding one WITHOUT chocolate!!!
Chocolate overwhelms the salted caramel for me!
However, salted caramel core gets it right!!!
The blondie bites are the cherry on top!
Please don’t ever discontinue this flavor!!!
If I could afford to purchase every pint, I would!!!

author: Cami123
title: I wanted to like it...
text: I really wanted to like this ice cream because I'm a die hard B&J's fan! However it just wasn't that great. The ice cream base was very yummy, it wasn't an overpowering flavor and the blondie chucks were very good! But the center, tasted like pure table salt and sugar mixed. It really was over the top salts to the point where I just ended up eating around it...I wish I would have gotten another flavor if I had known.

author: Leeanette323
title: What happened to the blondes bites?
text: This was my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor. I still love the sweet cream ice-cream and I adore the caramel core, but something happened to the blonde brownie pieces. They used to be soft and chewy, perfect texture and delicious. The texture has changed now they are hard and crumbly very disappointing. Thought it was a fluke but the last maybe 5 pints I've had from different stores have all had the same issue.

author: Alli
title: Delicious brownies but caramel is disgusting
text: I bought this last night and was very excited to try. Brownie was great but caramel was so salty that I couldn't even eat it. It was like someone poured a salt shaker's worth of salt into it. Did anyone else have this experience?

author: kpay
title: SO GOOD.
text: I've already told my husband that I just might cry if this flavor is ever discontinued. And we would need another freezer so I can stock up on pints. To the reviewers saying this mix would be better with vanilla ice cream, you need to check your taste buds! The sweet cream complements the salted caramel core so wonderfully. Although I will agree with others - more blonde brownie chunks please!

author: katiejanes
title: THE BEST!
text: This is truly my favorite ice cream flavor! I have introduced several friends to it, and they love it just as much! I introduced my husband to it when we were dating, and we actually had salted caramel core pints at our wedding instead of cake. The salted caramel is perfect for salted caramel lovers, and the blonde brownies are the best addition! I would 10/10 recommend this goodness.

author: Chickenleg
title: The best thing I’ve ever put in my mouth
text: This was the best ice cream I’ve ever tasted. The salted Carmel mixed with the sweet cream ice cream is Devine. When you hit a blonde piece it’s the most delicious mouth watering bite. I would recommend this ice cream to everyone I know. I could live off of this for the rest of my life and be content. I stalked up on these pints during quarantine. Ben and Jerry please sponsor me.

author: RKH123
title: Salted caramel with emphasis on the SALTED
text: The core concept is great because you get a lot of one key component. I normally love salted caramel. However, the caramel core in this ice cream is so salty I can't eat it. It isn't even a matter of mixing it together with the other ingredients to maybe make it taste better than it does in isolation. The salt just overpowers everything!

author: SaltedCaramelFan
title: Excellent blend of flavors
text: I’m tempted to give a bad review to see if they “reach out to me to make it right” by giving free ice cream...

author: Angie38
title: Tastes spoiled
text: I got a pint of this ice cream and i had to throw it out. It had an awful taste and the brownies were really gross and chewy; I spit it out and it left an awful after-taste. I checked the date on the carton and it’s good until 2019, so I’m not sure what happened but the ice cream was the worst I’ve ever eaten. Won’t get that again.

author: Gal Friday
title: Possibly my favorite flavor!!
text: I'm very surprised by the low reviews on this flavor. It is absolutely delicious. The caramel core is what makes this one so special. You can enjoy it all the way down to the end of the pint. It could use more blondie chunks (bigger ones, too) but this didn't detract enough for me to take away any stars. I LOVE this flavor.

author: Trina
title: Taste Amazing BUT...
text: I love the flavor combo of this ice cream but I just wanted more brownie pieces. I found myself trying to dig out what few pieces were in middle of my pint. Just a little disappointed. I just wanted more :( The overall taste of the ice cream was on point. I don't think a little more brownie chunks will mess that up. Thanks!

author: Jarrett
title: Almost perfect!
text: Ok so this was my first 'core' Ben and Jerry's. It was awesome. I love the experience of mixing the ice cream with the caramel. But where were the blondies? They were few and far between each bite. I was very excited about it everytime I managed to find a small piece. Also, are the blondies made by Greyston Bakery?

author: Shotgunshell
title: Best ice cream in the history of cream!
text: My husband brought it home a few months ago and now im addicted! It's so good i as in hospital having brain surgery and it's all I wanted! I give up meals so i can eat it. I don't like chocolate so it's so hard to find blonde brownies and salted carmel without chocolate. If I had a last meal it would be it!

author: PhoenixRises
title: My Favorite Core Ice Cream!
text: This one is my favorite out of the cores! I'm a lover of caramel and a lover of blondie brownies so of course this is a win! I can't see how the average rating is only 3.5. I don't get it. I don't know what people are tasting, because this is delicious. PLEASE don't get rid of this flavor!! I NEED it!

author: Christinel
title: Love salted caramel core!!!!
text:
Been buying this since it came out and lately the core has been less and less each time I buy it. The core only goes 1/2 inch and then none. Wish the core would go to the bottom of the container. Please keep the same ingredient but more core caramel!
Would give it five stars with more caramel!

author: parkesea
title: SO GOOD
text: I LOVE this flavour. Salted caramel and blonde brownies are my favourite thing, and to find them in ice cream was a dream come true. The only thing I wish was different: I know "Salted" Caramel is the name of the flavour, but it really was too salty - so much so that I found it kind of off-putting.

author: Corbin
title: Great potential, but lacking in brownies.
text: Tastes great and has so much potential, but the 6 pints of ice cream that I bought-all had a core of caramel with a couple of blonde brownies but nothing like I expected. It fell short of my expectations and I can't justify spending $5 a pint for ice cream that isn't chock-full of gooey goodness.

author: Raee
title: Finally something not chocolate!
text: This was a dream come true when I found it in stores. I was so excited!! I barely made it home. BUT... disappointment hit me in the face when I almost died at how salty the caramel is. Wow. Not enough brownies. I guess I'll keep searching for my perfect flavor. I wish you could Exchange icecream.

author: Jennni
title: My favorite
text:
My favorite flavour from ben&jerry’s! The salted caramel tastes amazing with the cream ice cream and i love the blondie brownies too. I live in europe and they do not have this flavour in finland, which makes me so sad :(
But every time i come to the states i buy it, because it tastes so good.

author: AmandaPanda
title: Hard Blondie Pieces
text: We have been buying this ice cream since it first debuted. It was our family favorite, hoewever, the last 6 pints we’ve bought have had hard, crunchy blondie bits instead of the soft, chewy pieces we knew and loved. This is such a disappointment and sadly, will make us stop buying this.

author: icecreamfiend
title: Life changing
text:
Truly. I’m in recovery from anorexia nervosa and you better believe that I’ve inhaled a pint of this ice cream every single day!!! The perfect ratio of salted caramel to smooth vanilla ice cream, and the brownie bits provide a nice touch of goodness.
Ben and Jerry’s: 1
Anorexia: 0

author: jasg517
title: Tastes Great but Caramel is too Salty
text: I got this a few days ago just to try. I really loved it!! The blondie brownies are so yummy. I really enjoyed the ice cream overall. However the salted caramel core was a little too salty for the ice cream. I couldn’t really eat all the caramel with the ice cream like I wanted too

author: Abp87
title: Can’t get enough of this ice cream
text: This ice cream. Y’all. This ice cream. The perfectly salted gooey caramel, the chewy chunks of blondie... ermahgerd. The worst part of this is we can barely find it anymore. BEN AND JERRY I swear to you if you get rid of this in the middle of a pandemic... I will never forgive you.

author: Ben123
title: Really, Really GOOD
text: I am writing this review as I enjoy a pint of this very ice cream. It is delicious and the flavors go very well together. The only problem was, though, that the caramel was waaay too salty, so I ended up eating around it. Nontheless, it was really good and I hope to buy it again.

author: sarah7
title: good but can use a little help
text: I think the sweet cream and caramel are great but I have bought this a couple times and the brownies just are off on taste. I feel like choc brownies would be better or to even leave them out. Far from gross but not as good as other ice cream which is a bummer with the price.

author: Kyure
title: Perfection!!
text: By far my favorite pint ever! Not to mention, SUPER addicting!!! The blond brownies are the beeeeessst, and with caramel? Truly my only companion in this quarantine, so i stocked up. World War IV could break out and as long as I have my daily B&J pints I’d survive just fine.

author: Jewels30
title: Caramel Core????
text: I bought this for the caramel core the first time and it was great. The second time with was a dollop of caramel on top. The third time an even smaller dollop. If you like just vanillia ice cream a little bit of caramel this is the ice cream for you. I am very disappointed.

author: Newks
title: It’s my favorite!
text: I bought this about a month ago and have gotten two more containers since. I would not say it’s a flavor for everyone but I love it. I love salted Carmel. The salt pairs nicely with the sweet ice cream and blondies! But if you don’t like salty sweetness this is not for you.

author: MicktyMac
title: Perfect
text: I am allergic to coco beans so finding a tasty ice cream with out any chocolate can become quite the hassle. When I, thankfully, came across this ice cream I was over the moon. The only problem I have with it is that I can't find it in any stores when I go search for it.

author: SadPint831
title: Disappointed, false advertising
text: First time buying a pint of salted caramel core. I was so excited! I immediately noticed a lack of blonde brownies and about half way through the pint, the caramel core disappeared. It looks nothing like the picture! There was a total of maybe 5 or 6 blondie pieces.

author: Umpalumpa
title: Salted Caramel with blonde brownies!!!
text:
Salted caramel + blonde brownies + B&J ice cream = what I plan to replace my blood with.
If you LOVE sweet & salty this was made for you. If you haven't tried salted caramel with blondies, Do. It. Now. You have not lived & I weep for you, you poor unfortunate soul!

author: KirstenBuckeye
title: First time wasn't love, second time was love!
text: The first time I tried this I thought it was wayyy too salty. I gave it another try a few weeks later and I love it now. The trick is to have a tiny bite of caramel with the ice cream since sometimes the core has a lot of caramel and sometimes it just has a little.

author: Kuhree
title: Incredibly Sweet
text: I usually get salted caramel core when none of my favorite flavors are available. Even though it's a last resort for me, I still enjoy the sweetness of the vanilla, the chewiness of the blonde brownies, and the incredibly rich caramel. It blend together perfectly.

author: Willcgo2012
title: Great concept, salty execution
text: I really love salted caramel and blondes. I think in this pint, though, that the caramel is wayyyyy too overpowering and there are too few blondies to enjoy. I ate around the caramel, but as the core spread through the rest, it ruined the ice cream in my opinion.

author: Anonymous person
title: Not enough Caramel or brownies
text: I think it should be a little more brownies and Carmel all the way to the bottom so you can have a little bit of caramels and brownie with each bite after a few scoops mine didn’t have any more brownies like it was only brownies in the top layer of ice cream

author: Ericb95
title: Lack of caramel
text: I bought this for the first time tonight 1/23/19 and was super excited because I love salted caramel ice cream. Upon opening the product I noticed that the ice cream had no caramel in it whatsoever. Highly disappointed especially for the price of a pint.

author: SlimDaddy
title: A Caramel Lover's Dream (With A Catch)
text: This ice cream is very tasty with the caramel core. However, my core only went halfway through and then stopped. I also wish the chewy bits were a little more flavorful and thicker. Other than being cheated on the core, I really enjoyed this ice cream.

author: Hanna
title: Best Ice Cream EVER!!
text: I have been obsessed with this flavor since the first time i had it! It's all about balancing the sweet cream and the caramel! Too much caramel might be too salty but too much cream might be too sweet. It a balance and extraordinary once you find it!

author: Kaohinani
title: MY FAVORITE
text: This is one of my favorite ice cream flavors of all time. The caramel is yes, salted! But I personally love the saltier caramel with the sweet creamy ice cream. And the blondie brownies are so YUM! I will be sad if they ever stopped making this one.

author: Jaclyn7
title: Barely any blonde chunks and core stopped
text: I was so excited to try this but I had barely any blond or chuncks in my ice cream and the core stopped half way through!! I thought the core was supposed to to all the way to the bottom. Very upset and this was my first time trying Ben and Jerry’s

author: cdmccune
title: Best Flavor Ever
text: I love this flavor, it is now my go to! It is the perfect mix of sweet and salty, only sometimes issue is that the core occasionally stops before the end of the carton. It doesn't matter to me though because I still love the brownies in it!

author: Boommm
title: Love this ice cream flavor
text: This is the absolute best flavor!!!! I love how creamy the ice cream is. The brownies are absolutely amazing full of flavor and very soft!! The caramel is super salty and sweet it's SOO GOOD I'm obsessed. Don't ever change the ingredients!!

author: Shane
title: Salted Caramel
text: As somebody who grew up on Ben & Jerry's I have been spoiled by so many delicious blends. However, this one was very tasty, but disappointing because the core kept getting smaller until disappearing halfway through and so did the brownies.

author: SarahS
title: It was good but..
text: I just actually finished a pint of this and while I like the idea and the flavors, it was very off balanced flavor wise. I can't tell if it was just my pint or what but it was overwhelmingly salty with little to none blonde chunks );

author: Tanya
title: Disgusting
text: I have loved b&j for many years. My favorite of course which is gone was Wavy Gravy. I bought this flavor because Karmal Sutra wasn't available, this is nothing like it, gagged on the first bite of Karmel SSSOOO salty!!!!!! Yuch

author: Jan2018
title: Great flavor but not much of a core
text: Unlike other reviewers, I enjoyed the flavor of the salted caramel. I didn’t find it too overpowering. I just wish the core made it all the way to the bottom of the pint. The pint I ate only had caramel at the very top

author: Dominique
title: Amazing icecream but needs a little more brownie
text: I brought this so manny times I love it really but the thing about it is that it needs a little more brownie dough in there and honestly I love the Carmel center but it’s just the brownies that need a little bit more

author: Amanda
title: Where's the rest of the core??
text: I loved this ice cream when I stared the pint but not even halfway through, the caramel core just stopped! I had to be a bad batch because no way that's how it's supposed to be. Sad because that was my favorite part!

author: Nina
title: Not enough chunks
text: Bought this last night and while the flavor was great there were literally only 5 chunks of blondies throughout the whole pint. I wish there were a lot more as it would have make the eating experience more enjoyable

author: Ice Cream Fanatic
title: Wonderful ice cream!
text: This is becoming my favorite ice cream, and one that I have come to crave. The only thing that would make it better would be more of the caramel - Ben and Jerry's makes the best caramel in ice cream I've ever had!

author: Caramel Lover
title: No Caramel flavor
text: I love anything caramel. Tried this flavor years ago - core was like creamy salt. ! Gave it another try recently thinking it may have just been a bad batch, but again, nothing caramel about it. Will not buy again!

author: tktilly
title: Love This!!!
text: This is one of the main Ice Creams that I purchase from Ben & Jerry's!! Absolutely the BEST is you like Salted Carmel. I do not understand why the rating is not higher??? But PLEASE DO NOT REMOVE this flavor. <3

author: MC Sea Salt Jesus
title: My Go-to Ice Cream
text: I buy this all the time because it's so delicious. The salted caramel and blondies create a tasty melange of awesome flavors. It's my favorite! I highly recommend it!!

author: LillyPad123
title: Least favorite
text: I bought this last night, the "core" barely even went halfway down the pint and there were only a couple chunks of brownie. Didn't even finish it, lacked excitement as all i was left with was vanilla ice cream.

author: naat
title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING
text: this is the best flavor of Ben & Jerry’s by far. If you’re complaining I don’t trust you; this is seriously the most addicting flavor. If they stop making this flavor I’ll cry. Soooooooooooo goooooooodddddddd

author: AnnArt
title: Love the caramel core
text: I'm a big salty/sweet fan so this ice cream is perfect for me. I see people complaining about how salty the caramel is, but that's honestly my favorite part about it! Devouring a pint as I type this review.

author: Jadira16
title: Not so good for the first try
text: Today was my first time trying it and I’m a little disappointed I thought this would be “ salty “ but NOT THAT EXTREME SALTY. I wish it was less salty don’t get me wrong I love caramel but this was to much !

author: create_world_peas
title: Love the salted caramel!
text: Due to health issues, I cannot eat chocolate, so this ice cream is a lifesaver! It's sweet, the caramel is outrageously soft and delicious, and the brownies offer a great bit of texture. I love it!

author: KayJay
title: Seriously Delicious
text: I think this is my first time writing a review for ice cream. But this flavor is just amazing. The chewy brownies are delicious and I love salted caramel. Perfect amount of salt in my opinion.

author: litig8rij
title: It's Very Simple...
text: If you like Baskin & Robbins' "Pralines & Cream" ice cream flavor, you will LOVE Ben & Jerry's Salted Caramel Core! However, be careful: It will add the weight on you -- it is just THAT good!

author: Mel429
title: Love this flavor
text: I love this flavor so much! I just wish the caramel core went all the way to the bottom. About half way down the pint the caramel goes away! It's so sad because this flavor is delicious!

author: Celeryluver
title: Heaven on Earth
text: I'm not sure how this flavor is rated so low! It is life changing.

author: linda1200
title: My absolute favorite!
text: I love vanilla ice cream based flavors and this one is the best. Blond brownies, ice cream and caramel are a great flavor combination. It is hard to stop eating it once I have started!

author: Hayhay8693
title: DEFINITELY GONNA GET THIS AGAIN
text: I bought this a less then a month ago and I can't stop thinking about it ahhhhhh soooo gooood but another one I really recommend is "the tonight dough" I rate that a 12/10 sooooo good

author: CaramelJunkie
title: Best Flavor EVER!!
text: Absolutely wonderful use of the core to have a luscious slug of salted caramel drilled down the center!!! Awesomeness!!! I will buy this flavor forever as long as it is available!

author: Not a Nancy
title: Best Ben & Jerrys Flavor ever!
text: Please never stop making this flavor! The salted core is perfect if you get a small amount of core on each spoonful along with a chunk of blonde with the ice cream it is to die for!

author: Cwoods333
title: My Favorite Ever!!!!!
text: I buy this ice cream maybe twice a week but the last two purchases haven't had caramel completely to the bottom and not enough blonde bits.....I don't know why but I still love it

author: voneout
title: Great Taste!
text: I bought it accidentally for my Birthday - I wanted something else - but, it is not that bad what I expected about the taste of caramel! More than likely I would buy it again.

author: VanessaB99
title: Perfection achieved!!!
text: This has the perfect example of what salted caramel should be. Smooth and silky with a salt/sweet balance that's downright addictive. Had to force myself away from the carton.

author: Iknowgoodicecream7
title: Best Ice Cream, Ever!!
text: I wish I had something bad to say about this flavor just so I can get coupons for MORE!! LOL I've never run across a bad batch. It's always DeLiCiOuS!! Thank you so much!!

author: Carat
title: Melody of flavors
text: The salted caramel core reaches my soul. The addition of sweet cream ice cream and blonde brownie bits complement the salted caramel as a perfect masterpiece of flavors.

author: KimLovesIceCream
title: Can’t Get Enough
text: I am so in love with this ice cream. Must always have some with me. The sweet cream ice cream combined with the blondie pieces and caramel are a match made in heaven!

author: Theo
title: Love it
text: This one is by far in my top five. I once had a flavor with honey bun pieces and caramel and was obsessed with it but this one by far blows that one out of the water

author: HBunny
title: Bummed about lack of swirl and blondie
text: Ben and Jerry’s has never let me down until now! Huge fan of the other flavors, but this was lacking with the burst of mix ins we all have come to know and love.

author: KKUU
title: Perfection
text: This is hands down my favorite flavor! I'm not a chocolate fan, so I appreciate every aspect of this. Each ingredient shines, but I love a good blondie chunk!

author: Obsessed
title: THE BEST
text: After trying dozens of flavors this is the one I keep going back to. The caramel core is divine and there's enough to go with every bite. I LOVE THIS FLAVOR

author: Dancer
title: Not so great
text: Very little caramel in the core. There wasn't any caramel until half way down. I've wanted to try the core flavors for a long time now. Won't buy again.

author: BrittaNYC
title: My new favorite!!
text: What’s not to love? I’m completely addicted to this ice cream. I fight with my husband when I feel he’s eating more than his fair share of the core.

author: TamHunter
title: Favorite Flavor
text: This is hands down my favorite flavor of ice cream! Please don’t ever get rid of this! I would sell my souls for a pint of Salted Caramel Core!

author: Lauryn
title: too salty and not enough brownie
text: I love the sweet cream and the blonde but the caramel is too salty and there isn’t enough brownie bits in it! Other than that it is DELICIOUS!

author: jelfers
title: Y'all are crazy, this is great
text: I love this flavor. The intense saltiness of the caramel is my favorite feature, and the blondie bits are divine. I eat it all the time.

author: jozz
title: best caramel I've ever tasted
text: this is the perfect ice cream if you are a caramel lover - that's it!

author: orion1two
title: One of my favorites
text: I love salted carmel, sometimes it doesn't have a lot of brownies and caramel. If they could make that more consitant would be awesome.

author: Katie5677765
title: My favorite, love alllll the caramel
text: I love the salted caramel core. It’s the best part. Hard to find ice cream with no chocolate but I finally have and it’s the best.

author: Bnjlover
title: The best!
text: This is by far my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor! Love the caramel core, perfectly gooey and the blonde brownies are sooo good!

author: DVDV
title: Wonderful taste with maximum flavour!
text:
It's the second time in a row that I buy this ice cream, and I dont seem to get tired of it :)
Just ate it a minute ago :))))

author: Rose221
title: My Favorite!!!
text: This flavor is my absolute favorite ice cream! It's so amazing! Sadly however, they stopped selling it in my local stores RIP

author: D1026
title: Best Flavor Ever
text: I tried this for the first time last week, and now I'm hooked. The ice cream alone is great, and the caramel core is amazing!

author: ag13
title: My favorite flavor!
text: My mom and I always get this one every time we go to the store. There's a lot of caramel, but it doesn't overpower you.

author: Kinger87
title: More Like 1/2 Core!
text: Caramel “core” completely ended less than half way through. What a joke! Apparently no quality control being done.

author: britni
title: AMAZING
text: This is the best ice cream ever. I am a fan. 10 out 10. Everyone should get it. Please let me sponsor this flavor.

author: Megcrum
title: Favorite one!!
text: I try new flavors, but always get this one too. It is the best flavor in my opinion. The caramel is delicious!!!

author: Possible
title: Best of the "Core" line!
text: I am giving it a full 5 because it is the best of this line. That said, I do wish there was more brownie bits!

author: Jackie0783
title: My Favorite!
text: This is my absolute favorite flavor.. please don’t ever take this away! I love the caramel core. The best!!!

author: GEN21280
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER
text: BEST ICE CREAM , IT IS DEFINITELY MY FAVORITE. ONLY THING THAT WOULD MAKE IT PERFECT WAS DOUBLE THE CARAMEL.

author: Jaee
title: Where are the brownies?
text: I bought this yesterday after some convincing and I'm disappointed I had maybe 4 brownie chunks in mine :(

author: Yessss
title: Mmmmmm...
text: I love the sweet and salt combination! Need more quart containers in you inventory besides Cherry Garcia!

author: qawsedrftgyh
title: the blondie and the center
text: It has a delicious flavor and It is so creamy and good The only word I can think of to describe it is YUM

author: Ecrocker14
title: This one is my favorite!
text: If you love salted caramel this is the way to go! And I love the blonde brownie bits in the ice cream

author: Casey
title: Perfect except for lack of core
text: I thought the core would go all the way through. It was only about an inch deep. Delicious otherwise.

author: Eovo5
title: Amazing
text: I've had this multiple times at our school store, and it's delicious. I could eat everyday, honestly.

author: Emilejoi
title: Mmm
text: Got this as a surprise and loved it! The salted Carmel core with the blondies was my favorite part

author: Angie63
title: The best ice cream ever!
text: My husband and I had this on our vacation in Myrtle Beach a couple of days ago and it was awesome!

author: Mfinn1
title: It is so good omlll
text: This is one of my top three favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor and definitely my favorite core flavor

author: Brittanyj
title: Ok
text: The flavor and idea is amazing but it wasn't enough brownies for me won't plan on buying again

author: Bridgespo99997
title: Not good.
text: The pieces in the ice cream are very dry and crusty. Not good. The core is pretty good tho!

author: Jewelljet
title: It hits
text: This flavor was exceptional imo, the salty caramel in the center was generous and so good!

author: KSU2221
title: Extra creamy, perfect amount of caramel
text: Extra creamy, perfect amount of caramel, not too sweet. This one is my absolute favorite.

author: AmandaB57
title: SO. MUCH. CARAMEL!
text: Love all the caramel down the middle of the pint! Great flavor without being too rich.

title: Salted caramel
text: Really good ice cream. Highly recommend it. The caramel core really tops it off. 9/10.

author: MondayMadness
title: Caramel Lover
text: Love everything about this caramel core!!! I am a caramel lover and this hits the spot

author: tammy99
title: Awesome mixture of flavors!
text: This is one of my top 3 favorites!!!!! Love the blonde brownie with caramel!!!!!!!!

title: Perfect combination!
text: It has all the good stuff! The flavors and gobs of blonde brownie are the best!!!

author: Jake349
title: Core doesn't go down to bottom
text: Core doesn't go down to bottom and isn't in the center also caramel is too salty

author: molita
title: DELICIOUS!
text: OMG, I have tried this by mistake & it is now my fave!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

author: destertcritict11
title: AMAZING
text: MY NEW FAVORITE FLAVOR. this was the most amazing ice cream i have ever tasted!

author: Queenratlady
title: My absolute favorite!!!!!
text: The most perfect caramel ice cream flavor on the market. I’m forever obsessed!

author: AmiHP
title: My new favorite!
text: Just the right blend of salty and sweet with silky smooth vanilla ice cream!

author: MsJohnson225
title: OMG!!!!
text: This was my first time trying this brand and I am in love with this flavor!

author: magz
title: Lacking Flavor
text: Caramel was lacking, brownies had no flavor, mostly vanilla ice cream only

author: Rippy 59
title: Taste
text: I thought the Carmel tasted burnt. There wasn’t enough other flavor.

title: Best ice cream in the world!!
text: I just ate this and did not want it to end. Must try before you die

author: James732
title: My favorite flavor
text: I’ve been obsessed with this flavor for Months . It’s amazing

author: TheDark7070
title: I love it but
text: I can't find it in Houston anywhere for the last 6 months

author: MamaTried420
title: Caramel dreams!
text: The gooey caramel makes this pint my personal favorite!

author: Lele
title: Tasty!
text: Addictive!!! Love this flavor! True Caramel fans only!

author: Jaessee
title: Anyone who says it’s bad is a liar.
text: It’s amazing, the best ice cream possibly of all time.

author: Mommie
title: Decadent
text: Can’t get enough! Best ice cream I have ever tasted❤️

author: Jacque
title: The Best!
text: My favorite ice cream of all time! I’m in love! Truly!

author: Lmurphy
title: Amazing
text: This ice cream is amazing. My whole family is obsessed

author: brendhaw
title: Perfect
text: THE BEST ICE CREAM EVER!

author: plang
title: my current favorite flavor
text: I will buy amost anything with salted caramel in it

author: Jjamie
title: Delicious flavor
text: Amazing smooth caramel .... great job on this one!

author: Daveusaf77
title: Good stuff
text: My all time favorite I go out of my way to find it

author: ChrisColby
title: So simple, yet so effective.
text: Ben and Jerry's took the peanut butter/chocolate flavor and knocked it out the park yet again. The peanut butter ice cream is great as always, but combined with the pretzel swirls, the flavor is heightened to an amazing degree. A nice little crunch to the pretzels as well for texture. The brownies aren't quite as good as in other flavors but definitely plentiful and still tasty. Put em all together and you get a salty/sweet peanut butter and chocolate combination that just works. A great flavor.

author: wormmoons
title: THIS IS THE BEST ICE CREAM IVE EVER HAD
text: The actual peanut butter ice cream is amazing, the brownie chunks taste like they were just cooked. The pretzel bits are the most amazing thing I have eaten, they are not too salty. They are not crunchy or too soft, evert time I get a bite with the pretzel in it I have to just stop and savor it. So far I have only found these at Target I have shared about eight pints in a couple weeks with my husband. Honestly it's the best ice cream I've ever had. Hard, soft, homemade, vegan or non, it's the best.

author: Greenarroweric
title: Awesome Flavor
text: I will start by saying that I'm not a peanut butter flavored ice cream fan(I'm an urban bourbon addict)the only reason I tried this flavor was I couldn't find my flavor. Boy did this flavor SURPRISE me. It's a must try.

author: KirstenBuckeye
title: Sweet and Salty Perfection
text: My top two favorites of all time are Tonight Dough and Chubby Hubby (tied for first place) and a close second place is Netflix & Chill’d! The brownie pieces were HUGE and the salty sweet combo was just perfection.

author: Naughtytink
title: Perfect ice cream!
text: This is EVERYTHING I want in ice cream! Peanut butter, sweet, salty & just enough chocolate. I hope it becomes a regular flavor.

author: bluejaysfan_1975
title: Love it!
text:
I love the PB ice cream rather than another flavour with gobs of actual peanut butter* throughout the pint**. The saltiness of the pretzel and chewy bits of fudge make tis quite possibly my new fave-flave. But...Everytime I look at the red couch on the label i can't help but think of tomatoes and thats not a flavour combo I wanna try anytime soon.*** Yuck!
* Don't get me wrong, I loves me some PB gobs but we got enough of those.
** I know that its not a pint here in Canada. But it sounds better than "2 cup tub o' B & J's"
*** If there IS a Tomato ice cream with chunks of marzipan and marshmallow swirl flavour in the works I'd beg you good folks to reconsider.

author: ambitious07
title: Amazing
text: I am in love with this flavor. I'm a big pb fan and it is very prominent.

author: Netflixchilledlover
title: An ALL TIME Favorite!!!!!!
text: This is just simply amazing. I am not one for ice cream but this has changed my perspective, so many perfect flavors wrapped into one. Sweet yet salty, enough toppings in every bite. WOW! I look forward to this every night!

author: AFerg
title: Way too salty
text: The peanut butter flavor is good and the ice cream is creamy, but the balance of salty to sweet is way off. This tastes like peanut butter ice cream with pure salt swirled through it. The brownies are soft but flavorless, so they do nothing to help balance the flavors. I normally love salty sweet combinations, but this missed the mark.

title: All the best flavors in one
text: The peanut butter, the brownies and the pretzels all together!! So good, perfect amount of sweet and salty. I need more!!!!!

author: Grover15
title: Delicious!
text: This flavor was AMAZING. I would not change anything about it! I never thought I would find anything better than Half Baked and Tonight Dough, but this flavor definitely made it up there with them.

author: Icecreamdream17
title: Underwheming
text: I was really disappointed in this one. Flavors were blah. The peanut butter icecream tasted more like vanilla and hardly any pretzel flavor. Chubby Hubby is a much better choice with similar concept

author: HBunny
title: Unique treat
text: Salty and sweet, but could use more brownie chunks and pretzel swirls to achieve sheer perfection! The concept is there but my pint had paltry mix-ins.

author: Rexx
title: The taste of happiness
text: Honestly the best ice cream I have ever had. I was expecting good, but this is a game changer. B&J ya'll never let me down!

author: Twizzle
title: Reminds me of my fave Candy Bar Pie!
text: I've be consistently buying this wherever I can! Please don't get rid of this!

author: Jorie
title: I love this
text: Please don’t take this away from me. It is the perfect ice cream.

author: Jroman312
title: Great taste and worth every penny
text: Best Ice Cream ever been buying and loving Ben & Jerry's Ice cream since 2013 thanks keep up the good work

author: Kitchen82
title: Best flavor ever ( please make permanent )
text: The first time I tried this I was in love, it's the perfect peanut butter flavor with the perfect amount of sweet and salty, it's amazing & the chocolate brownies add just the right amount of chocolate. I've bought probably 16 pints so far, maybe more. I'm in love!! I look forward to my treat at night and I dont know what I'd do without this flavor. Please please please #Ben&Jerry's dont ever take this one away, Netflix & chill'd needs to become a permanent option. I'll be so sad if y'all stop making this one.

author: Mokarran
title: Pretty good!
text: Great pb flavor! Love the salty pretzel swirl! But the brownie pieces were too big and chewy, like a dog eating pb. I think I’d prefer it with a fudge swirl and larger pretzel pieces. Will try it again, maybe it will have smaller brownie chunks. Peanut Butter World is still my favorite.

author: Carmalina
title: New Favorite for Ice Cream Addict
text: I bought a pint of this when it first came out and I ate the whole thing in one sitting. And another the next day. And another the next... this is my FAVORITE flavor, even better than any I've had from any specialty ice cream parlor. It's the epitome of sweet and salty. The pretzels are almost more like sprinkles of salt with a bit of texture, the fudge brownie is dark and rich enough to break up any monotony. I don't want this to ever go away (even if it's responsible for 90% of my quarentine weight gain) :P

author: Kkcott
title: Needs more brownie
text: I got the chocolate fudge brownie and yes there is a great amount of brownie but I think the ice cream to brownie ratio should be more brownie less ice cream!

author: Lexa
title: Bomb Bomb BOMB dot com
text: B&J did it again. The creamy smooth texture of the peanut ice cream contrasted with the swirl of salty pretzel goodness engaged with nice healthy chunks of brownies. Perfect combination of flavor and texture. Thank you B&J for making another wonderful creation. You guys rock!

author: gabby606
title: Simply amazing
text: I finally got around to trying this flavor and I’m so glad that I did! I’ve been buying Ben & Jerry’s for the past 15+ years and this is one of the best flavors I’ve ever had. The flavor of the peanut butter ice cream itself is incredible. I’m thoroughly impressed.

author: Tcrave
title: Way too salty
text: Honestly I think maybe I just got a bad one from the grocery store. The flavors were good but it was just SOOOO salty. I will probably try it again though, hopefully it was just a goofed pint

author: mc12345
title: Too salty, not sweet
text: This was the worst ice cream I’ve ever had. Peanut butter flavor mixed with pretzel is way too salty. There is almost no brownie, and the brownie pieces have no flavor. This would have been better if it was chocolate ice cream or chocolate fudge mixed in.

author: AnabolicAlbert
title: Sweet N Salty
text: Peanut flavor is exceptionally bold and delicious, however the saltiness is oddly mixed in, I’ve had bites of mild salty pretzel and really really salty bites. Could do a little better in that regard.

author: Marise
title: My Favorite flavour
text: I bought this 3 days ago and just bought a second tub! Its absolutely perfect. I love the salty swirls and the brownies are soft and delicious. Please keep this flavour!

author: TJSmith
title: Not good.
text: The peanut butter ice cream was chalky and salty. The brownies were made with a very bitter chocolate. The pretzels were in a mushy mass and did not look appetizing. This was probably the only B&J ice cream I have not liked.

author: suzi
title: Not very good, sorry
text: I am a fan of peanut butter cup and cookie dough, and birthday cake. But I think this one is too much. A simple peanut butter flavor with brownies and why not bananas would have been enough. Why the "pretzels"? It tasted like uncooked dough. at least put real pieces of mini crunchy pretzel. I'm even surprised netflix associated their name to this ice cream :(

author: Katty1002
title: Best Ice Cream Flavor!
text: Just tried this flavor and it’s officially my favorite! Perfect balance of sweet, salty and savory. The little bits of fudge are also SOOOOOOO GOOD! Can’t get enough

author: Weimerallie
title: Soooo Salty. Yuck
text: Not a fan of this flavor at all. Seemed to have the makings of an awesome icecream with all sweet and salty components, however, the pretzel swirls were so salty it made me gag. 0/10 would not recommend

author: SteveInChCh
title: One of the worst tastes ever
text: I really enjoy different ice cream flavors, but this is just disgusting.

author: ogremach
title: great flavor, gritty texture
text: Looked high and low for the new flavor and was excited to try (peanut butter is my favorite). The flavor of the peanut butter ice cream was not overpowering as I was concerned, but pleasant. I was disturbed by the texture of the ice cream. It felt gritty and the brownie batter swirl had a taste like chocolate, but was the consistency of taffy. Not my favorite flavor.

author: dino19
title: Not my favorite flavor :(
text: I’m eating this now, and it’s getting harder and harder to eat. The pretzel swirls are strangely too salty and the brownie pieces are too mushy. The peanut butter ice cream is okay. The combination of everything together just doesn’t work for me. Maybe it needs some texture? Some crunch? I still love you, Ben & Jerry’s!! I’ll stick to Phish Food and Gimme S’more.

author: Shar
title: Great!
text: Amazing flavors and amazing taste. One of my top 3.

author: RedCoyote
title: Salt Explosion
text: If you, like a horse, enjoy licking salt... than this is the ice cream for you. I really wish that the brownie parts were bigger and more brownie like. Also the pretzel dough bites are more like bits of playdough when it comes to flavor, and the added saltiness. Good Idea on paper, not so much in taste.

author: Sammy
title: Nope
text: How did Netflix approve this flavour? It’s been in my freezer for days, which never happens :/

title: Honestly
text: I bought this for the first time a few months ago, and wow. I was floored. This icecream is the most perfect balance of flavours ive ever experienced in a BJ pint. It is salty and sweet, but not too sweet as I find many BJ flavors, and not too salty.

author: RoyK
title: Anticlimactic
text: I was excited to buy this flavor but was quickly disappointed. To me the brownies tasted of rye bread, the ice cream was gritty (not in a good way, either). There was flavor of pretzel but I saw no pieces. I will probably go back to Phish Food next time.

author: Sydsscoops
title: Great concept that needs some tweaking in the lab
text: I wanted to love this flavor. What’s not to like? Peanut butter ice cream with pretzel swirls and brownie pieces—should be a hit. It is not. First, the peanut butter ice cream is WAY too salty. I agree some salt is needed to offset what could otherwise be a cloyingly sweet peanut butter flavor, but this kills any semblance of peanut butter flavor and is unnecessary given the pretzel swirls. Second, why pretzel swirls and not pieces or chunks? The swirls are weirdly soft and barely evoke the sense of eating a pretzel. Finally, the brownie chunks were just weird. They are the same ones as in Half Baked, where they work beautifully. Here, I respect the need to bring in a chocolate component with a peanut butter base, that’s a no-brainer. But why not go with fudge chunks or chips? The brownies brought no flavor to this pint and certainly did not help on texture. A slight re-tooling of the flavors and components would probably make this the ice cream dream the description promised.

author: Markhardman
title: To much salt nasty
text: Tried it for the 1st time wont ever buy agian way to salty.

title: A true review
text: This is probably one of the worst Ben and Jerry ice cream I’ve ever had. I love Ben and Jerry I’ve cream, but this one is just plain bad.

author: rayray96
title: I am building a shrine to this flavor
text: Okay, so when I saw this flavor first advertised I was out of my mind excited. I love peanut butter. I love brownies. And I love pretzels. But when I finally tracked it down in stores, I was disappointed because it wasn’t what I was expecting it to be. (Also, it melted a lot on the way home that day.)

author: Lexi143
title: It's Okay...
text: This flavor has such a fun name and sounded amazing, so I recently purchased it. It's not bad by any means, but I found myself wishing there was more sweetness and/or chocolate throughout it. I found the peanut butter and pretzel combo made it a bit on the saltier side, and it would have been nice to have some additional sweetness (like a caramel swirl or chocolate ice cream mixed in) to balance it out a bit more.

author: Not Tryna be a Karen
title: Missing the mark.
text: I love the peanut butter ice cream base. Very delicious and unexpected.

author: Lukas
title: Worst flavor I’ve had
text: Probably the worst B&J’s flavor I’ve ever tried. What a waste of calories

author: Hdg3327
title: This ice cream is the chip!
text: Bought this as soon as I saw it in store last week. If you don't like sweet and salty stuff, this is not for you. As other reviewers said: I enjoy the milk chocolate, lighter, ice cream with chocolate chunks. The "chips" come in little balls and are surprisingly cripsy and chip tasting. I hope they add these as a permanent flavor! The people who don't like it probably also don't like pineapple on pizza ..

author: rayelle
title: Intense
text: The peanut butter flavor was overwhelming to me and the salty pretzel swirl just layered on the intensity. However, i feel if there were more brownies throughout it would balance out. They all seemed to be clumped into the bottom of mine.

author: Sebs2020
title: Great Combination and Interesting Textures
text: This has been my go-to flavor for the past month. The flavors go together really well, finding a perfect balance between the peanut butter, the pretzels and the fudge brownies. Another great thing about this flavor is the texture that it has which is pretty unique. Every bite you'll find a juxtaposition of the grainy pretzels and soft fudge swirls,. A truly delightful experience for the tastebuds!

author: AngelinaNotAngie
title: Netflix and Chill’d is my new favorite flavor
text: It’s so good. The brownies are legitimately delicious as brownies, not brown blobs like other brands. The peanut butter ice cream and pretzel streak compliment each other. So good. I might give in and have it for breakfast today...

author: bananni
title: Great PB Flavor!
text: Everything about this ice cream is amazing...except the brownies. They remind me of the cheap cosmic brownies you can get at the grocery store. The pretzel swirls are so tasty with them PB ice cream though!

author: Ukiwi78
title: High Expectations Not Meet
text: Hard to go wrong with ice cream, peanut butter, pretzel and cookies. Somehow this does!

author: jwl2020
title: May be my new favourite
text: This... is so good! I think its a perfect combo of salty and sweet; Didn't think I was too much of a peanut butter fan but this tastes so good honestly. I think it might beat Baked Alaska as my new favourite! PLS PLS PLS don't get rid of this flavour I know it's probably a limited edition or something but just rename it to something else without the Netflix.

author: Lindseysprout
title: Too salty
text: I am a life long fan of Ben & Jerry's and love most so flavors. This is the only one that I could not eat. I had to throw it out. The main problem was that it was way too salty.

author: dubweisser
title: Love it! However, weird question...
text: The flavors and textures work beautifully together. This is an extremely satisfying ice cream for my palette.

author: ReganRex
title: What the heck were they thinking!?
text: This is a terrible "ice cream" - I opened the pint, ate the bit stuck to the top of the lid and gagged so hard. How do you make peanut butter ice cream tasted like crushed hopes and dreams!? I'm so irrationally angry at this pint of ice cream I may never buy B&J's again... The only flavor I ever loved anyway was the creme brulee...

author: Sleas_az
title: Meh...
text: I do KETO and this was my treat for my carb load day and I have to agree with another review that the pretzel pieces reminded me of eating sand...or KETO almond flour. Lol Alzo the brownie portion was sticky so it kept sticking to my teeth in am awkward way. Def not my fav flavor, sorry.

author: NicM
title: WAY too salty!!
text: I only had one piece of fudge and no pretzel bits! It was just pretzel crumbs & salt chunks in the middle. Sooooo dissappointed. :(

author: Geo85
title: Flavor= Salt
