text: Salt poured onto gross flavorless ice cream ... seriously not much else to say. Waste of money. Please go with other flavors.

author: jaylene
title: New Favorite B&J Flavor!
text: Can we take a moment to appreciate the delicious pretzel swirl in this, I need that in all my ice cream now! Such a great combination of flavors, the peanut butter ice cream is spot on and how Ben and Jerry's keeps their brownies so soft and fudgy is a miracle in itself. Love this flavor, so happy it looks like it will be a permanent flavor to the line!

author: elliot01
title: too much salt
text: About every few bites, there is a clump of salt that tastes disgusting and feel likes you're biting sand.

author: BoogieBoo
title: Hooked
text: I think I have a new favorite flavor. If they continue to make this flavor, I'm sure to get more!

author: Lunalillia
title: BEST ICE CREAM I HAVE EVER HAD
text: I am writing this while eating my favorite ice-cream ever ! Honestly, i've discovered it during quarantine because i could not find my flavor at the grocery store. Sweet and yet salty; mix of texture really i am obessed and you should definitely trying ! This is my first time writing a review for something but really it is so wooooorthy !

author: eliz13413
title: Very tasty, however...
text: I LOVE anything with peanut butter and pretzels, and this point delivers that in an excellent way. I don't care for the brownien pieces, however. They're too big and don't taste very good. I think small pieces of chocolate fudge would work a lot better. This will not stop me from buying more of this flavor, though, that is for sure!

author: Andrew1989
title: Tastes like salty nutty sand
text: I don't know if it was just my pint, but the chunks of pretzels were so small it was like eating sand that stuck to my teeth. I got this pint because I couldn't find my original pint Justice remixed anywhere, and I really regret it.

author: Bmp87
title: Meh
text: Was so excited about thia flavor. The peanut butter ice cream and pretzel swirl is bomb but my pint had 0 brownies!!! They need to rethink the final product. Its lack lust.

author: YouAreSalty
title: It’s not salty bro!
text: I’m not a big peanut butter and chocolate fan BUT The peanut butter is so subtle in this icecream and with the pretzels it creates a dream and balances out the brownies. It’s amazing, I thought the tonight dough is my favourite but this is giving it a run for its money in my favourites

author: Bambooninja
title: Wonderful peanut butter flavor
text: I bought this to complement some chocolate cake. The peanut butter flavor is fabulous. The salt from the pretzel enhances the flavor. I'm on the fence about the brownie because I found it a bit gooey. Brownies are a good idea but maybe make them smaller and more chewy.

author: SweetNSalty
title: Great Taste!
text: I've seen a few people complain about the saltiness. Pretzels are salty and it might not be the flavor for you. However, to those of us who love pretzels, peanut butter, and brownies: This is a GREAT flavor for those of us who like the sweet and salty mix of flavors!

author: Spisha73
title: Awesome flavors
text:
I loved the flavors of this (one of my favorites so far) ... my only suggestion ... (I understand that it says a pretzel swirl) but some extra chunks of pretzel pieces would be nice... unless I just got a
dud... but still loved and can’t wait to purchase again.

author: 22snew
title: Netflix n chilled
text: THIS IS THE BEST FLAVOR EVER!!!! this flavor has been available for less than a week and my roommates and I have already bought 5 (yes you heard that right, 5!) pints!! The perfect blend of flavors. I hope this is a flavor for as long as I live! By far the best!

author: Thebandits
title: Gave my husband a sweet tooth.
text: Delicious sweet-salty flavour is our household favourite. My husband doesn’t usually eat dessert and the first tub we bought, I had a single, humble scoop, only to find out the next evening that he had finished the pot. I wish I had a bigger freezer.

title: I've Bought it Three Times
text: Peanut butter and then the juxtaposition of the salt in the pretzels. So...read the review title and that's pretty much all. I watch movies with it, usually documentaries, dark comedies, or something uber tacky and sentimental like "Dumb and Dumber."

author: Debra8308
title: Simply amazzzin
text: This ice cream is the perfect balance of different flavors all in one! I just can not get enough. Just when I think I have had enough I gotta keep going back to get more of that flavor explosion! Great job, please please don’t ever stop making it!!

author: Cas4
title: Best flavor of all time
text: If they get rid of this flavor I’ll literally sob! It’s the best one they’ve ever made! I’m not an ice cream person but bought one out of sheer curiosity and I can’t stop. It’s perfectly salty and sweet! Hands down the best ice cream I’ve ever had!

author: givemethecream007
title: Golden ratio ice cream
text: The peanut butter ice cream is deliciously rich and creamy. The brownie swirls are gooey and proportional with every bite, which pairs so well with the ice cream. The pretzels add an awesome touch to a balanced sweetness, salty and not too crunchy.

author: IceCreamLovinBaddie94
title: So creamy and great flavours!
text: Absolutely love it, the peanut butter ice cream is amazing- such great flavour and texture and the rich brownie just cuts through the thick peanut butter taste SO WELL. Absolutely love this flavour, they have again delivered a master piece

author: TommyG
title: Interesting blend of flavors
text: The Peanut Butter flavor is very good although the fudge seems out of place and rubbery. The salted pretzel is a nice compliment to the PB but the overall blend of flavors reminds me of a PB&J sandwich. OK but not amazing.

author: sarah123
title: MY MOST FAVORITE ICE CREAM IN THE WORLD
text: I love this ice cream and the pretzel swirl is my favorite thing. I've been waiting for B&Js to come back with this flavor. I like how salty it is. I've bought many to make sure I am stocked up. Please keep this flavor!

author: Bloomable
title: It’s just Amazing
text: This ice cream is so delicious. As soon as I tasted it I knew it would be a regular in my ice cream rotation. It’s the perfect mixture of salty and sweet and the flavors are just balanced really well. Highly recommend.

author: haley123
title: SO good
text: Sunday cheat night arrived and I already knew exactly what I was gonna do with it. This ice cream is delicious - the only reason I gave it four stars instead of five is because I wish it had more pretzels/saltiness.

author: BreG
title: Where’s the Brownie?!?!
text: Love the peanut butter flavour and the sweet and salty preztel swirls. Great for peanut butter lovers! However, I was disappointed that my pint did not have a single brownie bit, as mentioned in the description.

author: Goon Squad
title: Best flavor of all time
text: I truly haven’t ever had an ice cream I like as much as this one. It’s creamy and has hunks of fudgey brownie with the salty peanut butter and pretzel pieces. I’m obsessed and I request a lifetime supply.

author: kw81
title: Great for PB lovers
text: I got a pint a few weeks ago and was blown away. For the first time, I found an ice cream with a decent peanut butter flavor. The salty pretzel swirl adds a nice little flavor boost. I need more!

author: rstap
title: This stuff is bomb!
text: I didn’t think I would even like peanut butter ice cream and now this is one of my all time favorites!! I love the bit of saltiness and the brownie chunks are so soft. Oh man, it’s so dang gooooood.

author: KayDee
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER
text: This is the best ice cream I have ever tasted. It is the perfect blend of salty and sweet. Please please please Misters Ben and Jerry make it a full-time product instead of a limited flavor.

author: Rehab Radio
title: NUMBER ONE
text: This ice cream is heavenly. I have never written a review for ice cream before but this particular flavor was LIFE ALTERING..PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE send more up to the Central Maine area.

author: dejofran
title: A bit too salty and not enough brownies
text: I would’ve loved more brownies and crunch pretzels. I liked the swirls but it was a bit salty. I’d choose chubby hubby over this one. I did enjoy the peanut butter ice cream.

author: Luandjoe
title: Wow just wow - pretzels where u at
text: Delicious. Tastes like a peanut butter party on my tongue. Lots of brownie came through but the pretzels didn’t get the memo. Hopefully they come round in the next bowl

author: Val22
title: My new favorite flavor
text: I looked EVERYWHERE for this and it was totally worth it!! So so so good. Keep your eyes peeling in the freezer sections and don’t miss out!!

author: RachelSuzanne
title: Great new flavor!
text: I love it. Please keep it around! I've tried both the vegan variety and the regular. Both delicious. That salty pretzel swirl. Wow. I also love the peanut butter base.

author: Jmoo
title: My Favorite... made me an ice cream person
text: I’m not one to choose ice cream over other sweets but this has changed that. By far the best flavor. I’ve bought a pint every week for the last 4 weeks. Delicious!

author: Talll
title: It’s my new favourite flavour.
text: I absolutely love the taste the combination between sweet and salty is perfect it’s sooooo good I literally finished the whole ice cream by myself in one day

author: Ellie2647
title: Baddiebx
text: My girl on TikTok names baddiebx recommended this flavour to me and my friends so we all brought it and it’s amazing I’m so greatful she told me about it

author: KWeez
title: What Dreams Are Made Of
text: My husband picked this up for me to make up for eating all of the Glampfire Trail Mix. And I'm so glad he did! Favorite flavor to date! Thank you! :)

author: cg27
title: DELICIOUS!
text: Delicious combination peanut butter, gooey brownie, and salty pretzel. Love the texture and balance of flavors, please make this a permanent flavor!

author: eeeeeejay
title: Please never stop making this flavor!
text: This is my favorite ice cream. We've been buying this regularly. The mix of salty and sweet is perfect. Please always make this flavor!

author: Jd24
title: New favorite!
text: I'm in loooove, the peanut butter ice cream isn't too sweet like many others are, and the salty pretzel swirl is *chef's kiss* perfect.

author: IceCreamGuy23
title: OH YEAH!
text: Bought this because I'm trying to try all the Ben and Jerry's flavors and was really happy with how great it is! Would buy again!

author: Lauren B
title: So much salt
text: Some bites are magical and some are HORRIBLE. I ended up tossing this day 2 because it was way too salty. Super disappointed.

author: Baroness
title: Best ice cream ever
text: Not usually an ice cream person but this flavour is absolutely amazing and I can’t get enough of it!Very bad for my diet!

author: lizagna
title: MY NEW FAVORITE
text: I was skeptical at first but this is my new favorite ice cream! Found it in Durham, NC - haven't yet found it home in AL.

author: Smully
title: Favorite!
text: I think this is my favorite! My bus and and I hide them in the freezer from each other because we don’t want to share.

author: Rachael86
title: Amazing!
text: This Ice Cream is the best! It is salty, it is sweet! The taste is heavenly please do not stop making this flavour!

author: AllisoninSF
title: My favorite flavor
text: The salty pretzel swirl sets this flavor apart. It's dangerous for me to keep this in my house--I just can't stop.

author: CarlySyz
title: PB ice cream- what could be wrong?
text: If you love peanut butter, you’ll love this. There is more fudge than pretzel- or at least there was in mine.

author: jaymz21
title: the BEST
text: Absolutely perfect combination!!! Creamy, peanut buttery, and slightly salty from the pretzels. Perfection

author: Melyy28
title: Great Flavors except the brownie
text: I like the peanut butter ice cream and the salty pretzel (my wife didn’t) but I’m not a fan of the brownie

author: JennEd
title: Fantastic!
text: My favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor and one of my favorite ice creams ever. Salty pretzels, chewy brownies.

author: dorie
title: Amazing
text: This is by far my favorite! I keep my freezer stocked when I can find them!! This flavor is a keeper!

author: Teach
title: Best DoorDash purchase!
text: Soooo delicious! Spoonfuls of happy in this paininthebackside pandemic! Well done, Ben & Jerry's!

author: Sgouveia
title: Best ever
text:
I loved the amazing combination of flavors from this ice cream!
I found my favorite Ice Cream!

author: joklein
title: Best ice cream ever
text: This ice cream is literally my favorite thing in the whole world. It's perfect in every way

author: Samir07
title: Best Ice Cream Ever
text: I LOVE this flavor. I bought one pint and have since bought 25 pints in (2 or 3 months).

author: angiemarie12345
title: Amazing taste!!!
text: Bought this yesterday and ate it outside on the porch. Best ice cream i’ve had in a while!

author: Smjones816
title: More fudge brownie
text: I bought this a few weeks ago, it needs more fudge brownie. Will go back to phish food.

author: Melanie122
title: Best ice cream flavor I’ve ever had
text: I eat ice cream nightly, this one beats every other flavor. Please never stop making it

author: Nikayla
title: Please keep this forever. I love it
text: Oh my lord. Best I’ve cream I have ever had!!! I go out of my way to find this.

author: casey0525
title: MORE THAN LOVED
text: this is by far my favorite flavor, i'm going tomorrow to get about 4 more lol

author: Gazz
title: Nirvana
text: This is the best ice cream I've ever had. Please never stop production.

author: QuitaB
title: And the Nominee for best ice cream flavor!
text: I am a Ben &Jerry's fanatic. Netflix and Chilled is soooooo bomb.

author: The Rockin Fig
title: Two Big Thumbs Up!
text: This flavor better not go away. I mean like EVER!!! So tasty!

author: Emmaaaaaaaaa
title: Dreamy
text: Bought this ice cream three times now and I’m obsessed. 10/10

author: Babyruth
title: Great flavor
text: The brownie pieces are awful but everything else is great

author: kjkj
title: The Best Flavor
text: This is by far the best B&J flavor ever. I devoured it.

author: PireLuvsIceCream
title: Its a nice flavour but..
text: I didnt saw any pieces of pretzel when i was eating It.

author: macalao
title: Couldn't be more delicious!
text: Wait... Maybe with some white chocolate pieces????

author: chelsealovesicecream
title: BEST flavor EVER
text: During quarantine I was living off of Half Baked...but when I went to the store all that was left was Chip Happens. Having been heartbroken by another brand's "Milkshake and Fries" I reluctantly bought Chip Happens. I am happy to report Ben & Jerry's NAILED this flavor. The lighter chocolate, chocolate chunks and the perfectly CRUNCHY salty potato chip swirl is EXACTLY what every sweet/salty craving is made of. I put on my quarantine mask and went back to the store and bought the 4 pints left. I need another freezer to stock this flavor. Hope it remains a regular flavor because it says "limited botched edition". Break quarantine and RUN to get Chip Happens!

author: horix
title: Please, never get rid of this potato chip flavor!
text: My favorite flavor used to be Late Night Snack because of the amazing innovation of the salty potato chip balls they used in combination with the sweet ice cream. The combo is heavenly. I've been waiting for years for Ben and Jerry's to bring back the potato chip ingredient and lo and behold yesterday at the store I found this flavor. It's even better than I remember late night snack being; the potato chip swirl provides a perfect salty and sweet combo in almost every bite. Please make this a permanent flavor; or at least release something else that uses this potato chip ingredient because I'll be SO sad if I have to wait years for it to appear again.

author: Skelly
title: Perfect Combo!
text:
Please keep this as a permanent flavor as I've introduced this to others and we all LOVE it! Just like as a kid putting chips in my peanut butter and jelly sandwiches, this ice cream is the best thing since then! Love the chocolate ice cream with the chips!! Would love if you kept it around!!! Was bummed when I saw it was a 'limited botch'
Thank you!!!

title: Love this flavor combo!
text: I tried this for the first time a few days ago and the pint is already gone. This is a perfect flavor for someone that likes the sweet and salty combo (e.g. chocolate covered pretzels). The chip pieces add a nice twist to the chocolate, and the texture/consistency is not weird. There are some bites that I feel the chip chunks are a little too big,but overall it is great!

author: chipalwayshappens
title: Best B&J's flavor!
text: I am a lover of all things sweet and salty, so when I saw this in my grocery freezer I just knew I had to try it. Ben & Jerry's did NOT disappoint with this flavor! I've searched for and bought this flavor countless times since I first found it a few months back, and I enjoy it a little more each time. The sweet & salty balance in this one is perfect. The only downside I can say is that the consistency of the potato chips are often in botches and not evenly distributed throughout, but that's nothing some scoop controlling can't fix. Please keep this one permanently!

author: Sierrastdenis
title: Amazing!
text: I was so excited when I saw this flavor! I am usually picky with different ice cream flavors. Ben and Jerry’s used to have a flavor that was called The Kitchen Sink...I believe, which was vanilla ice cream with chunks of potato chips mixed in! It was my absolute favorite! I was so upset when it was discontinued! When I found this ice cream I was SO EXCITED! I’m hoping this will become a permanent flavor!

author: Sydsscoops
title: Should be a permanent flavor
text: This achieved what Late Night Snack could not--it is a FANTASTIC flavor. The chip swirls have the perfect salt content and potato taste. They stay crispy, which is a great complement to the thin crunch of the chocolate chips and that smooth, almost milk chocolate ice cream. THIS SHOULD BE A PERMANENT FLAVOR. IT'S SO GOOD.

author: MJamz
title: Chip Chip Hooray!
text: Fresh off the taste test, I'd say this was a great addition to the flavor line-up! It's simple but different enough from the usual B&J's components (although those are great too!). I appreciate that the base is a bit of a lighter, milkier chocolate-- more like in Chocolate Shake It than Fudge Brownie. The potato chip swirl is fantastically crunchy and salty. I'd love a real mish-mosh with a split between chocolate and vanilla (or peanut butter), and BOTH the chip and pretzel swirl (like in Glampfire Trail Mix)... what botch heaven that would be.

author: JLI7
title: Blissful Contrast
text: I am not usually the type that likes a lot of mix-in’s in my ice cream, in fact, it would be accurate to call me a plain Jane. However, I just recently happened to go on to your website and saw that this was a new flavor so after a trip to the grocery store......my palette my most pleased. It was such a wonderful combination both with the velvety chocolate ice cream and then the salty crunch of the potato chips!! Well done———-you most definitely nailed it!!!!!

author: AthenaDog830
title: Can NEVER compare to Late Night Snack
text:
I have no idea why this has so many good reviews. This is a HORRIBLE flavor!! Bring back Late Night Snack before you bring back this GARBAGE. Late Night Snack was the PERFECT balance of salty and sweet. The chocolate covered potato chip balls and caramel were so so good!!
I love chips, but these are WAY too salty. The chocolate ice cream was a horrible choice, vanilla would have been better.
I have no idea how this even got made or why people like it. I am so so disappointed in you Ben and Jerry's. DO BETTER!!!

author: JayIceCream
title: Bring back Late Night Snack!
text: Can I express how excited I was to see this on the shelves? I was beyond excited since I was a HUGE fan of Late Night Snack. Upon opening the lid, I noticed chocolate ice cream with giant chunks of chocolate chips and potato chips.On my first bite, I tasted molasses and then bits of chocolates and potato chips. I wasn't a fan of the strong taste of molasses.. Perhaps I was expecting something similar to the discontinued Late Night Snack. Chips Happen wasn't bad but it wasn't great.

author: LAloveschips
title: Please keep this as a permanent flavor!!
text: Simple and delicious flavors with great texture! The potato chip stays crispy, and it works great with the size of the chocolate chips. If I were to change anything, I’d add some more potato chip swirls. Maybe even keep the potato chip swirls but then include chocolate covered potato chips instead of the chocolate chips? I really hope this isn’t a fleeting “limited botch”

author: Rayah
title: For all the people who dip their fries in a frosty
text: Absolutely delicious. Sweet, salty, creamy and crunchy. This is a pint of oxymorons and I love it.

author: Skarlet
title: PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE KEEP THIS FLAVOR!!!!!!
text: I’m obsessed with this flavor since I tried it. I can not believe how amazing it is. And the potato chips have the perfect crisp (don’t understand how) but it’s delicious. Please please please keep this flavor :(

author: lina uwu
title: This is literally perfect.
text: When i saw this i thought it would be gross because chips and ice cream seems just gross together but when my sister convinced me to try it i felt fireworks. the chips are perfectly salty and the chocolate isn't to chocolaty! Its perfect for people who eat dip their french fries in chocolate ice cream and its a fun and unique flavor to try out! would highly recommend!! :D

author: cmitch927
title: Make Chip Happens Permanent!
text: When I first came upon this early June I tried the pint and within 5 minutes it was gone. The rich, velvety milk chocolate ice cream blends well with the contrasting textures of chocolate chunks and salty potato chips. I find a reason to drive 10 minutes 3 times a week just to stock up on this flavor exclusively. I am willing to lead the charge to make this flavor permanent. It's genius! I was disappointed that imy local store had sold out. I hope you consider this as a Fan Favorite!

author: DelightandTuchus
title: My New Number 1
text: In the beginning my favorite was Coffee Toffee Bar crunch. Rich coffee, with satisfyingly semi-salted toffee. Salty-sweet taste combo stage-one unlocked.

author: Deanof316
title: Love the chips!
text: Whilst I still hold a candle for 'Chubby Hubby' and my all-time fave here in Australia...'Clusterfluff' (was soooo good!), I must say that Ben & Jrry's nailed it (!) for sure with this new netflix inspired flavour. Far superior to their earlier 'Netflix and Chilled' option I certainly hope this 'limited botch' ice-cream becomesa mainstay as it is delicious and perhaps the best ice-cream that B&J has in Australia atm!

author: HBunny
title: Had such potential
text: I was so excited to find this special pint - unfortunately, mine barely had the potato chip swirl I was looking forward to! Ben and Jerry’s are known for their ample mix ins, and this didn’t make the cut. Really bummed!

author: Pnw2015
title: Amazing sweet and salty
text: I’m a sucker for chocolate covered potato chips. This ice cream is my major weakness. The chocolate ice cream is the best (and I don’t care for chocolate ice cream). I hope this flavor stays.

author: Kate925
title: Should be a permanent flavor!
text: You guys nailed this one! It is perfection, the sweetness of the ice cream with a hint of saltiness of chips. I’d buy it every time I went shopping if it was a permanent flavor!

author: Buffalobabe
title: Don’t want to ever eat this again
text: I’ve had ice cream with chips before and enjoyed it so was excited for this one. But this flavor is truly terrible. My boyfriend and i each ate a scoop & decided to throw the rest away - a choice we’ve never made before.

author: Jules0408
title: Very Good!
text: I bought this in substitute of Americone Dream and I have got to say, I love this ice cream!! It tastes so good!

author: victorialee
title: Wonderful creation that makes the day better!
text: I didn't buy it when I first saw this flavor at the store because potato chips aren't the usual ingredient in ice cream. But then I was convinced by my sister to try it, whether I like it or not, at least I will actually know how I feel. And oh boy, was I delighted!!! It's truly beautiful creation..!!! It tasted like eating potato chips and drinking chocolate shake at the same time (it doesn't sound weird anymore.) The potato chip swirls are, in fact, CRUNCHY, and salty! So yummy! I am happy that I decided to give this flavor a chance.

author: Snorkie
title: Good idea bad in reality
text: Potato chips are dark tasting, like the crunchy burnt ends in kettle chips. First time I’ve gotten a flavor that I just couldn’t finish.

author: Sebs2020
title: Too Strange, Two Stars
text: Regular flavor made worse with potato chips. The combination of potato chips with chocolate ice cream is too strange for me. If you can't tell, I don't dip my fries in my milkshakes.

author: Ilikeicecream1002134
title: Make it permanent please!!!!
text: Perfect chocolate ice cream! I love the lighter, less intense chocolate ice cream that’s similar to one of my other faves (chocolate milk and cookies). It really tastes more like chocolate milk. The potato chip swirls are a perfect salty complement to the mild sweet. Im a huge fan of chocolate covered chips so this is right up my wheel house. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!

author: Nicki19
title: Best ice cream!
text: After Trader Joe’s discontinued their chocolate covered potato’s chips I’ve been in search for something close. This nailed the same flavor and was so much better. Great mix of sweet and salty. It’s like in n out fries dipped in their chocolate milkshake. Turned my whole family onto this flavor and we bought out the two stores that carried it. Please Please continue the flavor!

author: MamaCat
title: A grainy aweful mess
text: Ew, not good at all. The chip swirl is like chewing sand and it disrupts the rest of ice cream. This was not pleasant. Icky stuff. Wish I’d never tried it.

author: knscott
title: Please make this permanent!
text: I’ve never felt moved to write an ice cream review before - a friend recommended this flavor, which has been hard to find so when I came across a pint buried in the freezer at a store I don’t usually go to, I was excited to try it. Honestly this is one of the best combos I’ve ever had and I’m not usually a big fan of chocolate ice cream. The potato chips are insanely good and the mix is perfect for salty/sweet lovers like me. PLEASE consider expanding this beyond a “limited botch”!

author: Ashp
title: Make it a KEEPER!!!
text: I remember when A flavor called “Late Night Snack” was released a few years back and it was the first and only ice cream I’d ever tried with potato chips in it. I was put off by the idea of someone ruining ice cream with such an absurd idea but trust me people, potato chips and ice cream belong together!!!! I was bummed when Late Night Snack never appeared again but was ecstatic when this flavor released!!! Please don’t get rid of this flavor!!! My local store cannot keep it stocked because it is THAT good!!!!

author: Roomba
title: Nope
text: I love Ben&Jerry's but this flavor was a disaster. The chocolate doesn't mix with the saltiness of the chips and it just tastes so wrong.

author: jon1
title: Please make permanent!
text: this is my new favorite flavor. this chocolate base is better than any of their others and this potato chip swirl is incredible. i don't buy ben and jerry's that often because of the price point but i would for this pint! this is an incredible sweet and salty blend and i can't get enugh!

author: JustDesserts
title: My absolute favorite: please keep permanently!
text: Oh my goodness—this combination of salty and sweet is everything I need in life. I could never have another flavor of ice cream in my life and be just fine.

author: Miranclan
title: Please make it permanent!!!
text: I do not write reviews very often at all, but I really wish this was a permanent flavor and I am hoping if they get enough great reviews it will be. I was skeptical of course that it would just be soggy chips in a pile of icecream, but it is in fact crisp af. It is a must try flavor I wish I could find anywhere, but unfortunately I have to drive to one specific Target to get my hands on it. Thanks to Ben and Jerry's for all of their hands on support in the community.

author: macintosh1597
title: LITERALLY THE BEST FLAVOR EVER
text: My roommate brought this glorious flavor home for our late night binge and my life will never be the same. I have a huge sweet tooth so I have a lot of experience when it comes to ice cream. This flavor is the perfect mixture of sweet and chocolaty with a sprinkle of salty. It honestly reminds me of dipping a french fry in my Wendy's frosty, dare I say it. I am seriously in love, I can't find it in my local store anymore so really hoping it becomes a permanent flavor.

author: Kate001
title: Delicious!
text: I got this a number of days ago and it’s absolutely delicious. The chip swirl makes sure you get it throughout the ice cream. I really hope this stays in the collection!!

author: Castaway
title: Favorite of all time
text: Half Baked has been my favorite ice cream, but this beat it. I wish the whole potato chip, sweet salty thing was more popular because this is amazing.

author: BigTom97
title: My all time time favorite
text: This ice cream is my newest addiction. I have been buying as much as I Can before it’s gone. I’m begging for this to become a permanent flavor.

author: Chipper345
title: Please make it permanent!!
text: Chip happens is my absolute new favorite ice cream! The chocolate and salty mix BEAUTIFULLY! Please keep it around!!

author: Zoe2000
title: Too Salty
text: Wayyyy to salty I couldn’t even finish it. but I did enjoy the chocolate.

author: Bearsie
title: Delicious Chocolate, Iffy Chips
text: Love trying new Ben and Jerry’s flavors, so I immediately grabs this when I saw it on the shelf. Overall it takes like dipping fries into a Wendy’s Frosty. The chocolate flavor is AMAZING! However, I wasn’t a big fan of the chip “swirls”. It’s soft and doughy, but salty like a chip. The texture threw me off, and reminded me of salt dough. I wasn’t able to enjoy it. If they made just the chocolate flavor separately I would definitely buy it! Tastes just like a frosty.

author: wdb1974
title: One of the few good things to happen in 2020
text: What a great combination of flavors, I truly hope this will be around for awhile.

author: lizziea
title: If you get rid of this, I will cry.
text:
This is the best ice cream flavor ever. I'm someone who gets fries and dips them in a chocolate shake, and this ice cream is like that but with less mess, more texture, and more flavor. I love the sweet and salty combo, and I feel that the addition of the chocolate chunks are really what make this ice cream so unbelievably fantastic. And the chips -- they're in a swirl, they stay crunchy, and there's the perfect amount! The combination of textures and flavors is just amazing.
My only complaint is that this is a limited botch. Like the title of this review says, there will be tears from me if you get rid of this. This NEEDS to be a regular flavor, and I really hope this opens up the door for more sweet and salty flavors. Please don't get rid of this flavor! If you do, I will hoard as many pints as possible and eat them for years.

author: rexicon
title: if you ever dipped your french fries in a frosty..
text: i’m always a fan of the sweet and salty combination, especially chocolate and salt. i also love chocolate covered potato chips, AND i’m a fan of the show so this was a no brainer. it’s rich, the flavors work really well together and it’s equitably distributed throughout. i can’t express how much i love this flavor, how many pints my partner and i go through, and how much i hope it stays in permanent rotation. NAILED IT!

author: Faye
title: Make this flavor permanent!!!!!
text: Cherry Garcia used to be my favorite. I cannot get enough of Chip Happens. Please make this flavor a regular and not a limited addition. It will bring happiness across the world.

author: Sheri
title: Perfect Combo of Sweet & Savory!
text: Best new Ben & Jerry’s flavor since Tonight Dough! I almost ate an entire pint in one sitting, it was so good. It has all my favorite things in one ice cream! I certainly hope that you keep this flavor around, it’s too good to be a limited batch only.

author: marvelouscara
title: Amazing chocolate CHIPs!
text: I have always been a huge fan of chocolate covered potato chips, so when I saw Ben and Jerry’s had come out with a flavor including both of these flavors, I had to try it. I do not know how they did it, but getting the chips into the ice cream without the chips becoming soggy is a dream come true, and absolute magic as far as I’m concerned. I have found my favorite ever ice cream. Thank you!

author: BP13
title: Perfect Mix of Sweet and Salty
text: This flavor is freaking amazing! After falling in love with another limited batch flavor, I told myself I wouldn't try any others in case they disappear forever. Well when I saw Chip Happens at the grocery store I couldn't resist... and have bought a dozen pints since! The chocolate flavor is rich but somehow still light, the chocolate chunks add to the sweetness perfectly, and the chip crumbles are heavenly. 5 stars.

author: Mallory
title: I came here to write a review, didnt I?
text: This ice cream is my favorite. It’s salty and sweet at the perfect combination of happiness on a spoon. I want to stockpile it because I can’t imagine a world where I can’t grab this guilty please out of the fridge. It’s getting me through social distancing and COVID19 and the woes of the world. I beseech you, please make this a permanent addition. I’m begging. I’m pleading.

author: rzaun99
title: Nailed my all time favorite snack!!!
text: i love love love this flavor!!!! i was so upset when you got rid of the “late night snack” flavor a few years ago but this one is perfect!! please make it forever and ever ❤️

author: JBinMidTN
title: Please make this a permanent flavor!
text: Real truth, I’ve never been a huge fan of Ben & Jerry’s. Most flavors sound amazing but they end up being a let down. This is an exception. The chocolate base is just right and the potato chip ribbons contrast the sweet with just enough salty. It’s perfection.

author: 19mk
title: Unreal
text: My girlfriend was moved to tears of joy after her first bite, it’s that good. How on earth are the chips still crunchy? Amazing

author: Zaqj
title: Perfecto!
text: Honestly it's my favorite ice cream of all time and I'm super stressed that I can't find it anywhere. I guess on the bright side, my wife and I are no longer fighting over who gets to eat it and our marriage counseling bills have lessened.

author: Kanye south
title: Bad flavuot
text: Taste dreadful. I don't know whos idea it was to make this flavour but they are

author: panditachung
title: FAVE FLAVOR EVER!! PLEASE DO NOT DISCONTINUE!
text: Please make this a permanent flavor. This is hands down my favorite flavor I have ever tried....I absolutely love it. The salty crispy potatoe chips...my gosh!! I love having this as a treat daily. Keeps me sane during shelter in place. Also, B&J is a kickass company that stands for social and racial justice. Love their ice cream and their values.

author: Dmarie513
title: In love
text: Wow. This flavor is the best thing I’ve ever had! Absolutely amazing!!! Please keep it forever :)

author: jamesy
title: Kinda average
text: So I literally just bought it and was excited but I dunno it’s kinda mediocre. Obviously B&J makes fantastic ice cream this one just ain’t doin it for me. The potato chips are chewy not crunchy and they taste kinda fake I found myself eating around the potato bits.

author: RumorHasItGodIsATexan
title: Should be a permanent flavor
text: I was hesitant to try this, but it was on sale so I figured I’d got it a shot. Omg. I’m not usually a big sweet and salty person because I think it can make the sweet taste too sweet, but this ice cream balanced the flavors perfectly. Also the chips are somehow perfectly crisp and crunchy. Please make this a forever flavor!!

author: Zigfree
title: Awesome
text: Best ice every. Must keep making this ice cream!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Amazing blend
text: Amazing blend of smooth, then crunch, salty, and then sweet!!

author: Lauren123
title: PLEASE KEEP THIS FOREVER
text: I love it so much! The potato chip swirl is really good, idk who B&Js does it but it literally tastes like regular chips. The sweet and salty combo is bomb and the fishes chips are really good too. Please B&Js keep this flavor forever

author: bnimmo
title: Potato Chip Swirl!!
text: I had no idea potato chip swirl is what was missing from my life. I have told everyone I know about this flavor. It is incredible in its subtle way of mixing all the flavors and textures of smooth, decadent and crunchy, together. Sincerely, begging for this to not be just a limited release--it's too good to see it go away.

author: Traveltone1
title: A Game Changer
text: I am a 63-year-old mom, I have been eating Ben & Jerry’s for years. My ice cream of choice is Chubby Hubby, it’s been that for years but it just got knocked down to second place. This Chip Happens is the best ice cream flavor Ive ever had. Cannot get over how crunchy the potato chips are. How do they do that in ice cream and they’re not soggy. So unbelievably delicious.

author: Cassie1695
title: My favorite
text: His is my absolute favorite flavor now! Please keep it

author: IceCreamLady81
title: Please don’t take this away!!!
text: This is the best Ben & Jerry’s flavor I’ve ever had! The mmmm it has just enough sweet, salty, and chocolate. My absolute favorite! Please do not discontinue this flavor! However, in case you do, I am going to stock up.

author: Lilymc
title: This is the best
text: This the the best Ben and Jerry’s ice cream I have ever had where I live we don’t have a Ben and Jerry’s shop so we have to get it from the store and no place has it be cause it is everybody’s favorite we always ask when the might get a shipment and hurry to get it from the store I wish they would carry it more!

author: vjbjoe99
title: Potato chips are AMAZING!!!
text: Thank you so much for this flavor! I truly hope that it stays on the market. Ever since Late Night Snack got discontinued I've been hoping that you would introduce a new mix that included potato chips. It may sound like a strange ingredient to some, yet the salty sweet combo can't be beat! LOVE THIS FLAVOR!!!

author: Annie J
title: This chip is good!!!
text: If you're a sweet and salty fanatic like me, get this.. It's amazing!! I've been spreading the word about how amazing this flavor is. If you're wondering if the chips are soggy.. They are NOT!! Idk how they managed to keep them so crispy, but they are, and it's so amazingly tasty. Sad it's a limited batch!

author: dalis139
title: Perfect sweet and salty combo
text: Love Ben & Jerry's in general and this flavor did not disappoint. My curiosity was peaked by the description of the flavor and the "limited botch" label. It was delicious, reminds me of how I dip french fries in my milkshakes to get that sweet and salty balance. Hope this becomes a permanent flavor!

author: NINmuffin
title: OMG
text: This ice cream was so delicious that it made me write a review in the hopes it will not end up in the flavor graveyard like my beloved Vermonty python. The ice cream is packed with chocolate chips but the best part is the crunchy potato chip swirls. This is everything I need right now.

author: Willyum
title: Delicious! Make it a regular part of the line up!
text: Such a great combo! Please make this a regular part of the ben and Jerry’s line up.

author: Lemondrop312
title: Sooo good!!!
text: This is the perfect combination of salty and sweet. I really hope this is a flavor that sticks around and becomes a permanent flavor. You won’t be disappointed!

author: c0l0n
title: BEST, MOST UNIQUE ICE CREAM EVAAAAHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!
text: When my friend told me she'd found an amazing ice cream with POTATO CHIPS in it, I was like, "Ewwww. Who came up with that nasty combo?." But after I tried the flavor, I could NEVER go back. This is the BEST ice cream I have EVER eaten, and I pray God each night that it will not be limited edition. Thank you Ben & Jerry's!!! <3 Colin

author: Sean The Irishman
title: The best ice cream flavor
text: I was perusing the Ben and Jerry’s section when I found this beautifully delicious flavor. I was a little skeptical at first but as an Irishman I could not resist the delicious potato and I am glad I didn’t this is my new favorite. I hope it becomes a regular flavor.

author: Leah420
title: PLEASE KEEP THIS PERMANENTLY!
text: This is the best ice cream I have ever had. It is the perfect combination of salty and sweet. (Note, the chips are quite salty so if you're not into that it may not be for you) but holy cow it is for me. Please please please keep this as a permanent product.

author: SummerAnn1
title: Scrumptious.
text: I decided to go out on a limb and try this one day. I saw Ben & Jerry’s social platform and absolutely wanted to give this company my support. I was not disappointed. This ice cream is absolutely BOMB and Im so sad because it’s been sold out at my local grocery stores for a while. Please keep this flavor!!

author: elizabethhopee
title: A Snackers DREAM
text: This is exactly what I want in a snack, sweet and salty. There’s the perfect amount of potato chips and chocolate chunks you can get some in every bite. It was absolutely delicious and I wish this would stay a permanent flavor!

author: Tarheelswin
title: So yummy! The perfect sweet and salty treat!
text: I love everything about this! It’s even better than Late Night Snack (but where is that one? Bring it back, too?). We need more sweet and salty flavors, and this one had plenty of the chip swirl, as well as the sweet chocolate ice cream. Love love love this. Please add it permanently!

author: Berry
title: One of my fav flavors ever
text: I will be sad when I can't find this flavor anymore. It was my new favorite -- the chip swirl is delicious and the chocolate tastes almost malted. It's so good.

author: Bernie90
title: Salty sweet goodness!
text: I just bought this flavor today and I can tell you if you are a salty and sweet fan like myself you will love this ice cream. I really hope they keep this as a permanent flavor, it's a perfect combination of flavors. Please keep this one around!

author: LivS
title: AMAZING TASTE
text: I cannot say enough about these incredible flavors, the saltiness of the chips are unbeatable. I would buy 1 million of these if I had space in my freezer.

author: Liam
title: Best Flavor, Hands Down
text: This is the best Ben & Jerry’s flavor I’ve ever had, no cap. I made my boyfriend drive me to five different grocery stores until we found some & I (no joke) bought five pints. I DIE by Chip Happens. I would kill a man for this ice cream flavor.

author: ilovechiphappens
title: amazing flavor - please make permanent!!!
text: i've been waiting for a flavor with potato chip mix ins since ben and jerry's got rid of jimmy fallon's late night snack! please keep this one around

author: Cece
title: Best thing since Late Night Snack
text: This is the absolute best flavor since Late Night Snack. I hope this becomes a permanent flavor. Late Might Snack will always hold a special place in my heart but if this is the flavor that stays then I’ll take it! Absolutely the best

author: Blender
title: Perfect combo of sweet and salty
text: This tastes amazing ! I love the milder chocolate flavor of the ice cream which is more like a milkshake flavor and the swirl of chips is the perfect combo of crunch and salt flavor. Please consider making this a permanent flavor!

author: Chips please
title: I want this to be a part of my life forever
text: This is the best ice cream flavor, hands down, I have ever tried. I will truly mourn its loss if it isn’t made permanent. I have literally gone searching for it at different stores and I scoop it up (heh) every time I see it.

author: Nancy 410
title: Love this chip!
text: Please continue to make this flavor! The sweet of the chocolate and the salty of the potato chips is a match made in heaven. I bought the last pint at my local store today. Fingers crossed it will be available for reorder!

author: Tori1031
title: Make it a permanent flavor
text: It was love at first pint. And now I'm on my third. This ice cream is the perfect balance of sweet and salty, smooth and crunchy. Please consider making this limited batch into a full time flavor. You have truly Nailed It.

author: Rachelday9
title: So good oh my god
text: The potato chip crunch bits are just so good and salty and amazing. Probably my favorite flavor

author: stogra
title: Love the sweet and salty!!!!
text: Please make this a permanent flavor!!! It saved my quarantine! Love the crunchy salty potato chip swirl, the milk chocolate ice cream, and the perfectly sized chocolate flakes... please bring it back!!!

author: Bonn
title: Delicious...sweet and salty yummy!
text: LOVE this flavor combo. The sweetness and salty balance is perfect. Please keep it-yummy!

author: Mikeeeee
title: Amazing!
text: Seriously insane. The salty crunchy chip swirl ice cream mixed with the chocolate is the perfect combo. I was skeptical but this might be my favorite new flavor in years. Please make permanent!

author: bdg2016
title: Amazing New Flavor
text: I bought this flavor in the last couple of days and it is my new favorite! I used to love chocolate covered potato chips and can no longer find them, but this just beats that by so much more :D

author: JustJess
title: AMAZING!
text: I absolutely love this flavor! It's the perfect blend of sweet & salty

author: Mommomx02
title: Oh my Goodness!
text: Chunky monkey has been my all time but this is the best ! I love love love it! You guys nailed it, please don’t make this limited edition. It needs be a ever lasting flavor! Thank you!

author: Bribar75
title: Absolutely Amazing
text: I bought this Saturday afternoon and I love this creation! Deliciously sweet!

author: BTON
title: Great combo
text: Luv the chocolate taste with the salty crunch of the chips. Great combo

author: shameIceCream
title: Forbidden Levels of Pleasure
text: This flavor is so good, it hurts. Nothing should have this level of salty crunch mixed with sweet enough vanilla and chocolate ice cream. This pint completely destroyed me.

author: Ludalyssa
title: SALTY AND SWEET
text: Literally snack heaven. Sweet but not overly rich chocolate ice cream, chocolate chunks, and a thick ribbon of crunchy salty chip! So good. Please keep making this forever.

author: barberge
title: Mostly sweet, but just enough salty
text:
And chocolate. Need I say more?
Apparently so, to fill out the review.

author: scrapler22645
title: Creamy creme
text: Crunchy, choclatey goodness that certainly satisfied my craving for ice cream craving. The ice crame even has salt that thought would be terrible, but it was delicious!

author: william
title: AMAZING
text: this flavor seemed weird to me at first but now its literally my favorite i usually buy 3-4 tubs just because the taste is soo good and u still get a crunch love it !

author: Chocolatteeegurl2
title: Sooo good!!
text: These are three of some of my favorite flavors,I think it’s a great combination.If the product changes from limited batch,I would love to always buy this product!!

author: Shanmoney
title: Chip Delicious
text: I bought this today because I love sweet and salty, I am amazed that this ice cream is bomb, and the chips stay crunchy. Please keep this flavor.

author: GabyNicole
title: Please Keep!!
text: This flavor is my dream come true. I have never been an ice cream lover but this one right here...just made me one. Thank you for this!!

author: latenightsnaklover
title: Late Nite Snack is reborn!!
text: MY life has not been the same without that perfect little blend of sweet and salty. Thank the B&J gods for this true gift of the people.

author: Vand3
title: Salty sweet goodness
text: Salty mix of crunchy chips and dairy queen cone dip flakes in a chocolate ice cream. So good! Don't want to buy any other flavors now

author: Sama125
title: Heaven sent
text: Literally the best thing I’ve ever eaten in my life. I am so so so sad I didn’t know the last time I ate it would be the last time

author: NMikk
title: Delicious
text: Ben and Jerry was on sale last week at a local grocery store....ended up going back for three more pints of this!

author: Lulu1985
title: Looove
text: I love the sweet and salty combination! It is so good and addictive...definitely a go to after a stressful day!

author: Kal23
title: This needs to be permanent
text: Bought today and have eaten almost half of it already. I loveee it. I need this to be a permanent flavor :)

author: Vic2020
title: One of my favorites!
text: Please keep this flavor!! It’s the perfect mix of sweet and salty!! I buy it every week! So good!!

author: Court817
title: Awesome ice cream!
text: I was skeptical about trying this ice cream but omg it was beyond great. Such a great combination

author: LA Chrissy
title: The Best!
text: This ice cream is ridic- and the potato chip swirl really makes it something special. I love it.

author: Allycat
title: Sweet and salty
text: A perfect combination of flavors in this tasty treat. Really hope they keep making this flavor!!

author: Butch
title: GOAT
text:
PLEASE PLEASE MAKE THIS A REGULAR FLAVOR.
that's all
- A Loyal Fan going through Menopause

author: Treatz
title: Great new flavor!!
text: Salty and sweet. Smooth and crunchy. Don’t make it limited time - keep this flavor. Delicious

author: Aacash
title: The BEST botch
text: Hands down my favorite ice cream flavor to ever come to be. Hope this one stays around

author: AlexZ
title: Please make this permanent
text: This is a flavor combination for the gods...nostalgic chocolate ice cream and chips.

author: Nee23
title: Perfect for Sweet and Salty lovers
text: This was amazing! One of their best creations. It hits the spot for sweet and salty

author: Brunos Mom
title: Delicious!!
text: Bought this on a whim and it’s one of the best flavors from B&J’s that I’ve had!

author: MAppel
title: Try it
text: This has the Perfect amount of sweet and salty!!! I would def recommend this.

author: Ndwonder
title: MAKE THIS PERMANENT
text: Bought this on a whim and it is delicious! Perfect balance of salty and sweet

author: Richard
title: PLEASE MAKE PERMANENT
text: The potato chip swirl is incredible! Please make this a full time offering!!!

author: ABlu
title: Ate this in 10 mins
text: The salty, crunchy chip coupled with the sweet ice cream is to die for.

author: Dotticus
title: Please keep it!
text: Loved this! Great cravings combo. Please keep it permanently!

author: Kttest
title: A salty sweet dream
text: This is the perfect salty sweet balance and just delicious.

author: drasper
title: Best flavor yet!
text: Flip me over and give me some of this goodness!!!!

author: audrey the icecream lover
title: MY FAVORITEST ICE CREAM EVAARRRRRRRR
text:
Dearest Ben and Jerry,
Chip Happens is the most divine ice cream flavor to ever grace this earth. Honestly, the way the potato chips looked on the packaging looked a little suspicious. BUT, I was BLOWN AWAY WHEN I TASTED THIS MASTERPIECE OF A FROZEN DESSERT. I LOVE IT SO MUCH. it is the PERFECT combination of sweet and salty. And just REALLY GOOD. In fact, I recommended it to a friend, who once said his favorite flavor was mint chip. BUT ONCE HE TASTED HE THE HEAVENLY TASTE OF CHIP HAPPENS, HE WAS converted as well. We ate so much ice cream for two weeks and put hot fudge on it. It was really a beautiful experience. I will forever hold these memories close to my heart. A month later, I returned to the grocery store scouring the shelves for my beloved ice cream. And to my horror, I could not find it. I even had a whole conversation with a lady at the grocery store employee about how distraught i was. I returned home, sad, hungry, and heartbroken, for my beloved ice cream had left. But, I will not rest until i can experience this ice cream flavor once more. I am calling on you Ben and Jerry, BRING BACK THIS ICE CREAM FLAVOR. IT IS SO MUCH BETTER THAN YOUR STANDARD FLAVORS AND DESERVES TO BE RECOGNIZED FOR THE BEAUTEOUS FOOD ITEM IT IS. I WISH FOR NOTHING MORE THAN TO TASTE THE SWEET GOODNESS OF CHIP HAPPENS.
Love,
Audrey

author: Doglover88888888
title: OMG!!!!!! SOOOOOOO DELICIOUS!!!!!
text: Am trying this flavor for the first time right now. Took my first bite and fell in love IMMEDIATELY!! May just be my new favorite flavor!! Have tried a different brand of mascarpone ice cream before and it basically just tasted like vanilla. This is the complete opposite!! Definitely not just plain old boring vanilla!! Can NOT believe how amazingly delicious this is!! Everyone needs to try this now!! Would probably drive 10 hours to get this if i had to like omg it's just that good!!!!!!!!!! Please ben and jerry's-I'm literally begging you to keep this flavor FOREVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

author: Plumber
title: LOVE THE SWIRL
text: I love this flavor. It’s light but packs a POWERFUL flavor punch. And the swirl is kind of hidden by its color but man if you find a big pocket of it and try and isolate it, it’s the BEST. The chocolate covered pastry things have Always been crunchy in my 20+ pints to date. The flavor is just so boom in your face. The texture of the Mars alone swirl is insane. This is my 2nd favorite flavor behind Gimme Smore. So help me god if you guys discontinue this flavor or gimme smore, I will come down on you with the wrath of a thousand lightning bolts. Haha. Plz make a cake batter with chocolate chocolate chip swirl and a brownie batter something

author: Arubaman68
title: My Prayers Have Been Answered!!
text: I was devastated when the “Holly Cannoli” flavor was discontinued years ago. Every time I passed the ice cream aisle in my supermarket, I’d search for the Cannoli flavor, hoping to see it again. Just when I was about to give up, THERE IT WAS!!!!! I scooped up every pint I could get my hands on. This flavor is the best!! The sweet marscapone cream and chocolatey shell pieces make for a sweet celebration for the tastebuds. Thank you so much for bringing this awesome flavor back! Please don’t ever discontinue it again. You’ve struck gold with this flavor — it is truly is a treat!

author: antaresoceana
title: I think this is my new 2nd favourite ice cream
text: Oh man. Where to begin. Two bites and I knew. The marscapone ice cream? Dude. The cannoli shells? DUDE. They're so crispy it's almost like magic how crispy they stay. And coated in chocolate nonetheless! The marscapone swirl is something you almost forget about too but like not even in a bad way because you end up stumbling upon it without expecting to do so and it HITS YOU IN THE FACE WITH DECADENT FLAOUR. Also the chocolate chips are the mini's, the cute ones. Perfectly sized!! B & J knocked it out of the park with this one. A+++

author: Christine94
title: SO HAPPY IT IS BACK
text: Please keep this around forever! For over 7 years I have hoped that this day would come where my favorite dessert ever would return! Such a delicious ice cream!

author: Kalidoscope
title: Not half bad
text: The icecream itself is luxuriously fatty, so it does take some time to eat this as compared to opposing flavors. The mascarpone swirls is what I'd say takes the cake for me, though be aware that not all the chocolate-covered cannoli pieces will be as crisp as you'd expect them to be.

author: CraigShew
title: I eat one a day
text: This is so good, i have been eating one a day, please keep this around so i can keep eating it

author: jndnaps
title: Absolutely Terrible!
text: I love cannoli's and couldn't wait to try this. Finally found it and was so excited. But it was a total let down. This taste nothing like any cannoli I ever had. Absolutely terrible.

author: Soni
title: Thank you for making my dreams come true!
text: I have been craving, whining about, and reminiscing about this flavor for YEARS.

author: Scabicky
title: Cannoli? I don’t think so
text: Not only does this ice cream do nothing to remind you of a cannoli it does not taste good at all. The container says A fan favorite.Overly sweet with an unpleasant aftertaste. Took two bites and tossed the rest. A total misfire. Clearly those fans have never tasted a real cannoli or one of B&J’s better flavors,

author: Danilicious
title: Holy Cannoli!!!!
text: Bought this on my recent trip to Target. Had NO expectations...it just sounded interesting. To my surprise this flavor has quickly become my new fave! (Right under Half Baked) It seemed creamier than usual which I attribute to the marscapone. The cannoli pieces are delish and it is an overall pleasant experience. No clue why anyone would call it "plain" unless they were expecting the ice cream to be the flavor of the shell or something. If you are looking for something packed with flavor this one isn't for you. This flavor is meant to have when youre craving a more sophisticated dessert. Quick tip: let it sit out until its soft enough that you're not waging war between it and your spoon at every bite. Takes it to another level ;)

author: Fallerina
title: Where’s the shell pieces?!
text: The flavor is great, but there were almost no pieces of the cannoli shell in the pint. My husband and I both thought it was strange, and maybe a bad batch because you can always count on the pints to be pretty full of all the good stuff listed in the description. But not this time. And I see from another review that maybe this isn’t a fluke after all. The cannoli shell is the best part of the dessert, so it shouldn’t be skimped.

author: ChrisColby
title: Hopefully never discontinued again!
text: A delicious take on the classic Italian dessert, B&J's Cannoli is a winner. The base is described as a marscapone flavor. Now marscapone isn't typically used for Cannolis but instead ricotta. Marscapone is a cream cheese used for cakes and other desserts. While not quite fitting the theme of a Cannoli in that regard, B&J made the right choice for the sake of flavor. The base is absolutely like a heightened cheesecake. Almost as if their regular cheesecake flavor was mixed with the equally delicious buttery brown sugar one. It's fantastic. The swirl is the same flavor, so they blend together seamlessly for a full on sweet cream cheese taste. And the pastry pieces are the perfect contrast to the base. Crunchy and covered in chocolate, they remind me of the similar chocolate dipped waffle cone pieces from Americone Dream, and there are plenty in each pint. Whether it fits the theme or not, Cannoli is a great flavor that I hope stays as a mainline one for a long time.

author: whatdeanerwastalkingabout
title: Bland and Disappointing
text: Finally found this and regret it. It doesn’t taste at all like a cannoli, the bits were sparse and again, tasteless, like eating little chucks of chocolate covered cardboard. Waste of money and calories; just eat a cannoli.

author: LacySeesRed
title: If you like cannolis, you won't like this
text:
Do yourself a favor and put this ice cream down, walk over to the bakery section of whatever store you're in and get an actual cannoli. This tastes like someone added a crap ton of powdered sugar to artificially flavored cheesecake ice cream and blended it with stale cannoli bits (these could also be bran flakes for all I can tell but I'll take their word for it.)
So if you want a cannoli, get a cannoli and if you want Ben and Jerry's get a more reliable and well made flavor, they have so much better to offer than this.

author: RealIceCreamLover
title: Doesn't taste like a cannoli.
text: First of all traditional cannoli are made with ricotta, not mascarpone. This tastes more like tiramisu without the coffee. It's missing the liquor flavor of a cannoli and was too cheesy. It would be better if it had chocolate shavings, but the base is wrong. I ate it, but I would not it buy again.

author: Bionicbello
title: Makes my Italian knees shake with pleasure!
text: I happened to find this flavor when I went shopping today at Albertsons and I love all kinds of Italian cuisine. Cannolis are one of my favorite desserts. The flavor of this ice cream was delicious and tasted exactly like a cannoli! Perfect flavor!!

author: Jpan99
title: Not at all like a Cannoli
text: I was so excited to try this because I love a good cannoli. The taste was just wrong. I really didn't like anything about this flavor. The ice cream itself was marscapone which isn't what's in a cannoli. This was just a fail, cannot recommend.

author: givemethecream007
title: Good, not impressed
text: The ice cream is light and fluffy, just as expected from Ben & Jerry’s, but I think the mascarpone ice cream is just a variant of vanilla ice cream. The crunch from the chocolate shells is rad and the mascarpone swirls are delicious.

author: Meli24
title: Could’ve been perfect!
text: Bought this a few days ago after searching for a while. So looking forward to it. I loved the flavors BUT it should have had way more cannoli shell pieces. There were barely any at all.

author: gillian_belle
title: DELICIOUS
text: Chunks were found throughout and I really enjoyed ice cream so reminiscent of my fave dessert.

author: LeLe33176
title: My favorite dessert as an ice cream!
text: I absolutely love this flavor, and I'm glad it's back to stay and not a 'Limited Batch'

author: tati
title: PLEASE KEEP!!!!!!!
text: Please keep the Cannoli ice cream!!!!! It is the best EVER!!!!!

author: MichaelaLM
title: My FAVORITE is back!!!
text: Ben and Jerry’s limited batch Cannoli ice cream single handedly got me through law school!!! I have literally written the website 100s of times begging them to bring it back!! For years I have regaled my now fiancé with tales of the elusive, delicious limited batch Cannoli ice cream. Well fast forward about a decade and in walks my fiancé carrying not 1, not 2, but 3 pints of the permanent Cannoli pint. It’s just as delicious as I remember.

author: Giavana 12
title: Horrible
text: I usually love Ben & Jerry but this ice cream was horrible. It tastes nothing like a cannoli. I was so excited to eat this, and looked everywhere for it, and it's a total let down. The "cannoli shells" taste like waffle cones, and the mascarpone tastes horrible. This has a after taste and honestly just a total let down.

author: fishylex
title: Strange strong flavor, mix ins sparse.
text:
I was a big fan of the retired* Holy Cannoli. This version has a strange strong flavor from 1st taste. The mix ins were sparse, which was not right** regardless of whether I liked the flavor or not.
*Original was ricotta and pistachio ice cream with chocolate covered cannoli and roasted pistachios. It bombed and was retired one year later.
**Pint bottom: NOV0921BJ1 5095 22:59 67867261.

author: Jessieleigh
title: If you like cake frosting...
text: If you like cake frosting... then this is your ice cream. I don’t taste cannoli not even in the least. Just sugar, like cake frosting. I do like the chocolate coated pastry pieces but they were few and far between. I will eat it because i paid a lot of money for it. But pretty disappointed. There isnt any cinnamon flavor or rose water like i put in my homemade cannoli. :-(

author: Doreen
title: Not as good as the prior Holy Cannoli
text: Holy Cannoli was my second favorite Ben & Jerry's of all time. When I heard it was coming back as Cannoli, I couldn't wait to find it locally. Unfortunately, I was disappointed as it had changed from "Creamy Ricotta and Pistachio Ice Cream with Chocolate Covered Cannolis and Roasted Pistachios" and didn't taste as good. Bring back the old Holy Cannoli!

author: GoBlue99
title: Nothing like a real cannoli.
text: Chocolate chip cannoli is one of my favorite desserts. I grew up in Boston and know great cannoli. So I was very excited to try this flavor.

author: NillaRilla
title: Meh
text: Not my favorite.....Tastes nothing like a Cannoli.

author: Princess Qajar
title: Well....
text:
Your Cannoli ice cream
Which claims to be Sicily’s finest in flavors, is a complete abomination to the Italian community.
If you’re going to label the thick, creamy, tangy Italian cheese TWICE in your label, I should be able to taste it. Or better yet!!- see it in the ingredients list. Please refine this product.
Thank you

author: Mimi232
title: Good Not bad
text:
So one thing I love about this ice cream is the crunchy waffle cones covered in chocolate it’s very similar to Americone dream but I think I still prefer the American dream better because of the plain vanilla flavor with caramel.
This one I know is supposed to be the mascarpone flavor. It’s not bad but not my favorite.

author: Christi102
title: Needs more bits!
text: This ice cream is very good, however I think that it would benefit from having more cannoli bits in it. If it’s called cannoli it should have more cannoli in it.

author: Ikay
title: My favorite
text: I love cannolis and I love this ice cream but I wouldn't say they taste the same. This is really rich. On my first bite I thought it was a bit too strong, but it really grew on me. Love hitting those mascarpone swirls, and the pastry shell pieces are nice and crunchy. Happy it's permanent to the line.

author: billthecat
title: Would have preferred Holy Cannoli
text: I was so excited to see this. I was a little concerned when I saw that it was made with mascarpone ... which has no place in a true Sicilian cannoli. I should have known ... this is only what a grocery store cannoli would possibly taste like. Bring back the REAL cannoli ice cream: Holy Cannoli.

author: catcrazy73
title: Good stuff!
text: Found Cannoli in my store recently and decided to give it a try, as I'm from a predominantly Italian area and a fan of the real pastry. Tasty ice cream, super creamy and fun. Could use a bit more of the cannoli bits, though, which was the only reason it didn't get 5 stars. Still a top 5!

author: Jbi22
title: Underwhelming
text: Not sure how this is a “fan favorite”... the ice cream base is this weird artificial vanilla, the mascarpone swirl is this gritty, undercooked batter and the fudge cone flakes literally feel and taste like cardboard. I WOULDNT recommend this flavor unless you enjoying wasting your money

author: Norrrrm
title: First Ben & Jerry's Flavor I did not like
text: I'm a big Cannoli fan. The filling is so important but so his the shell. This just didn't taste like cannoli to me at all. I'm a native New Yorker and perhaps the filling and shells here are not typical of the rest of the country, but both sure are gold standard in my book

author: JLE90
title: Love it
text: Fantastic. Saw this in the store while working out of town in Jacksonville. Let’s just say the Publix gets bought out every-time I go. Since I can’t find Cinnabon anywhere this one is my new go to. Netflix and chilled is tasty as well classic favorites in one for that one

author: HaddieMae11
title: NEW FAVORITE
text: Wow. This ice cream is soooo good! So good I had to write this review lol. I think it could use a bit more cannoli pieces but regardless it's an awesome ice cream. Do yourself a favor and try it, it's for sure a new favorite of mine and I hope it sticks around forever

author: TheMayorReview
title: Terrible!
text: I was so excited to find ice cream that allegedly tasted like cannolis. It tasted like utter disappointment! It tasted absolutely nothing like cannolis! This mediocre monstrosity was literally just butterscotch with bits of chocolate covered waffle cones.

author: AnchorPointDeb
title: Tried it, loved it!
text: Not finding Chunky Monkey, I took home Cannoli and am so glad I did! I ate the whole pint in one sitting... good lord! I loved the still crispy bits hidden inside that lusciousness... yum! Hope this one makes it into the big league as a regular flavor.

author: Liz1
title: AMAZING
text: This ice cream is by far the best ice cream I've ever had from Ben and Jerry's. Big fan of cannolis and they could not have done a better job. The mascarpone swirls are to die for and I am proud to call this my happiness in a spoon!

author: Rozalynne
title: Did you have anyone who has eaten a cannoli taste
text: I bought this tonight and it is straight up vanilla ice cream with chocolate chips. Did there taste testers actually ever have a cannoli? This had no resemblance to the taste of a cannoli. So upset this was a flavor failure

author: Paigem212
title: New Favorite
text: I was really skeptical of the flavor because I’ve never had a cannoli before but I decided to try it because the americone was out at my grocery store and WOW! Genuinely this is my new favorite flavor *chef’s kiss*

author: CannoliFanGrl
title: Best. Ice cream. Ever.
text: I've waited YEARS for this flavor to return.... Nothing compares. Thank you for bringing it back! Please don't ever take it away again.... I don't want to live in a world that doesn't include cannoli ice cream!

author: Karen13
title: Holy cannoli this was awful
text: I love cannolis. This was no cannoli. Weird tasting ice cream. Hardly any mix ins, which was probably good because they just tasted like cardboard covered on chocolate. Don't waste your money or calories.

author: Mimi30
title: So happy it's back
text: Deliciously Different. The marscapone swirl is the best

author: Morgan546
title: Perfect sweetness
text: I bought this at the food store yesterday eager to try it. I honestly didn’t expect it to be nearly as good as it was! It’s just so sweet and creamy and the chocolate pieces add the perfect crunch.

author: mama
title: goood
text: people always complain that things never taste like the thing theyre supposed to but is that a reason to hate it? its good i dont care if it tastes like candy corn just a little its still nice

author: Caviggs
title: One of my all-time faves
text: I shed a tear in the grocery store when I saw that they brought this flavor back. It's the perfect balance of sweet and creamy with delicious chocolate, pastry shell crunchies. YUM!

author: Bluemeaney
title: TAKE THE CANNOLI!
text: Literally the most scrumptious B&J’s flavor I have ever had. I ate the whole pint *accidentally* in 6 minutes. I have built a shrine to its perfection in my fridge. FREAKING YUMMY!

author: Lacapaneus
title: Thank you for bringing this back!
text: This redux is better than the original cannoli flavor that I tried. The mascarpone made it softer than many other flavors and it wasn’t overly sweet like some flavors.

author: Idontusuallydothis
title: Best flavor I've had
text: I have a sweet tooth but Ice Cream is usually lower on my list of must have treats. This ice cream changed that for me. Love it. Happy it is back for good!!

author: Des02
title: Absolutely decadent!!
text: I am an absolute cannoli fanatic and to see that there is a cannoli flavored ice cream just blew my mind! I had to try it! Absolutely delicious and decadent

author: Mimi11
title: Best ice cream ever!
text: The perfect combo of crunch from the chocolate covered cannoli cookie and swirls of mascarpone I really hope this isn’t one of those ones that’s temporary!

author: Kayykaayy
title: So delicious
text: I got to try this flavor just the other day, and I am sure glad I did. This ice cream is one of the beat ben and Jerry's flavors I've had

author: acferg
title: Weirdly Artificial Tasting
text: Tastes nothing like a cannoli. Overly sweet, cloying ice cream with a strong artificial flavor and aftertaste. Would not buy again

author: Embe
title: Swirl texture is a little off
text: The flavor was okay, the chocolate covered pieces were a bit chewy. The swirl going through it had a bit of a grainy texture

author: Brianna98
title: Disappointing
text: I LOVE cannolis but this flavor missed the mark! It could have been amazing but it was so boring and not creamy.

author: Alexatar15
title: Great Taste and Texture!
text: The store I went to didn’t have the B and Js flavor I wanted, I am so glad I grabbed cannoli instead!

author: TonyP6
title: My New Favorite!!
text: This is my new favorite ice cream - hands down!! Absolutely love the all the flavors and textures!!

author: Delizioso
title: Sicilian treat by the ice cream king
text: Well done as always. If this ever goes away please bring it back as a seasonal holiday item

author: Tracy0712
title: MY NEW FAVORITE
text: I’ve never been disappointed with a Ben and Jerry’s flavor, but Cannoli is my favorite!!!

title: Good, But I Forgot it was in the Fridge
text: Decent and really sweet. But I forgot I had it. So...not so much like the real thing.

author: Cathy61
title: Too sweet
text: This is the first Ban and Jerry’s flavor I’m not crazy about. Wanted to like it more.

author: Emilou
title: Can i suggest a rename?
text: Awesome! I would have named it holy cannoli! Thank you for thinking of this one.!

author: LolaD471
title: Delicious
text: I love cannolis and this is one of my new favorites!

author: Alee
title: Excellent!
text: Great flavor. It is so rich and delicious I love it!

author: yum yum tum tum
title: Favorite
text: yassss! Love you so much..........................

title: best flavor hands down
text: This is my favorite flavor in the entire world please make it a permanent flavor!! I made all my friends go out and try it and we're all addicted. I have three pints a week. I wish I was joking. We single handedly bought all of the Gimme S'more stock in our grocery store. The day this flavor is retired is the day my happiness dies. :)

author: Chicksluvrock
title: Smart way to make a Smore's flavor
text: I have several favorite B&J's flavors, but I decided to go outside of my usual and get this flavor. With the first bite you can definitely taste a hint of marshmallow-y flavor in the base ice cream. It's different than just plain vanilla. I think they did a great job capturing that flavor. The chocolate cookie swirl and graham swirl is smart and I think it's a unique way to add the classic flavor of a smore. And of course, you can't go wrong with fudge flakes! I am a total mix-in and swirl junkie, the more the better, and Ben & Jerry's never disappoints with that! Great job on this flavor! Overall a unique take on a novel summer treat!

author: KGibby
title: Way better than the OG S'mores!
text: I've had many pints of the Gimme S'more while it's been out and tonight I accidentally grabbed the original S'mores, with the chocolate ice cream. It was the most disappointing moment when I opened the pint to find chocolate ice cream instead of the typical golden ice cream I was used to with the Gimme S'more. Gimme S'more is the perfect representation of what a S'more is: mostly composed of perfectly toasted marshmallows, hint of chocolate, and a great trail of graham crackers. I will be so sad when this pint leaves the shelves. And I will never make the mistake of buying the OG S'mores pint again. Too much chocolate to represent a S'more.

author: HarleyQuinn
title: My New Favorite
text: I recently had the pleasure of taking a tour of Ben & Jerry's in VT and this was the flavor sample of the day. Instantly, I was hooked. I've been buying some from my local CT grocery store since. There was a sale one night and the store was out. I sat on the floor and cried. While the ice cream base may not taste exactly like marshmallows, is delicious. Everything about this flavor is amazing!

author: laurenlaughs24
title: BEST FLAVOR EVER!!!
text: I am so sad that this is a limited batch. Gimme S'more is my all time favorite flavor and I've tried almost all the Ben & Jerry's flavors. It is like heaven in your mouth. The graham cracker swirl and chocolate cookie swirl are my two favorite things about this ice cream. Since the flavor is slowly leaving, my friends and I have gone to multiple stores to stock up on what is left. As you can tell we LOVE Gimme S'more and if you're a s'mores lover like me then it's worth the try!

author: Phish Food Fan
title: Breathe, it’s gonna be ok.
text: This is such a great new pint! I stocked up and my freezer is loaded with them. The ice cream, the swirls and chunks are so so yummy! If I could eat it every night, I would. This is a LIMITED BATCH! It did not replace S’mores. It’s still available in stores and online. Gimme S’more has come and will go again and regular S’mores will remain. The very first S’mores was retired but the one we’ve been enjoying for quite a while now is still there. So enjoy this for what it is and have your regular S’mores too.

author: VJ101
title: New Favorite Flavor
text: This is so delicious! It tastes like an amped up cookies and cream but with a graham cracker taste. A S'more is like a cookie so I'm not complaining. I also like it better than the Original. This is my new favorite flavor! I don't think the base tastes like regular vanilla at all. It may not be marshmallow-y, but it's definitely a "warm, dark" and border-lining a faint molasses flavor versus a sweet, strong vanilla if that makes sense. This is my new addiction. I think newbie Ben and Jerry's consumers will take a liking to this one.

author: tyler321321321
title: A worse version of the old one
text: I was having trouble finding my favorite flavor of B&J at the store, when I came accross this one that seemed to be an overhauled version of it. I bought it and took it home only to discover that it tastes nothing like smores. The chocolate cookies are good but have a really out of place flavor. They definitely should have had a soft fudge swirl or something instead. The graham crackers are the best part, but there just weren't enough. And the ice cream which says its "toasted marshmallow" flavor just tastes like vanilla. Overall very disappointing not just as a replacement for the old smores but for ben and jerry's in general. I really did not like this one.

author: ChrisColby
title: Not quite S'mores, but tasty nonetheless.
text: The new S'mores flavor is much better than the standard flavor from the company. Ben and Jerry's wisely made the decision to use a marshmallow base instead of chocolate, so it doesn't overpower the other components. The base tastes more like sweet cream than marshmallow but when combined with the fudge flakes and graham cracker, the result tastes very close to the real deal. My only complaints are that the chocolate cookie crumbs overpower what little graham cracker there is, losing the theme a little. And the fudge flakes are strangely limited. Still, the components all come together to provide a tasty flavor, and I hope this limited edition lasts as long as possible.

author: Gimmemoresmore
title: Best EVER
text: Honestly, I don't love ice cream. It's my least favorite dessert. But, about once a year I get a craving. I saw the Gimme S'more ice cream in the store and love s'mores so thought I'd give it a shot. Total game changer. This is the best ice cream I've ever had and I've ended up buying it like 7 times.
