I'm so sad it's limited edition and hope it becomes permanent. It's perfectly simple and complex-I wouldn't change a thing. I'm reviewing in hopes marketing people see its ratings and decide to keep it!!

author: sweatk
title: Bring it back!!!
text: I first tasted this heavenly creation on Dec 24th... And boy what a Christmas Miracle it was. The target I visited was out of my previous favorite Milk and Cookies, and I want in the mood for the "chocolatey-ness" of my other favorite the Tonight Dough.

author: Bip407
title: Prefer original S’mores flavor
text: I feel like this is a just a sweet vanilla ice cream with a cookie swirl, like cookies and cream. There was no noticeable marshmallow flavor, and occasionally I could taste the graham cracker. I much prefer the chocolate based s’mores flavor which was rich chocolate, and a creamy marshmallow, with the perfect amount of crumbly graham cracker. Really, what do you remember about s’mores over the campfire? The melted Hershey chocolate and the gooey toasted marshmallow, followed by the crumbly graham cracker. This new flavor really doesn’t have any of that except the memory of the gritty graham cracker, which was really only there to hold onto the chocolate and marshmallow.

author: Mimi232
title: Top favorite flavor!!
text:
I made it my goal that I’m going to try every single flavor of B&J that I can possibly get my hands on. And out of 10+ flavors so far, this is one of my favorites! I have tried the phish and loved it! I wondered how it would taste with a little bit of crunch and so I decided to try this and it did not disappoint!!! The fact this is actually a TOASTED MARSHMALLOW flavored ice cream!!! BOMB. and not only does it contain graham crackers but CHOCOLATE COOKIES BITS too. And of course a generous amount of chocolate chunks and the hints of fudge. GENIUS.
They really did it with this ice cream guys. I’m so blessed I got my hands on this.

author: nflamari9488
title: All I kept thinking was "oh man, oh man!"
text: I literally just bought this 20 minutes ago, put a little bit in a bowl, and decided I had to write the review. I agree with one reviewer where they said the marshmallow ice-cream doesn't really taste like marshmallow. However, I feel like that's a really difficult flavor to capture and the overall execution was very good. I totally tasted the graham cracker pieces and I LOVE the chocolate cookies BJ puts in their ice-cream. If I had to make a critique or suggestion, I would say maybe have more graham cracker swirls and/or flavor the ice-cream graham cracker and have marshmallow swirls with the cookie and graham crackers? I don't know though because I'm pretty overkill with my ice-cream. If it doesn't sound like I'm going to die it wouldn't be my first choice. All in all, I am so happy, I'm struggling to not get more, and I would be very sad if this never came back.

author: Drewbee
title: Gimme S'moreeee
text: Please bring this flavor back. I noticed one love came back again this year so ive been waiting to see this one too especially since I can't imagine a single person who tried this didn't love it. I saw one person in their review said they ate 3 pints a week. I ate a whole pint every single day the whole time it was available. Bought my grocery store out every time they restocked. I still have 3 or 4 a week but no other flavor compares to this one, not even my old favorite. This ice cream ruins all other ice creams.

author: Jenn01234
title: I have never been let down more
text: The original s'mores ice cream was a dream come true, it was by far my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor and I even drove to Vermont to tour the facility and get a cone there. When I tried this replacement I had hope to be wowed but was left feeling nothing but disappointment. S'mores do not have cookies in them so I am not sure where that idea came from, and normally I would like cookies in my ice cream but if I am looking for the flavor profile of a s'more this ice cream just doesn't deliver.

author: Bkeller08
title: Why change a good thing?
text: My favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry’s is S’mores, which I have been a fan of since it was called Marsha Marsha Marshmallow but it is the HARDEST flavor to find! I saw Gimme S’more in my grocery and got so excited! But when I got home, I was disappointed. I thought my favorite part of S’mores was the graham cracker swirls which are also in this flavor, but it turns out, the Chocolate ice cream was more vital to the awesomeness of the flavor than I thought. The “toasted marshmallow” Ice cream just tastes like vanilla. While the add-ins are good, the ice cream part of this pint leaves something to be desired. I guess I’ll forever be on the hunt for my fave flavor “S’mores” because you can’t beat it! They shouldn’t have changed a good thing!

author: Savv
title: PLEASE BRING IT BACK
text: I need this flavor to return. This was my favorite flavor of ice cream ever and I would buy multiple pints of it out of fear that I would go to the store one day and the “limited batch” ice cream would be gone. My heart broke as I checked the Ben and Jerry’s section of the freezer and saw that there was no more and it wasn’t coming back. PLEASE bring this back even for just a month so I can buy every stores stock. I’m serious, every time I eat ice cream now I just feel like it isn’t the same as gimme s’mores. I still check the ice cream section at every store I go to and I will continue to do so till it comes back :(

author: Cait5
title: Ok, but NOWHERE near as good as the original.
text: Don't get me wrong, it isn't bad. It's fine. But I'm docking it one star because it comes nowhere close to the original S'mores flavor--this strikes me as a disappointing remix. The ice cream itself tastes closer to sweet cream than toasted marshmallow, and it lacks enough chocolate to actually compare it to a s'more--chocolate is supposed to be a constant component of the dessert! While I prefer the original's chocolate base regardless; if this flavor had more chocolate chunks and a toasted marshmallow swirl like the original, it might be a lot better. But as it stands, OG S'mores is still my favorite ice cream flavor ever and this simply doesn't come anywhere close to it.

author: Sarahjo723
title: So glad they went back to the original recipe
text: I loved the 2014 version of Gimie S‘ more. I was so disappointment when the ice cream flavor was changed to chocolate. That being said, once they brought back the toasted marshmallow flavored ice cream, I was thrilled. I liked the chocolate cookies, but the ice cream felt more like cookies and cream than s’mores, so I just added my own crushed graham crackers. EVEN MORE RECENTLY I noticed they changed the recipe, again. This time it was perfected!! I no longer have to add my own graham crackers.

author: Lare Bear
title: A solid pint. Great use of flavor choice.
text: I bought this flavor last week while making a trip to my local scoop shop. Let me just start out by saying that smores is a hard flavor to really nail flavor wise. I really enjoyed the marshmallow ice cream. Alot of companies usually go with chocolate as a base for Smores and I think that its usually overwhelming and distracting from the marshmallow. So the star of the flavor show was definitely on point. The grahms are great and are a great topping used in alot of flavors lately. Unfortunately tgis pint suffers from the same thing most smores flavored things do and it was ultimately too sweet in my opinion. I enjoyed this pint but theres too many more to try to stop here!

author: Cassidy
title: Definitely missed the mark
text: S’mores is my favorite flavor EVER. So when I saw Gimme S’mores in my local grocery store I almost fell over I was so excited! However the excitement was short-lived because this is not s’mores. Not even the slightest bit. If I were blindfolded and tried this, I would never guess that it is s’mores flavor. The “marshmallow” ice cream is vanilla and there is no hint of graham cracker. The most overpowering part is the chocolate cookie swirl...which is not s’mores. Don’t get me wrong, the ice cream is good! If I were rating based on taste it would get 5 Stars. But I’m rating it based on how closely it captures the s’mores flavor. If I could give it a 0 I would because this is basically The Tonight Dough without the cookie dough and chocolate ice cream. So do yourself a favor and just get that because at least you have cookie dough.

author: Ateag
title: The Best and Most Missed
text: This was the best s'more flavored edible substance I have ever consumed. Every time I saw "Limited Batch" on the label, I dreaded the day that would be my last time seeing it on the shelves. Mercy shone upon me each time, though, as upon return to my home, all the dread melted away as I rejoiced and beheld Heaven's essence grace my mouth with the textured, creamy delight of Gimme S'more. Alas, the day finally encroached upon my innocent self that I would see in its stead, "One Love". I've since settled for Milk&Cookies which I know can never fill the void once occupied by the dessert of unmatched divinity. I dream that one day I'll once again taste the treasure graciously gifted to this unworthy world by the great Ben and Jerry.

author: Andy0418
title: Best s’mores ice cream I’ve had!
text: Way better than the previous s’mores recipe. Fantastic! I sat down with the pint and before I knew it, it was gone. Oops!

author: Disappointed625
title: Flavor regrets
text: As a long time fan of Ben & Jerry's, I have favorite flavors I always want. Being summer and seeing the store did not have any of my favorites, I thought I would try this "new" flavor. I have to say, it is not at all what I was hoping for. I am a marshmallow junkie and was hoping for toasted marshmallow flavor; instead, I felt like I was eating vanilla chocolate chip with some of those cake crunchies that you find in ice cream cakes. I will go back to my regular flavors or skip buying if Gimme S'more is my only other option.

author: ash84
title: The real deal!
text: I have been a hard-core regular cookie dough ice cream only fan for YEARS, but this flavor caught my eye at the beginning of summer and I haven't been able to buy any other ice cream since! It's the amazing cookie swirl that almost convinced me that I could love the Tonight Dough flavor, despite my hatred for the nasty peanut butter dough. And the ever so creamy toasted marshmellow ice cream was a pleasant surprise! Even the graham cracker swirl blends in perfectly so you don't feel like you have random dry crumbs messing up the texture! It's the perfect combination that at times tastes like what an Oreo ice cream should taste like! I haven't had my go-to cookie dough ice cream in over 4 months and will be incredibly sad when this masterpiece goes away!

author: moorejennie78
title: The original S'mores is better
text: This flavor does not remind me of S'mores at all. Why cookies? The chocolate flakes are more like big pieces... too big for this. I couldn't even finish the container. It wasn't worth it. first time I've done that with Ben & Jerry's. Hopefully you'll never quit making the original S'mores, even if they are only in the shops.

title: Best ice cream I’ve ever had in my life
text: I had an ad pop up on my Instagram timeline for this ice cream and I went and found it at my local H-E-B. The next day I went back and they were out. I went to 4 Walmart’s and 3 more H-E-B’s with no luck until I finally found it at target. I have now bought all the pints from my local target. Please send more every where in San Antonio. I need it to live at this point LOL

author: Tubs123
title: S’mores :)
text:
I really enjoyed this flavor! I was excited to try this flavor because the other s’mores flavor has chocolate has the ice cream which I personally don’t like, so I was very happy to see this one with a marshmallow ice cream! I will say, marshmallow is a hard flavor
to replicate, so the ice cream tasted more like vanilla to me. This flavor would have benefited from marshmellow bits mixed in. The chocolate cookie swirl and graham cracker swirl were amazing and crunchy! These swirls delivered on the s’mores flavor for me!

author: Natf
title: Not what I was expecting.
text: I love s’mores, and don’t get me wrong this flavor is great, but not what I wanted. I was expecting more of a s’mores flavor, and I would explain this ice cream as more of a “marshmallow cookie crunch.” It’s still good! Just not s’mores. It would be better with gooey marshmallows :)

author: OTstudent90
title: A miss unfortunately
text: I just bought this as well as my staple, cookie dough. Cookie dough was as usual amazing but this one was just a miss for me. It reminded me of the pint slices, not nearly enough toppings or pieces. It was mostly vanilla ice cream with some cookie pieces in it. Definitely not enough marshmallows to make it feel like a s'mores ice cream. Anyway, I love most of B&Js flavors but this one wasn't for me

author: Frog
title: Breaks my Heart this is Only Limited Batch
text: I like ice cream and I eat a fair amount of it but never have I had an ice cream that haunts my dreams like this one. This ice cream might actually be perfect. The toasted marshmallow base is excellent and not too sweet and the flakes of chocolate add the perfect crunch to the blend. I'm not a big chocolate ice cream fan and I think that making the base marshmallow allows all of the flavors to be appreciated as one instead of being overpowered by chocolate. However, by far my favorite part of this ice cream is the graham cracker fudge swirl. Holy moley! It has a fantastic texture and the taste leads me on a whirlwind adventure. I don't know what I have to do to make this more than just a limited batch but I will do it. Every time I go to the grocery store I hold my breath that it will still be there waiting for me, cool and delicious.

author: Givemesmoreforever
title: Tastes so good it should be illegal
text: This is my new favorite ice cream. While I agree that the base ice cream is not an exact replica of marshmallows, it does not taste like plain vanilla... more like the melted gooey inside of a marshmallow that’s not actually warm or gooey. The add ins are perfection to me between the swirls graham and chocolate cookie I’m in ice cream heaven. I have to carefully calculate my purchases so this is the only cheat on my diet each week! I hope it goes from “limited batch” to “here to stay”!

author: sarac99
title: beyond expectation
text: I love a good vanilla based ice cream flavor, and this did not disappoint. I was skeptical to try to the flavor because of the reviews that were already posted but it was amazing. I loved the graham cracker bits. people complain it's not like the regular smores flavor, uh hello duh the smores flavor already exists and is still in stores. This a tasty spin-off and does not disappoint

author: Westanhalsey
title: Favorite Flavor!
text: I have been buying this consistently for about 5 weeks almost like twice a week because I cannot get enough of this flavor. It’s honestly unhealthy for me at this point and for my bank account because I barely bought ice cream before taking a chance on this one. Delicious! The cookies and graham crackers are amazing in it. I literally went through the process of giving my info just so I could write this review in hopes that the flavor is continued and more people improve upon their lives by buying this flavor.

author: Taylorch4
title: Glorified cookies n cream
text: Hmm tasty but not s’mores. Just tasted like cookies n cream with some extra chocolate chunks. No graham cracker flavor. Wish the base actually tasted like toasted marshmallow, but unfortunately the flavor isn’t coming through. Oh well!!

author: Angie Mottk
title: Please rename this to Cookies and Creme
text: I love Ben and Jerry’s but they missed the mark on this one. This is nothing even faintly reminiscent of S’mores ice cream. Now this one replaced the original S’mores and I can’t find it. Very disappointed.

author: Tamami
title: I need this to be a permanent addition!
text: I love this flavor. Forget s'mores because that one is just old news. I bought and stocked up my freezer but now I am eating the one last pint... Please bring it back soon

author: DaveSaysGimmeSMore
title: My greatest Ice-Cream Memory
text: I first tried this flavor with my best friend and became hooked the moment those flavors hit my palate. I’ve gone through 6 pints within a week (multiple times), trying to savor the limited batch that was created (also in hopes of raising the number of pints sold, encouraging your company to keep them on the grocery shelves). There was never a time I’d leave the grocery without one of these pints. Until, my local grocery store finally ran out.

author: RS30
title: The old S'mores was so much better!!!
text: The previous S'mores was so much better. The chocolate ice cream tasted much better than the marshmallow one. When I went to the store and didn't see the other one anymore (which btw was my favorite flavor ever!) and saw this one I decided to give it a try, but overall I was very disappointed. The ice cream itself is not good and the chocolate cookies do not taste like s'mores to me. Please bring the old one back!!!

author: KerryB88
title: Overall NOT S'mores!
text: It's vanilla ice cream not toasted marshmallow. That alone was extremely disappointing. A little graham cracker swirl was ok. Just didn't go with the ice cream. I did like the chocolate cookie swirl. It basically was a cookies and cream ice cream taste. Only a little bit of fudge flakes but that's fine with me. Extremely disappointed. I love marshmallow.

author: Patty
title: Delicious
text: Gimme Smores is the best ever. My whole family loves it. Please make it a forever flavor. We can't get enough.

author: emilyab
title: No s'mores taste
text: It's ice cream, of course it still tastes good... but sadly this tasted nothing like s'mores. Marshmallow ice cream taste nothing like marshmallow, and the chocolate cookie took over the graham cracker flavor.

author: whistle_pig
title: In no way is this like a s'more.
text: The ice cream base is suppose to be a toasted marshmallow flavor but to me it is just vanilla ice cream. This ice cream to me tastes like cookies and cream to be honest, save your money and just make a s'more.

author: Wilhelm
title: Best Ben and Jerry's Ice Cream
text: Few Ice Creams in life have a perfect blend of flavor, texture, and eatability (which I know is not a word, but I have made it up for this review!). You can eat Gimme S'more! for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, and still be able to find a way to have more more bite as dessert. You can eat this straight, or as a dope milkshake. I really hope this flavor sticks and goes into permanent rotation. Good job Ben and Jerry - keep up the great work!

author: GimmeSmorePlease
title: Please Bring this Back
text: This ice cream deserves more than 5 stars. It is by far the best flavor of Ben and Jerry's I've ever had and every time I go to the grocery store I still check to see if MAYBE it will be back. My boyfriend and I were both obsessed with it and had all of our friends and family try it. This deserves to be so much more than just a limited edition flavor. The whole world needs to try it. I agree with the below reviewer that said when this flavor is off the shelf, their happiness died. There is a hole in my heart than can only be filled with this flavor.

author: timoteo
title: Best new flavor in years
text: Ben and Jerry’s, PLEASE keep this one around. I loved the old S’mores too but this one is so much better. I know most flavors end up in the graveyard but if this one ends up in the graveyard it will be a tradgedy on par with human trafficking.

author: SpecialSauceRemix
title: Best tasting s'mores ice cream I've ever had
text: My girlfriend bought one for us to try. Went back and bought each our own.

author: VanessaB99
title: Still needs improvement
text: I like this version better than the original, however it still doesn't taste like s'mores. There needs to be a smoky element, whether that be smoked salt or bits of charred marshmallow. Also there needs to be a LOT more graham. I couldn't taste it at all. This ice cream has the potential to be amazing & legendary. It's tough to re-create the taste of a real s'more though. Hope you keep trying.

author: FuzzyGut
title: So glad I had it while it’s still available
text: Delicious! Great ice cream and the swirls are perfect! I eat my Ben and Jerry’s with one of my son’s toddler spoons to help make the pint last longer (as I always eat the whole thing) but this one I couldn’t help but take huge bites anyway. I really like this flavor! I could have maybe gone for a little marshmallow swirl in addition just for a texture contrast but that’s not a big deal.

author: Savanna27
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER,
text: I have been FEENING for this ice cream. It is hands down the best ice cream I’ve had in my entire life. Do you know how tormenting it is, to find your favorite ice cream then it goes out of stock? Then you try a million different flavors and none of them do what the Gimme s’mores does. ITS THE BEST. PLEASE. I beg you. Bring this back as a permanent flavor. The people need it.

author: mags345
title: best s'more flavored thing besides actual s'mores
text: I am not a fan of s'mores flavored items. I like real s'mores. but this ice cream is exquisite. the graham and chocolate cookie swirl are stars of the show and on a backdrop of marshmallow ice cream, not a sharp sweet but a mellow and deep savoriness...its delicious. I had never tried the original "S'mores" flavor, but tried it after loving "Gimme S'more".. Gimme S'more is hands down the reigning champ, i feel the other s'mores tastes mostly like a rich chocolate, nowhere near as complex in flavor

author: Kyle86
title: Definitely better than the old S'more flavor but..
text: It's pretty much another cookie bit flavor similar to "The Tonight Dough" and "Milk and Cookies." It's pretty tasty though. So.... if you're expecting an authentic s'more flavor, you'll be disappointed. But if you like cookies-n-cream types compared to the two popular flavors I compared it with, you'll enjoy it.

author: tharrfuldodgr
title: Sequels are never as good.
text: I'm so sad they've discontinued the previous s'mores recipe for this.

author: Smorepls
title: S'more or less
text:
My most favorite thing in this entire world is s'mores. Anything Chocolate or marshmallow is good enough, but when you put them together it creates the world's best dessert!
Unfortunately this ice cream didn't taste anything like s'mores. It was delicious nonetheless, but I didn't taste the marshmallowy goodness that I was expecting. The ice cream tasted like regular vanilla, and there were some chocolate chunks in there. The Graham swirl was incredible and made up for the lack of toasted marshmallow flavor.

title: definitely not a s'more
text: So, it's not like this ice cream is bad, but the name and description are very misleading. I would call it more of a cookies and cream because there is no marshmallows. And it's not a very good cookies and cream. Definitely one of my least favorite flavors:(

author: tiana12332132
title: Better than the original
text: Probably my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. The marshmallow ice cream is super tasty, I love the chocolate cookies. The original s'mores flavor is too chocolate-y for me, so I much prefer this one. My only complaint: I wish there were more graham crackers.

author: MissyG
title: BEST FLAVOR EVER!!!
text:
This flavor absolutely tops any ice cream flavor I have ever tasted; and I love ice cream!
It may hold an extra special place in my heart as it was the sample of the day when we visited Ben and Jerry's in Vermont during a New England vacation. I have had a hard time seeing it in stock at my local grocery stores recently (and I've searched in a few) so I would love to see it more readily available and for it to be a permanent flavor! You will continue getting our business for this amazing ice cream!

author: Jerbear
title: THE BEST
text: I just bought this a few weeks ago and I wanted to try a different flavor and I was compelled to buy this one because of the description. I was very curious about this flavor but afraid it could be too sweet. After my purchase, I finished the whole pint in one sitting because the flavor is delicious! I can't get enough of this flavor. I was looking to buy a second in the grocery stores but I couldn't find any! It's apparently not sold everywhere but when you get the chance to see this flavor, do it!

author: Skyyphys mom
title: I Frickin Love This Flavor!
text:
I purchased this ice cream because I LOVE Smores but I'm not a big ice cream person (I mostly stick with vanilla bc you can't go wrong with that). After eating the entire pint in 2 days, I was basically begging my husband for another one. Thank you for taking my boring vanilla days and turning them into a rainbow filled, colorful painting I can live in. Yes, I'm a stay at home mom and my days are pretty
much the same. Please try to keep this flavor around and not bury it in a year. Thank you

author: kjm1
title: Ugh!
text: I may have gotten a bad one but there were no swirls of anything. Just specs of stuff. Plus it was very hard.

author: MontyJoe414
title: Loooooovvvvvve it!!!
text: From the first time I laid eyes on this cream, I couldn't go back to any regular flavor lol. Seriously, this flavor is soooo much better than the other over-powered chocolate based Smores that you all have. It's texture and flavor is impeccably balanced to resemble an actual Smores. Don't judge me, but it has even come down to me buying atleast 3 pints every other week just to keep my fridge stocked for the future lol. Just please take it off of the "Limited Batch" list. Pleeease!!

author: ritaaint62
title: Gimme S'more Forever!
text: I work at walmart. Over the summer I took to sampling a large number of different ice-cream pints, but once I discovered "gimme s'more!" the sampling stopped and I have settled into my favorite ice-cream. While I refuse to share my pint, I would encourage others to get their own. With this flavor, there are no regrets.

author: SenseiEvan
title: This should be chocolate.
text: I can’t find regular S’mores anywhere anymore. This is a sad excuse for a replacement if that’s what’s happening. It’s your best flavor.

author: Szigler
title: Not smores
text: There are no graham crackers or marshmallow swirls. Doesn't even taste like smores. Chocolate chunks are the best part.

author: Escole3
title: Cookie swirls are AMAZING
text: The chocolate cookie swirls in this blew my mind. Combined with the graham cracker and marshmallow WOW so good.

author: JustBeingHonest
title: The Greatest Disappointment of 2018
text: I brought this flavor from my local grocery store yesterday because I've been asking for S'more ice cream with toasted marshmallows forever; the wait was finally over or so I thought. Unfortunately, this is NOT S'more flavored ice cream this is however cookies in cream. The "toasted marshmallows" taste exactly like the cream filling in Oreos and the double chocolate cookies like the Oreo cookie – Infinite sadness.

author: Linds1571
title: Amazzzinggg!!!
text: Chocolate Fudge Brownie used to be my fave until I tried this. I’m SO glad I did. This stuff is heavenly!

author: Streeturchin
title: I think cleaned put my local stores
text: My daughter and I loved this, i hope it returns as i think weve gotten the last ones at our local grocer

author: woodhouse
title: PLEASE MAKE THIS FLAVOR PERMANENT
text: LOOK. I am a busy person. We all are. And part of what makes being a busy person so bearable is ice cream. Especially Ben and Jerry's ice cream. ESPECIALLY THIS FLAVOR. When I tell you that this is like a sweet and creamy version of every campfire memory of your youth, I mean it. It is every good part about every good flavor that makes S'mores a gosh-darn ethereal pleasure right here on earth. So get in your car, walk to your subway station, or hail the nearest rideshare or omnibus and GET SOME OF THIS BEFORE THEY TAKE IT AWAY.

author: Mm56789
title: THE ABSOLUTE BEST!!!
text: Literally the best ice cream ever made. My new favorite. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!!!

author: Joy96
title: Best flavor ever
text: Currently stuffing myself with heaven and I gotta say this is the best flavor I’ve ever had

author: Heather810
title: My favorite!
text: This one is 10 times better than the other s'more one! Please keep making this one!

author: Ewillard
title: Best S'mores Ice Cream!
text: This ice cream is so good and I really wish Ben & Jerry's would make it year round!

author: Briguy425
title: I don't even like marshmallows
text: I have been on a journey to find the best Ben and Jerry's ice cream. This may be it

author: addylovatic
title: awesome flavor
text: So good- I’ve bought it several times. The cookie crumble is the best part.

author: Dani1234
title: AMAZING
text: My new favorite ice cream! So much better than the original s’mores flavor!

author: Amercole
title: The BEST
text: I’m going to be super disappointed when this flavor is gone. I love that there is ZERO chocolate ice cream, but instead wonderful graham crackers and chocolate pieces. The toasted marshmallow ice cream is perfect. This is literally the first time in 30 years I’ve been willing to spend money on Ben and Jerry’s (I don’t exactly see eye to eye with some of their views on certain policies and laws), but as long as they keep selling this, I will keep spending my money!

author: DBR96
title: BEST FLAVOR
text: Wish it wasn't a limited batch...I could eat this all year long!

author: mama
title: YES
text: this is so good please keep this flavor forever ohhh yeahhh

author: Melmel
title: Yes please!
text: I love the new Gimme S’more! It is my favorite flavor❤️❤️❤️

author: Icecreamfan
title: Great
text: Awesome flavor could be my favorite the texture is awesome

author: Shan68
title: Love it!
text: One of my newest favorite flavors❤️ I hope it returns.

author: Alwaysgimmesmore
title: Don’t get rid of it
text: It’s the best! Whyyy does it have to be limited? WHY

author: Mugsy
title: MARSHMALLOW
text: THE MARSHMALLOW ICE CREAM IS AMAZING please restock

author: Emily823579
title: Should not be a limited batch !
text:
THE BEST ICE CREAM !
Please keep it around!!!

author: upset
title: Not feeling' it
text: It didn't really taste like anything, just tasted like vanilla ice cream with specks of cookie and chocolate. And when I say specks, I truly mean specks. Trace evidence of flavor. Not a fan at all, tasted nothing like S'mores.

author: Clhatbix
title: Not very S'mores like
text: It's a good flavor...... but doesn't remind me of s'mores at all. It's more like cookies and cream with graham crackers. It should have the same marshmallow creme that Fish Food has and way more chocolate chunks.

author: mchardy
title: Give it a good ol' try
text: Upon first spoon, I was overwhelmed with the disappointment of too much chocolate. I assumed that it was just another foolhardy excuse of a s'mores flavored food that would be overpowered with chocolate. However, I persevered and did not give up. As I continued on in my journey, I was greatly impressed. The marshmallow portions in the ice cream were great. was it as up to par as my usual go to staple of the Tonight Dough? No, But it was good enough to wear I would purchase again if I needed something different in my life. It does get better. Do not give up on this flavor, you really just gotta commit. Not a total fail of the s'mores flavor, which tends to be a difficult one to portray, however not a total success. It is good, though maybe not a typical s'mores. I do not think it completely captures the essence of s'mores, however I think that it is decadent and delicious enough for me to purchase again.

author: sweetmel
title: Not the best
text: Please do not replace the previous s'mores flavor with this one. It hardly has any s'mores flavor at all. All I taste is marshmellow, where's the graham crackers? Nope, I do not want s'more of this one!

author: Lewsfancy
title: What a let down!
text: Ok, ok granted I love the original S’mores. I’m just tired of having to drive 37 miles (yes 37!) to get it. This flavor hurt my soul. The base didn’t have any flavor but sweet, the chocolate cookies part was ok. That honestly all the flavors I found. I’ll keep driving the 37 miles.

author: ilovesmores
title: I need S’more
text: Perfect name, because I can’t stop eating this and I need some more! Oh my gosh, this ice cream is SO good! It’s my favorite ice cream that I’ve bought in a grocery store, and my favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor since Fossil Fuel. I’m a lover of all things smores, and this is the best smores flavored ice cream I’ve had. I’m going to cry when it’s not in stores anymore. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor, it is too good to just be limited batch!!!

author: givejackiesmore
title: New favorite flavor!
text: I was very disappointed when I saw my boyfriend decided to buy this flavor instead of Milk & Cookies... to the point where I ate all the ice cream in my freezer before even thinking about opening this new pint. And boy oh boy was I so wrong - the combinations of flavors in this pint exceeded all expectations and Gimme S'more has now risen the ranks to my new favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. Don't get me wrong, I will eat ANY flavor, but now when I go to stores, I specifically search for this one! The only thing that makes me sad is that most places don't carry this flavor as it must not be as popular, but when it's available, it's embarrassing how excited I get. Don't sleep on this flavor like I did... I've never written a review for any product I've ever bought in my 27 years of life, and am happy that this is my first. I'd give it 10 stars if I could!

author: AmyDee
title: Please keep this flavor!!
text: I tried this for the first time about 3 weeks ago, and have bought an embarrassingly excessive amount since. It is so good. I love how the chocolate isn’t large chunks, and swirls with the graham cracker perfectly. Too often I find a flavor I like only to have it discontinued. Please don’t do that with Gimme S'more!! Keep it!! I promise I’ll keep eating it!!!

author: becca13
title: Best Flavor By Far!
text: I grabbed this flavor along with a few others when I was bringing a bunch of ice cream for a get together at my brother's home. I picked it for dessert and it was the most amazing thing I have ever eaten! When I was going home for the night, I made sure to take this pint with me!

author: SmoreLove
title: I will eat it because it is ice cream
text: I will eat it because it is ice cream, and B&J makes great ice cream, but I am very disappointed in the S'more flavor. I was searching for my long lost, always hard to find, favorite flavor that I recall having a chocolate base with graham cracker and marshmallow swirls. What happened to that glorious ice cream?! I was ready to love this new version but it wasn't meant to be. If you try again, Ben & Jerry, I will too.

author: PandaCVP
title: Best S'mores Ice Cream Hands Down
text: This flavor is everything a s'mores should be, and I sincerely hope it becomes a permanent pint in the lineup.

author: J_1880
title: Less than 5 stars is a joke.
text: Anyone who votes less than 5 stars tried the wrong ice cream.

author: Mfennec
title: Perfect
text: I bought this last week on a whim and was blown away completely. I went on a quest for it today. No one had it, so I decided to try the original S’mores. You guys. This flavor is so much better than the original. The lighter base really helps the contrast of the flavors, and it’s honestly amazing. Completely worth the calories where the original isn’t. I hope I can find it again before it gets discontinued.

author: mfro
title: Best Flavor Combination Since Half-Baked!
text: I had the pleasure of trying this flavor at the end of the tour, and it's the most excited I'd been about an ice cream flavor in fifteen years. The ice cream itself is phenomenal, as are the chocolate chips, but the FUDGE FLAKES are the winner in my book. Purchased two pints from my local supermarket (four states away) and it's just as delicious. Please, please, please, please, please keep this flavor!!

author: Smoreslvr
title: Great flavor but S’mores it is not
text: I was so excited to see this new flavor as I love all things s’mores. I agree with previous reviewers that it reminds me of cookies and cream. A very rich, cookies and cream. What it needs more of is graham and marshmallow, less of the cookie swirl. Having said that, I wouldn’t not buy it if I were in the mood for a little ice cream. Thanks B&J for introducing this new flavor. I hope you keep it around.

title: BEST EVER
text: I was in Denver, Colorado at a scoop shop and saw the flavor "Gimme Smore" I read the description and it sounded good. My friends and family loved it too, and as soon as we got back home we checked if our local grocery store had it and they did! We honestly probably bought 10 of them. Once it left the stores we were devastated and emailed to make sure it would come back and happily it did!!

author: Marie1007
title: So much better than the OG S'mores!
text:
I used to be diehard for the original s'mores flavor..as it became harder to find I found I just didnt love it as much anymore and I was looking for something to replace it with. Then I found this one! WOW its so good. Please leave it as a consistent flavor!
I have found I can only find it at Kroger sometimes. Publix does not seem to carry ANY new/ limited edition flavors.

author: B28078
title: Meh
text: Honestly very underwhelming. Maybe if there were more swirls of cookie and graham cracker, or adding marshmallow swirls would help. But I definitely won’t be buying again.

author: Smoreslover5467
title: Get rid of the other s'mores and keep this one!
text: Finally a good rendition of s'mores! So smooth, love the chocolate cookie pieces! Wish it had marshmallows in it like phish food, but oh well. Don't get rid of it please!

author: Talentchic
title: Love it beyond
text: This is my new favorite flavor. Tonight dough is a very close second. Hope this becomes more than a limited edition. Would be a staple in our freezer

author: Cab44
title: So Good!
text: I ended up trying this flavor because they were out of my favorite. It was so much better than I expected it to be! It might be my new favorite.

author: Kjbedell
title: So good! My new favorite ice cream
text: This is by FAR my new favorite flavor! The crunch from the cookies and graham cracker really makes it! I hope they decide to keep it around

author: Jaaay7282
title: Disappointed
text: It’s currently 1 am and I’m eating my ice cream that I have been looking forward too all day. It’s basically vanilla ice cream with cookies & grahm crackers. The ice cream does not taste like marshmallows & that’s so disappointing.

author: Monday16
title: Great While it Lasted
text: This was our favorite B&J’s flavor ever. It really tasted just like you were eating a S’mores from a campfire. It was a limited batch and it must be over because it is no longer available where we live. We tried the other B&J’s S’mores Ice Cream, while it is a good chocolate ice cream, it does not really taste like S’mores. Very disappointed it is gone.

author: Laura24
title: Not S’mores, But Still Delicious
text: This has all the elements of a s’more, but I don’t get that full s’more flavor when I eat it (I think because the marshmallow flavor isn’t very strong). That being said, it’s absolutely delicious. I love the different textures of the chocolate and graham cracker, and I had to stop myself from going back for more. I will definitely be buying this again!

author: Max18
title: Very Disappointing!!
text: I bought this for the 1st time when I couldn't find my favorite "S'mores" at the store. Very disappointing!! Tastes nothing like a s'more. It reminded me of a cookies and cream type flavor but not even as good! Please bring back the "S'mores" flavor! With it's toasted marshmallow, graham crackers and dark chocolate ice cream, it was delicious!!!

author: Threeb73
title: Yummy
text: I shared this with my five-year-old great nephew, and he said it was the best ice cream he's ever had.

author: Lemondrop312
title: Please make this a permanent flavor!
text: I absolutely LOVE this flavor! If I’m being honest, I don’t think it has an overwhelming ”s’mores” flavor, but I love it anyhow. The cookies have a great flavor, and the texture of the graham crackers is wonderful!

author: Jacksmom
title: I’ll eat s’more of this
text: Great flavor. The texture of the cookie is spot on. I’ll be disappointed to see this one go.

author: kimmybuz
title: Please Keep This Flavor!
text: DELICIOUS! This ice cream has great texture and tastes amazing. I can't wait to get more.

author: JH0912
title: New Favorite Flavor
text: This is my new favorite flavor! I hope they decide to make this a permanent addition!

author: GimmeSmoreNOW
title: New family favorite!
text: My whole family loves this ice cream! We tried this flavor during the factory tour in VT. When we got home, we bought the last 3 at our local market. Please make this a permanent favor! PLEEEEEEEASE!

author: Tonyp
title: Make this a permanent flavor please
text: Magnificent.. best flavor out of all B&J I’ve tried. Keep it a permanent flavor!

author: Smoseph
title: Favorito
text: Fave B&J ever! This should be a forever flavor, not limited batch! Puh-lease!

author: Plumber
title: Best flavor
text:
Been getting this one for years. Its my favorite.
The only thing i do not taste is the marshmellow.
So please throw a marshmellow swirl in this and ill love you forever.

author: GMfT
title: Two words: Ah Mazing
text: Why is this only a 4/5? People seriously...this is an epic epicurean delight

author: fat person
title: Favorite new flavor
text: Wish it wasn't a limited batch. My doctor is glad it is though. LOL

author: JanelSample
title: My favorite!
text: I am obsessed with this flavor. Wishing it wasn’t a limited batch!

author: Ashley618smw
title: Best s’mores ice cream
text: Stocked my freezer with it, really wish it wasn’t limited batch

author: Lacie P
title: The best yet
text: Hands down fravorite flavor yet, and I’ve had a lot of them

author: Smores
title: When I need a pick-me-up...
text: I have never been so passionate about an ice-cream flavor than I am with Ben & Jerry's "Gimme S'mores!"

author: Kaylazies
title: Best Flavor on EARTH
text: Literally my new absolute FAVORITE icecream ever. It’s PERFECT. It’s all my favorite flavors together all in one and that chocolate cookie swirl is to die for and omg that graham cracker is just heaven, not too chocolately and that marshmallow icecream just ties it aallllll together. Amazing. Exquisite. Must have with every meal.

author: Cooley
title: Better than the actual s’mores flavor
text: Sooooo good, my new favorite flavor of Ben and jerrys!!!

author: Chaos
title: Best flavor EVER!!!!!
text: After my first pint I never looked back. Iv eaten more of this ice cream in the past few months then Iv eaten any ice cream in my entire life lol. If you like smores (or ice cream) then you need to try this. The only bad part is that it says limited batch . "I hope they do us all a flavor, keep this one around for us to savor ".

author: Lolo17
title: Great ice cream, but really S’more
text: The overall ice cream was really delicious, but it didn’t really taste like a s’more. The actual ice cream did not taste enough like marshmallow, would have loved to have actual marshmallow swirl in it like some of the other B&J flavors. Tastes more like cookies and cream with some extr little extra chocolate chocolate pieces.

author: kris403
title: Great taste!
text: For days, I have been stocking up on this flavor. The graham cracker and cookie swirls are the pints' best features!! I would love to see this become a permanent flavor!

author: Cheatingonmydiet
title: Favorite flavor!!!
text: Oh my gosh I’m so happy they brought this flavor back! I was obsessed with it during the summer and I was so sad it went away, but I just saw it at my grocery store and just about freaked out. The texture from the marshmallow is so nice and the flavors are just perfect. My favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor, hands down.

author: PintKiller1
title: Amazing taste!
text: This is now my favorite Ben and Jerry’s I’ve cream! I love the toasted marshmallow taste, and the fudge ripple and graham cracker swirl are to die for!

author: Stillannoyed
title: Not buying it.
text: This is a horrible job of fixing something that wasn’t broken. Where is my S’mores!?!? I can only find this gross imposter where it used to be.

author: helen74
title: NEW FAVORITE FLAVOR
text: I’ve been buying this flavor left and right ever since I first tried it — it is my new favorite and I just can’t seem to get enough!!

author: Kamm
title: Best ice cream ever!
text: This is my most favorite ice cream ever! I don't normally right reviews on anything but I want Ben&jerry to make this all the time!!

author: Sugar addict
title: Best flavor all time
text: I have been searching for this flavor for weeks after finding one perfect pint of it. This is what cookies&cream would taste like in an ideal world. Sweet marshmallow ice cream base with a textured Graham cracker swirl is everything a s'mores ice cream should be. I desperately want to find this again!

author: Sarabeth
title: Best Flavor Yet!
text: I cannot say enough about this delicious treat! The sugary graham cracker bits and chocolate cookie pieces...incredible!!!!! If I wasn't already married, this ice cream would for definitely ensure the fact that I would be single forever, which, for this ice cream, would be totally worth it!!!!!!

author: Chelsi
title: The best!!!
text: This is my favorite ice cream. I’ve always been a lover of Half Baked and never ventured out of my comfort zone, but now I’ll never go back. I seriously want to buy pints of this and keep it in my freezer for the 2 years that it is apparently good for. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!

author: Grxciebella
title: MY FAVORITE
text: I really just wanted to break from my usual and when I saw this and it wasn't a chocolate based ice cream, I just had to get it. The last time I went to buy a pint, it was out but today when I went there were some, so just to be on the safe side, I bought two because I love it so much!!

author: Brooklyn99
title: Delicious!!!
text: This is by far my new favorite ice cream from Ben and Jerry's! It says "limited batch" on the container, but I hope this becomes a permanent flavor! I will eat this year round. The marshmallow ice cream is amazing and paired with the chocolate cookie pieces and graham crackers, to die!

author: ddub14
title: Top 3 Ben and Jerry Ice creams
text: I bought this because it was limited addition thinking it would be mediocre. But it was amazing.5/5

author: Emstay
title: New favorite!!
text: Literally my new favorite flavor. Possibly the best one yet. I hope they make it a forever flavor!

author: BringBackGimmeSmores
title: This is the best they've ever made.
text:
I was on a strict diet and hadn't touched B&J for months. Saw this in the grocery store and didn't even hesitate to take two pints. I love s'mores and I hate chocolate ice cream. It turned out to be even better than my other favorite (Milk and Cookies, which is btw a fight to find in any store because it's bought out so quick).
This ice cream is so good (and also a limited batch) that I drove to every grocery store in the area and bought all of the pints available (about 10 pints were left) because they were ALL on closeout and they were going so fast that I didn't want to risk taking the time to go and get a basket when I found more that 2 in a freezer and just bare-armed carried all of them to the register before someone else could. This is not an insane, ice-cream obsessed town, its a normal town. These are normal people. This ice cream is RIDICULOUS its TOO GOOD. If they don't bring this back as a regularly stocked product I will consider it one of the greatest food related tragedies of my life.

author: Calvin B
title: Wow.
text: Just when I thought Oat of this Swirrled was the best thing EVER. You guys made this flavor.

author: nugget
title: BETTER THAN THE SMORES FLAVOR
text: I crave that cookie taste all of the time. Please make this permanent! I accidentally got the smores flavor thinking it was the same and boy was I wrong. The smores one is just plain chocolate whereas this one tastes like a delicious smore. This is my favorite flavor of all time!!

author: Jcairns22
title: AMAZING - my new all time FAVORITE!!
text: I tried this knowing how good the old one was, but this is even better! I actually stopped buying the old one since it got too sweet and overpowering for me, and this newer version fires on all cylinders for me. My 11 year old son also loves it so we have stocked the freezer ;)

author: idealistterrene
title: I hate that this is limited
text: My Husband and I enjoy Ben & Jerrys ice cream a few times a week. We have our "usual" flavors; Cherry Garcia and Pistachio. We tried this a couple weeks ago and we LOVED it - the marshmellowy icecream and the crunchy bits plus chocolate pcs perfectly delicious. Now we need MORE

author: Niftynoodle
title: I can’t stop buying this.
text: I never had a favorite flavor of ice cream... until now. I’m terrified of the fact that it is Limited Batch. I keep buying a couple of pints when I’m at the grocery store. They go quickly at my house. And so far they are still in stock... but I’m afraid! Don’t take it away!

author: lulu27
title: BEST FLAVOR EVER
text: Honestly I don't know how this flavor only has four stars because it is legitimately one of the best (if not the best) Ben and Jerry's flavors of all time. SOOOO good.

author: BlackThoughtz
title: Great Flavor
text: Wonderful remic to the prior version. I really love the chocolate cookie swirl in this. I really wish there was a pronounced graham cracker in here. Maybe replacing the dark chocolate chip with a cluster of graham cracker instead would probably make this a better flavor IMO

author: Andrea R
title: EVERYTHING I'VE EVER WANTED
text:
Gimme S'more! is one of the best flavors Ben & Jerry's make.
The Marsh mellow is sweet without being too sweet. Great ratio between Chocolate Swirls & Flakes and Graham Cracker Swirl. Although I wish there was MORE Graham Cracker Swirl because it's so tasty and crunchy.

author: TiNiLo
title: So Good
text: I picked this up yesterday and I wasn't sure that I would like it because I tend to be pretty simple in my ice cream tastes. I am so excited that I did because this is delicious! My favorite part is the combination of the ice cream flavor and the graham cracker swirls.

author: batchase3
title: Best flavor yet!
text: Best flavor yet! Cant seem to find more in the same stores lately!

author: Erinlm
title: Gimme smores
text: The old version is much better this one is not very good at all.

author: KB157
title: Best flavor ever
text: This is the best Ben and Jerry’s I’ve ever tried. It’s amazing!

author: Careabearasara
title: All gone!
text: Finished a pint in one sitting it's just sooooo good!

author: Brian309
title: Great smores flavor
text: Bought one of each of the new flavors and this was the first i tried. Its great taste like smores and id buy again. However BRING BACK VANILLA HEATH BAR CRUNCH PLEASE!!!! Obviously i dont eat this for breakfast lunch or dinner either thats a stupid question

author: Mkayyy
title: All time favorite icecream
text: I have an obsession. I live around the Algonac mi area. And I guarantee your sells for the gimme s’mores are up thanks to I. I can’t help but eat it on the daily. Absolute best icecream I’ve ever had. I hope it becomes permanent. I’ll be sad to see it go.

author: BenJerrysLover
title: LOVE IT!!!
text: I love Ben & Jerry's and I have tried many different flavors. However, this one is definitely my favorite! I've lost count of how many pints I have bought so far. I hope you guys decide to keep this flavor, I was disappointed that it said "Limited Batch".

author: Zack
title: Best flavor ever!
text: Please keep this flavor forever, this might be my new all time favorite. Perfect for s'mores lovers, blows the other s'mores flavor out of the water. Love the graham cracker/cookie trails and the toasted marshmallow flavor. It's simply the perfect pint.

author: DanyT
title: The most delicious flavor ever probably
text: Do yourself a favor and try it! Its delicious. The roasted marshmallow ice cream with graham cracker swirls is just a great mix with the chocolate cookie. I made the mistake of confusing is Gimme S'more! for S'more and while it's good it's not as good.

author: Vballmom
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER!!
text: This is my favorite ice cream by far from anything in store or even fresh from our local ice cream shops! I can’t live without it! I even like it better than the regular s’mores flavor by Ben and Jerry’s. Please please make this a permanent flavor!!!!

author: jdublovesicecream
title: Absolute Favorite!
text: This is hands-down the best flavor Ben and Jerry’s has ever made! I love all ice cream but this was so delicious. Tons of graham cracker, chocolate chunks, and chocolate swirl throughout. I wish this was made all year long! I highly recommend this.

author: Devo
title: Best Ben and Jerry’s flavor
text: My husband and I have purchased this flavor multiple times this summer. By far, one of the best flavors and would love it if it became a permanent option. The combination of ingredients is phenomenal, you won’t regret choosing this flavored pint.

author: Anonymous12
title: This is my favorite flavor
text: Please add this add as permanent flavor!!! Tried this on a whim and its taken over as the only flavor I have in my freezer. I usually have great self control and eat only a little at time, but with this flavor I can't help but eat the whole pint.

author: Holli123
title: BEST FLAVOR EVER
text: Bought this a month ago & went back for it & have not been able to find it since & am DEVASTATED! It is the BEST icecream I've EVER had & I am pretty picky...like about everything. It has a well balanced flavor that tastes LITERALLY like smores

author: Amanda M
title: PLEASE MAKE PERMANENT!!!!!
text: This is literally THE best ice cream I have EVER tasted. I would love nothing more than for it to be permanent. I have bought every single pint at the three grocery stores in my town! I could not have asked for a more perfect flavor combo.

author: Evhybrid
title: Surprising combo
text: The Gram cracker and chocolate cookie swirls go amazing with the toasted marshmallow ice cream. The fudge flakes add a nice crunch to the texture. Amazing combo of light and rich flavors, def my new favorite. A bit hard to find in stores.

author: Tb12014
title: Best of the best!
text: This is easily the best flavor Ben and Jerry’s has ever released. I firmly believe it should replace the original s’mores because gimme s’mores blows it out of the water. It seems like it’s gone but I’m always on the hunt for it nonetheless

author: StormyDawn
title: One of the best!
text: I bought this one after the store was out of my usual and I give it 10 stars it was perfect! I usual have to pick a flavor that doesn’t have too much hard crunch because of sensitive teeth and this hit the nail on the head! Will buy again!

author: Ali_500
title: BEST FLAVOR EVER!!
text: This flavor should become a permanent flavor. Way better then the OG S'mores. I was so sad when my grocery store ran out of this Gimme S'more. Please mamke more of this delicious flavor and make it a permanent one, available all the time!!

author: sydthereader
title: Almost perfect!
text: i tried it today and it was SO good!! the only thing that would make it better is if the ice cream itself had more of a toasted marshmallow taste. i think right now it just tastes like vanilla (maybe just a tiny bit sweeter tho).

author: Saralaw
title: My absolute favorite flavor!!
text: This is the best flavor, I’m obsessed with it. I have to have at least two pints in my freezer at all times! I know it’s limited edition, but PLEASE keep it!! It’s even topping half baked and mint chocolate cookie as my favorite!

author: Vinlands Wolf
title: Great taste, but not a staple favorite
text: I absolutely love this flavor, all of the flavors stand out on their own but blend well together. I definitely would grab this on occasion when available. But due to lack of availability it just hasn't become a staple favorite.

author: abbey30
title: New Favorite Flavor!!!
text: This is by far the best Smore's flavored ice cream. Do yourself a favor and try this out because you will NOT be disappointed!

author: Nicole145
title: Waiting for the return
text: This is a limited edition batch - but it shouldn't be. It's been months since I last found this in stores and I'm waiting for it's return. PLEASE MAKE THIS A PERMANENT FLAVOR. This is some much better than the OG Smore flavor.

author: JJay15
title: Favorite Flavor!
text:
Hey guys!
This is my absolute favorite flavor and I am so thankful it is back! I don't eat chocolate ice cream so this version of S'mores is perfect with a marshmallow based ice cream instead of the chocolate based ice cream!

author: BigSmileBear
title: The BEST!
text: The best Ben & Jerry's flavor yet. AWESOME! Hope this one becomes a regular flavor. I ended up buying the four pints that my local grocery store had left and placed in my deep freeze. So much better than the S'more flavor.

author: Chris B
title: My new favorite!
text: Tried this when it first came out and I was hooked. It has become my new favorite and I like it a lot better than the original S’mores. Hopefully they make this a regular flavor as I’m sad it’s becoming harder to find.

author: iheartgimmesmores
title: AMAZING FLAVOR
text: This is probably the best Ben & Jerry's ice cream I've ever had. My boyfriend and I are obsessed with it. We want it to be a permanent flavor not just limited batch!!! It it so so yummy- please keep it forever B&J!!!!

author: Natty825
title: Best flavor yet
text: S'mores is one of my favorite flavors ever and B&J's absolutely killed it. You taste the cookies more than anything but once you get to the marshmallow and graham cracker tastes it is amazing. Would highly recommend.

author: ShennaPunk
title: This sold me on Marshmallow
text: I have never been a fan of marshmallow anything. The exception...Smores over the campfire. This ice cream flavor has me hooked. The marshmallow is subtle but pairs well with the graham cracker and chunky fudgy bits.

author: sunKerst
title: Almost Perfect!
text: I LOVE S'more flavored things and all existing ice creams on the market do not have a good take on it. Ben and Jerry's S'more ice cream is so addicting! Add a bit more graham cracker and perfection will be reached!

author: Clark
title: Soooo good
text: Every part of this flavor is amazing. The toasted marshmallow ice cream would be good enough on its own, but throw in the graham cracker swirls and chocolate and it's one of the best desserts you can buy frozen

author: Lasquiz
title: Suprise!
text: This flavor was surprisingly DELICIOUS!!!! I was hesitant that the marshmallow would be too sweet but it was such a nice flavor, actually more like a cheesecake taste. Definitely will be getting this again!

author: KassieHaHa
title: So unique!
text: The marshmallow flavor was very unique! For a s’mores ice cream, I was surprised but happily! I’m usually a chocolate therapy girl, but this may be a new fave! There were plenty of toppings in every bite!

author: Gimmesmores18
title: 100% New Favorite Flavor - PLEASE KEEP IT!
text: Its like comfort in a pint. Always been a hug fan of Phish Food, but this one is nostalgic and DELICIOUS. I know it’s a limted batch, but I would LOVE to see this on the permanent Ben & Jerry’s lineup!

author: AliMo
title: ARE U KIDDING ME
text: Guys, I have eaten a ton of Ben and Jerry in my lifetime but THIS is the best I have ever had. Let’s stop the games and make it a permanent flavor. Once this limited batch is done, I’ll be heartbroken.

author: lmccran
title: Favorite Ice Cream Ever!
text: This is my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry’s, & my favorite ice cream flavor I’ve tried. I like anything inspired by s’mores, and this ice cream did not dissapoint. I hope they keep this flavor around!

author: gotgotgone
title: Smores Flavor is better
text: I was not a fan of the toasted marshmallow Ice Cream. the chocolate cookie swirls, graham cracker swirls and fudge flakes are all wonderful fill ins. I wish they used a different tasting marshmallow

author: Julia711
title: BY FAR BEST BEN & JERRYS FLAVOR
text: This is by far the best Ben & Jerry's flavor ever. Finally a s'mores flavor that realizes chocolate is not the star in a s'mores its the GRAHAM CRACKERS. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!!!!!!

author: lj3809
title: PLEASE DON'T LESS THIS BE LIMITED
text: This may be my new favorite flavor!! I seriously hope they keep this on forever as a flavor since it said limited batch. I didn't think I could like one more than Half Baked, but this may beat it

author: foodie29
title: Very disappointing.
text: I couldn't find the traditional "S'mores" flavor at the grocery store so, as a smores fan, I bought this one instead. What a disappointment! I literally took one bite and made a face because I did not like the flavor. I dug around for a minute looking for a marshmallow swirl.... nope, it's not there. Just small bits of chocolate cookie. What? How is this a smores ice cream? The base ice cream tastes nothing like marshmallow and certainly doesn't have the wonderful marshmallow texture the old ice cream had. Couldn't find anything resembling graham cracker here either, unlike the old one. This is just.... cookies and cream. And a pretty dull cookies and cream at that. This is not only nothing like smores, it is a dull ice cream.

author: Redskull
title: Amazing
text: I originally bought a pint of this flavor two weeks ago. We finished the first pint so fast that now we buy two every time we stock up on ice cream. I can’t wait to get s’more of this flavor.

author: Cshh
title: Best Icecream I've Ever Tasted
text: I'm so excited to see they're bringing this flavor back. It's been gone for about two years and I thought I'd never get my ice cream back. Thank you Ben and Jerry's for answering my prayers.

author: Hannah92
title: Amazing Ice Cream
text: I love anything marshmallow and this ice cream hits the spot! I was so excited to try this and I'm so happy I did! Going to be stocking up since it's a limited edition flavor! Amazing!

author: Slm66
title: My new favorite
text: I love this new flavor. I hope it sticks around. I love s'mores flavored things. This just adds to the list of delicious s'mores like treats. Perfect blend of flavors. I love it!

author: Pepman
title: One of the best flavors
text: I have not tried all Ben and Jerry flavors, but have tried enough to rate this as one of the best. The hint of toasted marshmallow with chocolate and graham cracker are spot on.

author: Notnowmaddie
title: Holy s’mores!!
text: I’ve never made a review for any ice cream but this one deserves it!! Never been so disappointed about something being limited edition. This is my ultimate favorite ice cream.

author: Amandak727651
title: The chocolate cookie swirl... Oh my!!
text: By far my favorite B&J yet. The ingredients yall use is what makes the difference. That was the only one left at our Target so I hope that get more. I’m in LOVE! -Oxford, AL.

author: Maggie101
title: Amazing taste!!
text: Every time I go to a food store I always get gimmie smore!It has a amazing taste!!If you like chocolate chunks and graham crackers and marshmallows the your in for a treat!!

author: Middlear
title: My new favorite flavor
text: Excellent balance of chocolate to graham cracker. Could use more of a toasty note on the marshmallow, but favorite new flavor along with with the oat of this swirled flavor.

author: oh_paulie
title: They forgot the s'more!
text: Terrible. s'mores are graham crackers, marshallow, chocolate. Gimme S'more has ZERO graham cracker taste. It's essentially just another vanilla ice cream with chocolate.

author: Laurenisawesome
title: Life changing
text: This might be my new favorite. The taste and texture are amazing. The crunch of the graham cracker, chocolate swirls. I told my sister I would share, but there was no way.

author: yummy yummy
title: YUM
text: This flavor is so amazing. i’m a huge s’mores person and i couldn’t believe how amazing this was. B&J is my go to ice cream and i’ve offically found my go to flavor. YUM!

author: Zachp
title: So glad it’s back!!
text: This ice cream is so delicious when my wife found out it was back for good she was smiled bigger than on our wedding day. Such an improvement from the old s’mores flavor!

author: ICConnoissuer
title: Good but flavor not as advertised.

author: Mason

author: icecreamlover082018

author: ebrodie

author: AJ105

author: Girlmom

author: karlyfarmer
title: THE CHEF’S KISS
text: The flavor is IMMACULATE. I mean... need I say more?

author: SoSammmm
title: Amazing!
text: Best ice cream ever! Please make it permanent!!!!!!

author: ChrisColby
title: Peanut Butter makes everything better
text: A flavor I'm glad to see back after liking it before it was discontinued, PB Half Baked is even better than I remembered. There's not much to say if youve already had the standard half baked. It works very similarly except that the vanilla portion of the flavor is now replaced with peanut butter ice cream, and the chocolate chip cookie dough is instead peanut butter cookie dough. For such slight changes though, they do make a big difference. One thing I disliked in the original half baked was how weak the vanilla base was and how it was completely dominated by the chocolate. That's not the case here as the peanut butter taste to the ice cream is strong enough to balance out the chocolate, giving the classic combination we know and love. The balance is also matched perfectly with the mix ins. There are HUGE brownie squares in this flavor, tasting great as always, and combined with the numerous peanut butter cookie dough pieces, you're getting the chocolate/peanut butter taste in every bite. If you're a fan of that flavor combination, you can't go wrong with Peanut Butter Half Baked.

author: Nicoledobermanmom
title: Best flavor EVER
text: Normally the tonight dough is my go to. I have been waiting for this flavor to get to my area and went it finally did I made sure run right to the store. I was in LOVE after the first bite . This is by far the best peanut butter ice cream flavor ever made. I beg and plead for this flavor to never go away because I am forever hooked. Thank you thank you thank you for my new favorite ever. This is a MUST TRY because you won’t look back

author: lbrennan203
title: Omg so delish!
text: I bought this at a Ben & Jerry’s store a couple days ago in Sandbridge, VA and it was oh so good! I am a sucker for anything chocolate and peanut butter and this did not disappoint. My son took one lick and was jealous he did not pick it so we went back again last night and bought some for him! I love the peanut butter ice cream and fudge brownie and didn’t realize the cookie dough is peanut butter too, yum! Now that I am home from vacation I just need to find it near where I live!

author: BodybyBenandJerry
title: THANK YOU!!!!!!
text: First of all I would like to say THANK YOU to whoever decided to put peanut butter in half baked! Half Baked is my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor but I'm not a huge fan of vanilla ice cream... I just think the Peanut Butter ice cream really pairs well with the rest of the components in this mix. Dare I say... I might like this BETTER than the original Half Baked? It's too soon to tell. I love you Ben & Jerry!

author: A__A
title: Many problems fixed!
text: The ice cream has chunky brownie, amazing cookie dough... Just amazing stuff!

author: HBunny
title: Quarantine Dream
text: It’s everything you could wish for that would make being stuck at home seem a real treat. Chunks abound! The peanut butter and chocolate combination is hearty, decadent and worth it!

author: Marisa
title: Yes.
text: Yes. Just yes. Nothing else needs to be said. This ice cream is it. Buy it. Try it. Love it.

author: SBEC
title: Beessst Ice Cream Flavor!!
text: I LOVE this flavor, and I am happy it is now a full time flavor! Both my mom and I find this as our go-to desert. The ice cream is loaded with stuff: cookie dough and brownies and on the side I like to add in some chopped nuts. LOVE LOVE LOVE.

author: TypeNone
title: Love the PB, just needs a little more
text: Bought this past week, was expecting a lot more PB, was very similar to the regular Half Baked. Still Very Good!

author: eyik
title: my new favorite
text: If you like peanut butter cup or PB and chocolate, this is like that, but so much better

author: Stoney Tony
title: Best ice cream in the world
text: If Ben and Jerry’s only made one flavor, I’d want it to be peanut butter half baked.

author: ConnieG
title: Ice Cream Dreams Fullfilled
text: Took me awhile to find this but when I did I just kept going back for more.

author: bblock22
title: My wife and I’s Favorite!
text: The perfect combination all in one! And the better “half” to half baked

author: Jupolonius
title: It's back and the best!
text: So bummed when this disappeared. Our voices were heard! Thanks guys!

author: JennyWoof
title: Berry good!
text: All time favorite flavor! The berry flavored swirls of ice cream are perfectly delicately, but distinctly, flavored. The natural pastel purple that comes from the blackberries is definitely an adorable plus! The mascarpone ice cream swirls have that heavenly cheesecake-y taste, which combines with the soft crumbly shortbread to create a tiramisu-esque experience... but instead of the rich notes coming from cinnamon it comes from the crunchy fudge-covered almonds. May I suggest renaming this flavor to "Chuck Berry Mascarpone" after Chuck Berry: one of the pioneers of rock'n'roll.

author: Lexi143
title: Seriously The Best Ice Cream Ever
text: This is without a doubt the best ice cream I have ever tried from Ben and Jerry's, and probably from anywhere at all! There is a B&J's scoop shop down the street from my apartment, one a couple miles away, and countless grocery stores in between. However, I constantly find myself driving out of the way to go to the only store in the area that I know stocks this flavor regularly. It is the perfect combination of flavors, and I have a really hard time keeping myself from going through the whole pint in one quick sitting. I will be absolutely devastated when this exclusive flavor is no longer available. Please keep it as a regular!!

author: Tr6nce
title: Excellent
text: A lot of recent flavors from Ben and Jerry's have left me disappointed but I saw this at Whole Foods and had to give it a go, because I'm like a Ben and Jerry's expert at this point. I thought it was going to be gross but I was pleasantly surprised by how all the flavors complimented each other. I left a few other people in the house have a small spoonful and they liked it as well. And to the person who said Strawberry Cheesecake is gone, you are wrong. That flavor is everywhere and never going away. Perhaps your store just stopped carrying it. It would be nice if they brought back the Blueberry Cheesecake flavor that was an exclusive at Walmart years ago. Anyway, Blackberry ice cream gets thumbs up from me!

author: JEM2021
title: Love this!
text: This is my new favorite ice cream!!! It is absolutely delicious! I saw this at my local Whole Foods and decided to give it a try since I was craving ice cream with berries and I was so pleased when I got home and tried it. This flavor has just the right amount of sweetness and the flavor combo is to die for. The chocolate covered almonds and cookie bits not only add to the flavors but provide a great texture. I usually don't write reviews but this is so good and I'm afraid it will only be a limited time product. I hope they keep this one. I'll buy it forever. Recommending to all my family and friends.

author: Dianamo in Dallas
title: Sooooo good!
text: I’m not even a big ice cream fan, but this is life changing!

author: jaiye
title: my absolute favorite now!
text: first of all--the pieces of cookie throughout the ice cream are EVERYTHING! I love the balance of flavors. It's so good. I'm actively searching for it which is the primary reason I ended up on this website, but figured I'd add a review and give it 5 stars to keep it on shelves.

author: Anand
title: My new favorite flavor!
text: This is a great balance of flavors -- each one compliments the other and none of them are too over powering. Creamy, sweet, and a little fruity. I especially like that's it not jam packed with fixings and you get to taste the actual ice cream.

author: Blugold
title: Top 5
text: Great flavor combination. I wanted to try it because it was a new flavor and ended up loving it! Definitely in my top 5. My only criticism is that is it difficult to obtain.

author: Cezanne
title: Swept off my feet
text: When I bought this flavor, I was hesitant to switch things up from my trusty flavor, The Tonight Dough. At night, I got peckish and searched the fridge until I remembered about this new flavor. I was in bed when I had my first bite, my only main regret.

author: KellieB
title: Nope
text: Bring Bach strawberry cheesecake. This isn't cutting it!!! I'm done buying Ben and Jerry's until it comes back!!!!

title: fav Flavor !!
text: This is my Favorite Ben & Jerrys Flavor ever, I wish it was easier to find. so many pB cups !! #LOVE that !! I really hope they make it permanent, because their is not very many other options for banana lovers. (I Hate the toppings in Chunky Monkey (◕︿◕✿)) would love if they added fudge brownies

author: jobird
title: Best Flavor Combo!
text: I'm so glad this flavor exists, it's my new favorite! Chocolate, PB, and banana is such a good combo, I order smoothies and milkshakes in that combo too.

title: Yum!
text: It’s like chunky monkey but with peanut butter cups instead of nuts!

author: letimedi
title: Best B&J Ever!
text: This is the best Ben & Jerry's I've ever had! I can no longer eat nuts so the peanut butter cups are the best alternative to Chubby Hubby. I hope this flavor is available forever!

author: GG Danzigg
title: Best flavor!
text: Bought this on a whim and it's the best B&J flavor of them all.

author: The098
title: My absolute favorite
text: My local store sold out completely of this flavor, no word when it’s coming back. :( I love it. The banana so good. It’s the better version of chunky monkey! The cups are perfect!

author: Flavor fiend
title: Best ever!
text:
This is the best flavor Ben and Jerry’s has done!
Banana and chocolate ice cream with mini peanut butter cups. Please please keep this as a permanent flavor. I buy multiple containers whenever I can find it!!

author: duckeeduck
title: This needs to be a REGULAR flavor!
text: Happened upon this at the grocery store, and knew I needed to get it. I've been enjoying Jen & Jerry's for decades, and my favorites before this were Cherry Garcia, Apple Pie a la Mode (from years ago - I heard this one couldn't be added to the reg. menu because the price of apples fluctuates too much), Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, then Half-Baked, and more recently Cinnamon Buns. This one combines SO MANY of my favorites: cinnamon, dough, chocolate, brownies ... and now SPICE. YAS. I LOVE spiced and spicy chocolate, and what has been created here with this special edition is just EVERYTHING. PLEASE keep *churning* this one out!!! ;D It is simply the BEST.

author: Puppylove
title: Best Flavor! Please Add Permanently!’
text: I have been hooked on half baked for years now but this flavor changed everything! There’s just so much depth of flavor. I thought the spicy brownie would be too much but it’s very mild. I’d still prefer normal brownie but not by much. I love that the cinnamon ice cream and chocolate ice cream are two different ice creams swirled together. At first glance I thought it was going to be just chocolate ice cream with cinnamon flavor but I was wrong. Every bite is a unique balance of flavor that sends my tastebuds to heaven. I just wish it wasn’t a limited batch. I can’t go back to just half baked after this.

author: MJamz
title: Sooooo close!
text:
I really enjoyed this flavor--interesting, but not so far out there that I couldn't wrap my taste buds around it (I was a bit skeptical about the spice factor, but it was nice and mild). However, while the pint succeeded in taste, it fell short on execution (bad pun unintended, considering the name). The chocolate base was noticeably less dense than the cinnamon, and was riddled with tiny air bubbles. It still tasted great, but the creaminess was inconsistent, and likewise, there were plenty of dough gobs but only 3 big brownie chunks. Seems like Justice Remix'd just needed a a bit more balanced mixing.
For reference, my pint's info: UPC 076840036745, Date FEB0621BJ52, 5095 09:20 67834702)

author: VanessaB99
title: Keep this flavor! PLEASE!!!
text: I bought this flavor today. Upon trying it, I immediately wanted to go back to the store & buy every pint that they had. SOOO GOOOD!!! Please keep this as a permanent flavor, instead of a limited batch. This is one of the best flavors you've designed in a long time (except for the sour sorbet this summer).

author: dennis333
title: Please keep forever
text: Oh man. I don't even seek out ice cream that often, but this flavor caught my eye and now I am an absolute fiend for it. I'm getting emotional thinking about this ice cream. I tell everyone I know to please try this ice cream. I sent out text messages to my family telling them to go buy this ice cream. I have never tasted anything like it in my life! Please keep it forever! I'm obsessed! (And of course I am also happy to hear about the nonprofit partnership.)

author: AmandaO
title: Tastes like Abuelita hot chocolate!
text: This is delicious. I didn't know what to expect when I read the description of the flavor, but OMG it's so good. It takes like the Abuelita brand hot chocolate with a little hint of spice from the brownies. I love it!

author: Kimpossible52891
title: Best one so far!
text: I was a little nervous about the spicy brownies but oh my gosh! I love this flavor!! Please be a regular flavor not a limited batch!!! It’s so good!!!

author: Jackson
title: Possibly your greatest flavor ever.
text: This hit every sweet spot for me. I'm serious. Absolutley loved this flavor, and I'm actually a little sad I tried it, because if it's a limited edition flavor that means it'll go away and never return. This needs a spot in the regular rotation. Don't make me go back to the store and hoard all of them.

author: CinnamonLover
title: Best Ice Cream so far!
text: I love cinnamon more than any other flavour in general (in cakes, bubble gum, tequilla, porridge ... - you see, ice cream is certainly no exception), so i was really excited to try the ben & jerry's cinnamon bun, when I saw that flavour for the first time some years ago.
