Unfortunately, when it comes to ice cream, I strongly prefer chocolate over vanilla or caramel as a base, so I the cinnamon bun flavour didn't blow my mind completelly. Just 1 hour ago I saw THIS new flavour at a gas station and coudn't resist. It's even better than I expected, because the spiciness harmonize so well with the cinnamon & chocolate (that I always love). So I highly recommend this ice cream flavour to anyone, who really loves cinnamon in general and chocolate ice cream.

author: SciFiLover
title: The spicy fudge MWAH!
text: The Ben & Jerry's line of ice cream is some of the best I have ever tasted. When I spied this, the newest in the freezer at my local grocery I was intrigued. So I ponied up my cash and brought it home. As usual, I popped the top and took a taste. OMG! I was floored. This has to be added to the line-up as a permanent option.It is everything I did not expect it to be. The flavors burst in your mouth! The combination of cinnamon and chocolate, although seemingly odd, are perfect together. And the "topping on the cake" is the spicy fudge brownie. Love this new flavor.

author: tiffery
title: I Need This Forever
text: I can't stop buying this flavor. The balance of cinnamon ice cream, chocolate ice cream, tiny chunks of cinnamon bun dough, and bits of spicy brownie?! OH MY GOD. It's perfect. I saw a picture of this flavor online and then noticed it in my local grocery store, so I bought it. That was a month ago and now I can't stop. Please please please, Mr. Ben and Mr. Jerry I am begging you from my soul to keep this in the permanent rotation. JUSTICE TASTES DELICIOUS.

author: James S
title: amazing flavor! even more amazing cause
text: So glad to see B&J step it up on the activism front as well as on the taste buds front! This is a delicious ice cream

author: Simsima
title: Went back and bought every last pint
text: This flavor combination is out of this world with perfect balance of flavors, textures and ... that cinnamon spice is everything. i wanted to try this initially because I support the cause and I was curious about how the flavor combo would be - and now I’m here begging you to add this to the regular rotation of flavors even though I never write reviews. I just went and bought out my local stores stock. Please add this to the regular line up!

author: Jcforever3
title: Pretty good flavor! Worth trying.
text: I saw this in the store and had to buy it as soon as I saw the words "spicy brownie." They weren't lying, the brownies have a really interesting kick! I can understand why it was too strong for some, but for me it made up for the lack of cinnamon promised in the ice cream and cinnamon bun dough (which basically was like their cookie dough in texture minus the chips). This is a flavor for people who like the classics but are bold enough to try out some more exotic ones. Overall, one of the most intriguing flavors I've had from Ben and Jerry's.

author: ForTheLoveOfReMixd
title: If This is Discontinued....
text: I'm not sure I will ever love again! This is a fantasticly unusual combination that just hits every mark for me. I can usually ration out my pints over a couple weeks, but this flavor only lasts me two sittings! Anytime you need a break from the sugary cinnamon, the deep rich chocolate is there to smooth things over with a little spice and vice versa. I would definitely become a regular fanatic if this became a daily flavor (r.i.p. my diet)

author: Adam
title: I LOVE this flavor
text: It's so good! The cinnamon seems to pervade the entire pint and the spicy brownie bits are so tasty and interesting! I don't think that Ben and Jerry's has another flavor with a spicy element and I don't think that they need another one if they were to just keep this one around, which is exactly what they should do! I am gonna be so sad when they take this one away. I get that its kind of a weird flavor but it seems like the people who like it, REALLY love it.

author: damien702
title: Best new flavor yet
text: This flavor is exactly what I didn’t know I needed, the cinnamon ice cream and hint of heat from the brownies really make it something special. I hope Justice ReMix’d becomes a regular flavor, it’s one of the best in the Ben and Jerry’s lineup and I’d be so sad to see it go.

author: jaxyfrou
title: Love love love this flavor
text: Someone brought this in at work and I immediately fell in love with it. It has chocolate, chunky dough, and cinnamon!! So Good!

author: Ellie
title: LOVE
text: This flavor combined my two favorite desserts - chocolate and cinnamon rolls. To me, it tastes like the Mexican hot chocolate, Abuelita - which I LOVE! I didn’t read that the brownies were spicy, so I was confused at first, but it was a great addition!

author: Kayleen18
title: PLEASE KEEP THIS FLAVOR!
text: I’m an ultimate half baked person, and this is amazing and just what I wanted. Please keep it is so good!!!

author: falon
title: Wonderful Combo!
text: Whoever expresses this as a disappointment is wild. All these flavors paired wonderfully and the spice to the brownie is like a cinnamon spice and so delightful. I'll be sad once this is gone! Love it!!

author: RTK18
title: Please Keep Making this Flavor
text: This is my favorite flavor ever. Its the only flavor I buy now when I get ice cream and I always buy 3 or 4 pints of it at a time out of fear it won't be there when I go to the store next. I love the cinnamon and spicy brownie combination. There isn't a substitute to this and I will actually cry when its no longer available.

author: Emdog
title: PLEASE KEEP THIS FLAVOR FOREVER
text: I am in love with this ice cream as of many others I know, I always seem to become OBSESSED with a product when it is a “Limited edition” item. For the first time ever I am actually contacting a company in hopes to continue my obsession with this fantastic ice cream. PLEASE keep this flavor available!! :)

author: HBunny
title: Chunk-a-licious!
text: This is how every flavor pint should be! Gorgeous chunks evenly distributed throughout, creamy, chocolatey with a cinnamon zing. Phenomenal.

author: dysgwraig
title: PLEASE Make this a Regular Flavor!!
text: This is actually some of the best ice cream I have Ever had. All the spicy elements blend perfectly with the chocolate to create something I can only describe as the apotheosis of Mexican hot chocolate. Please don't take this deliciousness away from me!!! Make this a regular flavor!

author: Candace
title: Yum.
text: Bought this yesterday at my local supermarket and ate half the pint already. Love it, love it, love it.

author: Jessicaaa
title: OMG AMAZING
text: LOVE LOVE LOVE! Please keep this flavor definitely one of my favorites I can’t get enough of it!!!!!

author: LalaLovesIceCream
title: My FAVORITE Flavor Ever!
text: Please please PLEASE keep this flavor!! It is my all time favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor!

author: Bgirl52
title: Omg! Keep!
text: I love the cinnamon bun and can't find it saw this and tried it! Best flavor ever! Please please please.keep!

title: Spicy love!!!
text: Loved the cinnabon pieces and the spicy brownie pieces!

author: runlolarun
title: Hands down best flavor
text: ...and you will not change my mind. Its cruel and unusual that this is a limited edition batch.

author: Franfran
title: Great combination of flavors!
text: This is the kind of pint that I could eat in one sitting, but have to hold back to save more for the next day. The combination of flavors are exquisite in my opinion!! Nothing to complain about for me. If you’re scared of the spicy chocolate, know it is not very spicy and quite delicious. THIS ICE CREAM NEEDS TO BE PERMANENT because I’ve realized I can’t live without it now. Please consider keeping it!!!!

author: calikdub
title: Incredible Combination!
text: I was skeptical initially on the spicy fudge brownies, but holy Hannah! It’s 1000% amazing! It is darn near impossible to stop at one serving. I hope this stays around for a while, or I’ll have to get another freezer to stock up!

author: eggcorn
title: crying
text: I'd never had a favorite ice cream flavor before I tried Justice ReMix'd and now I've gone through five pints and counting and I would sacrifice my firstborn to keep it in the roster forever

author: AmyT
title: Perfection!
text: This flavor is complete perfection! It’s the perfect balance of chocolate and cinnamon. I love the spicy brownie (not too spicy) and the cinnamon roll. I just keep buying multiple pints every time I go to a grocery store because this flavor is almost singlehandedly getting me through the stress of working during the pandemic. As an added bonus to the delicious flavor, the nonprofit connection is for criminal justice reform - ice cream doesn’t get any better than this! I hope you add it as a permanent flavor!

author: Victoriarla
title: One of my favorites!
text: At first I didn't feel the spice from the brownie but when it's eaten alone its definitely there. This flavor is sooo good. I wish it would be a permanent flavor.

author: Sm56
title: Love this one
text: I was really excited to try this one when I heard about it I love the spicy sweet aspect and really wish they would make this one of the regular flavors

author: Dooodlebops
title: Spicy brownies I love
text: The ice creams are blah but the spiced up brownies saved the pint...until I ate it. All.

author: Barbara
title: Happy Surprise
text: My curiousity stopped on the label at 'gobs of cinnamon bun dough', so I didn't even notice the "spicy fudge brownie" part. Turned out I don't actually like the little cinnamon dough buttons (easy to spit out), but the spicy brownies really made this worth the purchase. I hope they revisit it again, Loving the cinnamon/spicy chocolate combo.

title: Too spiced
text: The icecream itself and the cinnamon buns were good but the brownie was too strongly spiced.

author: Icecreamman1
title: The Most Interesting Flavor
text: I haven't found a new ice cream flavor like this in awhile. I would love to have it permanently, because it is my fave flavor currently! Very odd, but satisfying. The spiciness of the brownies works perfect with the sweetness of the mix of the cinnammon bun dough and ice cream. I'd love to see more creativity like this in my ice cream!

author: hslagle
title: The best ice cream ever. Make it permanent!!
text: Ever since this ice cream has come out I always have a pint of it in the fridge. Seriously right now I have 3. Not only is this my favorite ice cream of all time but it also supports a great cause so maybe we can be lucky enough to keep this pint because as long as you guys make it I will keep buying it.

author: antaresoceana
title: Just didn't do it for me but I really wish it did
text: I was more disappointed in myself than I was in this ice cream. I really wish I liked it. I really do. All the mix-ins were right up my alley. I don't know where my taste buds took a wrong turn. I had visions of a cinnamon roll with spicy hot chocolate to wash it down, but instead it was like a roller derby of playfully competitive flavours fighting each other to win. In turn, they ended up too black and blue to discern who was who. :'(

author: Jessban507
title: This ice cream cured my depression
text: NEEDS TO BE A PERMANENT FLAVOR! I can’t believe there’s a flavor that combines my favorites— cinnamon bun with Half Baked. Every bite was so interesting and delightful. A whole pint goes down eeeeasy. I hope I can find this again. DEFINITELY a new favorite.

author: RiccoColdBrew
title: Addicted To CinnaBuns & Chocolate Ice Cream
text: Was first time trying and I'm addicted the spicy fudge brownies paired with the sweet chocolate ice cream and cinnamon bun dough is to die for thanks @Ben&Jerry's for the best I've cream always - Ricco

author: Veggiesaurus
title: Yuck, spicy brownies!
text: The flavors did not go well together AT ALL. It sounded interesting so I decided to give it a try. I like spicy food but the spicy brownie mixed with the strong cinnamon flavor was vile. If I had very much of it, I Would be nauseous . The second I bit in to the brownie, I thought “this is disgusting “. Absolutely the worst Ben & Jerry’s flavor I have tried and the worst flavor of ANY ice cream I’ve ever tried.GROSS.

author: CharChar
title: My favorite flavor yet!
text: Oh my gosh, I loooooooove the mixture of chocolate and spicy brownies! It reminds of Mexican hot cocoa. I vote to keep this flavor forever!

author: Liza
title: Please keep!
text: Please make this a permanent flavor. It’s one of the most unique, delicious flavors you’ve ever produced.

author: Katienesbitt85
title: It’s soooo good!
text: If you like Mexican hot chocolate, you’ll like this! It’s delicious!

author: SetterMom
title: Not Working
text: The cinnamon spice is way too aggressive - tastes more like strong gingerbread - and the flavor doesn’t pair well with the chocolate at all.

author: Jesika Tracy
title: PLEASE KEEP THIS FOREVER
text: New favorite ice cream. Ate all of it in one night. Heck yeah

author: willowmiri
title: !! My favorite !!
text: This is the combination of all of my favorite things and I'm so happy. It is so delicious and I hope Ben and Jerry's never stops making it. I'd always wondered about the lack of Ben and Jerry's cinnamon ice cream because it's my absolute favorite -- and Justice Remix'd knocked it out of the park. Everything is so cinnamony and chocolately. I love the chunks. SO GOOD.

author: HHarper148
title: This flavor does ice cream JUSTICE!
text: I bought this a week ago because it sounded delicious. After finishing the first one a couple days ago I just had to get another. I had to go to two stores to get one and learned it's a limited batch. I LOVE cinnamon ice cream, mix that with cinnamon bun dough and spicy brownies and it is heaven on earth. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE add this to your line of regularly available flavors. I would hate to lose it as quickly as I discovered it.

author: mchrisman01
title: Parts of it are good.
text: The cinnamon ice cream and chocolate ice cream are great. And the cinnamon bun dough is out of this world!! But the spicy brownie in it overpowers everything. I end up picking it out of the ice cream. Honestly either the brownie needs to be taken out all together or the brownie needs to be a plain brownie instead of a spicy one. There is also so much brownie in it so it could also stand to be toned down in that regard as well

author: IceCreamMan99
title: Why????
text: I got this flavor by accident. Had done curbside pickup at the grocery, but instead of Phish Food, I received this. It sat in the freezer for about a week and decided to try it. I honestly feel like my taste buds were being punished, as if i lost a bet and was forced to eat this. If fear factor created an ice cream flavor, this would be it. None of the flavors work together. The cinnamon is too strong. Would be better if it tasted more like a cinnamon roll than the cinnamon challenge from a few years back. The spicy brownie makes no sense. The flavor is so off putting, i wanted to gag. They could have easily used some sort of Mexican hot chocolate flavor and it would have been so much better. I really have no words except this is one of the most vile and disgusting flavors I have ever eaten. Save your money and make a donation to your favorite social justice charity.

author: lilsnackfiend
title: Singing to the Tune of Justice
text: Not only does this ice cream flavor support a I cause important to me, but it's an amazing texture and flavor combo. That spicy ribbon of fudgy brownie?! Those cinnamon roll chunks?! My tongue is dancing to this beat. How does this not have an average of 5 stars already? It's the remix I needed. Play it again! Make it a permanent member on the Ben & Jerry's Flavor Playlist.

author: Giggle box
title: Omg heaven
text: I wish this flavor was around year round I never knew I needed this in my life until I unlowingky took a bite into the most heavenly thing I’ve ever eaten. I LOVE IT

author: Jennjennjenny
title: You had me at cinnamon
text: Went looking for Justice Remix'd ice cream because of a facebook post that led me to Ben & Jerry's civic and social commitment. The Ice cream happens to contain a cinnamon and brownie deliciousness that I love and is hard to find together. A true surprise and delight. Thank you so much and if the blueberry one comes about I know I'll like that one too.

author: DocGfin
title: A great message on a great icecream.
text: So many ice creams these days are one trick ponies: sweet on sweet on sweet. A well balanced dessert needs multiple notes. This delivers. Warm cinnamon, spicy brownies, bitter chocolate and of course smooth sweet Ben and Jerry's icecream.

author: EnglishLitDoc
title: Too sweet
text: Sugary and not great. This is probably my least favorite flavor I have ever had of Ben and Jerry's.

author: Rika
title: Really wanted to like it...
text: I wanted to like this flavor so badly but I just didn’t. The spicy brownie ruined it for me. I ended up digging out the brownie and just eating the rest.

title: I Can't Remember This
text: I know I bought this, but I can't remember it. So that means that A. it's not horrible and B. it's not outstanding. Kind of like a blind date who is certain to end up with someone decent and you wish him the best, but he's not for you. I'd probably buy it again just to make sure I wasn't intoxicated the first time and that's why I forgot.

author: Steevn
title: God awful
text: Just bought this and took three bites and I couldn’t swallow any more this is the most disgusting ice cream I’ve ever had I don’t know how it made it to the shelves

author: lulu7777
title: Justice Remix
text: I love Ben & Jerry's however this one is not for me..Dissapointed.

author: lemmingade
title: Good cause, bad f!avor!
text: Super icky. I've never thrown away an almost full pint of Ben &Jerry's before The cinnamon flavor was too strong and the spicy brownies absolutely unpleasant.

author: MAGAzine lover
title: Grooosssss
text: Don't waste your time. Much like protests, the whole thing is ruined by disgusting spicy chocolate!

author: Nettieb
title: My new favorite
text: I love this flavor so much that it is now my official go to! The surprising bite of spicy brownie is so delicious! I was hesitant to try it because I can't do too spicy anymore, but this has just a small amount of spice which oddly balances with the sweet! I hope this becomes a part of the permanent collection!

author: Moni
title: Not a chocolate fan
text: I’m not a chocolate fan at all, but I love cinnamon so I decided to give this flavor a try and im glad I did!! The chocolate wasn’t overwhelming and the cinnamon mellowed it out. I loved the chunks of spicy fudge and cinnamon bun dough. This was super creative and perfectly executed

author: Ashley0908
title: Incredible mission
text: Thank you for using your platform for good. Ice cream flavours are incredible with real ice cream! It amazes me how socially responsible this company is. I 100% recommend this brand to everyone I know any chance I get. Incredible flavours, incredible missions, worth the price!

author: Volvomom
title: Amazing, unique taste!
text: I'll admit - the colorful packaging and good cause drew me in. Who knew that the cinnamon that lingers would be the thing that keeps me walking back to the fridge each night around 9:30pm? I'm not an ice cream addict, but this flavor is more like a gourmet treat. Indulge!

author: Danny311
title: Horrible.
text: Probably the worst ice cream that has ever been created. Absolutely disgusting

author: Acedar608
title: So Uniquely Yummy
text: I love Ben and Jerry's because their ice cream is delicious and because they support good causes. This flavor looked interesting and I like knowing that a portion of the money I spent might help make a difference. I ended up eating the whole pint in one sitting

author: Briguy
title: Good stuff.
text: If you don't like the flavor profile, chances are you won't like this pint of ice cream. However, if it sounds good to you like it does to me, pretty sure you'll enjoy this ice cream. My only complaint is I wish it had more of the spicy fudge brownie pieces

author: Shayshay06
title: Ehhhhh
text: I was so excited to try this but it was absolutely terrible. It made my stomach hurt and I literally was nauseous.

author: BL_on_the_DL
title: THE. BEST. FLAVOR. EVER.
text: I have never written a review here before, but I thought this necessary to see if you could make it permanent. It is so so so good. The spicy chocolate and everything is amazing. I went back and bought our grocer out. Please make it permanent. :)

author: Lisalue49
title: Yummy cinnamon!
text: What a change of pace! Not a huge fan of chocolate but the cinnamon gives it a good balance. What's B&J without something gooey? Oh yes! Gooey gobs of cinnamon bun dough and brownies! Even the brownies are magical! The taste bursts on my tongue!

author: Ggmg
title: Awful
text: The flavor combination is disgusting, obviously no real thought went into this ice cream and I doubt anyone taste tested it.

author: maiab
title: Not what I expected but really good!
text: I didn’t really know what to expect with this flavor and it was different but still super good. It is pretty powerful on the cinnamon and with the spicy brownies but everything complemented super well together. Would probably buy again.

author: mx7mbb
title: make it PERMANENT!!
text: I found this at the grocery store once and I fell in love with it. Unfortunately, I haven't been able to find it anywhere after that. I really want this flavor of Justice will become a permanent flavor!!!!!!!! PLEASE!!!!!!!

author: Rmorflin
title: Great flavor experience
text: I absolutely loved the cinnamon and chocolate flavor combination. It's very unique flavor in the best way possible. It's easily one of my new favorites. The spice in the fudge brownies is perfect to fight against the sweet.

author: Jojo123
title: Tastes like dirt
text: Horrible flavor. Get rid of it. One of your worst ever.

author: Susanna
title: Addicting and amazing!
text: I impulse bought the last pint of this my Kroger had, and I swear to you it’s the best ice cream I’ve ever had! The spicy brownies were absolute perfection! The only problem? I’m craving more and can’t find it anywhere!

author: Dave Matthews
title: Not good! Bring back One Sweet Whirled.
text: Why not bring back some of the good flavors from the graveyard instead of garbage like this?

author: Flutterfre
title: OMG! My new favorite!!!
text: Seriously, please keep this flavor on the shelves and available forever! I love cinnamon buns and brownies. But the spicy brownies were new to me--and now they're an absolute favorite! Can't get enough.

author: ZOmbie17
title: Amazing Taste!
text: Bought this just to try it after reading the label, I was intrigued by the spicy brownie aspect (I LOVE Mexican brownies). Ate it right out of the pint, and was SO GOOD!!!!!! definitely a new favorite!

author: iLoVeLiCoRiCe
title: A favorite for cinnamon lovers!!
text: This is wonderful! Definitely different than your “traditional” flavors, but I seek this one out! I wish it was easier to find!! You have to LOVE cinnamon though— some strong flavors here!

author: Casey E
title: Please make this permanent!
text: This ice cream is amazing, the flavors go together so well and remind me of Mexican style hot chocolate with a lovely spicy kick! Please add this to your permanent roster of flavors!!!

title: Great Ice Cream - Great Cause
text: This flavor absolutely rules and I hope it never goes away. I love that Ben & Jerry's takes social justice seriously as a company, and I love the work they've done with Senator Sanders.

author: Blacklivesmattter
title: Ben and Jerry for president
text: AMAZING FLAVOUR! Ben and Jerry are so awesome that I don’t mind paying more for this ice cream because they pay their employees very well. Great guys. Gen Z loves and approves!!

author: ohz2
title: One of the best ice creams I’ve ever had
text: I’ve eaten way too many kinds of ice cream, and this is easily one of the most amazing and creative kinds that I have ever had. Any time I see it in a store I have to buy it.

author: JenniT
title: My Favorite Flavor
text: I almost didn't buy this, but my daughter convinced me to try it. It's amazing! I love that it has just a bit of brownie spiciness with the sweetness of the ice cream.

author: Icecream6032753
title: New favorite!
text: All of the flavors pair very well with each other, the brownies add just a touch of spiciness that is complimented by the chocolate. This is going to be my new go to!

author: Casiecase
title: The best flavor
text: This is seriously such a good flavor. The brownie in it has enough cinnamon to give it a kick but isn’t overbearing and the little cinnamon bun bits are phenomenal.

author: Mareday
title: Spicy Mexican hot chocolate and Cinnabon
text: Anyone who rates this below a 4/5 is foolish! This tastes like heaven !! Spicy brownie batter with cinnamon ice cream and Cinnabon pieces. I hope this stays forever

author: BJ2019
title: Thumbs down
text: Hi I just kept feeling like they are reaching for flavors on this one. Bring back dastardly mash and New York super chunk

author: Agcrook
title: My favorite flavor!!
text: I absolutely LOVE this flavor. It's sweet with just a touch of spice with my favorite flavors. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!

author: grayskies23
title: Please make this a regular flavor!
text: OMG it's so good, spicy brownie, it's like you have been listening to my inner ice cream dream thoughts! Thank You : )

author: carolll
title: its good but not the best
text: i bought this awhile ago and it's good. i really realized that I was white when I though the cinnamon was spicy lol

author: Uncannyen
title: I'm obsessed
text: I love this! It's my favorite ice cream since Late Night Snack. I wish it would become a permanent flavor.

author: Meesh
title: LOVE IT!!!
text: So good!!!! Please keep this one as a regular! It's the closest thing I can find to Mexican Chocolate.

author: ice cream girl
title: yum!
text: the best ice cream flavor out there! the spice is phenomenal and it NEEDS to be a regular flavor

author: Horchatadelight
title: Cinnamon and chocolate
text: Are a combination meant for holy matrimony. This flavor needs to be made a permanent option.

author: Lillyllill
title: Yummmmmm
text: Please keep this flavor it’s my favorite the cinnamon and chocolate are a perfect combo

author: ilamae
title: PLEASE KEEP IT FOREVER
text: I love this flavor so much this is my favorite pls dont ever get rid of it im begging

author: ldmfarmer
title: Love the name!
text: This is by far my favorite flavor of all time with Cinnamon Bun. Please keep it!!!

author: Gotta love it
title: Love the flavor
text: Absolutely love this ice cream!!!! I’ve never been disappointed when trying flavors

author: Suzanne Kelsey
title: Not for everyone but I like it
text: Not for everyone but I like it. Lots of cinnamon flavor and a nice hit of chili

author: DouglasElliott
title: Zing!
text: This is an amazing combination of flavors. Please make it a regular!

author: Sweetsunshine
title: Wish it were here to stay
text: They’ve done it again! Few things I crave, now this is on the list

author: Shonken
title: Best new flavor!
text: Love this flavor so much! Dethroned several of my favorites!

author: Lizzie22
title: Please make boots on moon a regular flavor!
text: I love this flavor, and am already sad that it is a limited item. Yummy chocolate ice cream with crispy toffee & fudge cows and sugar cookie core. It's all amazing, and a terrific combination! Please please please, how do we make it a regular flavor?

author: Laluna
title: Worthy of being a regular flavor!
text: Bought this the other day and omg I am in love! This needs to be available always please don’t take it away it’s too good to not be around for long!!! The sugar cookie core is to die for!!

author: lainey_moto109mx
title: DUUUUUDEEEE...
text:
I’m just gnna say. This one makes me wanna sit on the couch and just smile n dance like a chunky little kid gettin’ their ice cream shimmy on!!! The chocolate ice cream, for some reason, tastes so dang good in this batch! The toffee bits are such an awesome touch to it. The fudge cows, another awesome texture element with a hit of a nice bittersweet dark chocolate to contrast the sweet/salty toffee crunch and silky smooth milk chocolate ice cream. But the dang killer here is....... that SUGAR COOKIE CORE. WHOA B&J... ur just showing off now. That stuff.... is like.. out of this world (; U should really put a litttlleee more in the pint hehe! :D
But anywho, it’s Uber yummy!! Wouldn’t be surprised if it became a next hit and stuck around!

author: gotgotgone
title: New Favorite
text: This is my favorite Netflix B&J flavor and I will be purchasing again. I was worried this would be too sweet but has the perfect balance of chocolate, toffee, fudge, and sugar cookie core. The sugar cookie core is not overbearing like some other core flavors. I also love the that the texture is both smooth and crunchy. I hope this become permanent

author: Amanda530
title: Good idea but weird
text: I was excited to try this new flavor last week. What's not to love about fudge cows, toffee, and sugar cookie. Unfortunately for me it was a major flop. The ice cream and fudge cows were enjoyable. The toffee clusters were a weird texture experience, unfortunately. I was expecting something more along the lines of the toffee in Everything But The.... which I really enjoy. The real disappointment, and reason I'm actually taking the time to review ice cream, was the sugar cookie dough core. For me, it just tasted of wet sugar. Grainy, too soft, no flavor. Ben and Jerry's has set high expectations for their products, but sadly this one didn't deliver for me.

author: Bjaxx1992
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER.
text: The combination of flavors in this ice cream is OUT OF THIS WORLD! I was lucky enough to find one pint and have been searching for more. I really hope this becomes a regular flavor because I’m obsessed. I’ve been checking all the stores nearby and everywhere is sold out. Please please please keep this one around!

author: shanti123
title: Out of This World!
text: The combination of flavors makes an incredible medley for your taste buds! It was exciting to try a new flavor. The sugar cookie dough is absolutely heavenly. You have to try this new flavor combination!

author: IceDream
title: Boots on the Mooo'n is out of this world!
text: Hole-y Cow!!! (Hole-y as in holes. You know, because craters...? Oh well.) Couldn't wait for Boots to show up in stores, so when it did, I pounced. I would be over the moon if this was made a regular flavor. For heaven's sake, do it! This is one of the best B&J flavors I've ever had. Been eating B&J for decades.

author: InvestinBlackCommunities
title: Best Chocolate Ice Cream in the Solar System!
text: I tried this last week for the first time on a whim (because there was no other B&J's left at the grocery store). I was nervous because myself and my partner are not usually chocolate ice cream lovers but this one has changed our minds!! The cookie core and other bits balance out the chocolate ice cream PERFECTLY. I've been trying to track it down again since but it seems people have caught on to it and it's been sold out. You have to try it!

author: ivamarie
title: We love it!!!
text: My son and I can’t stop talking about how good this flavor is, and how we would sign a petition to get it made a permanent Ben and Jerry’s variety! Please continue to make it...the combination of fudge and sugar cookies and toffee! oMG!

author: Sam loves ice cream
title: Even better than the show!!
text: After searching all the stores in my area, I was finally able to get my hands on what I now believe to be my new favorite. Please don't let this be a limited batch! It's too good to disappear!!!!

author: Missymcicecream
title: Most amazing flavor I’ve ever witnessed
text: I bought this flavor a week ago, hearing about it from the office ladies podcast. It sounded good and I love supporting them and also Space Force, so I had to buy it. I am not kidding when I say this is literally the best flavor I’ve ever had. And it’s not even close to my old favorite go-to of cookie dough and cookies and cream, so that says ALOT. This needs to be a permanent flavor. 500 stars.

author: TheAlphaGreenBean
title: Holy Moly!
text: I got a serious case of the munchies and this was the best icecream a person could ask for...A ice cream for the Gods! and them mini chocolate cows got me feeling like a archaeologist digging thru looking for there goodness. Hats off!!

title: Out of this World!!
text: Move over Phish Food and Cherry Garcia and Coffee Coffee Buzz Buzz and Americone Dream- all legit faves of mine! And make room New York Super Fudge Chunk because there is a new Wowzer in space!! PLEASE make this one stay in orbit!!!

author: Zany67
title: Keep Forever!
text: Searched high and low for this flavor. Finally found it and bought 6 pints! Everyone in our family (5 of us) is obsessed with it. Hands down a winner! Especially love the toffee clusters in this ice cream!

author: staciajan
title: Literally, out of this world!
text: The toffee bits sold me on this initially, but every part of this flavor was a delicious surprise! Everything from the milk chocolate ice cream to the cookie core... so good!!

author: ChellaQ
title: Please make this a permanent flavor!
text: This is my new favorite icecream. I really hope you guys keep it on forever. Usually it takes me months to finish a pint (I know, it's weird) but this one I finished in a day.

author: Ccort
title: Please please please make this a regular flavor
text: I never write reviews for anything. This is the best ice cream I HAVE EVER EATEN! Please please please make this regular.

author: Brittany01
title: Freaking delicious
text: I bought this today and holy camoly it is so good. The sugar cookie dough is to die for. Can you all please make this regular. Please. It is a perfect balance of sweet and the toffee adds some saltiness, and the sugar cookie dough just finishes it off.

author: TommyG
title: Nothing but fun for the mouth
text: The milk chocolate flavor is excellent, and there are tons of things to keep your mouth entertained. Awesome!

author: cara19
title: my dream pint
text: I love the special cows! and literally everything else about this pint. it’s so good in every way

author: Lacy
title: Absolutely AMOOOOZING!
text:
I went back and bought the rest of them at my local store.
Please make these a regular flavor!

author: steph95688
title: YAAAAAAAAS
text: I'm sitting on the couch devouring this entire pint. Make this flavor permanent, i need it in my life. Love chocolate based ice creams with crunchy additions like almonds, chocolate, toffee, etc. Most are ruined with marshmallow so this was an exciting flavor to find! My other fave is New York Super Fudge Chunk. We need more chocolate flavors like these!

author: Erlybird
title: Make it Regular, PLEASE!
text: I went to five stores in my area looking for "Boots on the Moon". I love all things MOON, and I thought I would like it, and I was wrong - I LOVE it! I had some for breakfast today...and dinner tonight. I am glad I live alone, so I don't have to share it! Am I addicted to it? Will an intervention be called for? Tune in, and make it regular!!!!

author: rachel23
title: AMAZING
text: My usual pint, Milk and Cookies has taken a back seat. The sugar cookie core + the toffee is a combination to DIE FOR. Plus, we all know the delight that is B&J chocolate ice cream.

author: ray18
title: Amazing!
text: One of my new favorite flavors, I’m so sad that it’s not a regular flavor. The sugar cookie core is my favorite part, and the toffee clusters add a great sweet crunch. Would definitely keep purchasing this if they made it a regular flavor.

author: Molekayhee
title: Best. Flavor. Ever.
text: Seriously...never get rid of this...even if the show doesn't continue on (which it should)...never ever ever get rid of this amazing flavor combination.

author: Ice Cream Manwich
title: SWEET BABY JESUS please keep this flavor around!
text: I seem to have discovered this flavor just as it was going out of stock. Got one for me and one for my wife, and we both thought it was fan-freaking-tastic. It even has a hint of malt flavor, whether unintentional or due to a confluence of other ingredients. I'd have trouble choosing between this and Phish Food, and that's saying something! I'd be even more stoked if you could make a froyo version, 'cuz the reduced calories and saturated fat would let me eat it more often!

author: ChocolateIcecreamLover
title: Favorite EVER!
text: This is seriously my fave!!! Please make it permanent!!!

author: Yellow
title: I need this
text: My new favorite flavor from you please make more!!!!!

author: Ks 8
title: Would give 10 stars if i could.
text: Okay I’m not joking when I say I love and hate this flavor at the same time. I pe this flavor because it is BY FAR the best tasting Ben and Jerry’s flavor ever made, no competition... and i amd a huge Ben and Jerry’s fan. The reason I hate it is because this flavor has caused me to gain like 30 lbs at this point because I cannot stop eating it. It does not get old. Ever. The crunchy sweetness of the toffee is spot on amd just pairs PERFECTLY with the sugar cookie core and the milk chocolate ice cream. Oh yeah, MILK CHOCOLATE. The milk chocolate is so good. I have eaten probably like 50 of these at this point and everytime the core is big and i never get a bad core. Every pint i have gotten has been just as good ig not better than the last. Please Ben amd Jerry’s. If you are reading this. DO NOT MAKE THIS A LIMITED TIME FLAVOR.

author: doubledipped89
title: YES
text: This new flavor is so good! I love it, it's like a fun twist on some well loved Phish Food flavors. The little chocolate cows are such a cute touch. I hope that this becomes a regular flavor, as it is now my favorite chocolate ice cream based B&J pint. My fav of all time will always be Salted Caramel Core, but this is a close second. Definitely for caramel and toffee fans, I even loved the sugar cookie core.

author: MizoMetar
title: Shockingly Good
text: I am not the biggest ice cream fan but I do like a good dessert, but this was everything I could have wanted from a dessert, creamy chocolate, a nice crunch of cookies and toffee, a smooth flavor that wants me going back for more. If your a fan of texture and something out of the ordinary give this a try, I know I did and I cannot wait to get more.

author: Charles V
title: Until this becomes a regular flavor...stockpile.
text: When I first discovered this I was on the East Coast. Found it in a tiny gas station. After one scoop I immediately made plans to go back and buy the place out. Bought the remaining three pints the next day. We only had a week left on our trip but I had no issues finishing all 4 pints.

author: Peach
title: Chip Happens
text: Just tried chip happens..yummy! Don't know how you managed the chips in it but love the salty/sweet combo. Reminds me of b-day's as a child

author: MegA
title: My ABSOLUTE FAVORITE!!
text: I love this flavor SO MUCH! It's such a bummer when the limited time flavors are the best flavors. I still think about the 2016 Empower-mint. Please keep this one going. And maybe bring back the Empower-mint?

author: TommyAZ
title: Almonds? Why?!
text: This could’ve been fantastic, but you went and ruined it with Almonds, one of the most common food allergies!!

author: Allie223
title: Yummmmyy!!!
text: My daughter (19) and I think this is one of the best flavors. Can't stop wanting in our freezer. Please make it a regular.

author: Morgan K
title: Best Ice Cream Ever
text: Absolute favorite flavor! All the flavors compliment each other perfectly and make a final product that is absolutely to die for! Please please please make it a regular flavor!

author: Nate from NH
title: Should be a regular.
text:
One of the best flavors out there.
At first the cookie core had me second guessing, but I was 100% wrong!
Everything about this is amazing.
Its a shame that its a limited batch.

author: Brittney
title: Not as Great as the Others.
text: Tastes kind-of bland. The sugar cookie core doesn’t really taste like much, especially when combined with the chocolate ice cream. Favorite part was the toffee pieces.

author: Pwalsh35
title: Delicious
text: Sugar cookie dough core make that into a flavor only

author: Coleman
title: Perfect harmony
text: I loved this ice cream so much I typed in Ben and Jerry's Americone Dream is amazing into Google. I wanted to add a review since there was only one so far... To my surprise the cone was still crispy and the amount of fudge covering the cone was not overwhelming whatsoever. But the caramel swirl is fantastic quality, bringing back memories of the first time I had caramel with a side of Apple. I chose this because I was looking for a non traditional flavor but not too rich, now don't get me wrong, eating half a pint is definitely a hefty load on the gut but it doesn't feel too busy and you still get to enjoy the ice cream.

author: sgai
title: Current fav BJ flavor
text: I've gone back to this flavor after favoring The Tonight Dough and the Caramel Core ones. I forgot what I was missing. I bought 2 the last time they were BOGO at Publix and go 2 more before the sale ended. I love caramel(I hate fudge) and the crispy chocolate covered waffle cones are tasty. Also I don't see many other options with waffle cone pieces. There have also been a lot of waffle cone in the pints.

author: LeeLee
title: Delicious
text: Tastes good, satisfies my sweet tooth, and definitely represents the Americone Dream!!!! Also, you don't have to feel guilty about eating a pint because you're eating ice cream for charity (it's like a tax deduction.... calories get deducted if they're for charity)!!!!

author: Dejota
title: Awesome
text: I typically try every new flavor that comes out when I see them. When they have no new flavors to try, my default is American dream. I love it!

author: Americone Dream Lover
title: The best ice cream ever
text: I eat a pint when I am sad, I eat a pint when I am happy, I eat a pint when I want to be happy... I keep eating this ice cream... SOOOOOOO GOOOOOOOOOD. This ice cream is truly dreamy

author: MNJenn
title: And I don't like ice cream...
text: I am not a big fan of vanilla ice cream. In fact, if it isn't coffee or chocolate I am usually not a fan at all; however, Americone Dream is a mix of fabulous flavors! No toppings or modifications are needed to make this a tasty treat for my son and I. The touch of waffle cone is a nice addition (though crunchier cone would be even better). Thanks for making a great ice cream!

author: Muney1169
title: O M Geeeee!
text: Fell in love at the first taste and haven't looked back. No other ice cream can compare. June 19 was the first I saw and heard of the slices and now I won't sit and eat the entire pint. Thanks guys!

author: Mimi232
title: FAVORITE
text:
So between this and the new Gimme S’mores. It’s a TIE. I honestly can’t decide which one I like more. But this has been one of my favorites before Gimme S’mores. I love Americone Dream so much The ice cream and the caramel ripple and the chocolate covered cone parts is AMAZING.
Whoever said this needed more salt it DOES NOT. It is perfect the way it is. I found no issues with the crunchy part either.
It has the perfect amount of caramel perfect amount of crunch and chocolate ratio. This is like a drumstick but with more of that “good part”.

author: PhishFoodLUVR
title: Could be delicious if revised
text: It would be fantastic if the texture were better and it had something to balance out the sweet. Replacing plain caramel for salted caramel, or adding sea salt to the chocolate. Switching to dark chocolate. The cone pieces felt chewy or doughy, and I expected a crunch. Though I do suspect this has more to do with the freezing process. I'd like it a lot more if it was only one of these. While I don't care for it, I can see why lots of people love it. Good job!!

author: Maggie1198
title: Americone Slice
text: I chose this flavor for the caramel swirl as much as the fudge covered cone pieces...sadly it contained neither

author: francescaf17
text: This is my fave ben and Jerrys flavor. I had it back when I met jerry at a speaking engagement. The little waffle cone pieces are perfect and the ice cream flavor is great. I have and will buy again!

author: stephaniek104
text: My favorite ice cream! Taste just like a drum stick!! Has the perfect amount of flavor [product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-ice-cream]

author: Browine
title: Delicious
text: Very good ice cream u guys have. Americone Dream is me nd my wife's favorite flavor. I it new varieties coming out anytime soon?

author: FuzzyGut
title: Such a great flavor!
text: This one is pretty perfect in my opinion. All the elements work well together and the chocolate covered cone pieces were nice n’ crunchy!

author: beckyh5052
text: They have much better flavors. It’s not bad but I do not like that the waffle cone pieces get soggy

author: Melissa8271975
title: My life now has purpose!!
text: I just want to say that now that I have found Ben & Jerry's Americone Dream ice cream, my life now has purpose!! That purpose is to get up everyday, eat Americone Dream ice cream until it's gone, drive to the store, buy some more, and repeat. This ice cream is EVERYTHING!!!!!! Please never stop making it!!!!

author: Flavor Reviewer
title: Great Flavor
text: Excellent! This flavor has all sorts of things in it!

author: kaylar97c1
text: Guilty pleasure! I think everyone can agree Ben & Jerry's is delicious no matter what kind you get. I really like the Americone Dream. I'm a huge fan of waffle cones so add that into the ice cream and I'm sold. I usually get the small pints with my boyfriend and we'll finish that in one sitting! It's so bad but so good :P

author: Skinny Pretzel
title: :o Conerrrrr
text: Such good ice cream. Like too good. I cannot physically stop myself from consuming this ice cream. The flavors and textures blend so well together and I am overwhelmed with the need to keep eating it. I am considering seeking professional help. Keep doing what you're doing. All the stars *************

author: dakotaw3
text: My favorite ice cream! Its so delicious, especially the caramel swirl! Also Ben & Jerrys high key supports the #BLM movement. So we STAN Ben & Jerrys in this household. 10/10 recommend to anyone and everyone in literally the entire world. Go get you some Ben & Jerrys. Like. Right now.

author: Gabby
title: Really good ice cream
text: The vanilla ice cream is so good! Almost as good as my Grandma used to make! I am a caramel lover and could use a little more in this but it was yummy, and of course everyone loves the cone!

author: SayWhat
title: Ingredients in every bite!
text: OMG.....amazing! First time trying this flavor and it did not disappoint! I love that the ingredients were in every bite. #happycustomer

author: Di7769
title: Never Knew Something Could Be So Good!!
text: I finally weaned myself off of the Strawberry Shortcake and then came Americone. Oooh Americone, I love you so!

author: kails924
text: All of the best flavor combinations in one place! Sweet, salty, crunchy, creamy, chocolatey, waffly goodness!

author: Angie23
title: Yummy!!!! Perfect combo. Lots of caramel!!!
text: Satisfies all sorts of cravings. Crunchier and creamy. Love it while I watch the Steven Colbert show!!!

author: Brittany012
title: Best flavor ever!
text: Literally my favorite flavor. The waffle cone prices and magical.

author: Amber88
title: The Best!!
text: So perfect!!!!!! The caramel swirl is amazing!!!!!

author: MedicChick
title: The Triple Threat!
text: Beauty, brains, and brawn. Chocolate, caramel, cone. There are no wrong answers here. I'd say it tastes like heaven but something about it is just so sinful. Nothing should be this good and still be legal. Oh but it is. It so is. Haven't tried it? WRONG. You haven't just "not tried it", you haven't even started living. It is life giving. Fix it. Go forth. Brave the great wide world in search of the truth of the universe. (Hint: it's Americone Dream).

author: Elyse
title: Out of This World!
text: This is one of the most delicious flavors of ice cream I’ve ever eaten. It’s sweet, crunchy, wonderfully gooey, with pieces of waffle cone, fudge, and caramel goodness. To make it even better, the proceeds go The Stephen Colbert’s AmeriCone Dream Fund, which feeds hungry children, provides them with medication, and also provides services to veterans. For what more could you ask? You’ll love it and feel good about helping those in need.

author: chase
title: Least favorite B&J
text:
I'm new to B&J icecream, just got a whole bunch of flavors last month and out of ~10 this is my least favorite.
The good: The icecream is high quality, and what you would expect from B&Js, and the caramel was gooey and tasty.
The bad: The cone pieces had a soggy texture and were very unpleasant to eat, they were slightly chewy. Not sure if this is a result of my freezer or something, but I couldn't finish the whole pint.

author: Ana808
title: Great flavor!
text: I decided to go with something out of the blue but sadly I wasn't thrilled.... the waffle cones where soggy and didn't make me want to eat the whole pint, like how I usually do lol.... don't think I'll eat this one again.... :(

author: ashleyv150
text: A good flavor! It's pretty simple- vanilla with caramel and fudge-covered waffle cone pieces- but sometimes that's all you need! I've definitely purchased this flavor more than once. The only slight flaw- and this wasn't an issue the last time I purchased it so maybe it got a bit better- was that the waffle cone pieces could be a bit too big sometimes. I'd still highly recommend it, though!

This Ben & Jerry's was good, but not my favorite of their line. Idk if it's the label or the actual ice cream. I think it needs someone else on the label who doesn't hate our current president. I'm a repeat consumer, but I won't buy again because of that. I love America regardless of who our president is, but overall the flavor is actually great like all ben & Jerry's

author: Rudy
title: Needs different texture caramel
text: The vanilla icecream part is amazing!!! The chocolate covered cone pieces and yummy, but the texture of the caramel is bad, i love caramel swirls in icecream but this light almost slime textured caramel really bothered me, i tried to.mix it in more or somethinh but it was like biting into a cold slime ball i couldn't eat it. But the rest of the icecream was great

author: makeupsbymarie
text: I’ve always loved Ben & Jerry’s. I really like this flavor. It’s really sweet and all of these flavors together are amazingly good. The only bad thing about this flavor is that the ice cream cone chunks are soggy. Either than that it’s super good and I recommend! It’s an ice cream that you can get an upset tummy over because it’s not too much chocolate!

author: SassySusan
title: Worth the farts.⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
text:
Lactose is not my friend. When I eat dairy I tend to clear out a room and be left alone. For this reason I don't eat dairy whenever possible. BUT THIS! I don't even care!! This is THE ONLY ICE CREAM I eat. My husband and kids and hide in the basement, I'm NEVER giving this up!!!!!
*plus they support the fight against racial inequality AMAZING!!!

author: michellehb6a4
text: This one is my husbands favorite. I prefer Phish Food or Half Baked. I'm so addicted that sometimes I will eat a whole pint in one setting. It's a little costly but sometimes you can find it on sale. I live this and nbn if you like ice cream then you would enjoy this. Check out Phish food andHalf Baked. Half baked has brownie in it...omg

author: ash57
title: Sooo good! Love the Caramel!
text: My husband bought me this and it was sooo good I had to look it up to show my sister to convince her to get this flavor... and see if everyone agreed with me!! It made my night. I am usually not a huge fan of ice creams, I am pretty plain and like basic flavors like coffee, vanilla, and strawberry but man was this ice cream good!!

author: lalalamb
text: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry flavor! It's the perfect amount of sweet for my sugar cravings. I like the waffle cone bits which give it a crunch and some texture. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 because some batches tend to have soft pieces of waffle cone. The waffle cones are not consistently crunchy with every pint i buy.

author: kristins8f59
text: This is my favorite ice cream ever. I cant say this enough. They currently dont have it at the Walmart near me so I have to get it whenever Im at food lion. Its so worth it though. I think my favorite part is the waffle cone pieces. My only complaint is that there isnt enough caramel, but thats just because I love caramel.

author: sighrijaa
text: The best combination of things. I like vanilla based things more than chocolate ice cream based things and so I stay away from a lot of Ben and Jerrys flavors because most are the latter. This is great for a vanilla lover. With pieces of fudge and caramel (waffle cone pieces). The gooey-ness is real and drool worthy. YUM.

author: mandy22q
text: Great brand, amazing quality and this flavor is just perfect The crunchy waffle cones with caramel and the vanilla is just the right blend however I add chocolate syrup in with mine to give it more of a chocolate flavor I'm not big on the vanilla ice cream but with chocolate syrup mix in it's perfect summer time treat

author: Cbugkrunks33
title: Definitely an ice cream dream!!
text: This is one of my all time favorite flavors!! The ingredients go together so well!! The waffle cone pieces are very easy to chew, I get a rush of gooey goodness when it's mixed with the caramel swirl, and I get the ultimate satisfaction in enjoying a very tasty ice cream pint!! Please don't ever discontinue this flavor!

title: AMAZINGGG
text: I'm lactose intolerant so I tend to stay away from ice cream but every now and then I give in . This by far has the be the best ice cream that I have ever had and it's also my first and only time trying Ben & Jerry's . Haven decided when I think that I'm going to try a new flavor yet because so far this is the one .

author: sydpr
text: Ben & Jerrys will always be my favorite ice cream from the store! These pints are packed with flavor - mainly because while developing the product Ben, who suffered from a disease that left him unable to smell, couldnt taste the flavor of the ice cream! So, they just kept adding flavor! Which turned out GREAT for us.

author: ichbineinmaron
text: I love this brand of ice cream. I have no complaints with any flavors from this company. Growing up we lived near a Ben & Jerry's and that was our treat. I love this particular flavor because of the different bits added to it. In short I don't have the time to write all the reasons I love this brand or this flavor.

author: ashiahw
text: very good ice cream flavor from the bunch in my opinion. i think the cream flavor is great and i love the chocolate covered cone pieces that is all over the cup. the price is good and you can find this at your local Walmart or Target for about $4 i like to have it with me on a spa night while i'm watching movies.

author: Jackie54
title: On my top 5 list
text: I love the smoothness of the ice cream, the crunch of the cone and the yummy caramel swirl. Thank you for creating this flavor.

author: kailingc
text: I normally only get Cherry Garcia from Ben & Jerrys, but I just tried this flavor out for the first time ever. This has all of my favorite things in it - chocolate, fudge, caramel and waffle cone bits! The waffle cone bits are my favorite little add on. They add a nice crunch to the ice cream. Highly recommend!

author: jordan_large
text: One of my favorite ice cream flavors. I love Stephen Colbert and its so cool that they collaborated with him on this! The flavors together are so delicious- Im not even a caramel fan but the overall flavor is just too good. And the chocolate covered waffle pieces are so unique to this ice cream and so tasty.

author: Jake3469
title: Not the best
text: I love Ben and jerry’s Ice cream but this flavor is just not it... It’s so boring tasting compared to most of the other choices they have

author: girlwithnoclue
text: Ben & Jerry are my two favorite men because not only are they SMASHING the patriarchy, but theyve been killing the ice cream game for years. Americone dream is the perfect balance between the sweet cream I cream and the salty waffle cone pieces. Its not too indulgent and is always stocked in my fridge!

author: mizbohemia
text: I LOVE Stephen Colbert and I LOVE Americone dream! I am a total vanilla girl through and through and tell me that my vainlla has toffee, almonst, caramel and wafers? HEAVEN!!! This ice cream was made for ME but, since I love Stephen Colbert SO much I let Ben & Jerry name this one after him. Mwahahaha!

author: Jennibobunni
title: Soulfullness
text: My favorite ice cream in this world! For a long time I've tried to find my favorite ice cream. My brother likes buying random ice creams and he ended up having this one night. I fell in LOVE! I feel this ice cream on a spiritual level! It defineitly fits who I am as a person! Crunchy and sweet! ; )

author: juded1
text: im not the biggest fan of ice cream but THIIIIS is so good. I cant get over how amazing this is if im going to a drug store for snacks I always grab this. If you havent tried it please give it a try you wont regret it!! (plus this is an amazing company to support so please spend the extra money!)

title: Three Times This Has Been Offered to Me
text: My husband has bought this for me three times and I've eaten it all three times. I was "squinty" two of those times so on those occasions, I was super thankful for it and likely licked the bowl. That said, I am not reviewing this also squinty and eating Cheetos that I also think are super awesome.

author: stacis8
text: If I had to pick a favorite ice cream I think it would be this one. Yeah it would definitely be this one. Its just the best ice cream I dont know what else to say it has everything you could want it has chocolate covered waffle cone pieces, it has caramel, and it literally is the Americone dream.

author: fgr615
text: I am not a big ice cream person at all but we picked this flavor up so I gave it a try since it has been so hot out. It. Is. DELICIOUS. I now have a scoop every night - the caramel swirls and chunks of cone in the vanilla ice cream are insane. You can tell they are used high quality ingredients.

author: influensterbrit
text: I cannot tell you how much I love this ice cream! It is a flavor I always buy when buying ice cream. I cannot express how delicious this is and I think you should go out and buy a pint right now. Trust me. I love ice cream. I am super satisfied with my choice to eat this for dessert for years.

author: eliz13413
title: Just not for me
text: I know a lot of people really love this one, but I'm not feeling it. The caramel swirl is delicious, but the cone pieces are soggy/chewy, and to me, they should be crunchy, like in a Drumstick treat. I think I'll be passing on this one in the future and trying the Karamel Sutra Core instead.

author: ysnovic
text: This ice cream is one of my favorites right now!! The pieces of chocolate covered cones are so good. Also I love the caramel swirl throughout this ice cream. It's a little on the sweeter side but so creamy and delicious. I can't wait to get more of this. I just wish it was a little cheaper.

author: msaxd
text: This ice cream is one of my favorites right now!! The pieces of chocolate covered cones are so good. Also I love the caramel swirl throughout this ice cream. It's a little on the sweeter side but so creamy and delicious. I can't wait to get more of this. I just wish it was a little cheaper.

author: andaddiesaid
text: This is my second favorite flavor of Ben & Jerrys. I love it so much and hope they never retire the flavor. Delicious sugar cone bits are the perfect crunch in the creamy ice cream. I only put a few sprinkles on top of this and it is the perfect dessert! Hard to not eat the whole pint...

This has to be my least favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor. Usually they knock it out of the park, but this one disappointed me. Its strangely...bland. The cone pieces seemed stale and cardboard-y, and the rest of the flavor didnt make up for the lack, unfortunately. I wont be buying it again.

author: taylfeather
text: When I want ice cream, this one is my GO TO. I love everything about it. Although the Tonight Dough is a close second, I prefer the Americone Dream. Its easy to find and the pint size is perfect for one serving for me! Nothing hits the spot when I am having a craving like this variety.

author: julien1
text: This flavor is delicious!! I absolutely love the little pieces of waffle cone in there. I enjoy ben&jerrys the most out of all the other ice creams because its creamier than others.

author: christinab47
text: This is my all-time favorite, vanilla with pockets of fudge and caramel, it is pricey but goes on bogo often where I shop. The tubs are small but that's a good thing otherwise brainfreeze and sweats or pj's (unless you have elastic waist pants) would be the norm. Perfect with Netfix.

author: rondab4
text: This icecream is so good. I like the chocolate covered waffle cone pieces and the swirls of caramel yummy . Its the perfect combination. Sometimes I eat the whole pint . Its thats good. Plus Ben & Jerry's is woke so im happy to support them. I will definitely continue to repurchase

author: crissya7149
text: My favorite ice cream! Taste just like a drum stick!! Has the perfect amount of flavor! Vanilla, milk chocolate and little bits of cone, just the perfect combination. I try not to go down the freezer section of the grocery store because I know I'm going to get a couple pints! Yum!!

author: kitkat326
text: Ben & Jerrys is a staple in the ice cream industry and i enjoy it. Its not my go to because it can be too rich a lot of times but this particular combination of flavors is classic and delicious. If i only had Ben & Jerrys to choose from this would be it! Gotta love the classics!

author: George
title: My favorite
text: I am a long time lover of Americone Dream, delicious caramel and waffle cone flavors. I was surprised with my latest purchase to find cookies and cream ice cream instead of vanilla in the carton, in the end a not unwelcome addition. Perhaps brings into question quality control.

author: amydj79
text: I love Ben and Jerrys as a company because of their social justice and community based causes. Americone Dream is one of my favorite flavors. Its the perfect mix of fudge, caramel and waffle cone pieces. Its rich and creamy. Beware, once you get started, its hard to put down!

author: Lauracantu88
title: Simple Perfection
text: Since I was 13 I have never strayed from my two favs Phish Food and Chocolate brownie ... I saw waffle cone pieces and was sold. Americone dream is a great combination of flavors. The waffle pieces are still crisp and fresh. I ONLY wish it was loaded with more waffle pieces.

author: gretakate21
text: Ben & Jerrys is a family favorite because my dad has a dairy allergy. I love when stores have dairy free options because our family is able to enjoy a fun dessert where everyone is happy. Best creamy and fun ice cream flavors! [product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-ice-cream]

author: jeanl6
text: My husband and I are addicted to the Ben and Jerry's ice creams! They are just the perfect amount of creamy. The chocolate is tasty and decadent. This flavor is perfect with the waffle cone pieces. I would highly recommend to others to try this flavor. You can not go wrong!

author: evelyncc086
text: This is by far my favorite ice cream from Ben & Jerrys. The vanilla ice cream is always a winner, then the fudge covered waffle cones add texture and little bursts of surprises in your mouth. The caramel swirl adds that smooth buttery flavor without it being overwhelming.

author: milear
text: Once this came out it quickly became my fave Ben and Jerry's flavor. Its has all of my favorite things in it. Its delicious the cone is crunchy not soggy and tge chocolate hits the spot. Perfect on a cold summer day. The price is average but can often be found on sale.

author: alishac66e7
text: [product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-ice-cream] I love ice cream and I love Ben and Jerrys Icecream ! Out of all their flavors I love Americone! A nutty buddy basically mixed with the classic vanilla ice cream! This is a most have! You have to try this ice cream!

author: katt14
text:
Yummy! Has all my favorite flavors. Chocolate, fudge pieces, caramel. It doesnt get better than this! No improvement needed. Can be a bit pricey, but if you want the best , you pay more. Im very satisfied with this ice cream !!!
Highly Recommend

author: theantinewyorker
text: It's in my fridge right now! I love this flavor! The waffle cone is just the right amount of crunch to the smooth creamy vanilla. I am a repeat consumer and highly recommend this flavor when you're watching and/ or bingeing your favorite tv channels and Netflix.

My go-to Ben and Jerrys! They have the best ice cream, and they always pack it full of amazing ingredients! They are all good, but this one is definitely my favorite. You cant go wrong with fridge covered waffle cone pieces with Carmel drizzle. Seriously the best!

author: mairennm
text: THIS IS MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM OF ALL TIME! Ben and Jerry's went crazy this falvor, and I love it. The mix of caramel, waffle cone, and vanilla is superb, and if you do anything next to the grocery store, you have to pick this up. I swear it will change your life.

author: measterbrook
text: This is one of my most favorite flavors when it comes to ice cream! I love that he has pieces of cone broken up in it! How creative is that!? This is the most bought ice cream flavor for me, but this is mostly because its only a few servings! Thats okay though!

author: 15hurdoli
text: There will never be a bad time for ice cream. I LOVE Ben & Jerrys. Not only does the company actually stand for some pretty great things, theyre flavors are unbeatable!! Americone Dream is my favorite with crunchy little waffle cone pieces, chocolate, caramel!!

This is so so good, but it's also so so expensive. The containers are so small that you split this between 2 people and you are done in one sitting. I do really love the different flavors swirling together in this one but I save Ben and Jerry's for emergencies.

author: sirodlovesyou
text: This brand is for certain my favorite brand. It is consistently good. This flavor is the best. Someone put me on it when I was in college and ever since I have been hooked. I also love how it is widely available. The names are pretty unique and I love that too.

author: Rebel of Mars 81
title: Delicious, but too much caramel sauce.
text: I love this flavor, however, the ones I have purchased in the last year had far too much caramel. It is not just swirls, but globs, which makes it all too sweet. The rest of the ice cream, especially the chocolate cover cone pieces, is great and well balanced.

author: logan1310
text: Ice cream is one of my favorite desserts and Ben and Jerry’s never lets me down. I’m not much of a vanilla person so all the bits and pieces and drizzles throughout the ice cream is great. It tastes delicious and there’s enough that it lasts me a few days too!

author: kabrion
title: Love
text: We call this our honeymoon ice cream because it was what was being sampled during the factory tour we went on on our honeymoon. I’ve purchased a pint a month since then. The chocolate cone pieces seemed so weird at first but the flavors blend so perfectly.

author: stevenckopp
text: Listen, my apartment is a Ben & Jerry's apartment. If I'm going for ice cream, my first grab is always B&J. Americone Dream, Chubby Hubby, Tonight Dough, Half-Baked. The list goes on. There's usually a pint in my freezer. What's not to love about it?

author: Mel5
title: Excellence
text:
The best flavor, hands down. Forever.
Ben and Jerry's is my #1 ice. It tastes super clean but never bland. I like the natural ingredient lists and the variety of flavors. Plus its just creamier and better than every other ice cream out there, hands down.

author: justint10
text: as with most ben and jerrys products this is a masterful combination of texture flavor and scent. the smooth creaminess added with the crunch of the shells and the sweet smell of caramel give this flavor its sheer amazingness. definitely a favorite flavor

author: Christin
title: FAVORITE ICE CREAM
text: By far the best ice cream I have ever eaten! I have quite a sweet tooth so trust me when I say that this stuff is good! The caramel is in every bite of vanilla ice cream. The chocolate waffle cone is light and delightful! Please never discontinue this!!

author: angelloveinc25
text: I love this icecream it's the best. It's very delicious and you won't be disappointed at all with the flavor. This delicious icecream are the best compared to any others. I'm a repeat consumer. I love it. I would definitely recommend this to everybody.

author: gianam3
text: My favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor! It has everything - cone, caramel, cookie dough. So good. Same price tag as all Ben & Jerrys but delicious enough to splurge. Also, as a person with a nut allergy there is no warning or may contain, which is relieving!

author: Quaniapintluva
title: Bummer
text: I thought it was jimmy Fallon on the pint wanting to get the tonight dough. I was so upset when I got home. So I attempted to enjoy it. It’s not tasty at all. It’s salty, and crunchy & not what I want my ice cream to be.

author: ChilliedLaura
title: Americone Suprise
text: My wife brought me this one home to my disappointment as it really did not appeal to me. I thought it would not have any strong flavor, but I am glad I was wrong! Great mix-ins through out, a nice caramel taste and chewy bits of cone. Would buy again!

author: junel645d
text: I really enjoy Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream varieties but do not often purchase them because of the high price tag. One of my favorites from Ben & Jerry's is Stephen Colbert's Americone Dream. I love the crunchy wafflecone bits mixed with all the goodness.

author: jennab10
text: THE BEST ICE CREAM OUT THERE!!!! I love the chocolate covered wafers that give it an extra crunch and they go so well with the Carmel drizzle and vanilla ice cream. I buy this over and over again every time I have an ice cream craving, 10/10 recommend

author: sarabearycanny
text: Favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor of all time. I love the crunchy cone pieces, the super sweet caramel, and the luscious ice cream. This flavor never lasts in my freezer a pint is basically a single serving. I highly recommend everyone try this flavor.

author: heatherv9478
text: I really enjoyed this ice cream. The ice cream itself was super smooth and didn't do that weird thing where it gets crystally when you put it back in the freezer. Plus it satisfied my craving for something crunchy thanks to the ice cream cone pieces!

author: karishma__x3
text: This is my favorite icecream and icecream brand ever. I love how they dont just sell chocolate or vanilla but these creative ones instead. The only thing i wish they did was sell bigger sizes. Its expensive for how small it is but totally worth it.

author: chanellej
text: I really wanted to love this ice cream. Maybe its the hype? But I kind of had higher expectations. It was good, dont get me wrong!! I liked the sweet and the crunch and the chocolate... but Idk. Wouldnt call it my favorite of all time or anything.

author: Fat Matt
title: Excellent mix of flavors
text: Yes, 3 stars. I would have gave it 4 or 5 stars, but tonight dough raised the bar to high. After trying the amazing mix of flavors in tonight dough, no other flavor will be able to match the quality or complexity that I know expect from ice cream.

author: ericamata2010
text: B and j always wins in my book. Nothing is better than blue Bell but this always takes the cake. I love this brand so much and their ice cream is loaded! Better than any alternatives out there. Nothing taste like b&j. Super satisfied with this!!

author: snh_18
text: Okay, i usually do not like vanilla or caramel, but this ice cream laughs at me. The waffle cone bits are worth it all. If thats all you get it for, its worth it. They are chocolatey, crunchy and the ice cream just goes so perfectly with it.

author: jordankierstynmarie
text: This flavors has become one my of new favorite as my flavor of choice seems to ALWAYS be sold out. Its got a great mix of flavors that come together for a delicious taste. I generally only buy when the product is on sale as it is expensive.

author: noflexzone11
text: I love this ice cream!! I prefer vanilla-based ice cream over chocolate, and this is my favorite B&J ice cream flavor. With waffle cone pieces and a chocolate swirl, this sweet treat is a rewarding dessert that will tickle your tastebuds.

author: leslieeovoxo
text: Ben and Jerrys is your best friend when you are just chilling watching Netflix and eating ice cream after your boyfriend had just broke up with you it is such a comfort food we love ice cream and Ben & Jerry’s is so amazing very satisfied

author: themayaabdulr
text: I really enjoyed this flavor of ice cream. I really really love the pieces of waffle cone inside of the ice cream, it adds a very nice crunch. I really enjoyed the combination of the flavors together it isnt too overwhelming and is great.

author: nieceeg
text: One of my favorite flavors by Ben & Jerrys! I loveeee the chocolate waffle cone!! Im drooling thinking about it. Im pregnant and Im surprised I havent gotten a pint yet! Definitely going to after being reminded! Its so good, trust me!

author: danzrlove
text: This is one of my favorite flavors, I dont get it often. Partially because I cant find it and also because I dont tolerate dairy well. It is pricey as its Ben& Jerry but its also has all of the yummy flavors I remember from childhood!

author: britanayyx3
text: Ben and Jerrys is the best ice cream! The Americone dream flavor is one of my favs because it has everything you could ever want in an ice cream right there in the pint. Its not too overbearing it has just enough of everything in it

author: reganc10
text: By far my favorite ice cream by Ben & Jerry's!! This is such a great, never done before flavor that is provides that classic taste of a chocolate dipped cone. If you're debating which flavor to buy, you can't go wrong with this one.

author: tabithamari
text: I very rarely Eat ice cream because Im lactose intolerant. But every now and then I crave it. I tried this once on a whim, and fell in love. I havent been able to find it recently which is a bummer. I also love how they support BLM.

author: kaitiekreviews
text: My very favorite ice cream flavor! It is incredible including caramel ribbons, chunks of sugar cone, chocolate chips all mixed into vanilla. I only wish that it was slightly more affordable. I would eat it way more often if it was!

author: tiffanyr5e7a
text: I love this Icecream! I love the fact that they have actual pieces of cone in the Icecream. I think its a little on the expensive side. I only buy that brand when they are on sale. Thats really the only negative thing I had to say.

author: kirstens22
text: I was not a fan of this particular flavor they have. The waffle cone pieces were stale, and it wasnt that great of a flavor. I didnt even finish my pint. I love a lot of other flavors they have, but this one I would not buy again.

author: yaymejess
text: This has to be my favorite flavor! Ive probably have brought more than 10 pints. This is the best ice cream created. It has vanilla, caramel, and waffle cone. Its just amazing! Please do yourself a favor and run to the store now!

author: maryanastasia6
text: I love this flavor, the bits of cone add the perfect texture and the overall combo of flavors is great. I appreciate the support the company gives too, so it makes the ice cream all the sweeter. Plus Stephen Colbert is hilarious.

This is one of my favorite flavors! It's vanilla ice cream with waffle cone pieces and fudge. It's very delicious! If you have not tried Ben & Jerry's then I highly recommend you do so. One of the best ice cream brands out there!

author: kierstenp7be0
text: When I’m feeling ice cream, I splurge on Ben and Jerry’s! It’s really rich and creamy and has great flavor! Lots of sugar tho so be careful and don’t eat it all the time. This flavor is definitely my favorite, you should try it!

author: shangreen
text: Im a person who likes a lot of goodies in their ice cream. This flavor was a little bland for my personal taste and didnt seem to have as many fix-ins as other varieties do. It was an ok option but I would not purchase again.

author: mikaelaa1
text: My favorite ice cream of all time. This is the perfect combination of ice cream, swirls and chunks. But dont bother with the [product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-pint-slices-ice-cream-9-ct] they are extremely disappointing.

author: baileekno
text: I love me some Americone Dream. The perfect treat at the end of the day. The crunchy waffle cone pieces inside are my favorite because they add a nice crunch to go along with the creamy ice cream and delicious caramel swirl!

I like the flavor and all the different kind of ice cream that Ben and Jerry’s have! The price is a little high but I would pay for it for having a good ice cream. I would buy it again and I recommend it to my friends always

author: Raven
title: PERFECTION
text: Literally the best ice cream ever. All the best ingredients. In my fantasy world half the Carmel would be replaced with pretzels but it’s perfect as is too. My stores don’t gave it enough but that’s ok. It’s a scarce luxury

author: jill239
text: Best of is in this concoction of yummy! This is my go to and not only because I love Stephen Colbert but part of the proceeds go to charity. The mix of the cone in the ice cream with the chocolate just all around perfect

author: megk9
text: THIS IS MY FAVORITE FLAVOR OF ICE CREAM! It is not over pricy and is usually at all the stores that sell Ben and Jerrys. Though by the time I get to grab it there is usually only one or two left so it is clearly a winner!

author: kristas99a5
text: Literally my most favorite ice cream ever! It definitely is a splurge treat, but worth every calorie! The crunchy cones covered in chocolate is what my dreams are made of! Will buy this ice cream for the rest of my life!

author: effiea3
text: Crunchy, . Creamy, . Sweet, . Salty, . This is my perfect ice cream flavor. It has everything youll want. The chocolatey waffle cone pieces add the perfect crunch and the caramel swirl adds the perfect salty sweetness!

author: shreebee1029
text: I like the Americone cream flavor a lot because it has really delicious cone pieces in the ice cream. I also like that Ben and Jerrys takes the time to collaborate with people to create custom flavors, its a cute idea!

author: jessicaa265f
