text: Americone Dream is one of my favorite flavors from the Ben & Jerry’s store. I love that they sell it in pint sizes now! Although it can be a little more expensive than other ice creams, I think it’s worth the splurge.

author: larissat9
text: Ben and Jerrys its my number one brand of ice cream! But AMERICONE DREAM ITS THE BEEEEEESSSSSTTT without any doubts! My goodness, its the best, I just cant stop thinking about it haha. Everyone should try this flavor

author: jkingrey1447
text: This is my absolute favorite pint of ice cream out there. Its a bit pricey, about $4.00 where I am, I love the waffle cone pieces dipped in chocolate in here! Delicious, makes me want a Ben and Jerrys store close by!

author: aditik_sheetalll
text:
Absolutely delicious!!
This is my favorite Ben and jerry available on fresh. A chunk of goodness and every bite you take.. I wish I would have never tried it .. its too hard to put the spoon down :( just love it ..

author: mileysmommy
text: These little tubs of ice cream are perfect. I love hot great all the ingredients taste and how soft and smooth the ice cream is. I wish they sold this in a bigger size but other than that, this ice cream is amazing

author: cynthiam
text: I honestly love this and use it everyday! Highly recommend this to anyone and everyone me or female. I use it practically every single day. I love this brand too, I would choose this over any other brand as well.

author: xtoxicbeautyx
text: This is amazing. I love it. I can not say enough great things about this product. It is definitely worth the money. If you have the chance to experience this product, be sure you do so because you wont regret it.

author: TimmyA
title: Soooo Good!!!!!
text: Craving some Ben and Jerry's I made a stop to pick up a pint looking for something chocolatey. Saw this flavor and thought I'd give it a shot, and DANG!!!! was it good! Love the fudge covered waffle cone pieces.

author: jbond33
text: The combo of the smooth caramel swirls and the bits of waffle cone makes this flavor one of the best. Little pricey but definitely worth the buy. You will not be disappointed in the deliciousness of this flavor

author: zreviews
text: This was the first flavor of Ben & Jerrys ice cream I ever tried. Ive always heard great things about their ice cream so I decided to give it a try. I absolutely loved it! Can be found at most grocery stores.

author: kellies9ed4
text: I tend to like a little crunch in my ice cream. This is great because it isnt overwhelming, but gives some caramel, and the crunch of waffle cone pieces. Its like ice cream in a cone without all of the hassle.

author: Desireeluvsicecream
title: Best flavor ever
text: I’ve bought this every chance I’ve had and it never disappoints. The perfect combination of caramel, crunch and vanilla is amazing. Thank you for creating this wonderful ice cream it has made my life complete

author: baileyt8
text: I think this is my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerrys. I love the bit of crunch from the cone, and the fact that it is not too chocolatey. Its always delicious and never a disappointing flavor! Will buy again.

author: chuliosis
text: One of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor! Not too sweet and the waffle pieces in there add a nice texture to the ice cream. Some ice creams have too much caramel or not enough but this is very well balanced!

author: maurasap
text: Ben & Jerry’s has great flavors. I especially like this one because you don’t need to scoop it onto a cone, there are bits of cone in it already!! A bit expensive, but I get it on sale at CVS or Stop & Shop.

author: lauramgw
text: This is my favorite. The only thing that makes it better is when I add my own slices of banana to it (I really like banana and icecream); but it's fantastic the way it is. My FAVORITE Ben and Jerry's flavor.

author: austin2005999
text: This is just a great product I really recommend it to all of y’all out there. Because it has a good bang for its buck and it also works very very well! It rlly works with anything. This is my great review.

author: nicolep1122
text: This is hands down my favorite flavor of ice cream. I love the chocolate dipped cone pieces and the smooth texture of the ice cream itself. Its just absolutely delicious and I would definitely recommend it.

author: mellyzero

author: amyb274

author: jlaw_beauty

author: s_y_d_n_e_e_

author: paolav1

author: leanneh1010

author: seraphtay

author: caris1

author: ALZ1122
title: Absolutely awesome
text: This is definitely one of my favorites! I bought as pint slices, but 1 slice isn't enough. LOL

author: aliciawa030

author: susanu77ca

author: barisaxophone
text: This ice cream is delicious! It has a good texture from the cone bits and has caramel in it.

author: Mloper493
title: Favorite Flavor!
text: Wish this was sold at the grocery store closest to me. One of my favorite flavors for sure!

author: longislandfooodie

author: samc74

author: krissym8
text: Probably one of my favorite ice cream flavors from Ben & Jerrys. Its definitely a classic!

author: aliciac130
text: Love love love this classic! Im totally a vanilla girl and add some crunch ... Im in love!

author: crystalw52
text: Great flavor. Love the chocolate and crunch of the waffle cone. I do think its expensive.

author: sportslove
text: I love ice cream and I love this flavor. I also love Ben and Jerrys. The taste is amazing

author: Tatiana
title: Yummy!
text: This is by far my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's, always my go to when I get ice cream!

author: courtneyg100
text: Who doesnt love the chocolate nugget in the bottom of an ice cream cone?!? Irresistible!

author: kelsnicole3
text: BEST FLAVOR OF ICE CREAM. Chocolate covered waffle cone pieces?! Are you joking?! Unreal

author: arandomperson
title: AWSOME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
text: IS super yummy. and delish!! I bought this yesterday and I am so happy I did buy it pls

author: stephanier9039
text: I intake a ridiculous amount of ice cream a week hahah. Ben and jerry never disappoints

author: authoreda
text: Ice cream cone ice cream. Droooool. Ben & Jerry’s is the freaking best. Can’t beat it!

author: arwelsh10
text: love this product and its amazing quality recommend to everyone honestly - love it :).

author: mattp7
text: This is so delicious and one of the best I have ever tried. I cant have enough of it.

author: maytesa5b9
text: This is my second favorite flavor I really enjoy eating this ice cream its delicious.

author: kathyb4
text: What more can I say about Ben & Jerrys that hasnt been said? Grab a pint and enjoy!

author: lakefever2

author: angelapb797

author: canderson08
text: You cant go wrong with any flavor. I can down the pint if im not careful. Sooo good

author: kenseylinn
text: Its very good and I love this ice cream and its sooooo good and I highly recommend

author: katharinec1e3f
text: This is the best. Ben & Jerrys is the best. And if you dont like it, youre wrong.

author: Lh615
title: Good but could be better....
text: Would be a million times better with fudge swirl with/instead of the caramel.

author: Rockstar

text: I've never been much of an ice cream eater but I crave this one all the time!

author: cchilde6

text: There are a lot of great flavors, but in my opinion this is the best.

author: CaliKat

text: Yummy! Now can you please make a vegan version...pretty please

author: Pranav

text: It’s so good. Thank you Ben. Thank you Jerry. Thank you!

author: dk2019
