text: I could eat this for breakfast lunch and dinner haha I absolutely love this ice cream. It’s the best hands down. It’s a little pricey but you get what you pay for. This is an all time fav at girls night for sure.

author: linda001
title: Mine always has dough
text: Not sure what luck everyone else is having but mine always has plenty of dough. It's really good dough! And the icecream doesn't taste plain, it's very vanilla flavored, almost like a vanilla bean icecream.

author: angelicabadbd
text: I love this ice cream. Especially since Blue Bell has its issue with the recalls in the past. Every since I’ve been eating this brand and I just say I’m not disappointed at all. Overall I’m satisfied with!

author: miasd75b
text: Omg my favourite ice cream! Everything about this ice cream is amazing! Ice cream is my fave and I’m very picky but this is delicious. The only thing I would say is that my local supermarkets sell for £5!

author: alishasec3f
text: Does it really get any better than ben and Jerry's ice cream? I mean c'mon?! Always a staple for our family on movie night. So many different flavors to choose from so everyone gets their own.

author: megan0
title: All Vanilla, Nothing Else
text: So sad that I decided to break my no ice cream streak with this particular flavor. There was barely any cookie dough, and even less chocolate chips. Waste of the $8 a pint costs in NYC.

author: Rem127
title: It was ok vanilla ice cream
text: Got a pint for cheat day, and there was not a single cookie dough pellet in the entire pint. It was plain vanilla ice cream with about 15 chocolate chips in the whole thing.

author: babee143
text: Cookie dough really taste like cookie dough. It’s really hard to find an ice cream that has that real dough taste. You also get dough or chocolate chips in every bite.

author: mxriamk
text: An absolute favourite ! Plus I love the half baked flavour. The mix of flavours this brand offers differentiates itself from other brands and is totally worth it!

author: alyssa_cave
text: Nice big chunks of cookie dough, great vanilla ice cream. I mean can you really go wrong with Ben and Jerry's?

author: sheenawfac1
text: Dangerous to have in my house I’ll eat it all. It is the only comfort food that my life needs. Get you some

author: Katie
title: No dough!
text: Not a single piece of cookie dough! Very frustrating! Especially at the price of Ben & Jerry's!

author: bekzbekz
text: Guilty pleasure! Perfect for the sweet tooth, lots of cookie dough pieces and chocolate chips.

author: NightElf321
title: Didn't like it
text: Tasted like Just really sugary Vanilla Ice Cream, I couldn't taste the cookie dough gobs.

author: Cassandra D
title: Inconsistent flavor
text: Decided to indulge in a Ben & Jerry’s cookie dough pint and it was a disappointing splurge! This is the second time now having this experience. The ice cream was very chalky and had a weird after taste. Maybe an inconsistent batch? No cookie dough chunks a few chocolate bits, was very dry and brittle. The base vanilla ice cream had a chalky taste to it and as you tried to scoop it out of the pint was flaky. No ice crystals but left a powdery film on your palate.

author: Jnewton79
title: No Cookie Dough
text: They tasted ok I guess, but there wasn't one piece of cookie dough in the entire box I bought; that's the reason for my review. Quality was fine but without cookie dough they aren't what I bought.

author: sdtatis
text: I'm really not a sweets fan and by association an 8ce cream fan but who doesn't love Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Ice Cream? It's just good! Smooth and creamy with bite sized chunks of the raw cookie dough that you all know we grew up stealing and eating if our moms were baking cookies. Mine didn't but I learned how to as a kid so that's what I did. As a whole it's a great brand with unique flavors. Something for everyone.

author: Ccp3
title: Disappointed..........
text: Like many of the other reviewers, I can't find much cookie dough. I usually spend the extra cash for Ben and Jerry's, but I am so disappointed in this flavor. I guess I will go back to buying a gallon of another brand for the same price. I had such high hopes when I bought this.....

author: influenster_kaitlyn
text: This was delicious. They have enough chunks of cookie dough so that there was at least one little cookie dough bite in each spoon full. Theres also a great balance of the cookie dough, chocolate chips, and ice cream so that youre able to actually taste all the ingredients. Only downfall for me is the taste of the ice cream base, it is kind of bland and think it could have more of a vanilla or cookie dough flavor.

author: michaelah33
text: For starters this is my go to chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream brand because I feel as if they put the most cookie dough bites in their ice cream. I know they tend to be on the pricier side but I dont mind paying a little more considering the companies values. I encourage anyone to look into Ben & Jerrys and learn more about how they are passing it forward to their employees and the world.

author: RavenY
title: Let down !!!
text: Ive recently became a fan of the half baked ice cream , that it made me wana try just a cookie dough flavor. I bought one and there were very little cookie dough globs . Barely enough yo satisfy my sweet tooth.

Super big chunks of cookie dough, tons of chocolate chips, creamy ice cream and always filled to the BRIM! I did run into a huge air pocket on the side so I didnt get ALL of the container filled, but my body is probably thankful for that. The lid can sometimes be hard to put back on. But other than those functional pieces, the flavor is amazing and this is always a solid GO-TO always!

author: leahinphx
text: It's a classic for a reason-- it's just so delicious. I think this is the first chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream I ever tried, and, while I've tried many kinds since then, Ben and Jerry's cookie dough remains my favorite. The vanilla ice cream is creamy and delicious and not overly sweet. The cookie dough tastes just like homemade cookie dough. Together, it's just perfection.

author: thy_golden_child
text: I love the fact Ben & Jerry isnt afraid to use their brand & platform to speak out on social issues harming our society! I also enjoy this flavor, I wish they werent stingy on the cookie dough though. The ice cream is a tad expensive too. But, this os the only brand I buy when I get Ice cream. Please sponsors me, Ben & Jerry, I eat this too much to not become apart of the team.

author: shannonce981
text: I love Ben and Jerrys and I love their message and brand so I never mind spending money on this ice cream! This is a great quality ice cream made by a company thats big in keeping it simple and natural with ingredients and a this is a classic flavor so you cant go wrong. The cookie dough to ice cream ratio is spot on so I definitely recommend this to my fellow ice cream lovers .

author: carog2
text: I was a bit disappointed with the amount of chocolate chip cookie dough pieces. This didn't really have many pieces of cookie dough it was like 70% vanilla icecream & 30% cookie dough, therefore I would improve this product by adding more chocolate chip cookie dough. However, the taste of the vanilla icecream had a hint of cookie dough which is unlike any other brand I've had.

author: Hello
title: Ice cream itself.
text:
I got bunches of Cookie Dough in my pint but my problem is the Ice Cream
it self. It doesn't mesh well with Vanilla Bean. I would prefer French Vanilla.
That's my only complaint.

author: TwiceBurned
title: No Dough!
text: I bought a pint a few years ago and sent a message that there wasn’t gobs of cookie dough. It’s mostly vanilla ice cream with a few pieces of cookie dough. Nothing like the picture. I complained and was told it must be a quality control issue. I bought another pint yesterday and the same thing, very little dough!! Ben and Jerry’s listen to your customer and fix this issue!!

author: shebs13
text: My kids love this. There is something about the cookie dough. I took away a star, because despite the ingredients being good my kids -teens- tend to break out a bit afterwards. This happens with Talenti too. If you ever see Dolceza ice cream at Whole Foods buy it! Especially the marscapone and raspberry or roasted strawberry. Ive literally eAten a pint in one sitting.

author: rigaj
text: Perfect for any day. Sad day and you just want to cry? Ben & Jerry's is here. Fun day out in the sun and now you want to cool down? Ben & Jerry's is here. Sleepover with your friends? Well, Ben & Jerry's is here. The ice cream is worth all the hype it receives as it doesn't disappoint. It comes in various flavours and it's definitely a highlight to anybody's day.

author: turnerm110
text: This will always be my favorite Ben and Jerry's ice cream but I do love that they have so many different ice creams that you can try in pint size containers without having to commit to half gallons or larger incase you don't like the ice cream. I also like that it is local to me and the next state over has Ben and Jerry Ice Cream shops besides their factory.

author: Momof21816
title: Horrrrible
text: I'm 30 weeks pregnant and I was craving cookie dough and this is what I got and there was seriously 5 bites of cookie dough.

author: alexisw46
text: This is my favorite flavor of ice cream, and Ben and Jerrys is my favorite brand of ice cream. The boxes are great, and the ice cream parlors they have are amazing as well. Definitely recommend this, Ben and Jerrys is an awesome brand, theyre on the pricier side only because they pay their employees well. Overall an awesome company with awesome flavors.

author: jsheu
text: Ben & Jerrys is a great ice cream brand, but I personally dont like having a rich ice cream that also has a ton of mix-ins. Also, the majority of their ice cream features chocolate in some form, which is not something I enjoy in an ice cream (I know, not a popular opinion). I love cookie dough ice cream though, and Ben & Jerrys does a good job with it.

author: bobbiek
text: Ben and Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough ice cream is incredible. It's very tasty and is full of huge chocolate chunks and mounds of gooey cookie dough clusters, so there's never a dull bite. Plus it has all natural ingredients, which is always a plus. It's perfect for an indulgence or special treat. Try some today; you'll be glad you did.

author: stefanieamb
text: The best take on an absolute classic. I would consume my bodyweight in almost anything from Ben & Jerrys. However, their chocolate chip cookie dough is on comparable from anything. It is my favorite I always find good pricing information especially at local grocery stores, or I can find a coupon online. Highly recommend Ben & Jerrys ice cream

author: kimmc1
text:
I love this ice cream! It is absolutely delicious. The cookie dough bits are amazing and it has a good balance of cookie dough vs ice cream. All in all a great ice cream. Perfect size For the quality I'd say its average price but it does appear to be on sale quite often- always a good time to stock up!
Its definitely a staple in my freezer.

author: 24tiab
text: I LOVE THIS ONE. Anything Ben & Jerry's is the best quality you could ever imagine. I stock up on this especially because it's my boyfriend's favorite ice cream as well and it is perfect for a date night or as a gift. Please send me some!!! Love your stuff. I can promote on my tiktok where I have 25k followers as well. Much love, Tia

author: manderzz
text: When I was pregnant all I craved was sweets. I had my husband go out and buy me this specific flavor of Ben and Jerrys at all hours of the night to fix my babys and I craving lol. Its just so good. The big chunks of cookie dough with the smooth, creamy ice cream. You cant go wrong. I might have to go buy myself some tonight! Lol.

author: rebeccac5359
text: Ben and Jerrys Ice cream is definitely one of my top 3 favorite ice cream brands. They have an amazing variety of flavors, is locally made and never disappoints. This is one of my all time favorite flavors. I have loved since been a little kid riding home from beach and stopping to grab Ben and Jerrys on the way home! Must try!!

author: s_y_d_n_e_e_
text: This flavor of Ben & Jerrys is really, really good! It balances perfectly between the ice cream, chocolate chips, and cookie dough. The cookie dough is soft and is perfect with the creamy ice cream. Its a little pricey, but all Ben & Jerrys is. Its never too much to keep me from buying it though! Definitely one of my favorites!

author: Cbugkrunks33
title: Sadly disappointed...
text: My hubby night this for me as a treat this week. I love this flavor but was very disappointed in the pint I tasted. The cookie dough was there but no chocolate chips. The vanilla ice cream tasted chalky and the committee dough was chewy and grainy. Can someone fix these batches? I love Ben & Jerry's so this was a shock to me

author: sashao
text: Omg this brand of coodkie dough ice cream is one of my favorites! A good amount of cookie dough chunks and just melts in your mouth. I dont get it too often because it is on the pricer side but when i treat myself this is the one i choose! I definitely recommend it! You cam usually find it at most big chain grocery stores.

author: kristinh358
text: While most B&J flavors are absolutely five star-worthy, chocolate chip cookie dough is probably my least fave of theirs. The cookie dough pieces are plentiful but are a smidgen dryer and chewier than the cookie dough in some other brands. The ice cream itself is DELISH, but I would choose other B&J flavors over this one.

author: yasmine96
title: THE BEST.
text: I just want to start by saying. To the reviews who said “nOt EnOuGh cOoKiE dOuGh” that was NOT the case for me. Hey maybe I got lucky lol. Because my pint came with MORE than enough cookie dough in it! Literally huge clumps of it in EVERY scoop! This ice cream is delicious!! Definitely craving it as I type this review :)

author: gladism2
text: One of my favorite kinds of ice cream is cookie dough. I love the Ben & Jerrys ice cream more Because it has a different taste than other brands. This one I feel like it is more creamier and delicious. Also Ben & Jerrys is known to have so many crazy and yummy flavors. Definitely recommend if you havent tried This brand.

author: jenniferj1d4a
text: Of all the cookie dough ice creams, Ben & Jerrys is my absolute favorite. The ice cream is really good and it has nice big pieces of cookie dough. I have tried other brands and it has had basically just chocolate chips and called it cookie dough. I love Ben & Jerrys, I would recommend any flavor but this one is the best.

author: elanar
text: It's hard to pick a single favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream, but if I had to this would be it. Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Ice Cream to me the quintessential ice cream. It is what put this brand on the map, and as far as I'm concerned no other brand has done cookie dough ice cream as well as they have.

You cant go wrong with Ben & Jerry's. I love this icecream because they are never skimpy on the mixture of icecream to add ins. You always get some in every bite. The price is a little steep for the amount of icecream compared to other brands but considering its more of an ice cream shop quality the price is fair.

author: jazmines16
text: Ben and Jerrys ice cream chocolate chip cookie dough is very good. Along with all of the Ben and Jerrys Ive creams being so creamy and flavorful. The combination of cookie dough and chocolate chips is perfect! Also the chocolate chips in the ice cream arent hard which is just delightful because it melts in your mouth

author: hangingoutwithlori
text: I am not a chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream lover and this is no exception. Too sickly sweet for me. However the base ice cream is good. My children (now grown) love B&J chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream so its a winner just for that alone.

author: Polly
title: No cookie dough
text: My favourite ice-cream is the choc chip and cookie dough. I have just sat down ,looking forward to it...while watching a movie. Only to be totally disappointed to find no cookie dough and only a few choc chips. For an ice-cream that costs more than the average price to enjoy. I have to say what a waste of my money.

This was my first introduction to Ben and Jerry's back when I was in college and it remains a favorite of mine today. In fact I had a scoop last night after dinner. There is just something about Ben and Jerry's that is superior in taste, mouth feel and whole experience that will have me always coming back for more.

author: elizabethk9677
text: This ice cream is a premium brand which makes it a little more expensive than my usual brand. The Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is one of my favourites! It has a lot of cookie dough and chocolate chips in it. If youd like to indulge in a high quality ice cream that comes in many flavours I would recommend this one.

author: corriesbeautyspot
text: Probably my favorite cookie dough ice creams Ive tried! I dont get this flavor often anymore but when I do I feel like you cant beat Ben & Jerrys flavor and their quality! Some cookie dough ice creams the cookie dough has a gummy, flavorless texture, but this one tastes amazing and has the perfect chewy texture.

author: mkatlhen
text: I swear, this is HEAVEN. Ben & Jerry’s are my favorite and I have a thing for cookies dough ice cream. I just can’t explain. I always get this, it’s the type of ice cream that won’t get you sick of it just “because it’s too sweet” it’s not that pure sugar ice cream, it’s actually soft and very tasty. I love it.

author: karbuckle0
text: Dang this stuff is SO expensive for a little tiny pint of ice cream that goes so quickly... But there is NOTHING like it! Other brands don't compare and cookie dough is just one of my favorites. All of the flavors are so good! The limited time Bob Marley one with banana ice cream was the definition of KILLER!

author: ashleyq13
text: There ice cream is so bomb I definitely recommend. I get it all the time its a perfect snack, no matter the weather even if its raining! They also support BLM which makes me love the ice cream even more! I definitely recommend its affordable! [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-16oz]

author: jenpb581
text: Cookie dough ice cream is my favorite type. Ben and Jerry’s is delicious, with nice chunks of cookie dough. However, I do wish there were more of those delicious chunks in each pint, as you end up eating a fair amount of vanilla ice cream with chocolate chunks (which is still delicious, don’t get me wrong).

author: kimj60
text: I like Ben & Jerrys ice cream in general, its usually my go to indulgent ice cream, and I especially love the chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream. It can be a bit pricey for the size of the tub, but you dont really need a bigger tub if youre going to eat it all at once. I would definitely recommend.

author: adventureswithgail
text: I love chocolate chip cookie dough and ice cream so this combo is the best of both worlds. Ben and Jerry's makes the best ice cream around and their flavor range is out of this world! Super affordable and the flavor can't be beat! Only 4 stars cause I wish it came in a bigger size! Highly recommend!

author: rosan10
text: Perfect ice cream flavor for a romantic movie, breakup, time of the month etc... Ive ALWAYS loved Ben and Jerrys like even before I was born. Thats right my mom ate Ben and Jerrys Ice cream like it was her business the entire pregnancy then I came out and started to eat all the ice cream with her

author: laurag122
text: This is one of my favorite cookie dough ice creams on the market. I love the 16oz size because if youre splurging you eat the whole thing. If youre being mindful of portion sizes its easy to scoop 1/4 or 1/2 so you dont overdo it. The dough is a good soft quality while the ice cream is so yummy.

author: juliab161
text: My favorite I used to tell my boyfriend that the only way he could come over was if he brought this ice cream, my best friends were at my house watching a movie and he was like I dont have it I was like okay then go back home but I opened the door and had four different ones just for all of us

My favorite flavor from this brand! Although I do love my cookies n cream, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough adds that perfect crunch into the ice cream but still very smooth and savory. This is the perfect ice cream for the cookie dough lovers out there because of the chunks of cookie dough added!

author: mottagiu
text: I had the Chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream from ben and jerrys yesterday. Im normally not a fan of this flavor since the ice cream normally tastes too much like vanilla, but a friend told me to try this one and i absolutely loved it!! The cookie dough has a great texture and seems fresh.

author: mearsy
text: My favorite at home ice cream. The chunks of cookie dough are giant and the chocolate chips are big and crunchy. Paired with the creamy ice cream base, it all comes together perfectly. After learning more of the Ben and Jerrys company morals, I was even more glad to have a pint in my freezer!

author: sonache232
text: This is my favorite ice cream brand of all time. They have a big variety of flavors so everyone can find something that they like. Even though it is kind of on the pricier side I definitely think its worth it because they use the money they have to donate to different charities/organizations.

author: susanhayleyfox
text: I love classic flavors like cookie dough and Ben & Jerrys version is one of the best! Their packages ice cream tastes the same as what they serve in the store, so you know youre getting a high-quality product. Compared to others, this product has the perfect amount of cookie dough mixed it!

author: meetig94
text: Who doesnt love cookie dough?! [product:ben-&-jerrys-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-ice-cream] is PACKED with globe of cookie dough. Its thick and cream texture makes a little go a long way. Perfect for your sweet cravings legit anytime of the day. My absolute favourite. #icecream #cookiedough

author: theonly_ali
text: I love this ice cream and always feel like I get extra cookie dough. Unlike other brands there is way more than the usual 5 chunks of dough that you have to dig for. I also will always gladly give this company my money based off their views and donations to causes that are dear to my heart.

author: leimatronic
text: I love this icecream. It's got such a smooth taste and the cookie dough bits are delicious. It's a bit pricey but not bad of you can get them on sale. I'd love if they'd put them in a bigger tub like most icecream but it's still a good icecream. Definitely satisfied with the taste overall.

author: rachell31
text: I absolutely love this ice cream. But I also love what this company stands for moral and values wise so its double appealing to me. This flavor of ice cream is delicious, rich and filling! It is very much a selfish pleasure of mine and I truly cant think of an ice cream that I enjoy more.

author: natashak
text: This ice cream is pretty good. However there is never actually enough cookie dough, it is mostly just vanilla ice cream. So many of the other flavors are really packed with goodies so I don't understand why this doesn't have more cookie dough bits. Make the dough smaller and include more.

author: beckyyyyp
text: This is my favorite ice cream! It really is the best chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream I have tried and it's also dangerous because I can sit down and eat the full box!!!! haha This ice cream is a bit more expensive than others, but I find that Ben & Jerry's really does taste better!

author: memoulds
text: My husband got me this after we got home from having the baby, because you're not supposed to eat raw cookie dough while pregnant, (or really anytime, but it's delicious!). This ice cream is super yummy and has generous chunks of cookie dough in it. I just wish B&J was more affordable.

author: BBIC68
title: Best Cookie Dough EVER
text: Hands down best Cookie dough ice cream around. Only negative is at times they don't have much cookie dough but I find that very spotty. Still the best ever!! This flavor was the only reason why I started eating Ben and Jerry's ... Now I even eat others but this is still my favorite

author: vajoyce
text: I love anything Ben & Jerrys, but Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is one of my favorites. However, theres not a lot of cookie dough chunks in the pints. Its okay for me because I love plain vanilla ice cream. So I get some plain vanilla ice cream and also some with chunks of cookie dough!

author: hamburglar2
text: Yum. My favorite ice cream ever. I wish I didnt like it! Thank goodness this flavor is popular so it seems to always be out of stock otherwise it would be more tempting to buy lol. It is by far the best though even if it is a little expensive it is a nice treat every once in a while.

author: Em Ward
title: My favorite flavor!
text: ...I also love Half Baked, but this one will always been my classic, hometown flavor. One of the only brands that gets the cookie dough chewy instead of flaky. I would definitely not complain if they added more cookie dough... but until then, this one remains a favorite at our house.

author: CookieDoughLover13
title: Where's the dough?
text: The last two times I've had Ben & Jerry's, I tried the chocolate chip cookie dough. The first pint had so little cookie dough in it, that I assumed there was a manufacturing defect. The second pint proved to be just as disappointing. You may as well just get plain vanilla ice cream.

author: kpounds
text: This is easily my favorite ice cream ever. I can most definitely eat a Ben and Jerry's pint in one sitting. It's the perfect amount of sweet and creamy and is the perfect treat for any occasion. It's pricey so I usually only get it once and a while but definitely love this product.

author: memberf0fa3
text: Ive never had such a good chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream. I have love all of the Ben & Jerrys flavors Ive had so far but I never thought I would like cookie dough. But they proved me wrong. It had a perfect amount of cookie dough and tasted AMAZING. I 100% recommended this

author: angelac154
text: I absolutely love Ben & Jerry's ice cream I have a hard time stopping when I'm eating it. I've been eating Ben & Jerry's for years. This is me only brand of chocolate chip cookie dough that has a good flavor that I have found. I buy this as well as a few other flavors regularly.

author: oakleykennedy
title: Usually incredible
text: It's usually so so great and I bought a pint the other day and have just opened it to eat it and the cookie dough is all dry and crumbly i literally had to spit it out it was so bad, am dissappointed because its quite expensive and I only buy it once in a blue moon as a treat

author: alil02ec
text: Its good I just wish it had bigger chunks of cookie dough. Plus it would be sooo much better if we could buy any flavor by the gallon so there werent as many visits to the grocery store to buy more ice cream!!! [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-16oz]

author: makeupbymeiv
text: This is my FAVORITE ice cream flavor. I've tried other brands but ben and jerry's does it best! There are some brands that have super hard cookie dough pieces, but the ones in this brand are so soft and chewy! It goes super well with the chocolate chips and vanilla ice cream

author: ashleyr8b6e
text: I absolutely love this ice cream! It tastes amazing! Its hard to keep it in my house because my children and I love it so much so I have to buy 2 at a time and hide one! I hide it right under the frozen vegetables and they never know! Lol I definitely recommend trying this!

author: natalien4
text: Ben & Jerry's is a brand that you can NEVER go wrong with to satisfy your ice cream needs. I love Ben & Jerry's, especially any Cookie Dough flavored ice creams. This brand has never failed to make me happy, and invite me to new flavor combinations I couldn't even think of!

author: gwynedolynp
text: Many people do not know this but I live for cookie dough ice cream! Its my favorite flavor! I love Ben & Jerrys because it gives me all of cookie dough pieces it can fit in the cup, lol. Super delicious and I always grab this in the store whenever Im in the ice cream mood!

author: dakotaw3
text: I love me a good cookie dough ice cream! Its so delicious! Also Ben & Jerrys high key supports the #BLM movement. So we STAN Ben & Jerrys in this household. 10/10 recommend to anyone and everyone in literally the entire world. Go get you some Ben & Jerrys. Like. Right now.

author: pandabehr_est
text: One of my favorite cookie dough ice creams! While I dont purchase Ben & Jerrys often, when I do this is typically my go to flavor. You get a good amount of cookie dough especially compared to some other companies that make cookie dough. Plus the flavors all mesh together!

author: fernief
text: The chocolate chip cookie dough is amazing, Ben & jerry's has come a long way in making a premium product and the cost sometimes may be high but the quality is great so paying more for the brand is so worth it! I will buy it again and keep trying all of the crazy flavors

author: andreaviolin
text: My favorite flavor. I like that you actually get cookie dough bits in this. The chocolate chip mixed in with the vanilla ice cream really helps balance out the sweetness of the cookie dough. This is my favorite and I love this flavor of ice cream. I keep re-purchasing it

author: marine_a
text: This is one of my top favorite ice cream brand. I love the different flavors they have and I cant choose a favorite one because I love all of the flavors. For me its not overly sweet. And doesn't leave any weird after taste in my mouth. I would definatley 100% recommend.

author: stilla
text: A classic for all to love. It may be a little more fattening than other flavors but that means you can split up how you eat it a savor the deliciousness of this amazing treat. Highly recommend it to cookie lovers, cookie dough lovers, people with a sweet tooth and more!

author: ecjo13
text: This is my favorite brand to buy cookie dough from. The ice cream itself is so creamy and delicious. The cookie dough pieces are so good! And they give you a good amount of them in the ice cream. It is a little expensive but you get what you pay for and this is quality

author: lexeeb1
text: Always will be in love with cookie dough ice cream and I don’t know if it’s just me or not but some cookie dough or chocolate chips taste differently in other ice cream brands. Ben & Jerry’s definitely doesn’t disappoint when it comes to their ice cream. I’m obsessed!

author: ajroxurvanitym
text: I'm a huge fan of chocolate chip cookie dough. Oddly enough out of the three I've tried I really only like this one from ben and Jerry's. I have to eat it over time though because it's so sweet. I like how it still tastes like cookie dough though and not just chunks.

author: missymissjamie
text: Best Ice Cream ! The vanilla taste so rich and creamy! I buy about 3 pints every single week because it's so good ! I would add more cookie dough to the ice cream it def taste better than any other brand it taste more natural ! I would buy this product all the time !

Ben and Jerry's has to be the best ice cream that there is on the market. The different types of ice cream they come up with is pure genius. It is so hard to pick on flavor to be your favorite. They come in perfect little containers so they make a great little snack.

author: allyhawk13
text: I love cookie dough, so I loved [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-16oz]. This is perfect for people who love chocolate chip cookies. It was affordable and i wouldnt change anything about it. Very delicious and definitely would buy it again.

author: carolmpileggi
text: My absolute favorite! Loooove the big chunks of dough all throughout the ice cream. I can eat the whole pint in one sitting if Im not paying attention... if I have to find a fault is the size, I would like more variation as for a bigger family you will need multiple

author: brittanys36e9
text: The cookie dough in this is absolutely amazing. I usually buy cookie dough ice cream mostly for the cookie dough and unfortunately usually find that there is hardly and cookie dough, but there is so much cookie dough in this particular brand! Its definitely my go to

author: kristinka_v_s
text: Simply delicious! Not too much chocolate, not too much vanilla, amazing balance of traditional Ben&Jerry's ice cream with cookie dough! A bit too sweet but at the same time the ice cream can never have too much sugar. I always have a tub of this flavor iny freezer.

author: angiel68
text: This was delicious. They have chunks of cookie dough so thats theres at least one little cookie dough bite in each spoon full. Theres also a great balance of the cookie dough, chocolate chips, and ice cream so that youre able to actually taste all the ingredients.

author: makaylab19
text: Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough ice cream has been a favorite of mine since I can remember. I always appreciate the rich vanilla ice cream and chunks of cookie dough. I always end up finishing it in one sitting. Classic, reliable, and delicious!!!!!!!!!!

author: dannab14
text: I love this ice. I think You will love this too if you love to eat cookie dough when your not supposed to. This ice cream has an amazing taste that almost taste like the really thing but in ice cream form. I really recommend this ice cream that has a lovely taste.

author: katpereira21
text: Honestly Ive made it pretty clear that anything with some kind of dough in it is absolutely amaaaazing! Ive just come to associate Ben and Jerrys with it by now. Its there known good. Their identity which is why I like this ice cream in addition to all the others.

author: alic40
text: I only ever get cookie dough ice cream from Ben and Jerrys! They actually came to my college this past spring semester and were handing out free ice cream and thankfully I had the last scoop of cookie dough because it has so much cookie dough in it and I love it!

author: taliao5
text: I love this ice cream because it has the perfect amount of all the components of this as it is on the package theres not just more cookie dough or less cookie dough and not always vanilla ice cream as a perfect amount of chocolate chip cookie dough and ice cream.

author: allysonp8
text: Everyone loves a good basic cookie dough ice cream and this one is definitely a great one. My only complaint is that it can be really solid and you have to let it defrost a lot before you can really get into it. Its not the creamiest but it still tastes amazing!

author: tallyv
text: I LOVE ben and Jerrys ice cream! Its honestly my go to when Im craving ice cream, its a little bit pricey but I know its just because the ingredients are real and not fake like some other brands. The flavour and texture is always on par. I definitely recommend!

author: kenzieebritt
text: I am a big fan of anything cookie dough, and this is easily my FAVORITE cookie dough ice cream! Ben and Jerry's always knocks it out of the park with all of their flavors, and they didn't disappoint with this one! I could easily eat a pint of this in 5 minutes.

author: arelyp16
text: DELICIOUS, creamy, sweet and the best part is that it has chunks of cookie dough in it, great product and at a very good and fair price, great for sharing. Would choose this other ice creams thanks to the great flavors it has. I will definitely purchase again.

author: zhya
text: Yum!! Really liked this flavor because cookie dough in ice cream is just great. Polished it off in 3 sittings while watching some netflix and I definitely want to repurchase this. Definitely recommend getting some if you're into chocolate and/or cookie dough.

author: QTgurl224
title: SOFTY
text: Well there’s not many chunks so I️ just sat there and kept digging around for chunks. There was none to be found): ugh also the ones I️ did were very soft. Like I️ want alittle crunch or something but I️t was as if they were soggy !! Great flavor I love I️t.

author: myal1
text: I love chocolate chip cookie dough and Ben and Jerrys does it best with theirs. The ice cream is tasty, and there is the perfect amount of cookie dough and chocolate chip in the ice cream. I buy this brand when getting cookie dough ice cream 80% of the time.

author: taylorc16
text: This so so good for movie nights. I bought one for me and one for my boyfriend for an outdoor movie night. It was delicious. Obviously dont leave this out in the heat for an extended period of time. But this whole brand is fantastic they support BLM Movement

author: christiannar2
text: Ben & jerry's always makes the most addicting ice cream. I am always willing to pay the high price cause I know i'll never be disappointing. Chocolate chip cookie dough is a dream come true. Huge chunks in ever bite makes any cookie lover's dream come true.

author: kathyt40
text: This is, hands down, my absolute favorite ice cream I have ever tried!!! Brownie Chunks and cookie dough mixed together in generous sized pieces with a smooth delicious ice cream. I could eat my body weight in this stuff! It's the best thing in the world!!!

author: tzintlya
text: This was super good. They are really good for a picnic or hot day. I love the portion and it helps me to eat an entire gallon of ice cream. I love the pieces of cookie dough. I have bought this many times. I would buy this again. I recommend this to anyone.

author: memberabfe7
text: This is the only ice cream brand i enjoy. My favourite is the chocolate chip cookie dough, because it's a surprise in every bite, you never know if you're going to get a chip or a piece of dough. Def delicious and would continue to eat this yummy ice cream.

author: abi_auck
text: This is it, folks. I have tried every other cookie dough ice cream and all fall short of Ben and Jerrys. I will say, though, make sure your pint is fresh. It makes all the difference in the taste of the cookie dough chunks. They get hard and crumbly If old.

author: ryann4
text: Classic. Most people judge chocolate chip cookie dough by the cookie dough but to me it all depends on the vanilla ice cream - what good is anything if theres a poor foundation! Amazing vanilla ice cream and love that chocolate chips are too big like some.

author: katelynb73f7
text: I am a huge sucker for ben and Jerrys chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream. It is so smooth and not super milky. A small pint last me a for a few days. Since is sweet i can only have a small amount at a time. It is a bit on the pricey side but so worth it

author: diaundradabney
text: I love cookie dough lol.. I know ally of people can say this. But when you add ice cream (if follow me youll know I love ice cream anything, unless its an overload.) its even better though. [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-16oz]

author: taym10
text: SO GOOD! Rich, decadent and creamy! Great flavors, not over the top sweet and those chunks of cookie dough are beyond mouth watering! It is a little pricey, but it's so good that sometimes I dont mind treating myself and splurging on it! A great size too!

author: nicolen99
text: I love this when I dont want a lot of ice cream I can usually eat this in two days but it gives me just the right amount. I love getting this when I want some but dont wanna buy a whole tub. Its expensive for such a small container but definitely worth it

author: kikim18
text: Ice cream holds a special place in my heart. Not many deserts can hit the spot like ice cream. All the flavors. This flavor is a favorite. Little sweet little salty. Just right and yes it is affordable. I always buy when im craving and it just hits right.

author: jordoncoxx
text: While Ben and Jerry's serves the best ice cream on Earth, their cookie dough would have one thinking otherwise. For some reason the cookie dough does not have too much taste and the chocolate pieces have too much flavor. The vanilla part is great though!

author: member05c731
text: Ben & Jerrys chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream is the first chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream I ever had and it is hands-down the best chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream available. I also love that it is made in a neighboring state of Vermont.

author: yaymejess
text: The perfect size! You can find this ice cream at most grocery stores, and it definitely hits the spot. It has the perfect amount of chocolate chip and cookie dough. Its not overly sweet and pretty much perfect. Would definitely recommend this ice cream.

author: yanibellp
text: I love cookie dough ice cream and this Ben and Jerrys chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream is perfect for when you want a sweet treat. The cookie dough chunks in this are soft and perfectly combined with the ice cream creaminess. Definitely a favorite!

author: jkranjac
text: This is my go to brand and flavor. Ben & Jerrys has such high quality products and a large variety to choose from as well. I love the huge chocolate chip cookie dough bites in each pint. Real cookie dough bites and with a rich creamy vanilla ice cream.

author: everythingbeauty786
text: This is the best brand of ice cream!! I'm like a little kid at the grocery store when I see Ben and Jerry's! I love the taste of all its flavors but this is my favourite!! It has the perfect amount of chocolate chips, the taste is great! It's the best!

author: emmakate_02
text: This is one of the best ice creams to exist in this entire world, and to be honest, universe! An amazing ice cream to eat straight out of the jar while crying to a sappy romantic movie haha. Definitely Ben and Jerry's best ice cream flavor out there!

author: kellyc169
text: Love the Ben and Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Ice Cream. Sometimes we add a little milk to make a milkshake out of it. It is definitely one of our favorite flavors. It does tend to be on the pricey end, but great for a special occasion treat.

author: itssydni
text: My go too ice cream. I love it so much that my boyfriend will randomly just buy it and put it in the freezer for me to surprise me. Im actually eating it as I write this review! I like to spice it up sometimes by adding caramel and rainbow sprinkles.

BEST ICE CREAM EVER!!!!! It has the perfect amount of cookie dough and the vanilla ice cream is to die for. The pint is the perfect amount. It lasts me from three to seven days. This ice cream is more pricey than others but it is definitely worth it.

author: rs426
text: This is one of my all time favorite ice creams. The base is a creamy vanilla flavor but with a toffee flavor like a real chocolate chip cookie. The chunks of cookie dough are substantial and abundant which I love. This is best cookie dough ice cream.

author: emilyoc7fc
text: Ben & Jerry;s chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream is delicious. I don't normally purchase this flavor because my favorite flavor of this brand is Phish Food. The company has strong morals and I feel comfortable buying from them. Worth the calories!

author: msaxd
text: This is currently my favorite chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream! It's delicious and fresh. The distribution of cookie dough to ice cream is perfect! It's pricey so I only buy when it's on sale but it is my favorite! I can't wait to repurchase it!

author: kalynnm
text: Now who doesnt like cookie dough. I love it. I could eat it all the time if I could. Its my always go to ice cream that from this brand. I hope that never change this but could they add more cookie dough in it just for me please. Im just kidding lol

author: kats6
text: Delicious ice cream! Really creamy and soft compared to other ice cream brands. It is affordable and comes in many flavors. I am a repeat consumer and I always get Ben and Jerrys. I 100% recommend this ice cream brand to others who havent tried it.

author: alisab0acd
text: By far the best cookie dough ice cream out there, I tried this when it came out and have been hooked ever since. If you havent tried Ben and Jerrys ice cream you definitely should, its amazing. They also care about people, how could you not them!

author: thiviyar
text: This is one of my favourite ice cream flavours. I enjoy eating this particular ice cream since compared to the alternatives there are more pieces of cookie dough. I will continue to repurchase this product in the future and recommend it to others.

author: kaitlynk13
text: if i could rate this 10/5 stars i would because its so delicious that its disappointing when youre done w/ it! ben and jerrys is just a staple its better than roundys or blue bunny. its not too pricey and its worth it in my eyes. i would recommend

author: msnyder2
text: I love Ben and Jerrys. They have creative flavors with quality ingredients, and you can tell when you taste it. The cookie dough is moist and compliments the ice cream. Slightly pricier than generic, but worth it. Delicious and quality ice cream!

author: sakinab2
text: One of the classics is a good chocolate chip cookie dough flavored ice cream. This one from Ben and Jerry's by far has to be favorite ice creams. They are a little pricey for a pint but definitely worth it, overall i'm satisfied with this flavor.

author: nickiestclair
text: When you say ice cream I think Ben and Jerry's! Specifically cookie dough...who doesn't love cookie dough ice cream. Ben and Jerry's is delicious. I grew up with a pint always in the fridge and us New Englanders love to eat ice cream year round!

author: lopedigobeauty
text: You literally go wrong with Ben & Jerrys. I mean its delicious! Of course I only purchase the flavors I like. This is a classic cookie flavor though and the cream melts so deliciously as you get to munch on the cookie dough. Now I want ice cream

author: wednesdaim
text: This ice cream is so goood. Its a perfect mixture in my opinion and the ice cream isnt to hard and its not to soft either its just right. I can have this ice cream basically anytime but I try not to because Ill eat the whole thing in one go lol.

author: ldey1
text: Love this Ben and Jerrys flavor! You honestly cant go wrong with ice cream with edible chocolate chip cookie dough bites inside! The texture is smooth and creamy. One of my favorite flavors Ben and Jerry has and has become my go-to sweet treat!

author: afa1
text: A classic! Can't go wrong with this flavor. Lots of cookie dough in there -- good ratio of dough to vanilla! I've had this maybe 2-3 times. Wouldn't always purchase this because it is really really sweet but as a once-in-a-while-buy I'd get it.

author: ayaank
text: It's great. It's also vegan if you are dairy free. I am personally not a vegan but I still think it's their best flavor. It's also cheaper than some of the other flavor. I love eating this with cookies. Absolutely delicious. I highly recommend.

author: isobeldm
text: I love chocolate chip cookie dough anything!! So easily this one is my favorite!! You guys have to go pick up a container of this one for yourself! You wont regret the decision!! Any of their ice cream you choose is gonna be amazing regardless!

author: soniar49
text: Chocolate chip cookie dough is my favorite ice cream flavor & this ice cream was pretty good. Something about the cookie dough chunks tasted a bit different than other brands ive had but all ice cream is different & this one still hit the spot

author: ncwarren80w
text: Love Ben and Jerrys! They have a great variety of flavors and I love that the company fight against racial injustices so they will always be my first choice when it comes to ice cream. The flavor and creaminess is soo good, it tastes homemade.

author: katied167
text: My absolute favorite of all time! This ice cream is so good! Its made with all natural ingredients! The overall taste is superior the only thing negative I have to say about it is that it is sometimes expensive and is chocked full of calories!

author: justicem8
text: No matter what flavor I choose Ive never gone wrong with Ben and Jerrys. One of the best ice cream brands, Ill admit its a bit pricy for its small container but its overall worth it. You wouldnt be disappointed with any flavor from this brand.

author: jaeb8
text: Such a great ice cream flavor that adds to your day. It is delicious. I do wish there wasnt as many chocolate chip cookie dough pieces within the ice cream but when there arent any other flavors that interest me, I definitely go for this one.

author: dogatefish
text: Definitely not the best ice cream. It is very tasty though. I can taste a lot of cream in there flavoring and while thats good I just think for the price Im paying they should have more of a variety. One of the more expensive ones out there.

author: clarisseashley
text: One of my go-tos when Im in the mood for ice cream. Not too sweet, and it has a good amount of cookie dough bits and chocolate. This is definitely a must have just to keep in the freezer for those days when you need something cool and sweet.

author: taylorjobeauty
text: My favorite ice cream EVER!! This is the most tasty chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream on the market. I have repurchase time and time again. I do think it is really pricey compared to other ice creams, but in my opinion it is so worth it!

author: kassandra_pastor
text: OMG!! Cookie dough is my favorite ice cream flavor of all time and Ben and Jerrys is my favorite dairy ice cream to get! They also offer dairy free alternatives for their cookie dough which is also fantastic and I purchase this quite often!

author: courtneyfaith___
text: Not only does B&J make incredible tasting products, but they also take a very vocal stance on social issues and use their influence to do good in the world. Worth the higher price point for the fundamental excellency of the company overall.

author: citygirl98
title: The absolute best
text: This is my very very favorite ice cream in the world. There's a perfect amount of chocolate chips and cookie dough. I only wish there was a lower fat, lower calorie version but this still remains the best since I first tried it 5 years ago.

author: curlytiff
text: as a lover of chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream, i can confidently say that ben & jerrys did something right! the cookie dough is the perfect balance of salty and sweet goodness and the chocolate chips add a balance! you wont regret it.

author: tiffanyc166
text: You cant go wrong with any Ben & jerry ice cream choice! Its an affordable ice cream brand although it is a bit pricier than some other options. Although its pricier it is worth the splurge! Each flavor is pact full of toppings and flavor.

author: alyssac174
text: I love this ice cream, but it is pretty sweet because of all the cookie dough! I wish that stores had the pistachio version of this because thats even more delicious. this is one of the more expensive brands, but good if you can afford it!

author: indigenouswoman
text: Love the cookie dough flavor! Has just the right amount of cookie dough in each bite! Love the convenient size it comes in, makes me not feel@as bad for eating the entire jug. I always have to pick up this flavor whenever I buy groceries!

author: jessical9a30
text: Ben and Jerrys is a go to, since it has high quality ingredients and is extremely tasty. Even though its more expensive than most ice cream brands, they have such a huge variety of flavors and chocolate chip cookie dough is suck a classic

author: knoue
text: This is honestly one of my most favorite ice creams! The cookie dough actually tastes real instead of having that weird aftertaste. I love this, and have actually recommended it to people. Overall my satisfaction is at a high percentage!

author: brandiejoann
text: An absolute classic that will make your tummy and your tastebuds ecstatic! I have purchased this several times and its always a classic option. Ben and Jerrys is always a quality product that you can count on you cant go wrong with them!

author: timetogloww
text: Hands down one of my favourite makers of chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream out there! The perfect ratio of ice cream to toppings! So delicious Im definitely a fan for life! Highly recommend to anyone wanting a satisfying cold treat!

author: lipkit99
text:
You can’t really go wrong with chocolate chip cookie dough or Ben & Jerrys. So the Ben & Jerry's® Ice Cream Cookie Dough is an obvious go to when I’m
In the mood for a scoop of classic ice cream. Goes great with binder watching Netflix.

author: coralv
text: Ben & Jerrys is a great brand for ice cream but this one just doesnt make the deal for me. I think its a little plain to my taste, if your looking for ice cream with cookie dough Id rather try the Milk & Cookies one, you wont regret it!

author: jamestheiv
text: I mean. Its amazing, it might be packed full of calories but its worth it. I never regret it afterwords, well maybe a little. But almost every one of their flavors is incredible. Give them a shot and you will have found your new brand.

author: nickilynn765950db
text: You cant go wrong with this traditional flavor. Its delicious and the perfect blend of ice cream and cookie dough bites. The only problem is you want more and more! I would def recommend this flavor and all of ben and Jerrys products

author: denizzza
text: Pretty good, tastes like ice cream from the ice cream store. Delicious. Very expensive for the size though. If you can afford it, I would recommend it. I've bought it a few times, but it's not an everyday purchase because if the price.

author: hallierb
text: I tried this, and just decided Id rather eat normal ice cream. If you cant have dairy, this really isnt that bad! It lacks that familiar creamy consistency that dairy ice cream has so I suggest letting it melt a little bit when eating!

author: carlab18
text: Chocolate and cookie dough together in an ice cream, its a delicious combo , I'd recommend it to anyone who loves chocolate and cookie dough, its great just the way it is, it don't need any improvement, I would buy it again and again!

Im obsessed with chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream and this is by far the best Ive had. This is a little pricey for the amount you get but they more than make up for it with the flavor and quality of the product that youre getting!

I love this ice cream and it def. is a favorite I. My household. We buy this frequently the only thing I think I would improve is the size of the pacakaging I wish it was bigger ! But overall satisfied with the quality of this product

author: camc1
text: So amazing! Ben and Jerry’s is the only kind of ice cream I buy and I purchase it every single time I go grocery shopping! I can’t get enough. I love the cookie dough flavor! There’s lots of cookie dough and the chunks are really big!

author: dannab1
text:
Who doesn't like Ben & Jerry's ice cream!! It is so rich and creamy! It is such a treat to eat. I
don't get it often because I prefer light ice cream for health reasons
but I do like it when I can get it. I highly recommend it.

author: vandorsten
text: Since I was in college (15 years ago!) this has always been an indulgant treat. I dont buy it all the time because it is pricey for the amount you get. But it always has an amazing flavor and is rich & smooth like ice cream should be.

author: guettav
text: Love the natural sweetness in my mouth. This flavor comes with such a variety and different blends of taste. Sometimes its sweet then its salty. I highly recommend if you are looking for that specific taste for you next tasty craving.

author: avad12
text: I am such a sucker for Ben and Jerrys Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Ice Cream. Yes, it can be a little pricey but it is worth it. The cookie dough is chewy with that satisfying sugary grit. You could never go wrong with this ice cream.

author: alisay2
text: i try not to do dairy but when i do i definitely get b&j. i love chocolate chip cookie dough even if im risking salmonella from the cookie dough. all of ben and jerrys ice cream is good. it has the perfect amount of creamy and punch.

author: ericaf50
text: Very delicious! My favourite flavour is cookie dough and i always get so upset when other ice cream brands barely have any cookie dough in their ice cream. Ben and Jerry's was packed with cookie dough and really satisfied my craving.

author: sandrar127
text: Sooooo good I crave this all the time and its so much better than all the cheap brands its so creamy and theres also little mini ones and theyre so cute its for like one serving just in case ur scared of eating more than one serving

author: laurag31
text: Great vanilla flavor. Nice rich ice cream, and the cookie dough pieces are plentiful and just the right size. I could eat a whole pint of this in one sitting. You really cant go wrong with Ben and Jerrys. They understand ice cream.

author: lorim63
text: Gahhh! By far one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys ice creams. There is ample amount of dough which is something other ice creams tend to lack. But also, not too much to be overwhelming. I love this one and would buy it over and over.

author: keke1920
text: I mean, what can I say?? The Ben and Jerry products have always been on point. I've been a customer for years and will continue to purchase. I wouldn't change anything with this product. Compare to many, this is worth every penny.

author: katerinas74e6
text: Pretty decent ice cream. Its personally too sweet for my taste as Im not big on sweets. I think this would be perfect for someone who loves cookie dough and sugar. Price not bad and great for lounging and netflix. I recommend this

author: ah240
text: Who doesnt love Ben and Jerrys ! Honestly they have everything I would want. This is one of my favorites yes I would buy it again. I would like to not have to wait so long to open the tub hahaha. I just want to eat the ice cream !

author: aelac
text: I love this so much! Its so so Delicious! I cant get enough of it, I would definitely recommend if you want some delicious meal ice cream, melted in your mouth wonderland! Definitely a favorite, I cant tell you how much I love it!

author: robinelaine75
text: I feel like Ben & Jerrys packs the most add ins/ toppings per container. No matter what flavor you choose you will receive a whole bunch of chunks of delicious. If Im having an ice cream craving I know this brand will be amazing!

author: absinthewithadya
text: I think the ratio of ice cream to cookie dough is the most perfect in Ben and Jerrys. I would highly recommend this product especially with the lower cost point! It is the same quality as in store which is a huge reason to buy it

author: mariaz15
text: I love Ben & Jerry's don't get me wrong any pint that I can get, I snag. Except this one it never has enough chocolate chip cookie dough pieces in it and the ice cream is just Bland without it. This one will stay on the shelves

author: ninal39
text: The BEST chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream EVER! Other ice creams can't match the taste of Ben and Jerry's cookie dough. I don't know what they put in them, but I'd eat a whole pint of nothing but that right now if I could.

author: nikaa4
text: The taste of Ben & Jerry's is probably the best you can get when it comes to cookie dough ice cream. The mix between chocolate chips, cookie dough, and ice cream is very good and makes sure theres enough of each in every scoop.

I love Ben and Jerrys ice cream! Its really the only I eat! Chocolate chip cookie dough and chocolate fudge brownie are my favorites. They really hit the spot when you want something sweet! Everyone should try their ice cream!

author: kseniyak1
text: I havent tried yet but from what I see its a good brand of ice cream and I see people that say its too pricey but its so expensive because the workers that work for this brand actually are the ones that have no home after jail

author: eddyk
text: At the beginning this flavor sounds weird for me but my kid was very excited to tries it, and he wasn't wrong, he enjoyed this flavor like he uses to do when something is delicious for him, with a face of "I am in the heaven "

author: steffanis2
text: Who doesnt love cookie dough ice cream. This might be my go to on a hot summer day when I need something sweet. I would give it a 10/10 for sure. I love that this is sold in almost every store so I can get it when ever I want

author: stoneyr
text: Cookie dough has been my favorite ice cream since I was a kid! Ben & Jerrys by far the best ice cream! Loaded with cookie dough!! Very affordable price! Very delicious! Im 28 now and still eating cookie dough ice cream lol :)

author: mariamf11
text: This product is great we should give a try and find new ways or you can say explore new ways I really dont want to stick on routine way so I try new things always try it and find for yourself too yes i recommend it its yummy

author: melisaj4
text: Love it love it love it love it love it love it love it. No repeat consumer and couldnt be happier with your products. Needs more chunks in all of them. Its so much better than anything else would choose over and over again.

author: haileec9
text: I absolutely loved Ben & Jerrys Ice Cream Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough. I have bought it multiple times and I will keep buying it when ever I have the extra cash. While it may be a bit more expensive its completely worth it.

author: miacolleeng
text: I love cookie dough anything! Even though Im not a huge fan of the cherry or vanilla flavor but the cookie dough is delish!!! I like the small 16 oz I get from 7/11 for movie nights! Also, the deals buy 2 get the 3rd free:)

author: hattie_killeen99
text: This dairy free ice cream wasnt bad but it definitely is not in my top five dairy free ice creams. It tastes a lot like greek yogurt and the cookie dough bites taste a little bit off. I most likely would not recommend this.

author: lizzym15
text: To me, its all about the toppings not the ice cream. You can put cookie dough on just about any flavor and I will eat it for the cookie dough. However this ice cream is so tasty either way but I love the cookie dough touch!

author: person
title: it has a nice balance
text: This is a go-to, comforting ice cream to me. Yes the price is a bit high but after comparing it to other cookie dough ice creams, ive found the balance of chocolate chips, cookie dough and ice cream is perfect for my taste.

author: diamonds1
text: Probably one of my top flavors. My daughters will try to take it if they see me with it. But I always share and they love this kind of brand. Our favorite and I love their deals that they have at Walgreens with this brand.

author: jaimehbeth
text: When I crave ice cream this is my favorite. No other cookie dough ice cream brand can compare to this classic. The cookie dough bites are so good! I can finish an entire pint in one sitting if I dont force myself to stop!

author: Lyss
title: Huge Globs of dough! So yummy!
text: The vanilla base is absolutely wonderful and I love that there are bits of chocolate thrown in as well. I couldn't believe how much cookie dough was in this ice cream! Definitely glad I splurged and got myself this brand!

author: jocelynt13
text: i will definitely have this again! the ice cream was perfectly creamy and had just the right balance of toppings and ice cream. it was a little pricey and i couldnt find a bigger size, but it was totally worth the money!

author: gaballday
text: This is my favorite ice cream brand! I am allergic to milk, but I love cookie dough ice cream. I recently discovered this product and Im very happy that I dont have to compromise my health or my favorite dessert anymore.

author: davida17
text: My favorite ice cream on the market! Very flavorful and I love the cookie dough and texture of the ice cream overall! Definitely a fun late night sugar craving. I would highly recommend buying this and I would buy again!

author: mtursk
text: Ben and Jerrys is one of my favourites ! There is a lot of cookie dough and chocolate all throughout. It can be a little more pricy than other ones but you can usually find a 2 for $10 deal at shoppers. Super delicious !

author: kira_in_hawaii
text: This product has a huge taste of delicious chocolate chip cookie dough flavor that just makes u want even more of the ice cream. My kids love chocolate so this is the most ideal flavor and ice cream brand we have tried.

author: mamanicole215
text: I would get this every summer! It was always fresh and tasted great! My sisters also enjoyed it as well. We would totally recommend this ice cream! Compared to others it was better quality. We were completely satisfied.

author: elenid
text: I love ice cream, but I love Ben and Jerry’s ice cream especially because it has that rich cookie dough taste and it’s full of texture and it’s just my favorite flavor of ice cream from this brand! I love it! Must have!

author: xzarial
text: I think this product was good overall it is a very affordable price and perfect for sharing although they could lower the price a bit and this flavor is not my favorite but still pretty good I would definitely recommend

author: lesliec86
text: You can never go wrong with a Ben & Jerrys ice crea! It is more on the expensive side, bit definitely worth treating yourself! This flavor its amazing, especially if you love cookie dough it has all the right amounts!

author: uhohloreo
text: I love Ben & Jerrys because it truly is the best ice cream, even though its so expensive. They also personally took part in the current BLM human rights movement, so they are obviously the top tier brand of ice cream.

author: nicoleb313
text: I love cookie dough ice cream, and this brand is one of my favorites because it has such a large amount of cookie dough chunks! I also like how thick it is. It has such a full flavor which makes it one of my favorites.

author: noracat99
text: Okay... let me just start with my favorite ice cream brand is ben & jerrys so I might be a little biased BUT I love this flavor!! It satisfies my sweet tooth so well! The price is also great and doesnt break the bank!

author: natalielovesskincare
text: These are so delicious and such a classic, except for the thousands of calories that are in 1 pint. If you dont care about the calories and you just want a full sand then this is a great option and it taste delicious.

author: justinc18
text: Putting cookie dough and ice cream together is almost a perfect match, but can sometimes be heavy when eating it. Cookie dough is delicious and amazing following that original blend of vanilla ice cream is impeccable.

author: brooke5
text: Ben and Jerrys is just a classic go to comfort food. Whether youre sad or celebrating, this is the perfect product for any moment! there are so many flavors but personally i love cookie dough! I recommend every tries!

author: ULTIMATEC
title: COOKIE DOUGH
text: I have always been a fan of cookie dough. I could always use more in the pint but then again I should just eat cookie dough. I was happy and had plenty of dough in my pints over the years. Usually average of 5-7 gobs

author: crimsonm
text: If you love eating cookie dough ice cream then this one will definitely be a favorite. Has a good amount of cookie dough pieces. Unlike other brands where the ratio will be a bit off. I always recommend this flavor.

author: nicholeb33
text: Ok this is one of my favs. My only complaints are that the container is tiny for the price. It should be more like $1.99 but its $5.99 for just a small amount. Thats the only disappointing thing about this ice cream.

author: onlywayisforward
text: Any ice cream I can eat anytime, anywhere! It is so enriching & flavorful, I live eating it especially when Im binge watching, Im a repeated customer and cookie dough is my favorite favorite ice cream I love love it!

author: lexi_rodz24
text: this is the best flavor of Ben & Jerrys ice cream. theres plenty of cookie dough pockets and youre definitely getting what you paid for.The ice cream is very good quality and creamy and I can finish a pint by myself.

author: jessshanee
text: This is my favorite ice cream ever! It is the best the cookie dough with the chocolate chips are simply amazing an enjoyable! One of the best ice creams I have ever had hands down! I would recommend this to everyone!

author: monika1990
text: This is hands-down my favorite ice cream flavor. I would definitely recommend this product. It has a good ice cream to chocolate chip cookie to ratio. I have purchased this product many times and I will buy it again.

author: oliviad89
text: My absolute favorite ice cream! This is such a great treat and so creamy. I love the additional chunks of chocolate chip cookie dough. This is my brothers favorite dessert. I also really enjoy this ice cream as well!

author: mykaela_alvey
text: Honestly, the best! In my opinion Ben and Jerrys has the best tasting cookie dough! Theres nothing I dislike about this ice cream. You will absolutely not be disappointed. Its my top choice whenever I buy ice cream.

author: No chocolate chips
title: No chocolate chips
text: Every time I buy this ice cream I seem to forget that there are never any chocolate chips in the cookie dough. And every time I’m disappointed. Hopefully I’ll remember next time I get a craving and go somewhere else

My favorite go-to to indulge my dairy fix. Ben and Jerrys is quality ice cream, and chocolate chip cookie dough should be a staple in your freezer. I try not to eat it all in one sitting, but the temptation is real.

author: asian_bbby
text: Ben and Jerrys is one of the best ice cream brands ever to me. it tastes the best of cookie dough ice cream that ive ever had. so delicious theres no way you could be disappointed. buy every single time i run out !!

author: Ajw1
title: Chalky texture
text: I had a craving for icecream so I went to the store and got this hoping it would satisfy the craving. It didn't. The texture is weird. It's not smooth like every other b&j's icecream. The flavor also sort of lacks.

author: xsimply_sydx
text: The original cookie dough ice cream! Ben and jerrys actually invented cookie dough ice cream! This is the BEST cookie dough ice cream@in the market and I will pay the premium price over and over because its so good

author: leah l
title: Barely any cookie dough if not none :(
text: Ben and Jerry’s is my favorite but whenever I have the cookie dough ice cream there is very little if any actual cookie dough in it! so it would be awesome if you guys put more in or made a new one with extra dough

author: clairekcf4c
text: The best store brand ice cream out there. The vanilla is better than all other ice creams I’ve tasted, and the cookie dough does not make me sick like some do. I have bought this over and over and will continue to.

I really like this ice cream but it seems a little bit too sweet for my taste. The chocolate seems slightly sharper than a milk chocolate but not as much as a dark chocolate. The cookie dough is soooo good though !

author: daniellec192
text: Thus is a great sweet hard ice cream. Its single serve style cup allows you to grip for yourself satisfaction. Normally I eat halfway down and put in the freezer for consumption on another day I crave cookie dough.

author: jadar18
text: Anyone you ask who knows me will tell you about how much I love ice cream- and especially this one! I am obsessed with this flavor of ice cream,and I cannot stop eating it! I would definitely recommend this flavor!

author: autumnrose16
text: Delicious ice cream and lots of flavors too! Always nice and creamy. Tons of interesting flavors; not just the simple chocolate and vanilla. This is my favorite brand of ice cream as well I would highly recommend.

author: randi10
text: Delicious as it is fattening but so worth it. The vanilla and the cookie dough bites are out of this world! Wish there were more pieces of cookie dough but I might be obsessed. You cant go wrong with Ben & Jerrys!

author: chanteli1
text: Chocked full of cookie dough and that makes this a real winner. To me, it is a bit pricey. But, if I have a splurge or a craving then I will spend the money. It is great out of the carton or from the store fronts.

author: katd1
text: Ben and Jerrys never disappoints me at all. It tastes better than any off brand ice cream that tries to look like Ben and Jerrys. This ice cream has the bests flavors but it is very expensive. I would recommend.

author: imlaurax
text: To die for!! One of my favorite ice cream brands. I love the cookie dough. They are expensive though so I dont purchase often. Even on sale, they are pretty price but Ben and Jerrys has amazing quality ice cream.

author: yoyoc75ca
text: Just ordered a Ben & Jerrys ice cream cake in this flavor for my husbands birthday! Im not a cookie dough person but still enjoyed it a lot! My husband LOVED it! I think it would even taste better with hot fudge!

author: jordyng8171
text: THE BEST! Anything Ben & Jerry does is amazing!! Its a bit pricey but worth it. I dont think there is much they could even do to improve this product because its to die for! Everyone needs this in their freezer!!

author: elizabeths849a
text: My favorite ice creal of all time! I dont know what they put in ben and jerrys ice cream that they are so addicting ! The other one that i also like is vanilla and that is also my favorite! I would but it again !

author: Alexis
title: Was looking forward to cookie dough icecream...
text: Unfortunately, I ended up with pint of vanilla icecream. There were only about 3 globs of cookie dough in the whole thing (which were delish when I did get to eat them). Wish there were more, very disappointed..

author: hibs
text: I love cookie dough therefore the ice cream hating part of me just disappears. But I do have to appreciate the ratio of ice cream to cookie dough in these cartons because they have SO MUCH COOKIE DOUGH I love it

author: taylorrenae92
text: A classic! I have to be in the mood for it, its not an ice cream I want all of the time. I enjoy it, but there is something about it that is just maybe a little off. Im not sure what it is, its not bad just ehh.

author: amandah342
text: Chocolate chip cookie dough is my favorite ice cream, and Ben and Jerry's does not disappoint. The cookie chunks are big enough to stand out, but not so big they become overwhelming. Really great overall flavor.

author: asb322
text: I love Ben and Jerrys ice cream! Theres always so many flavors to choose from! It is perfect for summer days and whatever flavor you choose I bet it will taste delicious! I would definitely recommend to others!

author: parisiaz
text: This is pretty good. But honestly Im not that big of a fan of cookie dough ice cream so this was just ehh for me. I wouldnt buy it again but if I was offered it at a party or something, I wouldnt turn it down.

author: kylal1
text: This is my all time favourite ice cream since I was a kid! Ben and Jerrys makes the best! The cookie dough chunks are big enough for you to taste them each bite! The price is reasonable for the quality you get

author: alexisf0642
text: You cant go wrong with a good Ben & Jerrys ice cream. There are so many flavors to choose from and theyre all amazingly tasty! They come in various sizes and each tub of ice cream is affordable. Im satisfied.

author: racing_my_shadow
text: Something about cookie dough and ice cream. It is on the pricey side if you dont but it on sale, but hey when you want ben and Jerrys you go get it! I would definitely recommend if you havent tried it, do it

author: lorikovachuphold
text: Ben and Jerry I think is the creamiest ice cream of all ice cream I love the cookie dough my husband will get up late at night just to have a bowl of ice cream and me I find myself eating it in theAfter noon

author: lovelycarolinaa_xo
text: loving this chocolate chip cookie dough its really good with a good size amount of the dough, i had got a different brand but not ben & jerry does it, i also got the birthday flavor which im excited to try!

author: hayleyp6f89
text: Lots of cookie dough pieces which is the most important to me! I love all Ben & Jerrys ice cream and its usually my go to when grocery shopping and we want to grab ice cream! Their cookie dough is top notch.

author: linneai
text: I love Ben & Jerrys, and this ice cream has been one of my favorite for years! Because of how unhealthy it would be to eat every day and how pricy that would be, I treat this as a me-night type of ice cream.

author: spaigeotis
text: Ben & Jerrys is my favorite brand to buy chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream from, I think the vanilla is delish and creamy however I do think there could be more cookie dough, the equal ratio is lacking!

author: sarahh420
text: B&J is so full of chunks and I love it. Their cookie dough has lots of chocolate which is perfect for those who are chocolate lovers. This is such a go to ice cream for me. I highly recommend trying it out.

author: jessicag15fc
text: another good brand, can easily be found at many grocery stores and there are so many flavors to choose from. They range from mini personal cups to regular sized buckets of ice cream. Would totally recommend

author: rubs84
text: I love this Ice cream, I like to feel the chocolate. The price is good for the quality. I bougth the last year but I want to buy again this year. Like a dessert is perfect or with brownies. I recommend you!

author: breannas39
text: I really like this flavor. The cookie dough is chewy in a good way. It brings a little bit of saltiness to all of the sweet components. Ive had this flavor a few times and its definitely a top five for me!

author: kaelinw1
text: I love Ben and Jerrys ice cream, it is so creamy and delicious. I think is is up there with Graeters ice cream because they have so many flavors. It is delicious. I was overall satisfied with this product.

This is my all time favourite ice cream. If I had to choose one flavour of ice cream to eat for the rest of my life it would probably be this. The chunks of cookie dough in the ice cream is the best part.

author: Rsties
title: I live cookie dough but...
text: I've been buying this flavor for years now. I went to my local store to buy one today and my pint size seriously only had two pieces of cookie dough :/. Big disappointment! Guess I grabbed the wrong pint.

This ice cream gives you that raw cookie dough taste surrounded by swirls of chocolate fudge and ice cream. The creaminess is this product is to die for! I would recommend this to any cookie loving feen!

author: ticketsforfive
text: Classic cookie dough. Cant go wrong, super yummy and the perfect Ben and Jerrys size for splitting while having a Netflix marathon! The ice cream is delish and theres a good amount of cookie dough pieces

author: kaceya
text: Ben and Jerrys is delicious. Where blue bell is a classic, Ben and Jerrys isnt afraid to really mix in bold ingredients and new flavors. Love having this in my freezer for days that I need a sweet treat.

author: serenax2
text: I love this brand and all their unique and amazing flavors. I cant help but buy a few when I go to the supermarket because of how fast I finish one pint. And this is affordable so I would recommend 10/10

author: emilyannperry14
text: Ben and Jerrys chocolate chip cookie dough is such a classic. There are an abundance of chocolate chips and cookie dough pieces all throughout the ice cream so you know youre getting your moneys worth.
