This is so good especially with this season!!! Much needed dessert for summer!!!! You can eat this all for yourself but if you cant, you would love to share this to your friends!!!!!! So much lovee!!!!

author: memberf2692
text: My all time favorite flavor of ice cream is chocolate chip cookie dough, but the Ben and Jerrys flavor is just so sweet and the cookie dough part is so soft and just the right amount for the container!

author: sundas
text: One of my favorites! I always buy this flavor whenever I find it in the ice cream section. Cookie dough has been a fav since I was young so this always brings back the joyful memories when I was a kid!

author: thebrighterside926
text: The little bites of cookie dough taste like homemade cookie dough. There are plenty in the ice cream. The ice cream is creamy and has great flavor. The cookie dough compliments the ice cream perfectly.

author: andreab57
text:
Ben and Jerrys is my favorite ice cream! Its so rich in texture and flavor.
It really high in sugar though but its ice cream
The chocolate chip cookie dough is the best from all the flavors they have

author: megwolf
text: This is one of Ben and Jerrys more basic flavors (although none of their flavors are TRULY basic), but its still delicious. Vanilla ice cream with cookie dough chunks, how could you go wrong with that?

author: muppethans
text: Love this flavor since Im a huge cookie dough ice cream person. Only thing I dont like is there isnt enough cookie dough pieces, but then again I would just eat a whole pint of cookie dough if I could.

author: kennadyy
text: THIS! This is the best icecream out there whether your eating it in the pint or your actually at ben and jerrys, its like a cookie in icecream form and is absolutely amazing! Highly recommend for you!

author: smashattackk
text: I love this ice cream! Its so delicious and although the price isnt ideal, its so worth the money. The flavor, the packaging, everything about this ice cream I love. I always recommend this to others!

author: jennifergd672
text: I love Ben and Jerry's ice cream especially this one the flavor taste so good I keep a pint of this in the freezer and I eat on it when I want some ice cream. The price isn't bad I would buy it again

author: lindseyc6b81
text:
My favorite ice cream since high school affordable eating it with my sister.
Affordable price watching our favorite shows delicious yummy
I bought it at target store yes very good packaging amazing

author: faithda5b8
text: This ice cream is so good! The cookie pieces are the perfect size, and mixed with the ice cream it creates a wonderful treat for all those cookie dough lovers out there! I would definitely recommend!

author: jenniferc29
text: The best chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream out there!!! Huge chunks of the cookie dough in this small tub... and a lot of cookie dough in this tub! Simply perfect if you love to eat cookie dough!

author: bellas72
text: LOVE THIS!!!!! soooo good if you love cookie dough this ice cream is filled with cookie dough chunks I recommend to anyone who likes cookie dough its affordable doesnt melt quick and overall yummy !

author: arielc
text: I am a big lover of chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream. I have been buying Ben & Jerrys for a very long time and I simply love the little cookie dough balls in the ice cream. It has great flavor.

author: nicurn17
text: The pint size is so convenient, but dangerous. Its not hard to finish a pint; the problem is the huge amount of calories. Im a sucker for cookie dough but they have a huge variety of fun flavors.

author: heatherbeeeee
text: Man cookie dough anything is good. Period. But Ben & Jerrys chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream is AMAZING!! The ice cream tastes so good and the cookie dough is nice and doughy and yummy! Mmmmm.

text: Who doesn't love creamy, sweet ice cream with little chunks of tasty cookie dough? Ben & Jerry's never leaves you disappointed or looking for those bits of cookie dough. One of my go-to flavors.

text: Love Ben and Jerrys and their chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream! It is delicious!

author: madina_america
text: I loved this ice cream so much and it was a amazing price. Try it and you love it too

author: chynadoll2love
text: Great taste for an original fave. Good texture and doesnt go bad fast in the freezer.

author: briannae13
text: A classic take on cookie dough ice cream and possibly the best tasting version of it.

author: amberz7
text: There is just the right amount of cookie dough!! Definitely my favorite go to snack!!

author: christian7
title: Disappointing
text: Almost no cookie dough in this ice cream with bland vanilla ice cream to top it off.

author: bennymate
title: Awesome!
text: Absolutely amazing product! Ice cream was perfect and rich with cookie dough. 10/10.

author: amandat9e06
text: A great ice cream I love Ben and Jerrys. A little on the pricey side but delicious!!

author: lauriep6
text: Who doesnt like cookie dough? This one has a good ratio of ice cream to cookie dough

author: sheilap00c7
text: Another one of my favorites. You can never go wrong with Ben & Jerrys. So delicious.

author: amandak193
text: My favorite Ice cream Ben and Jerrys has the best cookie dough and I always get it !

author: susanad1
text: Such a creamy ice cream. Love the cookie dough taste. Perfect for a hot weather day!

author: ellie_x0
text: This ice cream is the perfect comfort food. I love it much more than other brands!

author: nicolem121
text: Super yummy!! Its generous with the cookie dough. Its just the perfect combination

author: AllieKatt
title: Love this flavor
text: Been eating Ben and Jerry’s cookie dough since college. One of their best flavors.

author: Ella2607
title: Forever Favorite
text: This has always been my favorite, even since childhood. I love,love,love this.

author: Minnie22
title: Worth it
text: It is a little expensive but so worth the money on my second pint this week ☺

author: carolh39
text: Classic cookie dough ice cream at its finest! Decent pricing and delicious!

author: realcaprisun
title: I LOVEEEEE this flavor
text: The flavor is ✨ i m m a c u l a t e ✨it’s my go-to and I 100% recommend

author: SirWased
title: Variety is good
text: This is a decent ice cream though I don't think it's worth the price.

author: kimds
title: ce crame
text: i like this ice frame and i love did my fovent ice carne is ben

title: Slices
text: Not enough cookie dough. Mostly vanilla icecream and no pieces

author: Jaxin
title: Yummy!
text: My favorite things. Cookie dough and ice cream and chocolate!

author: Jahahah
title: Tastes amazing
text: I buy this regularly, it has always been my favourite flavour

author: kjwright13
title: Favorite Flavor
text: Definitely my favorite flavor... Could use more cookie dough

author: luludove
title: The Best!
text: My #1 favorite ice cream. Everything else is last, lol.

author: Jazz
title: All time favorite
text: A perfect balance of cookie dough and vanilla icecream.

author: Kkeller14
title: Eh
text: Not enough cookie dough to ice cream ratio in the pint

author: JanaeM
title: Taste Amazing
text: Melts in my mouth... literally. It’s amazing I love it

author: Allisonb2003
title: Yummy
text: It taste so good I get it every time I go the store

author: Caroline
title: Yum!
text: This has been my favorite flavor for forever! Yum!

author: Please fix your brownies
title: Crumbly brownies three times!
text: He past three times I have bought the chocolate fudge brownie flavor the brownies have been hard and crumbly. The soft chewy brownies and the best part and three times now I have been let down. Each purchase was made several months apart, hoping the quality control issue was fixed. Nope. They were purchased and Walmart twice and Walgreens the most recent time. This was my absolute favorite ice cream flavor, but I think I’m done wasting $5 on being disappointed each time. Ben and Jerry’s, please figure this out. I saw that you commented that this happens when the ice cream melts and refreezes. You really need to contact your vendors and get this worked out.

author: EBGC03
title: Simply the best
text: I’m dealing with an ice cream addiction right now, I’m eating a pint of chocolate fudge brownie everyday, I know it’s crazy and expensive but it’s the only coping skill that works for me right now, I just love love this ice cream.

author: HappyMomCM
title: Sad Pellets of Yuck
text: I am so sorry to say goodbye to one of my favorite indulgences. In the past, I have made milkshakes and malts out of this ice cream because it's flavor was luscious and indulgent. Sadly, what I purchased today at my local grocery was not. Instead of yummy, chewy, chocolatey brownie bites; it contained gritty pellets of yuck. Each pellet was fairly uniform in size, and unfortunate in taste. Maybe some day I will be able to get this memory behind me and step foot into a Ben and Jerry's shop and see if their ice cream looks something like what is shown in the picture. Then again, after what I tasted today, maybe not.

author: andiinnashville
title: Same issue with the crumbly brownie
text: This is our favorite flavor and the last 3 cartons we’ve purchased have had the same issue of the brownie being crumbly and gritty. We love this flavor so we’re hoping this can get resolved soon! here’s a photo of what we’re seeing in these last 3 cartons.

author: Djmomjeans
title: I miss the old brownies.
text: Chocolate fudge brownie is my absolute favorite! A few months ago a bought a pint and there was only one giant hunk of hard crumbly brownie in the center, I couldn't even eat it. I was disappointed but thought it was a freak thing. Since then I have tried it again from different stores, and different flavors i.e. Half baked and the chocolate fudge brownie pint slices. Again the brownies have been crumbly and chalky. And there weren't many brownie pieces in the them or any fudge swirls. I hope they change the brownies back to the way they were so I can enjoy my favorite treat again!

title: Only thing I wanted after having my baby
text: So disappointed! I struggled with gestational diabetes and was unable to indulge in sweet treats for my whole pregnancy. When I gave birth to our sweet baby boy, I was allowed to have my Ben & Jerry's again. The store was out of half baked so my husband brought me fudge brownie. Couldn't even get through a proper bite because the brownies were just a crumbly/icy mess and the ice cream was sticky and solidified. I thought it had expired but it's good until Sept 2018! I was so upset. I'm afraid to have him go buy more pints if this is the result. I keep hearing about their new flavors but I waited 9 months for a regular pint and it was thrown in the trash-my husband couldn't even stomach it and he eats everything.

author: Miss Pettinato 55
title: Chocolate fudge brownie
text: This ice cream is the best chocolate ice cream in the world, now I am a chocolate lover and I also love ice cream i love trying new flavors and also new restaurants. Ever since I have tryed Ben and Jerrys ice cream I never thought i would find another ice cream that would beat it, and you know what I have not found a better one... and I probably never will. I am only 25 but I have traveled ALOT. I lived in Amsterdam for 3 years and I have tasted and tryed many different chocolate ice creams all arownd Europe and nothing even comes close. I am now back in the US and I still have yet to find a better ice cream. ❤️❤️❤️ If your in a chocolatly mood and need a fix Ben and Jerrys is the ice cream for you!!!

author: FuzzyGut
title: One of my favorites!
text: The brownies! My god the brownies are so GOOD! I’m sorry some don’t enjoy them but I just ate my second pint of this flavor and it’s become a favorite. The ice cream is rich and delicious of course, but the brownies are ridiculously good! Just the right flavor and chewiness. I could eat this for days on end. Please keep this one alive!

author: Phish Food Fan
title: How I love thee!
text: I love the brownies in this ice cream. I’m fact I love them so much that I bought a batch from the company Ben and Jerry’s uses! I eat this flavor more often than I should admit and I LOVE it. Chewy yummy brownies in delicious chocolate ice cream! Can’t lose. I’m sorry so many of you don’t like these new brownies but that just leaves more for me!

author: Goldriley
title: Brownie woes
text: This flavor used to be a favorite of mine, but the last few times I have purchased this flavor over the past few months, no matter what store, the ice cream itself has been great...but the brownie chunks were dry and crumbly! I had purchased Half Baked as well, and the brownie chunks were AMAZING!! I hope something can be figured out so it can be a return to being in my good graces again!!

author: Chrissy
title: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
text: Im huge fan of Ben & Jerry's and normally Im a Phish food gal! Decided to try this Flavour as had 7 year old nephew staying and Brownies are his favourite desert also any excuse to indulge in a major choc feast! but was SO disappointed in this ice-cream ! was clumpy and brownies where so hard and dry?!!! Shame a let from all the other flavours ..boohoo.

author: PatTuz
title: What's happened?
text: Every so often I'd buy a pint of "CFB" as my kids' and I refer it, and the brownies would be hard, crumbly, and tasteless....a real disappointment. I just attributed it to "a batch that melted on the way to the supermarket" or something. However, now, when we really need it, I bought 5 pints, and all are hard, tasteless and crumbly. I can't believe that I have to say "bye-bye"to B&J's CFB.

author: Mari
title: Very Sad
text: Ever since I was young, this has always been my favorite ice cream. I've always bought this ice cream and ate it as a comfort food. However, recently i've found that I can't enjoy this ice cream like I used to, because of the disgusting little chunks of hardness in the brownie bits. There's nothing more insulting than biting into a "great baked good" and instead having your teeth grit because of the inability to chew the extremely hard pieces in the brownie. I thought maybe it was a one time thing, so I bought another container. The second container had the exact same issue. This is truly a major let down, because this is the only store bought ice cream I've ever liked I hope they can fix this issue soon.

author: Disappointed625
title: Disappointing
text: I have had this flavor from time to time pretty much since it was first made available, so I am familiar with the level of quality it can have. In fact, take a look at your pic compared to mine--totally different experiences as your pic represents what I am accustomed to enjoying and mine is a poor copycat version with crumbly bits of what appear to be and taste like inadequately mixed brownie pieces. Honestly, the ice cream would have been better without the add-ins. After reading other customers' experiences, I think I am going to write this one off my favorites list.

author: Melanie
title: I noticed you must read and fix issues????????
text: My girlfriend and I got some of this ice cream all because it’s her favorite. She dug into it to find dry, gross brownies. We were like what? Went and bought another thinking the first must have frozen wrong or something. She dug into it and it as well was the same way. I love Ben and Jerry’s ice cream. I will go out of my way to get some. But now I’m rethinking this. The reviews go on and on for several years worth. If you don’t fix a problem that’s been on going, how am I sure the rest of your ice cream isn’t going to have problems like this. Sorry but I just can’t chance it.

author: Rosex
title: Fix your brownies!!
text: This has always been one of my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavors. However the last two times I have bought it, the brownies have been crumbly and not fudgey?? Not sure what happened to the batter but the brownies are flaky and hard chunks. Very disappointed!

author: becca
title: Was my favorite until.....
text: Had a huge craving for Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Fudge Brownie Ice Cream. I have been eating Ben & Jerry's for quite some time now. Today I purchased it and must have bought a bad batch. The "fudge brownie" pieces were dry, crumbly, and tan in color-not like usual! It didn't taste like the normal batch either- I was so sad because after 2 bites I just couldn't handle it anymore. I just bought it today and it wasn't even close to the Expiration date either. Disappointed :(

author: Tally
title: Disappointed
text: The chocolate ice cream itself is very good but the last couple pints I've bought all had hard brownie bites. They're so dry they crack as soon as you bite into them.

author: insiduous1
title: This is my new favorite
text: I normally get Half-Baked, but I was craving actual chocolate ice cream (which is kinda rare for me; I prefer vanilla), so I asked my husband to get me some and he showed up with this. Omgosh. It's better than Half-Baked! Usually I want more brownies in the HB because it always seems (to me) to be 2/3 cookie dough and 1/3 brownie. And this really hit the spot. The only problem is...I ate the whole pint in one sitting, which is, uh, not something I typically do and definitely not healthy. lol. I'll be sure to stop at least halfway through next time. :)

author: Popicoser
title: Used to be my favorite, but...
text:
This flavour used to be my favorite ice cream of all times, but the last few pints I bought were really disappointing.
Bought in CVS, the brownie bits were really hard and dry, and they used to be so moist and soft!!
So sad. RIP fudge brownie :(

author: LAE13
title: Brownie bites were hard and crusty..
text: This was my favorite flavor and the last few pints I bought were very disappointing. The ice cream is delicious but the what use to be fudgie brownie bites are now hard can crusty. Like they are old and frost bite... so sad :(

author: Scook
title: Disappointed
text: Since I was a child Chocolate Fudge Brownie was my all time favorite ice cream until one day I bought it and the brownies were hard, crumbly, gross...I hoped it was a fluke yet every single time I buy it it's still disgusting. I stopped getting it for a while and switched to Half baked....the brownies were hard AGAIN even in that. Now I've been forced to buy other brands but none can even compare to what once was the best ice cream known to man. Sadly not anymore.

author: Sara
title: Awful brownies!!
text: I was hoping this was a fluke thing but reading the other reviews it seems not. I’ve purchased 3 pints in the last six months or so and they were absolutely delicious! Soft chewy brownie pieces and wonderful ice cream. However this time the brownies are awful. They are rock hard rectangular chunks I can barely scoop out and when eating them they are just dry, hard, and crumbly. Not worth the $5!!!! I probably won’t try again as this seems to be an ongoing issue for other customers as well. It was my favourite ice cream:(

author: TayTayE
title: Really disappointed :(
text: I bought a pint of this ice cream from my local drug store and I just have to say how utterly dissatisfied I am on the quality of the ice cream I have been eating this brownie flavor for the past 4 years with no problem and I have always been a loyal customer of Ben & Jerry's so I'm sad to say that for the first time I am very unsatisfied hopefully you'll be able to make it up. And to pin point the problem area, the brownies were burnt and dry.

author: Freddiegee
title: What used to be
text: I have been buying this for a long time but it's not the same anymore. you guys have the best chocolate ice cream but the brownies have totally declined lately. I know you can blame retailers but that doesn't cut it anymore. it's not their fault. Take the heat yourselves and do something about it.

author: mpc2000
title: What happened to this ice cream?
text: We bought 2 pints last night, chocolate fudge brownie and coffee toffee crunch. We haven't had any Ben and Jerry's in a few years. Chocolate fudge brownie used to be my absolute favorite. We each tried one bite and all hated it. The brownies were hard and the ice cream tasted really weird. The coffee toffee crunch wasn't much better. I guess they changed the ingredients. Doesn't taste like a premium ice cream. It's not even as good as a cheap ice cream! Definitely won't buy again!

author: Michael G
title: So disapointed
text: This used to be heaven in a cup. Now the squishy delicious brownie has been reduced to some indescribable light colured crunchy substance that neither looks og tastes like brownie. Surpriced to see the same issue in year old reviews.

author: Melba
title: Totally Torn!!
text: This has been my favorite flavor since it came out. However I’ve recently switched to different flavors because the consistency is very bad regarding the brownie chunks. I understand the issue regarding handling but if you cannot control the quality of your product through your vendors, well that’s concernjng for your product. I look forward to the company regulating handling so I can come back to my beloved flavor. Meanwhile, your other flavors are definitely keeping me busy!!

author: Marissak
title: So disappointed
text: I haven't had any of these ice creams in about 8 or 9 months and to celebrate my nephews birthday I took him to get one since I don't get to see him besides every couple months. Well when we got home for his party he took a bite and immediately spit it out. So i tried it and noticed it just didn't taste the same and the brownies were either overcooked just not made correctly. It's such a shame because this was my favorite brand but I can't afford the price for it just to be thrown in the trash :(

author: Kris0909
title: Yuck
text: This ice cream used to be my absolute favorite!!! Now every time I have gotten some the brownies are hard and crumbly. I've even tried different stores, different states and now we are stationed in Germany and we still get the hard crumb brownie :( I miss the yummy fudge brownie

author: Shalom
title: VERY AVERAGE....
text: Certainly not worth $8! never again.................

author: alex1989
title: Normally I love this ice cream!
text: I buy this ice cream a lot. I notice that half the time it's perfect, lots of big chunks of brownie. The other half, it's hardly any brownie, or it's a whitish color in the brownie and it's crunchy (not how it normally is, which is soft) or the brownie is mushy. So, it's a basically a 50/50 shot of getting my money's worth. I love this ice cream but I'm starting to wonder why this happens?

author: Kandi
title: Ugh
text: I bought one 2 weeks ago and it was amazing! I bought one today and it is disappointing. The brownies are hard and dry. I couldn't even eat them, so I ate the chocolate icecream.

author: sunny23
title: Brownie tasted hard
text: I bought this recently and it used to my favorite. I got it all the time but the last two pints I bought the brownies tasted overcooked. I don't know how they let that slip through quality control. Come on Ben n Jerrys, you guys can do better.

author: caitlinlarkin
title: Used to be the best, not so much anymore
text: This used to be one of my favorite B&J's flavor (right up there with Peanut Butter Cup and Half Baked), but the last two pints I've bought have had super dry, over-cooked brownies. So disappointing when you are expecting delicious, chewy, fudgy brownie chunks. Upon reading other reviews, it seems like this is a common issue, so I don't think I'll be purchasing this flavor again.

author: LBeckett
title: Hard brownies
text: Normally love this flavour, but opened this carton and all the brownies are hard and crumbly. Very disappointed and makes the ice cream not enjoyable

author: PhoenixRises
title: Old Faithful
text: This is a classic favorite! I would buy this ice cream a couple times a week from the convenience store on campus during my college days at George Mason. Whether I was stressed out or just in the mood for something delicious I would turn to old faithful. I stopped eating this flavor for awhile when all the new flavors came in, but no too long ago by husband bought me this by mistake instead of the brownie core (another fav), and I forgot how amazing this ice cream was. I started getting this again. I love brownies, and they're not stingy with the brownie bite size and that's much appreciate. This ice cream was the reason why I fell in love with B&J in the first place, so it will always have a special place in my heart.

author: Jank
title: Hard and crumbly fudge
text: The last 3 jugs of chocolate fudge brownie have been very dissapointing. The texture of the brownie havent been fudgy, but very hard and crumbly... The brownie isent even brown, its more a light brown colour ..

author: lily14
title: Strange
text: This ice cream is usually very good and chocolatey, complete with soft, scrumptious brownies. However, my last purchase of this specific flavor was very disappointing. The brownie bites were hard, grainy, and inedible. The pint has been sitting in the freezer for months, something that is unprecedented in my house Ben and Jerry's lovers.

author: Lgalla25
title: Poor quality recently
text: This is my absolute favourite ice cream and hadn't had it for around 6 months - unfortunately the 2 tubs I have bought recently have had light coloured, chalky/crumbly dried out brownie in them - very disappointed :-( the chocolate ice cream tastes ok, just the quality of the brownies seems to have deteriorated.

author: Camcam
title: What's happened to the quality control on this fla
text: I love this flavor when the brownie are fudge bu over the last several years about 50% of the time I get the graining yucky stuff that I think is supposed to be the brownies. Please fix the problem.

author: beach patty
title: Not what it use to be!
text: The only ice cream I've eaten for years is the Chocolate Fudge Brownie. Was always my absolute favorite but lately the brownies are light colored and crunchy and so disgusting that I have thrown most of the last few containers out. Have you changed something? I noticed you said that it could be from improper handling and refreezing. If that was the case I think the ice cream would have ice crystals in it. For the price of over $5 I will have to reconsider brands of ice cream. I don't mind paying the price but lately it's just not worth it. I'm sooo sad.

author: Madday
title: Amazing chocolate!
text: I LOVE!!! This ice cream. It took my husband a few yrs to even convince me to try it. Result..... pure weekly addiction. However- the last few pints we have purchased (one for him one for me) have had SUPER dried out,almost cracker like, brownie chuncks. Not at all the ice cream I've come to love and crave. Don't know if maybe a bad batch, quality control, or recipes??? Anyway, hoping the good ole amazing-ness will return. I would still tell my friends this is amazing Icecream with a proviso that it's been not stellar lately.

author: Lejla
title: Not like it used to be...
text: I used to get this flavor ALL the time. I loved it. It satisfied all my chocolate cravings.... buuuut... I haven't gotten it in a while. Until yesterday. It tasted fine until I got to the brownie part. It felt like it was dried out, hard, and even had a crunch to it. I love the Milk & Cookies flavor (so I guess I'll stick to that), but unfortunately I won't be buying this flavor again.

author: Jackiefromcalifornia
title: The queen of Ben & Jerry’s ice cream
text: Good lord, I use to LOVE This ice cream. I would pay $8.99 at gas stations if I craved it and I was away from home. It was always worth the extra money even when it came to the minis. I don’t know what’s happening with the company though, the ice cream is becoming a hit or miss. Sometimes my brownies are so soft and delicious and other times they are dry and hard to chew. It’s terrible. Just last week they were doing buy 5 and get them for $3.99 each, so best believed I bought ten because what a steal.or so I thought..... Well turns out that was a mistake because I have opened three containers and they are extremely dry and hard. Hope they see all these reviews and improve its quality. because girlfriend over here wants to love the ice cream again!

author: Kvb1982
title: Hard brownie
text: I bought this and was really excited to try it but when I did the brownies were a weird light brown color and hard. The brownies crumbled into what looked like dirt.

author: DC24
title: A Go-To Chocolate Ice Cream!
text: I don't normally go for rich chocolate flavors, but this is one of my favorites when I do. It has a wonderfully rich, creamy, cake-like texture. Perfect smoothness and a delightful chocolaty brownie flavor set this ice cream apart from most chocolate ice cream. If you have a hankering for simple pure chocolate fudge brownie goodness, then this flavor is for you!

author: Joseph1813
title: Very Disappointing...
text: Bought this flavor twice in the last 2 days... Yesterday the ice cream was fantastic ate the entire pint me and my wife. But tonight we had our second pint.. The ice cream had lots of crystals all over it, the brownies were crusty it was so bad i checked the expiration date thinking it was expired. Not very happy considering this is a $5 pint of ice cream...

title: Bad brownies
text:
A few months ago, I noticed the brownies from 2 specific exp. Dates, were hard, dry and appeared stale. As someone whos has ate a pint a day of chocolate fudge brownie icecream from b&j for over a year now (a bit much) I was disappointed, and unable to eat them. At $6. A pint, I wasted alot of money for about 6 weeks. I had to travel out of town to get different dates.
New batches came and they have improved , however I still find the occasional stale brownie.
When the brownies are normal, the icecream is fantastic.

author: Edstromp
title: A favourite for years!
text: I like many flavours of B&J but I tend to turn back to this one. Mmmm... the combination Chocolate Fudge Brownie, some salty potato crisps (and maybe some adulty beverage) is so freaking good a friday night that it can make even the worst of weeks look like a faint crack in some old pants you anyway had thought of throwing away. Mmm mm mmm....

author: MM33
title: Extremely disappointing
text: I loved this ice cream flavor ever since middle school! Now the last time I've bought it the brownie is crusty and nasty ! It not only is disappointing after I sit down after a extremely long day go enjoy a sweet treat that use to be very delicious- and now it's just chocolate with chunks of dry crusty brownie bites !! Waste of money

author: Cree
title: Good ice cream, nasty brownies
text: I'm in shock. Ben and Jerry's has let me down for the second time. They used to have such delicious ice cream! The ice cream itself was good, but the brownie chunks were terrible! They tasted more like a ball of slightly cocoa mostly flour. Even the cheapest ice creams get the brownie chunks to taste like... brownies. Epic fail.

author: Love Brownies
title: Please Bring Back Better Brownies!
text: I have been a fan of this flavor & eating 1 pt a week for last 3 yrs. The last 4 months I have been buying from Neighborhood Walmart in St Matthews Ky & Kroger nearby & unfortunately this ice cream..my escape has not been as good :(

author: Mike
title: Crusty brownies!
text: I have stood by this flavor for so long thinking I just had bad luck but the past few times its been the same! Freezer burn chalky crusty brownies and an all around bad flavor. I can see I'm not alone. I've tried multiple stores and it seems like there is no bias for quality! To bad it really is the best flavor in my opinion

author: porter6547
title: Not the same
text: I always get this ice cream flavor. It is my favorite. I bought it three times within the last month and each time it contiued to disappoint me. The brownies were hard and scarce and the ice cream tasted weird and of chemical odor. So disappointed because it is my favorite flavor and I was a dedicated buyer. :((((((((((((((

author: James193850790
title: Brownies are gummy!
text: Used to be my favorite before they released the brownie batter ice cream (RIP).. now the brownies are so gummy that they are unedible! I literally eat the ice cream and spit out the brownies they are so bad :( I wish they would release the brownie batter ice cream again as that was a much better ice cream overall.

author: Gtrman84
title: What happened?
text: Ben and Jerry's chocolate fudge brownie ice cream was once one of my favorite things. A treat that was worth looking forward to. The brownies used to be delicious, now they are dried crumbles of tan funk. I don't buy that the poor state of said brownies is due to a freeze thaw cycle. What happened? Really??

author: Sarah0192837
title: Disappointing and inedible :(
text: I just bought a pint of this because I was desperately craving ice cream and it was disgusting. This used to be my favorite flavor, and I'd buy it all the time last summer, but the brownies this time were all white and crumbly and the whole experience was so gross that it was completely inedible. I wanted this ice cream so badly and it was such a let down. And now I see that this is a common problem and has been for years. Not buying again; it's not worth spending $4 a pint for this kind of risk. Buyer beware.

author: Karitx
title: Brownies might as well be rocks
text: This used to be the best flavor they had - moist and chewy brownies. For the last 10 years, they've sucked. Every so often, you'll get a decent pint, but mostly they are inedible. I've contacted B&J a few times and they never sent what they promised, I've stopped buying this completely.

author: Priya R
title: Ugh! Hard, inedible brownies
text: This used to be my favorite ice cream, bar none. But every other pint I buy now has the same problem - the brownies are hard, chalky and just BAD. They used to be consistently soft and delicious...think I'll have to stop buying this altogether, though it breaks my heart.

author: EmmaN
title: Almost no brownies and they are hard :(
text: Used to love this flavour and I bought a couple pints the other day, there were almost no brownie bits in either of them and the ones that were there were hard and crusty :( if the recipe changed for any reason, please bring back the old one. I love my Ben and Jerry's!

author: Kbuggs
title: Taking care of customers
text: My fiance and I are very big fans of Ben & Jerry's especially this flavor. It's something we get to share together at night when we're alone. A week ago we had an issue with his ice cream and we hate to complain but it was an issue that really freaks out my fiance. Today we received a refund and 5 free coupons for whatever we wanted. This was a shock to him and I but was very much appreciated. It nice to see how much you care about your customers. We both thank you very much and will always be a fan!! :)

author: briski
title: Still can't find a better chocolate brownie flavor
text: I compare all my chocolate ice cream and brownie ice cream experiences off this flavor. I have tried and failed multiple times to find a comparable one that comes close to achieving this greatness, only to come short every time. It is my all time favorite ice cream!

author: Jimbo
title: Barf
text:
I normally love Half Baked and tired this one by itself.
Everything about it was disgusting.
The brownies tasted old and crumbly, and even the ice cream tasted of freezer burn. You need to take better care of your products. I normally love your ice cream.

title: Hit and miss!!
text: This was my favourite because of the brownie bites but lately the brownie bites are not soft and smooth like they used to be. They are crumbly and unpleasant. I have had to change which one I usually buy but I do go back to see if it's changed but it hasn't.

author: Lucy1991
title: Not sure anymore!
text: This is my go to flavor when I get Ben and Jerry's! Normally it's very delicious and the brownies are soft! The brownies in this pint were almost white and I was cautious as to if I should eat them! I'm disappointed it wasn't like it normally is!

author: Jillvh16
title: Holy Fudge!
text: I've been in love with Ben & Jerry's ice cream since I was 3. I'm 16 and I've tried just about every flavor. My top 3 favorites have got to be Chocolate Fudge Brownie, Half baked, and Phish Food. I will always love this ice cream!

author: Yuki
title: Not the same
text: I have bought this flavor three times in the last two months and the first pint was great, really creamy and the brownies were soft. The last two the brownies were hard and crusty :( Super disappointing.

author: Cbugkrunks33
title: A solid classic
text: I love chocolate ice cream and I love brownies! Putting the two of them into an ice cream flavor together was a genius idea! It's a classic flavor to me and never disappoints! Thank you B & J!!!!

author: Chris
title: Brownie bits had white, crumbly, dried parts.
text: The ice cream itself was good, but most of the brownie bits had white crumbly bits and it got worse the further I went into the pint. Possibly partially unmixed ingredients?

author: Mike L
title: Horrible
text:
Wow I've had so many Ben N Jerrys pints and this one was just rancid.
Ice cream left a horrible taste in my mouth and the brownies really don't taste very good :/

author: Grantb22
title: Dry chalk brownie ice cream
text: Went down to my local store and grabbed a pint always love the chest gooey brownies but they were crumbly dust disappointed because it's usually so good

author: Cmfoster1
title: Best Chocolate Ice Cream Ever!!!
text: This Ice Cream is amazing!!! Love the big chunks of Brownie!!! Im a Mint Chocolate Chip nut...Put a scoop of this with Mint Ice Cream and OMG...Heaven!!!

author: Zoe37
title: Brownies hard and gross!
text: Really don’t understand why the brownies in the last few pints I’ve bought become so hard and gross?!?! It’s unfortunate and now I’ve lost $$$ :(

author: maal
title: Where are the old brownies
text: I just had it for the first time in a while and the other reviews are correct. The brownies are terrible. The old recipe was much better!

author: Jagger
title: Getting worse
text: I've always loved chocolate fudge brownie, but now the brownies are rock hard and crumble. No longer have the soft chewy texture.

author: Dababywolf
title: LIKE AN ANGEL IS KISSING YOU
text: This is hands down the best ice cream on the PLANET! I could eat this flavor all day every day. 10/10 great job B&J’s!

author: ella
title: Rich chocolate taste!
text: I love, love, love this flavored & textured ice cream! Please keep producing it! Soooo yummy!!!

author: Rick
title: Chocolate fudge brownie
text: Not a good ice cream, would not buy again . Stick with vanilla or cherry garcia

author: Ronin
title: That Rich Chocolate Flavor
text: When I want a really deep chocolate flavor this is it.

author: SadAnnie
title: What happened to the brownies?
text: I remember 10 years ago this ice cream was my absolute favourite because of the amazing chewy gooey pieces of brownie goodness inside. I've just had a pot and disappointed to find that there are no discernible brownie pieces. Then it dawned on me that I hadn't actually had any brownies in my brownie ice cream for a while. So irritated by this, that I browsed the Web for similar complaints. It seems as though I'm not the only one, and I won't be buying again!

author: BJLUVER
title: A nice change of pace
text: When I'm feeling frisky I'll switch up to this flavor. You have to be in brownie mood; this flavor is extremely rich. If you're looking to power through a pint, this one might hurt, but it is delicious. The consistency of the brownies is very very good. I would say B&J does the best job of figuring out how to keep their brownies gooey and soft in the freezer. If you want a brownie ice cream, this is the best one. Not my #1 flavor, but it is up there.

author: Ricky6732
title: Incredible
text: Never did in my wildest imaginations would I have been able to imagine a B&J flavor that would match, if not top, Peanut Butter Cup. The place I usually purchase buy my pints was out of PBC so I decided to give this flavor a try. The flavor of milk chocolate ice cream alongside fudge brownies, tasting as if they had been made that same week, was quite satisfying. It's as if you are enjoying brownies with a cup of milk, brilliant. Thanks!

author: WickedAnnabella
title: Should be discontinued--dry, crusty, gross
text: I loved this flavor when it was new, but stopped buying it when I was getting pints with crumbly/dry/crusty "brownie" bits. Every now and then I decide to give it another try, and I'm always disappointed. I can't remember the last time I bought a pint of this that wasn't dried out and gross. Now sure if it's a storage issue or an ingredient issue, but it's a real problem and a waste of money. They should have stopped selling it years ago.

author: paintingthesun
title: YUMMMMMY!
text: I was craving a treat tonight and this ice cream (it doesn't really do it justice to call it just ice cream - it's more than that) was on sale at Metro. So glad I picked some up! The chocolate is a nice deep chocolate flavour and there are so many brownie pieces in it that are chewy and delicious! I thought I was going to eat the entire thing in one sitting but it's so satisfying it's going to last me a few down and out nights.

author: nina90
title: used to be great...
text: The weather recently had been very warm into the mid 90s. I decided to treat myself and picked out this flavor. I had great memories of this flavor but this was just a horrid experience. This ice cream batch was crusty and very hard. I just threw away the rest because I was so upset.

author: Matthew B
title: Bad couple of batches?
text: Every week I treat myself to a pint of this ice cream, however, the three times I've purchased this flavor, the brownies look white/greyish, powdery, and crumble the second you scoop them. In addition, the ice cream doesn't seem as creamy anymore, but it may have been because of the brownies... I sure hope this isn't the quality I can expect from Ben and Jerry's going forward. It's the only ice cream worth consuming.

author: Lane
title: Unappetizing, gummy brownies
text: The chocolate ice cream itself is some of the best I have ever had, but the brownie was hard to find and even harder to eat. I had no idea what to expect. My spoon slid through the brownie instantly, but when I tried a mouthful, it was like half-baked batter gum! I kept chewing and chewing the same bit of brownie. Finally, I lost my appetite and put the pint back in the freezer. I won't be trying this flavor again.

author: KimmyB
title: The Ultimate take on this classic combo
text: I've tried many different takes on the chocolate and brownies combo, and none have held a candle to Ben & Jerry's. The ice cream itself tastes deeply of a good quality chocolate -- not too sweet, just right. The brownies are rich and chewy, the perfect texture to contrast the creamy ice chocolate ice cream base. Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Fudge Brownie is my very favorite ice cream, bar none.

author: TheLadyofHouseBrownie
title: I Pledge My Loyalty to Thee Choco Fudge Brownie
text: I would literally pay taxes to fund this flavor. Forget the Targaryens, I would bend the knee to Chocolate Fudge Brownie. This ice cream has been my go-to for the past decade and will continue to be my go-to until my last breath. I know no ice cream flavor but the Ben & Jerry's ice cream whose name is Chocolate Fudge Brownie. It'll be my ice cream from this day, until the end of my days.

author: Lilshywolfswag
title: Amazing chocolate with brownie pieces
text: This ice cream is amazing & i enjoy the little brownie pieces. I've ate 2 pints so far in the past couple weeks (& now have 7 more fudge brownie & 2 brownie batter core i ordered from the gift shop). Both fudge brownie pints I've had so far were delicious. & most ice cream has tasted weird to me lately, with 2 places including Ben & Jerrys being the exception that actually tastes good.

author: foodlover
title: It is bad.
text: I saw the ratings for this before so I thought I'd give it a try. I don't know if its the brownie but its a light crumbly hard texture in the ice cream. It honestly makes the ice cream nasty to eat.

author: skye
title: Literally my only source of happiness
text: This is my go to flavour for any ice cream and it is straight up the greatest thing to ever happen to me

author: BringBackFudgyBrownies
title: Used to be amazing
text: This has to be my favorite ice cream flavor BUT, it is a 1 in 5 chance that you get a good pint. Lately every pint that I get have dry crumbly brownies like it's just frozen brownie powder. I have wasted so much money buying this flavor in hopes of getting a good batch. The last 4 pints I bought from the store were all bad and I had to throw all of them away.

author: Vesna
title: Best chocolate ice cream ever
text: On a whim I tried this, altho I am not into ice creams that have anything but chocolate swirl or chips in it. I loved this, I have purchased a couple times and each time the brownie pieces were soft and chewy. But I would buy it just for the deep, rich chocolate ice cream, so good! And no nuts in it, thank you--I am not a big fan of nuts in my ice cream

author: Ashmar
title: So good!
text: BOGO this week at the grocery store and haven't had this flavor in forever and decided to pick it up this week and it's just SO AMAZING. The brownie pieces are huge and fudgy and the quality of the chocolate ice cream is just beyond the best. Planning on going back by the store to buy two more for the sale before it endsz

author: AJourneyThroughIceCream
title: Amazing flavor
text: Got this flavor a few days ago to start my journey of trying all flavors, and I am glad to say I wasn’t disappointed. Even though the grocery store I got it from gave it freezer burn I couldn’t have asked for a better pint of ice cream. Strongly recommended if you are in the feels and need a pick-me up.

author: LBGA
title: Personal Favorite
text: I crave chocolate fudge brownie all the time. I'm not big on sweets and consitantly eat very healthy, but I have to have a couple bites every day of my Chocolate Fudge Brownie. It's the perfect balance of sweet chocolate with a touch of saltiness and smooth texture from the brownie. Yummy in every way!

author: PrinzessJasmine
title: Wisdom Teeth
text: I just got my wisdom teeth removed and I had my mom pick up some ice cream. I was initially nervous about the brownie getting stuck in my teeth but I found that they dissolve between the roof of my mouth and my tounge. Nice rich flavor and texture. Helped soothe my sore throat after the surgery

author: Ashleys
title: Another brownie problem
text: This has been my favorite flavor since forever and now the brownies are all dry and crumbly. There aren’t many in my pint yet though with this consistency I don’t want them. The chocolate ice cream is really good but not this brownie mess. What happened!? I miss the gooey fudgy pieces!

author: Nessyrae23
title: Finally a chocolate ice cream for chocolate lovers
text: I love chocolate and I love ice cream but that doesn't mean I like chocolate ice cream. Who else hates when you open up a carton of chocolate ice cream and it's light tan and you know the flavor will be as weak as the color and you know before you take your first bite you'll be disappointed? I kind of gave up on ice cream for a long time because of that. It wasn't until I got a job at a Ben and jerrys scoop shop and saw how dark their chocolate fudge brownie ice cream is that I decided to try it. At that point I wasn't much of an ice cream eater and if wasn't called triple dark chocolate fudge I didn't want to try it and be disappointed. When I took my first bite I was really blown away by how rich and deep the flavor was. This is the way chocolate ice cream should be. It should be indulgent and intoxicating and not for the faint hearted. Then you add in the super moist and delicious brownies and it just doesn't get any better than that. Now I can't eat a lot of this. One scoop is enough bc it is so indulgent. I have to be in the mood for it. This is my go to when I've had a bad day and I need comfort. Since I tried this I have become a loyal Ben and jerrys customer. The scoop shop closed a while back which is sad because it was a cool place. But bottom line is Ben and jerrys are the only brand that makes real chocolate ice cream the way it should be made

author: Steph
title: Tried and true
text: This has been my favorite flavor since childhood. It's true that you need to be careful to get a pint at a more reputable place because if the freezer situation is iffy then hard brownies you will get. But usually it's extra decadent with chewy brownie bits in almost every bite.

author: Rebel of Mars 81
title: Intense Chocolate!
text: If you love semi-sweet and/or dark chocolate, you will love this ice cream. Only true chocolate lovers will be able to eat more than a couple spoonfuls. The brownie bits are rather large, they should be half to a quarter their current size, but they're really yummy and chewy.

title: This is My Favorite. Judge Me, I'm Boring.
text: I wish the look, name, and flavor were more interesting, but cuss, it's good, and I love it more than others. I said it. There. Keep judging me. It's chocolate, it's brownie. It's Jennifer Anistin compared to Angelina Jolie but I love it and you shouldn't judge my love.

author: MH27
title: Best brownie ice cream
text: Love this ice cream the brownies are so soft and delicious

author: David M
title: Dry crumbly brownies... so sad :(
text: Usually we love this — it’s actually our favorite ice cream of all time! But recently we’ve got some very bad batches with dried out, crusted brownies. instead of being rich and chewy, it just tastes old and freezer brunt. It’s real sad because we usually love it.

author: MMR68
title: Chocolate & more Chocolate!!!
text:
This will satisfy any craving for chocolate (and I mean GOOD CHOCOLATE)!
Great ice cream with moist and chewy brownie with NO NUTS... how I prefer them.
Just chocolate, fudge, chewy goodness. My new favorite when I want the BEST chocolate fix.

author: Ari1
title: Nasty!!!
text: Tastes like I am eating a cold, raw ball of chocolate Cake Flour Dough with glass of chocolate milk with a bitter aftertaste wasted my money no brownie chunks, creaminess, or richness just a cold mess. Need to definitely fix the recipe ASAP. UGH

author: hailley564
title: Dry brownies
text: I usually buy half baked because the brownies are really good so I decided to go straight for the source. Unfortunately the fudge brownie flavor has brownie chunks that are dry making it more of a chocolate flavor than a fudge brownie flavor.

author: heatherrrrrrr
title: bad brownies
text: this has been my favourite flavour for a while but the recent pint I bought was different. The brownies that used to be soft are rock hard and unpleasant to chew, and don't taste good. Very disappointing, won't be buying more for a while.

author: eatass445
title: Greatest of all time
text: This is the greatest ice cream of all time. I eat it every week. I don't even care if my arteries get clogged up. I am willing to die for this ice cream. Buy it and eat it, it will change your life. If i could give 1000 stars I would.

author: Celly
title: I love it! <3
text:
I've bought it a few times now, and i am usally very happy about it. Cookie Dough and this one are my favorites!
I only had it one time, where the brownies weren't perfect, but i know, how hard it is to deliver ice cream perfectly.

author: LikeemFudgelike
title: Crumbly Brownies
text: Three pints in last 6 months had crumbly brownies instead of the decadent fudge brownie I have come to love. Sent email to B&Js to let them know. Looking at other reviews, this seems like an ongoing issue. I await a response.

author: leahzc07
title: Best flavor of any ice cream ever!
text: I have never had a chocolate ice cream so rich and delicious, and the brownie chunks are the perfect texture. It's not too sweet with a hint of salt that just makes the perfect combination. This would be my last meal on Earth.

author: Boys mom
title: Keep getting rotten brownies
text: Just like so many other people are saying I keep getting containers that have the white crumbled spoiled brownie instead of the normal soft brown chewy brownie. What is the problem? How hard could this possibly be to fix

author: Peterha
title: OG CFB
text: Chocolate fudge brownie is super legit. Actually, all the true original flavors are delicious. There is stuff in here called a classic flavor that certainly is post sale to Unilever, therefore definitely not classic.

author: itsrose
title: I LUUUV CHOCOLATE!
text: Tasted this for the first time last month - LOVE IT... Hooked... it is tasty & chocolatey enough that you dont need to over eat! Satisfies my sweet tooth & chocolate craving! On my grocery list at this very moment!

author: Mariocheese42
title: Gluten free PLEAASE!!
text: Before my family went gluten free this was my favorite flavor but I can't have it anymore, if it was possible that you could find a way to make some of your flavors gluten free that would be AMAZING! Thank You!!

title: Crunchy brownies
text: I’ve had 2 pints now that contain crunchy and weird tasting brownies. The ice cream was purchased on 2 separate occasions. I’m disappointed that I can’t seem to get the brownies the way they are supposed to be.

author: MaefromBrooklyn
title: THE BROWNIE PIECES ARE ALWAYS WHITE AND CRUMBLY
text: please fix this. I’ve already contacted customer service about this. This is my third time buying from a completely different grocery store and I got white crumbled nasty pieces instead of brownie.... AGAIN

author: kailey123
title: Pretty good
text: I bought this icecream about 5 days ago and it’s pretty good. You do need to add more brownies though and maybe lower the size and make them smaller but add more...other then that the flavor is immaculate

author: Camille
title: My Favorite Ice Cream
text: Im so surprised to see this has such a low rating because this is the BEST ice cream I’ve had to date. The chocolate flavor is so strong and the brownie adds such a nice texture. So happy this exists.

author: Kinley
title: still amazing
text: I don't know why people are complaining as this ice cream has been and forever will be amazing. This is by far my favorite flavor, I don't know what changed about the brownie but I like it either way.

author: Wittyfamily
title: Not the same!
text: I haven’t had chocolate fudge brownie in years and my husband surprised me with it tonight and it’s gross now. Thin tasting. No longer rich and delicious. Just terrible. Not worth a single calorie!

author: verystrange61
title: Double Chocolate Heaven on Earth!
text: If chocolate is what you're craving, then this is your ice cream! Absolutely delicious in it's simplicity. While this might be a little "heavy" for a daily treat, it's a perfect weekend splurge!

author: Amie
title: Sad about the brownies
text: I usually buy cheaper ice creams and thought I'd treat myself to this. There was maybe 6 pieces of brownie in the first layer and bowl. The remainder had zero brownies. Very sad and disappointing.

author: maskee11
title: Good but the brownies
text: The chocolate ice cream and fudge was good but I went to the dentist and they said nothing chewy that could get stuck to your teeth, I was hoping for som good brownies but they were too chewy

author: Robie32
title: Love it!
text: I can't recall the first time I tried this flavor, but I haven't been able put it down. Growing up I was never a fan of chocolate ice cream, but the Chocolate Fudge Brownie has won me over!!!

author: Kannde
title: I am in love with this flavor
text: I absolutely love chocolate fudge brownie! It is a chocolate paradise but it is surprisingly not overly sweet. When the brownies are nice and moist it makes for a wonderful experience!!!

author: icecreamlover101
title: Not so good
text: I love ben and jerry but not so much after the last two ice cream pints I had were a hard one with cookie dough and now the brownie they just are living up to the expedition.

author: Buttercup
title: The best!!!
text: So surprised to see any bad reviews!! This is so rich and chocolatey with perfect chewy bites of brownies! It’s my go to on a bad day! One of my favorite ice cream flavors.

author: Jen1238975
title: Best flav ever
text: I bought this thinking it would be ok but wow this really impressed me the brownie is so good that is why I rated 5 stars so you should really buy it you won’t regret it

title: So chocolate that I absolutely can't get enough!
text: So satisfying every time. I can hardly wait until I get another carton of ben and Jerry ice cream! It tastes absolutely amazing and satisfying every time I purchase it!

author: icecreamlover2001
title: Usually a fan but
text: Ben and Jerry's is my family's favorite ice cream but lately we had to stop buying because the ice cream is really dry, especially the Chocolate Fudge Brownie flavor.

author: AmandaFromAustin
title: when it's good it's very very good but...
text: When the brownies are all dried out and crumbly, it's terrible. :( And you can't return it to the retailer, so whatcha gonna do, throw out 3-4 bucks of ice cream. :(

author: Ultrarunner
title: Had a bad batch but they've corrected it again!
text: My favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor, it sounds like they had a few issues in the past few months but lately they've been 100% lately. Perfect consistency and creamy!

author: ice22
title: chewy fudgey brownies
text: Love this ice cream it has to be the best chocolate ice cream of all time! Not only are the brownies delicious but the ice cream its self is very rich and creamy.

author: anne1975
title: So sad :(
text: Was really looking forward to having this but when I opened it there were white crusty brownies and only a few throughout the ice cream. Extremely disappointing.

author: Ash2
title: Problem fixed!!
text: For a few months now the brownies have been crumbly and a blonde color but for the past couple weeks I haven’t gotten one like it! Brownies are back to normal!

author: Taylor1909
title: Chocolate Creamy
text: I can eat an entire pint myself! Their chocolate ice cream is darker then most super fresh and creamy and the chewy deliciously brownies are to die for. Omg!

title: woohoo that's some good ice cream
text: perfect chocolate ice creaminess with GENEROUS chunks of chewy gooey fudgy brownies. chocolate and chocolate go so good together in this amazing flavor.

author: V Vargas
title: Love At First Bite !!
text: I have been eating this ice cream flavor for years!! It always satisfies my chocolate cravings!! Ssssoooooo sooooo good. Makes me feel happy when im sad

author: Sara G
title: Crusty Brownies
text: Bought this today and the brownies were extremely dried out, crusty and discoloured. The texture was very unappetizing and I had to throw out the pint.

author: PrettiPeaches08
title: SOOOOO GOOD!
text: Whenever I go to the grocery store, this is the only flavor that I look for. The only thing that would make this better is a chocolate fudge core. ^_^

author: Tarik
title: Best ice cream ive ever had in my life ❤
text: I love ben and jerry chocolate fudge, i buy it twice a week and im in love with this ice cream, i can never image my weekends without it seriously :)

author: Pinkflower22
title: All time favorite
text: All these old review are not relevant, this stand to be the hands down best flavor from ben and Jerry's. The brownies are always chewy and delicious.

author: rudyman
title: It's so good!
text: This ice cream is a chocaholic's dream! I was surprised to see such a low rating on this, it's literally one of the best flavors from Ben & Jerry's!

author: bellaboo
title: WOW AMAZING
text: I HAVE ALWAYS LOVED THIS ICE CREAM, BUT WOW THE BROWNIES ARE HUUUUGE NOW! OMG! WOW I WILL BUY THOUSANDS! Please do not ever get rid of this!

author: Ashley37829
title: horrible
text: This gave me really bad diarrhea after having it. I am not lactose intolerant, but this stuff made me destroy the toilet, don’t recommend it

author: MurphyMom
title: Love the flavor
text: I have eaten this since I was a kid and it’s my favorite. I love the brownie taste mixed with the chocolate ice cream. Definitely recommend.

author: r2dee2
title: My absolute fave
text: There are other chocolate abundant flavors, but this is my absolute favorite. I am honestly disappointed when my grocery store is out. A+

author: Jennyisateacher
title: Good ice cream but where are the brownies?
text: Just finished a pint of this and I was disappointed. I remember there being more, better brownies. But, the ice cream is still delicious!

author: Just Julie
title: An enduring favorite
text: Rich chocolate ice cream with chewy chocolate brownie pieces? Yes, please! Seriously, my current goal is to eat less than a pint a week.

author: DanniDirtyMoney
title: Forever Flavor
text: It’s the most chocolate in one little spoonful. The chocolate ice cream is alllll fudge and it has the best little chewy brownie bites

author: Carbi
title: The most amazing ice cream I ever had
text: This is the one flavor that I can’t get enough. It’s the best ice cream I ever had and chocolate lovers will definitely love this one.

author: EmilyRenee
title: Nothing Better
text: If you are a chocolate lover - you need this in your life. I've never been a huge ice cream person but I can eat this every night!!!

author: Amiriam 7
title: Delicious
text: I've been in this wonderful ice cream for a long time and it is the best ice cream if you guys got it even has brownies in it

author: Ksp0226
title: Disappointed
text: I used to love this ice cream but the one I purchased yesterday had chalky brownies and just tasted awful. Such a let down.

author: GHOULSKI
title: Delicious!
text: Perfect for chocolate lovers, the brownies taste wonderful and it goes together perfectly with the chocolate ice cream.

author: KatB
title: Simple but delicious
text: The chocolate base ice cream is rich and creamy, and the brownie pieces are huge and gooey. I love this ice cream!

author: Derpo
title: AMAZING
text: SOOOO GOOD!!! Brownie is always nice and chewy and the chocolate ice cream is so rich in flavor and very creamy

author: phoebsters101
title: Texture
text: The taste was okay, but it was missing the smooth, creamy richness that makes chocolate ice cream what it is.

author: Brian23
title: Hard brownie pieces
text: I bought this today and the brownie pieces were hard the ice cream also tasted like frozen chocolate yogurt.

author: Sash21
title: More Brownies Please!!
text: This is my all time favorite ice cream and every time I buy it. There’s seems to be less and less brownies

author: huneybee143
title: Loving Chocolate
text: One of my very favorite flavors. Love the chunks of brownies and the deep chocolate flavor the ice cream.

author: sydneyan
title: One of my favorites!
text: Every time I go to the grocery store I buy a mini cup of Chocolate Fudge Brownie! It's so good, I love it.

author: carolll
title: best flavorrrrr
text: these people don't know it, this is one of the best flavors of ben and jerry's, compliments to ze chief

author: Harley
title: FAVORITE FLAVOR
text: I have tried so many different flavors but always go back to this original favorite! CAN NOT beat it!!!

author: Mikayla
title: Great!
text: I always get this kind it’s so good and the brownie chunks are so chewy in delicious! 10/10 recommend!

author: Amanda13
title: The Best
text: It’s the only flavor that I absolutely love. I’m not a vanilla fan so I love that it is all chocolate!

author: Maryann
title: Not rich, bland
text: The brownies are hard, and the chocolate ice cream is sugary but not rich. Tried it once and done

author: Syd527
title: Yummmm
text: I’m not usually a big fan of chocolate based ice creams but this one was delightfully addicting.

author: alexia
title: Amazing!
text: So chocolatey and the brownies add the perfect texture and flavour to this delicious ice cream!

author: Nathan
title: Love!!
text: My favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry’s. The brownie pieces are so good mixed with the chocolate.

author: gabbs
title: AMAZING
text: I have tried this ice cream on multiple occasions, it is seriously the best ice cream ever!

author: Zar001
title: Huge fan of CFB
text: CFB is my go to whenever I need as chocolate fix. I prefer CFB over most other flavors.

author: Kirst23
title: Yum!
text: My favorite hands down! The brownies are super chewy and perfect for a chocolate fix!!

author: NoNickname
title: The best flavor ever!
text: This is the best flavor ever! Having all of the chunks in it just ties it together.

author: Lisjes
title: Luv it
text: I buy this one all the time, the flavour is so delicious. A perfect combination

author: Nich8801
title: Sweet brownies with creamy chocolate
text: Fudge brownie is absolutely one of my favs!!! I get upset when I can’t find it.

author: katie2586
title: Love it
text: the brownie was so fudgey and amazing. I love it! Couldnt be happier with it

author: molly76
title: Great Flavor!
text: I've had this a few times and absolutely love it. Would highly recommend.

author: T5H0C3
title: Addictive yumminess!
text: I buy this for a treat and it satisfies every fudgy-needing itch I have!

author: Mom3
title: Love it
text: It's my go to icecream cant find a better brand. I'm never disappointed.

author: Cinndie
title: My favorite!!
text: I've been this for years and nothing compares to my brownies! Yummmy!!

author: CFBlover
title: Great features
text: I bought this and shared it with a friend and it’s our favorite flavor

author: curlygirl
title: Fav
text: My go to every time. This and chocolate fudge brownie pint slices.

author: marianne
title: It’s Perfect
text: i get this flavor every time. great flavor for chocolate lovers!!

author: chambo_mommy
title: MY FAVORITE
text: I've tried many other brands and this one by far is my favorite!!

author: Twizzler84
title: Amazeballs!!!
text: Obsessed with this flavor. It's the best of any brand out there.

author: Jlgx2
title: Favorite
text: My all time favorite flavor, wish my local stores still sold it

author: iscream
title: classic flavor
text: This is one of the oldest and the best! I love ICE CREAM!!!!!!!

author: Kylie27
title: Great!
text: This is my favorite ben and Jerry's ice cream flavor by far!

author: JasmineLee
title: Love this flavor!!
text: I bought this a while ago and I’ve loved it ever since!

author: The Bad Keeper
title: Nam
text: I bought this for a week ago, its so good. I love it.

author: Eddie
title: Great!
text: This has to be one of my top two flavors of all time.

author: Chocolate addict
title: One of my favorites!
text: Rich and chocolatey! Mmmmmm! Love the brownie chunks.

author: Shonda
title: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
text: It's One Of My Favorite Flavors....................

author: Ev25
title: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
text: Fantastic flavor would highly recommend to everyone

title: Love Ben & Jerry's ice-cream
text: I love this flavor!! Thank You So Much ❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤

author: Jennnn
title: So good!!
text: Delicious!! Can't wait until I get more !!!!!!!!!!

author: Choclate Fudge Lover
title: This Flavor Is Great
text: I buy this flavor almost every week. It is so good

author: OB04
title: GREAT!!!!:)
text: GREAT ICE CREAM OVERALL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

author: Ptteckert
title: Toooo good!!
text: The pint slices are amazing! Better than the pint!

author: Scoopy sue
title: Just perfect
text: Delicious refreshing base, outstanding marshmallow swirl and yummy truffles - I love this flvaour!

author: BabyDontGo
title: Spot on...again!
text: Love this! I am a lover of Ben & Jerry's, have been for as long as I can remember and while some flavors are not typically my thing, this one is awesome! With the ice cream you get a smooth, creamy and full bodied chocolate malt ice cream, combined with a beautifully whipped marshmallow fluff type swirl. The ice cream mixed with this smooth heavenly marshmallow swirl would be enough for me but the addition of the cookie crumbled covered fudge bits, its joygasmic! Everything about this is a win, I really hope that this flavor stays around for a long time. If you want a smooth, creamy, satisfying chocolate ice cream....well, this one is for you!

author: Pnw1989
title: Love the truffles not the regular as much
text:
Didn't realize there is a Chocolate Shake it and. Chocolate Shake it Truffles. The Truffles version is hands downs better. The difference being that one has salted fudge bits and one has cookie covered truffle bits. The truffles are gooey are delicious. The fudge is dry and chewy.
Other than that I love everything else about it, malted ice cream with marshmallow is perfect combo. Not to rich and I can eat a whole pint without being sick! Haha probably not a good thing.

author: eastwest
title: This is my dream flavor
text: Where to begin. The explosive marshmallows? The creamy chocolate? The chewy truffles?

author: Cree
title: Disappointed
text: Something has gone terribly wrong at Ben & Jerry's. After my 2nd disappointing pint from them I was really hoping for a win. This flavor was incredibly bland. You can't call something chocolate malt just because it is light brown. I could not detect any malt flavor whatsoever and could barely taste chocolate. Even then I think it may have just been the truffles. The truffles were ok and there were plenty, but even the marshmallow swirl was also bland. Sweet tasting and I liked the soft texture but none of the flavors that were supposed to be in this were! Unfortunately I forgot to use my coupon and paid for this junk.

author: KirstenBuckeye
title: Hoped for more marshmallow and truffles!
text: I am eating a pint of it right now and the ice cream is delicious. I wish the truffles weren’t as sparse though and wish there were more marshmallow swirl. I’m about halfway through the pint and can still hardly see any marshmallow.

author: NaeWavyGravy
title: Disappointed
text: I bought this a couple of days ago and to be honest that's a long time to have Ben & Jerry's in the house. This one really isn't for me. I don't like it at all. It doesn't really taste like a chocolate milkshake to me more of a chocolate malted base with a lite marshmallow swirl. The truffle could be a little smaller which would make it have more also I'd they were a darker chocolate or a richer chocolate maybe it would be better I'm not sure but this one doesn't work for me.

author: Kaya
title: Bland and Odd Texture
text: This one missed the mark for me. I understand the texture is meant to be more like a milkshake but I expected something different and it felt grainy. The flavor was bland for me, almost no milk chocolate flavor, closer to sweet cream. Even the marshmallow swirl was nothing like the S'mores swirl, it had a very artificial texture. The truffles were pretty good, but not as much cookie crunch as I expected and there weren't many of them. Overall, I'm disappointed. I love Ben and Jerry's but this one did not live up to the label.

author: bgdl26
title: Loved it but needs more truffles
text: I've been obsessed with Tonight Dough for years and have yet to find a new flavor that I like as much until this one! I loved it! Tastes like a chocolate milk shake, love the marsh-mellow swirl and the cookie covered truffles were amazing, I just wish there were more in my pint. It seemed like I only had 4 or 5 but clearly there should be a lot more based on the photo. Anyway, it's still amazing.

author: NotAChocoholic
title: Average and Boring
text: This may just be my anger speaking becuase I asked for one thing for Valentine's Day: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake truffle. And what do I get? The most average chocolate icecream you can possibly from the Ben and Jerry's section of the freezer aisle. If you're gonna spend your money on something expensive, spend it on something good and flavorful.

author: Chicksluvrock
title: Good, but not great
text: I was very excited to try this flavor, and although it was good, it isn’t as good as I thought it would be. The texture of the ice cream is wonderfully creamy, but I would have liked a more intense malty-chocolatey flavor....it’s pretty mild. The marshmallow swirls and truffles are tasty though....except mine could of used more truffles! Overall good but I think I’ll stick with my favorite flavor - peanut butter world!

author: Chocolover779
title: Unimpressed
text: Overall I wasn’t impressed with this flavor, while it is very sweet, there isn’t much chocolate flavor. I don’t care for the fudge morsels either, they’re quite dry. The marshmallow is the best part! I will go back to Chocolate Therapy for my next pint.

author: Jasper02
title: Will not purchase again
text: Very bland ice cream and truffles. The only good thing was the marshmallow swirl, of which there was not enough. Only had about 1 tablespoon of marshmallow and 5 truffles in the whole pint.

author: Ice cream man
title: Yummy
text: Creamy smooth Malt ice cream! Need I say more? I think it’s a great idea no ice cream company ( at least in my area) sells malt ice cream so I’m happy Ben and Jerry’s came out with this!

author: Carrie999
title: My new favorite!
text: I love everything about this new flavor! I ordered it online and it arrived today. I told myself that I would just try a bit and now I can’t stop eating it!

author: samanthapaige
title: Underwhelmed
text: I was excited to try this but it fell short. Weird texture, off taste, the truffles were not good. Disappointed! Will stick with my Half Baked from now on.

author: zoey
title: not worth the calories
text: the chocolate ice cream was okay.... nothing to rave about, but the marshmallow swirls didn’t taste like anything. the truffles were very sparse, there were only like 5 of them in the entire pint and i wasn’t a fan of the taste or texture. this flavor pint just didn’t work for me. i usually love ben & jerrys but kinda just wanted to throw this one out while eating it.

author: Hayls
title: Kind of bland
text: The truffles were extremely bland. The ice cream & marshmallow swirl were good but it was just lacking in overall flavor & chunks

author: SarahSS
title: Tastes like a milkshake!
text: I had to try one of the new flavors, they looked so tempting! The ice cream flavor in this is so delicious and tastes like you're drinking a malt milkshake. There's a lot of marshmallow (my favorite part) and a good amount of truffles, not TOO many but certainly not sparse. I will definitely purchase again, but only after I try the other two new ones!!

author: AllD
title: This is everything I've ever wanted in icecream
text: I found this flavor yesterday after not buying ice-cream in a while. IT IS AMAZING. It tastes like you're eating a perfectly made milkshake. There's a little bit of some dryer flavor in the chocolate-cookie covered fudge but it levels out the entire flavor (one of the gripes I have with half baked is that it is too rich / gooey) and the marshmallow swirls tie it all together. Please never get rid of this and if you do let me know so I can stock up forever.

author: Turtledark
title: A whole lot of meh
text: Bought this a few days ago after finally finding it again. Maybe I built the flavors up in my head but for a Ben and Jerry's flavor, this seriously lacked. I LOVE malt, marshmallow, and truffles but it was just so bland. I tasted no malt but the ice cream was really creamy. The light chocolate taste was nice. The marshmallow was pretty consistent with every other flavor that includes it. I'm a major fish food fan. The truffles were what I had been looking forward to the most. I really liked the ones in the chillin the roast flavor. The truffles in this though had NO flavor! The only chocolate hint I tasted was from the thin coating; definitely not a "cookie crunch". Needless to say, I was disappointed. It wasn't bad. I mean, I love ice cream! I just really wish there was a real taste. If I wanted to vanilla, I would have gotten vanilla.

author: Dumb
title: They changed the fudge pieces
text: This used to be my all time favorite ice cream. Bought tons every time it was on sale, gobbled it down and then bought more at full price. Love love loved it. Until they changed the cookie covered fudge pieces. Apparently the new fudge pieces are salted and it destroys what this ice cream used to be about. That cookie crust was so well done and the fudge melted in your mouth. For whatever reason Ben and Jerry’s has decided to stop making a superior product. Instead they cop out and use salt to pique people’s taste buds. We don’t need more salt in our lives or diets! Bring back the original fudge pieces and make this ice cream great again! I can barely eat it since I discovered the unnecessary and “wool over our eyes” awful salted fudge mix up.

author: Tomas
title: No No No!
text: Picked up about 10 various flavors the other day and "Chocolate Shake It" was by far the worst. It was awful! Kept thinking it would get better as I ate, but gave up and tossed the last half away. I'll stick with my "Tonight Dough".

author: Laurenisawesome
title: Get the Phish Food instead
text: The malt ice cream flavor is good, the cookie truffles are what brings the whole ice cream down. The truffles are bitter and too big. The size keeps it frozen and hard. The marshmallow swirl is amazing though. Then again why not just have the Phish Food which I think is similar but has the caramel to make it even better.

author: Breezyj
title: Excellence!
text: I often feel a twinge of guilt purchasing Ben & Jerry’s over our many local brands, but yet again, the thoughtful, indulgent flavor combos are a league of their own.

author: KaitlynC
text: I was extremely excited when I bought this icecream, and don’t regret it, the only thing I did not like about it was the chocolate truffles. They were extremely hard, and I felt like they were unnecessary in the icream. Other than that, the icecream was great, the taste was amazing, the marshmallow was great. 50/50

title: Absolutely love it!
text: I personally don’t like an overly strong chocolate flavor in my ice cream. I like black and white milkshakes, frozen custard, and chocolate malt because they all have a dialed down chocolate flavor. This ice cream is perfect for me, and the marshmallow is a perfect compliment. Sometimes it’s nice to have cleaner, more subtle flavors as opposed to overwhelming concoctions of bourbon pretzel cheesecake ice cream with peanut butter salted caramel brownie chunks or something equally extra. Really well done!

author: FuzzyGut
title: Yes please!
text: What an awesome new flavor! First off, it really does taste like a chocolate milkshake. It’s light and creamy with the marshmallow swirl and the truffles are yummy too. Good job on this new flavor, B&J! Yum!

author: Just Me
title: Truffles were bitter
text: My least favorite B&J flavor ever! The truffles were almost "whiskey" tasting, strong and bitter. I couldn't even force myself to try and eat it. First time I have ever thrown ice cream away.

author: Andrew1989
title: Bland
text: This flavor is not very good, overall. Its just basic chocolate ice cream with a few dots of marshmellow fluff with these really mealy truffles that taste like nothing- very disappointing.

author: brianaa
title: good but dont like the truffles
