text: i loved the chocolate and marshmallow. thought i found the perfect flavor but the truffles tasted off and were too heavy compared to the consistency of the rest of product.

author: Teecee
title: Malt Shake Dreams Come True
text: I love malts so this is so delicious! The truffles are good too along w/ the marshallow bits. It's my favorite B&J's flavor & I hope it never stops getting made :D

author: Girly girl
title: Ice cream perfection
text: I’m hoping this flavor doesn’t disappear because it’s the best I’ve ever tried. Love all the yummy marshmallow creme and decadent truffles!

author: Icecreamfan4life
title: Cool idea but wasn't quite a hit for me
text: Bought this pint and the cheesecake flavor a few days ago(haven't tried the other just yet). Thinking this would be something fun and different to try(even though I'm not a big chocolate ice cream fan aside from Wendy's Frosties). And have to say as I sit here eating it now. The Malt base does remind me of a Wendy's Frosty(which I enjoyed). But I honestly don't think that it pairs all that well with the marshmallow swirl or the cookie truffles(which I've gotten plenty of those and not fully sure if I like them or not. Great texture and pretty soft to munch on. But taste wise may not be my thing).

author: lme2813
title: Used to be delicious
text: We have loved this ice cream for a while and have bought many many pints. Ove the last couple of months I have bought it at different stores and we found some of these are horrible. The truffle pieces look nothing like the picture on this site or what they're supposed to look like. Unfortunately I threw them all away so I don't have one but they're little hard pieces of stale tasting chocolate bits. It ruins the ice cream and I was blaming the store thinking maybe they weren't kept frozen but I found the same thing when I purchased elsewhere. Not sure if it was a problem at the factory or if a change was made to the ice cream but wither way it ruins it and I can't keep wasting money on bad ice cream. I don't mind paying more for good quality but I'm not getting it anymore with this flavor and it's so disappointing.

author: Missa
title: Rich but subtle
text: I have had this flavor twice now and it has hit the spot each time. It's subtle but it has deep flavor. It's very much like biting into a chocolate milkshake. I could do without the marshmallow fluff but it does have a nice texture and it breaks up the heaviness of the ice cream. A lot of people are reviewing that this flavor is bland but I like it. I hope it continues to be an option for years to come because I will be buying a shameful quantity of pints.

author: violet616
title: Great idea!
text: I love a chocolate malt and loved the idea. While I found the ice cream itself to be delightfully creamy, the truffles certainly satisfying and marshmallow cream a pleasant addition I found the overall product to leave a strange aftertaste, so much so that I tossed out the pint after one paltry serving. Disappointing, but I intend to keep trying your new and novel flavors :)

author: Isitdahfridge
title: Is it the stores’ fault?
text: I bought two pints of this flavor, each from a different store, and I was quite surprised. One was from a gas station, the other from a grocery store. The one from the gas station was grainy, but my guess it was just beginning to form ice crystals (maybe the door to their freezer room was slightly open). The one from the grocery store was perfectly smooth (other than the chunks).

author: Jenniferu1
title: Love this!
text: I bought this today and couldnt wait to try it. I can definitely taste the malt in the ice cream. With the marshmallow it reminded me of a mallo cup candy, without the coconut, from years ago but way better as I'm not a fan of coconut. I just had a few bites tonight but plan on putting some hot fudge on it to make a sunday tomorrow and I'm sure it will taste like heaven! I eat in moderation!

author: ChrisColby
title: Good flavor but lacking.
text: A strong malt chocolate base and the marshmallow swirl make for a good set up, but this flavor was really lacking in mix ins. The truffles in my pints were spaced too far apart and with too few in general. This flavor needed more of a bite or crunch (perhaps a second mix in, like cookie crumbs) to reach its full potential. A good flavor (thanks to the base and swirl) but certainly lacking

author: duffy
title: My new favorite
text: In the past month I have bought a pint of this flavor every week. The texture is different to other flavors, more like a milkshake, which to me gives it some novelty and frankly I really like it. The chocolate cookie pieces alone are a little dry but pack great flavor and with the marshmallow swirls which are more liquid and the new texture it works together to make a truly great pint.

author: SusanHop
title: Fabulously delicious!
text: I'm not a fan of marshmallow, but the chocolate malted milkshake ice cream, plus the truffle sold me on trying it. The awesomeness of the marshmallow was a wonderful surprise! The ice cream its self is perfect, though a bit more malt wouldn't go amiss in my opinion :-). The truffles are divine and blend the three ingredients into a satisfying and delicious ice cream experience.

author: Joelle
title: meh
text: The ice cream itself is so good--malty chocolate, perfect. The marshmellow swirl is good and in good ratio but those fudge clusters! They're kind of bitter and just not what I was hoping for. The whole experience ends up being pretty one-note without a fun texture element. This one is so close to great, but unfortunately just not.

author: Kaylazies
title: Best flavor on EARTH
text: Literally my new absolute FAVORITE icecream ever. It’s PERFECT. It’s all my favorite flavors together all in one and that chocolate cookie swirl is to die for and omg that graham cracker is just heaven, not too chocolately and that marshmallow icecream just ties it aallllll together. Amazing. Exquisite. Must have with every meal.

author: Goldberry7
title: Palatable, but awfully bland
text: I agree with other folks remarking on the blandness. There weren't many truffles, but that was actually a good thing since they were tasteless and ruined the bite on my spoon. Since my nightly bowl of B and J's is my only form of pleasure being 8 months pregnant, I felt the need to write a review. Going back to Chocolate Therapy.

author: Brinkley28
title: Save your money!
text: I bought this ice cream from Safeway in Pasadena, MD. I was excited to try it since it was a chocolate ice cream base but man was I wrong. This ice ream had such an odd texture and tasted like ice milk. Like they just added chocolate syrup and like it get freezer brunt, I do not recommend this flavor to anyone!

author: Sarahmuffin37
title: So much marshmallow
text: At first I wasn't excited to try this flavor but as I love anything marshmallow, I tried it. The marshmallow swirl is out of this world! Usually it says marshmallow but you can barely taste it, this product has a good amount of marshmallow that tastes like marshmallow! I would HIGHLY recommend this product!

author: y2flu
title: Surprisingly awesome
text: I'm not a big fan of chocolate ice creams, but I was looking for a new flavor to try and this was the only one they had, so I bought a pint. Wow, is it good! I love the truffles and the marshmallow is awesome. I've bought 3 or 4 more pints since buying the first one, and I'm about to go buy another one.

author: Mewples
title: My new favorite flavor!
text: Whenever I'm craving ice cream this is the first thing I search for now. Others must have the same idea because half of the time its completely sold out at my grocery store! I love that the ice cream itself isnt too sweet which makes the marshmallow a perfect compliment. Please keep this flavor around ~

author: Beeb
title: New changes not welcome
text: I have been eating this flavor and only this flavor since it's release. It was everything I ever wanted in ice cream. This ice cream really needed the crunch from the truffle. And the salt with marshmallow? Ew. It needs the dark chocolate to go with that sugary sweet. So disappointed in the changes.

author: Nicole8
title: TERRIBLE FLAVOR
text:
Upon hearing the name of the flavor, I could not wait to try it!
WHAT A HUGE LET DOWN!!!
It was practically tasteless. The ice cream literally has no taste.
I love Ben and Jerry's ice cream but this truly missed the mark for me. Ill stick to my favorites Americone Dream and Vanilla Caramel Fudge

title: New favorite
text: I bought this because I love malted ice cream and I’m so glad I did. It’s delicious on its own but the addition of the marshmallow swirl and fudge covered cookie crumble really cemented it’s place in my heart. 10/10 Was thinking about a second bowl before I finished the first haha!

author: Azsedo
title: Dirt
text: I’m eating it right now and it tastes pretty much like a chocolate, dirt, and grass blend.

author: molly_yum
title: My New Favorite!!
text: I bought this flavor on a whim, since my grocery store only had this flavor and another I don't like when I went. OMG, it is my new favorite. So unique and delicious. I just wish there were more yummy truffles!!! I will be buying this regularly now. YUM!!!!!

author: sam347
title: great flavor
text: im so confused i dont think i have a single truffle in mine? i came on here to see if that happened to anyone else and people are saying they are sparse. i've eaten about 1/4th and have not run into a single truffle. good ice cream but that is disappointing

author: Etotheparpar
title: BEST ICE CREAM I'VE EVER HAD
text: I slightly consider myself to be an ice cream enthusiast, and Ben & Jerry's almost always puts out great products. BUT CHOCOLATE SHAKE IT IS ON ANOTHER LEVEL! It is so amazing, especially the truffles. Waiting for it to be restocked at my local Safeway!!!

author: LaceLu88
title: Marshmallow Cream yes please!
text: I was pleasantly surprised to find this flavor tonight in my grocery store and had to try. I was not disappointed! All flavors with your marshmallow cream are good but this one is AMAZING! And this is from an Phish Food addict! I will be back for more!

author: TaylorK
title: Very disappointing
text: This was totally lacking in flavor. Was expecting more of a malt flavor and all i got was a watered down chocolate. It was just really disappointing for me and did not live up to what the package promised. I didn't even bother finishing the container.

author: LARob
title: Awesome!!!
text: This ice cream is delicious! Tons of marshmellow fluff and chocolate fudge bits and creamy smooth chocolate malt ice cream, what is not to like, my god it is heaven! Anyone disappointed with this...all I can say is you must be a hard person to please!

author: TxGalNFL
title: Malty goodness
text: I love chocolate malts. Summers drinking a chocolate malt with my grandmother under the shade of the pecan tree come to mind. Add in a swirl of marshmallow and some chunks of truffles (not cookies therefore not crunchy) make this a top fav for me.

author: Willow
title: Best ice cream ever
text: Bought it because I'm always looking for a chocolate ice cream with marshmallow and no nuts. This is what I have been searching years for! Went back and bought all they had and now I can't find it anymore so came to his site to try and find it.

author: BSmith
title: Amazing flavor
text: Other than the all too limited edition Chocolate Cherry Garcia, (an even better version of my all time favorite B&J’s flavor), Chocolate Shake It is the best new flavor released in a very long time. Everything about it is absolutely delicious.

author: Alex19
title: Great ice cream flavor, not so great truffles
text: The malt chocolate shake ice cream flavor is amazing, especially with the marshmallow. However, the truffles taste like artificial and fake chocolate. I was really disappointed by the truffle flavor, but the overall ice cream was good.

author: Lindsay222
title: What a great idea!!!
text: This is my most favorite ice cream flavor ever. I would eat it almost every day if the Target stores in my area would stock more of it. It’s so delicious. The malty chocolate with the marshmallow and fudge pieces is the best creation

author: Lil__Eats
title: One of my favorites... ever.
text: This is for the ones who love a mild chocolate flavor. It reminds me of drinking Chocolate Egg Cream. I absolutely love this flavor and could eat it without all the marshmallow and chunks (but they just make it all the more better).

author: misskitty
title: Love at first spoonful!
text: This flavor was automatically bumped into my top three fave Ben & Jerry flavors. The ice cream really tastes like a chocolate malt milk shake! The marshmallow and truffles only amp up the experience. You must try this flavor!

author: Shakes
title: Very impressed
text: My favorite is boom chocolata. Although it's tough to pick a favorite. "Chocolate shake it" is right up there. Amazing flavors, texture, and just the right amount of marshmallow and truffles. Very impressed with this one.

author: madi
title: RUINED ICE CREAM FOR ME
text: The Walmarts in my area stopped carrying this flavor for some reason and now I have to find a replacement, since this one has become my go-to flavor. BUT I cannot eat any other ice cream anymore none live up to this stuff.

author: jessicasayles
title: My all time favorite!
text: For me this is just a perfectly balanced ice cream. It's not too sweet and a great mix of flavors. I love it so much I came to write this review. I'm pregnant with my second child now and I crave this flavor all the same!

author: NurseDominique
title: OMG Tastbud Heaven!!!
text: This is ther best flavor & icecream I have EVER had! EVER! I loved everything about this mixture. I need this in a gallon. Marshmallows, chocolate truffles & more yummy stuff. It has a slight chocolate malt taste too.

author: vonster
title: New fav!
text: Please make this more available! Found it once in our little corner store, but now that’s out and I haven’t seen it in Ralph’s nor Vons. Usually I don’t like chocolate ice cream, but this malt version is perfect!

author: Turtle702
title: Very nice!!
text: I am not even a huge chocolate fan but I saw the malted milkshake part and I wasn’t sold.. very nice flavor.. the truffles are soft and tasty and you can taste the milkshake! I would definitely purchase again!

author: ahh72145
title: Truffles need work
text: I bought 2 since it sounds delicious, and it is...except the truffles which are unfortunately terrible. But the malt chocolate ice cream and marshmallow is awesome so you can just eat around the icky bits :)

author: Sweets B
title: My Fav Ice Cream EVER BY FAR!!
text: I would buy out the stock at any store I could find it in because I loved this flavor so much! It even replaced my Half Baked addiction. Now I can barely find it and I am so sad. Please bring it back!!

author: MBrez
title: Good, but the Truffles version was GREAT
text: This is good, especially the malt milk chocolate and marshmallow swirls. But it was soooo much better with the chocolate truffles instead of sea salt caramel. Please go back to the non-caramel version!

author: Rachelcan719
title: Classic Malt Flavor
text: This ice cream changed my life and I can NEVER find it anymore. It tastes just like a classic malt when Dairy Queen and Sonic just don’t get it right. The marshmallow swirl makes it phenomenal as well.

author: Meeegsies
title: Soooo delicious!
text: Admittedly, I'm not usually a fan of chocolate ice cream, but this was milky enough, and I loved it. My kids loved it too, and ever since we had our first pint, we've been trying to get another one.

author: Maddy V
title: Amazing!
text: Bought this on sale because it looked yummy, and it's absolutely amazing! I don't buy a lot of ice cream, but I would definitively get this in the future and keep an eye out if I go to a B&J store.

author: Weeezoe2000
title: Bland, not good at all. Sadness.
text: I decided to try something new. Bad idea. This is very bland and the truffles taste odd. I didn’t taste any malt flavor, and the chocolate was weak. Im glad it was on sale so I only wasted 3.50.

author: MadMaxi
title: Best one since Cannoli
text: Please keep this flavor. I was so upset when you guys only did a limited batch of Cannoli. Such a tease. While Chocotherapy was my favorite since Cannoli...now this one tops all of them by far

author: Kimber
title: SO GOOD
text: I just bought this for the first time ever and it’s so good!!!!! It takes like a genuine chocolate milkshake. The marshmallow is amazing and the truffles are divine. My new go to.

author: Foxarazzi
title: Love it
text: Ignore the haters. If you love malt chocolate you’ll love this. Mine was smooth and creamy with tons of chunks of truffles and loads of marshmallow. Malt chocolate magic!

author: MontyC93
title: Its Ok.
text: 3.1 balls. Its just ok. Lots of better flavors out there. Its somehting to try, and if its the only flavor id eat it happily. But nothing special.

author: Brenda the Unicorn
title: Addicting!
text: My dad bought me this and I loved it. It's my favorite ice cream in the whole entire world! Thank you for this AMAZING ice cream flavor!

author: Tips
title: Nice try but miss
text: Love a great chocolate shake but this was too sweet, not sure what it was...not enough chocolate flavor. Might have tried adding malt.

author: Smoran
title: New Favorite
text: I looked for this flavor all over....finally found it. The marshmallow swirl is so creamy and satisfying. The truffles are amazing.

author: Aajj
title: One of the best!!
text: This variety holds its own against some of my all-time favorites such as Phish Food & Americone Dream. I buy it anytime I see it!

author: Ginah
title: My Favorite
text: This is the best ice cream! I love the truffles and marshmallow swirl, and how the ice cream tastes like a milkshake. Delicious!

author: brandologist
title: Chocolate Shake it
text: The most amazing flavor ever. I feel like I am eating a thick milk shake. I wish It was available more. I can never find it.

author: Coyoterose
title: So delicious!
text: I tried this flavor and loved it! Just enough chocolatey goodness paired with creamy heaven! Definitely will try again.

author: ShySharon
title: I feel sorry for my waistline
text: This is the best ice cream since Friendly’s Toasted Almond Fudge or Ben & Jerry’s White Russian or Pistachio Pistachio

author: birdie
title: Just found my favorite flavor
text: This is the one pint I need to make sure I don't demolish in one sitting. All restraint melts away with my happiness.

author: Chris MThanks
title: Good-ish
text: Good concept, but skip the malt. Leave it chocolate ice cream like phish food and keep other ingredients. Yum overall

author: Tosh
title: Finally malted ice cream
text: I love everything malted.. I was hoping for more of a malted flavor but still love this ice cream and will buy again

author: Guzziben
title: Best flavor ever
text: Can’t find this in the Minneapolis area anymore. Not sure if life is worth the trouble, please stock the shelves!

author: Brina257
title: Delicious!
text: If you like “phish food” this is so much like it just with a creamier texture. This is my new favorite!!

author: Rocko
title: GRRRREAT!
text: I was at the plant last weekend and thought I would give this a try! Really hit the spot. LOVED IT!!!

author: Deezee1979
title: Holy chocolate !
text: I tried this when it came out.. I am officially hooked! Its creamy, chocolatey, truffly goodness.

author: Rgz124
title: So good!
text: This is our new family favorite! It’s really hard to find so I hope it becomes more popular.

author: haliiii
title: SOOOO GOOD
text: Very good! One of my favorites definitely recommends it for anyone who hasn't tried it.

author: csorensen81
title: Marshmallow goodness
text: great chocolate malted ice cream with a sweet swirl of marshmallow!! Great new flavor.

author: Kingfish
title: My newest favorite!
text: I was hooked from the first bite. I love chocolate malts, and this one blew me away.

author: CDoo
title: Love the truffles
text: Super smooth chocolate ice cream. All around amazing flavor. I love the truffles

author: Maryjane22
title: The best!
text: Bought for my neice ...and it was delicious! Only problem ` cant buy it locally

author: MilkandCookies4thewin
title: TOO MUCH FUDGE 4 ME
text: It was good besides all the fudge. Other than that the ice cream was very good

author: AnnieH
title: yummmmmy
text: I bought this flavor today and it is so delicious! My new favorite flavor.

author: SCarlock
title: Loooooove
text: This may be my favorite ice cream ever!!!! I love the subtle malt flavor.

author: Noah
title: bland
text: they need to bring back a hazelnut ice cream because this is not good.

author: Clsi
title: Great combo of texture and flavor!
text: Tried this for the first time a couple of weeks ago. I’m hooked!

author: LizzyJax
title: Bring back the truffles!
text: It’s good, but I liked the truffles better than the fudge pieces!

author: Metalhead18
title: Wonderful.
text: Best flavor I've ever tried. I think it is perfection!

author: Siungit
title: Chocolate heaven!
text: Got this as one of my cones for my halfy birthday! Great for chocolate lovers! Very rich. Cookies add a nice crunch.

author: Marky Mark
title: The best chocolate ice cream ever
text: This is the flavor that won my heart by Ben and Jerry's. If you are some one who loves chocolate and/or chocolate ice cream then you need to try this because this one does not disappoint. You will want to be multiple pints because one pint just won't be enough. I could easily eat pints and pints of this deliciousness in a single day and I am not exaggerating. It really is the best chocolate ice cream I have ever had. They could have aptly named this one Brownie Batter because it really tastes like frozen a brownie. This is for all of us chocoholics out there. Thank you, Ben and Jerry's and please never discontinue this flavor! You have shown the rest that you are the best when you created this flavor.

author: FuzzyGut
title: So insanely good it’s stupid
text: Oh my god! If you love chocolate this is your ice cream and if you need a chocolate fix, this is your ice cream and if you’re not sure if you love chocolate this will be the ice cream to ensure you do! Up there with Chocolate Fudge Brownie and phish food, this is a new favorite of mine. So silly good I could eat 2 or 3 pints in one sitting. Please do not retire this one anytime soon and if you do, please give us lovers of the flavor some time to stock up.

author: Nicki237
title: Decadent
text: I just recently bought this at My local publix and wanted to try something new and picked this up. Very dense chocolatey icecream. Tastes like real chocolate compared to other ice creams but my problem with this is it should've had actual chocolate pudding swirls instead of pudding icecream and the cookies instead taste more like chocolate chips instead of cookies. The icecream also is more of a dark chocolate flavor, slightly bitter. Would've tasted much better if it was chocolate fudge icecream or Milk chocolate icecream but still a good icecream I just wouldn't buy it again

author: SFMT
title: My favorite chocolate ice cream by far!
text: I tasted this ice cream for the first time last month. Since then, I've been hooked! It has all of my favorites into one. I love chocolate chocolate chip cookies, chocolate pudding and chocolate ice cream. Please, never change this recipe or discontinue it, because it's the only therapy I need! :)

author: LainiPaige
title: Aptly Named
text: This ice cream is exactly what it's title implies - therapy through chocolate, only way cheaper than therapy. The chocolate pudding is amazing and it is so delish you really only need a few bites to hit to spot. My favorite chocolate ice cream of all time!

author: Nessyrae23
title: I love Ben and jerrys chocolate
text: I really love Ben and jerrys chocolate ice cream. It's the only chocolate ice cream that tastes like chocolate. I was excited when this came out so I could mix it up a bit and give my tastebuds a chance to miss chocolate fudge brownie. I really like this one but I think the cookies weren't the right choice. I like the pudding ice cream so I think what would've been better would be like a ganache swirl or chocolate frosting. Chocolate cookies aren't very popular to begin with so it wasn't the selling point for me. I wanted to try the chocolate pudding ice cream. Still though it's a rich chocolate ice cream that I enjoy a lot

author: WMKonz924
title: Can't live without it!!
text: I tried this for the first time a few months ago and it is perfect when you need a chocolate fix to make you happy:) It is so creamy then you get the chocolate cookie swirl. I shouldn't admit it but I have at least once a week.

author: Greggo
title: Amazing
text: Seriously the best chocolate ice cream I've ever had.

author: Phish Food Fan
title: Brilliant!
text: Wow wow wow! I have found, along with a handful of others, another favorite! Amazing! This IS THE quintessential chocolate ice cream for chocolate lovers. The pudding and cookie swirls: totally out of this world chocolate flavor. My phish food and chocolate fudge brownie have competition! If you love chocolate, buy this pint. It won’t disappoint! Sorry for all the exclamation points but I’m serious, you need to be eating this.

author: nomadicsoul
title: Dark chocolate lover's dream
text: Finally, a chocolate ice cream that is decadent, dark, and not too sweet. The pudding ice cream is an excellent touch and I love that the ice cream is not too milky. The chocolate cookies are a nice touch, although unnecessary to my enjoyment of the experience of eating this wonderful ice cream! Thank you for making a flavor for those of us who believe the only "real" and "tasty" kind of chocolate is dark chocolate!!

author: RottenHead
title: Jesus Has Returned
text:
The level of chocolate this product will bring you is mind and body saturating.
If you need love and you are lonely or female and suffering 'that time' just put yourself in the bliss of this ice cream. The pudding ice cream is spiritual. You might need to eat this ice cream away from others, where they cannot see how it makes you feel. You may not be ready for how it makes you feel.

author: Andrea R
title: BEST CHOCOLATE ICE CREAM
text:
I bought this on a whim because I was craving Chocolate Ice Cream. It's now been 1 1/2 months and my husband and I have eaten no other ice cream except Chocolate Therapy. We hope they never stop making this flavor.
Smooth, rich without being overwhelming, great pudding texture and flavor and wonderful little fudge pieces.
It doesn't get any better.
Also, it's the absolute perfect pint of ice cream for when you have your period, or you're just grumpy and watching movies.

author: famous22
title: The Ultimate Chocolate Ice Cream!
text: So rich in chocolate and has texture throughout the entire pint with loaded chocolate cookies! I get at least a pint every week! Short and simple ingredient list and pretty great nutritionally for all that you get. Thanks Ben & Jerry's!!

author: Sweet tooth
title: Angela
text: My hubby brought this home for me from Albertson's. I probably wouldn't have picked this flavor myself. I usually go for chocolate with lots of stuff in it, nuts, caramel, whatever! It looks simple but the flavor is bold. It tastes like real chocolate, rich and flavorful. Better than any other chocolate ice cream I've had! My teenage daughter agreed, it is delicious!

author: jul_910
title: Better and cheaper than actual therapy!
text: I eat this every night. I calculate calories throughout my day to allow for my Chocolate Therapy.... every. single. night. They laugh at me when I check out at the grocery store - I buy all they have in stock. The intensely dark chocolate, coupled with the cookies and pudding are the perfect way to end the day...every. single. day.

author: ChocolateComa
title: The Best Chocolate Ice Cream I've Had...So Far!
text: When I saw the name I instantly grabbed it because I was in need of some chocolate therapy. I couldn't have been more satisfied and have purchased 3 pints of the stuff over the past few weeks. This will indulge all of your deepest chocolate cravings and leave you a bit depressed when you know there's none left in the freezer. it has all the right notes of milk chocolate and dark chocolate and then there's texture of smooth and creamy, pieces of chocolate cookie and/or brownie, and the silky texture of frozen pudding. This is a winner and I hope they never discontinue it.

author: Lorilt37
title: God Bless You for this flavor
text: This is THE flavor I never knew I was missing. My new favorite. PLEASE don’t ever retire this!

author: Torri1345
title: The best Therapy out there
text: I don't usually like chocolate, but on the few emotional times when I crave it I want real chocolate which I've never seen in an ice cream before. This ice cream is heaven! Chocolate so rich you would think it was gourmet. The only thing that could make this better is to make it even darker.

author: RachelfromNYC
title: Chocolate Therapy, Indeed!
text:
My teenaged son: "Mom, what's that?"
Me: "Chocolate therapy ice cream... my favorite."
Son: "Can I try it?"
Me: "Sure, but save me some."
Later, my son walks into the kitchen with a spoon and the empty pint in his hand. "Sorry, Mom. It was just too good to stop."
And it is.

author: Moco
title: Love this special treat!
text:
I was craving chocolate ice cream and I decided to stop by Ben & Jerry's. The young lady was sweet to offer samples and I chose Chocolate Therapy. I'm so glad I did. It's really rich but I ate the entire scoop. I've only had Ben & Jerry's once.
This was a special treat.

author: Niki
title: Best
text: A very satisfying chocolate ice cream combination! But I haven't been able to find it in the grocery stores near me. What is happening? They're still being made right?

author: CaptRon96
title: A darker chocolate satisfaction
text: It's my dessert after every dinner. It's in my grocery shopping cart every week, usually 2 pints. The chocolate is amazing. Love it.

author: NightElf321
title: Easily my favorite Ben and Jerry
text: The Pudding swirls really help with the flavor, This is my favorite Ben And Jerry flavor.

author: NovaBelle
title: AMAZING
text: It's the best store bought chocolate ice cream. I only let myself have it once a month (wink) & it's become a tradition lol Most times I will get ruffle potato chips, let the ice cream melt & dip the chips in it. Freaking yum.

author: Pachocolover
title: Omg
text: This is the ultimate adventure in chocolate, can not buy any other flavor since trying this. Ben and jerry should win the Nobel peace price for ice cream for this flavor. Guess there is a heaven, I visit it during every bite.

author: Mary Lu
title: True chocolate therapy
text: Excellent flavor. The only chocolate ice cream's that I Eat are Ben & Jerry's. The ice cream itself is similar to phish food, but the other ingredients are very different. And delicious!. I love the cookies !

author: Beca
title: A-M-A-Z-I-N-G
text: Are you a chocoholic? If the answer is yes then what are you wating for to try this ice cream? And if you're not then I swear you will become one after trying that, it's addicting. Soooo good

author: Fiona
title: To die for chocolate lovers!
text: A friend bought this flavor for me on my birthday two years ago. I haven't stopped eating it since. Please keep making this flavor or I may have to go to therapy for separation anxiety.

title: Heavenly dark chocolate goey goodness
text: I tried this as a whim in the grocery store and found my chocolate heaven. The name fits. I hope the keep this flavor. I loved candy pie, but this is WAY better!!

author: Malkav11
title: A flavorful pick me up
text:
I have enjoyed this flavor since it came out.
It hasn't disappointed in cheering me up when I'm feeling down.
It truly is delicious, well done B&J

author: Limpy the Cat
title: Heaven
text: This is by far the best ice cream I've ever had, so much chocolate deliciousness in one container. Thank you thank you thank you

author: Joanzie
title: Chocoate therapy favorite
text: My fav flavor so far but I have loved Ben and Jerrys since I went to college at Purdue University in West Lafayette IN !!!!!

author: Josh from VT
title: Great stuff
text: If you love chocolate, you'll love this flavor. Very one-dimensional, but that's a good thing when it comes to chocolate.

author: Gamndalf the white
title: chocolate lovers dream
text: perfect balance of rich chocolate and little cookie pieces. The texture is amazing!

author: Tina
title: It is the ultimate therapy
text: I'm a chocoholic and this is the perfect ice cream. Rich and smooth.

author: Jbone
title: Just plain yummy
text: Omg best chocolate chocolate ice cream ever ever ever

author: Lanyard
title: When god makes a #2
text: Best flavor to ever fall into earth and into my mouth

author: Kollette
title: OMG GREAT! Pure chocolate heaven.
text: It's harder to find but when i do find Chocolate therapy I buy a couple. Not all stores sell this flavor. By far, my absolute favourite!

author: Doon
title: YUM
text: Bought on vacation. Love this flavor! Super smooth.

author: Anonymous
title: Only for dark chocolate lovers
text: If you like dark chocolate, you'll like this flavor, but if you're like me and really taste the bitterness in dark chocolate, you won't be crazy for this one. Wish the website would indicate which chocolate flavor are dark chocolate and which are lighter/milk chocolate (if any are).

author: Zab38
title: OMG!
text: Best chocolate ice cream I ever had! The taste, the texture, just perfect!

author: Joycie
title: Rename it: Chocolate ice cream, nothing else.
text: I was expecting chocolate paradise, big chewy chunks of chocolate cookie dough, obvious pudding swirls and thick creamy ice cream.

author: WendyRuth
title: THE BEST ICE CREAM!
text: I am a chocoholic! I started my Ben & Jerry’s journey with Chocolate Fudge Brownie. It was okay but I didn’t like the chunks of brownie. The texture wasn’t right. Then, I found Chocolate Therapy and I fell in love! I relocated and now I can’t find it. My husband seems to think it may be discontinued. Please say it’s not so!

author: gubbsies
title: The most amazing ice cream ever
text: I'm not even a huge chocolate fan but this ice cream flavor absolutely caters to my cravings when I am actually craving something with chocolate. It's the best chocolate ice cream, the pudding is amazing, and oh my goodness I love the chocolate cookies. Absolutely by far my favorite ice cream flavor to exist.

author: Cara3177
title: Cookies almost nonexistent
text: The flavor is good, but the “chocolate cookies” is more like tiny bits of cookie pieces. I ate more than half the pint before I even found a tiny morsel of a cookie. If this flavor had actual chunks of cookies, or even better brownies, this would be my new fav. The pudding swirl is delicious.

author: Eric17
title: Chocolate Therapy
text: I am a huge Ben and Jerry's fan, and I love all of their ice cream. I have not had Chocolate Therapy in a while, and I will tell you, it was a bad experiance. The ice cream did not taste the same and I was really upset. I have not tried Chocolate Therapy since.

author: Cheyenne
title: Tasty!
text: This is my all time favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream!

author: payperdue
title: Don't ever discontinue this!
text:
This is my new therapist!
It's as if decadent chocolate could pick you up, cradle you and tell you everythings going to be alright. All the other flavors are just ice cream. This flavor has got your back. Don't ever discontinue it. Pretty please!

author: Kelly S
title: The most ridiculous chocolate ice cream ever...
text: ...and by ridiculous, I don’t mean “deserving or inviting derision or mockery”. I mean the most ridiculously good ice cream deserved of world wide acclaim and the high honors for greatness... some sort of prize should be in order as well.

author: JDog
title: One chocolate to rule them all
text: If I had to choose only one chocolate ice cream to get my chocolate ice cream fix, it is definitely going to be this! The chocolate variety tends toward a dark flavor, which I love. This is hard core chocolate therapy indulgence.

author: Diane
title: My favorite of all of the Ben and Jerry's.
text: This ice cream does not dissappoint. The texture and flavors are perfect in every way. I rarely get cravings for chocolate but when I do this is exactly what I go for. I just wish I could find it in stores more frequently.

author: Truth2018
title: Chocolaty Goodness
text: Today was the first day I tried chocolate therapy and it is delicious but i would've added brownie chunks instead of chocolate cookies that taste like chocolate chip pieces but other then that its yummy delicious!!!!

author: Kelly1217
title: Absolute favorite!
text: I can eat the whole pint of this flavor in one sitting. Every time it’s in stock at the store, I make my mom buy it even if we already have some at home. You can never have too much chocolate therapy.

author: ChocoQueen
title: This has to be a woman's creation
text: Chocolate Therapy has walked me back from the ledge on several occasions. Joking! It's SO good and so chocolaty (is that a word?), that I'm feel it's meant for women. :-)

author: kimmykimmy
title: Plz make a dairy free version!
text: This was my all time favorite ice cream before I stopped consuming dairy and I would love to be able to eat it again! It’s exquisite. Ben and Jerry, make it happen!

author: miacler
title: Literally the best thing in the world...
text: I went to my local scoop shop in 2013 and tried a scoop of the Chocolate Therapy. I've been hooked ever since. Seriously guys, I buy at least two pints a week.

author: chocoholic
title: Rich decadent deliciousness
text: This is seriously addictive stuff. It tastes like and has the texture of chilled rich brownie batter mixed with chocolate cream. Just heaven in the mouth.

author: Monie
title: Perfection!
text: I’m not a chocolate ice cream girl at all, but this flavor is amazing! I love how rich and creamy it is; I also love the chocolate cookie bits! So yummy!

author: Jacksmom
title: Wonderful
text: I don’t know why I tried this. I don’t typically like chocolate on chocolate but this was fantastic! I think the pudding was interesting and marvelous!

author: Gmemery93
title: 100 stars!
text: All other brands of chocolate ice cream fail in comparison! This is my go to and not substitutes, unless it is another Ben and Jerry’s flavor!

author: mamahoohoo
title: You had me at PUDDING
text: Chocolate, chocolate and chocolate. I don't usually like bits interrupting my smooth ice cream texture, but the cookies are good.

author: emmance
title: Rich in the best way
text: This is one of the best flavors, in my opinion. It has a rich flavor and great texture, just the right amount of components.

author: Teerobs
title: Amazing
text: I bought this because my pregnancy cravings were demanding chocolate and boy I was not disappointed! New favorite flavor!

author: hbee4
title: My Favorite Ice Cream Ever
text: This is the first Ben and Jerry's flavor I ever tried and has remained my favorite. I is perfect for chocolate lovers.

author: Eights
title: Dank
text: This is THE best ben and jerrys flavor! So chocolatey, and so delicious. Perfect anytime, even my cat loves it!

author: Big daddy
title: This so good
text: So I saw this in the store and I decided to get it. My mouth was watering as the ice cream melted in my mouth

author: TorySilver
title: The best!
text: Favorite ice cream of all time. hands down. Thanks for this Godsend, Ben and Jerry.

author: Chlocd
title: Addictive
text: It’s so good that it should be a sin. Ugh, I can’t get enough of it!

author: SnackyT
title: Amazing!
text: I love dark chocolate and this combo is amazing! Quite tasty...

author: blond1502
title: My favorite ice cream!!
text: Just love the Chocolate Therapy! I like the texture and flavor

author: KG0818
title: Delicious!
text: Always satisfied when I pick up some Chocolate Therapy

author: BeardedFly
title: Hello again old friend.
text: It has literally been about a decade since I've had chubby hubby. I went to the scoop shops and they said it was discontinued, this was a few years ago. Well, I begrudgingly made peace with it a while ago. There was always that small voice in my head that said to check the freezer in my grocery store (this is over about 4 different states I've lived in), alas, no dice. Tonight, I have been reunited with my best ice cream best friend, I was at Walmart picking up a few things and that little voice said "just look for it". So I did, and there it was. I stood there in pure amazement for a good minute. Never give up hope.

author: ChubbyHubbysMainLady
title: best ice cream ever!!! No joke
text: That if something happened to this flavor of ice cream I would die inside. This has easily become an addiction and I forewarn everyone who dares try it I've been on the hunt for it at every store near me trying to get the sellers nearest me to keep it in stock instead of only Cherry Garcia which I personally a peanut butter pretzel fudge loving person am not very fond of. If this ice cream Chubby Hubby was in fact a Chubby Hubby he would definitely be my hubby of choice. So a huge thank you to those coworkers the pranki. My only complaints are where and what is up with the Froyo version! Please attend issue as soon as possible

author: FuzzyGut
title: Very good pint
text: I just had my first pint of Chubby Hubby and I thought it was great! The ice cream flavor is delicious. Since my first experience with this flavor was after the change from peanut butter filled pretzels to regular pretzels, I can’t speak to that (though the filled ones do sound great) but the chocolate covered pretzels in the new pints are great! The reason I am giving my review 4 and not 5 stars is because I didn’t get any chocolate peanut butter swirl until the very bottom of the pint. I can imagine that if it had been dispersed throughout, it would have been AMAZING! Still, I will get another of these in the future.

author: KeithMoon78
title: They ruined a classic! Not the same as before
text: Why tinker with perfection? It appears that Ben & Jerry have changed their "formula" for their classic Chubby Hubby flavor, and in doing so have made it far worse. The ice cream used to be fuller and creamier, with peanut-butter filled chocolate covered pretzels and scrumptious robust chunks/gobs of peanut butter. Indeed, quite decadent! Now the ice cream is more "watery" (almost like skim milk), the pretzels are no longer filled with peanut butter, and the peanut butter is simply thinly swirled. The result: a pale comparison to its former self; not as rich, not as tasty. Tastes very generic now. Skimping... a sign of the times... Will not be buying again.

author: eliz13413
title: PLEASE bring back the good pretzels!
text: I just bought this flavor for the first time in two or three years because I was so upset about the change in pretzels a few years back. While the current pretzels are better than the round ones you had for a while, they still don't compare to the yummy peanut-butter filled pretzels of yesteryear. There must be a way for you to source these?? Pretty please?

author: Sarah2019
title: Like eating a salt lick!
text: I just tried this for the first time and was so excited to find a new ice cream with peanut butter and chocolate! I've never before found an ice cream flavor I just didn't like (and my first job was selling ice cream, so I've tried a lot!). I wanted to love it, but after a few bites, I found one of the pretzels, and it was so salty! I thought it was a fluke, but I soon found another that was worse. It took a few minutes for the salt to dissolve in my mouth. Now I LOVE a sweet/salty combination, but I would have gotten less salt licking our Michigan winter roads. I hope this was a bad batch, but I won't be taking my chances.

author: Seekerofpeace
title: Disappointing change
text: This used to be my very favorite ice cream in the whole world! What's NOT to love? But not anymore. The chocolate-covered pretzel pieces are unsatisfactory. Although the pretzels do not taste stale, their consistency feels chewy and stale. They used to be peanut butter filled pretzel nuggets covered in chocolate - a crunchy triple delight! I no longer buy this ice cream. :-(

author: Julie
title: -gurgling noise-
text: I have a tough time finding this flavor, and thank goodness for that, because I find it impossible to put it down whenever I get it. This has been one of my favorite flavors for at least 17 years now. BTW, those gym bills keep getting sent back, marked "return to sender" - am I using the wrong address?

author: samw98
title: BEST FLAVOR
text: I had this flavor for the first time a few months ago after finally tracking it down and it's AMAZING. Definitely in my top 3 right behind Cinnamon Buns and Peanut Butter World. My pint had over 15 pretzels in it and I was very happy. Only suggestion would be to make the pretzels into peanut butter filled pretzels!

author: Benihana
title: Too much Salt
text: I bought this last night, and was disappointed when I bit into a giant pretzel cluster that it was half salt. Needless to say I was forced to wash my mouth out a bunch, and lost my appetite very quickly.

author: chubbyhubbylover
title: *the* BEST ice cream EVER!!!!
text: I can't remember the first time I tried Chubby Hubby, but from the moment I did, it has been my hands-down favorite ice cream flavor of all time (and this is quite an honor of distinction, as I love many different brands of ice cream and their flavors!). There's just something MAGICAL about the formula of malt vanilla ice cream, with just the right amount of peanut butter and fudge swirling through, and the crunchy chocolate-covered pretzel nuggets embedded within---this combination is something close to ice cream heaven!!! Love digging into the pint, savoring the rich ice cream, and uncovering those awesome chocolate-covered pretzel nuggets---like mining for gold. Please, Ben & Jerry's, NEVER EVER discontinue this AMBROSIAL flavor!!!! And THANK YOU for providing me with such a great experience through your ice cream!!! :)))

author: Chubster
title: Actually better than before.
text: This is hands down my favorite ice cream on the planet. I guess I'm fortunate that I almost never find it in stores, because i can't see it without buying it. A lot of people have complained about the change from Chocolate covered peanutbutter FILLED pretzels to chocolate covered peanutbutter pretzels (it is my understanding that this was due to the original pretzels no longer being available to B&J's). While I do thing that the original was better in principal, I found that I frequently got pints where the pretzels were soggy and disappointing. I have never had that happen with the new recipe. The new pretzels are always crunch and a little bit saltier, which I actually prefer; I need the salt to balance the fudge and vanilla malt. Still the best!

author: Erin
title: Yum!
text: This is my new favorite flavor, tried it for the first time about 2months ago.

author: Mia Oxford
title: Disappointing :(
text: Wanted to try this since it seemed like a popular classic flavor. Sorry to say it was disappointing to me. The pint I got contained mostly chewy pretzels instead of crunchy ones. It also seemed that there were peanut pieces that were chewy. I liked the crunchy but the chewiness was an odd texture.

author: Artfreak06
title: This was my husband's favorite
text: We just recently it found chubby hubby at Meijer yesterday and my husband got excited because it's his favorite ice cream. We just ate it and it wasn't the same. The pretzels are supposed to be filled with peanut butter, not coated. I personally couldn't taste the peanut butter at all and the pretzels were too chewy. We will probably not be biting this flavor ever again.

author: uhhuhkayla
title: it was the best
text: this was my favorite up until the pretzels were no longer filled. it gave the ice cream that soft texture nw it has too much crunch and will never be the same. still good but not great and can never find it anywhere lately

author: Mermaid023
title: Pretzels Suck
text: Bring back the old pretzels or find a new peanut butter pretzel cause these chocolate covered ones aren’t the same. Changes the ice cream completely so people don’t buy this flavor anymore

author: Tombonannoo
title: Nt as good as before
text: I used to love this icecream with the nice crunchy pieces of pretzel, now the pretzels are really chewy and at times really un enjoyable, still a great ice cream though

author: Bennettelizabeth
title: So many delicious textures!
text: This has been my favorite since the beginning! Sweet and salty, smooth and crunchy! Never stop making it!

author: LarryPA
title: Used to be my favorite
text: The last time I had Chubby Hubby was when the pretzels were filled with peanut butter. I then tried it again and found no peanut butter in the pretzels. No doubt this was a change due to cost, but something was different with the overall flavor. Just not my favorite anymore. So unfortunate.

author: IceCreamCouple
title: Amazing but still disappointed
text: My girlfriend and I thought this was our new favorite flavor (actually got on here to review how amazing it is) then we began reading other reviews only to realize the pretzels used to be filled with peanut butter. We now can’t stop thinking about how much better that would taste. It has ruined our night. We are the type to obsess over something like this. Will be awake for next 4 days thinking about that peanut filled pretzels. Smh. (But buy the flavor. It’s amazing)

author: Chubbyhubbygrrl
title: The one and only, Chubby Hubby, is hands down...
text: ....the very best! Malt ice cream, peanut butter, fudge and pretzels...yowsa it's amazing! My only complaint is that it can be difficult to locate! I stock up whenever I find it though! Thanks Ben & Jerry for the most fabulous ice cream, ever!!!

author: bananni
title: Great, but used to be excellent!
text: Chubby hubby is one of my favorite Ben & Jerry flavors, however the pretzels used to be stuffed with peanut butter a few years ago. It was WAY better then! I hope you consider going back the old way!

author: Jordan
title: I miss my chubby hubby :-(
text: This flavor used to be truly epic. Chocolate covered, peanut butter filled pretzels were the stuff of legends. Sadly, legends are now all they are. Bring back the real chubby hubby!! :-(

author: chubbyhubbyrules
title: My All-Time Favorite Food
text: I am truly dumbfounded as to how anyone could possibly rate this ice cream as anything less than five stars. This is the perfect food. I often go on extended diets, and they are almost bookended with a pint of Chubby Hubby. It's honestly one of the only things that keep me going in life. The crispiness and the saltiness of the pretzel, combined with the sweet and chewy peanut butter swirls. It's just incredible.

author: Kikimocha
title: Only Ice Cream I Will Buy at the Grocery Store
text: I LOVE this flavor! Only ice cream I will buy at the store for the past 6 years now I even got my family hooked on it as well. A lot of people are mentioning the pretzels, but I love the extra crunch. There is already a peanut butter swirl and a little peanut butter goes a long way since it is a strong flavor. Thank you for making this ice cream and please please please never get rid of it.

author: Chubby Hubby and wife
title: Couldn't ask for a better treat!
text: My husband and I have been buying this ice cream flavor for about 6 months now. We are obsessed with this flavor. Chubby Hubby ice cream is addicting. We're just disappointed it doesn't come in a bigger size than pint and the pretzels are no longer filled with pb. I love the chewy pretzels. It adds character to the ice cream!!! Thank you for this yummy delightful flavor!

author: e4tami
title: it's ALL hard dry pretzels
text: Unbelievable that they changed the pretzels that used to be chocolate covered and chocolate filled and now they are plain, dry, with something they "call" chocolate covering them but it's just brown lard and there are SO many of them, hardly any ice cream, of course because they are cheap compared to cream, that one cannot even scoop the ice cream because the scooper keeps kitting pretzels, like big rocks when digging in dirt.

author: shanelee266
title: Average Ben and Jerry's is still pretty great
text: Ben and Jerry's is my splurging ice cream. Once a month I buy two pints. I always tell myself I'll make them last the entire month, and instead I'm ice cream-less for about 25 days until I buy more.

author: Sadsherri
title: Disappointed
text: My first taste of Ben&Jerry's was about twenty years ago. It was Chubby Hubby when the ice cream was peanut butter. Who had the lame brain idea to change it to vanilla malt? That ruined what was so special about it. Sadly, none of the current peanut butter offerings live up to the old Chubby Hubby.

author: Ob95
title: Basically a pint of pretzels
text: I was extremely disappointed with this flavor. It was almost impossible to eat because every bite was a chunk of pretzel. The little "vanilla" ice cream in the pint was almost sour and not the same as the regular vanilla flavor. Not to mention I didn't see a single bit of peanut butter.

author: Hopeful
title: The best Title/Name ever! It makes me smile!
text:
I have been eating Chubby Hubby since its inception! The name made me laugh so I tried it! What could be better than pretzels,peanut butter and chocolate!
Please don’t ever discontinue this yummy and fun ice cream!

author: WestTexSuz
title: Just not the same...
text: After not seeing this, my favorite flavor, for years, I was really excited when I saw it in the freezer section! Malted milk vanilla ice cream, peanut butter and fudge swirls and, the best part, chocolate covered, peanut butter filled, pretzels, Oh My. Unfortunately, the new rendition of this flavor is missing the peanut butter filled part of the pretzel which makes it just a dry chunk of pretzel covered in a thin layer of chocolate. It's OK but now where near as good as the original.

author: KimBeth
title: Bring Back The Old
text: This ice cream used to have more of an intense malt flavor--now the flavor of malt is lacking. The base of the ice cream used to be more like marbled fudge with thick swirls of peanut butter--now the base of the ice cream is vanilla with thin swirls of peanut butter and fudge. The pretzels used to be filled with peanut butter and covered with thick chocolate to keep the pretzels from losing texture--now the pretzels are not filled with peanut butter and the chocolate coating is not thick enough to prevent the pretzels from becoming soggy. I'm assuming the company did this to trim calories but if people want to be on a diet, we wouldn't be buying premium ice cream. Although this flavor is still good, it does not have the perfection it used to have years ago. Please go back to the original!!!

author: lovemyboys
title: I love this flavor!!!!
text: I love this flavor so much and I am so mad because I CANT find it at any store. I have looked in 3 different states (I move a lot) and none of them sell it anymore!!!!!!!

author: Kamk
title: Ruined an iconic flavor
text: Bring the old pretzels back. Used to be my addiction and would woof down the whole thing in one setting. I know that the old pretzels sometimes got soggy but when they did not, the whole thing tated sublime. Now, the pretzels are huge lumps, crunchy but fairly tasteless and not stuffed with peanut butter. Plus, I almost always get one or two super super salty (as if I crunched a lump of salt) pretzels that ruin the whole experience. Do something to fix and save this amazing flavor!

author: Andy
title: Our Family Favorite!
text: We have a hard time finding grocery stores in our area that carry this flavor. Currently there is only one that we're aware of, so that's where we choose to shop!

author: Jenchapd
title: Sweet and Salty
text: Perfect mix of sweet and salty this s a must. The chocolate covered peanut butter pretzels are just what makes this a perfect combo.You will not be disappointed.

author: Zarenna
title: Addictive
text: I love this. I got addicted to Chubby hubby when I was pregnant with my son. It is like moosetracks ice cream but better. Sweet and salty, a perfect choice.

author: Lizzo
title: This Is NOT Up For Debate
text: this is the best peanut butter and chocolate ice cream there is to date. PLUS, theres PRETZELS CHUNKS. What more could you ask for? more of it, perhaps..

author: Bigga
title: My favorite!!
text: A bit of sweet, a bit of salty, a bit of crunchy... ohh my. To bad I am having a hard time finding it in stores around me.

author: Beena
title: I fall in love with it.
text: Just not sweet

author: FATher of the year
title: Made me who I am Today...
text: By far the best flavor in the World. Can’t beat sweet, salty, creamy and crunchy. Hard to find, an emerging top ten.

author: lithium1
title: Have the best memory
text: When did you resurrect this flavor? More than 20 years ago i fell in love with Chubby Hubby. Extraordinaire taste!!

author: Padmanda
title: My favorite flavor
text: It is my ultimate favorite flavor!!! Its the only grocery item I wont share with my household

author: tagirl
title: Pretzels
text: Agreed. It's not as good as it used to be, but. Peanut butter pretzels that is all.

author: wendlls
title: Please NEVER discontinue this flavor!
text: I have loved this flavor for years. Please NEVER discontinue it!

author: Larry
title: It does make the Hubby Chubby!
text: All time favorite B&J flavor!!! All time favorite B&J flavor!!!

author: Robin O
title: Favorite Ice Cream Ever
text: So, I spent a few months trying to explore as many Ben&Jerry's flavors as I could, but I've come to the conclusion that this is my favorite ice cream flavor EVER! I grew up drinking vanilla malt milkshakes with my dad and this ice cream base is perfectly that. I love the fudge swirls, they have a very classic chocolate syrup taste. They're not too overpowering! Always so many pretzels too! This ice cream is a no brainer for me. Team Chubby Hubby 5ever. <3

author: Uncle Gingy
title: Disappointing pretzel evolution
text: Grew up loving this ice cream. Rarely would get anything else. Was disappointed in The change from chocolate cover peanut butter FILLED pretzels to simply chocolate covered but was able to look the other way as the peanut butter swirl still meet my needs. Once they changed those pretzels to way over loaded salty pretzels is been really disappointing. Thought maybe I was crazy but finally came to the website to see I am not the only one who feels this way.

author: Sarasota Florida Girl
title: All time favorite!
text: Chubby Hubby was the stuff of my childhood dreams and has been my favorite flavor ever since tasting my first scoop many years ago (more than I care to admit or try and number). I will not even be in the mood for ice cream, and yet I still check to see if it's in stock, any time I pass an ice cream selection in any store ever. Simply the best! If you haven't tried it yet, you are missing out. But that's fine, because it leaves me more pints.

author: ChilliedLaura
title: Peanut butter and Pretzel Delight!
text: I kept hearing about the hype around this one and had to try it for myself, I was not let down. The pretzels were by far the BIGGEST chunks in a Ben & Jerry's ice cream I have tried thus far, combine that with a little peanut butter and it is just pure heaven!

author: cylej
title: name change?
text: This is hands-down the greatest ice cream ever created! I have a deep love for this ice cream and last year during a PRIDE event, Ben & Jerry's had a stand where a worker informed me that they are going to change the name to "Hubby Hubby", having two cows with top hats on.

author: mary alice
title: My very favorite
text: My blonde bomber of a cairn terrier -- Earth Dogge Mulligan -- and I used to eat CH after our pizza. It is the BEST. ICE CREAM. EVER!!! My boy is now enjoying pizza and CH on the Rainbow Bridge. And I get CH on my birthday. The smile on his furry little face as he plowed through his very own bowl always pops into my head on that day. Thanks for the memories.

author: Marks
title: My absolute favorite ice cream flavor ever!
text: I've been a Chubby Hubby fan for many years. I now live in Singapore though, where I've never seen it in shops. Last year I was in Hawaii and was delighted to find Chubby Hubby readily available there. I certainly took advantage of that availability while I was there, but I'm back in Singapore now, with no Chubby Hubby. Please make it available in Singapore!

author: kirsten28
title: Always a favorite
text: The ice cream is one of the few malt flavors and if that’s not enough to be incredible, the salty and sweet of the chocolate with the pretzels just make it amazing. The pretzels aren’t soggy since the chocolate makes a perfect shell, and there’s the perfect ratio of chunky to ice cream itself. I really hope this one sticks around forever because it ROCKS.

author: Phoenix87
title: Missing the classic recipe!!!
text: This used to be my absolute favorite flavor. How I miss the chocolate covered peanut butter filled pretzels of the original, classic, version of Chubby Hubby! Never mess with a great. Every time I think I will give it another try, I am dissapointed because I still remember how truly great flavor originally was and miss that this version falls short.

author: Bakerfam
title: Please make a non dairy version!
text: This I've cream is by far my husbands very favorite ice cream. Our only problem is that we have had to go vegan for our health and can no longer consistently dairy or eggs. Would you please consider making a non dairy vegan version of this with the crunchy peanut butter pretzels please! We have had 2 of the vegan flavors and they were great!

author: Chubby hubby lover
title: Bring the old pretzels back plz!!!
text: This is the best icecream on the planet, even with the new chocolaty covered pretzels. But I still dont get why you dont want to bring the peanut butter covered pretzels back ?!! Most of chubby hubby fans are asking you and complaining but you just ignore. I dont understand what's so hard about getting the old recipe back.

author: Tubs123
title: Great! Would buy again!
text: I just tried this flavor for the first time and I thought it was delicious! The chocolate covered pretzels were nice and crunchy! The saltiness of the pretzels was great with the sweet ice cream! The malt flavor of the ice cream was also great along side the huge swirls and fudge and peanut butter!

author: rsquare
title: Absolutely delicious!
text: This ice cream flavor is the best. The malted vanilla is already delicious on its own, and yet it melds so wonderfully with the peanut butter and fudge swirls. The stars of the show, though, are the pretzel pieces - crunchy, sweet, and salty perfection. Absolute joy in a pint!

author: Beepboop
title: My fave flavor for 15 years
text: This is my favorite flavor but I’ve noticed over the last couple of years it’s tasted much sweeter. It’s missing the over the top peanut butter that I fell in love with. It used to have a better balance of sweet and salty. It’s still great but I wish it hadn’t changed. ❤️

author: Icecreamlovr
title: Not the same as the original
text: This was my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's ice cream. The ice cream doesn't even taste the same as the original. The chocolate covered pretzels are too big and aren't filled with peanut butter anymore. Why, oh why did you change a great flavor?

author: Rmeady
title: Bring it back to the UK
text: Chubby Hubby is the best flavour ice cream I’ve ever tasted. All the elements blend so well together to create the ultimate taste sensation. It’s been a good few years since I’ve been able to taste it though as it sadly no longer is available in the UK!

author: agevans78
title: My favorite icecream flavor of all time
text: This flavor is addictive. I hope Ben and Jerry will never stop making it. Although the recipe changed recently (the chocolate covered pretzels are no longer peanut butter filled), I still love it with all my heart. Thank you for making Chubby Hubby!

author: Sweetcharity
title: The best ice cream ever
text:
I happened upon Chubby Hubby ice cream at my neighborhood CVS. I had a hankering for some Ben & Jerry’s (my absolute favorite brand), and decided to open up the CVS ice cream vault of awesomeness. Low and behold I saw the funniest name I had ever see labeled on an ice cream, “Chubby Hubby”. I laughed, read the description and the story behind it, and thought that I had to buy this even if it wouldn’t fall into my “favorites” category .
I was wrong in so many ways! I fell in love with this ice cream! The peanut butter and the chocolate covered pretzels...... my mouth is watering right now as we speak! Ha ha ha!
My husband, family, and friends all know that if they want to put a smile on my face, simply buy this ice cream for me. In fact, the hubbs has replaced flowers with Chubby Hubby ice cream and it may have saved our marriage multiple times (I also may be a tad dramatic).
I believe they should rename this “Chubby Wifey” because I’m pretty sure I will get that way if I keep eating this at the rate I am.
#putdownthespooncharity

author: Bigga
title: My No 1 Ben and Jerry
text:
I don´t alway find this Chubby Hubby in the stores but when I do I make sure to grab a couple.
It´s my absolute favorite. I just love the Fudge-Covered Pretzel bites, gives a little salty crunch to the sweet and peanut buttery ice cream.

author: SeanB
title: My go to since 1993
text: I’ve been eating this flavor of Ben and Jerry’s for over 20 years. It’s been revamped with different pretzels but it still tasted exactly the same. They used to be peanut butter filled pretzels which was awesome. Chubby Hubby for the win!

author: Betty
title: Chubby Hubby
text:
My favorite flavor so far. Yum yum.
Now if you could make a flavor of just good vanilla ice cream with lots of peanut butter swirls. (Either crunchy or creamy). Have waited for years for someone to make this and nothing so far.

author: WheresTheChub
title: Hopelessly Seeking My Chubby Hubby
text: I'm giving this a 5 star because it sounds so amazing, though I've never had it. I drove around tonight on a mission for over an hour following the flavor tracker and failed miserably. I'll find you one day chubby hubby!

author: supermas
title: Greatest Ice Cream Flavor Combination
text: Just the right amount of texture, sweet, salt, chocolate, and peanut butter! Gobs of those delightful pretzels. Can't go wrong with this pint! Sometimes a little tricky to find, but not impossible. The perfect ice cream.

author: ChandlerM
title: Excellent ice cream
text: I went to a Ben and Jerry’s store out of state that had this and it was the best ice cream I’ve ever had! Unfortunately there isn’t any store that sales this flavor... :( I’d buy this every week if I could!

author: carla tortilla
title: The best of the best
text: The best flavor there is! I've tasted a bunch of other flavors but I always keep going back to this one. The sweet and salty of the pretzel and the combination of chocolate and peanut butter are the best!

author: cdub
title: Delicious, I mix it with "oat of this swirlled"
text: I love this icecream please do not ever stop making it. If there is a contest to enter to win a lifetime supply please let me know. PRO TIP: mix with oat of this swirrled flavor for a cinnamon explosion!

author: tmwsiy1976
title: The Best of the Best
text: Words do Chubby Hubby no justice! My all time fave for sure and always on the look for it cuz its sometimes hard to find. Cheers to Ben & Jerrys for this timeless classic !!! Keep up the great work!

author: AshB88
title: When salty and sweet collide!
text: One of my favorite ice creams. It is a great blend of salty and sweet, with the sweet ice cream base and the crunchy salty pretzels. The only bummer is not many stores in my area or IL carry it.

author: locaknd
title: SOOOO AMAZING OH MY LANTA
text: This is by far the very best ice cream i have ever tasted. The combination alone is completely genius. Thank you for creating this peanut buttery, malt fudge filled masterpiece.

title: Best flavor of all time! GOAT!
text: This is by far the best flavor of all time. So sad it isn’t sold any more. Every other flavor I get I want it to taste like this and they all fall short.

author: Lioness
title: The BEST ICE CREAM
text: I have been trying to remember the name of my favorite ice cream in the entire world .. chubby hubby... .. absolutely amazing!!! Thanks Ben and Jerry

author: Yankee2565
title: Awesome
text: This is the best ice cream ever. I've been eating it by the pint for what seems like forever. Don't change it and definitely don't stop making it.

author: Miki
title: Best ice cream ever!
text: Salty and sweet perfection! Who wouldn’t like peanut butter, chocolate and salted pretzels? I’m always sad when I can’t find it at the store.

author: lindzrose333
title: chubby hubbyyy <3
text: this is by far my favorite ice cream from ben and jerry’s if not my favorite ice cream period! i hope they never discontinue this flavor!!!

author: Bttrfngrbbs
title: The pretzel bits
text: It would get 5 stars but i didnt like the huge pretzel bits. I expected broken up pieces of "tiny twist" pretzels. They were so salty too

title: Loveeeee it
text: Chubby hubby was my first b&js ice cream, I’ve tried many other but it will ALWAYS be my go to and my favorite I’ve cream of all time

author: France
title: Would trade my first born for a life time supply
text: This isn’t by far the BEST GD FLAVOR y’all have ever made it isn’t hands down my favorite and a bust have after a rough day lol.

author: SPack
title: The best
text: This is my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's. The closest store to me that sells it is 22 miles away and it's worth the drive.

author: Tabi92
title: Best of All Time
text: This is my Go To for ice cream. It has everything I need to satisfy cravings. Sweet creamy crunchy salty dream come true.

author: Barbara54
title: EXTREMELY PEANUT BUTTERY
text: The pretzels in this ice cream are good, but if you can’t handle that much peanut butter, than this might be intense.

author: Cheshire911
title: Delicious
text: I bought this a couple weeks ago, and I can’t stop thinking about it. Each time I get it, it gets better and better.

author: Kliebhauser
title: Great flavor but disappointing pretzels
text: This used to be my all time favorite but lately all the pretzel pieces are either too salty or soggy. Disappointed.

author: Deee
title: No pretzels
text: I was pretty amazed to find out there were no pretzels in my pint. Great flavor but extremely disappointing.

author: elephantsforever3
title: BEST FLAVOR
text: It is so good! The flavors mesh perfectly together and it's salty and sweet. The pretzels are the best part.

author: iscream4icecream
title: turnin me into a chubby hubby
text: Breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks.... I just can't put it down.....This is gonna make me a real chubby hubby

author: Bellaandjerrys
title: Amaxing
text: Ate the whole pint last night. Perfect balance of chunks and ice cream. If you love peanut butter get this.

author: DajonD
title: Fat dad!!
text: The best flavor, ever!! Everytime I see this flavor I can’t help but buy it. My wife gets mad at me. Lol

author: Chubby Fan
title: Wow!
text: Best flavor hands down! Chocolate covered pretzels filled with peanut butter, what more could you want?

author: Dejota
title: Love it
text: I LOVE this ice cream. Its a a bunch of my favorites toppings in there. Great ice cream. great choice.

author: CatherineF
title: This is the best flavor. Ever.
text: My favorite flavor. Could eat the point myself no problem, the sweet and salty mix PERFECTION!

author: jinson
title: HORRIBLE
text: ALL pretzels were in the bottom and the ice cream seemed as though it had melted t some point

author: Raerose26
title: Addicted
text: I eat a pint every night! I eat ice cream for dinner. It has all the major food groups right?

author: Kburow29
title: The Best Flavor Offer by B &J.
text: Has been my favorite for 20 years. Think it needs to be carried in every Ben and Jerry store.

author: Marie23
title: My favorite ice cream!
text: The 1st time I tried this flavor I was hooked! It is hard to put down once I start eating it!

author: Kholder
title: Pretzels yummm
text:
What kind of pretzels do you use?
They are so good I need them to munch on!!

author: hutchy420
title: YUMMM
text: hella good. like yum. the flavors just explode. great mix of sweet and salty

author: Syd527
title: Can’t get enough
text: Loved this flavor and all of the chunks that are added to the ice cream

author: Kajitsu90
title: Salty and Sweet
text: Perfect when you really want ice cream and something salty and sweet.

author: MarkChana
title: An ice cream God
text: This is perfection in its tastiest form. It needs to be 5 stars.

author: Charmedone
title: Unrequited love
text: I love it but can NEVER find it!!!! Please bring it closer to me

author: Spring
title: Best Ice cream
text: This is my favorite ice cream...Where can I buy this flavor at.

author: Leah
title: Sweet, salty, crunchy, loaded.
text: This is probably my most favorite ice cream flavor of all time.

author: USBrit
title: Inedible
text: So incredibly salty that it was inedible. Who thinks that’s ok?

author: Ice Cream Feen
title: The G.O.A.T.
text: All you need to know. Last name greatest!!! First name ever!!!

author: whatthemel
title: YUM
text: Has become one of my favorites! Perfect mix of sweet & salty

author: Beargrob
title: Simply the best!
text: It takes a Chubby Hubby to know the best Chubby Hubby!

author: Jrae
title: Omg
text: FAVORITE FLAVOR of Ben and Jerry’s ice cream ever!!

author: ACNKimmi
title: Best Ice Cream Ever
text: So hard to find, but still my favorite from day 1!

author: Grizbaer
title: Love at 1st pint!
text: My first bite of B&J YEARSSSS ago, have turn back!

author: devnall
title: One of the two best B&J flavors ever
text: Chubby Hubby has been a favorite of mine for decades. It seemed to completely disappear from shelves for quite a few years but recently I've started running across it again in stores and am delighted.

author: jwhgg7
title: Great flavor but hardly any chocolate chips
text: I was sad to give a mediocre rating because I really loved the flavor of this ice cream. I have never had banana ice cream before and B&J does it perfectly. The addition of walnuts and chocolate pieces makes this flavor simple but delicious. Maybe it was an isolated incident, but my pint had very few chocolate pieces. I think I was averaging 1 chocolate piece for every 4 scoops of ice cream. That's not great, especially since the image on the label shows it being riddled with chocolate. I am hoping this was an isolated incident and the next chunky monkey pint will be better.

author: Wendy
title: Heaven!
text: If I didn't know any better I would've thought this flavor was made with love and some type of witchcraft- it's that good! ❤️

title: Chunky Monkey missing the chunky
text:
This is my favorite ice cream ever! I buy it by the pint and in a Chunky Monkey waffle cone whenever I can find a B&J store.
I was shocked to find only banana ice cream, not one walnut or piece of chocolate.

author: Munica28
title: Hey, where are the chocolate chunks???
text: I bought this at my local grocery store. I almost always buy Cherry Garcia but they were out. My next go to, plain ol' vanilla was not available either. I decided to try something new, normally I'm not adventurous with my food. I decided on trying Chunky Monkey because I love bananas. I opened my pint a few nights later, took my first spoon full and there were no chocolate chunks and very little walnuts. I kept digging and nada. The ice cream was very tasty and smooth. The walnuts had a nice nutty toasted flavor. Still, no chocolate chunks. It wasn't until I got to the bottom of the pint a few nights later did I find THREE chocolate chunks. Not cool, not cool at all.

author: Ancy
title: The banana base is FLAWLESS!
text: I tried this flavor for the first time a few months ago, and albeit I'm not much of an ice cream person as it is, I CANNOT stop buying myself a pint each week! It is SO SO good. The banana base is perfection! I honestly don't even need the walnuts and the chocolate, although the walnuts are absolutely amazing in it... They completely NAILED the banana ice cream. Just....wow. <3

author: Tallie
title: Was skeptical
text: Tried this flavor today I was unsure about the bannna flavor but got it anyway it is so good. Bananas flavor was perfect wasn't overpowering the chocolate pieces were good tastes like good quality chocloate. I will get again

author: TheTyGuy
title: I’m sorry, but no.
text: Being a lover of ice cream, bananas, chocolate, and all forms of nuts, I expected to like this ice cream much more than I did. After the first few bites into the pint, I realized how gross the banana flavor in it is. This might just be me, but I did not like the flavor. Eating into it some more, I noticed a stinging in the back of my throat, I think because of the fudge pieces. It was an acidic sting the more I ate, and the worse it got the more I ate, so I ended up throwing away the pint soon after I started.

author: Vanessa
title: My All Time Fave since I was young....
text: Delicious, creamy nana icecream with nice chunks of chocolate and walnuts.

author: Justyne
title: So good!
text: I've been eating this since I was a kid, its their best flavor!

author: Erin89
title: All monkey and no chunky :(
text: This is the first I have tried chunky monkey. My go to is Americone Dream. I love chocolate covered bananas so I thought ... why not? I am so disappointed. Halfway through my pint and have only found 3 chocolate chunks. The ones I did find were delicious!

author: Rileyhd
title: Nice flavor
text: Got this instead of the mint to switch things up and let me tell you, I LOVE THIS. Great banana flavor. Everytime I take a bite with the fudge chunks it tastes like a chocolate covered banana

title: AMAZING, but needs more chocolate.
text: Okay I absolutely love this ice cream, it is my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor in fact. It's hard to choose the best part, but it is the chocolate chunks. After an intense amount of research I was unable to find what kind of chocolate was used in the ice cream. I would pay a lot of money to eat a chocolate bar made out of the kind of chocolate used in chunky monkey. So, as far as I'm concerned if you would like to keep my business you have two choices: 1. Add much more chocolate to pint of ice cream like advertised or 2. make chocolate bars. Thanks and have a great day.

author: CHUNKY MONKEY CONNOISSEUR
title: LOVE AT FIRST TASTE
text: I've been a Chunky Monkey fan for over 15 years now. I moved from New Jersey to Alabama to find out the quality is not the same. I've notice less chocolate chunks and the ice cream has a gritty texture. Not sure why the disparities but I look forward to going home (Jersey) for Christmas.
