I have a suggestion, PLEASE consider selling in half gallon or gallon sizes. This would make my life complete. Thank You for a delicious product

author: lizzysun
title: Best banana ice cream
text: My brother introduced me to this flavor years ago and it remains my favorite!

author: Jackie21
title: Addicted
text: I am addicted! this is the best product ever. The only one I purchase. I do not care about the calories because I run them but this icecream is so worth it. I used to make my banana shake with oats and milk...I gave that up to have this. My local grocery store was out so I decided to try the "Almond Milk" and I can tell you I was disappointed. The texture was not the same...it tasted like regular chunky monkey but expired.

author: JackieM
title: Reminds me of my childhood favorite ice cream
text: I absolutely love this Ice cream but I 100% could go without the walnuts, I don't really like those in there, I feel like the walnuts should be replaces with a lot more chocolate chunks. Breyers used to sell a banana ice cream with chocolate chips when I was younger but discontinued it and I was so unhappy! But this one is great, but again, a lot less walnuts or removing them completely would be great.

author: Luckii21
title: The best!!
text: My absolute favorite. My favorite thing to do is share some with my little man who loves it as well!

author: chunkylover11
title: Iconic
text: This is the best thing you could ever purchase, a very good investment.

author: Ranger702
title: My last meal request will include Chunly Monkey
text: I could gain 100lbs on this ice cream and be happy.

author: Chunko Munko Man
title: I'd give it 11 stars if it was possible
text:
I have been buying Chunk Monkey for years, I open it up and next thing I know.... I ate the whole darn thing!
My biggest disappointment is I can't get it anymore.
I moved from Montreal Que, to Saint John NB and there isn't a single store anywhere I can find it. My freezer used to have a pile of steak and a pile of Chunky Monkey.

author: Cam_
title: Simply great taste (:
text: First Ice cream flavor I had ever tried.. and wow. All I can say is this is nothing compared to any other Ice cream companys Ive tried throughout my childhood years till now. All though I can say is I do wish It had a great price where other buyers are able to afford it such as myself. But overall, I think this flavored Ice cream should be one of your GREAT classics.

author: issa
title: Too chunky!!
text: This is honestly my top favorite flavor ever but I wish the chocolate and nut chunks were smaller... when chocolate freezes it gets even harder to chew and it hurts my teeth so I usually eat around the bigger pieces and just eat the smaller ones!

author: Zucks29
title: Very good!
text: Love this flavor, rarely is banana done right. Only reason it’s not 5 stars is that I feel as though the walnut and chocolate pieces should be smaller so that the ice cream is more easily consumed when it is really cold.

author: Vero
title: Good, but little to no chocolate :/
text: The banana flavor is soooo good but I literally got 2 chocolate pieces which was kind of disappointing. Maybe I'll give it another chance.

author: HayyHayy
title: MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM EVER
text: Every time I go grocery shopping I buy 5 pints (which I go every week because I’m a college student) I wish I could buy more but I’m a broke college student. I go thru a pint every night. One day I walked to family dollar up the street because I thought they had it but they didn’t. After leaving family dollar I walked to multiple corner stores and they didn’t have it and they weren’t close either I was so depressed and sad when I went back to my dorm room. But I eat this ice cream almost every week. I just wanna say if you guys ever have a contest for a giveaway for this specific ice cream for months or a year I am entering and ima do everything to win! Love this ice cream out of all the Ben & Jerry ones ive had. I’ve even made my family start eating this one and one of my family members don’t even like bananas. Lol

author: Marky Mark
title: Surprisingly amazing flavor
text: I am a chocoholic and will almost never buy any ice cream with any fruit associated with it but I decided to be open minded with this and give it a shot, so trust me when I say that this stuff is absolutely amazing. I was afraid that it was going to have a very strong banana flavor but it doesnt at all. It doesnt taste like a frozen banana or a banana smoothie or the artificial banana you see in popiscles and candy. Instead, the masterminds created a perfect harmony of sweet cream, vanilla, and banana that keeps it from being boring and the texture is out of this world, better than any soft serve i have ever had with it's creaminess and density. The only reason i am not giving this a 5 stars review is because i didnt care for the walnuts or the fudge chunks. They could have left them out completely and that would have been perfectly okay with me or have gone with milk chocolate chunks or peanut butter cups. Still, this ice cream is one of their best and one of the best i have ever had and i am shocked to say that about a fruit flavored ice cream. I was so impressed with the flavor that went out the next day to buy another pint. Now I know why it's a top seller year after year.

author: _neenaaa
title: Delicious
text: The best combinations could only ask for smaller chocolate chunks

author: Happydude
title: Yummmmmm!
text: Try this flavor! You'll return to the store for more!

author: Rich from Cecil
title: How about a Chunky Mint Monkey??
text: Love Chunky Monkey but can we get a banana ice cream with York peppermint patties worked in?? Now that's a coooool monkey.

author: Gibby
title: The Umami of Ice Creams. Change My Mind.
text: Incredible real banana flavor, dark chocolate chunks at the size you DREAM all chunks should be at, and fatty walnuts to die for. So many other ice creams are sugar OVERLOADS. This flavor does not have to rely of excessive sugar to be great. Chunky Monkey is the umami of ice creams. Change my mind. Also, BRING IT BACK. My local stores are falling short. -Richmond, CA 94805.

author: Nicole81
title: Absolutely LOVE everything about Chunky Monkey!
text: This has been my favorite ice cream since I first tried it when I was a teenager. I keep saying I’m going to try another flavor, but it’s so hard. I love Ben & Jerry’s. There is no other ice cream that can compare to their ice cream. I mean every bite there is goodness! And anyone who knows me knows that I am not sharing my “Chunky Monkey”

author: Clark
title: A masterpiece of a flavor
text: I'd normally be skeptical of nuts in ice cream, but the walnuts and chocolate chunks in this flavor are just what the absolutely delicious banana ice cream calls for. I would like to shake the hand of whoever concocted this amazing recipe. The banana ice cream tastes delicious and unique, and the nuts and chocolate compliment it perfectly.

author: LexLuther
title: Drool worthy
text: The ice cream gods smile upon the flavor gurus that crafted this heavenly concoction. I always played it safe with cookie dough and half baked until I gave this flavor a try, and ever since, I'VE BEEN HOOKED! Forever my favorite, I urge EVERYONE who likes banana walnut to try this flavor, you won't be sorry!

author: Syd555
title: Banana ice cream is perfect
text: I loved the banana ice cream, it didn’t have that artificial banana flavor. Combined with the walnuts reminded me of banana bread. I didn’t care for the chocolate chunks, I wish there was a fudge swirl instead. I wish there was another banana flavor combined with peanut butter, caramel, or cheesecake.

author: Mamacross5
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!
text:
I bought Chunky Monkey a couple
Of days ago and baaabbbby.... let me tell you, this is the BEST ice cream flavor I have ever tasted. I love Coldstone’s banana ice cream but it has nothing on Ben & Jerry’s Chunky Monkey!!! It is perfection! Perfect flavor and perfect chunks! A new staple in my house!

author: Shake
title: Not a Fan
text: The banana ice cream is overpowering and struggles to compliment the chocolate and nuts. I ate a quarter of it and threw the rest away.

author: Nik904
title: I Love It
text: I purchased this ice cream because I'm lactose intolerant and was tired of only purchasing Breyers basic vanilla lactose free flavor. This ice cream is so good even my 2 yr old enjoys eating it. I just wish it was sold in a half gallon. The pint isn't enough.

author: Yummmmm
title: Delicious!!
text: I just tried this flavor and it's delicious!! The ice cream tastes exactly like frozen bananas with no after taste. The nuts and chocolate pieces are definitely a plus. I always loved Ben & Jerry ice cream and this will be one of my new favorites!

author: Uzziah 1954
title: Poor
text: I bought two Ben and Jerry's Chunky Monkey one pint ice cream. When I got home, I found out they must have been refrozen many times. The taste was horrible...what a disappointment. I could not recommend this product the way it was to anyone.

author: Nikki72
title: Needs improvement
text: This is my favorite. Just needs to change one thing, and this applies to all their flavors with chocolate chunks. DON’T. Jus leave out the chocolate chunks. They get hard as bricks when frozen and have no flavor. Like eating bits of plastic.

title: BEST EVER - sometimes
text: Chunky Monkey is by far my favorite ice cream and trust me I have eaten plenty of brands and flavors! BUT two of the last 3 pints I purchased were very disappointing. VERY VERY FEW fudge chunks - my favorite part of the pint!

author: Helen 1202
title: Addictive!
text: I am hocked, I was on dialysis, for about 5 years, I couldn’t eat ice cream, I just got a transplant in April, 2020, I have been eating this ice cream like crazy. But I was wondering if you could make it in your yogurt recipe.

author: SheriC
title: Chunky Monkey Is the Best!
text: I love your pint size Chunky Monkey... it is my guilty pleasure. Can you make it in the 4 oz size? I have only seen Cherry Garcia and Cookie Dough ice cream in the 4oz. Thank you! Also I would appreciate any coupons!

author: Monkey Magic
title: Recipe mods required
text: I now do my own at home, leading to the realization that roasted macadamia nuts make a better-than-BJs Chunky Monkey. Drop the walnuts, sub in macadamias and I think you'll have the best banana ice cream on the planet

author: Gamndalf the white
title: Where's the walnuts??
text: Great ice cream but I hardly got any walnuts in my pint. Lots of fudge chunks but little to no walnuts. This is already a simple ice cream and walnuts are one of only two mix ins. And there was hardly any in pint.

author: bridgenann
title: Best Banana Ice Cream I didn’t know I needed...
text: I’m on a mission to try all the Ben & Jerry’s flavors and have landed to Chunky Monkey. I can’t believe I held out so long! I thought banana ice cream would suck, but leave it to Ben and Jerry to prove me wrong!

author: Jon H
title: So delicious
text: I absolutely love Chunky Monkey. It’s always nutty, not too many chocolate chunks, but not to few. It’s always perfect!

author: Britms6133
title: Perfectly chunky
text: Just finished my pint of Chunky Monkey and it was sooo good. There was a perfect ratio of chocolate pieces and walnut to the banana ice cream in my tub. By far my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry’s ice cream.

author: Ryan
title: Best Ice Cream Ever (Or At Least Close)!
text: I love this ice cream! Banana ice cream has to be my favorite now. The fudge chunks are awesome (!) rather than having some swirl, and the walnuts are a perfect additional compliment. 5 Stars; 2 thumbs up!

author: Mamasuge
title: Every bite is perfext
text: I’m not sure how you do it but you get the perfect balance of chocolate, walnuts and banana flavor in each bite! No searching for chunks around the pint, they always there with each spoonful.

author: 802GirlLivinInThe603
title: Banana Ice Cream, what?!
text: Seriously, who thinks of banana ice cream with walnuts!? It's so good it should be illegal. But please don't make it illegal, I prefer not to have to go through the Black Market to get this.

author: Reenie Beenie
title: Oh YUM!
text: I never get tired of this....it’s my all time favorite!! Bananas and walnuts are so perfect together...throw some chocolate in and I’m the happiest human on the planet!! Love it!❤️

title: Delish Banana Icecream But No Chocolate Chunks :(
text: Brought this the other night, had it before and loved it! However, we dig around and only found a coulple of chocolate chunks, it was so good last time we were left disappointed:(

author: Macy
title: Literally So Good
text: Everything about this ice cream is perfect. The banana flavor is light, refreshing, and doesn't taste artificial. Perfect amount of chocolate and walnuts. Absolutely delicious,

author: TRVary77
title: Perfection
text: I tried this at one of the Ben and Jerry's factories in Vermont and I loved it. I have bought it so many times since then and it is my all time favorite ice cream flavor ever!

author: LunaLoca
title: Not just banana flavoring
text: Banana “flavor” is the worst. This reminds me of homemade banana ice cream. For me the nuts and chocolate are an added bonus but not the main event. It makes me happy.

author: Imai
title: The Best Ice cream flavour in the World
text: This is my favourite! An ultimate flavour combo that works every time. The fruitiness, the nuttiness & the chocolate rich taste comes together Harmoniously.

author: Becz
title: Perfect
text: This flavor never fails to lift my spirits! The chocolate chunks are a perfect amount so that the banana flavor of the ice cream isn't overwhelmed. Love!

author: latavia81
title: Favorite of My Son Honor and I
text: We love the sweet simplicity of the trio of flavors! Sweet banana flavored ice cream, chunky dark chocolate pieces and rich walnuts .....it’s a hit!!!

author: Sartzer
title: One of the best ice creams made!!!
text: Every time I’m at the store I have to pick a pint up. Can’t say enough about it. Smooth banana ice cream with decadent chunks of chocolate and nuts!

author: texx
title: not as advertised
text: I love banana ice cream, walnut, and fudge. But there is no fudge, it is dark chocolate which tastes like burnt chocolate to me. Will not buy again.

author: chunky
title: No chocolate chunks?
text: Flavor of the ice cream is nice and banana-y and there are some walnuts, but where are the chocolate chunks? Because of that, it is disappointing.

author: CassyDad
title: Flavor changed - now too sweet
text: So sad they changed this magical flavor. It’s now sickly sweet and you can’t really appreciate the flavor combo because all you taste is sugar.

author: Chunky808
title: Iconic B&J's
text: By far, the one flavor everyone knows is Ben & Jerry's. Chunky Monkey makes life fun, no matter how old you are. Banana Ice Cream is the star.

author: Terex54
title: Where is the flavor?
text:
The last 3 pints i bought of Chunky Monkey seemed to be lacking on the banana flavoring. Somewhat bland.
Have they changed the formula.

author: Jaqs
title: Best flavor ever
text: Chunky monkey is so addicting. The banana, walnut, and chocolate flavors go together fabulously. No doubt my favorite ice cream flavor.

author: Tina325
title: Needs more
text: This flavor is very good and unique but it lacks more toppings. I want more walnuts and chocolate chips and then it would be perfect!

author: Debs
title: The best ice cream in the world
text: I've never tasted an ice cream better than the chunky monkey. I can eat the whole pint at once. It's just impossible to stop eating

author: handsomebob77
title: Best Ice Cream Flavor. Period.
text: What the title says!! I've never met a better ice cream flavor. The banana is perfectly sweet and the walnuts perfectly walnutty.

author: Sissy
title: Best Ever
text: This is the best banana ice cream on the market. I love the chocolate chunks and the walnuts. Thank you so much for making this.

author: MsBluewings
title: If you LOVE Bananas. this is for YOU!
text: This flavor combination was one I used to go for almost all the time. It has a really banana flavor if you really LOVE Bananas.

author: Cake1792
title: Lol worst balance of contents
text: Literally one walnut and a couple of chocolate bits. The rest was the overperwering banana. Love B&J's but this was a joke

author: Sindie
title: Satisfies All My Cravings for different Flavors!
text: I love the variety of flavors within a Chunky Monkey pint. It's excellent for making sundaes and banana splits! Yummy!

author: Kittykate88
title: Everytime!
text: I literally buy this Everytime I buy ice cream. I wish the chocolate pieces were smaller, however I keep buying it lol

author: Lexia
title: Yum!
text: Best banana flavored anything! Normally I don’t care for things that are banana but this is my favorite flavor lately

author: Seahawkstml
title: Top 3
text: In my top3 my favorites, taste so pure and fresh, which is weird cause who would of thought frozen would taste fresh.

author: Lkflore
title: So good
text: It’s been my favorite for years. Banana ice cream check , chocolate chunks check and walnut pieces check. Sooo good

author: Apl42
title: Yum
text: I've been purchasing Ben and Jerry's chunky monkey for over 20 years. Awesome flavor, texture,

author: Nina16
title: Best ice cream ever
text: Chunky Monkey is not only my favorite flavour of Ben&Jerry's, but it's also the best I've eaten in my life

author: Philcallins0987
title: GOOD
text: Good flavor but feel like it needs cherries added to it. Its definitely missing an additional ingredient

author: Moops57
title: Best Banana Flavor Ever!
text: It will be a sad day when TR4 wipes out bananas for good. Get some Chunky Monkey while you still can!

author: Suchalady
title: Chunky Monkey is the GOAT
text: I wish this flavor was available in gallon sizes because I buy a pint or two almost every other day.

author: kolliaskat
title: my therapy :)
text: literally my favorite ice cream ever... I'm lactose intolerant but I suffer for some Chunk Money

author: Becky39
title: Great combination of flavors
text: Hooked ever since I tried it. Family loves Ben and Jerry. We each have our own favorite flavor.

author: pokerdude03
title: My all time favorite
text: If I had to complain about this ice cream, it would be that it doesn't come in gallon sizes.

author: Tamishyee
title: Banana chocolate walnuts, perfect combo
text: I love Chunky Monkey, sweet ice cream which chucks of chocolate and walnuts, its too good.

author: Dennifer
title: Best Flavor!
text: This flavor is the reason I eat Ben and Jerry's! My absolute favorite ice cream ever !!

author: Kris
title: Amazing!
text: Literally the best ice cream flavor I have ever had. In fact its the only one i eat!

author: Yurwelcome
title: Simple yet perfect
text: Not too many added in pieces. The banana flavor isn’t overbearing. I love it.

author: loes_vd
title: Waw!!
text: This is my all-time favorite! OMG Love it so much! Little piece of heaven :D

author: Vette
title: Amazing flavor
text: I LOVE this flavor, it is my go to for when i'm celebrating or feeling down.

author: Janz
title: My favorite
text: This is the perfect ice cream because it’s so flavorful but not too sweet!!

author: Gabby2234
title: Best flavor!!
text: Honestly the best flavor they make!!! Not too rich, fruity and chocolatey!

author: gracie
title: BEST FLAVOR
text: Has been my favorite flavor since I first tried it. Absolutely amazing.

author: neli
title: Ingredients
text: Would love for there to be a little more walnuts. Too much chocolate.

author: ChunkyMonkeyLover
title: Love this flavor!
text: Best ice cream ever made! Love the mix of banana flavor w the nuts!

author: chunkybj
title: Delicious
text: I love this ice cream. It’s my happy place. I buy it all the time!

author: OlleC
title: Best flavour ever!
text: My all time favorite ice cream, to bad it's no longer in Sweden :(

author: Shawna
title: Delicious!
text: Heaven in a cup! Always my go to pint of ice cream when I indulge

author: caseydev
title: I love it!
text: I am lactose intolerant, but I still eat it and really enjoy it.

author: Jase
title: Sooo Perfect!!!
text: Never makes it straight into my freezer. By far my favorite!!

author: 802Red
title: The best
text: Who knew banana ice cream could be so creamy and delicious!!!?

author: Mjovane
title: My wife loves it!!!!
text: Great combibation of chocolate and banana flavors with crunch

author: Tx95
title: My Favorite Flavor.
text: Nom nom nom nom nom nom nom nom nom nom nom. ... Nuff said.

author: Yael
title: The best all around flavor, texture, presentation
text: The best all around for flavor, texture, presentation

author: TrishyPants
title: The best!
text: Love the banana ice cream! By far my favorite flavor!

author: Msbjealous
title: Absolutely the best
text: Forever has this been my favorite it forever will be

author: Icecreamnut
title: My Fave Flavor
text: Please keep this flavor. It's one of my favorites.

author: ahumanbeing
title: Best flavor of all time
text: 30 years. 3 continents. 7 countries. Countless types and flavors of ice cream. This is it. This is literally the best ice cream flavor I have ever tasted in my whole life, period.

author: erikarubes
title: Cinnamon Lovers Unite
text: I am in love with this flavor. It's a little hard to find but whenever i see it, i seriously by 3 pints at a time. (and its gone by the end of the week because my kids love it too)

author: CorrieH
title: My absolute favorite!
text: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor ever, I’ve been getting it for years and since I’m lactose intolerant I even tried the dairy free version and it was amazing too! My biggest complaint is it’s impossible to find in my area! So sad!!

author: Dnice
title: Top 5 flavor hands down!!
text: This is one of the best ice cream flavors I have ever had. It is probably more like top 3 flaovr for me and I have tried a lot of ice cream. It is bursting with cinnamon flavor and is unlike any flavor I have ever had. I got my Mom hooked on it now. If there is EVER even a thought of retiring this flavor I would have to make a trip to Vermont to talk to the CEO of Ben and Jerrys. It is that good.

author: Adam
title: TASTES AMAZING
text: This flavor is the best ice cream flavor I've ever had. It's my favorite. Please bring it back to my area.

author: Mrstriadafillou
title: To die for!
text: I bought this the other day, skeptical it'd live up to all that cinnamon-y goodness. I know that the salt caramel core ice cream needs more caramel, so I was iffy about this.

author: Trace22214
title: The BEST most Amazing flavor of all time!
text: My #1 favorite & I have access to ice cream, fresh frozen custard, frozen yogurt, etc. I can't even come up with words to describe the deliciousness of this caramel ice cream with cinnamon bun pieces & the cinnamon strudel swirls!!!!! This can NEVER end up in the graveyard! Thank you for this flavor.

author: cigarman512
title: WOW!!
text: Eating it for the first time right now, you guys are gonna make me into an addict with this flavor!

author: luisbet151
title: Heaven on a spoon
text: This is the best ice cream I have ever tasted. I have never written a review but this merits one!

author: manda55
title: Dry dough :(
text: I (embarrassingly) spent about half an hour reading Ben and Jerry flavor reviews before deciding that Cinnamon Buns was going to be my new favorite! Drove to the store and could hardly wait to taste it when i got home and....... I was disappointed :( Although the cinnamon flavor was delicious and definitely there, the cinnamon bun dough pieces that other reviewers were raving about just weren't there for me. The dough was VERY dry and crumbly, NOT at all soft and gooey like others have claimed. Not sure if mine was a bad batch but unfortunately I was very disappointed.

author: Billybob6869
title: Tastebud Delight
text: Hello, my name is Ronny I just want to say how absolutely amazing Ben and Jerry’s did on this one of a kind flavor. When I taste this ice cream. I taste morning breakfast at grandmas with a cinnamon bun in my mouth melting my tastebuds. Ben and jerry all I can say is you succeeded everything and beyond. Thank you for being you and all you do to make these flavors. You always have my support. Never again will I have another brand of ice cream outside of Ben and Jerry’s. Thank you. I love you. Goodnight

author: OnereviewEric
title: Disappointed
text:
I purchased this flavor after reading how great it was on reddit.
I can honestly say I’m very disappointed.The cinnamon bun dough are like gobs of gritty sugar. The caramel ice cream is ok. Almost like eating liquified brown sugar pop tarts.
I’ll stick with cherry Garcia

author: FuzzyGut
title: YUM! Absolutely delivers on its title!
text: All I can say about this one is that it’s perfect! The ice cream is great, the bun dough chunks are perfect and the streusel swirl is SUBLIME! I let mine melt for just a few minutes to get it even gooier! This is a great flavor pint and was just a little sad when I finished it.

author: ag31026
title: I Love It...and I Miss It!
text: Cinnamon Buns was the best ice cream coping mechanism to help me with my dad passing away in August 2018. It's fulfilled my love for cinnamon and is my favorite flavor in the world! As of March 2019, however...I never see it in my area. My college town and my hometown don't seem to sell it ANYWHERE! I actually cried on my mom's birthday over it, how embarrassing. It truly is the best ice cream in the entire world. I miss it so much.

author: SamanthaAnn25
title: Best Flavor EVER!!
text:
The first time I tried this was a few months ago and man, have I been missing out!! This stuff is heaven in a little pint.. I'm kind of glad these are sold in smaller amounts sometimes.. because its so addicting you almost want to eat the whole thing in one sitting!! I try to make it last but its so difficult! Lol <3
Please do NOT ever think of discontinuing this flavor... 'cuz its the bees knees! Haha! :)

author: Thom
title: Strange texture
text: I ran to the store to try a new flavor and just opened a pint of this today and was disappointed in the quality of the buns dough... the dough tasted old and was too hard. I tried leaving it to sit out for a while to see if it had just needed to thaw a bit, but that did not do the trick, also there were big almost sugar cubes between the ice cream. :(

author: Scott_56
title: Cinnamon Dreams are made of this
text: Look no further, Cinnamon fanatics. This is the flavor you've been waiting for. The gooey swirl will keep you diving back in with your spoon, and if you're lucky you'll come up with some cinnamon bun dough too. I've considered buying an extra freezer dedicated to pints of this flavor. I can only hope it sticks around!

author: Brie
title: Cinnamon Lovers Delight!
text: Finally decided to try this flavor today and my goodness I was NOT disappointed. That streusel swirl is heaven! And the dough pieces remind me more like giant frozen pieces of crumb topping. Like the kind on top coffee cake with is HEAVEN. I definitely need some warm coffee cake to plop a scoop of this deliciousness on!

author: lala4now
title: Like a cinnamon bun in ice cream form
text: I just tried this flavor for the first time and it's my new favorite flavor. It's everything I hoped it would be - from the ice cream itself to the cinnamon swirls, streusel pieces and cookie dough. Absolutely delicious. If you love the rich, indulgent gooeyness of a fresh cinnamon roll you'll love this flavor.

author: Durban
title: Mostly good
text: I was super excited to stumble upon this flavor. It was delicious other than the cinnamon bun dough bites. The dough had a weird taste and after a few pieces i could only describe it as a black licorice flavor. I mostly picked out the dough pieces and was able to enjoy the rest of the ice cream!

author: Flip08
title: Skeptical
text: I have to admit that I was a little skeptical about this when I bought it, so I bought a backup pint of Americone Dream just in case. I have never eaten a pint of B&Js so fast in my life.....it was amazing !!!!! Keep it coming B&Js.....Cinnamon Buns has officially entered my top 5

author: ToplessJeepChick
title: Heaven in a Pint!
text: Love, love, love this flavor!! It used to be harder to find, but lucky me it started showing up in more places. This is by far my most favorite ice cream flavor. I never get tired of it and when I do try other flavors although I enjoy them I always go back to my cinnamon buns!!

author: SBayjj
title: Sweet!
text: There is nothing I love better than a cinnabon bun. However, for me, this did not translate well into ice cream. Maybe i'm getting older, but this flavor is over the top sweet for me. And that is saying a lot. Sorry, I won't be buying this one again.

author: SuzeQ
title: Omg I can't live without this!
text: As a chocoholic, it's a pretty big deal when I will always choose this ice cream flavor over any chocolate flavor. Please don't ever retire this flavor! I could not live with out my cinnamon buns ice cream!!!

author: LAURENC
title: So good, so hard to find!
text: I actually came here to figure out if Cinnamon Buns is just a seasonal flavor. Why is it so hard for all of us to find (I've now read everyone else's comments). Please deliver more everywhere!!!

author: Cms2191
title: FAVORITE ice cream
text: This is by far my favorite ice cream. I'm not always a big ice cream person but I always end up eating the whole pint of this stuff. Tastes just like a cinnamon roll!

author: Lmcg91
title: Ultra Sweet Bun-mazing
text: LOVE the cinnamon bun dough chunks and the delicious creamy cinnamon flavor. It’s really like a cinnamon bun in ice cream form!

author: Kmiller2721
title: The best ever!
text: If you love brown sugar pop tarts then you will love this! Its the exact flavor plus so much more!

author: SugarPlumVixen
title: Model Of What All Cinnamon Ice Creams Should Be
text: I've never thought that an ice cream would make me feel all warm and gooey and content inside but Ben & Jerry's decided otherwise. I bought this on a whim when my cinnamon loving mother was supposed to visit me but I ended up having to buy a second pint before she even got there. This ice cream has such a pronounced buttery cinnamon flavour to its base, and the dough remains just soft enough so that it really feels like you're biting into a chunk of the thick cinnamon rolls you get at the mall. The cinnamon streusel swirl was probably my favourite part though. My mom and I fought over who got to scoop their spoon through the biggest swirls. Just to note it, my first pint had a lot of swirl while my second had more dough. Both were delightful but I wish it would have been more consistent with more of both aspects please!

author: RMundo28
title: Amazing!!
text: My favorite flavor ever!!! Is different from all the other companies

author: abenny415
title: Bomb
text: Broooooo. it SLAPS. It is for sure my new favorite.

author: dre1018
title: Amazing!!! Hard to stop eating it!
text: This is my absolute favorite flavor of any ice cream! It might be the swirl. It might be the cinnamon bun chunks but from the moment I taste the first spoonful, it is bliss! It's been a while since I'd seen it but soooo happy I've found it again! Is is loaded with chunks of cinnamon bun like dough. I don't know what it truly is but it is amazing!

author: Alex576
title: Super disappointing
text: Not what you'd expect from Ben and Jerry's. If I didn't know better if think it was some cheap store brand. The "gobs" of cinnamon roll dough are just those weird sugary chunks like in cheap cookie dough ice cream. Not like any of the other dough in Ben and Jerry's ice cream. I took a few bites and it sat in the freezer for months until we threw it out.

author: DC24
title: Not This One!
text: Just not enough contrast in this flavor. It simply fails to capture the essence of a delicious cinnamon roll. It was a valiant effort, but it just wasn't enough for me to recommend the product to anyone. I love some of Ben & Jerry's flavors, just not this one!

author: Jsteps
title: Only cinnamon bon ice cream
text: B&J Cinnamon bon ice cream is not just the best B&J flavor but also the most unique. I was hooked on this flavor, it was my go-to for a frozen treat. Then it disappeared. I was left feeling empty and unsatisfied. Did you know there's not even a competing cinnamon flavor ice cream made by any other companies? What's the deal with that? Why would cinnamon be so scarce from frozen tastey varieties?! ...heartbroken.

author: atik
title: Simple but different
text: This isn't one of the Ben and Jerry's crazier flavors where they have unusual combinations of mix ins and flavors, like half baked or milk and cookies. Still, it's an amazing flavor. This flavor is one of my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavors. Everything from the steusel swirls to the dough to the caramel base in this pint is solid, and I can't name anything I would want to change about it.

author: Blancos Girl
title: AMAZING BUT HARD TO FIND
text: Im telling you this is literally the best flavor!!!! But so hard to find not even the big name brand places like Walgreens and what not have it. Once you do find it it’s EVERYTHING, the chunks of cinnamon are to die for. Every bite is worth the find. Not to say I enjoy scavenging through stores to find it. But it is sooo enjoyable it’s crazy. MAKE IT MORE AVALIBLE PLEASE!

author: Usefulcoin
title: Nice flavor, too sweet thoughm
text: I love cinnamon but the sugar in here is just too much

author: booboo3677
title: FAVORITE ICE CREAM EVER
text: I have had a multitude of ice creams all my life but none compare to this Cinnamon Buns one! This has been my go to ice cream for 6 years and will forever be my favorite. So hard to find but I hope this never becomes discontinued because I will probably never find anything as great as this one and will actually cry if it goes away!

author: rpisjake
title: Totally amazing!
text: I tried this a few weeks ago and ended up buying 4 more pints before the weekend was over. It is by far my favorite flavor I've ever had! The only problem is that I want it all the time... If you could make it carb free, fat free and guilt free then I would live on it. Lol! I didn't think I was an ice cream person...I was wrong!

author: CiciMarques
title: The only ice cream I’d eat!
text:
This is it! This is THE one! I love this ice cream and won’t waste my time with any other flavor!
It’s so hard to find though... I haven’t found it in my area for the past 3 months... and that’s why I came to check it on the website...
yes, I am writing this review tomemcpurahe you to never discontinue this flavor!

author: Mackenzie
title: Cinnamon Buns
text: I bought this because my store was out of Oat of this Swirled. If you like lots of chunks this is for you! Unfortunately I couldn't seem to shake the flavor of licorice from the dough chunks. But I was impressed by how much dough they fit in the pint. Not my favorite, but definitely worth the try!

author: icelover
title: So good I could cry
text: Ice cream is my absolute favorite dessert. And anyone who knows me knows I always have a sweet tooth. In all my 18 years, I have never seen this flavor until yesterday. It is delicious, wonderful, and life-changing quite honestly. Because it was so hard to find but what a gem this ice cream is!!

author: Purple77
title: Simply Amazing
text: My favorite flavor, hands down. I can't express enough how amazingly delicious this flavor is. I literally have to draw upon the deepest recesses of my will power to stop myself from eating the whole thing in one sitting. Please please please never discontinue this one. I would be so grateful.

author: Sriddick
title: Cinnoman is a dream come true
text: This cinnamon bun ice cream is a fight in my house this is the only kind i eat its the best my husband eats other ben and jerry so i be yelling at his cause he'll eat the cinnamon bun smh selfish i will fight for the cinnamon bun its is heaven in a container just the best

author: Radzach
title: Too rich
text: This one is all right, its a little to sweet for me all though I love the flavor combinations. Its to rich for my tatse.

author: Peter
title: The best hands down!
text: For those of us who don’t like chocolate, there is rarely an option outside of vanilla or a fruity variety. So I was so excited to find this. And I’ve introduced it to my chocolate loving friends and even they agree it is the best ice cream on the market!!!!

author: Stephan
title: Best flavor so far
text: I got it with a delivered pizza and instantly fell in love with the taste.

author: Maryquality
title: Best flavor ever!!
text: This is my all time favorite ice cream in the entire universe!!! If you love cinnamon rolls, then this is the ice cream for you. The problem I have with this flavor is the availability in the grocery stores. It's hit or miss with it.

author: Dannyboy
title: MOST AMAZING ICE CREAM FLAVOR EVER!!!
text: This flavor tastes like eating a Cinnabon! I'm addicted to it! I tried it when it first came out and to date I have not found a flavor better-tasting than this one! Simply amazing! One spoonful and you'll be hooked! Guaranteed!

author: Chad
title: Absolutely delicious!!!
text: This is not only my favorite B&J's flavor, but my favorite ice cream. Period. The ice cream, dough pieces, and cinnamon swirls are so fantastic that it's impossible to put a pint of Cinnamon Buns down until it's empty!!!

author: Shelbynic18
title: To die for
text: This is my absolute favorite ice cream and I always eat the whole pint in one sitting. Nothing needs to be changed about this ice cream, please never discontinue. Is there anyway to get this in a quart?

author: Bethany Grotto
title: I love the dough balls!
text: I had this at my local cinema and was instantly hooked. Move over Chunky Monkey... you have been usurped by this cinnamon dream. It's delicious, just the right level of cinnamon flavour. I love it!

author: CW1984
title: Cinnamon Bun Heaven!!!!
text: This is my absolute favorite flavor!! It’s not a sweet overload. All of the flavors marry together very well. I love the cinnamon bun dough pieces! Please NEVER EVER EVER EVER get rid of this!

author: morgan123
title: Best Ice Cream Ever
text: Every time I go to the store I search out this ice cream because it is easily the best thing I have ever had. The first time I tried it I accidentally ate the whole pint in under 30 minutes.

author: hollyxo
title: Best flavor ever
text: Im so happy I bought this flavor ice cream. It was so amazing! There were so many pieces of dough my mouth is watering just thinking about it! I have to get myself some more!

author: johnc
title: Fantastic flavors!
text: I love cinnamon buns, so I was thrilled to find this flavor! There is cinnamon in every bite...just like a cinnamon bun. It's hard to control myself with this flavor.

author: sydneyc
title: My favorite ice cream by far!!
text: Always a classic. Was delighted to see my Walmart carried this flavor when I moved to a new town. I will always buy this flavor over any other flavor or brand any day

author: isabella
title: Best Flavor I Have Ever Had
text: I have been buying this flavor since I came out the womb. I rarely buy anything else. For me, this is the best flavour of Ben and Jerry's Ice Cream out there.

author: KellyR76
title: Best ice cream EVER!
text: I don’t like chocolate, so finding a good ice cream flavor other than vanilla is difficult. This is the BEST!!! And all my chocolate eating friends agree.

author: LizzyC
title: The Most Delicious Ice Cream of ALL Time
text: I am in love with this flavor. So many cinnamon roll chunks and the cinnamon swirl?!?! Forget it. The most delicious ice cream of ALL time.

author: SirWased
title: The best of your Ice Creams sold in Denmark!
text: I have had this ice cream quite a few times and I've had to limit myself to one quart every 3 months because I could live off of this one.

author: Melv
title: OMG!!!! The Best Flavor Hands Down
text: My hubby bought this flavor and let me tell you I couldn’t get enough my gosh B&J you have outdone yourselves with this one

title: DELICIOUS
text: I picked this out when i was 12 because I knew I loved cinnamon buns.. this was 10x better than any icecream I’ve ever had.

author: Jebber007
title: Amazing flavor
text: This flavor is by far the most addictive flavor. It's virtually impossible to stop eating, so o typically finish a pint.

author: Stephyyyy
title: NO NO NO!!!!!
text: Why is this no longer at my Target and on clearance at Walmart???! Don’t you dare discontinue this glorious flavor.....

author: Debbi
title: Hands down the best
text: We love cinnamon buns and when I saw this at the store I had to get some for the whole family and we all loved it.

author: CHERI
title: This is crack!!!
text: OMG, this is the best in my opinion! SO SO SO good. Add more strussel and chunks, overload that sucker. SO GOOD!

author: Cinnaloveruk
title: Bring to the uk
text: So many times flavours don’t reach the UK. Is this because all of the additives that you Americans love so much?

author: HannahYummy
title: This is literally the most amazing ice cream
text: This is by far my fav B&J’s ice cream, I wish it was easier to find! 10/10 would always eat again.

author: cln1
title: To die for
text: The best ice cream I have ever had! Every time we go to the store I can't resist getting it!

author: Birdy
title: Rich flavor!
text: In my top three. Rich flavor. They want eleven more letters but its all about the flavor

author: Iloveicecream1234
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!
text: I consistently buy this ice cream! It is my favorite because of its texture and taste!

author: Maccy14
title: Pure filth. In a good way.
text: Ridiculously good, it's just not available in a lot of places like the others. Shame.

author: Rebekah0509
title: Careless Whisper
text: I have been a dedicated Ben&Jerry's customer for a long time. First, I fell in love with Cherry Garcia. It was perfect. Finally ice cream had enough flavor with actual pieces of cherry! But then things changed...and I grew up. I grew up and I realized that my heart truly belonged to Half Baked. We were true soulmates. And I have eaten an average of a pint a week, ever since then, for years... I was certain nothing could ever superced perfection!!

author: Nick
title: Cinnamony Goodness
text: This flavor is a true cinnamon lover's delight! I eat it at least once a week.

author: Icecream991
title: Delicious!!!
text: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream. I just cant seem to get enough!

author: crazyk
title: Just like a baked Cinnamon Rol
text: Great flavor! My favorite of Ben &Jerry's! Taste like a real cinnamon bun!

author: RyanQ
title: BEST FLAVOR
text: My absolute favorite flavor! If you like cinnamon rolls you'll love it.

author: Dian
title: Amazing
text: Tried first time at Ben and Jerry Vermont factory. Favorite flavor now.

author: Mello
title: BEST EVER
text: PLEASE always make this!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!! Cinnamon Buns 4 ever!

author: Carebear
title: Yummo
text: Just tried this flavor and it's by far my favorite!!!

author: Beachlover24
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!!
text: Best ice cream and best flavor EVER! So delicious!

author: Bean
title: All time favorite!!
text: Discovered this flavor in a scoop store in Kingston, Ontario years ago. It became my go to flavor. I would hunt it down where ever we moved to. ;) No other coffee ice cream is strong enough and has just the right balance of chocolate and coffee like this one. Got my niece hooked on it too. Sadly she lives in Vienna, Austria and can't get it. Any way this great flavor can make it to the EU?? Please! Lots of Europeans like strong coffee. In the meantime my niece came to visit Boston, MA this summer and she was very excited to have it again. It was a good as she remembered.

author: ccbbb lover
title: Thank goodness for CCBBB
text: I was so disappointed when my favorite B&J flavor (Coffee Heath Bar Crunch) changed to Coffee Toffee Crunch and the flavor went way down hill. I decided to try CCBBB. It is on beyond delicious. It is how I reward myself after hard work in the garden, or walking with my Mastiff, or other causes for exhaustion or for celebration. When I finished my taxes the first thing I did was grab the CCBBB out of the freezer ..... my reward to myself. I have recommended CCBBB to others and their reactions have been positive. Thank you B&J! By the way --- the Mastiff has to stick to vanilla!

author: I Love Ice Cream
title: THE BEST!
text: I am both a chocolate and coffee lover, and this is the single best coffee ice cream I've ever tried. The coffee flavor is so strong and there are many large chunks of rich espresso bean chocolate pieces. So much flavor...this ice cream really does pack a punch. Please NEVER discontinue this flavor, Ben and Jerry's! I stock up every month. :)

title: The GOAT of coffee ice cream
text: I’ve tried all of the coffee flavored ice cream I can find in local stores and this one is easily the best. My only issue is that’s it’s not carried at many stores and I’ve had trouble finding it in the last month. Thankfully the B&J team assured me it’s not discontinued but the production is behind because of the pandemic. When things are back to normal please get this in more stores so more people will discover this incredibly indulgent and amazing treat!

author: Katie W
title: Strong
text: I bought this after a 3rd shift at work to get me through the rest of morning class at school. Its really quite strong and kept me quite awake!

author: luna09
title: Simply the best!
text: I adore this flavor. I have become quite a fan of stronger coffee over the years so this one is a winner. The coffee ice cream is definitely strong and just sweet enough. The espresso fudge pieces give a nice texture contrast and are a lot like eating chocolate covered espresso beans. Fortunately there are at least a couple stores in my area that have this one and I hope they never stop carrying it. Please never discontinue this flavor.

author: wnabmedic
title: GET BUZZED
text: I've been waiting for this flavor to come back to my area FOREVER! #InLove

author: Jmcorral504
title: Great coffee flavor!
text: I used to purchase a different brand of coffee ice cream and they no longer make it...BUT then I found you! Oh how I love you coffee coffee buzz buzz! I have tried almost every brand of so called "coffee" ice cream and nothing even comes close to the strong, creamy coffee flavor of this wonderful ice cream...can you tell how much I LOVE this ice cream?

author: Dishon
title: BEST (next to EVERYTHING BUT THE)
text: This is one of my FAVORITES. I first tried this in the B&J on my college campus and fell in love with it. Unfortunately, when I got home, I couldn't find the flavor anywhere I was bummed. That was about 5 years ago. I never wouldve thought to check the company website. I just thought it was a discontinued flavor but NOPE, I see that for my area they're selling it exclusively at Target. Now all I need are coupons.

author: DR725
title: Absolute All Time FAVORITE FLAVOR!!
text: I am literally addicted to this flavor!! I love it!! It’s the best coffee flavored ice cream ever. I know I sound like I’m exaggerating but I honestly mean every word. I buy at least 2 pints every weekend for my cheat meals. Eat like half a pint for the weekend nights. I’ve tried so many other coffee flavors because it’s one of my favorites but this one tops them all the strength of the coffee flavor is the best it doesn’t have that weird too creamy taste it’s just like adding some milk and sugar to a cup of espresso and a side of some dark chocolate which is honestly the best flavor combo ever just pairs so well. And I love the dark chocolate espresso pieces; I used to buy dark chocolate covered espresso beans and eat them and it reminds me of that with the light crunchy-ness of the beans in the chocolate. My literal worst fear is that I go to my grocery store one of these fridays and I find out that this flavor has been pulled or discontinued! If this flavor ever got taken away that would be the worst ever!! I mean I think I buy out this flavor at my store alone and waiting for it to get shipped sucks and is a pain. This is a lot just for a flavor of ice cream but as I said before I love it and I’m addicted to it. It’s the only coffee flavor ice cream I’ll buy. Thank for making it!!

author: JMQCC
title: OMG! Where have you been all of my life!!!
text: This is, by far, one of the best flavors I have ever tasted! Tried it on a whim, not a coffee drinker or lover of coffee, but because the store did not have my normal go-to flavor (NY Fudge Chunk), I thought I would give it a try. Now, I am eagerly searching for grocers in my son's home state so that he can buy it and love it too!

author: Mala
title: One of my faves!
text: I live in Taiwan, and we sadly get very limited flavors of B&J's here. However, this one is one I'm happy to have. Excellent coffee flavor with just the right amount of chocolate. I'm ashamed to say how many pints I ate this summer, when it was just too hot to even go outside (except to the Carrefour store for more ice cream!).

author: livkerp
title: The literal best
text: This is my all time favorite ice cream flavor. The only downside is that I can eat it all in one sitting! It is so good, my family and I are obsessed. We even travel to get it because it is only available in certain stores around us. Wish it was available everywhere! Truly an underrated flavor!

author: Bre86
title: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz
text: Hello from HOUSTON, TEXAS!!! All do B&J ice cream is delicious, but CCBBB has my heart. Every bite has a scrumptious bit of espresso...its like you have to savor the entire pint in one sitting. I load up EVERYTIME I SEE MORE THAN ONE. PLEASE KEEP THIS FLAVOR GOING....ITS MY SPA DAY FAVORITE!!!

author: Denise
title: Delicious!
text:
Got a free pint of the coffee ice cream from Market Street for my birthday!
I love this flavor! Took one bite and couldn't put my spoon down. My husband also took a bite and couldn't seem to put his spoon down either. Love the big chunks of chocolate mixed in.

author: Shtal14
title: Help!!
text: I have loved this ice cream for years. For the last few months I have not been able to find it. I’ve looked at every supermarket and called all over town. Even looked into ordering on amazon, but out of stock. Is this discontinued ??

author: jonpeg
title: Love this flavor!
text: We love this flavor, it has good, strong coffee flavor, and with the espresso fudge it's the best coffee ice cream out there! We haven't found it near us for a while and are glad to see it is still being made. Thanks Ben and Jerry!

author: Bill13
title: Lost Product
text: I absolutely love this flavor and so many stores near me stopped carrying it. I have actually abandoned a shopping cart and left the store when I found my favorite no longer on the shelf.

author: FuzzyGut
title: Simple awesomeness
text: This was not a hard one to love. Delicious ice cream with delicious espresso chocolate chips! Simple? Yes. Boring? Heck no! It’s so good and kept me digging till the end of the pint!

author: Good stuff
title: I live for these
text: Really great coffee flavor. These are totally worth trying if you dig coffee flavored ice cream. I would dive over others to get the last one in the case. These really are that good.

author: Amby
title: Delicious
text: This flavor is by far my favorite. If you're a fan of coffee and ice cream I highly recommend trying it. The only disappointment is most stores in my area don't carry it.

author: Trishia
title: hands down, the BEST COFFEE ICE CREAM
text: I have been buying this since it first came out, and EVERYTIME (and he eats ice cream nightly) he eats this, he says' GOD I LOVE THIS ICE CREAM!

author: fansnotes
title: Coffee lovers' dream ice-cream!
text: Rich coffee flavor (not like the milky latte flavor of most other brands) and the chips augment that taste with crunchy texture!

author: BuzzBuzz
title: Best ice cream ever!
text: If I were on death row, my last meal would be a gallon of Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz. Just joking -- it'd be two gallons.

author: Cyndy
title: Love This Ice Cream Flavor
text: Coffee and chocolate are my favorite things to drink and eat. I get both in this cream! This is best ice cream ever!

author: ALM77
title: EXCELLENT
text: EXCELLENT coffee ice cream. I love the coffee and chunks of espresso chocolate.

author: Coffee dreams
title: Really, no words can describe the awesomeness
text: Best coffee ice cream in the world, hands down!! Never tasted better.

author: Lynda with a y
title: Disappointed
text: I was so sad when my favorite coffee Heath bar crunch was replaced by toffee heath bar crunch. It is a total loss of flavor profiles - especially the change to the coffee base. Then the proportions changed in coffee coffee buzz buzz buzz so there is so little coffee ice cream in most of the pints I buy that I end up with at least 1/3 of the pint filled with the excess chocolate pieces after digging thru the pint searching for the tase of the worlds best coffee ice cream. I haven’t stopped buying pints because I love the coffee flavor and a portion of the buzz buzz is perfect.

author: Midnight Rider
title: My favorite go-to flavor!
text: I love my coffee, and I had high expectations for this when it got my attention. It instantly became my all-time favorite, kicking Americone Dream out of the ring for a while. It's not overly sweet in a toothaching way, and the espresso component isn't bitter either. It's a nice little pick-me up when you're wanting your caffeine fix and a nice way to cool down on a hot day.

author: Tallkid86
title: No your best work
text: I just recently came across this in the store and thought I would try it because how bad could coffee ice cream be? Unfortunately, I quickly regretted buying this products. The "coffee" tasted awful and the chunks tasted weird. Idk if the pint its self was just being sold by the store old but it didn't even look appetizing either.

author: Gail26
title: Love Love Love!!! Coffee Coffee Buzz Buzz!!!
text: Started off with Coffee Coffee Buzz Buzz at my local Ben & Jerry's Shop in the '90's (it moved - & so did I.) It gave me a hit of that instant buzz buzz in the surreal shop setting reminiscent of the Grateful Dead & California vibes of the '80's. I could sit with my small son & continue my California Dreamin' of yesteryear.

author: MakeMore CCBBB
title: Best Ice cream ever
text: I consider this the single best commercial ice cream flavor I have ever had. Given that I can never find it, you must not be keeping up with the demand, that is if you made more you should be able to sell more and make more money. HELP! Please make it mare available!

author: Jackytheripper
title: If you like coffee, this ice cream is for you
text: This ice cream is so freaking yummy! I've never had anything like it. The fudge is so good and somehow you can chew it and it's crispy, then it melts. And the coffee is a true kick to the face coffee flavor. Perfection!

author: HollyA
title: Perfect balance
text: Great balance of coffee ice cream and fudge chunks. The fudge chunks have some coffee on them and it is heavenly. One of my favorites! Sometimes it is hard to find in stores...when I see it, I buy 2!

author: richy
title: coffee tastes mild but it is nice and creamy
text: Loved the crunchy pieces contrasting with the smooth ice cream. Coffee could be stronger though

author: KitterKat
title: Best of the best!
text: This is my all time favorite flavor. I’ve always loved coffee flavored ice cream but this takes it up several notches of awesome. Never get rid of this flavor!!!

author: Tx95
title: My 2nd Favorite Flavor.
text: I grab this when I'm when I'm not in the mood for Chunky Monkey. It's like a mocha-chip with a bit of a kick. I like it. It's pretty good.

author: mray
title: Best flavor!
text: I have been hooked on this flavor for quite a few years and am sad that it my grocery chain shows that it has been discontinued!

author: Porsha
title: Awesome flavor
text: Got this flavor for free cone day and it was amazing. Loved the pieces of coffee grounds inside the chocolate chunks.

title: It’s AMAZING!
text: It’s so addicting. It’s hard to control myself and try not to eat the whole pint, I buy this in like batches.

author: coffeelover77
title: Love the coffee, love the chocolate
text: Wonderful taste -- my only regret is that my local shoprite frequently runs out.

author: Maryann
title: Nothing Better
text: The flavor of this can't be replicated. Any other coffee ice cream is awful.

author: Espressozombie
title: LOVE
text: My all time favorite out of all ice creams and I can't ever find it anymore!

author: Steamer
title: Best flavor I've had
text: Great mix of coffee ice cream and chocolate chink. Not the usual flavors.

author: J101019
title: My favorite icecream ever
text: The espresso chocolate chucks with this icecream are amazing.

author: Buzz Buzz Buzz
title: The best
text: Ben & Jerry have outdone themselves on this ice cream

author: Jos726
title: My favorite!
text: This is by far my favorite flavor! I love it!!! YUM!

author: huntp
title: What a shame they replaced the Heath Bar.
text: I love coffee ice cream and heath bars, but try to eat them infrequently due to needing to watch my sugar and weight. On a nearly 90 degree day here in NH, I decided to indulge. What a horrible disappointment. The ice cream is ok, but after a few bites of toffee, I was done and tossed the pint. I found myself avoiding the crunch. So disappointing. I appreciate your dedication to non GMO, but I prefer strong labeling. I am a big girl, and can make my own choices. I just won't bother with B&J's if they sacrifice taste. This is not health food, there is no way this variant is any better for you than the Heath version, let's not kid ourselves.

author: Eliza
title: Why isn’t Ben & Jerry’s listening to its consumers
text: After you changed the formula and removed heath bars from this ice cream it’s tasted awful. I ate this ice cream every day for years when it was Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. This new Coffee Toffee Crunch is dreadful. Consumers have been complaining since you made the change and you have not improved the ice cream. I know how Business works so I am sure part of the problem is that you are lock into a contract with the new Toffee company but you are losing sales therefore you should get a new supplier. I keep waiting and checking for you to fix this formula so it could taste like it used to. Very disappointed.

author: ToffeeTastesLikePoo
title: Certifications over Taste
text: Not sure why a Ben & Jerry's employee responded to another customer that Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch wasn't a replacement for Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. On this very page you have a video stating: Coffee Heath Bar Crunch has a new name!

author: paige18
title: Another sad customer longing for heath bar return
text: Anyone who likes this flavor must never have tried Coffee Heath Bar Crunch because this is a sad replacement at best. And yes, I’ve read the multiple replies from B&J staff stating this flavor was not meant to replace it, but as others have pointed out, there is a video on the flavor’s page announcing its ‘new name’. I’ve bought this flavor more than once since its switch years ago, hoping for improvement over time, but still the toffee leaves a terrible aftertaste and the coffee ice cream lacks its once creamy, rich flavor. Ben & Jerry’s commitment to non-GMO products is admirable but please don’t this sacrifice the taste! Bring back the Heath Bar or give us a better replacement!

author: Jeremy
title: My favorite snack is no more.
text: I eat a relatively healthy diet and the coffee/toffee Ben and Jerry's was always my one real guilty pleasure that I would indulge in whenever I wanted something sweet. I admire the company's dedication to non-GMO/fair-trade products as I often eat a diet as low in non-GMO products as I can, but this new product really is dreadful. There is little flavor in the ice cream, and the toffee tastes like what you would expect from a sugar-free candy bar. I have bought it twice now, the first time was a surprise, and the second time was me hoping it was just an isolated mistake. Both were bad enough that I threw them away within a few bites. Major disappointment and I hope they take these reviews to heart and reconsider the product change.

author: Holls
title: If I could give no stars, I would.
text: Coffee Heath Bar crunch has been my favorite flavor of icecream since I can remember. I decided to try the new product because I figured it wouldn’t be too much different from the original. I can’t pretend to eat it. Knowing what the flavor was to this?! No comparison. I read all of the responses from Ben and Jerry’s on this site and they claim that the point was to not replace the product. If it wasn’t to replace why was Coffee Heath Bar crunch discontinued? Have the Non-GMO (I mean, we’re talking about a treat here) and the original one if it wasn’t meant to be a replacement. I haven’t bought a Ben and Jerry’s product since and I used to have my freezer full. Such a disappointment.

author: Disappointed Customer
title: It seems no one is listening
text: This ice cream is just disgusting. You say you weren't replacing Coffee Heath Bar Crunch but you were, I red it at the time. I get the GMO thing but as others have said ice cream isn't healthy and we can make our own choices. You keep telling people it is a manufacturing error IT'S NOT the ice cream is just BAD. Why are you treating your loyal customers like this. Fix it or agree that you can't reproduce one of the best flavored ice creams you had. It doesn't make the top 10 anymore but Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was always in the top 10.

author: Cnyc
title: oh no no it has changed
text: I noticed the name of my favorite ice cream changed in the grocery store today and tried it anyway - I figured swapping toffee bars wouldn't make that big of a difference but the coffee base changed too. It's no longer rich, the toffee no longer produces that sticky liquidy toffee pool. Instead, this toffee melts into a pretty gross dark brown grainy mess. The left over flavor is just yucky. Don't buy this. CHBC is gone and this is not a replacement.

author: Ommmmmm
title: A poor replacement
text: Coffee Heath bar crunch was my favorite flavor.

author: tcwoody99
title: Disappointed
text: I have recently decided to make my way through all of the B&J flavors (I have gone through an embarrassing number of pints embarrassinly fast..) and this was one that excited me at first sight. I love coffee ice cream and I love toffee, so I thought the two together would be a great mix. Sadly, the coffee flavor was very weak, and the toffee tasted almost metallicy. I thought maybe it was just a bad bite, but every piece of toffee had that same metallic taste, and all of the ice cream that touched the toffee was given that flavor as well. Overall, I was highly disappointed, and very saddened because this was the first flavor I have tried that I did not like. I will be throwing away my pint and not buying this flavor again.

author: brianctoner
title: Sad Face
text: I love coffee, I love toffee, I don't care for this flavor. Strangely metallic flavored toffee. I bought this a few years ago and hoped that it had improved. Well, it did improve, but it still isn't great. It went from inedible to tolerable. This ice cream tasting bad just makes me sad. I don't want a refund, I don't want coupons, I just want this ice cream to taste good.

author: Madelyn
title: Yuck!
text: I wish I had read the reviews, this ice cream is disgusting! I love Ben and Jerry’s and like to try new flavors but this was a huge let down. The ice cream has little flavor and the toffee is indescribably bad. Like other reviewers said it tastes metallic and like a sugar free candy. The texture is grainy unlike other Ben and Jerry’s ice creams. I was wondering if I got a weird pint until I read the other reviews. I threw the pint away it, it was inedible. I expect more from Ben and Jerry’s.

author: VellyBelly
title: Nothing good lasts
text: I bought this the other day and was soooooo ready to dig in. Boy was I disappointed. Immediately there was a difference. The coffee has no flavor. It lost all the richness. Oh and the toffee bars. Ugh! Totally gross. This tastes like the diet version. I understand why you guys made the changes and I'm glad to support the cause. I guess I'll just have to find a new ice cream.

author: KentM
title: Not near good as previous Heath Bar Crunch
text: Wife and I just bought a pint of the Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch because it has been a year at least since we had one. Today was a test to see if maybe had gone back to Heath Bar toffee. NOT. Whatever kind of toffee being used now is, apparently lots less money is the usual reason for change...big mistake. The Heath Bar version, I am betting, far outsold the present blend. The present toffee blend...we did not eat much of the pint, maybe total 3 spoonfulls. The rest...we tossed into trash.

title: My guilty pleasure is gone
text: I used to keep track of what stores had the Coffee Heath Bar Crunch for those times when you just need a good pint of ice cream and a movie. Knowing that it isn't out there anymore is sad in a way the surprises me. And it's not like an old Atari you can find on eBay. It's just... gone. I didn't hear about the change but noticed it was really hard to find the flavor when I was looking for it. Then I found the Coffee Toffee Crunch and thought they might have just changed the name. Then I tasted it and thought I must have gotten a bad pint. Then I read the label and realized my favorite flavor was gone. I can only hope someday they'll bring it back. Maybe Health Bar can meet the free trade non-GMO requirements? What's so wrong with GMO anyway? Isn't that just called science? Isn't that how we cure disease?

title: Love the coffee and the toffee!
text: Maybe it's because I had never tried the original. But I love this flavor! It is one of my go tos! The coffee ice cream is delicious and the toffee is a tasty buttery crunch! Mmmm!

author: Zorg
title: Bring Back the Original
text: Let me be clear: I want to give this 1 star for how disappointed I am. I threw in the extra recognition because the idea is amazing. I was fortunate enough to try the original with Heath, but sometimes I wish I never knew how heavenly it was. It hurts so much to lose my favorite ice cream flavor strictly due to an ingredient change. The toffee is mediocre and reminds me of the cheap caramel from my childhood. It’s a critical difference from the original, more buttery and crunchy delight. Please, for my sanity, bring back the original flavor or just put this flavor to rest. I can’t take any more disappointment when I see it next to my second favorite flavor, skipping this one every time...

author: Me2me
title: Doesn't taste right
text: I'm so upset at the taste of this ice cream that I made my way to you're website just to express my concerns. Okay so I love coffee, especially coffee ice cream. When I stumbled upon this ice (which was in sale) I thought I found a a yummy treat. Boy was u wrong and disappointed. The coffee flavor isn't bad. But the toffee. Yuck. It has like a sour milk metal taste to it. And no its not expired and in eating the ice cream with a plastic spoon. Something is just not right. And with the other reviews, I know it's not only me who feels this way.

author: GiantBlue2
title: Never again!
text: I rarely buy B&J's but the CHBC was my fave, so when asked what kind of ice cream I wanted with Christmas dessert it was the first thing I thought of. I could hardly wait! Imagine the disappointment when met with this horrid excuse for coffee/toffee ice cream! I get the whole non-GMO thing, but is there no one making a decent non-GMO toffee bar that you could use? One bite and I knew it wasn't Heath - though I hadn't heard you were making a change. I complained pretty vocally so my sister actually showed me the container to prove it wasn't a generic brand. It was then that I noticed the change in the name. I wish I had known. What a waste! If Karamel Sutra wasn't so good, I wouldn't even look at the Ben & Jerry's section of my store's freezer.

author: Sijnaanik
title: WHY????
text: Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was one of my favorite ice creams of all time, but I can't even eat this. I get that some people have an irrational fear of GMOs, but that is no reason to manufacture a bad-tasting product. If you really can't use Heath then find some other toffee that tastes good; I imagine it can't be that hard to do. Until then I'm not buying this (and since you discontinued most of my other favorites, my overall Ben and Jerry's purchases have been and will be infrequent).

author: lily14
title: Gross
text: Awful, metallic, bland taste. CHBC was infinitely better. Although B&J claims it was not a replacement, despite being dished out directly after CHBC was discontinued, it is clear that this was meant to appease CHBC lovers. B&J could not have been farther off in this assumption. This ice cream went straight into the trash after five people took a bite and determined something was "off" years ago. It was purchased again recently with the same conclusion. Awful.

author: nyc ice cream
title: Awful since they dropped the heath bars
text: Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was my favorite B&J flavor. Bought this when they first made the change and thought I'd gotten a spoiled batch. As others have noted, terrible metallic taste, and the "toffee" tasted bad and had the wrong consistency--like a crunchy sponge instead of dense. Have never bought this flavor again.

author: Jtc3
title: I miss the old recipe
text: Today I was daydreaming about the original toffee heath bat crunch. It's been over 2 yrs since I've had been and jerrys. This flavor was the last one that I ate. It was horrible. Of course I was comparing it to coffee Heath bar crunch which was magical tasting.

author: kkudlich
title: Let’s not fool ourselves.
text: As much as you insist that this isn’t a replacement for Coffee Heath Bar Crunch, it absolutely is, and it’s a failure. How did you manage to find the grossest toffee bars on the planet to put in this abomination? And the coffee ice cream— icy and terrible. Awful, and substitution for the old delight that was Coffee Heath Bar Crunch— a flavor to which I would credit my bachelor degree, as it did its part in getting me through college.

author: Liz88
title: If you can't do it with the heath bar....
text: So coffee Heath bar crunch was my jam. I agree with many of the other reviewers that the toffee used now for this ice cream is really bad and leaves a bitter taste.... so disappointing because the old version was amazingly delicious. I know your comitting to non-gmo products so perhaps partner with a different toffee maker? or make a plain coffee ice cream. B&J's coffee ice cream base is great so I I would just buy that and buy my own Heath bars!!!

author: DisappointedPortland
title: Unfortunate ... not at all the taste I remember.
text: I love the coffee flavors from Ben and Jerry’s and “Coffee Heath Bar Crunch” was my all time favorite so I figured this might come close... and no, sadly it doesn’t. The toffee is grainy and sweet, tastes very little of anything. The coffee ice cream is much less richly flavored, sigh. I had a few bites and tossed the pint.

author: Whale
title: Worst Marketing Choice Ever
text: I understand what Ben&Jerry's is trying to do, but I no longer have a Ben&Jerry's flavor that I like enough to buy. Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was my favorite flavor and I bought it every single week. I tried this new one, thinking it must be the same thing with a new name; However, this toffee is horrible and almost tastes metallic. The taste of the ice cream is completely different. You're better off just buying a different brand of plain coffee ice cream and adding Heath Bars, or whatever toffee you enjoy, to that.

author: William Q
title: BEST FLAVOR EVER!!!
text: I can't believe I am seeing these negative review's. I am a fan of ice cream in general. I live in Schenectady NY and if anyone doesn't know this where some of the best ice cream in the country comes from. That said... This is my absolute FAVORITE flavor of all time. Awesome flavors. Together! But it is hard to find now and there's similar flavors out there but none with big chunks of toffee in it! Plus the coffee flavor compliments the toffee so well. I usually stick to my local brands, but this is by far one of the best out there!!! Why can't I find it anywhere guys!?

author: drewfaulk
title: Unconscionable Adulteration of a Perfect Product
text: I check back every year or so to see if B&J has listened to their customers and gone back to the original Coffee Heath Bar Crunch recipe, but see they’re sticking to their guns on this one. This product used to be perfect and now doesn’t even taste like a treat. I’m shocked that the company would settle for this nothing-like-the-product-it-replaced substitute. Why would non-GMO and fair trade make it taste so much worse? Ben and Jerry’s are in the wonderful position to effect change by CREATING DEMAND for non-GMO and responsibly-sourced ingredients by showing how wonderful they can be: this does the exact opposite and actually hurts their cause. Dumbest business move since New Coke. After 4 years of hoping and waiting, I’m giving up on hope they’ll ever see the light or listen to their customers; This was my last appeal.

author: Michael
title: Go To The Graveyard Already!
text: After being a huge fan of the CHBC, I was quite upset when the new flavor came out and still am. The coffee ice cream and toffee bar is absolutely disgusting. The toffee doesn't have the flavor that Heath Bar or Skor does, and the coffee ice cream is also horrible. I asked somebody else to try this flavor after it changed and they also thought it was disgusting.

author: NickW2
title: Awful...
text:
Since they don't sell regular coffee by the pint, I used to settle for Heath Bar Crunch. The contract must have expired and they replaced it with some awful generic.
Coffee is still good, toffee is inedible.

author: ToffeeSlag
title: Nope. This Ain't It.
text: So today I tried B&J's Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch for the first time two different ways (as is my custom): very firm straight out of the freezer and slightly softened after having sat out a bit. I give this flavor a "meh" out of five. The large toffee bar chunks, purportedly fudge covered [shrugging emoji], don't do justice to the coffee ice cream. For me the pinnacle of grocery store coffee ice cream is Trader Joe's Brownie Coffee Crisp ice cream sandwiches. If Ben & Jerry's can pint up their version of somethingverysimilartothat, I will probably bankrupt myself when I find it in stores! That combo of soft brownie, small, solid chocolate bites and coffee ice cream is my jam. But toffee slag? Not so much.

author: Pamela56
title: It says what it is. Great title
text: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. I have had trouble finding it in my location 65109 and 65101. I love the coffee flavor with the flavor of the heath bar and the crunch of this ice cream. I am gluten free and so may flavors have cookie dough which automatically eliminates those options. Love this ice cream. Please start delivering this back to the zip code locations of 65101 and 65109. I have not been able to find this flavor in Jefferson City. Miss this ice cream which is what prompted me to make this review. Love the ice cream flavor of Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch.

author: Juliennes
title: What a disappointment....
text: I don't eat a lot of ice cream in order to try and avoid too much sugar. But I wanted a treat and Coffee Heath Bar has always been my favorite ice cream. I picked up a pint and was so looking forward to the indulgence. What an absolute disappointment it was. I originally thought it was me...maybe I had dreamed it up in my head that it had tasted better than it did in reality. I had some more the next day and it still was not good. I had my son try some and he agreed. I was not going crazy. The toffee pieces are just awful. I am all for the non-GMO movement but honest to God, I would gladly take the Heath Bars back regardless. It was a delicious treat that is now a huge let down. I truly hope that I can find some replacement :(

author: Dave P WA
title: non-GMO isn't really science
text: Wow, eliminating my favorite ice cream for this dreadful concoction for completely non-scientific pseudo-science mumbo jumbo fakery reasons is just stupid.

author: RichardA
title: Bring back the Heath Bar!
text: This is very disappointing stuff. I'm sure that the company that makes this tasteless toffee is very happy to have actually found someone to buy it. What's next...Phish Food with actual fish?

author: RaeU7916
title: Oh me goodness!!
text: Saw this little guy in the freezer section and thought to my self my two favorite things so why now try it?! Got home and had a bit and it rocked my world. This flavor is amazing!! Delicious notes of coffee and massive chunks of toffee!! Pure delicious bliss for me. I went back and bought two more!!!

author: Madelyn
title: Yuck!
text: I wish I had read the reviews, this ice cream is digusting! I love Ben and Jerry’s and like to try new flavors but this was a huge let down. The ice cream has little flavor and the toffee is indescribably bad. Like other reviewers said it tastes metallic and like a sugar free candy. The texture is grainy unlike other Ben and Jerry’s ice creams. I was wondering if I got a weird pint until I read the other reviews. I threw the pint away it, it was inedible. I expect more from Ben and Jerry’s especially at $5/pint.

author: Andrew P
title: Metallic taste still there
text: It’s really not hard to make great-tasting buttery toffee candy. I used to do it all the time in my own kitchen, and I liked mine just as much as I like Heath bars. Please find a supplier of non-GMO toffee that doesn’t taste like a nickel-cadmium battery. Geez, maybe I’ll start up my own toffee company and underbid whomever you’ve contracted with just to save my formerly favorite ice cream flavor. (Well, second favorite of all time after Dastardly Mash — yeah, I go back that far.)

author: Susan
title: Delicious
text: This is my favourite flavour of Ben and Jerry's. The contrast between the rich coffee ice cream and the sweet crunchy toffee is lovely. My two main grocery stores appear to have stopped carrying it, and that makes me very sad. (I found this site because I was searching to see if Ben and Jerry's had discontinued it.)

author: SarahBucky
title: Terrible!
text: Would have given it zero stars, if possible! This flavor is awful! The toffee is terrible! I could and do make better toffee in my kitchen. This was a bottomline decision. GMO, Fair Trade blah...blah, blah...blah, blah. Ruining one of the best BnJ's flavors was a bottomline decision by the parent company, Unilever. If BnJ's was purchased by Hershey, Heath bars would still be in use.

author: Theresa
title: Sucks
