text: I used to love your coffee heath bar ice cream. But then you took away the heath and put in cheap toffee. Yuck!!! You totally ruined my once favorite ice cream by getting rid of heath for cheap toffee. Now I will NEVER by any Ben & Jerry's ice cream.

author: Jfer
title: Do not like new toffee bar
text: I have tried the new blend of coffee toffee twice and the toffee is disgusting. Coffee heath bar crunch use to be my favorite flavor, but I cannot even chew the new toffee without gagging.

author: Kathy1950
title: Horrible replacement!
text: Miss the full flavor heath bar and the big pieces. This is way off the mark leaving a nasty bitter taste from both the coffee ice cream and the toffee pieces. Will never buy this again.

author: Mik123
title: Lost a long-time customer
text: Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was one of my favorite indulgences ever since I started eating ice cream as a kid. Upon trying this changed version, I was so repulsed by the new toffee that I feel like I can no buy B&J's in the hopes that hear us on this particular flavor. I can at some level understand switching away from Heath Bars but there's plenty of ways to get a decent tasting non-Heath substitute (I've had a lot of good toffee in my time). But with this version it's like they're trying to make the worst toffee possible. B&J's product people please please please hear us!!! :(

author: Pearson88
title: Used to be my favorite
text: Coffee Health Bar Crunch was my all time favorite ice cream. When I went. To get a pint and saw the name change I was confused, but figured maybe it was rebranding of some sort, but when I took it home and tried it I realized I was wrong. Honestly, the new toffee is gross and I couldn't even bring myself to eat t.f he pint. So disappointing!

author: MarkChana
title: Bring back Heath
text: The new chocolate covered toffee pieces are terrible. They taste like ash. This was among my favorite flavors back when Heath bars were being used. Shame it fell so far.

author: ConorC12
title: Flavor
text: The ice cream wasn't even coffee flavored and the toffee pieces left a bad taste in my mouth

author: Jo28
title: Lip smacking
text: My mum got this ice cream last week and we finished the whole thing in two days. The crunchy, crispy toffee pieces laced in fudge was heavenly. I just have to close my eyes and enjoy everytime a piece of toffee gets in my mouth. How this flavour got such low stars is something I would never understand in this lifetime. Mum’s a huge fan of coffee icecream and she just can’t stop raving about it. For sure this flavour is something we’ll keep coming back to. It’s like the gold standard of all coffee icecreams that exist in this world. Thanks a ton B&J.❤️

author: RF144
title: I really like it!
text: I just discovered Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch recently. I usually stick to Cherry Garcia, New York Super Fudge Chunk, and Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough. But when I realized how much I love toffee, and saw this in the store, I thought I'd give it a try. I'm not a coffee drinker, but what the hey? Boy, I really like this ice cream! The toffee pieces are much bigger than I expected, and that's a plus! I read some reviews from people who enjoyed the Heath bar version, but not this one. I'm sorry they don't like it, but I think it tastes great. Thanks, Ben and Jerry and the ice cream team!

author: CClW
title: Blood ice cream, anyone?
text: One time my neighbor talked me into licking her metal swingset. It was winter and I was a gullible kid.

author: jkmm
title: Used to be my second favorite
text: Decided to try again since I heard changes had been made but the toffee is still not good. Please keep trying!

author: Kimbe51
title: Gross
text: Not the same since you are not using Heath Bar....I will no longer buy...It was gross...waste of money.

author: Katluv
title: Love it!
text: Lover it so much!! Would buy again and again!! Miss the old version but still great!!

author: Wayne
title: Changed formula??
text: I was highly disappointed with the flavor, much different than the Heath Bar crunch my wife and I loved! We ate a few bites out of this pint and looked at each other the same way, like, what the heck did they do to our ice cream!!! Ugh!! By the way, what the heck DID you do to our ice cream!?!

author: efw63
title: Love it!
text: I hear that you may go back to the old recipe. If you do, I hope that you keep this one too! I love it! Some complain about the coffee being bitter, but it offsets the toffee perfectly. Love that toffee too! I have to make a special trip out of town to find it, but it's worth going after.

author: ChelleS
title: Love Love Love
text: This Ben & Jerry's flavor is dangerously delicious!!!

author: CoffeeIceCreamLover
title: YUM!
text: I love coffee ice cream and this one did not disappoint! I found it creamy and delicious. There are other brands whose coffee leaves me with kind of a thick disgusting taste in my mouth, but not this one! It was absolutely yummy! As far as the crunch, that part was a nice treat.

author: shannonCA
title: Only one problem...
text: Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was a magical concoction! Then it changed, and yes, it was gross and metallic for a while. But I have to say, it seems to have improved. It's not exactly the same as it used to be, but its much much better than the metallic one. I am 7 months pregnant now and it is 100% my biggest craving. Only one problem: I can never find it near me!!! The stores that are listed to carry this flavor never have it in stock, and now my poor husband is enslaved to finding it at all costs hahah! Please tell me how I can get my hands on a consistent supply!

author: Grandma Leslie
title: Absolutely Delicious
text: This is by far my favorite Ice Cream. I have a very poor appetite and even my doctors tell me I can eat as much ice cream as I want, I usually finish this in 2 sittings. The only problem is that my Giant Eagle runs out of it very quickly.

author: Kjd313
title: Definitely a favorite
text: I love coffee ice cream, and toffee is my favorite type of candy, so this is obviously a winner for me. I've seen a lot of criticism about the toffee in this but I LOVE it. It's better than heath or skor in my opinion. It's much crunchier and it has more of a buttery taste. Every time I eat this ice cream I wish that I could buy the toffee itself to snack on, Maybe Ben & jerry's could start making candy too?!

author: COMtnMama
title: Coffee & Toffee deliciousness
text: This flavor is just so delightful. Robust coffee flavor tempered with the creaminess of ice cream, and crunchy toffee pieces, with bits of gooey goodness as you eat. It's really hard to get the right balance for a coffee ice cream, and somehow you found it! Such a great pairing with toffee! This Ben & Jerry's flavor I'll be returning to again and again!

author: Ezcarter04
title: The single best ice cream in history
text: I try to be objective but it’s hard because this is the best freaking ice cream ever. Coffee toffee is amazing (and I’m a Mormon) and I will die if it gets discontinued.

author: meme
title: Best Flavor Ever
text: sorry to say i never tried your "original" but recently discovered this version: Coffee Toffee & must say: THANK YOU B & J - i am in love! cannot get enough of THIS flavor. gave up on anything else as a "sweet treat" won't be missing any of whatever it used to be. this is my Go-To, Gotta-Have-it ice cream, now & forever

title: Amazing combination of flavors
text: I bought this after coming back from a vacation where they had toffee ice cream and was looking for something to fill the void it left, and I'm so glad I did! This coffee is not over powering in its flavor, but is enough to make you taste it. The toffee is super crunchy and in big prices scattered throughout!

author: Former fan
title: Still so disappointing
text: Coffee Heath Bar used to be my absolute favorite ice cream and for years I bought it to the exclusion of everything else. Since the formula changed I've tried the "new flavor" (I get it, "not a replacement", sure) a few times and am always SO DISAPPOINTED. The toffee has a weird plastic-y texture and metallic aftertaste. This all natural non-GMO toffee tastes more fake than the good old Heath Bars ever did. And still missing is the absolute best part of the old flavor - the way the Heath Bars would melt a little into the ice cream leaving delicious gooey envelopes around the crunchy candy pieces. How long is B&J's Quality Assurance Team going to "review" all this negative feedback before they make a change? At least admit you aren't going to do anything, then I can just give up on it altogether.

author: Bells
title: My all time favorite
text: Honestly, I was shocked when I saw how poorly this rates on the website compared to most of Ben and Jerry's other flavors! I too loved Coffee Heath Bar Crunch, but this is a totally different product and I love it just as much. If you love toffee and coffee flavors, I think you'll enjoy this pint as much as I do. Just don't go in expecting Heath! This toffee reminds me more of a rich, handcrafted chocolate-covered toffee bar you'd find at a local chocolatiers shop. And it is so dang good.

author: poTATEogeek
title: Underrated gem
text: Yalls trippin if you think this ain’t the bomb. It’s got toffee, it’s got coffee, it’s smooth, creamy, has a great amount of toffee bits you can nibble on in between scoop sessions or you could save it for last. It doesn’t matter how you eat it it’s still one of the greatest ice cream creations ever to come out of a pint container and into your mouth.

author: Meme1028
title: My favorite!
text: The perfect blend of sweet coffee flavor & toffee crunch! I just wish my local store would carry it more.

author: Emma
title: Haters gonna hate
text: Saw all the negative reviews and was honestly baffled (admittedly, I never had the Heath bar version). I love this ice cream! Toffee is perfectly crisp and didn't get stuck in my teeth (I was a little worried about that going in). And I love the rich coffee flavor of the ice cream.

author: Tammy75
title: Awful!
text: Nothing like the previous flavor. Won't be buying this one anymore

author: JacquiD
title: Better than the old HeathBar one!
text: The Heath bar crunch was my favorite flavor. After reading all the negative reviews, I was quite nervous about trying the toffee bar crunch. However, the new version is amazing! The coffee flavor of the ice cream is rich and deep, the toffee pieces are huge, and although they are not Heath bars, the Toffee is incredible. It does have a slight molasses taste to it, which is why I think people are saying that it tastes burnt. It doesn't! I am so glad they made my favorite flavor even better!

author: FuzzyGut
title: Tough call
text: I hate posting anything other than a glowing review of Ben and Jerry’s ice cream, but this... yeah. The coffee ice cream base is excellent, like all their coffee bases, but the toffee, while plentiful, is dreadful! I never had it with the Heath Bars so I can’t compare them; I can only go on this new pint I bought but the toffee is really terrible! I couldn’t eat it, not worth the calories. I bet it was glorious with the other toffee because the coffee ice cream is delicious.

author: Kellbell
title: My favorite!
text: I tried this flavor my last month living in California and fell in love! It is the perfect amount of toffee and the coffee flavor is delicious. I never had the heath bar flavor that everyone seemed to love, but it makes me sad that everyone writes such poor reviews for this flavor. The poor reviews might make this flavor go away all together so please stop with the one stars! Since moving to Texas, I am completely unable to find this in any store in my area and am very sad.

author: FormerBandJfan
title: A terrible substitute for Coffee Heath Bar Crunch
text: Please bring back Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. This flavor is a dreadful substitute and has made me lose my love of Ben & Jerry’s. Coffee Heath Bar was my favorite. I can hardly believe that switching out to this other toffee candy could downgrade this ice cream so dramatically. Please bring back Coffee Heath Bar Crunch!

author: Tarabara
title: Sad
text:
I keep hoping b&j would listen to the feedback and change the recipe again, this used to be my absolute fave flavor but since they changed the recipe it’s no good. I haven’t met anyone who likes it now. So sad I’ll never have that delicious coffee heath bar crunch again.
Even if you can’t go back to original recipe, could you at least work on the current one and make it better??

author: Jeff
title: What happened to Heath bar crunch
text: Just bought toffee bar crunch since I didn't see Heath bar crunch. Such a shame the new flavor was horrible compared to the original recipe. The vanilla ice cream was no longer thick and creamy and the toffee bar was terrible. No longer a Premium ice cream. Sorry B&J but I will not be buying anymore from you guys.

author: Coffee Ice cream Fan
title: I thought this was pretty good!
text: Now, CCBBB is my favorite ice cream flavor of all time. Can this replace CCBBB? Not in a million years. However, the local stores in my area do not carry pints of it, and the nearest Ben and Jerry's scoop shop is an hour away. I was craving coffee-flavored ice cream one day and saw Ben and Jerry's was really one of the only brands that DO sell coffee ice cream. So I tried this. I think it was pretty dang good I just wish there was more crunch in it. If you have a coffee ice cream kick and can't get your hands on CCBBB, this is a solid alternative to crush your craving.

author: IceCreamTruths
title: I Could live off this deliciousness!
text: I tasted this by accident. The store was out of the one I had been eating. It took a bite or two before it actually got me and “Oh Wow!” I was hooked. This is the most amazing ice cream I have ever had, hands DOWN! I could eat it every day in place of my meals. It’s that good!

author: Rafi
title: Ruined With The new Toffee
text: When this was Coffee Heath bar Crunch it was my absolute favorite flavor ever. I ate almost a pint a week. Since switching away from actual Heath Bar, the flavor is incredibly disappointing. The off brand toffee supplier is pretty bad. There's so much good toffee in the world... I don't understand how B&J managed to find a bad one. The flavor is ruined.

author: kiwisoup
title: Not just the toffee bars have been changed.
text: Used to eat this flavor all the time when it was Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. The coffee flavor ice cream barely tastes like coffee anymore. What did you do? Blech... tastes like watered-down stale coffee that was left on the burner too long. Usually I devour a pint, but this one has been sitting in the freezer for a week ahead I've tried eating it 3 times now.

author: LizzyD
title: Being back the Heath bars!
text: I was so excited to remember how much i used to love this ice cream (formally of the Heath Bar variety). Then I dug into this new version. SO disappointed. It really is gross. Totally different texture and flavor. Overly sweet but bitter at the same time. Ya’ll need to reassess

author: Babar
title: Disappointing
text: I guess they've changed the recipe since I last had it, because I was just disappointed with what I got this time. It used to be my favorite flavor, but it was just bad, with a metallic tasting toffee . Hopefully they haven't changed the recipes for all their flavors.

author: schottski
title: Why does it taste metallicy??
text: We tried this flavor for the first time yesterday (both my husband and I are big coffee ice cream fans) and we both took one bite and spit it out because it tastes SO metallicy! Super weird. We made a friend try it too and she also agreed it tasted like metal. Not sure if an ingredient went bad or if it the recipe needs reworking but probably the grossest ice cream I have ever had. Stilll a huge Ben and Jerry's Fan but won't be buying this flavor again.

author: DonnaPc
title: Great taste!
text: At first I didn’t like it. But then the flavors took hold of me and I absolutely loved it! It’s my favorite flavor. Unfortunately, it’s harder to find but it’s the best!

author: Nike
title: Why mess up a good thing?
text: I kept thinking my taste buds had changed cause I haven’t had this ice cream in years but no the toffee and coffee are just bland and not at all worth the calories. Certainly a disappointment after having enjoyed the original perfection of coffee and Heath bars.

author: Momtothree
title: Wish you brought back the original!
text: The old coffee heath bar was my go to ice cream! NOTHING compared. Went to buy it one day and I hoped it was just the name they changed but boy was I so disappointed that the flavor changed, unfortunately in the worse way! Never bought it again and keep hoping some day it will be back! Glad to see I am not the only one who feels this way!

author: Chant
title: Horrible replacement
text: I saw you changed out Heath bars for a non gmo version of toffee, unfortunately I absolutely hate this new flavor. Not sure it just tastes bland and off

author: Kristian
title: Do not buy, do not eat
text: I echo the comments of everyone else who is disappointed and frustrated by the change to the recipe. The new toffee bars are not crunchy and I don't like the taste. The ice cream has also lost its coffee flavor. This used to be my favorite flavor but no more. Why hasn't anything changef if you have passing along negative customer feedback for over a year? I'd rather you discontinue this flavor altogether than keep making it in its current formula.

author: sdecker27
title: This is my fav!
text: I love this one. It combines my favorite flavors of coffee and toffee.... enough said. Now PLEASE bring it back to my area!!! Thanks!

author: Darren
title: Toffee is Horrible
text: Tried this flavor yet again after Heath Bar was replaced. Unfortunately the toffee replacement is not good. Surprised this is still is a flavor, would prefer you to put it in the graveyard and bring back Chocolate chip Oatmeal cookie.

author: Mommy
title: WOW!
text: My favorite ice cream flavor of all time. It only took trying it once and I was hooked. Marrying the coffee taste with the toffee crunch is heaven in my mouth.

author: suet
title: Nooooo!
text: Please bring back your original Coffee HEATH BAR Crunch!! Very poor substitute. So disappointed.

author: Erins
title: My fave flavor
text: Delicious. I like it better before they switched from heath bars, but it is still my favorite

author: CaliDreaming
title: My Fave
text: Sad to see so many foodies complaining about this flavor in comparison to a previous similar flavor. I do love that the chocolate and toffee texture is not frozen rock hard so I am able to enjoy flavor as it melts in mouth. I’ve been looking for a similar quality in a regular candy bars, no longer enjoying some toffee bars I’ve eaten before. Makes me wonder how delicious this heath bar flavor was to cause such an uproar from others.

author: Farrinna64
title: I haven't had Ben & Jerry's since...
text: The last time I had B&Js, I thought I was buying my favorite flavor "Coffee Heath Bar Crunch". I wasnt paying attention to the change on the label. Starting to eat it and it didn't seem the same. I thought, maybe my taste buds had changed, or something. But, then I read the label and realized why. I haven't had B&J since. Now I'm reading these reviews, and it's not just me. Boy, do I miss my favorite ice cream, well ice cream flavor

author: Ciara
title: My go to
text: My favorite flavor. Nothing can compare. I probably eat one a week. I was concerned with some of the lower ratings last year before I left for basic training that I would get out and it would be in the flavor graveyard. Lo and behold it’s still here. Can’t get enough of the toffee!

author: Alw13
title: Best best best ice cream ever!!
text: My MOST FAVORITE ice cream!! Did liked the 'heath bar crunch better but now that I'm used to this...I love it as We'll! The only problem is slowly but surely all my stores are dropping it..:-( There is only ONE Target that I know of that still carries it and it's 25 min away.

author: Josh VT
title: Skim Milk and Coconut Oil
text: I do not recommend this product. Should not even be considered ice cream. The minute you added coconut oil it tastes chalky, metalic and poor texture. Also skim milk; why? This new product has more calories than the original version. Personally, when I choose this brand I expect true ice cream and ingredients. I do not care about how many calories or healther dietary ingredients. Make it the way it should be...

author: LibbyM
title: Please bring back HEATH!!!
text: This is just not what it used to be. It has looonggg been my favorite flavor but the new toffee bar makes it a no-go for me. So freakin sad about it.

author: Amklush
title: Best coffee ice cream and toffee is amazing combo!
text: This ice cream I was worried wasnt going to meet my expectations...but it did! And the size of the toffee pieces were great! This combo is amazing!!

author: JamieB
title: Bring back Heath Bar
text: This used to be our family favorite. We bought a pint almost weekly. But we haven't bought it in a few years. It's just not the same anymore. :(

author: Jess
title: Blissful
text: I feel like this flavor was made for me! I was astonished when I found it. I didn't realize other people like coffee and toffee too! I adore the toffee bar. Better than any I've had before! I'm eating it as we speak. Thank you! I also LOOOVE the big chunks!!!

author: Anna
title: Unreasonably large and mediocre toffee
text: I miss the Heath bars for sure (I saw a response to one of the reviews saying that this wasn't meant to be a replacement, and people just aren't that dumb). But I could get over it, I still like the coffee flavor. But why are the toffee bar pieces so enormous? What am I supposed to do with an inch-long chunk of toffee in the middle of my ice cream? Chisel away at it with my spoon? Not a good experience, and it's happened in all of the last few pints I've bought.

author: BabyDaddy
title: Pregnant wife is upset
text: My wife loved the original flavor. She always said, whens she's pregnant she is going to eat this all the time. Well she got pregnant and there was no more coffee heath bar crunch. It crushed her spirits. Thankfully our local ice cream shop supported us through the pregnancy but the business would have been given to Ben and Jerry. Please bring back the CHBC flavor before we go through another pregnancy.

author: rockinbaker
title: Favorite Flavor
text: This is my absolute favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor! I used to get it all the time, but the stores I went to frequently all stopped carrying it around the same time. I assumed it was discontinued. Imagine my surprise when I moved to NC, and there are actual Ben & Jerry's shops, and this flavor still exists! So excited to get Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch again after years of flavors that just weren't the same.

author: Brenda
title: Not good
text: I was very disappointed after eating the new version of the toffey coffee heath ice cream. It was by far the worst I've ever eaten. The ice cream with the heath bar in it is my favorite. I will no longer buy it due to the drastic flavor of the new toffee. Most people aren't buying ice cream at Ben and Jerry prices for their health, it's usually to indulge a little bit. So sad to see the change.

author: The flying sergeant
title: My life's blood ruined
text: Ben & Jerry's Coffee Heathbar crunch has been my favorite food of all for about 26 years. I no kidding had days where it was all i ate. When i was a paramedic in Williamsburg, VA there was a B&J's store where you made the best even better by being in sundae form, heaven it was! In the military, anywhere in the world I was if I could find some of this ice cream I felt at home. Now however, it's not the same. The removal of actual heath bars completely changed the taste. Gone are the treasure which was the little gooey pockets found next to a piece of Heath. I hate to say it, but it actually tastes bad. Didn't know it was possible for a B&J ice cream to taste bad but it does. The chocolate tastes cheap like cheap generic store brand and the toffee tastes & feels stale.

author: Cricket68
title: July 4th bummer
text: I always buy coffee ice cream. I usually buy a pint of coffee/toffee at the nearby coop. The price is 9.99. My husband treated me to your Coffee a Toffee Crunch. The ice cream tasted like molasses. The toffee bits had no crunch and tasted stale. I tried it twice thinking I ate something earlier that would alter the taste. Second spoonful hours later still tasted like molasses.

author: jesslu
title: Favorite Ice Cream...and I eat a lot of ice cream.
text: I'm shocked by the reviews of this ice cream. It's not the strongest coffee flavored I've ever had but when paired with the delicious and generously sized pieces of toffee it is fabulous.

author: Patti
title: Dad's favorite
text: This was my dad's favorite and I like it a lot too. He walked me down the aisle for my wedding in 1996 and his reward was a pint. I can't believe people aren't reviewing it higher.

author: Bonne
title: Awesome!
text: I love this ice-cream!! I'm from Canada and it also appears that my fav grocery stores have stopped stocking this one. I hope it hasn't been discontinued in the Great White North.

author: Rufus
title: Toffee pieces too large
text: I like coffee ice cream. I like toffee. What could go wrong?? Ahh! That's right. The toffee pieces are too large, so large it's difficult to get a little toffee and a little coffee ice cream in the same bite. Too bad because toffee & and coffee go together like two peas in a pod.

author: CTisthebest
title: My favorite!
text: All the negative reviews are crazy. This is my favorite flavor by far! I love the giant chunks or crunchy toffee. No other ice cream maker has anything even remotely close. You're lucky if you get tiny slivers in other brands. My only regret is that it seems to be caffeinated so I can't eat it too late or it keeps me awake.

author: Allieb
title: BEST FLAVOR
text: Hands down the absolute best flavor made! No other coffee flavor even comes close! The toffee chunks are HUGE and the coffee flavor itself can’t be beat!!!

author: maerceci
title: Surprisingly Awesome!
text: I wasn't too sure on this flavor, but my local store at them BOGO half off, so since they were sold out on Strawberry Cheesecake, I though I would try something new. And I found it to be one of my new favorite flavors. I love that the toffee doesn't get stuck in your teeth like a regular toffee candy bar, and the coffee ice cream compliments it perfectly.

author: Jaze
title: Best Ice Cream I EVER Had!
text: This is the only ice cream im willing to eat. For everyone that doesnt like this ice cream your negative reviews has made it difficult for people like me who would like to find it at the grocery store. im on a ben and jerrys coffee heath bar crunch ice cream hunt and i cant find it. The gas station nearby was the only place i could find it for 6.99 and now they have discontinued it After reading these negative reviews now i see why its slowly disappearing from stores. it is absolutely the best ice cream on the market. my 2 favorite things combined coffee and heath make it easily my favorite ice cream. I would pay $100 to have a bucket in front of me right now, but it is like a mission to find it. i live by smiths in las vegas they dont have it, walmart doesnt have it, some albertsons may have it i think if im lucky but i havent seen it on this side of town since i moved. no ice cream compares to this one. i hope to find a store soon with it. <3

author: Julie11
title: Not the best
text: I thought I'd really enjoy this flavor, like I do with all other flavors or b&j, but this one just doesn't taste good. It leaves a bad taste in my mouth. I was excited to try it, but was very disappointed once I got home only to have it sitting in my freezer ever since.

author: Kelly
title: Just alright
text: I have always had a thing for this flavor and finding it around my area is hard. I recently stumbled upon it and was so excited to get home and take a bite. Not realizing they changed the heath bar to a toffy bar I knew something was different : (... I want the heath bar back!!! It's just not the same without it.

author: Allie
title: Disappointed
text:
I bought this one because I haven't been able to find my favorite Boom Chocolatta. I had high hopes for this flavor but the taste left much to be desired.
It's quite expensive to pay $6 for a pint and take one bite only to have it take up precious freezer space :(

author: coffee craze
title: I'm in love
text: I love this flavor ice-cream but it is so hard to find I know I might be one of the few that does enjoy it but I don't care i love coffee and the mix of the toffee and crunches it fills my sweet tooth I've even gone as far as ordering an entire case of this flavor for my family we all enjoy it on movie nights

author: Bright08
title: Yuck!
text: This used to be my favorite flavor. I hadn't bought this product in a while and didn't realize till I bit into one of the toffee pieces that it was no longer made with Heath bars. I understand their reasoning behind changing the toffee pieces, but this toffee is horrible. Tasted old and very oily. So sad!

author: BJRCallahan
title: Once my wife’s favorite, now unpalatable.
text: My wife loved this back when it used Heath bars but now she cannot stand it. The toffee no longer compliments the whole. Thankfully Americone Dream is unchanged so she still has an option she enjoys. I understand this B&J goal but flavor is still the most important consideration when it comes to ice cream.

author: Xonbear
title: Horrible tasting toffee
text:
Bought it to try another one of the coffee flavors as cccbbb is one of my favorites and was thoroughly disappointed in the taste of this one.
The coffee flavor is a lot more subtle than cccbbb which isn't a bad thing, it's quite enjoyable; the toffee on the other hand is horrendous.
I have to sit with a bowl as I eat the pint to throw the toffee pieces into so I can enjoy the ice cream.
Will definitely go into my "never touch again" category.

author: mary937630
title: Absolutely love it!
text: When I first tried this flavor I instantly fell in love! Coffee ice cream is one of my favorites, and the addition of the toffee brings it to another level. I have had some trouble finding this flavor in stores recently and I’m very disappointed that it doesn’t seem to be carried in a lot of places.

author: Lilasiris
title: Tastes great!
text: This has always been my favorite flavor from Ben & Jerry’s, but it’s hard to find. I enjoyed it with Heath, but this new toffee is much better! It’s more buttery and easier to eat frozen. It tastes like the more expensive English toffee they sell in tins during Christmas.

author: Erica
title: Dislike the new recipie ...
text: This used to be one of my favorite flavors. Bought it today and didn't notice the name change. The bars have a gritty texture to them and is nothing like the Heath bars that were used. Disappointed. Really wish I didn't choose this flavor. Won't purchase again.

author: Pepper
title: Everything is a disappointment!
text: Are used to love CHBC far that I’ve changed wouldn’t be that different. Boy was I wrong! The coffee flavour is so disappointing and the bar is granny with no nice coffee flavour I am so sad as this used to be a big treat for me and now I’ve had to waste a pint.

author: Rgdedge
title: Ruined
text: I’m so disappointed. I loved Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. I picked this up, assuming it was a slight retool with a new, generic, toffee bar. It’s just not good. The texture of the ice cream is icy, not creamy, and the toffee bars are crumbly and one-note: sickly sweet. They remind me a bit of Scottish tablet. 3/4 of a pint still in the freezer and I don’t think I’ll be finishing it. I should’ve known...same disappointment when Mint Oreo changed to Mint “Cookie”. The essence gets lost in the translation.

author: Mom of four
title: Terrible substitute
text: This is the worst thing you could have done to my most favorite flavor of ice cream ever!! This version doesn’t even come close in comparison to Coffee Heath Bar Crunch!!! Please bring back the original...this Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch stuff is awful!!!

author: Pixie
title: CoffeeToffeeBestComboEver! - SorryPB&chocolate!
text: I found this flavor many years ago when it had Health Bar and I was sad at first when the toffee changed but I have learned to love the responsibly sourced toffee too. I like to try other B&J flavors but Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch is my true love!

author: Shay04
title: Used to be good
text: This used to be my favorite ice cream. I keep buying more to see if it will taste the way it used to but ever time I'm left feeling disappointed and sorry I wasted my money. It's weird how something that used to be so yummy is now weird tasting?

author: A1149TKR
title: Heath Bar crunch
text: I have been on a diet for a while, used my cheat day to share some ice cream with my partner. The “candy” you used to replace the Heath toffee is NASTY, what good is fair trade non gmo terd nuggets, absolutely the last time I buy Ben and Jerry’s

author: hmtj
title: Toffe is horrible
text: Just tried this in desperation looking for my Coffee Heath Bar Crunch fix. What a mistake. The toffee is chalky. Horrible flavor. Can't compare to the Heath Bars they used before. Don't waste your money. Grab another flavor.

author: Lori
title: Different Toffee Bars
text: My favorite Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream Flavor has always been Coffee Toffee Crunch, but the Toffee bars have changed. I think you used to use Heath Bars which are buttery and delicious and what a great combination to the coffee ice cream, but now the Toffee bars taste blah and I don't care for them in the ice cream. It makes the ice cream taste watery instead of buttery. Wish you would go back to the original recipe.

author: steph22002
title: Bad taste
text: i bought this flavor ice cream today. Its my first buy from the brand. I was ready to dig in. I was disappointed at the flavor. The coffee taste watered down. Not a rich flavor. The toffee taste odd. I didn't enjoy it.

author: BJLUVER
title: Good ice cream with a bad wrap
text: Now I wanna clear some things up here. This isn't a bad flavor but it seems as though it's getting a bad wrap. What a lot of people won't tell you about ice cream indulgence is that the mood/setting/amount you consume/way you consume all affect the experience. So let me start off by saying if you set out to finish the pint, you might not like this flavor, and that's fine, but just know you didn't enjoy this ice cream the way it was intended to be enjoyed. This is for the people who enjoy small servings of sweets. For those with more mature palettes. This ice cream deserves appreciation and admiration, and I believe the consumer but question where they're at mentally and spiritually before imbibing. Are there better flavors? Of course. But it's all about the time, place, feeling, and mode/way of consumption. This is enjoyable.

author: SSue12
title: It used to be amazing
text: I bought this about 1-2 years ago under the Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch name. It had pools of the tasty toffee throughout and the crunch bars also had lots of the gooey stuff. The coffee base was smooth and rich.

author: Toni94
title: Used to be my favorite flavor. Now it's... ew
text: When it was the coffeee Heath bar crunch it was absolutely stellar, but once they changed it, its really not good. It's the toffee. It's gritty, hard, and bitter which is a shame because the actual ice cream is good.

author: Bill
title: Threw it out
text: I just purchased recently and first time ever trying Ben and Jerry because a co-worker highly recommended and i took about 3 bites and threw it out. It was bad. Doesn't taste anything like what I was expecting.

author: Fredwina D
title: An abomination
text: Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was my favorite ice cream of all time. You destroyed it. The "toffee" is disgusting and crumbly, and the ice cream is flavorless. I don't even buy Ben and Jerry's anymore. So sad.

author: GramZilla12
title: Not even close to the original Heath Bar Toffee
text: The newer version is a sad imitation of the original. New toffee is not even close to the flavor of the Heath toffee

author: Chicky
title: Not worth it!
text: I tried this after they stopped using Heath. It's terrible! I was so unhappy, I've stopped buying all B&J products. I can appreciate they are trying to improve the products, taste can't be sacrificed.

author: Ice cream machine
title: Greatest Canadian Loss
text: I'm not sure I have ever been so sad as when this flavour was removed from Canadian shelves. It is my favourite flavour but I can't travel to the US just for ice cream. A nation has been deprived.

author: nope
title: Not Good...
text: I bought this on sale, and I see why. The bars are good, but the ice cream was the worst B&J's i've ever had.

author: MarkC
title: So Disappointed
text: I just tried what I was hoping was still my favorite B&J flavor. What have you done? You are creating anti-non-GMO consumers. If avoiding GMO means substandard substitutes, No thank you.

author: Mom2017
title: Don't like the new toffee
text: I loved coffee Heath bar crunch but this new flavor is nothing like it. Toffee tastes bad and barely a coffee flavor to the ice cream. I'll probably toss it out. Liked the old flavor better.

author: AnonyfromWI
title: I like it
text: Not sure why so many blistering reviews, it's not even as horrible as it's being portrayed. I love the coffee and toffee taste. I enjoy ice cream every now and then and B&J's is a good brand.

author: HANNAH
title: Massachusetts
text: I feel so sick after eating this .. I have tree but allergies and I feel like my throat is closing after eating this.... i am freaking out . This was my fav flavor but what happened ?!?

author: Hopup123
title: Agree w neg reviews...
text: The toffee choc pieces are tasteless and the coffee ice cream which used to be rich and intensely coffee is more like tea and instead of creamy is frosty-iced pcrystalline. Very sad...

author: Linz
title: The toffee is perfect!
text: I don’t understand all these 1 star reviews! This is the absolute best ice cream and the actual toffee is far better in quality and taste then a Hershey's toffee bar. Perfection!!

author: Donna
title: Delicious Toffee!
text: I love my coffee ice cream. And the LARGE chunks of toffee in this provide a perfect crunch without being too hard. I appreciate the size and quality of the toffee. Brilliant.

author: Ceci
title: Favourite Flavour
text: I love this flavour, it is my favourite! I think this is almost as good as it was with the original Heath Bar and appreciate Ben&Jerry's commitment and them being consequent.

author: Jen Berry
title: Coffee! Toffee!
text: One of my favorites! The reason for replacing the Heath™ bar pieces was in honor of Heath Ledger's tragic passing #RIPHeath...The people rating it a 1 Star need Jesus!

author: Tmigs
title: Ruined
text: Was once one of the greats, but the toffee bars in this ice cream are no where near as good as the old heath bars were. Sorry; this one was t an improvement.

author: Cathy84
title: Chunks of chocolate covered toffee!!!
text: I purchased this along with my favorite core ice creams just to try it out. May want to have this as a shake in the morning instead of regular coffee.

title: Love this!!!
text: Tried this flavor on a whim and I loved it!! If you like Heath or Scor candy bars you’ll love this. There a huge chunks of toffee. Sooo good!!!!

author: Lanh
title: Love this flavor!!
text: The coffee base is creamy and strong flavored and the toffee offers a delicious crunch. Also the perfect ratio of coffee ice cream to toffee!

author: lovecoffeeheath
title: Surprised at the number of complaints.
text: This one is my favorite flavor from this brand. I used to love the coffee heath bar crunch as well, but to me, this one is so similar, I don't see why so many are disappointed? The toffee is probably a bit drier than the heath bar, but overall, I still love this flavor, in fact, I have not been seeing it as much as I used to at my local Target and I hope it hasn't been discontinued.

author: Gamndalf the white
title: not sure
text: Not sure if I got bad pint or what, but the ice cream was icy and not creamy at all. the toffee was great!! ice cream more ice than cream.

author: Mpitts
title: One of my favorites
text: I never had it with the Heath bars so I don't feel like I'm missing out. I love coffee and toffee and this flavor is a hit with me!

author: Timothy
title: Sad
text: Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was my favorite treat. With the change, the ice cream isn't as rich, and the toffee is unappealing. :(

author: Jackyg123
title: Every batch tastes like a bad batch
text: I had forgotten my rule of not buying this flavor, and now $5 is basically going in the trash because this stuff is inedible.

author: Heartofyoga
title: Forever Mine
text: This is my favorite ice cream of all time! The Heath bar bites are yummy chocolatey surprises. I'm hooked forever!!!

author: Londa007
title: Delicious
text: My all time favorite ice!!! If you are looking to try a new flavor, you have to taste this. I absolutely love it.

author: stevie9923
title: Don't buy if you liked Coffee Heath Bar Crunch
text: Stop saying this wasn't meant to replace Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. For customers who like Coffee Heath Bar Crunch, this is obviously what they will go to since CHBC is no longer available & the name is almost identical & only the only ice cream you offer with coffee & toffee bits. Most are obviously going to compare the two & this flavor simply does not taste as good as CHBC.

author: Mikeybeee
title: Two of my favorite things together
text: Never get rid of this flavor. Finally two of my favorite flavors and ingredients in one place!!!! Thank you

title: This is my favorite flavor!
text: I loved Coffee Heath Bar Crunch and honestly I wasn't able to eat it for more than 2 years since I moved to another country. When I got back I saw the name change. I still love it and unfortunately can only buy the small pint size version. I would really enjoy a bigger size!

author: Sam467t
title: Changed the toffee, now it sucks
text: This use to be my hands down favorite ice cream, now I won't even buy it. The new toffee taste awful

author: Irasthe
title: Love this with chunks of toffee!
text: I tried this and went back and bought 4 more pints, my family and I are in love with this ice cream!

author: Clay
title: The best!
text: This is hands down the best ice-cream I've ever had. I have no idea why it's rated so low...

author: TS ice cream
title: My new favorite
text: Love the huge pieces of Heath Bar. Yummy! Coffee taste like a creamy latte. Great combination

author: Sprowt
title: Delicious!!!
text: The pieces of toffee bar are just killer. So yum! Might be my favorite coffee ice cream.

author: Janebug
title: Not quite up to par
text: The coffee flavor is washed out and the toffee is bland too. Sorry you diluted flavors!

author: Jamboy
title: Absolutely Terrible
text: You guys really need to bring back the old flavor. The new one taste like metal and is disgusting. You discontinued your most popular flavor, who cares about gmos, you guys should be more focused on customer satisfaction instead of this PC garbage. Look at Amazon for example, they sell adult novelty items and whatever else and look where it has taken the company. This ice cream is trash and I refuse to buy Ben and Jerry's until you bring back coffee HEATH bar cruch.

author: Tk224
title: Amazing
text: Such a rich coffee flavor. So creamy and huge chunks of toffee

author: Flub
title: Not delicious!
text: No way is this as good as Heath bar crunch. Not even close.

author: Cmshanah
title: Soooooo yummy!
text: By far the bets flavor! love the big Heath bar pieces!

author: Cath1234123
title: Terrible!
text: I just spit this out of my mouth. The toffee is gross

author: lynnie
title: Terrible
text: Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was my favorite flavor. The Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch is the worst. It has a gritty texture, not sure what that could be. The toffee is horrible. I checked the expiration date even because I thought maybe it had gone bad. Coffee taste is OK, but leaves sour milk aftertaste. I can't believe ice cream can be this terrible.

author: Zach
title: Unsatisifed
text: I bought this ice cream flavor because I love toffee and coffee. I usually get americone dream but I thought it might be good to change it up a bit. Boy was I sadly disappointed. The ice cream almost had a smoky, burnt flavor to it and the toffee did not mix with the ice cream at all. I won’t be getting this one again.

author: Smu1957
title: coffee Heath Bar Crunch
text: I decided I wanted Coffee Heath Bar Crunch to help me get through quarantine for the coronavirus. Little did I know that B&J’s took away my favorite ice cream. I’m crushed...and apparently a lot of other people are too. Bring it back with Heath Bars no matter what you have to do with the company which makes Heath Bars.

author: flocke
title: As a Ben&Jerry's locker im just dissapointed
text:
Seeing this on my weekly shopping tour I grabbed expecting as always a delicious ice cream that I would enjoy with pleassure and a little guilt because I tend to eat the whole Pint in one sitting. Added to that I love everything coffee flavored and Toffee just reminds me of good childhood memories.
But this 5$ "treat" certainly did not remind me of anything remotly good. I did let the Ice cream get meldet a little and grabbed my spoon and wanted to indulge in. The pure coffe ice cream was passable , a little bit stronger would have been better in my opinion but hey everyones taste is different. What i really was excited for was the Toffee crunch. I grabbed a big spoonfull and tasted a really really big disapointment. It tasted all mettalic and even bitter. I even tried another one because I could not believe it. This was the first time I ever had to throw away a nearly whole pint of Ice cream. Let alone this makes me sade . After that I looked up the flavour on this side ans saw that many other Ben&Jerry fans had the same experience.
To sum it all up I tried nearly all flavours and loved them all of course one more then the other but i would never reject an offer to eat one. But this Coffee Toffe Bar Crunch was not only a waste of my money but also a discourage for a huge supporter of the brand . Next time I'm gonna think about if I want to buy one of B&J's products or one of a other brand.

author: jkafor
title: Bummer - Not the same!
text: Not the same flavor I once knew and loved. This used to be one of my favorites of Ben & Jerrys but I was sadly dissappointed after recently purchasing the new variation. Nothing against good old Ben and Jerrys but I was truly bummed after not having had it in years and finally deciding to treat myself. :(

author: hunnybear
title: Metallic, chemical, stain your mouth flavor
text: I got this ice cream from my local publix, and upon first bite, I was horrified. The toffee had a strange flavor, metallic almost, and combined with the icecream, was not a great mix. After having eaten the truffle kerfufflei was very disappointed, and sad to throw away a pint of your ice cream

author: Dave RN
title: What a difference !!
text: The heath bar cofffee had disappeared from my store. I then saw this new coffee toffee crunch. I was so excited, I bought three pints, in fear this may disappear also. My excitement was cut short when I tried the first pint. It was not heath bar coffee. It was a sad day as it was my favorite.

author: ic critic
title: Poor substitute for old Coffee Heath Bar Crunch
text: Shame they replaced the old Coffee Heath Bar(TM) Crunch for this one. The combo of this version of the ice cream and these 'toffee bars' have poor flavor and terrible texture. NOTHING like the old coffee and Heath Bars in the older version. Shouldn't have messed with a good thing!

author: Gina
title: Disappointed
text: I buy Ben and Jerry's icecream all the time(usually chocolate fudge brownie). I was very disappointed with the flavor and texture of Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch. It wasn't worth eating and this is one of the first times I've ever been extremely dissatisfied with B&J's icecream. :-(

author: AmiG
title: Still the best
text: Saw the poor ratings and had to write a review to get it back up because if this gets discontinued I would be so sad! B&J marketing/distribution/whatever team, please do not get rid of this flavor! Make it extra delicious or whatever you need to do to get your fan base back but make sure it can live in our freezers for a long, long time.

author: trai
title: Toffee Bar NOT WOW!
text: Always love me a Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream, but this coffee toffee bar a kinda a disappointment. The toffee is crumbly and not so great tasting and is off putting to the delicious coffee ice cream. I would suggest if this flavour was redone, is to use skor bar or even just the skor toffee bits without the chocolate coating. I think the skor toffee and nuttiness will pair well with the delicious coffee ice cream.

author: MaggieSTL
title: My favorite for years!
text: I’ve been enjoying this flavor since I was in grade school! I used to buy it all the time at the local corner store on the way home from school. I’ve been having the hardest time finding it at the grocery store now-a-days, but it’s still my favorite!

author: Chez36
title: So so tasty
text: I love coffee and toffee ice cream and I love that Ben and Jerry’s have put them together. I am from uk and the toffee pieces taste like little Dime bars. By far my favourite ice cream flavour will be looking out for it all the time!

author: jakeat1
title: Ruined!
text: I loved Coffee Heath Bar Crunch! The new toffee in this Ben & Jerry's "Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch" is so bad. Please just don't even try it. They gave up taste for a no GMO product. Why??? I am not eating ice cream for my health.

author: Ducky
title: Dry and chalky toffee bar
text: Loved the toffee coffee heath bar crunch. The new version is really bad. The toffee bars are dry and chalky with no taste. I have tried it a couple times hoping it was a fluke. I would rather have a plain coffee ice cream.

author: AndyC
title: Additive Flavor - Grows on you!!
text: I (like many others) was a fan of the Heath Bar Crunch. When B&J switched, I investigated as thorough as a consumer could. I discovered it had something to do with the Hershey's corp, and B&J had to come up with a toffee tasting replacement. So I gave it a try. It took a few pints, but I grew to love Coffee-Toffee as much as the Heath Bar Crunch. Its a little different, but it is good in its own way. This is the only food I've ever found that I can eat once a day and never get tired of it. I've probably eaten about 4,000 pints of the Coffee-Toffee (on top of probably 2,000 pints of the Heath). Sometimes, I get a pint that doesn't have quite as much of the toffee candy in it, so I buy a bag of the Heath "Bit-o-Brickle" Cookie bits, and sprinkle some on top, and it supplements the toffee nicely. Sometimes, I sprinkle in some Heath bits regardless of how much toffee is in the pint. I can't help it.

author: Tallie
title: Lacking
text: Love Ben and jerry's ice cream but this particular flavor has an odd aftertaste the tofee bars in it were amazing and I seemed to dig for them since the ice cream wasn't that great.

author: Franwindle
title: Disgusting!
text: It was disgusting. Please ban all coffee ice cream. No amount of toffee can save this ice cream. Seriously disappointed. The vanilla toffee crunch, however, is delicious.

author: LilMil
title: absolutely horrible!!!!
text: Please please bring back Coffee or Vanilla Heath Bar Crunch ice cream. The new kind, coffee toffee crunch or whatever it is called, is horrendous.....just awful!!!!

author: Kenelli
title: Delicious
text: My favorite ice cream by far! I never tried it with the heath bar so I can't compare it to that. I just hope this never goes anywhere..but my belly!

author: Joan
title: Use to love Coffee Heath Bar Crunch
text: I was so addicted to this ice cream it's not the same but can't even find it any longer. Please return my favorite flavor.

title: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch Rocks!
text: This has been my absolute favorite by far for years! Although I must admit I like to add a bit of caramel swirl to it...

author: JDP1
title: It’s like New Coke...
text: I have a sweet tooth that demands satisfaction and my “go to” was Coffee HEATH BAR Crunch. Probably the best ice cream in the history of the world. Then for some unforeseen reason (ok, I know it’s to be a better Fair Trade Partner/non GMO...) they took perfection and threw it out the window.

author: AndiKay44
title: Best ice cream I’ve ever eaten
text:
I see so many folks complaining on here, but I don’t understand it. This ice cream is incredible! I am now wondering what I’ve been doing with my life in eating any other flavors. I love that this ice cream isn’t overly sweet and genuinely Tastes like coffee. I took a pint over to my friends home to make them all try this flavor, that’s how taken with it I was (they all loved it as well. Maybe not as fanatically as me...but what can I say, I’m passionate ).
I want to let you know I buy your ice cream because of your ethics behind your food. I know that a good majority of people rely on willful ignorance with their purchases, but you vote with your dollar, and I feel much better funding something I can stand behind. Yes, consumers have autonomy to choose for themselves, but suppliers also have a responsibility to provide options for people like myself who wish to have integrity behind their purchases. If you miss the heath bars so much, go out and buy one and put it into your ice cream. You have the freedom to do that. I’m going to be eating this ice cream for the rest of my life, and this should be brought to any Ouija board event So I can enjoy it in the after life as well

author: Rachelly
title: Ohhh Coffee and Toffee! Oh my!
text: Used to buy this on a regular basis and now it's not here in the Pasadena, TX area. I wanted this so bad that I settled for terrible other ice cream coffee brand (didn't want to use the correct name because it really was kinda horrible) and bought some Heath miniature bars. Oh well. Still not satisfied because I really want your product.

author: Dakwar44
title: Great flavor
text: My favorite of all Ben and Jerry's flavor. The heath chunks go well with the coffee.

author: Janice
title: Excellent!!!
text: My favorite flavor!! My go to flavor at the Ben & Jerry's Store or grocery store!

author: fumisme
title: How the mighty have fallen.
text: This used to be one of my favorite flavours. It was best when it had the original Heath bars in it. It was still acceptable when it had the Ben & Jerry's toffee bars. Now it just seems to have flat pieces of chocolate in it without any toffee at all. I just finished my last serving of this flavour. It isn't worth the calories or the cost.

author: uvarianna
title: Good change!
text: I'm happy they changed the type of candy bar. It now has natural flavors instead of artificial flavors. They should continue to make those kinds of decisions. Ben and Jerry's should be as natural as possible. It is originally from VT, after all.

author: Jazz mann
title: My favorite
text: I was surprised by all the negative comments. I find this ice cream delicious

author: ella
title: Tastes great to me...
text: Gee, I love this flavor & haven't had any issues with it.... Totally yummy!

author: kat94
title: so delicious
text: i love this ice cream and can never find it at my local walmart anymore! :(

author: colewis
title: My favorite Ben & Jerry's icecream
text: I love the flavor and the chunks of heath bars. Please don't disconintue!!

author: Scruples
title: My New Ben and Gerrys
text: Needed a treat that would be uplifting. Good to do something for me.

author: cam0477
title: Used to be my go to flavor
text: The old coffe toffee heath bar crunch was my tried and true go to flavor!!! I loved it!!!! So I was bitterly disappointed when it changed to non heath bars- not even comparable- but being a fair person I tried it again recently to see if maybe it would wear on me. Nope, sometimes a girl just wants some gmo's if it means better taste.

author: Beckykp27
title: Classic
text: I can't believe people rate this so low, its one of my favorites!

author: MrRogers
title: Best ever!
text: Toffee coffee and ice cream best things in the world combined!!

author: Azor Ahai
title: My favorite!
text: Always my favorite! Should be higher rating! Love love lovve.

author: Messy Tessy
title: I love it. But I never had the heath version
text: I love coffee and toffee. On this heatwave, this is perfect.

author: Anilu
title: Love this flavor
text: love the toffee bar and rlly lke the ice cream! great buy!

author: Lowe
title: Duuuude
text: Stop what you're doing and eat this ice cream. Always.

author: Kimberlytheresa
title: Delicious
text: This flavor is delicious, I hope you keep this flavor

author: Jessie39
title: Best ice cream ever
text: Yummy an it is my favorite snack to eat at midnight

author: Sparkles1970
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!
text: I found this flavor twice where I live. It was the best ice cream I have ever had. I went to buy more and never found it. Still check the Walmart’s here every week. I would buy this ice cream on every shopping trip but have only gotten to eat it twice. I still want more 3 years later. I am actually sad that I can’t have any.

author: Darrahh
title: My New Favorite Ice Cream
text: I discovered Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch about 2 weeks ago and I simply cannot get enough of it. I told my bestie about it and she has been searching high and low for it.

author: Emzy
title: All Time Favorite
text: This ice cream brought me into the world of coffee flavored ice cream. I would be a worst person if I'd never discovered this truly fantastic flavor combo.

author: Luthersez
title: Number 1 in my heart!
text: This has always been and continues to be my go to Ben & Jerry's! My only complaint is that occasionally the toffee bar chunks are too big, no big whoop.

author: naneres
title: By far the best ice cream ever
text: I've loved this ice cream my whole life (38 years). It's so creamy and has the best coffee flavor. I love that Ben & Jerry's took the initiative to change their ingredients to non-GMO, Fairtrade, etc. More companies need to follow suite. I just wish this flavor was easier to find- almost no one carries it!

author: Cricket928
title: Terrible without Heath Bar
text: I’ve tried really hard to like this new version but it just isn’t good. Please listen to your customers and bring back this ice cream with Heath bars. Your sales will make up for any licensing costs. And we don’t care about the sourcing mumbo jumbo. We want you to source your toffee bars from Hershey Co.

author: kathyz
title: Love it!
text: This is my favorite flavor! I love the mix of the coffee ice cream and the toffee pieces. And I love that the toffee bites are so big!

author: CoffeeLover
title: No long the same
text:
This used to be much better. I agree with all the other comments re the metallic taste. The only good thing is that it's no longer available in Canada - so I'm no longer tempted to buy it to see if the problem has gone away.
I still love B&J, but really need a good coffee version to be happy again.

author: Kkely626
title: DELIGHTFUL!
text: I really hope Ben & Jerry's does not listen to all the whiners complaining that it isn't Heath Bar in the ice cream. Truly, this is my favorite flavor! The coffee ice cream is divine and the toffee pieces are delicious! There are usually some nice huge chunks of it in there as well. So so good!

author: sc123
title: So sad!
text: I love Ben & Gerry's....they have some really AWESOME flavors. But this is not one of them. So disappointing. I was totally expecting a delicious Heath Bar knock-off. But no such luck. The ice cream itself is the usual B&G's quality, but the toffee bar chunks are totally sub-par. wah. :(

author: Angel
title: Stop denying replacement
text: Heath Bar obviously replaced by a salty concoction called toffee bar crunch. This used to be the only flavor I'd leave Haagen Dazs for. The coffee ice cream base still delicious, but I have to pick out all the big salty chunks of this horrible toffee. Perhaps add pecans or almonds instead.

author: Mattyicekilla
title: YOU EVER BEEN IN A STORM WALLY?
text: A storm of flavors blasting you in the mouth? When was a kid always ate the toffee heath bar and now it's there toffee I love it the same maybe more 5 star ice cream.

author: Lolly
title: Worst coffee ice cream
text: I love coffee ice cream and I don't think I have ever hated it no matter which brand I bought, but this one was that bad. Major issue is the toffee bar pieces, they ruined the ice cream. Just get ride of this flavor for good. Brewed to Matter is really good though, that one I LOVE..

author: Frankie2u
title: Chalky/gritty
text: I bought this flavor this past weekend and it was chalky and gritty. I checked the sell by date and it doesn't expire until next year. Couldn't taste the toffee well either. I love your other flavors but this one let me down, especially it being close to 7 dollars a pint at 7-11.

author: TRenee
title: Disappointed
text: I LOVED the Coffee Heath! This toffee is not good to me in taste AND texture. The coffee ice cream is delicious though. I ate just the ice cream and tossed the candy in the garbage which was disappointing. I'm afraid to try other flavors that I like in case you changed them too!

author: Jackpipe
title: Can’t stop eating this!
text: Picked this up for the first time. It’s sooo good. I just kept eating and eating...

author: MikeH
title: So disappointing
text: Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was the absolute best B&J flavor. The coffee ice cream is still the best, but the toffee bars in this pint have a kind of taste I can barely describe - probably because it doesn't belong. This flavor is not a consideration for me anymore. It is a shame.

author: Raebirds
title: Still the best!
text: Yes, I know this isn’t the original Toffee heath crunch flavor that we all loved, this flavor has improved greatly since it’s release and is still my favorite BJ flavor by far. Thanks BJ for keeping this masterpiece around for all the coffee ice cream, buttery toffee lovers!

author: Hippiekitchen
title: The Best!
text: I so rarely get this wonderful Ben &Jerry’s Flavor! It is the perfect combination with a perfect crunch. A lot of perfect in one little pint!

author: srjanes
title: Yummy
text: My absolute favorite! The perfect taste of coffee and toffee.

author: Kit96
title: Grainy ice cream and no crunchy toffee
text: I bought a pint today because the flavor sounded interesting. I was sorely disappointed when I took a bite and got grainy ice cream. It was even worse when I found a piece of the promised toffee and it was mush, no crunch or nice toffee flavor just mush.

author: RachelB85
title: Needs more toffee!
text: I grew up eating coffee heath bar crunch, and while I'm fine with this version, I wish there was more toffee. You get a few big squares in the middle, and then none for the rest of the container. Still delicious, just want more toffee. Nom nom nom.

author: Busybee
title: Always my favorite
text: This has been my favorite Ben & Jerry’s ice cream for years. I could care less if it has name brand heath bar or a different toffee candy bar. I still think it tastes the same. It’s delicious! Thank you for continuing to make this ice cream.

author: Amby
title: Sadly disappointed
text: I expected the ice cream to taste like coffee coffee buzz buzz since they are both cofee ice cream. The ice cream tasted more like molasses than coffee. The toffee was disappointing also, it didn't taste like any toffee I've ever had before.

title: No toffee in the ice cream?? 3 times...
text: I used to really like this flavor. But the last 3 pints have had literally 1 piece of toffee in them. Super disappointing. Thought it was just a fluke but I probably will not buy this again. I should just stick with Cherry Garcia forever.

author: some rapper guy who raps
title: Perfect combination
text: Luxury, decadance, uniqueness all in one pint sized tub.

author: Debg
title: Was my favorite until the change
text: I LOVED the coffee heath bar flavor. Was my favorite. But with the name change and the formula change it tastes like a cheap knock off. The toffee has a burnt taste. Very unappealing. Please find a different toffee to use.

author: Booksnoop
title: Repulsive Toffee
text: This used to be my favorite ice cream flavor, but after trying the new version which does not use Health Bars, no more! The new toffee is disgusting. Why did they replace delicious Heath Bars? I won’t buy this again.

author: Scaro
title: Hits the spot!
text: This is my all time favorite flavor, the toffee is soft and buttery yet still holds the perfect crunch while simultaneously melting in your mouth. The coffee ice cream is on point, everything about this flavor is great!

author: Carol Sue
title: Disappointed
text: Used to be my favorite. Don’t plan to purchase again. Toffee is poor and even the coffee ice cream seems different, and not good. I expect better from Ben and Jerry’s. On a positive note, I do like the Urban Bourbon.

author: ajs626
title: My favorite!
text: I love the uniqueness of this flavor and it has become my favorite go-to for snack until the stores in my area stop caring it. I've been testing other flavours, but none have matched my love for the Coffee Toffee.

author: Emmee
title: Please tell me you sell the Toffee separate??!
text: Listen I LOVE the ice cream but the TOFFEE! The toffee is so delicious I picked it out FIRST ate it and then ate the ice cream. I am just blown away....if you don't sell separately can I get a recipe!!? PLEASE?

author: CrissyD
title: My Soulmate!
text: I just discovered this ice cream recently and now my local grocery orders it special for me, and my friends, because we're all now addicted. I love it. It is the best flavor the is. Please always keep it!!!

author: taylortots
title: Horrible Flavor
text: When I took one bite out of this ice cream, I immediately regretted buying it in the first place. The toffee bar crunch part tasted really odd, like burnt toffee. It is a shame because it sounded so good!

author: Bethany1500
title: My favorite!
text: This is my all time favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry’s. I couldn’t find it anywhere for awhile and came on here to find it near me. I’m happy to say I bought all 6 they had at my local bi lo. Heaven!!!

author: Deborah
title: Delicious, but caffeinated
text: I love the flavor of this coffee ice cream, but I'll have to eat this one for breakfast. It keeps me up if I eat it post dinner. I'd love to see a decaffeinated version! Love Ben & Jerry's BLM message!

author: Lizzie from the Lou
title: Love it!
text: I started buying pint sized ice cream instead of going out for ice cream. Gave this a try and wasn’t disappointed. I wish the store where I do curb side pick up offered more Ben and Jerry flavors

author: Zokk5
title: Terrible flavor
text: I just bought this from a local Shoprite. Toffee pieces were too flat to be crunchy. And it did not taste like coffee ice cream. Severely disappointed, as I dont eat much ice cream.

author: Mona
title: Delicious
text: My husband surprised me with this and I love it, my only criticism is that I thought the toffee pieces should have been a little smaller, maybe half the size for ease of eating.

author: CRSpooner
title: Why why why
text: I grew up eating Ben & Jerry’s coffee heath bar crunch ice cream. It literally was the only ice cream I would buy in stores. Years ago it was replaced by this terrible copycat.

author: AnnaGarv
title: Worst toffee ever
text: Wow what a waste of $6. I spent more time scooping around the cheap yucky toffee than I did eating the ice cream. Heath bars would have been much better. Gosh that was sad.

author: jccd23
title: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
text: It Was Any First Time Trying This Flavor And Overall I Loved The Flavor But It Was A Bit Hard To Enjoy Because There Was This Grity Powdery Texture To The Icecream Itself.

author: LaurieUpstate20
title: What Toffee?
text: I bought this a few days ago. Only two pieces of toffee in the whole container. And a few tiny pieces. Very disappointing. Maybe it was the last container in the batch.

author: Aaron
title: Bring back the heath!
text: The new toffee bars used taste waxy and are definitely not as good as the original Heath bars in the “Coffee Heath Toffee Crunch” I ate for years. Please change it back!

author: Lambski
title: All-time Great
text: I have bought this flavor loyally for over 10 years (since it had Heath bars), and enjoy it even more now. The flavors are perfectly balanced and it never disappoints.

title: Try it if you love coffee ice cream!
text: I've been eating coffee ice cream since I was a kid! This brand has some delicious coffee ice cream! I'm surprised by the bad reviews, but I love this flavor.

author: Brotherd66
title: Simply the best ice cream flavor ever created.
text:
I have been a fan of this ice cream flavors since the mid-1980’s
It never disappoints, and is the best thing to ever rain down upon my tastebuds ever!

author: krissi924
title: The best!
text: This is by far my favorite ice cream flavor! The large chunks of toffee beat any other ice cream with toffee in it, and the toffee melts in your mouth.

author: Birdmann
title: Hard on the teeth
text: We loved Heath Bar, but this has very hard thick toffee that doesn't crunch. Tastes good, but wish we could have a softer crunchy toffee again

author: Someinternetguy
title: Garbage
text: Not a substitute for coffee Heath Bar Crunch. Did anybody taste this stuff before they put it on shelves? The brand has gone down hill.

author: Equinn17
title: This ice cream makes my boyfriend jealous.
text: Literally the best thing I could put in my mouth. Not even my dreams could come up with something like this. Thank you Ben and Jerrys!!

author: Cavewmn
title: CCOOOFFFFEEEEEEEEE!!!!
text: This is my new favorite ice cream. I love the coffee ice cream. Then it is amazing having these toffee chunks covered in fudge.

author: Missheath
title: Bring back the heath bar!
text: I am so sad that you all changed the heath bar to toffee. The texture and flavor is not the same. Please bring back heath bar!

author: melodie
title: she is delicious
text: you all are out of your minds, coffee toffee bar crunch is truly one of b&j’s best, second only to cherry garcia honestly

author: Gummeh
title: Ugh
text: This used to be my FAVORITE! The toffee bars are disgusting now, they leave a weird aftertaste. Bring back the Heath bar!

author: Bill vandrick
title: Ruined the best ice cream
text: Humans are GMO - there is nothing wrong with GMO and you reunited this ice cream by getting rid Heath Bars. Stupid!!!

author: bringbackheathbar
title: Tastes like blood
text: Has a disgusting metallic taste. I recommend only for people who like their ice cream to taste like blood.

author: Alex576
title: All time favorite
text: The ice cream is amazing and the toffee bars are sooo good. Not like cheap check out line candy bars.

author: BringBackKeyLimePie
title: Worst Toffee I've Ever Tasted
text: Just gave this a try tonight and I am very disappointed. Literally the worst toffee I have ever had.

author: Cambrieezie
title: My Favorite!!
text: I have only been able to find this flavor one time and it is my FAVORITE!!! Ughhh... send me more!!!

author: ABLE403
title: Incredible
text: Dont be fooled by the low star rating this one is one of the best pints I ever had! EPIC FLAVOR

author: Angelazhuinn
title: Toffee bar nasty
text: Omg I love Ben & Jerry’s ice cream but this one was a flop. Ended up throwing away 2 pints :(

author: HazelBasil
title: Favourite Ice Cream!
text: This is by far my favourite ice cream to buy. Great coffee taste with large pieces of toffee.

author: Illy
title: My Favorite!
text: It's my absolute favorite ice cream. Unfortunately, I can not find it anywhere. So sad.

author: LoveHeath
title: Toffee too thick
text: I thought I was gonna break a tooth. The toffee pieces are much thicker than Heath.

author: Hawthornecl
title: Nasty metallic flavor
text: Coffee heath bar crunch was the best. This coffee toffee is junk! So disappointing!

author: Jeepin Jesse
title: Bring Back Heath Bar!!
text: They non GMO ruined this flavor. To the graveyard with this one.

author: Mariss
title: Best
text: Best flavor they have. So delicious. Cant go wrong with coffee and heath bar

author: Carrie
title: One of my favorites!
text: Love Toffee and Coffee together! I am sad when I can't find it at the store!

author: bgood 76
title: Awesome Awesome mix of all my favs
text: bought it 7 years ago and have looked for it every since my for ever go to

author: QueenSky
title: My favorite
text: This is the only flavor I like. But it is rarely stocked in stores :(

author: Mandamae
title: Addicted
text: Love this icecream. It's an awesome blend of coffee and toffee. ❤️❤️

author: Halle
title: Coffee with toffee crunch!
text: My fav flavour, you can't beat coffee ice cream with toffee crunch!

author: MsC757
title: I love it!!
text: Very very GOOD ♥️..If I could I would eat this ice cream every day

author: Stgrmom
title: Inedible
text: So so so bad! Won’t waste anymore time on this disgusting product.

author: JenB
title: Coffee toffee
text: I am so happy I tried this flavor, it is now my new fav!!!!

author: Sue2020
title: My favorite flavor!
text: This is my favorite flavor. More stores need to carry this!

title: FAVORITE
text: Try it and you will always buy it!!! BEST combo everrr

author: Galex66
title: My favorite
text: The perfect blend of toffee and coffee and crunch!

author: MalloryKnows
title: For those who are brave or who have taste ONLY!
text: I can’t even imagine comparing a nasty, trite, bland Heath bar to the fine, succulent toffee in this ice cream. A Heath bar belongs in a bland generic brownish ice cream made specifically for the commoners’ consumption, basically people who will never know any better; it certainly doesn’t belong in this delicious, palatable gourmet ice cream made by Ben and Jerry’s.

author: Mama Shannon
title: The best caramel ice cream I've ever haf!
text: I tried this ice cream for the very first time about a month ago, and now it is my once a month treat to myself. I didn't eat ice cream very often, but I'm a bit of a caramel nut. When i saw this flavor, I have in and broke my rule and got a pint, even though I was leery of spending so much on an unfamiliar product. I have a strict budget, and only allow myself to get a "comfort food" treat once a month, so that I'm not tempted to buy junk food when I'm really in need of that "comfort" factor. I'm SO glad I took the chance! This is the best caramel ice cream i have ever had! My only regret is that out only comes in pint containers.

author: BrianNYC
title: Finally an ice(cream) caramel latte!
text: I bought this flavor a couple of weeks ago and it has now become my all time favorite ice cream! If you love coffee ice creams and caramel this is the perfect ice cream for you! Mixing the cold brew ice cream with sweet cream allows for a much more subtle coffee flavor and really emphasizes the trio of flavors goes together exceptionally well.

author: goziii
title: Rare Find!
text: This ice cream is so good that I’m eating it right now. I love Ben & Jerry’s and I love coffee ice cream. So when I went looking for ice cream I went to the 7-11 down the street. Had I known this was going to be so good, I would’ve bought the rest of whatever they had in stock!

author: nikkibeethatsme
title: If you like coffee, this is for you!
text: I absolutely love this flavor. We bought one pint and went back for two more, then we showed them to our friends and they went and bought some! The best flavor I’ve ever had.

author: Dragonfire8910
title: SO GOOD
text: This is so good? I don’t usually like coffee icecream but this is amazing. Definitely has a lot of caffeine, but luckily I have adhd and am therefore immune.

author: christianbean
title: Best Caramel Ice cream EVER
text: Bought one last week at a 7/11 and saw that they’re exclusive so I had to go back yesterday stock up on a few!

author: drewwwtimus
title: Amazing & Satisfying!
text: To say I love ice cream is an understatement. I eat a pint of Ben & Jerry's every night (that is not a typo). I usually do half baked and try other "exclusive" flavors when I need a change. I saw this flavor at 7-11 and decided to try it. Wow! This is my new favorite flavor! It tastes like genuine cold-brew coffee, not a cheap, overly sweet imitation. The sweet creme ice cream gives the perfect amount of sweetness without being too much. And the slightly salted caramel swirls are to die for. The combination of flavors is the perfect balance. It's not too sweet or heavy and is actually refreshing. There's no chunks, so if you love creamy ice cream like me give this flavor a try! Tastes just like that popular chain's caramel frappuccino. Only problem is that I bought every one at my 7-11 and can't find any more! I'm absolutely in love with and addicted to this flavor and hope it becomes a staple.

author: Kosherjoe
title: Best New B&J Flavor
text:
Dear Ben & Jerry or my life savers,
This is hands down the best icecream I've ever had. I had bought two pints and during quarantine these have been the best sweets. I had broken my arm so it's been hard for me to get around so when I postmates it no one can find me this flavor! So I went on the hunt for a day and after 10 different locations I could not find this flavor! Please make this a permanent flavor so I can have this sweet treat again!

author: Jmkbabe
title: Disappointing
text: I bought this tonight. I love Ben and Jerry’s, this flavor was the only one left at 7-11..... about four bites fixed my sweats craving, however- despite my love for coffee and my love for icecream - this just doesn’t taste quite right. Way too potent on the coffee side, and I like espresso straight. Not going to buy again :(

author: JLNM
title: Great Flavor
text: so creamy and yummy, i love the chunks and swirls so much

author: Eileen
title: Everything other than what it used to be!
text: I have bought this flavor for years and it was my favorite ice cream EVER! However when you changed the recipe and took the HEATH out of it I noticed immediately! I thought I had bought a bad batch, and after a few bites threw it away. After 4 more batches with the same disgusting taste, I wondered why I was eating ice cream that tasted like rusty metal! And sure enough it was the NEW “Toffee Pieces”. They are so bad I can no longer eat this. What a tremendous disappointment. I could eat another brand of ice cream with a rusty spoon and it would taste less like metal than the New everything but the.....NEVER AGAIN!

author: DMAC
title: Love this flavor, but...
text: This is my go-to choice every time I'm needing a fix. It's close to being perfection in a pint. However, I miss the Heath brand chocolate covered toffee pieces.
