It just hasn't been the same since the switch. Am I the only one that thinks the current toffee has almost a medicinal or metallic taste? Would love to see a better toffee choice in the future. That's not strong enough....PLEASE GIVE US BETTER TOFFEE PIECES!!!

author: Hrshanahan
title: Where's the toffee?
text: This flavor is one of my favorites! I fell in love with it the first time I had it, it was packed full of peanut butter cups and huge pieces of toffee. However the past couple time I've had it I only get shavings of toffee, and a couple peanut butter cups. was there a recipe change? Smaller toffee and more nuts? Fewer PB cups? I'll still purchase this flavor! Just disappointed to not find large toffee pieces and more delicious PB cups

author: Alanna P
title: Delicious Flavors!
text: I got this ice cream for the first time after finding out about Ben and Jerry's no nonsense stance agaisnt white supremacy and was not disappointed! Absolutely delicious, I ate every morsel I could get! The peanut butter cups were massive and delicious, the toffee pieces were really yummy for me, and the white chocolate was not overpowering, as white chocolate can sometimes be, but added a nice addition. I will certainly get this flavor again and am excited to try other flavors in the future!

author: Shan
title: Where did Everything go?
text: There is a complete lack of "everything" in this! I've had four in a row with no toffee, and very little of anything else. Seriously?? When you pay a premium for ice cream that is stingy, it is not premium, it is a waste of money! Very disappointed! Been a forever fan, but I'm done hoping it was a temporary issue, it has been consistently lacking. So sad, but time to say goodbye):

author: Elizabeth
title: Awesome Except the Toffee
text: The toffee isn't nearly as good as when it used to have Heath bars in it - it tastes a little more sour to me. But everything else is fantastic. This is by far my favorite B&J flavor.

author: FuzzyGut
title: Almost great, but misses
text: Ben and Jerry’s is hands down my favorite brand! As for this flavor, the ice cream is great, as are the peanut butter cups, but the toffee is not good at all. I never had this when Heath was used but I can imagine it was far better. The nuts were ok but I won’t be buying this flavor again. Others are far better. Sorry, folks.

author: may_g13
title: Peanut butter cup overload
text: This ice cream was practically taken over by pb cups. While I do love pb cups, I wanted more of a variety in this ice cream. I only got two pieces of the toffee and less than 5 almonds. The white chocolate was there which was delicious but my favorite is the toffee and unfortunately it was lacking. Overall, it’s good if you’re in the mood for peanut butter cups.

author: Kokoabuttah
title: Pregnant go to
text: I bought this ice cream honestly because the supermarket was having a sale and they didn’t have the kind I originally wanted no brand shall be named being that I’m 38 weeks pregnant and can never make my mind up on what I want the list of ingredients sounded like a delicious combination of everything I wanted to try so I bought one. I thought it was vanilla ice cream with chocolate swirls but it’s not its Chocolate and vanilla ice cream togetherI honestly don’t even like chocolate ice cream but to my surprise it was delicious!!!!! . I would love to see more pnutbutter cups in there but beside that it was amazing.Now I find my self going straight to this brand and this flavor no matter if it’s on sale or not.

author: HorriblebooTM
title: Um...
text: So I just got this stuff from a local drug store because I’ve never had Ben and Jerry’s before. I was so excited to try it! Once I did, I had to spit it out in the sink. The chocolate, vanilla, and almonds are good, but the toffee covered fudge chunks tasted nothing like hoe they sound. They tasted like blood or rusty metal. Yuck! I thought I could just work my way around the blood tasting fudge pieces, but no, the metallic flavor was everywhere! Not getting this flavor again!

author: ColumbiaH
title: Sounded good but tasted awful
text: I have no idea what it was but randomly through eating it I’d get this terrible taste in my mouth. I came to read other reviews and someone else summed it up perfectly. The toffee tasted like rusty metal! great idea, but something in this is off.

author: Shannon
title: Everything but the Peanut Butter Cups
text: I debated between this and Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch for quite a while but ultimately decided on this because of the Peanut Butter Cups, but there wasn't a single peanut butter cup, if you can believe it!? There was a very generous amount of large Toffee bars, which was nice, but it certainly did fulfill my Peanut butter craving. No hard feelings, just saying!

author: kleemargaret
title: Not the Same
text: 5 years ago, Everything But The was my favorite treat. I ate a pint a week and I was in love. Then, one day, I opened a new pint of the ice cream and found that the Heath Bar part tasted a little funky. I thought at the time that I got a bad batch of the ice cream and bought a new one. Sadly, I realized that there had been a switch of the Heath Bar permanently. For the past 5 years, I have eaten around the metallic tasting toffee. I still love the flavor, but I beg that we can switch back to the original taste.

author: prospermom
title: Please use better TOFFEE!
text: This was my favorite ice cream in the whole world (five stars!) UNTIL the "new" toffee. From the other reviews I read, I know your other fans agree with me. And of course this applies to all your other flavors that have Toffee as well, that I USED to enjoy, like Coffee Heath Bar. I appreciate the Non_GMO/Fairtrade efforts, but can you please source Toffee that meets your standards and actually tastes good? The toffee is missing the buttery taste. Or maybe gets Hershey's on board with making some special non GMO Toffee just for you guys? I used to love digging for "treasure": the gooey, slightly melted toffee pockets were my favorite part. Now, I don't buy this ice cream nearly as much as I used to, but when I do, I dig around the toffee and throw it away, which is wasteful. I cant just add Heath bars to this myself because they will not get those gooey carmelly toffee pockets.

author: Specie
title: What Happened??
text: This was always my favorite flavor. Lately, though, the Heath Bar pieces and Peanut Butter Cups are few and far between. Like almost non-existent. Just some tiny round balls of chocolate with almonds inside (I think), and flat pieces of chocolate. Are the new owners cheaping out? Please bring back the original - it was one of the best ice creams on the planet!

author: Rmg1188
title: Inconsistent
text: When I crave ice cream this is what I crave. It's literally all of my favorite candies in one ice cream. But it's really hit or miss with the amount of candy in it. Sometimes I'm completely missing toffee pieces, or white chocolate pieces it just depends. There never seems to be a shortage of the peanut butter cup though. I just wish the candy ratio was more balanced and consistent. I literally never know what I'm gonna get when I buy this, but i still buy it anyway because even on its worst day it's still pretty darn good.

author: karlena
title: Everything But The Delicious
text: I've never been disappointed with Ben and Jerry's in the few months I've been buying pints. I like to try a new flavor every time. The description of this flavor sounded to die for, so I snagged a pint. However, I'm very disappointed in the flavor of the candy chunks. The white "fudge" tastes like plastic or has some sort of chemical aftertaste and the toffee pieces taste metallic/rusty. The chocolate ice cream and the peanut butter cups are what enabled me to keep eating it and not throw it in the trash.

author: pointeful
title: Absolute favorite
text: My mom bought this flavor my entire childhood and got me hooked on it! Everything in it works seamlessly and provides a different, sweet, chocolaty taste with every bite! The inclusion of the two kinds of ice cream makes it even better!

author: Douglas
title: Used to be good
text: This was really good back when this had Heath toffee bars in it. Sadly this is not the case anymore. The new toffee bars are metallic tasting. On top of that all stores within 25 miles of me stopped carrying it. Might be the taste???

author: Nikhug
title: the loss of Heath
text: Still a fan, but the loss of real Heath bar really downgraded the product. On my bookshelf I have an empty pint of the last container with real Heath bar in it, a happy reminder of a better time in a better product

author: James_ice_cream
title: PLEASE CHANGE BACK TO OLD RECIPE
text: Why why why would you guys change my favorite ice cream?! Please go back to the old mix... Im sure people would pay a little more for it if that's the issue...

author: SadStoryGirl
title: Disappointed.
text: I decided to try a new flavor, and this sounded appealing. Ugh, I was wrong. Hate the combination. Toffee pieces too big. I'll stick to the ones I know work.

author: Mary
title: It truely does have Everything But the
text: I but 7 pints of this a week and eat every one of them!!! I will drive to every store in my area if I cant find it!!! The best ice cream I've ever eaten!!!

author: Sindawg
title: Everything, what the?
text:
Everything but the... stuff I wanted!!
Where's all the yummy stuff? Mostly just ice cream, very few chunks of yummies.

author: GoddysMama
title: Only one piece of toffee?
text: My entire pint only had one piece of toffee. What gives?

author: Beemandyd
title: My Favorite Flavor!
text: I've been coming back to this flavor for years. It hasn't disappointed me where I need to try a new flavor but I'm sure the others are just as good if not better! I always recommend this flavor and I am disappointed when sold out!

author: Dianne
title: Best flavor!
text: This has been my "go to" flavor for years! It combines the best of everything (which means no cloying caramel)! I can never choose between chocolate and vanilla, so I don't need to with this flavor. I love the big peanut butter cup chunks, toffee pieces, and fudge covered almonds. These three items are my favorite mix-ins at any ice cream parlor. Most Ben & Jerry flavors are good, but this one is exceptional and 100% perfect.

author: Andig
title: Only the kitchen sink, nothing else!
text: Not much going on here for me.. New York Supa Fudge Chunk kinda gal so maybe that's why!

author: BAR507
title: What's not to love!
text: With all the peanut butter cups, chocolate toffee chunks, chocolaty almonds and white chocolate deliciousness, the only thing that would make this flavor better is whipped cream! But, I guess that's the but!

author: Ckebb
title: ALL ICE CREAM
text: Ok I saw this and saw the peanut butter cups and I was like yes I’m craving peanut butter lemme get this one. And then I bought it and there was 3 PIECES OF PEANUT BUTTER LIKE WHAT. It was LITERALLY all Ice cream I was not happy. And the other things like the almonds and whatever that other thing is was so so and there wasn’t much of that either. Yea like this is just all I’ve cream.

author: Big Boiiii
title: So good!
text: I saw that this flavor had under 4 stars average and thought it was criminal. Here's my boost for an awesome flavor!

author: Ineedtoffee
title: Everything but the Toffee
text: This is my absolute favorite. I didn't really mind the switch from the heath toffee to the current. However, I recently brought a pint the other day and there was no toffee whatsoever in my pint. How are the batches being made now? It seems like for the price you would literally get some of everything. I would appreciate better service.

author: Ryan
title: Did NOT Like the PB Cups
text: Purchased a pint of this ice cream within the last couple of weeks at the local grocery store. The PB cups were not up to par with the quality of the other ingredients. Overall, just not a distinct taste to this pairing of ingredients. Disappointed, at best. Recommendations: Chunky Monkey (always); Truffle Kerfuffle (!).

author: MKracken
title: Miss this Flavor!
text: Everything But The has always been my favorite flavor even when they changed to different pieces. I love the blend of flavors and large chunks of stuff. However it’s not carried in stores around me anymore! I’m starting to worry it’s being discontinued.

author: Runningskunk53
title: I love everything but the
text: I get everything but the every night and yet the past few nights it’s been like freakin peanut butter cup lovers cuz that’s all that’s in there is peanut butter cups I’m getting very disappointed with everything but the now

author: Ashlynn
title: Why is it discontinued?
text: This is my absolute favorite ice cream and I came home from deployment to find that all the stores near me stopped carrying it because it’s discontinued it’s all I’ve wanted for the past year l, this is truly upsetting

author: Mel19
title: My favorite flavor
text: This is honestly my favorite flavor ice cream. However, I don't like the metallic tasting toffee pieces, I usually give those bites to my son that doesn't mind the metallic taste. Please get better toffee pieces!!

author: Bowlgouge
title: Everything but the goods
text: If you like plain vanilla and chocolate ice cream with nothing else, then this is the flavor for you. If you purchase this flavor expecting PB cups, toffee bits, and white chocolately chunks look elsewhere.

author: Joycie
title: Horrible taste and odd gravel in pint?
text: I bought this a week ago and took one bite and noticed an awful rusty iron taste as I bit into a very gritty something. I tried a few more bites and every single bite tasted like metal. Very dissapointed .

author: Sarasue92
title: Love it!
text: This is one of my favorite ice creams, I have to hide it in a frozen vegetable bag in the freezer so my daughter and boyfriend don't eat it. The only thing it needs is a little more vanilla ice cream.

author: Tallal
title: Lovely
text: What can I say? What's not to love? Two of my favorite candy. Toffee and peanut butter cups. Lovely combination. Only thing Want more pieces in it. Fully loaded please. Thanks Ben and Jerry's.

author: Apethecake
title: So good I gained weight from eating too much of it
text: This ice cream is the best ice cream I've ever had in my 20 years of life. I would eat it everyday if i could! Ben and Jerry, you are a blessing for my heart but a cruse for my body!!!!

author: MsBluewings
title: What else could you ask for?!!!
text: Oh my, and I thought "Phish Food" was going to be my favorite for LIFE. Well, I found my new favorite for LIFE! Great combinations and well blended. Big chunks and whole pieces GALORE!!

author: tonezib
title: Fantastic
text: I love this flavor. It is Devine. In May, for the first time ever, two of the things were not in the pint. I've kind of noticed this lately, I hope it's not the new owners.

author: The Bombshell
title: THE BEST ICE CREAM EVER MADE ON PLANET EARTH!!
text: Let me tell you something people! If you have not tasted this ice cream, you have not lived. Every single bite is different and my god it's addictive! Very Therapuetic!

author: KingBob
title: The best ever specially the salted almonds.
text: I used to have one of this at least once a week and love the salted almonds, reeses ans heats chocolate pieces. Unfortunately it looks like only exists at US market now.

author: Maxdonaldo
title: Interesting Flavor Combos
text: Every bite is like a new flavor with all that’s in there! That said, I wish it were a little better. Maybe if the chocolate ice cream were richer. But still—its good!

author: Aanstead
title: Everything I want!
text: I love this ice cream! When I first tried it I was skeptical, but I love everything in this ice cream. I just wish it was consistently sold in my grocery store.

author: Meeshell
title: My Go-To Pint!
text: This is the perfect blend of everything, especially since you don't have to choose between chocolate and vanilla ice cream! My favorite is the toffee pieces.

author: Qjeenah
title: My favourite flavour!
text: This is the best flavour because it has a little bit of everything. Chocolate covered almonds, white fudge pieces, peanut butter cups... i want some NOW!

author: toffeelover
title: Everything but the Toffee!
text: This used to be my favorite flavor until they removed the toffee. I could not find even a single piece of toffee in the entire pint. Very disappointing.

author: pepgirl78
title: Awesome flavor
text: This is the best flavor... Can't get enough... It tastes like heaven.. Wish it came in a bigger size... Just finished a pint and want more...

author: Kammie69
title: Aww
text: This is by far my favorite in the world i live 5 mins.away from borgata an they dont carry it...please please bring it to ben an jerry's their..

author: ToughSissy
title: My Favorite
text: The chocolate is rich, the vanilla is mellow and digging with the spoon is like treasure hunting. The peanut butter cups are like hitting gold!

author: Becky11117
title: AMAZING
text: Every time I get ice cream cravings this is my go to! I’m not a big fan of dark chocolate but with the flavor combinations it works!

author: Cocosdad
title: My Favorite
text: This has always been my favorite, but can't find it in any stores in my location. I look for l look for it everywhere we go.

author: SUNFLOWER23
title: Absolutely love
text: This flavor is amazing. I absolutely love it. The only downside is I can not find it in any store near me now. COME BACK!!!!

author: Blake6900
title: Personal favorite
text: I rarely see this flavor while shopping but anytime I do, I have to buy myself some. If you love chocolate, you'll love this

author: Icecreamaddict55
title: Everything I Want
text: It's everything I want but not too much. It checks all the boxes of what a good ice cream needs. Nuts, chips and chocolate.

author: Kim J
title: Miss everything but the
text: I love, love, love the Ben & Jerry’s everything but the. I have been looking for months and cannot find it. HELP!!!

author: jasminesb418
title: I love this flavor
text: This flavor is so good I don’t get why it’s reviews are so low!! It has a lot of components but I think it’s bomb

author: Raye
title: Best Flavor!
text: My mom introduced this flavor to me years ago. It’s my absolute favorite!❤️ I wish this came in a 48oz.

author: Nini1991
title: Nom Nom Nom
text: Seriously one of my favorite flavors!!! It's always hard to choose between this one and half baked!

author: Brin
title: Favorite but
text: I bought this because it’s my favorite but it had toffee and no Reese’s and no white chocolate

author: highup
title: hi
text: is it called this bc there is a limited amount of ice cream and its a lot of toppings-lmk

author: Mike2312
title: Best Flavor
text: This is by far my most favorite flavor and hope to see it stay around for a long time

author: Magicalmusing
title: Best Flavor!!
text: Anytime I want some Ben & Jerry's it's gotta be Everything But The... simply amazing

author: buner
title: AMAZING
text: The toffee pieces are just heaven. Perfect blend of flavors and all things great.

author: Zac11
title: Great texture
text: Bought this too many times at this point, outrageously good ice cream

author: eliz13413
title: Delicious
text: The title of my review sums it up: Delicious!! One of my favorites.

author: whatthemel
title: YUM
text: One of my favorites! So much goodness packed into one flavor

author: Softycz
title: Everything is everything!
text: My go to flavor fave! When I really want to treat myself.

author: tortellini
title: Delicious Swirls
text: The regular chocolate ice cream usually isn't the best but the salty pretzel swirly really elevates it to a new place. The combination creates a salted chocolate flavor that really keeps you coming back for more. Marshmallow swirls are always a good option over mini marshmallows and the almonds add a good crunch. I rounded this up to 5 stars but I would be interested in graham cracker or some type of pastry chunks along with or replacing the almonds. I just simply don't love almonds. Overall 4.5/5 Very good. Worth buying.

author: Chip M
title: Love, love, LOVE Glampfire!!!
text: I found this ice cream last year and bought way more than I should have over the summer and cleared out my local Target in the Fall. I mourned the loss of summer and this ice cream until I happened across five pints at that Target close to the holidays! It was a Christmas miracle that I savored well into the new year. Then it was gone...again. I thought that was it until I saw it today back on the shelves. THANK YOU, B&J for bringing this back. I hope this is a permanent summertime flavor!!! The salty/sweet combination is PERFECT!

author: m4rski
title: Bring it back!!!!!
text: Please bring it back B&J.

author: tracymzuziak
title: Best flavor EVER!
text: I, myself, am not the biggest fan of ice cream, but I was stocking up for my husband, and I saw this exclusive flavor at Target. Got it home, tried it for myself, and went back the next day to get two more pints! I LOVE IT! The chocolate is so decadent. The marshmallow is scrumptious and the little bits of pretzel give it the perfect dash of crunch and salt. I cannot stop eating it. Dee-lish!

author: FuzzyGut
title: Good, not great.
text: I think Ben and Jerry’s does the best chocolate and fudgie flavors I’ve ever had, and this one is now exception. The pretzels were great tasting and nicely salty but was not so much a swirl and more chunks of pretzel here and there. The marshmallow was great and played well with the pretzel chunks against the chocolate background but honestly, the fudge covered almonds were kinda gross tasting and I had to eat around them. The real problem was that the pint wasn’t full! There was a big gap on the side of the container and that was rather frustrating. This came so close to being great but between the missing ice cream and the funky almonds, I think this one time will be my last for this flavor.

author: chefamyj
title: Good not great
text: I'd give this an 8 out of 10. The chocolate I good, and marshmallow swirl is awesome(which I love) and the chocolate covered almond chunks are fantastic. And it would be 10 out of 10 except the pretzel part is waaay too salty. if it were actual pretzel pieces it would be ok too But in the container I got, the pretzel part was like the texture of wet sand and just too salty. Zero crunch at all and no defined pieces. just this salty paste. But the chocolate, marshmallows and almonds are so good. I'm wondering If I got a bad container because reading other people's reviews of this flavor, they had pretzel pieces in theirs. which would have been 10x better.

author: Carolyn
title: Obsessed!
text: I tried this on a whim, and it is now my absolute favorite flavor ever! The combination of chocolate ice cream with slightly salty pretzel bits and globs of gooey marshmallow along with fudge covered almonds is just perfect. Please let this be a regular flavor and not just a limited edition. Pretty, pretty please!

author: audrey1
title: Please make this a permanent flavor!
text: BEST FLAVOR EVER. The pretzel swirl is my favorite feature of any ice cream, and the fudge almonds are amazing with the salty pretzel. I was so disappointed when I stopped being able to find it in the store and really hope this flavor makes a comeback! I would make this a staple of my ice cream rotation :)

author: Angie Mottk
title: I loved the first pint of this but...
text: I bought this last month and feel in love! The salty swirls are so delicious and the marshmallow took the show! I would have given this a 5 out of 5 based on that. But purchasing it again, it was basically chocolate ice cream with marshmallow. The pretzel swirls was NOT in my pint. Very disappointed in the hit or miss with the pints. I thought they was improving on this but that’s the second pint of this flavor with the skimpy mix ins. I get so disappointed when this happens being I only indulge once a week in ice cream so I want it to be good! Please work on this.

author: Charm
title: Salty and sweet
text: On behalf of all pre menopausal women... don’t let this one go. Crunchy and salty and marshmallowey chocolatey goodness. Best pint of ice cream I’ve ever eaten.

author: capinmn
title: PLEASE BRING IT BACK in 2019
text: Love, Love, Love the Glampfire Trail Mix ice cream! This is the first ice cream that I haven't been able to put down and I must have ate it all, cause now I can't find it at any of the Targets. Please, Please, Please make it one of your staple ice creams. It is ridiculously good!! Nice job by the way!!

author: CurlyGF18
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER!!!
text: I adore all kinds of chocolate ice cream and have a special place in my heart for Ben and Jerry’s (its always just perfectly rich) but this flavor is bar none my favorite ice cream of all time!! It was a seasonal Target only flavor so at the end of the season I bought 9 to last me until next summer!!

author: ChrisColby
title: Rocky Road-ish?
text: Glampfire Trail Mix has chocolate ice cream with chocolate covered almonds, a marsmallow swirl, and a pretzel swirl. The base and almonds provide alot of chocolate flavor that dominates the taste buds when eaten in isolation. The salty pretzel swirl gives a nice crunch and heightens the chocolate, giving it a sort of dark chocolate taste. It's a little overbearing but luckily the sweet marshmallow swirl balances the other components out, providing a great flavor when eaten as a whole. Very close in fact to a rocky road but done better. The only problem is the amount of marshmallow isn't enough. Perhaps I just got a pint with less marshmallow but without more of it, the salty chocolate taste can be overpowering. A great flavor when all the components come together but a little too strong on the chocolate taste otherwise.

author: NanasCone
title: Might be my new favorite!
text: Just picked up this pint today, and was blown away by how deliciously rich, textured, and addictive this flavor is. I loved the chocolate covered almonds, the rich chocolate icecream, against the gooey marshmallow, and the nicely salty graham cracker. I am no fan of those cloyingly sweet salted caramels flavors, so I wondered if the salted graham crackers would work. It was perfect! This would be my icecream s’more of choice. Please make this a regular flavor!

author: IceCreamEnthusiast
title: THE GREATEST ICE CREAM EVER
text: As an avid ice cream enthusiast I’ve eaten my fair share of ice cream, but this flavor is hands down the greatest I’ve ever had. I stumbled upon it in summer 2018 and then spent an entire year searching for it at every store I went into for the last year. I just found it again and I bought the entire stock. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor! I never write reviews on anything.... but felt compelled to expressed my love for this amazing ice cream!

author: Natf
title: Awesome Mix!
text: If you like heavenly hash icecream, this is just about the same thing. The marshmallows are very creamy, and the hint of salt from the pretzels accents the chocolate and almonds perfectly. This might be my new favorite flavor! Thanks Ben & Jerry.

author: margie
title: cannot stop eating!
text: Awesome ice cream! The add-ins to this ice cream are just terrific. The marshmallows and pretzels. I cannot stop eating this flavor. I hope you keep it in the rotation!!

author: fastforwardgirl
title: New FAVORITE Ben & Jerry's Flavor!
text: Just bought this this past weekend for the kiddos! My favorite flavor before was Half Baked, but I took a bite of my son's pint of this Glampfire Trail Mix and honestly was MIND BLOWN! The saltiness of the pretzelness mixed with the sweetness of the marshmallow is PERFECT. The perfect texture and you won't be bored because there's always complex, changing flavors throughout! SO DELICIOUS! This is our new FAVORITE

author: SamanthaPN
title: MY NEW FAVORITE
text: This is the most perfect ice cream I have ever eaten. I can’t smell, so I love strong flavors, and this ticks every box. Sweet, salty, creamy, good textures - it’s like ambrosia. When I suspected Target was going to stop carrying it over the winter, I bought 20 pints from my local stores and boy am I glad I did. I’ve had one a week since then, and recently ran out. I PRAY that this comes back next year!!!

author: Bigbird
title: No pretzel!
text: No pretzel swirl in some of them! So disappointing! I feel you owe me my money back for lying to me.

author: kyla
title: The best flavor
text: I have a lot of favorite ice cream flavors but this is the best one, by far. I am OBSESSED with it, and they stopped stocking it at my local stores as well as the big box stores in my town about a year ago. I'm super sad about it, and still scour the shelf every single time, hoping it'll come back. The combination of flavors in this one is just perfect, hasn't been matched.

author: RockMomma
title: The best flavor there ever was!
text: Glampfire Trail Mix is literally the best flavor of all time. I can’t think of anything better than rich chocolate ice cream with a pleasant sweetness and then BAM- salty pretzel, gooey marshmallow, and crunchy almonds. My local Target stopped carrying it during the winter months, and then there it was in the freezer section the other day....my heart almost stopped. They brought it back for the summer!! I jumped for joy like a little kid and bought a bunch of them. Never stop making this flavor. It’s life changing!

author: RRatx
title: My absolute favorite
text: I cannot believe this is not available everywhere!!!! I am a huge Ben and Jerry’s fan (like I get pints of B&Js instead of cake on my birthday).... this is my absolute favorite flavor! If I had a deep freezer I will just fill it with pints of Glampfire!

author: Mdbenandjerry
title: The pretzel swirl rocks my world
text: This flavor is so close to perfect. Only way it would be better is with more marshmallow and pretzel swirl. So GOOOOOD

author: scoops
title: Love the Pretzel Swirl But Mix-ins Few & Burried
text: This flavor has potential but needs better execution. The chocolate base is dark and goes well with the marshmallow swirl and pretzel swirl. There's some good texture with both swirls and a slight saltiness from the pretzel swirl.

author: _jquig_
title: Pretzel swirl is mind-blowing
text: This flavor is now one of my top ice cream flavors of my life. The pretzel swirl is to die for, and the marshmallow swirl and almond chunks are a great addition. but really, that pretzel swirl is life. I hope it gets incorporated into more flavors! (In fact, a peanut butter world flavor with pretzel swirls might the best ice cream flavor I can imagine).

author: Stormy9679
title: Absolutely amazing!
text: If you’re a chocolate lover and enjoy the regular s’mores flavor you love this one! I knew when I read the ingredients that I’d love it. From the very first bite to the last, it’s a flavor that I’ll never forget. It’s the perfect blend of chocolaty sweet and a hint of salty that will send your taste buds on a journey

author: Carmella
title: Best Flavor Ever
text: I got this at Target and it was so amazing. I love ice cream and eat lots of it, and have tried many Ben and Jerry flavors. This was the best ice cream I ever had and my brother in-law agreed. Alas, I can't find it now and am heart broken. The lack of this flavor is driving me to try and make my own.

author: Cawthorn
title: Better than before
text:
I’ve been waiting for Ben and Jerry’s to bring back my favorite flavor. It was chocolate ice cream with marshmallow and Graham cracker swirls.
This flavor is even better. It has the rich chocolate ice cream. The gooey marshmallow swirls. Slightly salty pretzel swirl and crunchy almonds. Perfection.

author: Icecreamfan4life
title: Not Glamping Girl
text: I bought this flavor from my local Target last week along with a couple of other flavors. Figuring that, since I've come across a couple really good chocolate ice creams lately, I can't go wrong, right? Most especially with this being a B&J's flavor. But unfortunately, I have to say that this one missed the mark for me. :( I mean don't get me wrong, I had all the mix-in's, in the right amounts. But personally speaking, I felt like this was kind of another visit to salt lick city round two(first trip was via the Salted Caramel core flavor a while back), when I hit that pretzel swirl. I mean if I didn't eat straight from the middle where the marshmallow was and some of the not so salted part of the pretzels bits were or strictly the base that was on the outside of the swirl. I was just totally bombarded with a bunch of salt from the main part of the pretzel swirl. And it was soooo not good. Add to that, I am not quite sure what kind of fudge was made or bought to coat the almonds. But I beg of you B&J's, please find a way to tweak the recipe, some how. As I thought eating a couple of those would offset the salty flavor as well. But nope, the taste of that particular fudge just was not very appetizing to me. I'd recommend the fudge that is used to make the fish in Phish Food. But definitely not this new recipe. Sorry.

author: Robyntheriveter
title: Crying joyful tears
text: Never have I ever left an Ice cream review and that stops here. Pretzels and ice cram go together like Freddie and Queen. I’ve been longing for a day where pretzels have made it into these precious pints and I will feel personally attacked if this flavor ever vanishes. Nice work B&J, prouda you.

author: Chicksluvrock
title: Addicting
text: This is definitely my new favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor. The pretzel swirl has that perfect saltiness that is so addictive and pairs well with the chocolate ice cream. The fudge almonds add a nice crunch and the marshmallow brings it up a notch. Great job on this flavor! Love it very much!

author: QueenofEverything
title: Wow.
text: This is exactly what I was expecting! The chocolate isn't too overpowering or overly chocolatey and the pretzel swirl gives just the right amount of pretzel flavor with a hint of saltiness. The marshmallow swirl adds a nice touch. Definitely my new favorite. I hope this one never goes away!

author: lionslover33
title: Too Salty
text: Tried this flavor last week, was very excited for the combination but found it to be WAY too salty. I threw the carton out after a few bites. Very disappointed, could have been a great flavor. Spend your money on their better flavors, Phish food, Cheesecake, Half Baked, etc.

author: Nursikins
title: Omg! Yes!!!
text: This is my favorite flavor right now. The chocolate ice cream is reminiscent of what I remember having as a kid, the pretzel swirl is just the right amount of salty with the chocolate and the surprise swirl of marshmallow round toss pint out to make the perfect bite.

author: nearlyvegan
title: Target employee that set this up deserves a raise
text: Favorite flavor ever. I make special trips past my grocery store to Target for this flavor, with a backpack full of frozen packs, then run home as fast as I can so it's still frozen... because it never even sees my freezer before the empty container finds the trash.

author: heidi19
title: Move over Phish Food - this is my new flavor!
text: I LOVE this flavor. I'm nervous about it being an only summer time flavor so whenever I see it at Target it have to stock up! I hope this flavor stays in their normal rotation! When you get the pretzel swirls it is a great surprise with the chocolate. Sooooo good!

author: KW30
title: AH-MAZING!!!!!
text: I love, love, love this ice cream flavor and can't get enough of it!!!! Thank you, B&Js for coming up with this one!!! I now have my dad hooked on it, so I'm responsible for bringing it to him when I can find it. It truly makes my day eating this ice cream!

author: Katie04
title: NEED IN EVERY STORE!!
text: I wish this wasn’t only in target... I have to drive to two sometimes three different targets to find it in stock. Hands down best ever. I wish there was more salted pretzel swirl because that’s my favorite part. B&J’s please sell this at other stores too!!

author: glampfirefan
title: Like classic Rocky Road...only better!!
text: This was the best impulse buy of my life. I’ve discovered my new favorite B&J’s flavor!! But I can only find it at Target, and the “exclusive” packaging makes me fearful that it’s gonna go away...say it isn’t so!

author: Yomart
title: The best flavor yet!!!!
text: I know this is only at Target, and I’m reeeeeeeeally hoping it’s not just temporary flavor! I need this to be available everywhere, all the time!!! Seriously obsessed with this flavor. Please don’t let it go away! My favorite since “The Gob Father!”

author: Janine T
title: My New Go-To
text: I absolutely love this flavor! The only thing I don't like is that its an exclusive flavor. It's the perfect mix of salty and sweet while the marshmallow adds an extra creamy texture. Really hope I'm buying enough to turn this to a regular flavor...

author: khcruise
title: My favorite!
text: Discovered this one a couple months ago. I absolutely love it. Right amount of ingredients. So many other flavors just have way to many things crammed in there and I can't stand the core options. Please make this one permanent, pretty please!

author: CatB
title: SOOO DELICIOUS!!
text: This ice cream would be in my top 5 favorite flavors. My number one is phish food and this tastes veryyy similar but in an original creative way! And it’s such a unique flavor. My only complaint is that it’s not available in all grocery chains!

author: melanieMichele
title: Absolutely amazing
text: I absolutely love the pretzel swirl and chocolate covered almonds in the rich chocolate ice cream with a marshmallow swirl. The only thing I would change is I wish the chocolate covered almonds were larger!

author: mstearns13
title: Favorite flavor of ice cream EVER
text: I bought this because I love chocolate covered pretzels, but the mix of pretzels, almonds, and marshmallow is absolutely unreal. It was as if this flavor was custom tailored to my taste buds.

author: Lara
title: Perfection
text: I have bought a pint of this every time I’ve been to the store in the last couple of weeks. Last time I went they were sold out and I died a little inside. Please keep this amazing flavor.

author: Bearsie
title: My New Fav!!
text: I’m always trying to find the perfect balance between sweet and salty- and this is it!! The pretzel swirl is so delicious! I always buy multiple pints when I see this in the store.

author: Stephaniern7
title: PLEASE MAKE THIS PERMANENT!
text: This ice cream is amazing- from the salty crunchy pretzel swirls to the gooey marshmallow to the surprises of fudge almonds. Please look at the reviews and make this permanent!

author: Mam766
title: The best ice cream ever
text: This is literally the perfect mixture of sweet and salty. I would do anything for this ice cream and i can only find it at target. My absolute all time favorite, i am in love.

author: Kitkatlin
title: Like phish food but BETTER
text: I LOVE this new ice cream. The almonds add crunch and the pretzels are surprisingly delicious and compliment the rest of this perfectly salty sweet treat.

author: MaryElizabeth
title: Amazing - in top 3 of all time for your flavors!
text: In love with this flavor. One of the best you've produced - please keep it around and offer more outlets for it in South Dartmouth MA!

author: Maryisabelle_
title: My FAVE B&J flavor!!
text: Hands down best flavor out there, every bit of this complements each other, just fabulous!! It’s a must have, PLEASE keep it coming!!

author: Krab06
title: New Obsession
text: I absolutely LOVE this ice cream! It’s an obsession at this point. Would love to see more of it in the stores. Yummy deliciousness!!!

author: BoydLake17
title: So Happy!
text: ChubbyHubby is very rare up here in northern Maine. My go to is usually Phish food. I have FINALLY found the best of both worlds!

author: mike66
title: Great Taste For to eat
text: A perfect balance of both sweet and salty as well as a perfect concentration of almonds throughout to give it a nice crunch.

author: FLIceCreamMan
title: Among my new favorites
text: This is a great mix of savory and sweet and the ice cream is very smooth. It's quickly become one of my favorites.

author: Gabe
title: Target states it's no longer available
text:
On Targets website it's "no longer available".
That's a bummer going to miss my favorite B&J ice cream.

author: Elee
title: OMG!
text: My absolute favorite B&J flavor. Perfect combo of salty and sweet. I hope they never discontinue it.

author: Caspian
title: One of my favorite flavors
text: Nice mix of texture and flavors. All the ingredients stand out without overpowering each other.

author: CTINA
title: 5 STARS!!
text: By far my favorite ice cream!!!! Hate that it is an exclusive flavor, don't want to see it go!

author: Mandyanne
title: Perhaps my favorite B&J flavor
text: The salty sweet crunch to creamy ratios are so perfect here. I am sad this is limited edition.

author: Stephl
title: Amazing!
text: This flavor is my new favorite and I am super picky when it comes to ice cream!

author: Su123
title: I LOVE IT!!
text: I just tried it last night and I’m on my 3rd rub! Please keep in the market!

author: Joelle
title: New Fave?
text: This unseated my long-mourned, lost favorite, Late Night Snack. Excellent.

author: LindsKOP
title: Best I’ve ever had
text: This is the best flavor of B&J that I have EVER had! I need more!!!

author: ericg87
title: Amazing!
text: This is your best yet! The perfect mix of sweet and salty :)

author: sskk0825
title: Life Changer
text: The. Best. Ever. Unreal tasty goodness in your mouth.

author: blueman
title: Quality has gone downhill -- cannot recommend
text: I've been eating and basking in this flavor for as long as it's been around, but it's now awful. As pointed out by another, the cookie dough is like a stale malt ball now, and the brownie also sees degraded. But the cookie dough is horrible now. I thought this was a fluke, but I see it's happened to others and to me for the last month or so with multiple purchases.

author: Moxie
title: My Go-To Comfort Ice Cream
text: This flavor is amazing. Its everything you didn't even know you wanted all in one. Vanilla AND chocolate ice cream, chocolate chip cookie dough AND brownies. I can't drop my craving. Plus you get A LOT of the cookie dough and brownie, and I mean A LOT.

author: Derecia
title: No brownie in my half baked pint ☹️
text: I bought me a pint of Ben and jerrys half baked last night at QT reading the description excited to try it mainly because of the brownie chunks but there wasn't any brownie it was mostly just chocolate and vanilla ice cream with hard balls of cookie dough. And I paid 6.99$ bummer

author: Melody32
title: Sadly the reports are true
text: I bought this ice cream because I was having a huge craving and I found that sadly the negative reports are all true. The brownie was a crusty and dried out consistency and the cookie dough was quite dry and chalky. I am still a fan of Ben and Jerry’s (I used to work there and I also appreciate their sincere care for humans and the environment) and I hope this flavor does get fixed because it’s a complete mess right now.

author: will21
title: Just not the same...
text:
I really tend to stay away from sweet stuff but once i tried this flavor of ice cream on an impulse buy, i've been hooked since. This has been my go-to snack for 2 years and its constantly stocked in my freezer. Unfortunately over the past couple of months i've noticed a degrade in the brownies. What was once a gooey,chewy delight, is now an odd,kind of crunchy (not in a good way), cake that crumbles in your mouth like a bad cookie.
About 3 out of every 4 pints i buy come like this and its grown to be a bugger. I know it may have alot to do with the shipment process, but this was not a problem before and i cant imagine the amount of first time tryers they are shooing away due to this error. This is my favorite ice cream and i hope this issue gets resolved.

author: IceCreamBobby
title: THE CASE OF "THE MISSING GOBS"
text:
Just sat down to enjoy a pint! I dug right in , and noticed no gobs of anything!
Half way through and still.... nothing.. just vanilla and chocolate .. oh wait... 1 piece of brownie.. :((
The vanilla and chocolate was as good as ever! But misssing the gobs of goodness !! I am thinking... maybe I got the special pint??? :))
I am a regular..sometimes daily! Pint eater.. so it won't slow me down.. I am guessing, better luck next time!? Hope so!
Here is the upc # 76840 10132 just in case inquiring minds would like to know!?
Bottom of container # is 84141103 maybe that will help get to the bottom of
" the missing gobs"
BTW... my favorite of all time was the penut Carmel cluster that was out,
I believe Last summer! Any chance of it making its was back on the shelf?

author: icecreamcannon
title: What happened?
text: Over the last month, I’ve purchased 4 or 5 pints of this flavor, and ever single time, the cookie dough has been hard and slightly chalky, and the brownies have been dry, shapeless, and just... gross. Before they were distinct cubes of chewy, rich goodness! What happened? Is it a specific distribution center or something or did they change the formula somehow? This is my favorite flavor of Ben n Jerry’s, and honestly my favorite flavor of ice cream in general. But not the last month... Consistently disappointing is how I would sum up my experience.

author: mariaz15
text: I bought this when I was out of my fudge brownie. I normally go for that one because of the bigger chunks of brownie but this is a go to favorite, Best of Both Worlds. You get brownie and chocolate chip cookie dough and they're not small pieces so when you actually get to a piece you are in for a real treat. the brownies remind me of the corner pieces of the brownie Pan and the chocolate chip cookie dough is sweet but has that little bit of salt that you get from eating an actual cookie but then the ice cream is vanilla and chocolate. Please try to tell me I'm wrong and try it out for yourselves you will love it!

author: FuzzyGut
title: Half Baked, How I Love Thee
text: One of my favorite Ben & Jerry’s pints! I can’t not eat the entire container. The ice creams are excellent in flavor and texture and the brownie and cookie dough chunks are sublime. I actually eat this with one of my toddler’s little spoons so it lasts longer. Please never kill this flavor!

author: Sad Canadian
title: Where the dough ?
text:
I decided during our quarantine my wife and I could enjoy some half baked for a bit of indulgence and comfort. After devouring half the pint in a night we realized there was absolutely no fudge or cookie dough. Ice cream
was still good but definitely disappointed. My quarantine is even worse now :(

author: cmclaughlin
title: What happened to this product??
text: I have been buying a pint of half baked every week for at least the last 6 years. However for the last EIGHT MONTHS every pint has been a disappointment-either almost no cookie dough/brownies or when they are present they are dry, chalky, crumbly-not the gooey moist texture I had fallen in love with. Have tried from multiple stores even in different states with same results. So sad they changed formulation or something I used to look forward to this every week :( Hope they fix production issues soon

author: fatisflavor
title: OMG(oodness)
text: I wanted a treat this evening but I had no idea what I was getting into with Half Baked. So good it is dangerous. The remains of the pint are deep in my freezer now but I feel the urge to set it free. Great balance of vanilla and a superb chocolate ice cream and generous bites of brownie. The perfect way to eat brownie, too - saturated with creamy rich ice cream. And THEN there is cookie dough, too! It ALL tastes good, together and individually.

author: Ashenfox
title: Chalk, not cookie dough.
text: What happened to this flavor? During the last few months in Europe, there is no more cookie dough in this flavor. Replaced by some kind of white chalky substance that has an unpleasant texture. I threw away the first one like this, wasting 8e, when the second one was the same I ate it anyway thinking it must just be a recipe change and observed that the brownie is also compromised, like hard and stale. Now a third one is like this and I see similar comments. Something wrong here. Please fix it. How could this happen to such a flagship product without you noticing?

author: alishamhorton
text: Ben & Jerry's Half Baked Ice Cream is a treat sent from the heavens above. When I tell you I was eating this ice cream every single day....I am by no means exaggerating. You might be thinking, "Oh she was just eating a scoop here and there." NOPE. I would eat the entire pint and go to the store the next day to buy another one. This went on for MONTHS! Now, I definitely had to slow down because eating that much sugar on a regular basis was making my thighs a little thicker than I would've like but, hey, I still curl up on the couch every now and then, turn on a good movie or tv series on Netflix, and eat my go to comfort snack, Ben & Jerry's Half Baked Ice Cream. This ice cream honestly shouldn't be as good as it is. It's a sin! A yummy sin...haha!

author: Hannahsmq
title: Cookie dough is chalky and dry
text: I used to love this flavor and have been enjoying it for years. Unfortunately I had to stop buying it because every pint I have purchased over the past year has contained dry, chalky cookie dough - not the buttery, creamy dough that I grew to love. This flavor used to be so decadent. I sent a letter last year to let them know, but nothing changed after their response. I am pretty bummed that this is still an issue.

author: Jackie68
title: HALF BAKED
text: I mean look it's simple every one loves gooie cookies An gooie brownies even the batter , An yes I've tried your brownie batter core ice cream but I'll save that for another time, because half baked deserves nothing but 5 stars An an a min for some gloating of its own lol you guys are awesome keep doing what you do , p.s your impact is far beyond ice cream, it touches homes An hearts everywhere<3

author: Emily D
title: What happened to the brownie and cookie dough?!
text: I always loved Half Baked, but the last three pints I have purchased over the past few years (from various locations) have been awful. This is the second pint in a row that I have thrown away almost full. I am writing this review because I think the company needs to look into this. The brownie and cookie dough chunks almost feel like some sort of low-cal, diet substitutes of their former selves. They are chalky, dry, and difficult to eat. The ice cream is still good, but overall the experience is pretty terrible. I have to give up on this flavor. It's not worth the calories anymore!

author: happybarry
title: If you want happy, this is it
text: The delicious, fat chunks of brownies with such rich (but not too heavy, as it should) chocolate ice cream pair oh so perfectly with the decadent vanilla and old school cookie dough! 10/10 everytime, my go to.

author: amandag1
text: Ben & Jerrys Half Baked has been my go- to B&J flavor for a decade now... its delicious! It has all my faves in one- chocolate & vanilla ice creams with chunks of cookie dough & gooey brownie bits. Heaven!

author: Dane91
title: Not the same
text:
i would regularly purchase Half baked ahead of other pints. it is a close tie for favorite.
However the past 2 months i've noticed the cookie dough seems flavorless and powdery while the brownies that once had a glorious chew feel more like cookies.
it's a shame this has happened i think this flavors headed for the grave.

author: Mmhale08
title: Hopefully just a bad batch...
text: Half baked has always been my favorite Ben & Jerrys. After not having it for a year, I saw it at my local store and bought 2 pints! Then to my disappointment, I found both the brownie and cookie dough to be dry. Usually the chewy fudge brownie is the best part! Not a crumbling dry mess. I hope this was just a bad batch...

author: edb18
title: cement brick
text:
I tried this flavor for the first time and it's terrible. There are absolutely no brownie chunks and the cookie dough chunks that are in there taste like nothing. They are hard and dry. The whole pint looks and feels like dried cement. My pint had been out of the fridge for more than half an hour now and it's still as hard as stone. I can barely scoop out any icecream. The texture doesn't even resemble ice cream. I don't even now how to describe it, but I'll never buy this again. Waste of money.
Never had any of these problems with other flavors.

title: No cookie dough!
text: I love half baked, like love love it. But I have a pint that is totally missing cookie dough!

author: andybean
title: No Cookie Dough?
text: I bought a pint of half baked after years of it being absent in my life. I expected a cookie and brownie bonanza, but my ice cream had NO COOKIE DOUGH and only TWO BROWNIE CHUNKS. I am severely disappointed and don't think I'll ever get it again. Shame because this used to be my favorite flavor.

author: DrumsMcaw
title: Steady decline
text: Like other have mentioned, the quality of this particular flavor definitely seems to have gone down hill. Use to be my go to flavor but now I find myself avoiding it more often than not.

author: karissat1
text: Most amazing flavor ever. It has the perfect blend of chocolate and vanilla ice cream with cookie dough and fudge brownie chunks. Highly recommend

author: Gamndalf the white
title: hard, crusty cookie dough and brownies
text: this is the third time I have gotten this flavor and the brownies and cookie dough were dry and really hard and crusty! inconsistent with this flavor becuase some pints its ok and really good, but its not consistant with quality

author: annnaa
text: This is hands down my favorite ice cream on the planet. I guess I'm fortunate that I almost never find it in stores, because i can't see it without buying it. A lot of people have complained about the change from Chocolate covered peanutbutter FILLED pretzels to chocolate covered peanutbutter pretzels (it is my understanding that this was due to the original pretzels no longer being available to B&J's). While I do thing that the original was better in principal, I found that I frequently got pints where the pretzels were soggy and disappointing. I have never had that happen with the new recipe. The new pretzels are always crunch and a little bit saltier, which I actually prefer; I need the salt to balance the fudge and vanilla malt. Still the best!

author: Half Baked Lover
title: Best Ice Cream in the World but slight problem
text: Been eating Half Baked for years!!!!! I absolutely love it. Buy a pint every week. Since moving to Texas from Pennsylvania in 2017, I noticed the cookie dough changed and became chalky. Not sure why in Texas it changed. It's become luck of the draw, sometimes it's good and sometimes I get a bad batch. Lately it's gotten better. Praying it stays that way.

author: HalfBakedLover
title: Quality isn't what it once was
text: I would buy Half Baked at least once every two weeks and I generally stock up whenever it goes on sale since this is my favorite flavor. In the past year, I have noticed that the cookie dough has been very chalky and not at all chewy like it once was. Additionally, the brownie bites are no longer chewy and distinguishable, instead they just disappear with the chocolate ice cream. I attributed this to the fact that I stocked up on this particular ice cream however even with more recent purchases I have noticed that cookie dough and brownie bites are no longer the same texture and quantity as they used to be. This is my favorite ice cream so I hope they are able to pinpoint what exactly is going on with the recipe since they have said they have not changed it.

title: Absolutely awful
text: I bought a container of Ben and Jerry's expecting an awesome snack after a long day of work. I opened the plastic lid and scooped out maybe 1 cup. Not one fudge "gob" or chocolate cookie dough piece. So I came back the next day and had the rest. No fudge or cookie dough. It was just super disappointing and wrong that I spent $7.00 for a pint of ice cream that was mediocre chocolate and vanilla... Won't EVER be buying this again. Encourage everyone don't waste your money.

author: TheStateOfWisconsin
title: The #1.
text: Ten thousand years ago, a zebra and a pig bred, and the result was a cow. Immediately, humans realized the majesty, the pure tears of God that streamed from the cow's udders. This ice cream is the product of those ten thousand years of experimentation. Benjamin and Jerry have perfected conquered the world of dairy by creating the perfect ice cream: Half Baked. Never again will humanity ever reach this level of perfection in the dairy industry, nay, in anything. All hail the ice cream gods; and all hail their sublime creation.

author: KatB
title: One of the best!
text: I hope this never gets cut, because this flavor is so yummy! It's definitely a basic flavor, but it's incredibly well-executed. The base ice creams are rich and delicious, and the mix-ins are HUGE! The brownies are rich with gooey, and the cookie dough pieces are spot on. Must buy!

author: Grover15
title: Never gets old!
text: Half baked has always been my go to flavor. Although I have ventured out and found other flavors I love, Half Baked is always the one I eventually go back to. I can’t get enough of the wonderful chunks of brownies and cookie dough! Yum yum yum!!!

author: romitta
text: Ben & Jerrys is a brand that represents society. This brand takes societal problems and they are able to illuminate it through its products and advertisement. Honestly, because Ben & Jerrys is a proactive brand that cares about the worth of human beings ,especially those of color. So, I have invested into their ice cream. This is a flavorful non-dairy ice cream and I love the ingredients. Every bite you a taste a new flavor and sometimes you can get pieces of cookies and cakes in your ice cream.

author: rachelw
title: Dried Up but otherwise great taste!!!
text: I love the taste of the ice creme mixed with brownie and cookie dough, and this is the perfect mix!! Unfortunately, the brownie and especially the cookie dough was extremely dry and crumbly.. hoping I just had a weird batch.

author: Craftymomx5
title: Tastes like a freezer burnt mess
text: I recently bought this for the first time. As I sat down in a quiet house with a spoon and high hopes of enjoying this (all to myself) treat. Unfortunately the pleasure lasted about as long as the quiet did. The brownies which I envisioned at delicious rich chewy chocolate were more like gritty freezer burnt chunks and the cookie dough was dry and crumbly. This one won't go back in its hiding place behind the frozen veggies but front and center so someone else can easily find and eat it.

author: Markgopro
title: Favorite flavor
text: Huge fan. Only flavor ice cream I eat. Unfortunately, noticing "the gobs" aren't quite there like they used to be. I might switch to the chocolate fudge brownie quart

author: scanangjelly
title: I ATE 3 PINTS OF THIS IN 3 DAYS!!!
text: I would give it 6 stars if I could, thank you, Ben and Jerry's, you are a blessing in my life. I don't know how I could survive school without half-baked.

author: InezA7
title: The Best Ice Cream!
text: Big lover of ice cream, Half Baked definitely is the best! Amazing tatste, so obsessed!

author: IrishRider70
title: LOVE Half Baked
text: Love this ice cream! Seriously have 2-3 pints in my fridge at any given time! YUM!!

author: Joey213
title: Amazing!
text: One of the best flavors that exists!!! Totally recommended!

author: bluesky089
title: Best flavor ever!!!
text: This is my all time favorite flavor! I love it so much!!!

author: Halfbakedluvr
title: Holy shoot
text: So f*cking good plz bless yourself and buy it plzz

author: halfbak3dlov3r
title: Horribly disappointing
text: I've been buying this flavor for years now but for the last year or so, every single pint I buy is filled with hard, chalky cookie dough, and dry, shapeless, flavorless brownies. I would really like to keep supporting ben & jerry's but when the quality has been this consistently awful, it's difficult to. What is the problem? I buy it in New York City, is there some nonsense going on in a distribution center that delivers to my area?? It's so frustrating!

author: kayf27
text: Its been a while since Ive had this but I know it tastes very good. Rich in flavor. One thing about this brand, if the product states that it has a certain thing in it (e.g., fudge, cheesecake, cookie dough), just know that you will get nice chunks of these ingredients in every bite. This is what sets Ben & Jerrys ice cream flavors apart from the other brands. They are very consistent with their products. Would definitely recommend any of their flavors.

author: Ashli
title: So sad
text:
What has happened to this ice cream :(
It used to be my favorite flavor, now I'm too scared to buy it again. There were no brownie chunks and the cookie dough was weird and crumbly. I AM DEVISTATED! Why is this happening!

author: pillow4435
title: No Chunks:(
text: I adore Ben & Jerry's and Half Baked is one of my all time favorite flavors, and my go-to comfort ice-cream. After a bad week I went a grabbed one from my local store and was so disappointed when the cookie dough and brownie bits were only a few at the top! 3/4 of the pint was just ice-cream without the yummy chunks! I was so sad:(

author: allyrbc82
text: I am not one to gravitate towards ice cream but while on a recent vacation my sister had this so I decided to give it a try. Man I have been missing out for years now! I have bought one every week since returning from vacation. I make sure to fit some every couple of days in my macros for a treat. This will forever be my favorite flavor. It has tons of brownie bites and cookie dough bites and the perfect amount of chocolate and vanilla. LOVE!

author: Cookie Dough Lover
title: MY FAVOURITE ICE CREAM EVER!
text: I don't usually write reviews, but I had to for this one! I'm so glad I heard about Ben and Jerrys ice cream because I've been obsessed ever since I first tried it!! Literally the only ice cream I buy now! Half Baked is my favourite flavour, because I love cookie dough, chocolate, vanilla, and brownies of course haha basically everything about it! I can finish the whole pint in one seating lol. Seriously, I absolutely love it! It's so good! I can taste the fresh ingredients in every bite! And I love how the mixture of textures complement each other so well. Though the mixture of flavours, it's still light and creamy. I can eat it as a snack while I'm watching my favourite show or even for breakfast, lunch, or dinner haha! I honestly lost count of how many pints I've bought since the first time I tried it. I would definitely recommend it to everyone!!

author: cassandrajgollner
text: I love the smooth and delicious taste of the Ben & Jerry's Half Baked Ice Cream . The fudge brownie chunks, are CHUNKS! The cookie dough are grape size balls! I do notice some inconsistencies from batch to batch on how much of the fudge brownie and cookie dough bits you get. Imy spouse and I can not share a tub, and always have at least one pint each in the fridge. I reccomend anyone to try this product. Always satisfied!!

author: samsmakeupaddiction
text: Can you believe that up until a few weeks ago I had NEVER tried Ben & Jerrys before?! Half baked was the first B&Js that tried, and I immediately fell in love. Its sooo creamy, so tasty, smooth and rich. The chunks of chocolate and cookie dough are in every bite, which is fantastic! I cant believe Ive been missing out so much.. I have since tried several other flavours and love them all; but this is my # 1. Im hooked.

author: Mlle2002
title: Freezer burnt! Unfortunate!
text: I bought a pint of half baked and two pints of chunky money and they were all freezer burned when I opened them right after purchase. I was going to eat this with my family who is going to come over in a few days but now I can’t even eat it myself because of the awful freezer burn. There was also a severe lack of cookie dough and the brownie was stale. Very unfortunate and now I am scared to buy any more pints.

This is my favorite ice cream brand. The chunks of all of the cookie dough are really big so you get the brownie or cookie dough in every bite. The ice cream itself is super creamy and delicious. I love the pint size because it can usually give you 3-4 servings depending on how much you eat at a time. I highly recommend everyone try and flavor of Ben and Jerry’s! The names of the ice cream are also very clever.

author: jennyw50
text: This has been my go-to ice cream for YEARS! In high school my best friend and I would always share a pint over our Friday night TV binging. Years later I continue to have it and each time remember whythe fudge brownies are so rich melt in your mouth, the chocolate and vanilla ice cream are a perfect blend of not being too rich or too sweet. No other B&J has topped this as my favorite ice cream yet! Keep trying!

author: ladyslim37
text: Oh yum this ice cream is so full of stuff ,and is so good .it's creamy ,and full of surprise's with every bite .It is a little pricey for ice -cream ,but come on it's Ben& Jerry's so you know it's worth it .Unless you never had it then you should try it your missing out PLUS you love the single container .I love to share ,but some things you want all to yourself .What are you waiting for Treat yourself today.

author: kayh
text: An instant classic for break ups, girls' nights, and sneaking bites out of the container in front of the fridge at midnight while your spouse is asleep. Perfect amount of chocolate and vanilla ice cream, just the right amount of cookie dough and brownie. Ben & Jerry's is definitely a tad over priced, but thank god for that otherwise I would eat this more often than any nutritionist would recommend.

author: ilene
title: not so great
text: I bought this today for the first time. I've sampled it several times today and am eating it now. I won't buy this again. It's heavy and has a grainy texture with cookie dough and the fudge pieces are toohard. It's too much gook. My favorite ice cream is Cherry Garcia. It's light and has chocolate flakes and cherries and is perfect in every way. Cherry Garcia should be the No. 1 ice cream.

author: avashwal
text: I love Ben & Jerrys!!! They are definitely my favorite ice cream brand. Half baked is my go to flavor because there is so much going on. The only dislike I have that it is a little pricey for only a 16oz jar, but trust me its worth it! I just wish they made bigger tubs of it. But it is absolutely amazing!!!! Definitely recommend either Half Baked, Phish Food, or the Brownie Batter Core! :)

author: tinam3
text: I love Ben and Jerrys ice cream! Its so rich and smooth a full cream ice cream that is indulgent and delightful. I love half baked! The chocolate is Devine the vanilla is perfect! Its sweet and not at all boring or bland. The good brownie pieces are perfect and can there be anything better than cookie dough ? The problem with this is you cant have it very often or your pants wont fit.

author: gastropunk
title: Layers & Textures.
text: This is some of the best pints I've ever had from B&J. Incredibly, the textures of the vanilla and chocolate ice cream mixed with the brownie and the cookie dough are just amazing. Brownie is the mid-way between the softness of the ice cream and the crunchy sugar on the cookie dough and that makes basically everyone happy. From the rotating portfolio, this is by far my best flavour.

author: Sunfireklf
title: Dangerously Delicious
text: I bought a pint of the Half Baked for the first time, about a month ago and I loved it! The texture of the icecream is smooth and the yummy brownie and cookie dough gobs give great substance to the mix. I haven't forgotten about Half Baked since that first round and just finished another this evening. I thought to myself, I could of eaten two of these pints! Dangerously Delicious :)

author: Rosed
title: Where's the dough?
text: This has always been my favourite flavour, but the last few pints I've purchased had been found to be lacking. After the first spoonful the rest of the pint had very few chunks in it. I would say about 5 or 6 small chunks of dough. A flavour that has the word dough in its name should live up to that. The last few times it hasn't, looking forward to seeing this improve in the future.

author: cristinab5
text: This is my go to when I need a hug in the form of food. I can finish the whole pint in one sitting because I love the flavors and textures so much, so I have to check myself and put it away. Its definitely for chocolate lovers so if thats not your thing, youll probably think its too much chocolate. Its on the pricier side for ice cream, but its totally worth it. So rich and creamy!

author: trailheaders
text: Oh yeah, I remember where I was the first time I tried Half Baked Ice Cream by Ben & Jerry's. Chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream wasn't necessarily a "new" thing, although it was still fairly novel and B&J was doing it great. The only thing that could have made it better was mixing it with brownie chunks and more chocolate. There's no other company that beats this flavor combo.

author: lilym96
text: Half baked is one of my top 3 Ben and Jerrys flavors!! The toppings are so good and the flavors work so well together. Also, the founders of this company are so woke. They were recently arrested at protests for the black lives matter movement. They stick up for whats right and they share their beliefs. I love Ben and Jerrys and if you havent checked them out you totally should!

author: jacquelinebca86
text: This is my (and my fiances) go to ice cream pint! It has the perfect blend of chocolate brownie pieces and perfect size and amount of gobs of cookie dough. Kind of pricey since you can get a half gallon for about the same price (about $4 in my area, $3 on a sale) but I love ice cream and its better for me to eat a pint in a day versus a half gallon. Also, always a great flavor.

author: liz112
title: absolutely delicious !
text: This was my first time buying a pint of Ben & Jerry's and I'm so glad I chose Half Baked! The cookie dough and brownie chunks were super good and the ice cream was nice and creamy. The only downside was that it was hard to scoop the ice cream because the brownie chunks were really hardened. Overall, it was amazing, but I'll have to stop myself from eating the whole pint!

author: hillaryr2
text: Half Baked by Ben & Jerry's is my ULTIMATE favourite! It's one of those flavours flavours that if you haven't tried it yet, you simply havent lived. Once you do try it, it will be your go-to choice of Ben & Jerry's too! A delicious blend of creamy vanilla ice cream, with fudge brownies (my favourite part) and gobs of chocolate chip cookie dough. Would highly recommend!

author: KayforIceCream
title: Half baked addict!
text: This is one of my all-time favorite flavors. There's something about the combination of cookie dough and brownie bites that's just delish! My only worry? I have noticed that the ice cream to brownie/cookie dough has changed. I know find fewer dough/brownie bites in each pint. Hoping that they'll readjust that soon, or even better yet come out with a "packed" version.

author: richardsara
text: This is my go to flavor whenever I have extra money to splurge on ice cream for myself. I love the bites of cookie dough and then you have the bites of fudge brownie. Oh my gosh, it is just so good!!!!! If you like cookie dough and brownies YOU HAVE TO TRY this out NOW!!!!! Mmmmmmm.....no review will be enough to make you understand how good this one is.

author: Vicky1234
title: No cookie dough!
text: There was no cookie dough, the quality has really gone down hill. I used to love this flavor, now i am disappointed in the product.

author: caitieh2
text: whenever i get sad/or i work my butt off i treat myself to this. i could honestly eat the whole pint in one sitting. its technically b&js number one selling ice cream for the past few years!! the chocolate and vanilla ice cream/ cookie dough and brownie bits all have a perfect ratio. if you dont want all the calories, they offer it in a froyo version too :)

Oh my my my!! I LOVEEEE Ben & Jerrys Half Baked ice cream. I have on occasion ate a whole pint of this by myself. When Im craving something more than a simple flavored ice cream this is my first choice hands down. After a long day at work, nothing is better than a pint of good old Ben and Jerrys Half Baked, eating it with a spoon out of the carton in bed.

author: dhara9435
text: This is definitely one of my ALL TIME fav ice creams. I literally always have atleast a pint of it in my freezer for bad days and my bf knows when it finishes to replace it because it's just what gets me through bad days. It's all things delicious in 1 ice icream. It's got fudge Brownie and it's got cookie dough... I mean really what more do you need?

author: beautyinbeer
text: I love this ice cream. I just wish I could eat more of it for less calories, but who doesn't wish that about ice cream? I've used it to make my own popsicles by slicing it horizontally with a good knife, popping off the carton, putting a popsicle stick in it then dipping it in melted chocolate and refreezing. Helps me control how much I eat.

author: alsull1s
text: My love for ice cream is deep and this flavor is seriously perfection. It has everything you want in an ice cream. I think I buy this every week its so good. It has the perfect amount of vanilla to chocolate ice cream with GOBS of cookie dough and brownie bites. The brownie is the most amazing part. I love you #ben&jerrys for making this!!!

author: kendalina
text: This is one of my all time favorite ice creams. It was a staple in my freezer in college. I love the creamy texture, delicious ingredients, and reasonable cost. I also LOVE that Ben and Jerrys pay all of their employees a liveable wage, are politically active, and donate to charities. It is definitely worth the slightly higher price point.

author: zurrealcurls
text: Munchies anyone? I mean, come on, its Ben & Jerrys! Some of the best ice cream combos ever. You really cant go wrong with any of their treats. I cant say I have ever had a pint of B & J that wasnt drool-worthy! Plus, they have a great mission. *Doing a snap and this review applies to any and all goodies related to this brand of delishhhh.

author: jennifers402
text: This flavor is AMAZING! It is my absolute favorite flavor of all! Ben and Jerrys brand. It is perfectly blended and absolutely delicious. I wish the brand wasnt so expensive because I would be able to eat it more often. If they ever came out with larger sizes at a similar price, that would be the best day of my life lol, its SO worth it.

author: lexilovesmakeup
text: This is my drunk ice cream. The brownie batter, the cookie dough, ugh. Such a perfect combination and I could kiss whoever invented this. I will share this one because its a great pick me up and it doesn't make me feel the need to hoard it to myself. I want others to experience the same euphoria I feel when I get a nice glob of dough.

author: jovieb2006
text: I absolutely love this ice cream!! My all time favorite Ben and Jerrys ice cream! One of my favorite parts about this ice cream is it has chocolate and vanilla combined in it! The fudge brownie bits are so amazing as well as the chocolate chip cookie dough. 10/10 recommend getting this! [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-half-baked-16oz]

author: lbs1217
text: Reading the description of this describes my perfect ice cream flavor. But, for some reason, Ben and Jerrys doesnt do it for me. I am not the biggest fan of supermarket ice cream, I would much rather get it from a parlor. Something about it tastes artificial and I cant get past it. However, its the best flavor out of all of theirs.

author: britta5
text: This is hands down my favorite ice cream! A creamy ice cream base with delicious cookie dough and brownie bites mixed in. They are generous with the cookie dough and brownie bites too! My favorite way to eat this is to try to eat around all the added bits and save the bits (best part) for last and just eat spoonfuls of the bits.

author: brandyh20
text: This is my absolute favorite ice cream. I love Ben and Jerry's. I love everything about them. The company itself is awesome. It's so sweet and delicious, they are all good but this is by far my favorite. You can find it anywhere. It's got chunks of cookie and they have a half baked core that has more cookie dough in it's so good

Half baked is so yummy because it has all of my favorite things in it. It has chocolate and vanilla ice cream with cookie dough and brownie. It’s so yummy especially when it is at the perfect temperature, to me that’s slightly melted to make it soft and smooth. This is definitely one of my favorite flavors from Ben and Jerry’s.

author: Amelia2902
title: Incredible!!!!
text: When I buy ice cream with chunks, I'm always disappointed with how few and little the pieces are. However, this ice cream is by far the most satisfying chunk-containing ice cream I've had so far! The chunks of fudge brownie and cookie dough are the size of my spoon AND are evenly throughout the pint. So ADDICTING!!!!!

author: elyseh2
text: I love this ice cream. A perfect blend of chocolate and vanilla, brownie and cookie dough. The brownie and cookie dough are large and delicious in the ice cream. A classic Ben and Jerrys flavor that will never disappoint. And they make it in a frozen yogurt option too which is equally as delicious but fewer calories.

author: kirstenb
text: One of my all time favorite ice creams. I especially love that I can pick up a pint of Ben and Jerrys and have my own little personal ice cream potion to attack through out the week when I want a taste. Hands down love Ben and Jerrys they have my business mostly when it comes to ice cream! Great company to support!

author: autumnw40
text: SPECTACULAR! Despite the calorie count being so high (but let's be real here, its ice cream, what do you expect?) I try to buy this ice cream every few weeks. Half baked Ben and Jerry's is a million times better than their basic ice creams, and the different chunks and flavors are an absolute delight. Give it a go!

author: biancal05e3
text: Ben and Jerrys is my all time favourite ice cream because first of all it has so many flavours and this one is my fave. This one mixes cookie dough with brownies and chocolate and vanilla and I think maybe a hint of peanut butter inside and it is just so delicious I can literally eat one pot just to myself hahah.

author: jessica_ulrich
text: This is my go to treat of choice. Is is SUPER expensive though. $5 for a pint. However, it does have brownie and cookie dough pieces in it, so I get it. When I do treat myself to it, I almost always eat the whole pint in one sitting. It’s delicious, chocolatey, and the brownie pieces are so so soft. I love this.

author: Joe34
title: Good but also disappointing
