text: I bought a pint of Half Baked (my favorite flavor) and even though it said it was Half Baked, it was actually just a chocolate and vanilla mix with no cookie or brownie pieces. This is the second time this has happened to me in the past few months. Hopefully its just a production issue and not a new standard.

author: kylen19c7
text: Ben and Jerrys ice cream is known everywhere for their amazing flavor and quality. The half baked is my favorite, Im a huge fan of cookie dough and when you combine that with brownies it just does something for me. The texture is great, the ice cream flavors are incredible, and a little bit goes a long way.

author: earlsje
text: Ben and Jerry's makes amazing ice cream as I'm sure no one would disagree with. The quality is definitely there with the Half Baked flavor, too. I really enjoyed it, but I wasn't blown away like I am with some of their other flavors. Don't get me wrong, I won't turn it down, but I have many other favorites.

I love Ben & Jerrys not just for the ice cream they have a really good quality ice cream but because the mission behind their brand did you know they hire recently released criminals and they pay the $16 an hour 75% of their income goes to paying back incarcerated youth I love them for that #PrisonReform

author: jlcarson412
text: This ice cream reminds me of getting my heartbroken by the douchebag I dated in high school. I didnt let my poor taste in guys ruin my amazing taste for ice cream. Half baked is so good and its my favorite kind of store bought ice cream to eat. I would definitely recommend it for the happy and sad times!

LOOOOVE me some Ben&Jerry's ice cream!!! All flavors that I have tried so far are amasing! Very rich, full.of flavor delicious ice cream. I do wish the price was a little lower but then again you get what you pay for!!! So yesss, if you haven't tried it yet and you are an icecream lover, it is a MUST!!!

author: amryl
text: literally hands down the best tasting ice cream ever. a small one like this lasted me around 3 days, and i was so happy after coming home soaked in sweat from walking outside on hot summer day in texas, definitely would recommend this to anyone who loves brownie, and all the other ingredients listed.

The best and most rich flavor in Ben & Jerry’s flavor arsenal, Half Baked provides consumers with a mash up of two extremely popular batter flavors Cookie Dough and Brownie Batter. Blending these two amazing flavors with vanilla and chocolate ice cream provides a snaking experience unlike any other.

author: heat_duke
text: Honestly can you ever go wrong with Half Baked? It's my go-to Ben & Jerry's flavor because it never disappoints! The chocolate and vanilla mixture along with the cookie dough and brownie pieces are delicious. While this is more on the pricier side for a pint, it is always worth it when it's on sale!

author: mollythegreat
text: This is the best ice cream in the world; not only is this super tasty BUT they're literally the best company ever. These guys are the best and they're so kick butt and they stand up for all the right things and omg please buy their ice cream and support them because we need them to keep kicking butt

author: lindseym8fac
text: My number one pick for ice cream always. I am a huge fan of Ben & Jerry's flavors! There really hasn't been one flavor I've tried that I didn't like, but this is by far the absolute best. You have cookie dough, brown dough and both chocolate and vanilla ice cream! Doesn't get better than that!!

author: nickisfabfitandfun
text: Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream Half Baked - 16oz never disappoints! I've loved this flavor since high school! I was able to visit the Ben & Jerry's Museum in VT a few years ago. I love the variety of flavors and the small sizes so you don't get frost bitten ice cream. #ben&jerrys #icecream #halfbaked

author: caseyfbe0e
text: This was the best ice cream and I ate so much of it during a period of time and I wore it out. But if you love chocolate and vanilla ice cream, brownies and cookie dough. Bomb combined it all together and it's heaven!! I would def recommend this. It def hit my spot when I was pregnant. LOL

author: evztt
title: Quality has gone downhill (number 2)
text: So we’ve been buying half baked for a while and in the last months, I feel like you guys should rename it to a quarter baked. There are literally two pieces of fudge brownie and a handful of cookies in a whole pint. I used to love it but I think I might need to go find me another favorite. :(

The Half Baked ice cream is deluxe and what a treat it is when I do have it as it an expensive treat. Ben & Jerrys is expensive but the quality and taste is great. I buy it every now and then when I can find it on sale. I would give it five stars but because of the cost, Im giving it a four.

author: gerib3
text: What can I say...Ben & Jerrys is the best! And who wouldnt love courier dough and half baked brownies in ice cream?! If I could eat this everyday, you can bet I would! When I was growing up we used to go to the Ben & Jerrys store every Friday to kick off the weekend. I love their ice cream.

author: zoey
title: the best freaking flavor on earth
text: everything about it is perfect. chocolate and vanilla ice real together. there’s giant pieces of delicious cookie dough. and then there’s a HUGENESS fuge brownie at the bottom. this pint combines everything i love and i will fight for the deliciousness of this pint as if it’s my own child.

author: sumatime
text: This was a sensation with every bite! Smooth and silky flavor without an overwhelming amount of dough in it. I thought it was the perfect balance of ice cream and cookies! I always go back to this pint and will keep going back for more! I hide this from my kids to make it last longer lol!

author: ktcan03
text: There are just no words on how to describe this! It is absolutely fantasticly the best ice cream. Now, it is not my favorite flavor, but when you are in the need for some of that comfort, cry it out, girl I ain't getting out of the bed, ice cream...Half Baked is just that!! It has it all!

author: amethystl4
text: This is by far one of my favourite ice creams!Its almost impossible to find a bite without a big chunk of brownie or cookie dough. Its creamy with the perfect amount of sweetness and has ingredients you wont feel guilty about later! Dont even think twice about buying it. You will love it!

author: tayjordan97
text: My favourite ice cream by FAR! Im obsessed with this and there is always a tub to be found in my freezer. It is a little more expensive, but it is 100% warranted in my opinion, this stuff is incredible. Overall, I would recommend that you try this before thinking the price isnt worth it!

author: mamalukic
text: Ben & Jerry's half baked is probably my most favourite ice cream. I find the globs of chocolate and cookie dough are the perfect mix. I wish they would add more of them because some pints I find Lack I would still say that these are great value for your money they definitely hit the spot

author: foodiefamous
text:
This ice cream has the perfect combination
of everything you want: chocolate, vanilla, cookie dough, and brownie. This is
one of my go-tos at the Ben & Jerry's section in the freezer aisle. I love saving all the cookie
dough until the last bite! Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream Half Baked - 16oz

title: Hands-down still my favorite ice cream
text: I love the flavor and texture of the ice cream. The Bruins are soo god, dark chocolate, dense and chewy. The cookie dough is perfect; exactly the way I remember cookie dough as a kid. I just love everything about this flavor.

author: christinaxngyn
text: This has been my favorite ice cream flavor for YEARS! I love how it has huge chunks of brownie and cookie dough, and its not too chocolatey for me. I cant find any other ice cream that has the same elements as this one, which makes it super unique and will always have me crawling back!

author: lisafa5c9
text: Ive been a fan of Ben &Jerrys ice cream, half baked is def on of my favs. It has all my Favorites. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough and Chocolate Fudge Brownie. Vanilla ice cream and chocolate ice cream with chunks of cookie dough and fudge browniesit's hard to imagine a better combination.

author: Hyt1804
title: Where's the cookie dough?!?
text: My favorite flavor of ice cream is cookie dough but when I was introduced to half baked my life was forever changed. Although lately, the last three pints I've had of Half Baked have only had 3-4 pieces of cookie dough. :( what's going on? Has there been a cookie dough sequestration?

author: Claire
title: Sooooooo excited
text: I am so so so absolutely thrilled to see Ben and Jerrys in our shops now, so glad it's now available in Taiwan, especially this flavor!!! Truly love this tho I prefer mint chocolate cookie more(my childhood fave). I love you Ben and jerrys but please we need more flavors in Taiwan!!!!

This is the BEST ice cream I've ever had hands down. It is my go to... It is the perfect combination of cookie dough and don't even get me started on how Delicious the brownie chunks in this ice cream are.I was beyond satisfied in this ice cream and would 100% recommend it to anyone.

author: tinydemon101
text: This is by far one of my guiltiest pleasures. This is my bad day ice cream and my cramped up grumpy go to for an attitude lift. Perfect and generous balance of brownies and cookie dough without the salmonella! Cant go wrong, I salute you Ben, I wiggle with approvals Jerry. NEVER STOP

author: marcieo
text: Half Baked is the best of both worlds. Not only do you get cookie dough but you get brownie pieces too. I love the size of these because you cant just keep eating them. I also love that you can find these almost in every store including grocery stores and even in convenience stores.

author: miab326
text: Seriously cookie dough and chocolate fudge brownie!? Do I need to say more?? First off I feel like cookie dough on its own is amazing enough but the combination of brownie mixed in makes this ice cream flavor hands down without a doubt one of the BEST out there!!! Absolutely-YUM!!

Half baked is my go to ice cream! I love the way the flavors incorporate with each other. I love that its half chocolate and half vanilla ice cream, its the best of both worlds! Whenever Im grocery shopping and want ice cream this is what will end up in my cart. Its so delicious!

author: memberfd4b4
text: probably my favorite ice cream flavor of all time. my absolute go-to every time I go into the store and I want to grab something sweet. I have to be careful though because I do like it so much, that sometimes I'll finish the whole thing in one sitting! it's seriously;y that good!

author: amyjo
title: Love at first bite
text: One of my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavors! How can one resist the mixture of cookie dough goodness and chewy brownie chunks in ONE pint?! There's always the perfect ratio of cookie dough and brownie bites. If you have the ultimate sweet tooth, this will not leave you disappointed.

author: allisonw62954
text: Ben & Jerrys ice cream is pretty good overall, but the price is outrageous! You have to treat yourself once in a while to such a small tub of icecream. But overall the taste of almost all of the icecream flavors tastes pretty good! Especially this one when its not frost bitten.

author: shyanneg0d74
text: I thought it was so funny when I found this ice cream. My fiancs two favorite ice creams are fudge and cookie dough. One day he could decide with he wanted and I found this! The name made me laugh and he loved it. I dont recommend eating the whole pint at once lol thats too rich

author: katherinea
text: Hello heaven in the form of ice cream! Im not a big ice cream fan and bought this by mistake. My kid tried it and loved it but hes a kid so I had no expectations tbh. Finally tried it and Ive since bought too many. The brownies and the cookie dough are my favorite indulgence.

author: haleigho1
text: I am a sucker for a good cookie dough ice cream and this kind did not disappoint. It is one of my favorite Ben and jerry flavors. It has the perfect amount of cookie dough in it. It is perfect when you need a little something sweet to just eat a little bit and feel satisfied!

author: Bella
title: It is DELICIOUS
text: It is the perfect mixture of vanilla and chocolate ice cream with cookie dough and brownie! It's so good it is tied with chocolate fudge brownie flavour. Anyways its very good and I recently discovered it and wish it sold as a more frequent flavour it grocery stores I go to.

author: smileitschristie
text: YASS! This is my all time favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream! I love all the different flavors it has and the chocolatey goodness. When I'm having a crabby day or even some me-time I grab my spoon and chill with some Netflix and my night is set thanks to this buddy right here!

author: kaylab162
text: My favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor ever! I love cookie dough & combined with brownie makes it even better Chocolate is always my weakness when I'm having a sweet craving. This ice cream is perfect, I wouldn't change it one bit. I would reccomend this brand over other options!

author: YouThought
title: Not quite what I was baked for
text: I got this ice cream delivered to be from a market basket employee who I payed with my hard earned cash. Although the chocolate and vanilla tickled my fancy the cookie dough sadly fell short. I will not indulged in this until I get a written apology from both ben and jerry.

author: Mimi232
title: Classic Favorite
text: I have a few favorite ice cream and this one will definitely be a repeat along with American dream and gimme s’more’s. Those brownie chunks are ELITE. I love the swirls of vanilla and chocolate ice cream too. The cookie dough was good I really enjoyed the cookie pieces too.

author: cassandraw21
text: Mmmmmm!!! This ice cream is spectacular! It combines some of my favorite things, cookie dough, brownies, and ice cream!!! I would really love to taste the outcome if they did this flavor will all chocolate ice cream as the base. Maybe they do that? Ill have to look around!

author: deziraealexandriamit
text: This ice cream is mouth watering! It has the perfect combination of flavors. Im not a HUGE chocolate fan but I love cookie dough and mixed with chocolate and vanilla it goes well together. Its sweet but not rich. Its delicious and one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavors.

author: mrsteotonio
text: Ben and Jerry have always been there for me. They have never let me down. This is my favorite flavor and I can eat the entire pint in one sitting. I shouldnt, but I do. If I need some delicious ice cream in my life, I head to the store and find this container of happiness.

author: samsch__
text: this ice cream was immaculate it tasted so good I had all the flavor that I was looking for I would definitely definitely buy it again it was so tasty. This ice cream tasted like the cookie dough when youre making homemade cookies plus chocolate ice cream and brownie bits

author: ayeeholla
text: Ben & Jerrys is the best ice cream on the market. Its very flavorful and has equal amounts of ice cream to chucks of cookie. Also this brand advocates for BLM, abolishing ICE and anti-racism so everyone should support them. Making a difference while eating bomb ice cream.

author: MEOW123
title: THE MOST WONDERFUL EXPLOSION OF GOODNESS
text: I HAVE BEEN FAITHFUL TO HALFBAKED SINCE THE LONGEST TIME. THIS HAS GOT TO BE THE BEST ICECREAM I HAVE EVER HAD IN MY WHOLE LIFE AND IM 22 WHICH MEANS IVE HAD MANY YEARS OF ICECREAM EXPERIENCES. PLS SPONSER ME AND SEND ME ICECREAMS EVERY MONTH AND ILL SUPPORT U <3 <3 <3 <3

author: aikos2
text: The perfect combo! Ben & Jerry's always comes in clutch with the flavoring, and also backs the best causes behind their products. I've been eating Ben & Jerry's for years and love their fun take on names with a side of humor. Would recommend for the perfect comfort pint.

author: sambutneversammy
text: I love brownies and I love cookie dough. so this was the perfect combination for me. I bought this way too often, but it is, and Ben and Jerry's ice cream is in general, my guilty pleasure. One of my all time favorite ice creams that can be bought in most grocery stores.

author: dingbatty
text: This is my go to when Im just feeling gross. It has the perfect vanilla to chocolate ratio and the same goes for the cookie dough pieces and brownie pieces. Other ice creams that combine both usually end up with either too much off the brownie or too little of the other.

This is my favorite ice cream of all time! It has the perfect combination of ingredients! I wish it came in a huge gallon tub! Its so good every store around me is ALWAYS out. If youre looking for a new ice cream to wallow in or just a sweet treat you must try this one!

author: coolbeansdani
text: I LOVE Ben and Jerrys ice cream. Honestly every flavor is delicious but this half baked variety is everything. I love cookie dough and brownie bites in my iced cream. They are both soft and tasty. I once watched a Youtuber make cookies out of the dough and it worked !

author: effiea3
text: Yall. This is my go to ice cream. Not only do Ben and Jerry fight for freedom and basic human rights (YASSS) but they make the worlds best ice cream. I love the big chunky cookie dough and the rich brownie. The basic vanilla and chocolate ice creams cannot be matched!

author: juliad87
text: Between the cookie dough chunk and the brownie bites, this ice cream is super indulgent and extremely addictive. The ice cream is it's usual creamy and rich quality but adding in the extra flavours gives it more of a boost and more texture. This is my new favourite.

author: valerieh23
text: Cookie dough & ice cream together is a happy blend for me. This is a combination I haven't seen anywhere else. It's good as is, but adding a chocolate ribbon through it couldn't hurt. (Just sayin') If you like chocolate & are a cookie dough fan, this is worth trying.

author: SAPHORA86
title: The best of 2 fav ice creams in one
text: This is my favorite ice cream in the world i buy one pint a month and its ingredients are high quality I love the plastic seal so I know it's not been pre licked lol. I always try new flavors but this one has been my fav since I first tried it years and years ago...

author: gretchens
text: Wasn't my favorite flavor of ben & jerry's not going to lie. I would like it better with more peanut butter flavor in the ice cream. I think if they added a little more flavor to it it would honestly be a favorite of mine. I'd give it a 3/5! Honestly could be better.

author: katemariebeauty18
text: Best flavor of ben and jerrys hands down. You get both their iconic cookie doimugh and fudge brownie bits in one pint. This ice cream is def nore expensive than others but worth every penny. Try and find on sale bogo. Ben and Jerry is also socially conscious company

author: pdnimxcv
text: Id rate this 10 stars if I could. If youre a chocolate lover like me, this is literally your next go-to pint.

author: Kiki12345
title: Ice cream is good but missing something important
text: I bought this ice cream for the first time when I couldn't decide on if I wanted chocolate ice cream or vanilla. Although the ice cream was delicious and satisfied my craving...I'm now stuck craving cookie dough AND brownies lol! I guess I'll have to make it myself.

author: anamal_planet
text: This is my all time favorite ice cream!! I love the mix of vanilla and raw cookie dough with chocolate and brownie pieces. This ice cream is for the hard times, fun times, and everything in between. But especially after those sucky dates or sad breakups. Love it !!!

author: riabbby
text: when it comes to ice cream.... i do not play any games! this is the best ice cream !!! EVER! I love the mix of everything! I wish i could get bigger containers of it! i definitely think what sets it aside from others is the name and the mix of everything! SO BOMB!!!

author: kirsten
title: Where are the gobs?
text: I was so excited when I bought this, but when I opened it, I had to dig around to find the cookie and brownie gobs and was pretty disappointed with the amount :( I only got a couple pieces, but the few pieces I did get and the Icecream were as delicious as always!

author: kyleennee
text: Half baked is my fav! I love how much cookie dough and brownie hits there are, usually I eat the vanilla with cookie dough and my boyfriend eats the chocolate with brownie. Its a nice thing to sit there and share with someone. Love that it comes dairy free as well

author: adap9
text: This right here is the truth. Half baked gets 5 stars from me. This is mouthwatering and before you know it I eat the whole container. Theres nothing to compares to this. I stock up when theyre on sale at Walmart because its usually $6 so buying this is a luxury.

My absolute weakness! I'm not a even a fan of chocolate or a lot of sweets but if a pint of Ben and Jerry's is around me I eat every single bite! So delicious and I love the chunks of yummy soft sweet bites inside. I'm always satisfied with any flavor I purchase.

Half baked is one of my favorite flavors Ben & Jerrys has rolled out! It is the flavor I will pick up when Im in need of some sweet comfort food. Sometimes we need a reason to eat our feelings, right? It is delicious and sometimes I just need a reason to eat it!

author: oilpaintednerd
title: I've Been Missing Out!
text: I tried this for the first time today, and it's amazing! I'm not sure what the other reviews are talking about- I don't think the cookie dough is chalky at all, plus you get so much of it! My favorite part, though, is that it's safe for people with nut allergies!

Ben & Jerry's Half Baked Ice Cream is the best flavor! You get both chocolate and vanilla ice cream and both cookie dough and brownie chunks in one pint. If you haven't tried it, you should! The flavor is worth the price and I usually find it on sale quite often.

author: instaglambrosia
text: I have never met a Ben and Jerry's flavor I didn't like. But this one is my all time favorite. The brand is a bit more expensive, but the quality and flavor make it totally worth it. I also really like that the company gives back to the community in so many ways.

author: dakotaw3
text: One of my favorite ice creams! Its so delicious! Also Ben & Jerrys high key supports the #BLM movement. So we STAN Ben & Jerrys in this household. 10/10 recommend to anyone and everyone in literally the entire world. Go get you some Ben & Jerrys. Like. Right now.

author: naturalbabyblues
text: Wanting the best combo of many different ice cream flavor??! This is the one. It has Oreo and chocolate and cookie dough all in one its an all tile favorite for me since I saw it in stores and died to have some. Only ice cream I crave now! Best tasting as well!!

author: alil02ec
text: This is the perfect flavor when you cant decide what you want. You have chocolate and vanilla ice cream plus the added bonus of both brownie and cookie dough bites. Only thing missing is the spoon to eat it with!!!![product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-half-baked-16oz]

author: jaywallk
text: This is by far the best Ben and Jerrys ice cream Ive ever had. And I especially love the fact that the owners support the same causes that I do like BLM and the LGBTQ+ community. Thats hey Ill continue to buy their overpriced ice cream and live every bite of it.

author: brendabccc1
text: Best of both worlds! Ben & Jerry's combines chocolate chip cookie dough and brownies in a delicious ice cream. This is one of my favorites. Only thing I would add to this is chopped walnuts. A little pricier than other ice cream at this size but still worth it.

author: rolyatniltiac
text: This is my absolute favorite ice cream in the world. I always get this ice cream when I want to treat myself. The cookie and brownie pieces in this ice cream are always moist and not dried out like some other brands. Ben & Jerrys also supports important causes!

author: oharmonybaby
text: who doesnt like Ben & Jerrys? Can be a bit pricey but so worth it on occasion. They have amazing flavors and a dope presentation. This is quality ice cream. I wish they made larger sizes when cold stone or Maggie moos is closed, this is usually my next go to

author: sjm1
text: At the end of the day, there is nothing better than a cup of delicious ice cream from Ben & Jerry's. And, the flavours in the Half Baked version is a perfect end to the day. thanks Ben & Jerry's for always being so creative. Love the new Netflix & Chill.

author: megdini2015
text: Everyones favorite double date: Ben & Jerrys. I love the creamy texture of the ice cream dotted with chocolate, and then the cookie dough and brownie pieces bring in a whole new level of flavor and chewiness. This has got to be one of my go to comfort foods.

author: elliec2
text: this is my all time favourite ice cream!! It is the perfect mix of vanilla with chocolate. I usually buy it at the grocery store for around 7 dollars. It is way better than alternatives like hagen daaz. Cheaper and better tasting will definitely purchase again

author: ecapelorac
text:
Ben and Jerrys get 10/10.
They hire felons, pay living wage, donate, have been arrested when protesting for the greater good. They may be on the expensive side but when you find out all the good they do it is absolutely worth it.
This flavor is my favorite.

author: shannonp5
text: This Half Baked ice cream is my absolute favorite to treat myself! The blend of vanilla and chocolate ice cream with the cookie dough and brownie pieces is glorious! I would buy it all the time if it were more affordable and it didn't have so many calories!

author: maggiemf0c8
text: Ben and Jerrys is just so good! I love that its not just flavored ice cream it has bits and pieces of cookies,brownies,etc. they have the best flavor combos and totally different than other ice cream. I wish they came in a bigger container but still amazing

author: kristinspassionforfa
text: This is my number 1 choice when it comes to ice cream and well Im an almost everyday ice cream connoisseur.... I wish Ben and jerry would have bigger options. Can I have an entire gallon of this please! Skip food, eat ice cream yum!! Grab me a spoon please

author: mandib5c85
text: I love this classic flavor! Its extra packed with stuffing and is the perfect portion if you're trying to keep an eye out, diet-wise. Definitely makes me want some right now, especially the little sized ones! Would recommend for the classic ice cream lover!

author: leilag11
text: Ben & Jerrys is the best ice cream brand at the grocery store in my opinion. The ice cream itself is so smooth and creamy, and the flavors are so creative! This flavor specifically satisfies both my craving for cookie dough and chocolate at the same time.

author: jazzymoggy
title: Hands down my favorite flavor
text: Whenever someone asks me what flavor I want, this is my go-to and it never fails to disappoint. If you are a lover of cookie dough or brownie batter ice creams, this is a real ride or die. Yes, I am writing this review because I am craving some right now.

author: christopherh11
text: Are you ready to get high off this ice cream? Well embrace yourself because this will take your taste buds to a new dimension this ice cream is out of this world and affordable won't break the bank but will send your taste buds to overdrive of this flavor

author: carlyk19
text: This is hands-down my all-time favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor. Everyone has their go-to, and this is mine. The decadent combination of chocolate chip cookie dough and brownie batter mixed in together with a vanilla ice cream base is a treat fit for royalty.

author: juliad2
text: My favorite comfort food. Not a big ice cream person so if I eat it Im going all out. Also I love the company. The company supports causes I support so I find spending more for their ice cream is worth it because of the ethical stand point by the company.

author: kellihd6df
text: I love me some Ben & Jerrys! Especially the Half Baked ice cream! You get the best of both worlds with chocolate AND vanilla with helpings of scrumptious cookie dough and brownie chunks. Can you say YUM?! Grab a spoon and itll be gone before you know it.

author: jessicam808
text: My new favorite ice cream and I'm not even an ice cream fan! Love the chocolate and vanilla ice cream swirled together and the chunks of cookie dough and brownie pieces are huge. They definitely don't skimp on mix ins or flavor. Grab a spoon and dig in!

author: katpereira21
text: Back when I was in high school choir, my friends and I would each by one of these after a show to celebrate. The doughy goodness mixed with the cool creamy ice cream was amazing. What I love most about it is that the ice cream is never shy on the dough.

author: dominiquen4
text: My favorite ice cream. Its expensive almost five bucks for a pint. Since its a special treat its worth the price. It is the perfect combination of chocolate and vanilla ice cream. Theres big chunks of brownie and plenty of cookie dough. It is delicious!

author: eastcoastelaine
text: This ice cream is absolutely amazing, I love how delicious it is and theres the perfect mix of chocolate chunks and cookie dough in this mix. Im a huge fan of Ben and Jerrys and I would definitely recommend this to anyone whos looking for a nice treat.

author: courtneyfaith___
text: My favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor! So many dough chunks in the perfect ratio balance with the ice cream. Not too stingy, not too excessive, just right. Not only that, but Ben and Jerrys takes a steadfast stance on social issues, which I can get behind.

author: cassieann53
text: My favorite ice cream splurge. This flavor has brownie and chocolate chip cookie dough and It really doesnt get any better than that. Although It is more expensive, the company is very vocal on social injustice and for that reason I buy this ice cream!

author: macinnadeettemoon
text: This is one of my favorite flavors of ben and jerrys. It is super yummy with the chocolate ice cream and chunks of cookie dough and brownies too. Who doesnt love that? It is for sure worth the price that you end up paying for a half pint of ice cream.

author: idks
text: OMG! I LOVE this ice cream. There is so much in this ice cream, its a great combination of flavors. Everything works in this ice cream. It tastes so good, I would definitely recommend it. I would say it is expensive for a pint, but it's on sale often.

author: jackiek28
text: This is my all time favorite ice cream and go to when Im at the store. I love the mix of ice cream with the cookie dough and brownie bits and its such the perfect balance where you dont get sick or overwhelmed by any one thing. Definitely recommend.

author: awerman526
text: This is hands down the best flavor ice cream of Ben and Jerrys. Hands down. Even though they have many great floaties this half baked is SO GOOD. its creamy and has all the goodness inside. I dont eat ice cream often but when I do, this is my go to!

author: carolyns24
text: Everyone has their favorite Ben & Jerrys Ive cream. I love the size. I love the variety of flavors. I love that you can eat as much as you want and put the rest back in the freezer. No one takes your ice cream because everyone has their own flavor!

author: sbethala
text: Ben and Jerrys half baked is the best flavor in the Collection if you hate nuts. It has brownie chunks and cookie dough chunks which are mixed into chocolate and vanilla icecream. They complement each other nicely and make this flavor irresistible!

author: konkon963
title: YUM!!
text: This has to be my favorite flavor. Recently I've been getting pretty good pints with a good amount of cookie dough and brownie. Sometimes ill have some pints that will have less cookie dough or brownie but for the most part I've been happy with it!

author: taylorha8ad
text: One of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavors. I love the brownie and cookie dough pieces. The perfect amount of vanilla and chocolate. Definitely one of my go tos for at home ice cream enjoyment. Top it off with whipped cream and you are good to go!

author: natchivers
text: This flavor of ice cream is super tasty! The brownie and cookie dough are a delicious and perfect combo! It is more pricey and tasty than other brands, but worth it! I would buy this ice cream again and recommend it to anyone that loves ice cream!

author: jazmines16
text: This flavor is my absolute favorite. If you are a cookie dough lover and love brownies this is definitely the ice cream for you! The ice cream has both cookie dough and brownies in vanilla and chocolate ice cream which just has an amazing flavor.

author: yumicecream7654
title: This is my favorite flavor ever
text: I remember my grandfather would always get me this flavor when was younger and now every time I eat some I just can't help but to think back to then. This is my personal favorite ice cream flavor ever, Thanks Ben and Jerry for the great memories.

author: queenabigail30
text: This is probably the best ice cream I habe EVER had ita absolutely fantastic amazing really it leaves my taste buds feeling so happy and free so much comfort as well I think this is a great treat I will be eating it always the taste is phenomenal

author: octaviamom2020
text: The flavor is great I love how theres a mixture of like cookie dough and Oreo in it. I love the size the only problem is is its so good where a lot of the times Ill eat the whole container in one sitting thats OK I wish they had bigger containers

author: haleybd791
text: This is the best flavor of ice cream, hands down. It has the right balance of chocolate and vanilla ice cream and the brownie dough to cookie dough ratio is always perfect. I wish the pints were a little cheaper but love what the brand stands for

author: saryym
text: Loooooved these when I was pregnant with my daughter !! Omg !! So good ! My sister would always buy it for me ! Love how crunchy the chocolate chips are when you bite into those cookie dough chunks ! Very delicious! I will be buying some today !

author: mooshoobunny
text: My friend recommended this to me as its a classic fav but it was okay for me. I didnt like the too sugary pieces of the cookie dough. Im not a big fan of the cookie dough so wasnt a fan. These are pricey so I most likely wont buy this one again.

author: Emoney88
title: 1st time trying
text: Awesome! Never tried this classic until this week and it had the perfect amount of gobs and everything. Even if this ice cream melts and is refrozen - it still holds up much better than Phish food or other flavors that have lots of ingredients.

author: samp926d
text: My super sweet tooth cravings dream come true! Woo thats a mouthful! Half baked wont disappoint if you are looking for that super sweat treat to get you through your bad day, breakup, period, celebration! You name it this treats got you covered!

author: kristinh358
text: This is one of my absolute favorite Ben & Jerry's flavors. Delicious creamy ice cream with precisely the right amount of mix-ins. Like with most B&J ice cream, I have to convince myself to not consume the entire pint. Strongly recommend to all!

author: nycerke
text: One of my fav flavors ever created. I can eat this anytime, winter/summer, afternoon/evening. It has big chunks of cookie dough and brownies in it. And Ben and Jerrys always has plenty of chunks. I will@most definitely be buying this one again.

author: cathidelia292
text: This is my favorite Ben and Jerry's. It is mixed with vanilla and chocolate ice cream, with chocolate chip cookie dough, and brownie batter. It is rich, but it is fantastic. It is also expensive considering that a pint is $5, but it is worth it

author: blogqatart
text: The delicious, fat chunks of brownies with such rich (but not too heavy, as it should) chocolate ice cream pair oh so perfectly with the decadent vanilla and old school cookie dough! 10/10 everytime, my go to. If you want happy then this is it.

author: beckyyyyp
text: This is the best ice cream! It is literally the best of every world. The vanilla ice cream with cookie dough is so good and the chocolate ice cream with brownie is delicious! It is a good price and I would definitely buy it again and recommend!

author: angeliaa2
text: This ice cream was my favorite when I was a teenage, its so good!!! I guess I kinda got tired of it though because I havent had it in so long lol! But now I kinda want some, so maybe Ill pick some up soon, and take a dive down memory lane lol!!

author: carolyn_porreca
text: I am obsessed with this ice cream. It has all of my favorite things inside so it's perfect. It's like going to Coldstone but without all the hasel and a better price! The only thing I dont like is I wish it had cake batter ice cream in it too!

author: llusk
text: Ben & Jerrys Half Baked ice cream is seriously the best. This flavor combines two of my absolute favorite things brownie and cookie dough. It honestly doesnt get much better than that. This ice cream brand is a bit pricey, but its so worth it.

author: helloemmamarie
text: Ben & Jerrys has been one of my favorite ice cream bands for years. I used to get it with my grandma walking along the beach. This half baked flavor is by far one of my favorites. I love the cookie dough and the brownie pieces that are inside.

author: justicem8
text: No matter what flavor I choose Ive never gone wrong with Ben and Jerrys. One of the best ice cream brands, Ill admit its a bit pricy for its small container but its overall worth it. You wouldnt be disappointed with any flavor from this brand.

author: carrieh17
text: The best ice cream and flavour ever. If you're undecided between chocolate chip cookie dough and chocolate brownie this one is for you! I find other ice creams just don't compare to Ben and Jerry's. It is worth the extra price for the quality.

author: lovelylanzz
text: This is one of the best ice cream that Ben and Jerrys makes. I would rate this 9 out of 10. This ice cream is delectable and creamy. Theres also pieces of brownie and cookie dough inside. It tastes so amazing. I recommend getting this product!

author: leae1
text: This is by far my favorite ice cream! Its smooth and delicious and filled with cookie fought bites and my favorite part the half baked brownie bites all swirled together in creamy vanilla and chocolate ice cream. I recommend this to everyone.

author: Jlcchavez
title: Recent bad batch
text: I love this flavor but recently purchased a pint and it was terrible, can't be sure if it was my local grocery stores fault or the batch was bad. Had a very odd texture it was similar to those dehydrated ice cream squares you get for camping.

author: knkobelak
text: My weakness! I love this ice cream so much! There are so many different flavors and textures, making it a terrific, indulging dessert. Yes the perfect ice cream to eat when you’re bored and just want to sit in front of the tv and do nothing!

author: meganh4256
text: If you havent had thisyou need it. This ice cream is packed with pieces of brownie and cookies. Unlike most ice cream, there arent many bites that dont have a huge amount of brownie/cookie dough. Well worth the few additional bucks you spend

author: laurens283
text: Best ice cream ever. Gives the best of both worlds- chocolate and brownies and vanilla and cookie dough. This is my favorite ice cream, plus I love the company so much. They are so socially responsible and help with so many important issues

author: knoue
text: This is my sisters favorite ice cream! I think the flavor is very delicious and since Ben & Jerrys are known for their textures I wouldnt recommend if you dont really like textures in ice cream. Other than that this is an amazing ice cream!

author: sabrinasmash
text: One of my absolute favorite ice cream flavors! Quality ice cream with flavorful, quality add-ins. The ice cream is packed full of the cookie dough & brownie. Ben & Jerrys may be more costly than other brands, but its definitely worth it

author: linneai
text: I was chocked trying this ice cream. I had been sticking to the cookie dough flavor for years, which I still dearly enjoy, but when trying this one the cookie-dough got competition! I will definitely buy this one next time Im getting B&Js.

author: chifoodiebecs
text: This ice cream is seriously so flavorful and delicious, Im a true believer that no other ice cream brands compare to that of Ben and Jerrys because it is seriously THE BEST and the cookie dough chunks in here are HUGE and outta this world!

author: maybeamakeupaddict
text: Half baked is one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys ice cream flavors. It is a great go to for any audience or if you are in a hurry and you just want to grab one fast. I especially recommend purchasing it if you like cookie dough ice cream.

author: jackieq123
text: Sooooooo good!! Loaded with chunks of brownies and cookie dough. Great consistency and phenomenal flavor. Not to mention Ben and Jerrys is a company with great values which makes me feel good about spending my money. You wont regret it!

This is my second favorite Ben and Jerrys Ive cream. It has just the right amount of sweetness and is not over the top. I have easily eaten a whole pint in a single day. Overall, love this ice cream and the dairy they use is very creamy

author: joscelync44c6
text: This is my favorite ice cream. The size is perfect for one person. The mix of toppings in this ice cream is perfect. The taste is absolutely delicious and its amazing quality. I would recommend this to anybody who likes sweet ice cream.

author: aclifford88
text: Ben & Jerrys Half Baked is my biggest weakness when it comes to ice cream. I wish I could say I had self control, but this pint...I can eat it all in one sitting. Everything inside it is so dang good and the ice cream is just so creamy.

author: sarab15
text: This ice cream is great there is so many flavor to choose from. The kids like to try the different mixes. Is a good quality ice cream for a decent price they even have froyo versions of some of their ice creams. Definitely worth a try.

author: kierstab
text: This ice cream is guaranteed to make your day better. The cookie dough chunks are amazing in this brand and really the reason I continue to buy the flavor. I love chocolate of course and I love the ice cream bar version on this flavor.

author: melanieb112
text: Ugh where do i even begin?! This is one of my favorite ice cream flavors of all time. Each bite is packed with a different flavor that satisfies my palette. I will never grow tired of the taste of half baked ice cream from@ben & jerrys

author: hannahmz66
text: This is my go-to pint! Its got a little bit of everything! It is worth every penny to get a more expensive brand when the quality of the ice cream is so good! I would definitely recommend this brand to brownie and cookie dough lovers!

author: cornelius
text: If Im craving a little bit of everything, this is my go to choice. Delicious chocolate ice cream with bits of decadent brownies and cookie dough. I only eat a quarter of the paint because its too much sometimes, but overall delicious

author: taytay10
text: The best ice cream ever! Yes it is more expensive per pint than most ice creams are per quart but it is soooo good. I continue to buy this because I love the rich flavor and you cant beat a cookie dough and brownie combination to me!

author: jodim1
text: One of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavors. It has the perfect mixture of all the flavors. If youre unsure which ice cream flavor you are craving, this is the one for you! You are delighted with all of the flavors that are well loved.

author: kelliese367
text: I love this ice cream. Havent had any in a couple of months. This is one of my favorite splurge ice cream choices. I like to get the small sized ones when I need an ice cream fix. Highly recommend to anyone, you should give it a try

author: jadziarosec
text: This is amazing. Perfect cravings ice cream. I love the size of the container and the ice cream is very creamy. Price is a little high but for the quality its worth it! Definitely will have these stocked in my freezer ! A must have.

author: waleskisss
text: Its a perfect mix of vanilla and chocolate! Perfect when youre craving cookie dough & brownies!! Ben & Jerrys tend to be a little more on the expensive side but SO worth it! Especially since they pay their employees a livable wage!!

author: Marie
title: Cravings? Satisfied!
text: I buy this all the time and it’s my favorite. Both brownies and chocolate chip cookies are my favorite sweets to eat. The fact that it’s in ice cream is even better because I get to enjoy the best of both worlds on hot summer days!

author: brieoc
text: Tried this ice cream because of all the great reviews but it was just too sweet for me. If you have a high tolerance for sugar like my boyfriend (who likes this brand) then you may enjoy this but to me it just tasted overly sugary.

author: cellissalovesyou
text: The best mixture of cookie dough and brownie. Its not the most expensive but it also isnt the cheapest but for the quality I would say its worth it! This is my go to ice cream I have it atleast once a week as a little weekend treat

author: debbied1
text: This is a true decadent flavor blast. Easily one of the best pints in the line. Fudge brownie and cookie dough greatness that I would love to buy again and again. I love how they combine the top tier flavors together into one pint.

MY ABSOLUTE FAVORITE BEN AND JERRYS ICE CREAM FLAVOR. its definitely on the pricey side of ice cream but its so delicious. Its like a roller coaster of flavor! It really just doesnt compare to others. Seriously a satisfied consumer

author: dianak1
text: Craving this all day, every day. So so good! A little pricey but I think its worth it. Ice cream is great already but this just adds so much more. Id say its better than most other flavors and brands and Id definitely recommend it!

author: Bridgespo99997
title: Really good, really rich tho
text: This ice cream is a bit too rich for me. I love the vanilla ice cream with the brownies and the cookie dough, that's the really good portion. The chocolate ice cream is very strong, and too overwhelming to combine nicely with this.

author: tiffanyscents17
text: Can you say delicious??? Growing up in Maine I was able to enjoy fresh Ben & Jerry's ice cream at out local beaches. The way they make their pints is so amazing and just like the fresh ice cream you get. This flavor is so so yummy.

author: kamrya
text: Probably the best ice cream that exists. Its a great price for a pint and is packed full of flavor. Its better than others that are similar because you get a chunk of dough in just about every single bite. Overall its a top choice.

author: bumble_beauty
text: This is my favorite!! One of my pregnancy cravings so Ive been going through a lot of it lately. Its so delicious. I dont care if its pricey because Its worth it to me! [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-half-baked-16oz] #goodbyejuly

author: jessicabbdd3
text: This is my all time favorite Ben and jerrys flavor ice cream. I usually am not an ice cream person but this product is to die for!!! It is super delicious and you will want to keep eating it untill you finish the entire container!

author: Review101
title: "A life without Ben, is a dull Jerry."
text: So good. So good- - - So good! My mouth is watering thinking of the mind numbing flavor contrast evident in this flavor! Half baked is absolutely phenomenal for any gooey, chocolatey, fudge brownie ice cream loving lad or lassie!

author: amyccbd8
text: I absolutely love Ben and Jerrys ice cream its super delicious and really creamy. I also like that you get a ton of toppings they dont skimp! Its one of my favorite ice creams and I think its a pretty good price for what you get.

author: kileyg4
text: This is my second favorite flavor behind chocolate fudge brownie. There are a ton of cookie dough and brownie chunks and then blend of chocolate and vanilla ice cream is perfect! Great way to cure your sweet tooth all year round!

author: stella_1268
text: This tastes very good but is a little but to chocolatey for my taste. I love how they are in small containers so I dont even have to grab a bowl! I wish there was more cookie dough in it though! I recommend if you love chocolate

author: supacourt
text: I love the combination of The vanilla and chelate with the brownie and cookie dough bits...that are perfectly soft! I will forever love this slightly over price ice cream brand! And I love what the company stands for in general!

author: coraleel
text: Best Ben and Jerry’s flavour ever! So amazing and full of flavour! Definitely affordable for the quality! Eat this like once a week! Absolutely amazing and anyone who hasn’t tried it it’s so good! Cookie dough and brownie dough!

author: jess_doesyourhair
text: Amazing ice cream. I love Ben and Jerrys, Ive tried several flavors and definitely this and chunky monkey are my favorite. Some people say its overpriced but I think its a great price for the quality of ice cream youre getting.

author: staciem2cb5
text: I think this brand is slightly overpriced but I wont deny the incredible flavor. Their ability to market similar flavors yet they taste so much better amazes me! Its a real treat if you havent had Ben & Jerrys yet. Go get some!

author: rileyashs
text: Ben & Jerry’s Half Baked Ice Cream has been my favorite For at least 10 years. First time I tasted it I realized why people were so crazy about this brand. DELICIOUS honestly. They have a very good selection of flavors as well!

author: alicias37
text: Ben & Jerrys half-baked ice cream has to be one of my all-time favorites. Its so creamy and rich, making it very satisfying. I love the chunks of brownie and cookie pieces in it, and each pint is generous with the pieces in it.

author: oneandonllyy
text: Ben & Jerrys is one of my favorite ice cream brands! The brand never disappoints in the quality and quantity you receive, I buy them all the time binge watching or just for fun. It is however a little pricey but its worth it!!

author: saralynnb
text: This ice cream is so good, and I didnt think I would like it. I dont love chocolate ice cream, but with the mix of chocolate and vanilla with cookie dough and brownie bites it is delicious. We keep buying it again and again!!!

author: sabrinasb0f8
text: Its really hard for me to pick a favorite Ben & Jerrys, but this is absolutely a top contender. How can you improve upon brownies AND ice cream in one pint? I love how both are perfectly chewy and balance the creamy ice cream.

author: nicolettepf049
text: The amount of times Ive purchased this ice cream flavor is insane. Ive never had a more delicious flavor of ice cream! The mixture of chocolate, brownie, and cookie dough is amazing, and I would 100% recommend this to others!!

author: francist3
text: This was soooo good I finished it within like 20 minutes. It is kinda pricey but for good reasons. Honestly this ice cream will not disappoint you. Every time I go grocery shopping the first thing I look for is this ice cream.

author: jasmines126
text: Half baked is one of my all time favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor and I hope they never retire it! I grew up on this ice cream and its never let me down. Its affordable and delicious and I will always love Ben and Jerrys ice cream

author: faeriebarista
text: My absolute favorite flavor of ice cream! I love it. Its got the perfect blend of flavors and it is just perfect. I definitely recommend it to anyone that loves chocolate. Or just hates choosing between cookies and brownies!

author: jenniferl359
text: So yummy! Between the cookie dough and the brownie batter you cant go wrong plenty of chunks throughout the ice cream. We will definitely buy again but the price is high for the small amount you get. Overall it was delicious

author: jennifergz
text: I LOVE this ice cream. I always go back to this one. I have tried other Ben & Jerrys ice cream but this by far is the best one. Although the Cherry Garcia is pretty amazing as well! But you can never go wrong with Half Baked

author: ashleymc4f0
text: This is the single most delicious ice cream on the planet. I actually names my two cats Ben and jerry because it's so good. I think one spoonful has more calories than I should eat in a week though but it's sooooo worth it.

author: catmeowur
text: I absolutely love the flavor of this ice cream! You get the perfect mix of cookie dough, brownies and vanilla and chocolate ice cream! It is perfect for that time of month, girls night in, or just because ice cream is life.

author: emilyj142
text: My favourite flavour of Ben and Jerrys. Its always very consistent and has a good amount of brownie and cookie dough. I always have to hold myself back from eating the entire pint. I can usually make it last two days though

author: stephcb184
text: Delicious. This is the best tasting ice cream Ive ever Puchased from a grocery store. I loved the creamy consistency and the generous ingredients. Ben & JerrysNever disappoints. I would recommend this ice cream to everyone.

author: jilliang35f2
text: Ben and Jerrys has yet to put out a bad ice cream flavor. This has the perfect amount of cookie dough and brownie bits and theyre pretty big pieces too. Its so good, but its definitely pricier than other ice creams for sure

Nothing touches the flavor of Ben and Jerry’s, love the new products they are always trying new things and it shows great innovation. Half baked is just a classic of theirs that will always be my go to for movie nights in.

author: atik
title: One of my favorite flavors
text: If you like chocolate, but don't like your ice cream loaded with it, this is a good pick. The chocolate ice cream and brownies aren't super overpowering. They compliment the cookie dough and vanilla ice cream pretty well.

author: valerieced7e
text: I looooooooove. Whoever created this flavor has my heart. Just writing this makes me want to take a trip to the grocery store for it. The flavors compliment each other perfectly. The quality of the ice cream is top notch!

author: mpalmesano
text: This is THE BEST flavor of Ben and Jerrys ice cream that Ive ever had. Its vanilla ice cream with cookie dough, brownie, and chocolate chunks and its so good. Its not too pricey for how much you get and it tastes amazing.

author: kaitlynt32
text: Do I even need to say it? This ice cream is the best. If you love cookie dough and brownies you will love this ice cream. I dont love chocolate ice cream in general but I do love this one and pick it up every now and then

author: britdric
text: This is my favorite flavor from B&Js! Their chocolate chip cookie dough pieces are delightful and this mix is a fun twist. Only downfall is the overall pricing of their ice cream but you do pay for quality to some degree.

author: katd1
text: When I found this ice cream I could not put the spoon down! It tastes so very good and I always finish the container within two days. The cookie chunks that are in this are amazing and I always recommend it to my friends.

author: shelbyg7957
text: Half baked is the holy grail of ice cream. Chocolate ice cream with brownie chunks and vanilla ice cream with cookie dough pieces is the perfect combination. This is always my go to ice cream when I want a special treat.

author: alexism123
text: Ben and Jerrys is my favorite brand of ice cream. Their half baked is delicious. The cookie dough is really I like any other you can find in an ice cream. I like that this flavor has the mixture of the chocolate as well.

author: corinner23
text: Favorite ice cream flavor! The chunks of brownies and cookie dough are so good and the ice cream itself is amazing. Its so hard to not eat the whole pint in one sitting! Wish it was cheaper so I could get it more often!

author: ssl101
text: Half-Baked is the best ice cream out there for someone like me who is so indecisive. Its half cookie dough and have brownie! Cant get enough of this one. Idk how they keep it separate but they know what they were doing.

author: miav43
text: It was so good and it had so much flavor it was my first time trying it and I would get it again. There is nothing to improve. It was only 6 bucks and good so I would buy it again and I would honestly let others try it

author: alexandram143
text: Probably the best ice cream youll ever eat with the perfect combo of cookies and brownies. I even put it in the microwave for like 10 seconds to soften the ice cream and makes the cookies and brownies a little warm too

author: laurah192e
text: My favorite. A mix of both cookie dough and brownies! Plus the vanilla and chocolate. I like to get this when it is on sale but is a very good value i like how they bring new flavors out often. Will buy again and again

author: calleyb
text: This is the best ice cream its delicious and has the best combination of extras in it that it creates the perfect comfort pint of ice cream. Its B&Js so it is kind of over priced compared to generic ice creams though.

This is my second favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor and def one of my go tos. It’s really good. Love chocolate so brownie plus cookie dough is a great combination. Honestly I don’t know anyone who doesn’t like half baked

author: mccrae0330
text: Love Ben and Jerrys Ive cream when I need my ice cream fix they are always my go to with all my favorite flavors. The perfect amount of sweetness. Definately my favorite brand of ice cream for those late night treats

author: gabrielleang
text: this is my favorite ice cream flavor ever, it has the perfect combo of traditional ingredients and both chocolate and vanilla. Ive never disappointed with Ben & Jerrys. Just watch your serving sizes, word to the wise

author: savsides
text: I could NOT put this down once I took a bite. I love how this brand has so many different flavors and they are very unique. Pretty affordable for a college student like me. Great night time snack! Totally recommend.

author: kirstyse6e6
text: One of my favorites. Found at most grocery stores. Also online too. I recommend them. So many flavors. And they dont disappoint. A must try for sure and you will be going back for more. I highly recommend it to you.

author: taylorll
text: Hands down one of my favorite ice-cream! I love the chunks of sweets you get to eat while still eating ice-cream. This product is so creamy and so full of flavor! I love it on a hot summer day or even in the winter!

author: kaialacombe04
text: This is my absolute favorite ice cream. I have repeatedly bought this item and it never disappoints. The cookie dough and brownie bites are perfect. I definitely recommend to others. This is a great flair over all.

author: haleygf26a
text: fave of all time. may be a little pricey but ben and jerrys is always worth it!! so tasty so simple and so well done. always a treat with every spoonful. definitely one if those flavor I go back to again and again

author: laramaraldp
text: The perfect combination of cookie dough and brownie, and I really like the chuck pieces in it too. Also the chocolate and vanilla ice cream makes it even better. Im always happy when I have some of this in my day.

author: corinnek911
text: I love the combination of Cookue dough and brownie bits in this ice cream! I do wish they would add more brownie bits to it, it seems like there is never enough. The brownies are nice and soft and super delicious.

author: theresn
text: All Ben & Jerrys flavors are good but Half Baked is the best. Its delicious and I buy it more times than I probably should. I recommend buying this. Its affordable and worth it. You wont regret it. 100% recommend.

author: nikib6
text: Who doesn't love Ben & Jerry's? Unproblematic with wholesome ingredients! This is my favorite ice cream ever. The brownie chunks get me every time. I highly reccomend Half Baked when you cannot decide on a flavor!

author: bridgettesl
text: This is one of my favorite Ice cream flavors. It has all my@favorites all wrapped up in one. My husband always tries to steal some when I buy this. I highly recommend this flavor for anyone who loves a sweet treat

author: antoinetten2
text: Half baked is the best of both worlds. You get a little bit of brownie and a little bit of cookie dough. If I ever crave ice cream this one is my go to! I definitely recommend this flavor to everyone its the best!

author: hcreger_17
text: This stuff has been my downfall. I’ve had to learn to eat it in moderation. It is my number one favorite Icecream ive ever had. My husband doesn’t even have to ask what kind I want anymore it’s always half baked!

author: sophiec21
text: Cookie dough and brownie batter. How could you not like it? Such good flavor combos when mixed and eaten altogether. One of my favorite guilty pleasure ice creamed. Very satisfied every time I make this purchase!

author: kenziedave11
text: This is a very tasty ice cream flavor!!! I have bought this flavor many times before. It is so delicious and is my go to ice cream. I bought it from my local grocery store. I was very satisfied with this product.

author: caitlynkayeblog
text: One of my favorite ice cream flavors EVER. I am not the biggest fan of the brownie bits but I looove everything else in this ice cream!! Chocolate, vanilla, cookie dough, and brownie yummy goodness!!! A must try

author: lorim63
text: This one is a bit of a throw back for me. Upon first bite Im taken back to my childhood. Sitting in the back of my parents station wagon eating a soft serve vanilla and chocolate swirl ice cream cone. Delicious!

author: barbarac11
text: Ben & Jerrys has some of the best unique flavored ice cream pints this one is one of my favorites it includes chocolate & vanilla ice creams mixed with chocolate cookie dough and fudge brownies. What not to like

author: antonellam14
text: So. Good. DELICIOUS. The perfect mix of brownies and cookie dough with a little bit of coldness. This is my go to flavor and I will get it every time i go to the store!!! GET THIS FLAVOR!!!!! IT WONT DISAPPOINT.

author: nicoleee_u
text: This could be an UNPOPULAR OPINION but....... there is just way too much brownie and chocolate in this pint for me. I am a cookie dough lover and I feel it just overpowers the vanilla ice cream and cookie dough.

author: nanaagotthejuice
text: I just had this yesterday. Im on my period and this was amazing to have during this time. It taste so good. Might be one of my favorites and Im honestly not that big of a fan of ice cream. Only like $5 at wawa.

author: kaylas230
text: Im obsessed with this ice cream! I love cookies dough but we all know we cant have too much of it and this is the perfect ice cream for the cookie dough lovers. If you havent had this its definitely a must try!

author: akatori
text: Love all the flavors and is great on summer nights when just chilling outside with friends. Its always on sale even at 711 buy one get one free. Top 5 favorite ice cream brands 10/10 would recommend any flavor.

author: saratd34a
text: My chidlren love this ice cream. They love that its like eating twi ice creams in one. It taste way better than the alternative products and is about the same price. This flavor is definitely not disappointing.

author: maggiejane
text: This is one of my favorite flavors. I always end up eating more than I intend to because I keep digging for the next chunk of cookie or brownie dough. Plus you dont have to choose between chocolate and vanilla.

My absolute favorite flavor. I love the mix between the brownies and cookie dough. I cant think of anything that would improve this flavor. I buy this all the time, I would definitely recommend this to others!

author: jennab52
text: The brownie and chocolate chip cookie dough bites is the most amazing combination of flavors! It is a bit rich for me to eat the whole pint but I easily could. More expensive then most but so good nonetheless!

author: keepcalm155_reviewer
text: Ben and Jerry's icecream is expensive .. especially for a small pint of icecream but when you eat it it is worth the price it is so creamy and although i do wish they would make a bigger size I recommend

author: sarampls
text: Although the price is higher than a storebrand the half-baked is definitely my go to. I love the gooeyness and chewiness of the brownie and cookie dough mixed in. I am super satisfied and will continue to buy.

author: dylanc16
text: This is the perfect combination. Chewy brownie pieces and soft cookie dough pieces in a chocolate and vanilla ice cream. Its a fair price for the quality and I love that the owners are human rights activists.

author: ashleys32
text: It tastes good but it's definitely something you have to be in the mood for. There are a lot of chunky bits so if you don't like to chew your ice cream this one is not for you. The flavor is very nice though.

author: jasleena8136
text: Sitting on your couch craving all the sweets like cookies and brownies? Too lazy to get up and bake some fresh ones? Heres your solution! Its not warm and fresh out the oven but it is still just as delicious!

author: samag
text: This is my favorite Ben and Jerrys ice cream flavor! Has fudge in it along with balls of cookie dough and chocolate chips. Its a bit more than your regular ice cream but its definitely worth it in my opinion.

Half Baked is my favorite ice cream! We love to eat this at our house! The price is good. I usually buy it on sale. Not all stores have it. It is so delicious. I am a happy customer. I will be a repeat buyer.

author: princesstaytay91
text: This is my favourite ice cream of all time! My only complaint is the big price for the small container, but it’s also worth the money so it’s not a game changer for me. I will buy this ice cream until I die!

author: stephaniep40
text: This is one of my favorite flavors from ben and Jerry's! I love brownie and cookie dough and with this you dont have to choose between either! The bites are well distributed and the ice cream is high quality

author: rs426
text: This is the perfect mix of cookie dough and brownie for those of us that cant decide. The babies ice cream is a good vanilla flavor. This is one of my favorite go to ice cream flavors to keep in the fridge.

author: carriel16
text: Half baked is my favorite from Ben & Jerrys. It has the perfect amount of everything that I want. There is nothing I would change about it. Its definitely worth trying if you like cookie dough and brownies.

author: nataliem164
text: Ugh, the best flavor of Ben and Jerrys! Perfect for late night with a Hallmark movie and a glass of wine. Love the company and will keep buying from them! Delicious!!!!! I only wish it came in a bigger bin!

author: beccabee14
text: Im obsessed with this flavor. Its so sweet and I love the chunks of brownie and cookie dough inside. Each bite has a little bit of everything and is the best late night snack to quench those sweet cravings.

author: danyaalise
text: If you like eating batter and dough, this is the ice cream for you. So tasty, love that there are plenty of cookie dough and brownie chunks throughout. More pricey than a basic ice cream, but well worth it.

author: chym2
text: The ice cream is good. It has enough of each flavor but doesnt conflict too much. I would love it if the little globs of dough were a bit smaller but all in all Im happy with the amount of bang for my buck.

author: sammyxo19
text: The perfect combination of everything you want: chocolate, vanilla, cookie dough, and brownie. This is one of my go-tos at the Ben & Jerry's freezer. I love saving all the cookie dough until the last bite!

Ben & Jerrys Half Baked ice cream is my fianc and my all time favorite ice cream flavor. The pieces are so large and so good. However, You cannot go wrong with any of Ben & Jerrys flavors. 10/10 recommend.

author: arielhasasecret
text: My favorite flavor from Ben and Jerrys. When I want a gourmet bowl of ice cream I go with Ben and Jerrys. The flavors are rich and the ice cream fills me up quickly so that I dont feel like Im over eating!

author: ashleythedietitian
text: THIS IS MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM OF ALL TIME. so smooth, so creamy and curbs my sweet tooth. The perfect balance of sweet and creamy. Its always my go to when Im at the store. Ill love you forever half baked.

author: christineh1
text: Ben and Jerrys is my favorite ice cream brand! They are also a good company to support! Check those guys out! Half baked is so good, it is delicious chewy brownie pieces and super good cookie dough pieces!

author: angelbaby232004
text: So so so good! Love the half baked the best especially when Im half baked or having a really rough week. Ive been getting this flavor for 10+ years. The taste is phenomenal and the price point is on point.

author: allisonmaf9b
text: No other ice cream brand compares in my opinion. Although quite pricy its so worth it! Half baked is my favourite flavour and its always jammed packed with filling and flavours!! Will always recommend haha

author: brookr4
text: Mmmm half baked is amazing. All Ben &Jerry is sooo good. We just constantly try and love every one, every time we try a new one. Creamy and you can taste each additive in there ( cookie dough, brownie etc)

author: maryanastasia6
text: Excellent munchie flavor, they didnt name it half baked for nothing. The fudge bits are delicious and I love this flavor so much. The company supports good causes too so it makes the ice cream even better.

author: member53e86
text: One of my favorite icecreams! I like the cookie dough chunks inside and they give a nice texture to the icecream. It's definitely very sweet so I wouldn't recommend it if you don't like very sweet things.

author: lizy6
text: One of my go-to ice creams. Love that these are non gmo and packed with goodies. I personally wish it was straight down the middle chocolate ice cream on one side vanilla on the other but I still love it!

author: shelbyn30
text: This is by far my favorite flavor! I love the chunks of desserts hidden in each bite. Ive been eating this one for years. I only recently stopped because my gut decided it couldnt handle the dairy anymore

My favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor! Maybe even my fave ice cream in general flavor too. The chunks are big too which I like! I have had this several, several times and would recommend. Decent pricing too!

author: gonzalezg002
text: So good ! All Ben and Jerrys ice cream flavors are so so good. I will eat the whole tub.. good thing they dont sell huge tubs of them ! These are so good theyll please any picky ice cream eater ........

author: laurens94cd
text: The best ice cream ever. So yummy and easy to eat. Not cheap for ice cream but not expensive by any means. I would make the packaging different for each flavor to make it more appealing and likely to buy.

author: dubraskac
text: This is my favorite ice cream in the world. It pretty much has everything but in little portions. Dont get me wrong, I love it, but I would love it more if they add more cookies dough and everything else.

author: meganm70
text: This ice cream is defiently the best on the market! I am a repeating consumer and will be for the rest of my life. It can be a little pricey. VERY DELICIOUS!!!! I am satisfied with the product they make!

author: cailag31c4
text: The absolute best ice cream on the planet! I love this product! It has the perfect amount of brownie and chocolate chip cookie dough chucks throughout so you are sure to get at least one with every bite!

author: rebekahwillow
text: Seriously SO AMAZING!!! Cookie Dough & Brownie Batter! I'm in! The consistency is nice and creamy. The cookie dough chunks are good size and you don't feel like your searching for them in this ice cream.

author: uhohloreo
text: First, Ben & Jerrys is an ice cream brand for the people. Ben & Jerry were quite literally protesting with people. So, this brand is the supreme ice cream brand. And its delicious and sooo rich & creamy!

author: emilyh108
text: This combines my two favourite flavors together, there are plenty of brownies and cookie dough chunks in there and a nice mix of chocolate and vanilla ice cream. It's so tasty and I will continue buying.

author: caitlinm2cbb
text: Hands down the best Ben & jerrys flavor ever!!! If you havent tried this you need to. Its one if those flavors that I crave after having a really bad day. Always makes me feel better to indulge. Buy it!

author: poojap7228
text: This is just what you need to come home to at the end of a long day. So creamy and rich in flavor. Definitely one of my go to flavors. Can be pricey but they definitely go on sale every once in a while!

author: andreacambo
text: Super unique flavor! The cookie dough and brownie bits are delicious and are extremely chunky. Honestly, this needs no improvement. I am a repeat customer and will always come back for the yummy flavor.

author: raqueln1
text: This ice cream is delicious! Its also the perfect size and so easy to find at any grocery store or convenience store. Theres a ton different flavors that are good but this is one of my favorite flavors.

author: _aditij_
text: my absolute favorite flavor of Ben and Jerrys ice cream. i love the brownie chunks that i get in every spoonful and the vanilla and chocolate flavors. great ice cream and i can literally eat tubs of it!

author: jenniferm875c
text: Omg. Half baked is my FAVORITE. This is my go to ice cream for any occasion. The brownie and cookie dough pieces in this ice cream makes it what it is. I cant recommend this enough. You need to try it!

author: kevins1015
text: Half Baked is a staple item in my freezer. We always have a few tubs. The mix of chocolate, vanilla, brownie bites, and cookie dough makes for an amazing flavor profile. Absolutely love this ice cream.

author: sarahh420
text: Ben & Jerrys is always a favorite for ice cream. Unique flavors with LOTS of delicious chunks and swirls of yummy toppers. Only gave this one 5 stars because I prefer other flavors with less chocolate.

author: iconicdria
text: This is the perfect blend of brownie vanilla and chocolate mixed in one. Its not to pricey to me and I dont think I would change anything about this flavor. This is always my go when buying this brand!

author: ilanah2
text: Definitely my favorite ice cream of all time! I try not to have it all the time because its not super healthy, but its difficult to resist. I mean read whats in it, it cant get better than Half Baked!

author: Andrea
title: No cookie dough!
text: This is usually my all time favorite ice cream . There was tons of brownie but absolutely no cookie dough in my tub . I searched and searched as I was eating and no cookie dough at all. Disappointed.

author: ciarap4
text: Half brownie and half cookie dough you cant go wrong whenever you eat this I only purchase this flavor this is a must buy if you love ice cream, bit on the pricey side but definitely worth the money!
This is my favorite Ben and Jerrys product. It is a little pricey but worth the splurge. I would put more cookie dough then brownie. I am a repeat customer and will continue to be. I would recommend.

author: nicolep1122
text: We rarely get ice cream to keep at home, but half baked is definitely our special treat. It tastes great and even the hubs and kiddos love it. Its a nice change from traditional vanilla or chocolate.

author: tessac7
text: Having an ice cream that is vanilla and has all the yummy goods that everyone craves I had to try it! It is so good and you can almost always find coupons on Ben and Jerrys ice creams in many stores!

author: axhl3yy
text: This product is really good I love eating this, its affordable the price isnt that bad and this product doesnt need improvement, Im a repeat consumer Im in love, yes I would recommend this to others.

author: amys289
text: Best. Ice Cream EVER! Cookies dough, brownies, vanilla, and chocolate ice cream! all blended together for comfort in a cup! It's a very rich ice cream, so the little container can last you a while!

author: victorial0ve
text: I love the Ben & Jerrys has a lot of different flavors - this by far is my favorite! Anytime that I eat ice cream I usually crave something with chocolate and Ive gone through 10000 tubs in college

author: mekaylac3
text: This is definitely one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavors. Its very creamy and rich. The pint is always very generous with the amount of cookie and brownie pieces. Definitely my go-to ice cream.

author: sydneyc2
text: This is absolutely my most favorite Ice cream flavor from them. Its just out right delish and if you have yet to try it, Id suggest doing so! No regrets if you love chocolate and cookie dough bites

author: ess_102
text: Favorite of all time. I love cookie dough and I love Brownie bites. I'm not a fan of just vanilla so the mix of chocolate helps balance everything out and I get my two favorite sweet treats in one!

author: sierraskye13
text: Always a good go to flavor! I mean who doesnt like cookie dough am I right?! Can never go wrong with this one! First flavor I ever tried of Ben and Jerrys and I always find myself going back to it

author: rebeccagb80e
text: If you like Ice cream this is definitely a flavor to try. Ben and Jerrys combinations cant be compared. Better than expected and I love that I can eat it out of the pint and claim it as only mine!

author: meganr189
text: AMAZING. Satisfied!!! When Im craving ice cream I go for this one as well. Its so delicious I can eat the whole container in one sitting Definitely recommend this ice cream and will repurchase it

author: desiraek4
text: This is the best ice cream it is my all time favorite! Chocolate and vanilla with fudge brownies and chocolate chip cookie dough! Delicious. I especially like that it has a mix of flavors. Amazing

author: tejay
text: Half baked is one of those Ben & Jerry signature flavors that is perfect yet simple. Vanilla and chocolate ice cream with chunks of cookie dough and my personal favorite, brownies. Its addicting.

author: CroatianTaster
title: No brownies or chunks...
text: I was so happy 2 hours ago when i purchased this...it looks so promising and i love all your other flavours...but when i opened it and started digging i was so disappoimted..no brownies or chunks

author: sanzeria
text: One of my favorite ice cream flavors. I haven't had it in a while but each time I do, it doesn't disappoint. This ice cream tastes good, is affordable & they sell it almost everywhere. Its great!

author: theebombm
text: The best ice cream. Hands down. Always has been a favorite of mine i just wish they offered larger sized containers. Even the price doesnt bother me because they are usually on salr where I shop.

author: icecreamery
title: SO YUMMY
text: I ate a pint of this in one go. No regrets. I think this flavor is much better than Phish Food, which is another flavor of Ben and Jerry's. With both cookie dough and brownie, you can't go wrong.

author: Nini1991
title: My best friend
text: My taste buds have loved me ever since I've discovered this flavor! I can no longer eat the plain chocolate chip cookie dough ice creams thanks to this amazing flavor! Truly a girls best friend!

author: amethystfay
text: If I could give this 10 stars I would. This is my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. Honestly it does not compare to others. I am willing to try the fro-yo version of this and see how it compares.

author: lechatn
