text: Two hippies from Vermont with a dream and a spoon create rich creamy loaded ice cream that helps save the world one pint at a time. What is not to love?

author: avva
text: I really like this! It's expensive but not as expensive as some others. I will say that I'm not as much of a fan of the brownie part of the ice cream. The cookie dough is the best part by far.

author: TheWolfQueen
title: EVERY WEEK
text: I love love loooove this flavor i wish this was lactose free! I cant have lactose but you can see me getting 2 of these a week! I was horrified to find my gas station stopped carring this! ;-;

author: kathryns18
text: I love the flavor and texture of Ben & Jerrys. Half Baked is my favorite, but I dont buy it often because it is very rich and a bit expensive. I would recommend if you want to treat yourself!

author: noraflick
text: One of the best flavors Ive tried from them. Creamy and delicious; highly recommend a try if youve never tried it before; unless youre not a fan of cookie dough then its probably not for you.

author: meagand9d35
text: I have this ice cream about once or twice a week because it is just that good. It has everything you could want or imagine in one run. Chocolate, fudge brownie, vanilla, cookie pieces. Yummm

author: camillemalcom
title: I LOVE(D) THIS PINT
text: I’ve been buying half baked for several years now and the past two days i had a pint with absolutely no chunks. just vanilla and chocolate ice cream )): what happened to the old half baked?

author: Ange
title: Probably gained 15lbs
text: This stuff is dangerous. Take one bite and you will end up eating the whole pint! Jeez the cookie dough and brownies are perfection mixed in vanilla and chocolate ice cream... I’m drooling.

author: kellyk64
text: Cant go wrong with any b&J flavor! A true classic. very creative and unique flavors you wont see elsewhere. Typically end up eating the whole pint in one sitting. High in calories and sugar

author: gabbys59
text: Oh my godddddd this ice is soooooo good!! It is so delicious. There are so many cunks of chocolate and peanut butter. It is one of the best ice creams I have ever had. You need to buy this!

author: amandas0df3
text: Favorite ice cream! It is the perfect combination of chocolate and vanilla ice cream. Mixed with brownie and cookie dough pieces! Pricey but worth the purchase! Great for indecisive people

author: averik2
text: All Ben and Jerrys ice creams are absolutely delicious. I love the company I love what they stand for and their headquarters in Vermont is such an awesome place. 10/10 all around for them.

author: reemam1
text: I though this was an interesting combination of flavors. The texture was really nice. For me, it was a bit on the sweeter side. Wouldnt buy occasionally but definitely when Im in the mood.

author: katelyn_maria
text: One of the best Ben and jerry icecream flavors. Every pint always has a great mixture of brownie and cookie dough bites. I try not to get this often because the pint is gone in one sitting

author: ashleyrose93
text: These little things are not cheap but they are so dang good! I love the big chunks of cookie dough and brownie batter, so satisfying! I try not to eat the whole thing in one sitting hahah

author: abscog
text: This is a delicious ice cream! It is my go to dessert, it is the perfect mix of chocolate and vanilla, with the chunks of cookie dough, it is so good! It is very creamy and a great size.

author: tou tou
title: best ice cream
text: I had this when I was in Paris but when I got back to the states I forgot about it. Fast forward to today my mom found it and bought me some and it’s just sooo good! I highly recommend!

author: Applenoose
title: Astonishingly Awesome
text: Half baked is a fantastic contribution to mankind, and the universe in general. Grab a pint and settle in. Let it sit for a minute or so and then attack. Warning - can be habit forming.

author: crystale426c
text: This is the absolute best ice cream anyone could eat! Of course Im from Vermont so Im a little partial but it still does not take away from this amazing product and array of selections!

author: goddessglowmo
text: Half baked is one of my fav flavors. It's like heaven in your mouth and the cookie dough pieces just top it off right! I only gave it four stars because it is a bit on the pricey side.

author: hwolf2389
text: A mix of creamy chocolate and peanut butter ice cream which is delicious. Add in the peanut butter cookie dough and fudge brownie it is delicious. has a good mix in to ice cream ratio

author: alishai1
text: WOW! What a flavor! A perfect balance of cookie dough and brownie. For all my chocolate and vanilla lovers this is a great ice cream flavor![product:ben-&-jerrys-half-baked-ice-cream]

author: hannahnd486
text: Just try it couple days ago. Delicious ice cream with both vanilla and chocolate mix well together. Very rich texture and will buy it again. Little bit pricey ice cream but worth it.

author: shaylacoffman44
text: This is the only Ben and Jerrys ice cream I eat. Its amazing. Just dont look at the calories and save it for a crappy night when you eat your feelings. It never disappoints I promise

author: Alli86
title: The absolute best
text: This is the best ice cream ever. My pints always have heaps of brownie and cookie dough in them and this is perfect for people who can’t choose between chocolate or vanilla. Love it!

author: amandasfb9f
text: This is my hands down favourite ice cream. It’s more expensive but totally worth it. I don’t eat ice cream often but when I am craving it this is my go to! Would recommend every time

author: ennngeee
text: My favorite Ben and Jerry's ice cream! It has a little bit of everything in it. Quite on the sweet side but it is so yummy. My favorite is the cookie dough bits and the brownie bits

author: anyal1
text: I think the price is a bit high and it obviously needs to be eaten in moderation because we can let it overtake the desert because its quite rich but once every six months is doable

author: Goldriley
title: My weakness!!
text: This is ultimately my personal favorite...and my friends know it!!! I just can't resist the delicious ice cream with the gobs of chocolate chip cookie dough and brownies mixed in!!

author: indiap6002
text: I am such a freaking fan of Ben and berries ice cream they are just so yummy Aarhus texture full. The flavors are just amazing! My personal favorites are brownie batter, half baked

author: heatherp8eee
text: Half Baked can definitely satisfy that rich ice cream craving. The combo of brownie and cookie dough is a win! Id give it 5 stars but usually its more expensive than I want to pay.

author: justkaylaaa
text: I get this ice cream all the time . The cookie dough and brownie chunks are so delicious. Every time I get this my daughter and I finish it so quickly . I would highly recommend.

author: vmarine
text: A delicious classic!! It has a little of all my favorites. Its one of my go to ice creams because I know it always hits the spot [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-half-baked-16oz]

author: chucktown1894
title: unique & delicious experience
text: Such a great flavor of ice cream for those who enjoy soft & moist guilty pleasures! The chocolate & vanilla ice creams fuse together creating a perfectly sweet mixture. Amazing!

author: destreeb
text: Favorite ice cream! It has the best mixture of brownies and cookie dough but isnt too much. I look forward to this treat! Its a purchase I will make over and over and over! Yum!

author: patriciaf29
text: This ice cream is delicious! I have tried a lot of Ben & Jerrys ice creams and this is one of my@favorites. Cookie dough (yum!), chocolate chips, chocolate ice cream. Delicious!
A guilty pleasure to say the least. This ice cream has brownies, cookie dough, chocolate and vanilla ice cream. Such a good combination for when you’re feeling something sweet.

author: raybanna_xo
text: This is actually one of my favorite icecreams. I love cookies and cream and I love brownie fudge and this is the perfect combination of the two. I would recommend this product!

author: marleer3
text: Ok Im sorry but this is the best ice cream known to man! If you like brownies or under baked cookies or anything like that at all, this is the kind of ice cream you should get

author: juliawaslike
text: This is a classic flavor and MY ALL TIME FAVORITE!!!! You cannot go wrong with this one. There is so much flavor, texture, and yumminess in half baked! I could eat it all day.

author: elizabethm6
text: Ben and Jerrys is my favorite ice cream. They have to many flavors- you cant go wrong- but half baked is definitely one of the best in my opinion. I will definitely buy again.

author: mckenzif
text: This is my favorite ice cream of all time. I love having this as my after dinner snack. The ice cream is really smooth and the flavor is amazing. I love all of the bits in it.

author: lazyolturnip
text: Was OK. Meh. Just as good as competitors at 1/3 of the price. Wouldn’t buy again. If I’m going to indulge financially and calorie wise- I expect something more.. wow factorish

author: bric5
text: One of my favorite Ice creams. It is full of cookie dough and brownie chunks and you can buy it almost anywhere. However, I will say its a bit pricey compared to other brands.

author: livh21
text: This is my favorite ice cream of all time. I constantly have it in my freezer and it is my go to desert. I love all Ben and Jerrys flavors but this one has to be my favorite.

author: smasha3
text: We stan a brand that fights for human rights, employs ex-convicts and pays them a fair wage. I will always pay extra for this brand, and their product is more than worth it.

author: lisas245
text: Sooooo yummy. Its the right blend of everything I like in one! I love that its not overly rich in sweetness and each bite has a little something you get from the ingredients

author: farahpinklady
text: Its my favorite ben & jerrys ice cream. Taste so chocolatey and delicious. I could finished a pint of the ice cream by myself. Very recommended to all the chocolate lovers.

author: sarahf169
text: By far the best ice cream Ive EVER had! It combines all my favorite flavors with chocolate, cookie dough, vanilla and brownie. Would recommend to anyone with a sweet tooth!

author: catee3d1c
text: every single flavor of Ben & Jerry's I have had has been so good. I love ice cream and they just go above and beyond to taste amazing. You definitely get what you pay for.

author: saskiah5
text: Had this during a breakup and I 10/10 recommend. You find actual fudge and cookie bits and its honestly the best heart mender and binge worthy ice cream you will ever meet

author: meghana4
text: I love Ben and Jerrys! And their half baked is sooooo good! This flavor has so much cookie dough and brownie pieces its so yummy! Highly recommend it! Also comes in froyo!

author: abbye20
text: This is my boyfriend and Is go to for movie night. We can pick it up at our local grocery store, and it has become a staple for our date night ins. delicious and creamy!!

author: breanak3
text: My favorite flavor! Love the soft brownies in this mix and cookie dough is always a good add in! Sadly I can never find it in my area anymore. Would definitely recommend!

author: shanny_pans
text: Half Baked is the best ice cream when you want to really indulge! The chocolate cookie dough and fudge brownie bits are so delicious and they stay soft in the ice cream.

author: emilyb99
text: So delicious. It's a classic flavor that many like. I don't buy it often because it is so fattening, but it's a great treat. Super sweet and actually loaded with chunks!

author: chickenmom2019
title: My Favorite Ice Cream
text: This combination of cookie dough and brownie pair perfectly with the chocolate AND vanilla ice cream. I drool a little (kidding) every time I think about this ice cream!

author: brittneys3a01
text: My favorite treat to indulge with love the Ben and Jerrys flavors and its so hard to pick which one I want every time but then end up going with the good old half backed

author: deena_saurus
text: I absolutely love this flavor and ben & jerrys will always have my business because they are a very professional and proactive company that gives back to their community

author: jhoug21
text: Great tasting ice cream that comes in a nice size container to make sure you dont over indulge. My only con is it is a bit pricey compared to some competitors pricing.

author: samantham91d7
text: this flavor is really good and i really want some right now. its one of my favorite flavors from them. also THEY SUPPORT BLACK LIFES MATTER GO BEN & JERRYS WE LOVE YOU

author: Anni
title: Half Baked!
text: Half Baked - for me the most delicious ice cream! Actually i don‘t like vanilla ice cream but this does not taste boring and the doughy brownie pieces are just hmmm...

author: ninab101
text: Five star flavor for a five star ice cream brand. I havent been able to find any other brand that can even come close to their flavors. Im definitely a repeat buyer.

author: cayleym44df
text: If you like chocolate chip cookie dough and brownie batter, you HAVE to try this! It is amazing and has giant globs of both all throughout. Seriously worth the price

author: ellementalart
text: If you like cookie dough, like a lot, you will love this! This has way more cookie dough than the average ice cream and its high quality and overall tastes amazing!

author: kaitlynl1
text: If you can’t pick between cookie dough or brownie this is the one you should get!! It’s a mixture between the both and what’s better than that?? Nothing. Go get it!

author: calistag2
text: Im not usually a huge ice cream person but I do love this kind. I dont like paying $5 for it but its worth it. Its a good mix and it can usually last me a few days.

author: jazmink4
text: I love the different textures from the cookie dough to the brownie. It all seems to melt away in one delicious bite. Only thing Id improve on is having a bigger tub

author: auroraj6
text: It tastes just like cookie dough but not that raw. Its very delicious but only to eat for a few minutes. Its a little too sweet. Ive only had it about 2 or 3 times.

author: NoelleWillowGracie
title: Best ice cream ever!
text: This is my longtime favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream. I have tried other flavors but none come close. The huge chunks of cookie dough and brownies are to die for!!

author: amandaf23
text: This is a classic and a staple in my freezer for those comfort food nights...which have been a bit more plentiful as of late with the state of the world right now.

author: ice cream is awesome
title: THIS IS THE BEST ICE CREAM EVER!
text: This ice cream puts all of the best flavors together. The brownies and the cookie dough blend so well. And you can't go wrong with vanilla and chocolate ice cream.

author: sarahsweats
text: If you want a full fat full calorie ice cream, dont reach for anything other than Ben & Jerrys! Nothing else compares to the creaminess and the variety of flavors!

author: saraha317
text: Love this ice cream!! Great size, as its not too big so I can try new flavors often rather than being stuck with a single flavor. However it is a little pricey :/

author: maryjow1
text: I love Ben and Jerry's I've cream. Very rich and creamy. The ingredients are so amazing. Some of the best chocolate ice cream ever. I have repurchased many times.
Honey where do I start. I LOVE half baked brownies and cookies just something about them being in ice-cream makes them even better. I would eat this all the time.

author: ashleyn0230
text: Its the best flavor hands down. I love the little chunks of cookie dough, and the texture of the brownie bites inside it. Its affordable and lasts me a good week.

author: member467da1
text: Perfect combination of Choco chips and chocolate flavor. The crunchiness of chips added some little taste in it. Mouth melting Experience. I love this ice cream.

author: emilyhed58
text: It is one of my favorite ice cream flavors. I am a big cookie dough fan. I find this ice cream to feed my craving of chocolate, cookies, and brownies all in one

author: shannong63
text: I mean this is just such a classic with such a delicious twist ben and Jerry's is still out here making boyfriends look bad everyday with their amazing icecream

author: Anonna
title: Favorite B&J icecream!
text: If you like fudgy brownies and chunks of cookie dough, you'll love this ice cream! Always my go to flavor....I could kill a pint in one sitting with no regrets.

author: bibileigh88
text: This ice cream is a total classic at this point. Its delicious and the company is ethical and absolutely worth giving your money to. We love you Ben and Jerrys!

author: alexisf55
text: A classic. This had been my go to forever and Im sure for many others. When not wanting to try a new flavor but wanting Ben and Jerrys, this is what I will buy.

author: Willp147
title: The best!
text: This is hands down by far my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. My only problem is I can never find it at Ben and Jerry shops. I need to try it with a fresh cone!

author: Willp147
title: The best!
text: This is hands down by far my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. My only problem is I can never find it at Ben and Jerry shops. I need to try it with a fresh cone!

author: realdealsrichlandv
text: Love it!! Best of both worlds. You have cookie dough and brownie. I only buy it when it goes on sale or I have a coupon. I havent found another kind this yummy

author: sarabelle1698
text: Absolutely loveeee this ice cream! My go to favorite flavor. Its so creamy and you can really taste every individual flavor, very affordable highly recommended

author: katied167
text: These ice creams are delicious. The flavors mesh well. They are made with all natural ingredients. However they are just a little bit pricey but, are so good!

author: morganc122
text: Half baked is my second favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. Behind only netflix and chilled. It has brownie dough pieces and cookie dough chunks as well. SO GOOD.

title: My favourite flavour
text: I buy this all the time, it is my favourite ice cream ever. I got some today and there were no cookie dough chunks and it made me so sad I ate the whole pint.

author: shawnaeg
text: Cookie dough? Fudgy brownie bits? Literally what more could you want from ice cream? Half Baked is my FAVORITE Ben & Jerrys flavor and its my ultimate craving

author: adamaryc1
text: I love it, it is one of my favorite ice creams you can make several desserts with this ice cream, I love to share it with my family, it has a delicious flavor

author: nataliam6ed6
text: Its one of my favorites, because its I like it so much, I dont even give a chance to other flavors. I just dont like it as much as tres leches of Haagen dazs.

author: Ayoo
title: WOULD SELL MY SOUL FOR HALF BAKED
text: Favorite for years only recently topped by The Tonight Dough because it's Half Baked on steroids. Ben and Jerry are the two most dependable men in my life :O

author: Chunny
title: The BEST
text: I buy this flavor of Ben & Jerry's all the time. It's a hit with everyone in my family, as well as with my friends, and is probably their best flavor. Ever.

author: meghanf1
text: This is my favourite of all the flavors. Love the mix of chewy brownie and huge chunks of cookie dough. Nice mix of vanilla and chocolate ice cream as well.

author: ktlyman17

author: Impressed28
title: Throw out your other cookies n cream
text:
And don't buy them ever again. It's a waste of your money. Because Ben and Jerry have finally made the best cookies n cream and brought it too the masses. Instead of vanilla icecream with a cookie crumb every now and then, it's jam packed with cookies. It's everything cookies n cream fans have always wanted.
I bought this at my local Walmart last week and was blown away. Finished the pint in 2 days. I went back to the store multiple times, couldn't find it. I've called many other Walmarts. They were all out too. Grab this one while you can! Get two or three even!

author: CameronT
title: Cookies and Cream 2.0
text: Ben & Jerry's has reinvented my favorite basic ice cream flavor, Cookies and Cream. This should just replace all Cookies and Cream flavors everywhere and be the new standard for what is Cookies and Cream. Finally, someone actually put enough cookies in the ice cream. Usually, Cookies and Cream tastes like vanilla ice cream with the ocasional taste of cookie. This seems to be the other way around and I love it. Big cookie pieces! I hope this flavor never goes away.

author: SnackinMom87
title: Omgggg
text: Attn:: So my 6 year old saw this flavor and asked me to buy it, i did. He eats the carton within 2 days saying it was the best he ever tasted, super rare for him to devour ice cream that fast.. Beggs for another carton, I carry on and I go buy another carton for him. Later on my hubby is making a cup for my son and he randomly tasted it. Came to me like babe thats the best cookie and cream ice cream i ever had, ranting and raving... So me going to being nosey in the middle of the night i secures a cup. WHOOOOAAAAA! Blown away with its deliciousness. Needless to say i have to go to the store tomorrow to replace my sons carton LOL. We are all addicted. BNJ PUHHHHLEEEEASEEEE DO NOT GET RID OF THIS FLAVOR! I see those limited edition wrappings! Please don't do it. LOL. Sincerely The Late Night Snackin Mom

author: Icecreamfan4life
title: YAY for B&J making a cookies and cream flavor!!!
text: I picked this up with the Red, White and blueberry shortbread and the The Sweet like sugar new flavor as well a few days ago. And have to say that I was not disappointed at all. I know this is more of a tamer flavor for the company. But I can't help but feel that is what makes this flavor the best. Because there are so many cookies and cream variations out there, that don't always taste the best. And this one definitely does not disappoint with this shopper. Keep it up.

author: Demi252
title: OMG OMG OMG

If you guys bring out Superman ice cream I know that B&J pays attention to their customer base!!

author: Storm660
title: I’m in love
text: I am a cookies and cream connoisseur when it comes to ice cream. This by far what is the best cookies and cream I’ve ever had. The right amount of cookies and vanilla and goodness wrapped into one beautiful pint! Please please please do not stop making this and please have it at more stores because I can only get it at one.

author: Candice
title: My life is complete!
text: I have been waiting for YEARS for Ben and Jerry's to come out with this flavor! It's so amazing! Just letting you know, if you get rid of this flavor after completing said life, I will never buy your ice cream again! Lol

author: Drogers2698
title: Best Flavor Ever
text: I got the last one at the grocery store and it’s absolutely delicious. Never stop making this flavor!

author: Chicksluvrock
title: Whooooa boy
text: I can’t even begin to describe to you how good this is. Forget about all other cookies and cream ice creams. You don’t need other ones anymore. THIS is everything cookies and cream should be. It’s so riddled with cookie crumbs and big cookie chunks it’s a cookie dream come true. You won’t be disappointed with this one! Excellent job Ben & Jerry’s! Never stop making this!

author: Vivicart
title: Best cookies and cream icecream ever!
text: I have been looking for this flavor ever since I heard of its release. I’m a lover of all things cookies and cream and this icecream didn’t disappoint. I hope that this becomes a permanent flavor because it is now my favorite flavor. The flavors are intense and the cookie flavor is so yummy. Please please don’t take this flavor away. The is only one store in my area that carries it so I buy it in threes with no shame. Sooooo freaking good!

author: Tb1214
title: Way better than expected!
text: I picked this up last week at Walmart and I’m glad I did. The best cookies and cream ice cream I’ve ever had. For some reason I wasn’t expecting as good as it was and it blew me away. Hopefully this one never goes away! Definitely pick it up if you’re at a Wal-Mart

author: Bsaucier
title: Simply amazing!!
text: My husband and I could eat this by the gallon if it were available. We can’t even share a pint and always have to buy one each. I can only hope that this flavor becomes widespread and never leaves the line up! We are addicted! :)

author: jasssgee
title: LITERALLY THE BEST B&J EVER
text: Bought this yesterday and I was not disappointed. As an avid Cookies & Cream eater, this looked enticing, but it was SOOO much better than expected. PLEASE do not get rid of this one ever!!!

author: Sandy08
title: So freaking good
text: I brought ice cream Sammie today and let me tell you it’s so good I love it great Job Ben n jerry it is my new favorite definely recommend.

author: Tome002
title: Amazing!!! Hope it stays forever!!!
text: Saw a new product and it was somewhat similar to sweet cream and cookies which i needed to try. It was amazing!!!!!!

author: April173
title: Love it
text: I can't get enough of this ice cream I buy one every time I got to the store and the name has a bit of meaning to me

author: Jen7
title: So good!!
text: Way to go Ben & Jerry’s!! This is the best cookies & cream ice cream!!! Please make it a regular flavor!!

author: Anc323
title: Amazing!
text: Best cookies and cream ice cream I’ve ever had. I hope they make a non-dairy version

author: CookieswirlFORLIFE
title: OMG. YES.
text: I loved the old Vermonty Python ice cream by Ben + Jerry because of the delicious cookie swirl but then they discontinued it. THEN, I liked milk and cookies only for the cookie swirl and would eat around the ice cream just looking for the swirls as the rest was too sweet. NOW this has CHANGED MY ICE CREAM LIFE! Cookie ice cream with cookie swirls, holy moly I am so excited about this. Best B+J ice cream YET. Please keep this one forever!

author: Mrbeast6000
title: Pretty good
text: This ice cream was pretty good, had a nice combo of flavor and a good balance of chocolate.

author: rwright6
title: Best Flavor
text: I’m in love with this ice cream. Ben & Jerry’s is the only ice cream brand that I eat, so I’ve been slowly trying my hand at different flavors. The Tonight Dough, Americone Dream, and Half Baked used to be in a tie for my favorite until I had this. It’s like your classic cookies and cream but BETTER. And I love ice cream sandwiches so that, to me, is the best part. It’s so delicious!

author: Savanna
title: Best cookies and cream!!!
text: This is legit the best cookies and cream ice cream. Probably one of the best pints of ice cream out there.

author: SOT24
title: Best ice cream I’ve ever had
text: I’ve never written a review before, but I had to after eating this. It combines my two favorite things in the world (ice cream sandwiches and sandwich cookies) and jam packs them into a perfect pint. Every spoon has so much of both so you’re never left digging around to get more cookie. PLEASE never stop making this flavor!!

author: Raebirds
title: New Fav...
text: Ben & Jerry’s continues to be my emotional support during this crazy pandemic. This flavor is 1 of 7 pints purchased. I can’t wait to try the other 3 new flavors. Thanks B&J! Also, love this companies stance fondness for equality and justice for all.

author: JamesT
title: So many cookies
text: Best cookies and cream ice cream I’ve had. Does it tastes like a classic ice cream sandwich? Maybe a little/not really? It really doesn’t matter to me. 5/5

author: Hopperstall
title: Best cookies and cream ever
text: Eating this i never thought of an ice cream sandwich but i did feel i was eating the best cookies and cream ever!!!

author: bananni
title: Best “cookies n cream” ever!
text: If you’re a cookies n cream lover, this pint is for you! This is your “life” ice cream! Love this flavor!

author: Sweetheart 37
title: They did it right!
text: I saw this at my local Walmart and had to try it. Very good Ben&Jerry!! This is my new fave!

author: StrawberryAudrey
title: My new favorite
text: I love cookies and cream and this is even better! Yum!

author: Brusso989
title: Great tasting love everything about it
text: I have bought it twice and I’m happy I’m buying it

author: clouds513
title: The best flavor, anyone can fight me on this.
text: I've been buying Milk & Cookies for i don't even know how long. I have to drive 30 minutes total just to go get it because none of my local stores have it. It's officially ruined all other cookies & cream flavored ice creams for me, nothing can top it. I mean, it't got TWO kinds of cookies in it. What??? Man that's a lot of cookie. And you know, every time I buy a pint, I always think "man, is this $4-something-or-other worth it for just one pint?" and every time I get a different brand's cookies and cream flavor I always get my answer. It's absolutely worth it. This will be served at my wedding, and most certainly at my funeral. If anyone comes up to me and tries to convince me there's a better flavor out there, they can expect nothing less than a full on war.

author: Squilly
title: The G.O.A.T
text: I recently came across the Milk&Cookies flavor at my local convenient store and...WOW! If Oreo, Chips Ahoy, Tate's, Milano, and Nutella came together to make the best flavor of ice cream ever, it would not even come close to Milk&Cookies. The only problem is that I am becoming addicted and it is starting to affect my social life. Although my girlfriend dumped me and my friends no longer want to spend time with me, I will never stop eating Milk&Cookies Ice Cream. I am willing to take out a mortgage in order to purchase Milk&Cookie Ice Cream in larger quantities. Thank you Ben. Thank you Jerry.

author: Phish Food Fan
title: One yummy flavor
text: This is just what I was hoping for tonight. I love Ben and Jerry’s chocolatey, caramely, marshmallowy gooie flavors the most but tonight I wanted something different. I wanted exactly what Milk and Cookies delivered; a delicious vanilla ice cream with cookie swirls. No fudge chunks or nuts or oozey mix ins this time (even though that’s my favorite). Just a perfect ‘dry’ blend of cookie swirls and excellent vanilla ice cream. I will get this one every time I need a break from the Phish Food, Karamel Sutra and peanut butter fudge cores of the world. Awesome flavor!

author: Rocko13
title: THE BEST - Just needs to be in more stores
text: I was going to give it 5-stars, because it's BY FAR the best ice cream flavor that I've ever tasted! However, Milk & Cookies isn't available in a lot of stores, so it's definitely a challenge to find sometimes. Our local Whole Foods is really the only place that carries it. But, if you can find it, TRY IT! You won't be disappointed!

author: layla
title: LOVE!
text: I've been buying Ben & Jerry's for ages now, but I've never really been consistent with a certain flavor. I've always kept buying new ones to try. I'm on vacation in Florida, and found the Milk & Cookies one in the local grocery store and HAD to try it. Needless to say, we went back and grabbed 3 more the next day!

author: Brighton
title: The best flavor!
text: I tried this flavor once because they were out of my past fav- Cookie Dough. This one is a million times better! The cookies are amazing. The ice cream is amazing. Everything together is awesome. Thank you Ben and Jerry's for an awesome flavor. I could eat 20 pints of this.

author: Chelle8
title: THE BEST. EVERRR.
text: I am the lady who will buy up the whole store if I see cookies & milk B&J ice cream on the shelf. I ate 2 pints in one day once! It all started, they were out of cookie dough (my old favorite) so decided to try the next best cookie thing on the shelf. Boy was I GLAD I did. It became my new favorite INSTANTLY. It’s so good though I have to really warm folks that you may NEVER want another flavor again. That’s what’s happened to me going on 3 years now since discovering it. My only problem with it is I’m mad I didn’t find out about it sooner!! I LOVE EVERY BUT ABOUT! 100 thumbs up!!! MMMMMM

author: Sfnelly420
title: Great combination!
text: LOVE THIS ICE CREAM! Its the perfect combination.!! Thank you Ben & Jerrys

author: liv1
title: The absolute best Ben & Jerry's flavor
text: Every time I get ice cream this is the flavor I reach for, some people think it's a boring flavor but that is in no way accurate. It combines my favorite flavors, cookie dough and cookie's & cream creating the ultimate ice cream. With no overpowering crazy flavors, it took classic flavors and made them better. Ice cream will truly never taste the same - big shoutout to both Ben and Jerry for this one. (also it's a great post-run dessert)

author: juliew99
title: New Favorite
text: I had always been strictly Half Baked or Americone Dream, until I tried Milk & Cookies when all others were sold out. Needless to say I found a new reigning favorite. Nothing can compare to the gooey-ness of the cookie swirls - NOTHING. I fell very strongly about this ice cream flavor and I will defend its title as the best Ben & Jerry’s flavor.

title: My favorite
text: I’m not the type of person to sit and eat a bowl of ice cream but with this flavor I can eat a whole pint, it the best ice cream flavor I have ever had, my boyfriend and I have to drive 30 min away just to buy it because no local stores carry it.. My boyfriend is an ice cream lover and he even says this is the best ice cream ever.

author: klok
title: #1 best flavor
text: I ordered an unspecified pint of Ben & Jerry's from the deli and my delivery guy gave me this gem. I fell in love. It was fate <3

author: FuzzyGut
title: Pretty good pint
text: I love Ben and Jerry’s and I have for a LONG time. Over the last several months, I’ve decided to spoon my way through every flavor I can get in my area or online and last night was Milk and Cookies. It was definitely yummy but not my favorite. The cookie swirls were GREAT! The vanilla ice cream was for some reason not my favorite. I think a chocolate milk and cookies would be better. And I love Ben and Jerry’s vanilla a lot. All in all, this was a good pint but I like a lot of other flavors more.

author: jasmineg853
title: If you love cookies, you'll LOVE THIS!
text: My husband and I have a pint B&Js probably every 3 days. This one is such a hit! We love Half Baked but this one is like a soft cookie sundae. My favorite is getting those little chocolate chips in the mix, it just adds another layer of something already fantastic. It would be dope if there were full sized mini chocolate chips instead of the micro ones. Either way, great flippin' ice cream!

author: Haley g
title: My one true love
text: I have a deep and intense love for this ice cream. If I could marry it, I would. B&Js best ice cream flavor by a long shot, and they never skimp on the fix ins. All my friends write it off as just a regular cookies and cream ice cream but NO! This is so much more than that. I would like to be buried in a coffin shaped like a B&Js pint of Milk & Cookies ice cream. That is all.

author: Icrissyc
title: Give it a try !
text: I found myself wanting ice cream one day and I found this flavor in one of my local stores. I thought it would be strange with 2 different cookies , boy was I wrong ! Definetly one of my favorites of not my top favorite. Besides who's not in the mood for milk and cookies !?! You'd just be crazy if you said you weren't. HIGHLY suggest this flavor you will not regret it !

author: groovy
title: CREAM de la creme!
text: I have been getting milk & cookies for years now and when I run out, I HAVE to restock. I don’t normally even have a sweet tooth, but there’s just something about the texture and taste of the cookies mixed with this ice cream! Milk & Cookies is my all time favorite ice cream and I always make my friends try it. You should too!

author: Stephanie A
title: Recipe Suggestion
text: This is literally the best ice cream flavor I have ever had! I'm actually eating it as I write this review. I just have one suggestion for the recipe...ADD MORE CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIES!!!! This is a 10/10 ice cream flavor, but it would be a 20/10 if there were more chocolate chip cookie chunks in it!

author: ChrisColby
title: Cookies. Cookies everywhere.
text: Quite possibly the most accurate name for an ice cream flavor. Tastes exactly like cookies dipped in milk. The vanilla base is appropriately subtle enough to let the cookies shine, while adding the creaminess when melting. If there is one flaw, it's in the chocolate chocolate chip cookies which strangely taste a bit fruity. But that might just be me. Great flavor regardless.

author: Tanabear
title: Cookie chunks!
text: This is my favorite flavor. I get it anytime I am able! I love the swirls of cookie and the huge chunks of cookie that you get mixed in. I don't like cookie dough in ice-cream, so this works superbly. I love that it includes both chocolate cookies and chocolate chip cookies.

author: shanelee266
title: This cookie swirl is a game changer
text: My favorite flavor changes every year or so. Milk & Cookies is this years. What's the point of buying boring cookie dough flavor when this is available? The cookie swirl works so well and is such a great addition to the TWO kinds of cookie dough in this delicious blend.

author: iamironman
title: Dude. This is the best ice cream ever.
text:
This is the best ice cream I have ever had in my life. This ice cream makes me feel like I’m ten again and its the year 2000. The flavor is comparable to:
- Receiving a surprise puppy.
- Playing man-hunt outside with your friends in the middle of the summer.
- The feeling you get when you can finally click “skip ad” on Pandora and YouTube.

author: grinch
title: Simply the Best
text: I have not bought another ice cream in years. This is the best ice cream available in a pint that I have ever had. I have not even gotten sick of this ice cream. The two types of cookies (especially the light one) is absolutely delicious!

author: Andreadiana
title: A nod to your childhood
text: I picked up my first pint of Milk & Cookies a few years ago during a particularly hard time in my life. It was like a soothing balm during my emotional crisis. Could it be because it brings back a sense memory of better childhood times? Possibly. Or could it be because it is so darn tasty. I'm going with the latter. I have to really search my local stores for it and in the rare moments when they do have this flavor I buy multiple pints at once and look like a crazy woman. Thanks B&J. Thank you.

author: PhoenixRises
title: I just found this gem!
text: Recently I went to a store that didn't have any of my usual favorites, so I grabbed this one just to see what it was like. I know I love cookies, and cookie sundaes so I would probably like it. I'm not a fan of cookie dough ice cream (I like it plain, but not in my ice cream), so I was glad it was regular cookie pieces. It was amazing! I love the chocolate cookie swirls and the chocolate chip cookie pieces. It's only sold at certain stores, so that's the only downside, but it's a new favorite.

author: Freethebrowniebits
title: Delicious, so good! Mmm!
text: I bought this for the first time the other day and boy was I in for it. I used to get the fudge brownie but they were always skimpin on the brownie bits. And now here I am, writing a review about ice cream!!!!!

author: Draper
title: Five star flavor profile!
text: Milk & Cookies is in my top five of favorites from Ben & Jerry’s. The marrying of high quality vanilla ice cream and three types of cookies is a delectable treat sure to satisfy anyone’s sweet tooth.

author: Zach21
title: Best flavor ever
text: Milk & Cookies is the best ice cream flavor you will ever buy. I could eat pints and pints of this. You HAVE to try it! HIGHLY recommend!!!

author: Alaecia12
title: Life altering!
text: The Tonight Dough was previously my favorite, but Milk and Cookies tops the charts! I could eat a scoop or two every day!

author: Bellaandjerrys
title: Classic and delicious
text: This ice cream is one of my favorite bnj flavors. I would describe it as a mix of cookie dough and cookies and cream.

author: Shannon H
title: How do I give this more than 5 stars?
text: I once drove almost two hours for a pint of milk and cookies because the grocery store was out of it. Enough said.

author: ChilliedLaura
title: The Wife's Favorite
text: This is one my wife just cannot pass up! Thank you Ben & Jerry for this wonderful get out of jail free card.

author: kayli
title: My addiction.
text: BEST ice cream in the universe. Never buying anything else.

author: Vsalas2
title: Cookies cookies cookies
text: I’m a happy huge cookie fan so this ice cream is amazing!

author: Kuhree
title: My absolute favorite !!!!
text: I remember the first time I bought Milk and Cookies on a whim, and I consumed that first pint within minutes.

author: Kristy
title: Milk & cookies yummmmmyyyy
text: I buy this flavor every time I go to the store but it was sold out for almost a month I legit went everyday to see if they had gotten milk & cookies and I left with a sad face. I even went to another store, and guess what?? They didn't have it either I went to 3 other stores and nope nope and nope but finally the other day boom they had it ugh I'm enjoying some now as I write ugh I'm in love..... the best

author: bec99
title: best combo!!
text: Ever since I found this flavor it is the only flavor I will buy. It is the perfect combination of different cookies and only has vanilla ice cream which is different from most flavors and that is a big pro in my eyes. Hands down the best Ben & Jerry’s flavor ever and even though it’s hard for me to find sometimes it is always worth it! Definitely worth straying from your go-to flavor to try this one out!

author: Mymy
title: Favorite Flavor of all Time
text: This is my absolute favorite flavor of ice cream. Taking the spot from the former champion, green mint chocolate chip, this is the best ice cream I have ever put in my mouth. When I ended a long term relationship and was feeling a bit down, my roommate and her boyfriend went to 6 stores to fine one of these to bring to me. It was the b st cure for a broken heart I ever had.

author: mpg1904
title: Lacking chocolate cookie swirl
text: I’ve had this flavor before and it was delicious but recently I purchased it again and it wasn’t great. My favorite part of this ice cream is the chocolate cookie swirl and unfortunately there was barely any in this pint! The cookie swirl was only in about a quarter of the pint and the rest was the vanilla ice cream with barely any cookie pieces! Very disappointing

author: Lboogie
title: Usually the best Ben & Jerry’s getting cheap!
text: I have always loved milk and cookies and buy it ALL the time. Recently I have noticed a dramatic decrease in the amount of cookie in the container, it’s mostly just plain vanilla icecream. Very disappointed.. for the top of the line ice cream at almost $6 a pint this is unacceptable.

author: icecreamfan10
title: Best Flavor!
text: Eating a pint of this ice cream is more satisfying than having actual milk and cookies. This is the best flavor, and yes this is the hill I've chosen to die on. The ice cream is loaded with delicious cookies and chocolate swirls. The milky flavor penetrates the cookies themselves. I hope this flavor is never discontinued because I'd be beyond upset.

author: atik
title: Cookies n Cream 2.0
text: Cookies n cream is an old time favorite for a lot of people me included, and it's not easy to make a simple, old time favorite even better, but Ben and Jerry's managed to do just that. They don't skimp on the cookie mix ins, and I haven't seen any other cookies n cream ice cream like this one. This is one of my top three flavors.

author: DC24
title: What Cookies and Cream Should Be.
text: I love this flavor! It is what cookies and cream should taste like, but seldom does. It is grounded in Ben & Jerry's awesome vanilla with just the right amount of intense chocolate cookie flavor. Honestly, it is hard to describe why this ice cream is so delicious. It just Is! This flavor surpassed my expectations.

author: SamIAm
title: The best ice cream you will ever eat
text: When I tried this ice cream fro the first time my life changed. No flavor can ever live up to it. I feel like a kid again when I eat this ice cream. It seems to not be stocked at most places which is so frustrating and the only downside to this flavor. Try this asap and you'llnever go back to any other flavor.

author: Neanea500
title: New Favorite Ice Cream
text: I used to eat Half Baked, but the grocery store I was at was out....So I picked this up. This is the best Ice Cream I have ever had!!!! I est cookies and ice cream often because it is my favorite dessert but this is just amazing!!! Now my dad loves it. Too bad they dont sell it at any of the walmarts near me.

title: Holy deliciousness!!
text: The only reasoning I have to be disappointed is the fact that I didn't try this flavor sooner!! It is chocked full of cookie bits and has become my new favorite. I can only hope they make this vegan by the time I transition back or I'll be pining for it. For now, I'll be enjoying whenever possible.

author: judy808
title: Taste good but
text:
It taste great not too sweet (other B&J are too sweet for me) taste even better than haagen dazs's cookie and cream, but i am disappointed that the ingredients have:
CANOLA OIL, SOYBEAN OIL, BUTTEROIL, TAPIOCA STARCH, GUAR GUM & CARRAGEENAN.
i am not sure if i will buy again.

author: McKayla
title: Delicious
text: I bought this flavor for a change and it pleasantly surprised me. It is a great option for cookie lovers. I'm more of a peanut butter cup girl myself, but this flavor did not disappoint. The only thing I would have changed would be to add more Chunks of chocolate chip cookie!

author: Bridgespo99997
title: Could be amazing!
text: Tastes exactly like cookies and milk! Really good. I wish the cookies were a bit more like cookie dough, but overall it's a very good flavor.

author: jennyr
title: Disappointed
text: I decided to pick this ice cream flavor for my first time trying Ben and Jerry's because of all the good reviews associated with it but I was extremely disappointed. The flavor was too bland for my taste. I don't think I will be buying this again in the near future.

author: Mclopez
title: Never eating another flavor again!!
text: I usually do half baked but decided to try Milk & Cookies a try. It is DEFINITELY a game changer - I'm never buying anything else. I've been talking about it nonstop at work and to my friends. I gave one of my friends some to try and they were obsessed too!

author: Josh from VT
title: Good ice cream, but big hole
text: The ice cream and cookie chunks were fantastic, but there was a big air socket in the bottom of my pint which resulted in ~30% of the ice cream being left missing. Great ice cream otherwise, but will have to subtract a star for the missing ice cream :(

author: anjenkins
title: Everything I Want in a Pint
text: This is hands down my favorite flavor. It has the perfect balance of vanilla and chocolate, the perfect texture balance between soft cookie dough & crunchy chocolate chips. This is my go to after a long week and will forever be my first choice.

author: DaveO
title: Hands Down the Best Flavor of Ben and Jerry's
text: I cannot get enough of this ice cream flavor! Between the "Oreo" and chocolate chip cookie each bite is delicious. I go through at least one a week and am fortunate the corner store stocks this flavor. I hope they never get rid of this!

author: JoangleBook
title: Never Stop Making This Flavor
text: I've recommended this flavor to several of my friends now, and they've all become obsessed with it. You should make a dairy free version of this flavor, because everyone needs to be able to enjoy this Mona Lisa of the frozen dessert world.

author: Missy6
title: Perfection in a pint!
text: Obsessed! This is the perfect blend of ingredients in 1 pint! Perfect chocolate cookie w vanilla ice cream and fudge swirls! Perfect balance! Always sells out at my grocery local grocery stores! Please never stop making this!!!

author: Leems123
title: Amazing flavor!
text: This is one of my favorite ben and jerry's flavor ever! The cookies just melt in my mouth and it takes me back to my childhood of when I dipped my cookies in milk. Hands down, one of the best flavors ever. I love it so much!!!

author: Kidaboo94
title: The best thing I've ever tasted!
text: Seriously, it's THAT good. Just a perfect swirl or crunchy chocolatey cookie ribbon, chocolate chip cookies, and vanilla ice cream. I eat pints several days in a row. I absolutely LOVE this ice cream. It is my #1 fave ever!

author: bean12345678910
title: I LOVE THIS WITH MY WHOLE HEART
text: this is my favorite ice cream flavor. Me and my bff sam Stan mink and cookies. We highly recommend for anything from a brake ups to celebrating amazing achievements to just treating yourself. MILK AND COOKIES IS THE BOMB!!!

author: bananni
title: Best Current Flavor!!
text: Milk and Cookies is by far my favorite flavor B & J have out right now. (My all time faves are retired :(...) It brings the best of cookies&cream and choc chip cookie dough into one fabulous pint. Go find one now!!

author: Joey
title: Best Ben & Jerry's flavor
text: This flavor is so good, I have the worst guilt every time I eat it. If there's a way to get a lifetime supply of it, I am highly interested, so that if I ever become homeless, I'd have the ice cream to fall back on

author: Sweetlola
title: Great features, satisfying appearance
text: I’ve been buying this nonstop ever since I tried it 3 months ago. I’m always upset when they’ve ran out at my local grocery store, however I’m in love with the crunchiness, the creaminess and how yummy it is.

author: J3NNA
title: Best B&J flavor hands down!
text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this flavor. When ever I venture out and try a new flavor, I always also buy this as my backup plan. I just cant let it go! It's so good!!! Thank you Ben & Jerrys! Please never ever go!

author: Mia528
title: ABSOLUTE BEST FLAVOR OF ALL TIME
text: During my pregnancy I craved ice cream almost every day. My husband knows how much I love cookies and so he brought this flavor home one evening. I have been absolutely OBSESSED ever since!!!

author: witchchrist
title: Addicted to this
text: As much as I looooooove this ice cream as a cookies and cream addict, could it be possible to turn this flavor into a nondairy pint? I would die of happiness and not lactose intolerance lol

author: spookym
title: Vanilla flavored milk?
text: Almost got this one right. I never dunked my cookies in vanilla flavored milk when I was a kid. I think a simple sweet cream/no flavor ice cream would have been closer to the real thing.

author: Mlis27
title: A favorite
text: I think this is my favorite ben and jerrys at the moment. I love pretty much any with the chocolate cookie mixed in. I agree with some others, I wish it were carried in more stores.

author: IceCreamPrincess
title: Top 5!
text: I don't like milk but I love this milk and cookies! It has real cookies infused with the ice cream giving you a taste of heaven. I love this flavor. Easily anyone's top 5 ice cream.

author: TeamGill
title: So good except...
text: I really love this flavor but I have to pick out the Chocolate Chocolate Chip cookie pieces. Tastes soooooo gross! Almost manly. Like an old mans cologne. Very strange.

author: Keda
title: My all time favorite!!
text: I absolutely love this ice cream. I always try new flavors, but I always grab this one as well. The easiest way to my heart, is with a pint of milk and cookies.

author: Hroehr1256
title: The Best Flavor
text: Milk and Cookies is not just Ben & Jerry's best flavor it is the best ice cream EVER!!! It is my go to ice cream now. Never go without a pint in my freezer.

author: KatB
title: One of my all-time favorite flavors!
text: This ice cream has no mix-ins, only swirls, but it's so loaded with cookie swirls that it's delicious! This is easily one of Ben and jerry's best flavors!

author: nikithebaddest
title: JUST WOW
text: i discovered this flavor at a gas station an hour away from me and i got hooked. 10/10 WOULD RECOMMEND. me and my sister finished 4 pints in a day.

author: dudagarcez
title: Da best!
text: Everytime I see a Ben and Herry’s this is my go to choice whenever I don’t feel like risk it! Love the cookies, love the flavour!!! ♥️ Super yummy!

author: beech
title: Uuuuuuuunnnnggghhh
text: Honestly how can you go wrong? It’s like the perfect mushy milk-dunked homemade cookie BUT ICE CREAM?! Genius. Move over classic cookie dough.

author: moonyandthestar
title: Cookies and Cream 2.0
text: I love me some Ben and Jerry’s, but this flavor takes the cake (haha, dessert joke) because it is new and improved cookies and cream. So good.

author: Aleksandra
title: My Favorite!
text: This flavor has been my favorite for the past couple of years! Sometimes I would switch to other B&J flavors but soon I would be back to it!

author: SamanthaN
title: The best
text: After not being able to find boom chocolata anymore, i tried this wonderful flavor since it seemed closest. So good. Never disappoints.

author: kris2
title: Favorite Childhood Ice Cream
text: Tastes just like milk and cookies, there are multiple types of cookies, and it brings me back to childhood memories, A+

author: tootie
title: The best ice cream I ever had
text: This is the best ice cream I ever had in my whole life. It was so good I took time out of my day to write this review.

author: Soph
title: Only flavor I’ll eat!!
text: I always look for this flavor in target. I can finish the whole pint in one sitting and I only feel half guilty:)))))

author: turtle8
title: The most amazing flavor!!!
text: I have been a fan ever since the flavor appeared. I share my love for milk and cookies with all whom I come across.

author: RC06
title: Delicious
text: Best ice cream flavor EVER, hands down. Flavor is spot on with its name. Tastes just like milk and fresh cookies.

author: Cookielover32
title: The best Ice cream in tha world!
text: Has the perfect balance between chocolate cookies and vanilla ice cream... I can pay any price for this....

author: Lucke310
title: Wow great flavors
text: This is my go to when I get Ben & Jerry’s ice cream it’s now my new favorite or at least one of them

author: jesseash
title: best ice cream ever
text: The crunchy oreos are amazing! I just ate a whole pint myself sooo worth the calories. just wow

author: Memah
title: My favorite!!
text: This is my favorite ice cream ever. Although, the only place that sells it is 45 minutes away.

author: neverseenitbefore
title: Best ice cream in the whole world
text: There I said it. I am an ice cream connoisseur. There is none better (mass produced, that is).

author: Taeko
title: Best Flavor!
text: This is my favorite ice cream flavor of all time! Tastes like an ice cream cookie sandwich

author: Janel
title: So delicious!
text: What a great flavor! It has that great cookie crumble that I love + cookie dough...mmmm!

author: miagua45
title: AMAZE BEANS
text: This ice cream never lets me down. The flavor tastes just like my grandmothers cookies.

author: Kensington
title: YUMMY!
text: My favorite ice cream of all time! Honestly it's like cookie dough ice cream on crack.

author: Nicole64
title: Yumm...
text: One of my favorites so good! I love the chocolate chip cookie ingredient vs oreos!

author: Melll
title: Please never retire!
text: I have found ice cream peace. How is it im just trying now? This stuff is AMAZING.

author: Candiemarie
title: My all time fave
text: Obsessed! My absolute favorite flavor by Ben and jerry and I have tried a ton!

author: Mathi
title: The best ice cream
text: Definitely the best ben & jerry’s I’ve had. Really good taste and combination

author: mb711
title: Not great
text: I was very disappointed in this flavor. I couldn’t even finish the tub. :(

author: Jaredh94
title: Absolutely amazing!!!!!!
text: It’s been my favorite for a long time. It’s extremely mouth watering

author: Neka
title: Delicious
text: I'm hooked on this flavor.... just tried it a week ago!!!!

author: True87
title: Fav
text: Looooooove this flavor its one of the best I have ever had

author: Bree
title: Love it!
text: Always my go to! Can't find any ice cream that's better!

author: lele2007
title: great taste
text: I buy this ice cream every Thursday. It is the best.

author: KCantrell
title: The BEST!
text: The best flavor hands down! This is my go to flavor.

author: Vinosheknoe
title: Best in the world
text: This is my favorite Icecream in the whole wide world. POINT BLANK PERIOD. I drive 5 miles to the closest store that carries it atleast 1 a week which is a good thing as if it were closer is probably eat it everyday. Amazing job on this one guys!

author: Fortnighticecreamlover69
title: YUMMY!
text: It's been a while since I've bought this ice cream because I can't find it in my local grocery store but I love this flavor so much! I ate two pints in one sitting! My doctor says I need to stop buying Ben and Jerrys because of my diabetes but I can't stop! Aaahhh! I love this ice cream so much that I have to sneak it in the house because my family tries to hide it from me. I've stopped eating regular food and I basically just eat ice cream every meal. This has to be one of my favorite flavors after half baked! Thank you for your service, Ben and Jerry!

author: Mint4Lyfe
title: My favorite!
text: Literally my favorite ice cream out of all of the ice cream I've eaten in the world. Sometimes it's hard to find at certain stores, but I'll climb through a freezer door to search for it. #NoShame

author: mintchocolover
title: Childhood Favorite
text: This is my go to flavor whenever I buy Ben & Jerrys! I love how big the chocolate cookie chunks are!

author: James256
title: Used to be my favorite
text: This has always been my favorite but the last 3 pints I have bought have had almost no chocolate cookie chunks! This is very upsetting as this is my favorite ice cream and my favorite park is the cookie chunks. I instead have been left with mint ice cream with a few spattering of what looks like cookie crumbs. For the high price of B&Js I expected more.

author: jcvt
title: my favorite flavor
text: I really like this flavor, it is super awesome! For real, my favorite.

author: Fwiffo
title: Yumo
text: I like big chunks of cookie & I cannot lie. Unlike the cookie dust that's typical of most cookies & cream, my pint had about three quarter cookie sized pieces & many more respectable sized chunks besides. & of course chocolate & mint play nice together.

author: Mareday
title: Love of my life
text: Me and this flavor have been going strong for 10+ years in fact it’s been my “gateway” flavor which lured me into supporting this company and branching out to find new flavors I love (such as justice remix, oatmeal cookie etc..) it’s super refreshing with thick Oreo pieces and doesn’t have that weird green color other companies add

author: Chunk Lover
title: Chocolate cookies where?
text: As a chunk fan who loves half baked, I recently decided to stop loyally buying my pints of Half Baked and gave this flavor a try. I read it was supposed to have big, generous sized cookie pieces all throughout the pint. Well, my pint didn't have a single big cookie chunk! It was just very small crumbles and mainly mint ice cream. I'm so disappointed! I was expecting this to be the ultimate ice cream for chunk lovers based on what I heard. :(

author: BJfan4life
title: Yummy but disappointing
text: I was so excited to finally try the Mint Chocolate Cookie ice cream. I'm a huge mint chocolate chip fan, mint ice cream fan in general. But with the concoctions that B&J puts together to make some of the best ice cream flavors around, this flavor is disappointing. I would have expected chocolate chunks, swirls of chocolate, or even the Andes mint chocolates that are sold in stores. But this is basically cookies n cream ice cream with mint flavor. The ice cream isn't even green. Yes it's still yummy, but doesn't live up to what Ben & Jerry's is capable of throwing together.

author: Nicki237
title: Amazing!!!
text: I bought this flavor yesterday at Walgreens for $6.94 and I must say this flavor is ADDICTING! It’s so good. Ben & Jerry’s knows the perfect balance. The mint flavor is clean and authentic and not sickeningly sweet and artificial and it’s not green like most mint ice creams. Plus, the cookies in here are big pieces, the more I ate through the pint, the bigger the cookie pieces got. It’s as if Cookies & Cream Icecream, York Peppermint patty & Oreos had a baby. I just wish it wasn’t so expensive! I need coupons so I can stock up on this flavor! PLEASE Don’t ever get rid of it!

author: Mquinn
title: No cookies :(
text: First time trying this flavor and it wasn’t good. There were no cookie pieces at all. I kept waiting to get to the bottom and still no cookies. The bottom was even hollow so 1/4 of the container just had nothing but air.

author: Maybeillhaveonemorebite
title: So so so good
text: I don't write reviews, or didn't prior to today...I love this ice cream so much, it encompasses everything about a mint and chocolate cookie combination that makes me dream about eating more and more and more. I would live inside my pint if I could, build a little mint ice cream igloo with a cookie door, eat my way out and rebuild

author: MintBinch
title: Holy Grail of Pints
text: I check for this flavor every single time I'm in an ice cream isle, even if I'm not buying ice cream that day. I *scout* for it, all over the US. And I almost NEVER find it. I found the first pint in the last five years and it's still the best ice cream pint there is. Fresh but decadent but light but chomky. The fricken best.

author: Smrtgrl1231
title: Great Ice Cream.....but
text: This was my favorite ice cream flavor of all time. Always bought this flavor whenever I could find it. But, unfortunately now, its made with coconut oil and I'm allergic to coconut. I wish I would've looked at the container before purchasing it. I did look at the website before going to the store, and didn't see coconut oil in the ingredients. Maybe the website needs to be updated?? Would be more vigilant next time at the store and read all products. Ben & Jerry's does make great ice cream, I just got to be more proactive and always double check.

author: Nate
title: The mint flavor that is forever leading you on.
text: At first bite I could taste a mellow mint flavor over what is otherwise Chocolate Cookie Vanilla Ice Cream; sadly I sat there eating the rest of the pint not out of enjoyment but out of a desperate attempt to acquire the elusive mint flavor that was lacking. Long story short, I ate the entire pint and was disappointed not only in this flavor but myself. Also the texture was missing that of a chewy/crunch found only in a chocolate chip; if you are looking for that added chocolaty textured greatness the cookie alone will not bring you any solace.

author: Evelyn
title: Taste Bud Satisfactory!
text: I like big chunks and I cannot lie! You other B&J fans can't deny! Well, most of you- my friend prefers sorbet. Anyway, ever since Mint Oreos have been put on the shelves, they've been my favorite flavor! So when I saw this at my grocery store, I did a happy dance in the frozen aisle. The peppermint is to die for, and the chocolate sandwich cookies are like oreos! You did it again, B&J.

author: FuzzyGut
title: Best mint chocolate ice cream around!
text: My wife and I are both mint chocolate ice cream fans so when we found this one at the store, we had to try it. First off, the mint ice cream: rich, creamy, minty and delicious. And the mint tastes natural. Sometimes other brand’s mint tastes so artificial. Next, not satisfied with chips, this ice cream gives you whole cream-filled cookies! Awesome awesome stuff.

author: mintlover12
title: a classic!!
text: as a mint lover i can truthfully say that this is one of the best! my mom buys this one for me all the time though there are usually very little left in store. i highly recommend this one! much better than minter wonderland which is an abomination to this planet(see my review):) i would add an image of a happy gamer but the stock images are invalid lol

author: Foreversienna
title: Not enough chunks
text: I read several review on the good size of chunks and Great flavors. So when I was at my local supermarket and I saw this flavor I decided to step away from my usual purchase of phish food and half baked. But unfortunately I was very disappointed. There were no large chunks like reviews said. I am hoping thsi was a manufacturing error of some sort but the small pieces I did taste were also odd tasting.

author: Spocksdottir
title: Excellent
text: I don't enjoy chocolate chunks/chips in cold foods, but I like mint ice cream so much that I have bought mint chocolate chip ice cream, grudgingly eating around cocoa clusters. Thanks to Ben & Jerry's, there are no longer any obstacles to my enjoymint! Cookies are texturally lovely in this minty pint.

author: TheTyGuy
title: I can’t stop eating it!
text: Look. Ben, Jerry, Ben & Jerry, whatever you two go by, this ice cream is too good. You’ve got me hooked like I’ve never been hooked on ice cream before, and I can’t see any end in sight. How did it happen? I don’t know, but what I do know is I can’t complain.

author: Bridgespo99997
title: Decent
text: It's good overall, I wish they had a plain cookies and creme or a Mint Chocolate Chip. Similar to a thin-mint from the Girl Scouts. Not a favorite with me.

author: SeeairuhBuzzbee
title: ICE CREAM!!
text: This is the best ice cream don’t @ me. I’m allergic to milk but I am willing to risk it all for this ice cream anytime I can find it.

author: Pints4Dayzzz
title: Mint Chocolate Ecstacy
text: My first pint of MCC (“Mint Chocolate Cookie”) changed my outlook on life and I haven’t looked back since. Strongly recommend.

author: coclico
title: Disgustingly good.
text: The mint cookie is truly the most supreme ice cream flavor ever invented: not too minty, not too chocolatey... perfect distribution of ingredients, and don't get me started on the exquisite texture. It's unfortunate that I have to eat the whole pint in one sitting. I recently moved to a city with a store that has this magnificent flavor stocked almost every day. The previous place I lived... there was some sort of shortage. I could only find it in random stores once or twice a year. SO, you'd think this is a GOOD thing: that I now have access to my favorite flavor almost every day. Guys, this is a HORRIBLE thing. The store near me is also open 24 hours... you get the picture. So, I declare to anyone who reads these things: TODAY IS MY LAST DAY TO TASTE AND ENJOY THIS SUPERB AMBROSIA> I'm kicking it... tomorrow.

author: Jpocket
title: The Best Pint there is..
text: This was my go to Pint. It is disappearing from stores. please don't retire this flavor.

author: tillysandy73
title: Best mint ice cream
text: This ice cream flavor is one of my reasons to live, no joke

author: parliamentp
text: Mint chocolate chip is my absolute favorite flavor of ice cream. I don’t eat ice cream very often, but this is definitely a go-to. This ice cream even takes it a step further by having a cookies and cream twist. i was surprised the first time I had opened it because I thought maybe the label was wrong, but when I dug in, I could not be happier. Definitely check this out if you want a twist on the your favorite mint chocolate or cookies and cream.

author: DaiJa36
title: My Freakin Fav!
text: Ben & Jerry's is my favorite Ice Cream Brand. I recommend this to all my friends because I firmly believe that this Ice Cream will rule the nation. Therefore, my friends eat with appreciate that Ben & Jerry will rule the world. I have created an cult for this amazing business and we pray everyday with this Ice Cream. Sometimes in this because we love the smell of this ice cream. So I thank you, Ben & Jerry. I Love you.

author: Maria32
title: Adult version of Mint Chip.
text: I love it! Would love to see it swirled with natural peanut butter. This is my favorite flavor!

author: Valod
title: disappointed...
text: Bought it yesterday, was rly excited to give it a try. however, had almost no cookies and was mostly stuffed with mint ice cream. The mint taste was vigorous to an extent of repulsion.... had to throw it away half way... very dissapointing!!

author: Anna
title: Slight tweaks could really improve
text: I love this flavor, I love chocolate cookies in everything. But recently I've noticed the cream filling of the cookies has a really weird, unpleasant texture...kind of hard and crumbly. No one is here for the filling anyway, get rid of that! Also a few pints I've gotten have had almost whole cookies in there. Not easy to eat, break them up more! If you did these two things, this flavor would be A+.

author: Rocko13
title: No Good - Disappointed - Pass on this Flavor
text: Was excited to try a new flavor of Ben & Jerry's, but I just ended up being super disappointed in Mint Chocolate Chip. It had a very, VERY strong mint flavor and almost no chocolate cookies, it was very strange. Maybe I just got a bad pint, which is very possible, because this was just no good. I wish I would have spent that money on a different flavor.

author: Hat City
title: Gross!!
text: Since Mint Chip isn't available by the pint, and no scoop shops exist where I live, I tried this flavor and was beyond disappointed. The cookies are disgusting, it tasted like soggy Oreos coated in toothpaste and glue. I will never buy another pint, unless Mint Chip miraculously becomes available.

author: Kiki123456
title: Really disappointed
text: So I just bought this today and from the reviews I was expecting a lot of cookie chunks. I guess I was wrong because after eating half the pint I got ZERO cookie chunks just some very disappointing specks of cookie. The mint taste is also VERY strong to the point where you start feeling sick. I’m really disappointed with this ice cream and I REALLY don’t recommend it.

author: Iheartmint
title: No, thank you!
text: I recently bought Ben & Jerry's - Mint Chocolate Cookie ice cream. Unfortunately, this ice cream did not taste like mint.

author: anju8776
text: Ben & Jerry's really nailed it with this ice cream. It is so good! Ben & Jerry's is known for their quality and this is no exception.A excellent mint taste and ice cream treat. I just wish they would include more mint cookie pieces.This has become my new favorite ice cream. The mint and Oreo cookies are a perfect combination.

author: brooke
title: why tf is it not green ??????
text: Im sorry, maybe i dont know how to read, but im pretty sure this says MINT chocolate chip ice cream?? am i wrong? this simply looks like oreos in vanilla ice cream, which is obviously VERY BORING and no where near exciting as MINT chocolate chip. i dont even want to buy this after seeing these photos. #disappointed.

author: danibreann
text: Big fan of Ben and Jerry's ice cream. Cookies and cream is one of my favorite ice cream flavors, and adding the mint cookies takes it to the next level. A delicious treat that is the perfect size for just a coulple of people. The only complain I have would be that it is a little bit pricy for not a lot of ice cream

author: Jack
title: DREAM FLAVOR
text: This is by far the best flavor in the world. It has all the right flavors, and textures. By only complaint is that it is not infinite. I have been looking for this flavor for a long time, and found it here. I love mint ice cream, and I love cookies and cream. It is something I could only dream about.

author: stephhannam
text: Ben and Jerry's have to be my favourite ice cream brand, they have so many amazing flavours to choose from. My current favourite is the Mint Chocolate Chip Cookie, it just amazing. If you like mint chocolate chip then you will love this ice cream too. Makes for the perfect treat on a summers day x

author: vaeh2010
text: When I go to get ice cream this is the brand I always reach for. Its affordable in my opinion, about 4 bucks. Its a rick creamy ice cream and the flavors are strong. I always buy this for the nights I want to relax and watch a movie. Its a perfect amount for you and your partner. Or just you.

author: samanthaem9
text: I’m not a huge fan of mint chocolate chip ice cream, but I love chocolate and mint so I’m so happy I found this flavor! The Oreos are a great addition to mint flavored ice cream. There were huge chunks of Oreos. I also love that the ice cream is not dyed green like some other mint ice cream!

author: ellieh3
text: Because Im in college and only live in a dorm, these little pints of ice cream are really convenient. Theyre small enough to fit in the small freezer space of a mini fridge. Mint chocolate chip is my favorite flavor, but every flavor of Ben & Jerrys that Ive purchased has been good.

author: WillLOVESMintChocCookie
title: My All-Time Favorite!
text: The Mint Chocolate Cookie has become a fun search and devour game for my wife and I. No matter where we are traveling if we go into a store that sells ice cream we look for B&J's MCC. It's getting harder to find. I fear one day you may kill the cookie and send it to your graveyard.

title: The best mint ever
text: I eated last year in my USA trip and loved it!The cookies go way better than just chocolate chips.Its even better because in Brazil they only have one kind of mint ice cream that is no available in the grocery stores any that have giant chunks of chocolate in a enormous quantity.

author: beansky
title: Best flavor of all time
text: This has been my favorite flavor for YEARS! I love it so much and have driven to the store at night just to buy it. The peppermint flavor is perfect and the whole size cookies you get sometimes are an added bonus. The best ice cream of all time. Go buy it, you won't regret it :)

author: Cleeese
title: Mint cookies n cream
text: I love this flavor so much, I have been eating a pint a day ( i know, im addicted ) . They really do need to up the sandwich cookie numbers in the batches, lately it seemingly had very little cookie chunks. But when there is a decent amount of cookie chunks ,’im in heaven!!!

author: Jazz42
title: HEAVENLY
text: I am a BIG fan of mint chocolate chip ice cream so when I found Ben & Jerry's version I was head over heels. I even got my father in law & son addicted to it! This is the most amazing mixture and i can't get enough of it. THANK YOU Ben & Jerry, absolutley LOVE this!!

author: synthia7_
text: Im a big ice cream fan. It can be a little expensive but its completely worth it this ice cream is filled with delightful flavouring and will satisfy every tease with their humungous list of flavours. Great for a small snack or even a binge eat! Highly recommend

author: CocoaPicasso
title: ALL-TIME FAV
text: I worry that this flavor may get taken off shelves one day as it gets more and more difficult to find. This has been my favorite flavor since child hood, because I love mint ice cream but was never a fan of chocolate chips in my teeth so cookies are perfect!

author: Ooma
title: Good flavor, but...
text: I generally like mint chocolate cookie but the last pint I got was very disappointing- all the cookie chunks were gathered in the bottom, all the ice cream was on top and very icy. Maybe it melted at some point, which I assume was the grocery store's fault?

author: angelloveinc25
text: I love this icecream it's the best. It's very delicious and you won't be disappointed at all with the flavor. This delicious icecream are the best compared to any others. I'm a repeat consumer. I love it. I would definitely recommend this to everybody.

author: rileyh4
text: I love this ice cream I've been having it since I was very little and I love this ice cream with all my heart Ben & Jerry's is a very good ice cream bread and I would definitely recommend this to another person because it's not too pricey and I love it

author: chelseac1
text: Amazing product I’ve tecommended it to my mother my father my aunt my best friend my husband loves it I love it I can’t get enough of it I only wish I’d tried it sooner it smells amazing too ugh one of those holy grail products I’ll never live with out

author: amyr4668
text: Oooof. I love this. I know I shouldn’t eat so much but I love the creaminess and that the mint is really flavorful but not overly strong. The cookies are yummy and I love that they include thick sandwich cookies instead of just a thin chocolate cookie.

author: kierstin
text: I really like this ice cream because it is really good for the cost. The only thing that I wish is that they had a strictly mint chip ice cream instead of the one with cookies. Other than that, I buy it all the time and it is really good!

author: allywblog
text: you can NEVER go wrong with Ben and Jerry’s!!!! I love mint anything so I was really excited to try this. I thought it would be a little more chocolate-ty but it was still declines. I’d recommend to anyone wanting a good mint ice cream.

author: andreah9
text: This ice cream is fantastic. Flavour is great and truly refreshing. It is probably my favourite brand of ice cream but I barely buy it because the price is ridiculous. The portions are tiny and expensive. Maybe change the packaging?

author: jenaw5e9e
text: Ben&Jerry ice cream never fails to be absolutely delicious. Its always creamy, theres so many flavors to choose from and they come in sizes that keep me from going overboard. When they go on sale Im always sure to buy some.

author: jdivaaaaa
title: My Absolute Favorite
text: As stated, this is my ABSOLUTE FAVORITE ICE CREAM!!!! My only critic is to get rid of the cookie filling. It’s the only thing that doesn’t translate well. If I could order it special without the filling, I DEFINITELY would!

author: Tomas
title: Meh
text: Was excited to try this as I'm a big fan of both C&C and mint ice cream. However, this missed the mark for me. I'd rather have plain ol' C&C or mint choc. chip ice cream instead. This one had an odd flavor and aftertaste.

author: ambermc14
text: Can I just say OH MY GOODNESS!!! This is so incredibly delicious! I love so many different flavors of Ben and Jerrys! Who doesn't? I will say I do find it a bit pricey for a little container but, I will continue to buy!

author: volorian
text: This is their best flavor. It's like the Girl Scout cookie, Thin Mint, in an ice cream. This is easily my favorite. The mint isn't overpowering and there's plenty of cookies too! I always buy it when B&J is on sale.

author: icecreamlover454
title: AMAZING
text: This is my favorite flavor ever. Whenever nobody's home, I take out my spoon and eat away. It's the absolute perfect balance between mint and cookie dough. I had at least 3+ huge cookie pieces. Very very satisfied!!!

author: BreeC
title: So many chunks!
text: I bought this flavor today on a whim and was so happy I did! I couldn’t believe how many actual cookie pieces were in it. It took a lot of self control to not finish the entire pint. Will definitely be buying again

author: Raebirds
title: Bad after taste
text: I love Haagen Das Mint Chip, so I thought I’d give this a try. The flavor of the ice cream had a strange metal like after taste. This sounds more delicious than it actually is. I wish I could have my money back.

author: shannnn21
