text: Meant chocolate chip cookie is one of my favorite flavors from Ben & Jerry’s. You really can’t go wrong with this flavor or any player from Ben & Jerry’s for that matter. I can go through a whole bin in one sitting

author: ajoyster9
title: One of the Best
text: I visited relatives near Phoenix, & was naturally inclined to find something cold to eat. i went to Wal-mart, found this & fell in love with it! Haven't found it in WA yet though 9which is a real heart breaker).

author: mooshoobunny
text: I love dessert!! I have a huge sweet tooth and these ice creams fulfill each and every bit of that craving for me! This is basically cookies in cream but mint style and I love it!! It’s refreshing and delicious!!

author: member352555014
text: It’s not good these are so small. I know there are multiple servings in one but they make it so freaking easy to just zone out and eat the whole thing in one night. I’m not really complaining. It tastes amazing.

author: Grant
title: My favorite ice cream on earth
text:
I love mint chocolate cookie.
Unfortunately I have not had it in about five years or so because I can't find it anywhere from Cape Coral Florida down to the Florida key's.
I want my mint chocolate cookie!!!!!

author: emilyaf72b
text: The ice cream is very delicious but not worth the price in my opinion. The container is so small I could finish it in a day. The ice cream is quite expensive just because it’s a big brand. Would not recommend

author: sparklinghideaway
text: Im a sucker for both cookies and cream and mint ice cream but to have both in one?!? Omfg deliciousness is blissfully amazing! I totally recommend if you love both flavors to have in one ice cream pint cup.

author: sophiacardinale23
text: Mint chocolate chip ice cream is my favourite ice cream. Grab a tub of this for a movie night... or any night and you’re good to go. Grocery store or gas station you can pick up a pint and enjoy the night.

author: blendt
text: Ben n Jerry’s is my favorite! When they came out with this flavor I was in love! Not many people are fond of mint flavors but this brand and flavor is my go to ice cream when I’m craving something sweet.

author: megabucks
text: The best, hands down. Thick ice cream, big chunks of chocolate cookies, and the best flavor ever. Probably not the best if you have a dairy sensitivity, its a heavy ice cream. I would highly recommend!

author: laikynmckennagarcia
text: Cookies and cream with a hint of mint. Omg this stuff is amazing. Once you have one bite you have to force yourself not to eat the whole thing. Always have this or any ben and Jerry’s in my freezer.

author: alwest27
text: Ben and Jerry’s are my main men. But seriously they make the best Ice cream and have so many flavors. Every time I’m in the grocery store it is so hard to choose just one flavor to take home with.

author: kennykinns
title: fave
text: The best one they make next to Boom!. I don't just want ice cream, I want STUFF IN MY ice cream! They give so may cookies in here. I pile them in the lid and eat them at the end. YOU ARE WELCOME

author: alexisc219
text: Usually ice cream gives me a belly ake and leaves me feeling yucky but I can honestly say this one doesnt. I love this brand its full of flavor and makes me feel good at the end of eating it.

author: blushingdarling
text: This ice cream is so so so good! My husband and daughter both love it as well. I love how it doesnt become rock hard like most ice creams! Its really pricey for how big it is but it so good!!

author: Noodle
title: Delightful
text: When I picked this up I thought I was getting mint chocolate chip but to my delight I got this wonderful ice cream. The flavors blend so well. One of the best ice creams I've ever eaten.

author: Thomas
title: Simply the Best!
text: This is, without any doubt (at least to the writer) the very best ice cream ever produced. The subtle mint flavour combined with the Oreo-like cookie chunks makes this simple the best!

author: ivreelayce
text: I was actually nomming on this just last night. It is more of a cookies and cream with mint added than a regular mint chocolate chip but it is still amazing and I absolutely love it.

author: dad4monkeys
title: Mint Chocolate Cookie and Phish Food best flavors
text: I saw that somehow Mint Chocolate Cookie was close to 4 stars and had to jump in. Great flavor. One of their best. The haters out there can not possibly be ice cream aficionados.

author: katherinegdedd
text: This answer was really good this ice cream was really good I am really enjoyed eating it it has a sweetness and then it has like a meaty flavor and they all blend in together

author: bethanyw852d
text: I love anything Ben & Jerry’s ice cream that doesn’t have fruit in it but this one was my favorite it taste good it doesn’t give. Me a stomachache and it’s reasonably priced

author: jamiemillsn
text: Mmm minty , creamy delicious , tasty amazing melt in your mouth Ben & Jerry ice cream, another amazing best buy for hot weather like this can sit and enjoy and cool down .

author: amyr923e
text: Love love love! Can’t get over how good Ben and Jerry’s ice cream is. It’s a little more pricey comepared to other brands but totally worth it. I’ve never had a bad one.

author: shannonm43d1
text: Our family lovesicecreaman Ben and Jerry's. We like it so much that we have purchased Ben and Jerry's cookbook to make their ice creams at the house whenever we want to.

author: Rileyhd
title: My favorite!!!
text: full size cookies, the best mint ice cream out there!!!! Always my go to, I will go to multiple stores to find it...I can never get sick of this kind of ice cream.

author: taylors31
text: this icecream is a classic. i love the taste, flavor, and texture. wish it came in a lower calorie and carb and sugar version but its bad because it is soo good.

author: blessedbby
text: I deff love ice cream and can't ever go wrong with it either, break up and not hungry? Hey get some of these bad boys the cold numb the pain haha :)

author: smalltownbelle
text: I love this flavor. The chocolate cookies pair beautifully with a classic mint ice cream. I also love that the ice cream isn’t artificially colored!

author: briannae371a
text: Lets talk about yum! This ice cream is so delicious, I get it every time I go to the store, no other mint chocolate cookie ice cream even compares

author: Natp
title: My favorite ice cream
text: I LOVE this flavor and have never been disappointed. Wish it was in all stores where Ben and Jerry’s is sold though! Kind of hard to find it.

author: pirak
text: By far one of my favorite mint icecream flavor! The minty coolness of the icecream with HUGE chunks of Oreo-like cookies makes it so good

author: jennystan
text: Love mint chocolate chip and the fact that theres a cookie as well in the ice cream! Minty and cookie mix is the best kind of ice cream

author: hannawags20
text: i love ice cream and ben&jerry's makes some of the best ice cream out there. their recipe is amazing and it tastes great every time

author: Emily123
title: Favorite Flavor! But not available near me!
text: This is beyond my favorite ice cream flavor on the planet! But it is not available in any stores near me. How do we fix this?!?!

author: Sunnysideup22
title: This is the best ice cream
text: Finally, a mint ice cream that doesn’t look like a liquified and frozen Hulk. This really is the most amazing ice cream available.

author: Steph
title: Yum!
text: My favorite mint ice cream on the market and I've tried all of them. ;) I love the lack of green and all the giant cookie chunks.

author: Vallette74
title: Yummmm
text: Favorite flavor ever. So good! Nice light peppermint flavor and cookies mixed in adds just the right extra flavor and texture.

author: vanessad1
text: Ugh so good. Its pricey for a small carton of it so its not really in my budget to eat this all the time. But its still yummy

author: angelologyy
text: Anything with mint automatically wins me over. This is the perfect combination of flavors and perfect for a late night treat.

author: jessicaw9b7a
text: I love mint chocolate ice cream and Ben & Jerry’s outdid it with the Oreo cookies in this one!! Delicious! Eat the whole tub!

author: nooooooooo
title: Cookies?
text: Bought this because I wanted some cookies, not just a carton of peppermint icecream. not a single cookie, nary a fragment.

author: ea900
text: I’ve always loved ben and jerry’s ice cream! It’s much better than most brands i’ve seen, a bit pricey but it’s worth it!

author: Jayde
title: Delicious!
text: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. The mint is nice and sweet and I love running into the cookie pieces as I go.

author: Paisleyw18
title: My Favorite!!
text: I love Mint Chocolate Cookie! It has always been my favorite but lately I can’t find it anywhere! Where can I get it??

author: mccathister
text: Absolutely love almost any flavor of Ben and Jerrys. Definitely would recommend. I am an ice cream lover to the core.

author: lovegd77b
text: I loveeeeeeeeeeeeee ice cream, I eat my feelings with ice cream, it just makes everything better and this is great

author: mrskrichbaum
text: It is bad in the mint. The mint is too strong and outpowers the rest. Breyers actually makes this one really well.

author: melissa_maye
text: I love this take on a mint chocolate ice cream - a great peppermint ice cream base with OREOS. What a great combo

author: Earl
title: Only pint I ever get
text: It's just so good. Speaking of ice cream, how much would it cost to get a lifetime's supply? I'm just curious.

author: Sasha P
title: Love it
text: Perfect combo!!! The chocolate ice cream isn’t a heavy chocolate and tastes so good. Such a great a flavor!!!

author: mupby_queenbee
text: Ben & Jerry’s ice cream is the best hands down. It’s a little on the pricier side but well worth the money!!!

author: santinam9570
text: This product is my favorite I love cookies and cream and they made it taste even better love the product

author: frimie1
text: Love to eat every morning before school and tastes great as can be. Tastes perfect all the time everyday

author: samikshao
text: Love Ben and Jerry the mint chocolate flavour bring something fresh into the milky nest of the icecream

author: macyscott525
text: Ben and Jerry’s is the best brand out there and is well worth the price! Such a fun variety of flavors

author: shii_lovescococurls
text: One of my favorite ice creams amazing I love love ice cream when I’m sick and it helps me feel better

author: patriciasalasg
text: My favorite ice cream in the world! Awesome flavor and perfect combination for Netflix and bed hahah

author: beautyxjluna
text: For Mint and Chip Lovers if you haven’t tried this ice cream you are missing out ! Delicious!

author: thatl
text: This is such a good flavor. Ben and Jerry’s just can’t do me wrong. This ones a total winner.

author: amberk8
text: They never disappoint! Lots of chunks and deliciousness. My favorite go to after a long day.

author: zoulv1
text: an ice cream very delicious, super creamy, and perfect haha I love it is very good product

author: savemyskin
text: this is my absolute favorite ice cream and i will eat it even when it’s freezing outside

author: Haftaski
title: One of my favorites
text: I love mint chocolate cookie! It’s perfect after a spicy meal. Lots of cookie chunks.

author: Molly19
title: Non-dairy???
text: One of my favorite flavors ever. Pretty pretty PLEASE make this a non-dairy flavor!!!

author: evergreenandbloom
text: My favorite mint ice cream!! The best part is how big the Oreo chunks are. So good!

author: Jfort1
title: Deliciousness
text: The best ice cream I have ever tasted...no other ice cream comes close to this!

author: Rends
title: Perfect excited and flavor
text: It’s so creamy, perfect crispy cookie bits, and smooth minty flavor. The bomb

author: Maggie79
title: This is my favorite ice cream of all time
text: If you're a mint person, this is for you. This ice cream is freaking amazing.

author: LazarBear
title: Favorite Ice Cream
text: This is literally my favorite ice cream and I’m said I can never find it!

author: Jojo15
title: Amazing ice cream
text: Best ice cream of all time!! Been eating this one for at least 20 years

author: sarah7
title: SO GOOD!
text: Love that is it not too sweet or too strong of mint flavor. So Good!

author: sophia B
title: Yum
text: Mint Chocolate Cookie has been my favorite flavor since college!

author: Karo
title: Favorite!
text: This is hands down my go to, never let's me down favorite!

author: FuzzyGut
title: More!
text: Rich and decedent, this is a great flavor if you like mint and dark chocolate. Just looking at that glassy smooth ice cream just after taking the lid off makes my mouth water. It’s not as minty as Mint Chocolate Cookie, which is fine, and the dark chocolate ice cream is so decedent! The marshmallow is a perfect addition and the cookie is great. I’m glad I found this new flavor. Yum yum!

author: Nik5
title: Drooling
text: I was so sad when Gimme S'mores season was over but when I saw Minter Wonderland staring at me through the freezer case door, I knew it was meant to be. It's decadantly creamy and perfectly chocolately. Not too rich or bitter like a lot of other dark chocolates; plus the gooeyness of the marshamallows balances with the crunchiness of the cookies. One of my favorite flavors EVER.

author: Jonathan L
title: Review Time.
text: I have contemplated this review for quite some time. Unfortunately, it is officially time to let you all know about the greatest ice cream EVER MADE! I am flabbergasted that more people have never heard of this ingenious creation. It is by far the most perfected ice cream, which contains the best combination of flavors and ingredients to hit this planet. I am saddened to know that this review will for sure be read by millions and in turn lower my chances of being the only one at my local target eating this ice cream. I have withheld this important message for this long due to my own need to always have a fully stocked freezer of this amazing product. All i ask is that if you are contemplating buying more than 15 of these pints at once, just leave enough for myself to stock my personal Minter Wonderland freezer at home. Now to get to the real reason for this review. I am hoping that one of the millions that read this review may work for Ben and Jerry's or Target and start the long needed process to make this ice cream available ALL year and in ALL locations. Thank you and please do not touch MY Minter Wonderland pint.

author: Stephhy
title: What mint?
text: Minter Wonderland, leaves you wondering where the mint is. Mint chocolate cookie has more of a mint taste. I was so excited to try, but incredibly disappointed.

author: Kaitlyn
title: So good I had to write a review
text: I'm only a few bites in but it is so good I couldn't help but write a review. Decadent dark chocolate, mint, and marshmallow- couldn't ask for much more.

author: md1580
title: Decadent Dark Chocolate
text: While this ice cream wasn't as minty as I was expecting it to be, the dark chocolate flavor was so rich and so spot on. Dark chocolate ice creams and milk shakes are my favorite and surprisingly most difficult flavor to find. I was instantly hooked on the dark chocolate flavor of this ice cream. The minty cookies are refreshing and the marshmallow swirl adds just the perfect sweetness.

author: erin2251
title: the best
text: seriously... this is THE BEST flavor ever.... I wish it wasnt exclusive to Target only (always sold out)

author: leeann337
title: It was mint to be my fave!
text: O M G I tasted this and dashed to the store to clean out the freezer of this earthly delight! It is hands down THE best dark chocolate I have tasted, and the marshmallow and mint are perfect. I let my daughter taste some (yeah, WHAT was I thinking?) and now I will have to battle her in seeking and buying it all at the local stores. My freezer has 6 pints in it--LOL. would I recommend it?-- My answer says YES, but my heart says NO!-more for me!

author: Monica98
title: Girl scout thin mints the ice cream!
text: If you're craving girl scout cookies but they're out of season you should buy this instead. Because this is EXACTLY like an ice cream version of thin mints. This is the first mint chocolate ice cream I have ever enjoyed and the chocolate ice cream is so rich with the perfect hint of mint. A new favorite of mine and my husband's! That says a lot since we exclusively buy Ben and Jerry's for ice cream

author: Jenni from the block
title: Melt in Mouth Madness!!
text: I noticed this flavor around the holidays and have been hooked ever since!! Prior to this I liked the S'more and Boom-Choco-Latta, but nothing like Minter Wonderland. It has a smooth dark chocolate with a back lining of mint, and the cookie and marshmallow make for a great texture in between. You really outdid yourselves this time guys!!

author: Missylav
title: Amazing
text: Perfect balance of mint, chocolate and marshmallow!

author: Lann
title: The ultimate in decadence
text: The rich, velvety, delectably dark chocolate ice cream is a delight in and of itself. Pair it with gooey marshmallow swirls and crumbly chocolate cookies and you begin to gaze into perfection. My only wish is for it to be more readily available... It's hard to find where I live and I have to drive a ways to find it.

author: Needthis
title: NEVER LET THIS GO
text: The pinnacle of ice cream achievement. All other flavors pale in comparison. Ben, Jerry, please, I am on my knees begging you to keep this flavor available year-round. I promise you there is a market. Heck, I will eat enough annually to BE the market. This is the only flavor for me.

author: Marly
title: Tops my list of B&J favorites!
text: I've been a Ben & Jerry's fan since day one and have tasted most of their flavors. This exclusive flavor is one of the most sublime flavors they've ever done. It's practically pause-the-TV good and I wish it was brought into the regular rotation because it's amazing.

author: tuni2
title: Favorite Ever!
text: I tried this last year after finding it at target to try it out and it has became my all time favorite ice cream ever. But I haven’t been able to find it for the last few months so have been pretty disappointed. Hope to find it again soon!

author: Sharper90
title: One of my faves
text: This is one of my favorites ! I’ve tried about 25 different Ben and Jerry’s and usually don’t buy a flavor twice. But I really like this one and would buy it again. It’s super rich and has the perfect amount of mint. And I don’t usually like mint ice cream

author: mikeyb
title: One of the most amazing things ever
text: Genuinely, this flavor will change the way you look at and eat ice cream. I've written to ben and jerry's to beg this be in stores year round. Dark chocolate ice cream with the perfect amount of chunks is hard to find. This is such gold and I adore it.

author: dearkat58
title: Discovered by accident
text: We discovered this by accident, a whim to look at ice cream that day. Brought it home and loved it. Gone back twice for more. I just wish our local supermarket carried it. Had to go to a Target, which is less convenient.

author: skylarrrr
title: So good!
text: I just came upon this flavor recently & fell in love! It’s better than I expected. Not too much mint but just enough & the marshmallow makes it even better! This is definitely a new favorite for me.

author: MrsMoneyMorris
title: Wow!!!!
text: Didn’t know what to expect with this flavor.... but WOW! I hope they make this year round! By far one of the best flavors yet!!!! Not too minty it chocolatey... perfect flavor combo of each!!!

author: idaho
title: So good!
text: This flavor is everything and should be sold year-round in all grocery stores pls and ty. The combo of the rich dark chocolate + cool mint + soft marshmallow swirl + cookie crunch = perfect

author: Bridget
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!!
text: I bought this ice cream yesterday and I have literally never loved an ice cream more. Half-baked used to be my all time favorite but this takes the cake. Can't get enough!

author: Paul and Johnna
title: Love it
text: Chocolate marshmallow is my favorite ice cream flavor. Mint chip is my one of my other faves. This combines the 2 perfectly. Please keep making this!

author: Moff
title: Love this ice cream.
text: My husbands last name is Minter and this ice cream is amazing. The combination of chocolate, marshmallow, fudge, and mint is perfect.

author: MamaCoff
title: The best!
text: This by far is my favorite flavor, I never thought I would find a flavor I enjoyed more the brownie batter, but this takes the cake!

author: AmyLeePatron
title: Winters Best flavors
text: This is a fantastic mix of winter goodness. It tastes like a magical tastebud trip to the North Pole break room for Santa’s elves.

author: Alexa16
title: THE BEST EVER!
text: Absolutely the best chocolate flavor. It's almost as if Phish Food and a Girl Scout cookie had a little ice cream baby. Amazing.

author: Minterlover
title: Looooovvveeee
text: Obsessed with this flavor. Please please please make it permanent! It's my perfect ice cream, and I'll be so sad when it's gone!

author: Ughhhhh
title: Irritated
text: I’ve wasted so much time energy and gas... here it is the day b4 Xmas and STILL cannot find this flavor!!!! Not ok B&J

author: Brooke105
title: INSTANT FAVORITE
text: This target exclusive flavor is my ABSOLUTE favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor. Please don’t ever get rid of it!!

author: Phillynon
title: Sooo delicious
text: The dark chocolate, marshmallow, mint combo is refreshing and decadent. Make this year 'round please

author: Ecuchick1995
title: Best flavor ever!
text: Stumbled on this flavor in Target. You had me at Dark Chocolate! Absolutely AMAZING!!!!

author: Katz
title: Bring it back to Norway!
text: I love this flavour most of all ice cream brands and/or flavours out there. I used to buy it whenever I landed at the airport (back to school) after Christmas vacation up North in Norway, back in the day when it still was sold here. Now they have discontinued this flavour for some unknown reason (it can't be due to consumer preferance- I'm sure!!!) and allthough there are a lot of good ice cream out there, it is just not the same without the super chunky rich chocolate flavour of B&J's New York Super fudge chunk. Can someone please tell my disinformed country to BRING IT BACK??! Thank you. Cincerely yours (having withdrawal symptoms as we speak)

author: tangel
title: Best Ice Cream I have ever Eaten
text: I look for this Ice Cream in every store I go in to but there are never ANY of them. There are places near us who sell Ben and Jerry's but never type. WalMart - South Charleston, WV and Kroger, Danville, WV are two locations in between where we live. The WalMart gets a lot of traffic and I know it would sell well there. PLEASE help a sister out. I have lost 100 lbs in the last few years and this is my treat to myself but I can never find it anywhere. It is the BEST Ice Cream in all of the LAND .. please, please send some to those locations lol.

author: Niki4353
title: Amazing!
text: Nothing beats, At the end of a busy day cuddling up under a blanket with my babies and eating Ben and Jerry's ice cream. We love this ice cream. Thank you B&J

author: Carol
title: My favorite
text: This is my very favorite ice cream flavor -- not just my favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream, but of all brands. Whenever we are having ice cream treats, I buy this for myself in addition to whatever flavor is bought for everyone else.

author: Twacy
title: Perfection!
text: This has been my favorite for a long time. I love the chocolate ice cream. I would like to see more flavors with this yummy ice cream as the base. I also look forward to the white chocolate and chocolate covered nuts.

author: Dustybucket
title: New York Super Fudge chunk
text:
This is a great tasting ice cream I love the chocolate and nuts in it. I am originally from New York State, so this is a very fitting ice cream for me.
This is also my very favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor.

author: NYSFC Lover
title: The BEST flavor!
text: Been a fan since its debut! The very best chocolate ice cream as the base, with tons of chocolate chunks and nuts to keep it exciting. We come back to this flavor every time and have never been disappointed

author: Mazzarox
title: Incredible ice cream!
text: This is without a doubt my all time favourite ice cream. I used to love phish food but then I discovered New York super fudge chunk and have never looked back. Not just my favourite Ben & Jerry’s ice cream but my favourite ice cream. The chocolate is divine and all the different chunks are really what makes it so special. It’s just a shame that it’s so hard to come by at times and I am terrified that one day it might get discontinued. I might just have to buy in bulk now and save up just in case!

author: KatL
title: Perfectly Super
text: In my opinion this is the best flavor by far. It is so fun to find a chocolate covered nut and chocolate chips. I am not a white chocolate fan but this ice cream is super chocolatey and the while chocolate really complements it. It is super chocolate! And it is so hard to find in stores it is always sold out. Maybe it should move up in the ranks of the favorite flavors.

author: tops8677
title: CHOCOLATE & NUT LOVER'S DREAM!
text: Received as a mistake sent to my daughter-in-law. NOT A Mistake for Me!! Absolutely EVERYTHING I would have put in it if I'd made it myself!!

author: ninezero
title: GOAT
text: Best ice cream in history. Perfection. FUDGE CHUNK DADDY!

author: AnabolicAlbert
title: The best.
text: I’ve bought this several times going to see a movie, the textures and complex profiles of buttery-rich savory flavors leaves a satisfying experience for someone who doesn’t typically indulge in sweets and desserts. The level of variety of textures in this is really an enjoyable experience unlike other ice creams that try to work in nuts or chunks of chewables that really feel like a hindrance to the chewing aspect, but not this. No. This is done right and there is nothing more that could be improved upon. Love this!

author: seconda
title: Please bring this flavor back to Holland!!
text: There is just no comparison for the New York Super Fudge Chunk.

author: Ricky Olson
title: Delicious
text: I first bought the New York Suoer Fudge Chunk about 2 months ago. It's the best icecream they have. So perfect. Contains all the favorites. Highly recommend

author: the Mill
title: New York Super Fudge Chunk State of Mind
text: NYSFC is the best. For all of us chunk loving chocolate fanatics who don't want their ice cream cut with marshmallows, or unchocolatified by caramel, this is paradise in the mouth. Please never discontinue this flavor!! I say this not because I live in New York. I'd love it if it were Wyoming or Rhode Island Super Fudge Chunk. I say it because it must be said.

author: Missy Lou
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!!!
text: New York Super Fudge Chunk is the greatest flavor ever, This is my go to ice cream. I have tried other flavors of B&J and while they are good, this one knocks my socks off everytime. We don't have a local shop and sometimes finding this flavor is difficult but I will hunt all the stores till I find it. Please don't ever discontinue this flavor or I will die!

author: Kimmy
title: Amazing
text: Heaven in ice cream form; so much crunch, so much texture, I've never been so satisfied with an ice cream

author: AVeeIKO
title: MISSING SOOO MUCH
text: miss that icecream sooo much- it was the best for me. Please come back to Hamburg-Germany

author: Atic
title: Mail from Holland
text: Bring it back to Holland!!!!!!!!!!! It is the best icecream ever!!!!!!!!!!!!

author: Blackbeauti
title: Superb!!!
text: I have been a fan of New York Super Chunk since its inception, I think I started enjoying it more than 15 years ago. I WILL ALWAYS love NYSC but I try others too!!! Pecan pie is a goodie too!!! Thanks~~

author: Shellstill01
title: Happiness in every bite
text: This was referred to me by a friend a few years back and its been my favorite ever since. The fudge is amazing, along with the nuts! I have tried and liked other flavors but I always go back to New York Super Fudge! I would love to be able to buy the Fudge as well as the ice cream!

author: Addicted
title: Can’t Get Enough!
text: OMG. This ice cream is Bliss in a Bucket. I have never had a more wonderful ice cream. I am quitting sugar, so this is going to have to go. Honestly, it is the thing I will miss the most. It is gonna be a super painful breakup.

author: Mosey
title: New York Super Fudge Chunk
text: This my favorite ice cream. The chocolate is deep and rich with chunks of chocolate and nuts. It is the Best! Unfortunately, I can't seem to find it at our local stores. I will keep trying though. after all it is the Best!

author: Yazmin c
title: Me& my mothers favorite ice cream
text: As I sit here eating a pint I love this ice cream the best chocolate mix ever been eating this flavor for years

author: Ice Cream Fanatic
title: Best ice cream ever!
text: I cannot resist this ice cream! I always have to buy it when I see it. And usually eat the whole pint myself. . .

author: Noellajoy
title: My favorite flavour ever!
text: Love this. Bring it back to Canada please! Nuts and chocolate chunks. Delicious.

author: Msbhave
title: Delicious
text: Delicous....flavor is just amazing! I love this ice cream.

author: Misshahila
title: The best!
text: i cannot stop eating this icecream.super duper love it!

author: Shadbear
title: Love it
text: Always my favorite. Just love the white fudge chucks.

author: Ms SJ
title: We Need More
text: OMG! New York Super Fudge Chunk. This is my favorite flavor. I introduced it to a picky ice cream eater and they loved it too. But We Need More!!!! We have not been able to find this flavor over the last couple of months at our grocers in Gadsden, AL. We were getting it at Walmart (preferred) and Winn Dixie but lately it has not been available.

author: Niecy71
title: My first Ben & Jerry’s flavour
text: This was the first Ben & Jerry’s flavour I ever tried and it is still to this day my absolute favourite!! A friend bought it when it first debuted because I was feeling blue and I have been hooked ever since! It has everything you need in an ice cream, deliciously joined into one amazing tub. I may even get some this weekend just because. :-)

author: Irish
title: The Best
text: I’m a big time Chocoholic and ice cream lover. This is the most flavorful, chocolatey, chunky, chocolate covered nut ice cream EVER! This has been my favorite since it came out. I’ve been to the Vermont factory and taken the tour. Loved the Flavor Cemetery. I’m just glad New York Super Fudge Chunk is not in there!

author: SupaDave23
title: Moove over Rocky Road!
text:
Let me start by saying you have caused this Texan to defect from Blue Bell long before the Issue they had a few years back. I have not only fallen in love with this awesome flavor, it has caused me to part ways with long-term "friend" Rocky Road
Yes parting is such sweet sorrow, but in this case "BYE FELICIA!"

author: Mindee14
title: Chocolate lovers dream!
text: This is my very favorite ice cream of all time! Sometimes stores don’t sell it- so when I see it in a store I get so happy! Chocolate icecream with chocolate chunks! It is so so good!!! It’s kinda good they don’t sell it at every store because I would eat way too much of this delicious stuff!!

author: FuzzyGut
title: Yum!
text: I usually don’t love nuts in ice cream but this one is different! The Ben and Jerry’s chocolate ice cream (the best chocolate ice cream on the market) and the fudge chunks are perfect and the nuts are nice. Really great pint all in all.

author: Roih22113
title: So chunky and yummy !
text: I loveee chocolate ice cream and Ben and Jerry’s already gets that right. Then they add the SUPER FUDGE chunks. Yes!! Walnuts , white and dark chocolate pieces. My fav ever. A pint doesn’t last us long, ever.

author: Leeloo
title: Best ice cream by far
text:
I used to always have this ice cream in my fridge but they discontinued it years ago here in Germany. So every time I visit the US it’s the first thing I buy.
Please be so kind and bring it back to Europe!

author: coacharr1s
title: Awesome. Classic. Perfect.
text:
This is simply one of the best ice cream flavors anywhere!
My only complaint is that it is not always easy to find. Grocery stores have it about half the time, convenience stores...not a chance.

author: Ayooo
title: The best ever
text: We need this back in the Netherlands!

author: LBritt
title: Amazing!
text: Easily the best flavor you have- only I can rarely find it. Is it because it sells out all the time? Also, I'm a teacher I think I should get free ice cream for year!

author: defaultuser
title: Make more of this one!
text: Favorite flavour ever! Was thrilled to find it once up here, in Canada...can we have more, pleaaaase? I hope to never, ever see this one in the ice cream cemetery...

author: Stacy B
title: The best flavor ever!!
text: I love this flavor and have been eating it since the 90's. I have a peanut allergy but this does not affect me. I don't indulge often as my luck run out!

author: Angcat
title: Chocolate chunky goodness!
text: I found this flavor several months ago after looking for several years after Bear Claw (was my favorite flavor) stopped being sold around here any more.

author: LaurieG
title: Classic Greatness
text: I’ve been eating this flavor for years. I’ve tried other great flavors but still always come back to this one.

author: bvbogdanov
title: The best chocolate flavored ice cream out there!
text: Can't stop buying this thing. And can't stop eating it. It's my only craving and I feel I'm kinda addicted! :)

author: MelSantiago
title: BEST FLAVOR OF ALL B&J!!!
text: Everytime I have a chance to try to new flavors this point screams at me not to cheat on it. It is that good.

author: IceCreamLover53
title: Smooth, creamy, best chocolate flavor I've tasted
text: I don't care for chocolate ice cream BUT......THIS IS THE BEST!!!!! Don't ever discontinue this product.

author: Brooksie501
title: Still my favorite!
text: In 2018, this is still my favorite flavor! Please keep it on the flavor roster.

author: Sbgoodperry
title: Chocolate lovers dream
text: Love...love...love this. Hard to find sometimes but when's I do it's the best.

author: Slightlymelted
title: Best ever!!
text: Microwave 45 secs and bust out the spoon, pure pleasure from there...

author: Idosol10
title: The best
text: The best ice cream so far! Love it so much! Just AMAZING

author: ice cream
title: Perfection
text: Absolutely delicious. My favorite ice cream since college in the early 90's. No other ice cream or flavor compares. Delicious rich chocolate ice cream, fudge and white chocolate chunks, chocolate covered almonds, and pecans. Not a fan of pecans but they taste fine here. My mom isn't usually a fan of chocolate ice cream, but she really likes this especially with the chunks and additions. It's perfection.

author: Nicole1908
title: Something has changed with my favorite.
text: This has always been my favorite!!! However, when I bought it this last time, there was a noticeable change in the recipe and it was not an improvement. It is good but not excellent. Not sure I would run to the store in the middle of the night for this one anymore. What changed?

author: Chocolateismymiddlename
title: Slightly disappointing
text: I purchased this a couple weeks ago, and from the reviews was expecting something that would make my taste buds sing, but it ended up being mostly a rather plain chocolate ice cream with a few chunks of chocolate and nut pieces mixed in. It was average.

author: Ineedthisflavorback
title: Bring back to Sweden!
text: This is my all time favorite ice cream and I got so sad when I suddenly couldn't find it in any store.. It's been a few years, and no ice cream in the world could fill the void New York super fudge chunk left behind when it disappeared.

author: vaya
title: my pregnancy ice cream!!!
text: I ate this ice cream throughout my whole pregnancy.I was 9 months walking in the middle of the heat to get to the only store relatively near me that carried the ice cream. Now my daughter is two years old and we both love it!!!

author: Marters713
title: I recently stopped buying NYSC after many years.
text: I recently stopped buying NYSC after many years. The chocolate covered nuts now taste like Hazelnuts. I tried 3 different purchases at 3 different supermarkets. Sorry to have to stop buying this product. It was a great run

author: Roxanne
title: Whats going on?
text: I was at a scoop shop that has already had this flavor. This time they did not! I asked why and they said it was being discontinued. Is this true?

author: GRANDMA PAT
title: BEST EVER!
text: LOVE IT! LOVE IT!! LOVE IT!!!

author: Linnea
title: Best ever!
text: This is the best flavour of them all! But Sweden has discontinued it for some reason! I have not found it in years.. Anyone who knows why??

author: Dairyismyenemy
title: PLEASE MAKE IN NON DAIRY
text: This is my favorite flavor and I want to have it all the time but can’t so please make in non dairy

author: Cletus
title: The very best!
text: This combination is the only way that I eat chocolate ice cream.

author: jorgemas34
title: Best nut content ... except for Truffle Kerfuffle.
text: My second-favorite flavor ... bring back Truffle Kerfuffle!

author: madsan
title: So glad to have this flavor back!!!
text: When Oatmeal Cookie Chunk stopped being made, I was DEVASTATED! It was the only Ben & Jerry's icecream that I bought regularly. So for years I've been really disappointed. Today while at the store I saw it and jumped for joy! I have to say this flavor is very similar to the old, except the oatmeal cookie part is more crunchy this time around. I'm still super pleased and hope its here to stay!!

author: PettyBetty
title: Left Holding My Broken Heart :-(
text: Like everyone else, I was excited to try this so called new flavor because the flavor description reminded me of my favorite flavor, the Oatmeal Cookie Chunk that randomly disappeared years ago..... Sadly this flavor is not as great. I've had it twice now and both times I was disappointed by the large amount of chocolate flakes versus actual oatmeal cinnamon cookies. The only thing that was right about this was the brown sugar base does taste like the cinnamon base from the original flavor. Anyway, I digress... It'll have to do since it's the closest they've gotten to resurrecting the Oatmeal Cookie Chunk. Just please less fudge flakes or you guys might as well change the name....

author: maque
title: Augh I'd LOVE to have this without chocolate :(
text: Everything about this is great - the oatmeal cookie hunks, the cinnamon butter sugar brown I'm getting tongue tied just thinking about it - but I loathe chocolate. I feel like a good oatmeal cookie doesn't have chocolate in it - reserve that for the chocolate chip fans out there. But I tried this anyway, figuring the chocolate might be limited enough I could just grimace and get through it, but nope :( The chocolate was more apparent than the oatmeal cookie itself. This one was just an extra stab in the heart because I was holding out hope that the chocolate chunks were less common than they are in the Cherry Garcia.

author: LaDina
title: Bomb.com
text: Alli can say is heaven lol. My all time favorite has alwaya been chunkey monkey mostly because of the delicious chunks of chocolate in the ice cream now i found another favorite which is this oat of this swirled. Im sorry to say but the other reviewers who are complaining are picky and can not compare or expect this to be the same as other past sinilar flavors. All in all the chocolate chunks with a cinnamon taste which fully satisfies my cravings. I have one problem though, once i start i can’t stop lol. Overall ben and jerry’s always comes through the right way.! Love ben and jerry’s! No im not sponsered (but i wish i was) ha!

author: MissyMoo
title: More cookie chunks please!
text: I'm not sure this is "new" it's reminiscent of a flavor I had a handful of years ago at a B&J's shop in Vegas. But in my opinion there could be a lot more cinnamon cookie swirls and a little less chocolate fudge flakes. I've had 2 pints now with not much on the cookie chunk front.

author: RobR
title: Can't find this anywhere!!
text: The original oatmeal cookie ice cream was my all time favorite and I was saddened for years when it was taken off the shelfs. Imagine my surprise when I saw a new oatmeal flavor was introduced. I quickly purchased it and enjoyed it, but did notice there were not very many cookies chunks. Unfortunately ever since, I have not been able to find this flavor anywhere! All of my local retailers have plenty of urban burban and truffle kerfuffle - but no oat of this swirled anywhere in sight! I am having nightmares of this flavor being taken away again! And only after such a brief time! Say it ain't so Ben and Jerry!

author: Juls
title: Where's the Oatmeal Cookie??
text: I was SO excited when they brought this flavor back to the shelves. I missed the Oatmeal Cookie Chuck (my absolutely all time favorite flavor) oh so much. But the excitement soon was lost when I realized it was not the same OCC I loved so much. There was no chunks of cookies in the ice cream, and I know it's supposed to be a swirl, but 1) it would actually be out of this world if there were the original OCC chunks in it and 2) there was hardly any oatmeal cookie swirl in it. I've bought it a few more times hoping that the production has gotten better with adding more of the oatmeal cookie, but nothing has changed. Very sad. I just wish they could add in the cookie chunks in it like they do for milk and cookies (but oatmeal of course). :(

author: lisatayy
title: Absolute Fav!
text: This was the second flavor of Ben & Jerry's that I tried and I fell in love with it! I came across a Facebook post about it helping another mom with her breastmilk supply, and decided to try it because I was breastfeeding at the time, but wasn't really expecting it to help. I really just wanted to try it because of the flavors lol. I've been kinda disappointed lately though because I always bought this flavor from Walmart or Food Lion, and I guess they've stopped carrying it because I've been in multiple locations for each store and none have it anymore. I had to make a trip across town to Target to get it because I was craving it smh

author: SugarPlumVixen
title: The Flavour Made Me A Bad Roommate
text: This is the flavour my roommate always used to buy in college and it was through her that I tried it for the first time. Not gonna lie, it's good enough that I (shamefully, and maybe a little drunkenly) was compelled to steal a small spoonful after a late night out. The brown sugar base is just so rich, that when paired with the oat cookies, you just feel all warm and cozy. Like grandma just visited, minus the raisins. It has chocolate flakes though, which have just enough bitterness to them that you're not overwhelmed by the buttery base. Safe to say after my dip into thievery had passed (and I had a 12 hour nap) I went and got my own pint. Sorry girlie! It only happened once I swear.

author: cremebrookele
title: Just Googled: Is it ok to eat entire pint solo?
text: Where have you been all my life? This ice cream is divine.

author: Loopycoopy
title: My favorite ever
text: I picked this up from my local grocery store a couple months ago, and WOW!! It is my favorite ice cream I’ve had to date. I can’t stop thinking about it though, after I tried it I haven’t seen it stocked in a store since then, and I literally look EVERY day so I can buy them all up. If it was regularly stocked I would be eating this 3 times a week at least it’s that good. It’s so buttery and perfectly sweet, but the chocolate and cinnamon flavors add the perfect amount of savory to balance everything out. I can’t help but think how awesome it would be with the cookie dough pieces added to it as well if I was feeling really indulgent. I wish I could get my hands on this stuff again.

title: You won't find better ice cream. Seriously.
text: Years ago you abandoned us with the Oatmeal Cookie Chunk stunt. Not cool. But last week I had an out of body experience.... you created Oats of this Swirled!!!! I must admit, I even like it better than my original addiction. I'm proud of you guys for listening. It's so addicting.

author: BrokenWinders37
title: Oat of this...fudge chunks???
text: I really like this flavor idea. I love any ice cream flavor of "oatmeal cookie". Honestly the huge chunks of fudge makes me gag . I end up picking them out after 2.... I was expecting a lot more oatmeal cookie. I think it would really be "Oat of this swirled" if you added just a bit more oatmeal cookie, took about a 1/4 of the fudge chucks and shaved them instead. That sounds perfect to me. Please alert me when these changes have been implemented. Thanks so much❣

author: Allen
title: Good, but...
text: I had high hopes for this flavor when I saw it in the freezer case. I thought the brown sugar ice cream base was really good as was the oatmeal cinnamon swirls, but for me it was ruined by the excessive amount of fudge flakes, which to me really aren't flakes but more like chunks. There were just too many that I ended up tasting more of the fudge than anything else and eventually had to eat around them. I think at least half as many fudge flakes could have been used and still served it's purpose. I'd likely only buy it again if I knew there was less flakes in it.

author: Anne
title: Could have been amazing....
text: I wanted to love this. And.... I like it, but didn't love. Oatmeal Cookie was my all time favorite ice cream before it was pulled, and so I immediately purchased this when I saw this in the store. But, the cookie definitely did not have any of the amazing chunks I was expecting, and to further disappoint, barely had any traces/flavoring swirled in at all. The base was good (and maybe even an improvement on the Oatmeal Cookie!), but it really did not make up for the lack of cookie. Oh Ben and Jerrys, why do you tease me so?!

author: WholeLottaNada
title: Can't find it anywhere!
text: I first came across this flavor in November 2018 and I was instantly hooked. Unfortunately, I haven't been able to find in anywhere since and I've traveled across the country, from Washington state to Virginia for the holidays. Not a single pint to be found. I'm desperate!

author: LaurieB
title: Good but not great...
text: Oatmeal cookie chunk was my all time favorite ice cream, so when I saw oat of this swirled being released I was super excited! Unfortunately it doesn't quite stack up. The flavor is really good but I was disappointed to see that it was just a swirl of cookie (if you can call it that, my pint barely had any) and not more substantial chunks. I miss being able to taste chunks of delicious oatmeal cookies in my ice cream.

author: FuzzyGut
title: Excellent flavor
text: A nearly perfect pint. There were TONS of fudge chips in this one and the cookie swirl was dense and super yummy. The ice cream didn’t scream ‘buttery brown sugar’ though. It’s really good tasting ice cream and you do get a hint of those flavors but it could have been coming off the cookie swirl as easily. But that’s a small issue and it really is a great tasting pint which I will definitely buy again!

author: Hopa
title: A Galaxy of Flavors for my Tastebuds
text: I'm eating this right now for the first time, and it's absolutely amazing! It does remind me of the former Oatmeal Cookie Chunk, which was my favorite flavor, but I actually like this one even better. The combination of sweet cinnamon ice cream, delicious oatmeal cookies, and fantastic fudge flakes truly is out of this world! Oat of This Swirled is my absolute new favorite! THANK YOU for bringing back an ice cream with oats! It's phenomenal!!!

author: Ashmp
title: Favorite ice cream ever
text: Literally my favorite flavor ever. I scarfed down a pint of this in one sitting. And I did that multiple times. So sad I’m not seeing it in grocery stores anymore though :(

author: Minpin
title: Shouldn't have cookie in the description
text: Oatmeal Cookie Chunk was my all time favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream. Although the flavor of this "replacement" is very good, it lacks a much desired cookie dough texture. The "oatmeal cinnamon cookie swirl" does not offer a different texture to the regular ice cream. I was pretty bummed, but it does have good flavor... just lacks any cookie texture.

author: Rebecc
title: LOVE
text: I think this is my new favorite flavor!

author: Ginnifer
title: So delicious!
text: When the Oatmeal Cookie Chunk disappeared without warning it was a sad day for this devoted ice cream lover :( Oh my goodness, although slightly different, it is a delicious reincarnation of my old favorite!! Please don't get rid of this one too Ben and Jerry's :)

author: LuvBJ
title: Someone goofed!
text: Last week I purchased “Oat of this Swirled” at my local Safeway in Mill Valley, CA. Wasn’t I disappointed when the ice cream I found inside the container was missing more than half of the ingredients listed in the ice cream’s description. No oatmeal cookie swirl nor buttery brown sugar ice cream. Just a very flat tasting white ice cream with bittersweet chocolate flakes. I’m wondering how many other containers of this flavor are floating around with missing ingredients and whether or not B&J is aware of it? Here are photos that prove I’m not crazy!

author: MizzGen
title: New favorite!!!!
text: I tried this because oatmeal is good for nursing mom's in boosting milk production. Well it tastes amazing and i will be eating this regularly. Mmmmm gooooood!!!!

author: kMoney
title: Best ice cream!
text: It’s really good ice cream, I like it a lot. But I think my boyfriend likes it more.

author: Baespos
title: Exceptional.
text: This isn't the normal flavor I buy, for some reason my grocery store was out of the regular flavor so I bought this instead. It was delicious. I ended up putting this on my waffle for an extra treat and OH MY ATLANTA IT WAS GOOD. This flavor was so gooood on a homemade waffle with chocolate chips, it was amazing!!! I was really impressed with this flavor and I have fallen in love! It's a good combo of chocolate to cinnamon. I like that the oat cookies are softer and the chocolate chunks add a very nice crunch!! But I REALLLY recommend putting this on a waffle!!!

title: Where in this swirled are the swirls?
text: There are absolutely no swirls of oatmeal cinnamon cookie in this ice cream

author: Dave67
title: Phenomenal
text: It's the best of all time. By far I've already are my weight in this flavor

author: SweetTooth408
title: Awesome!
text: This ice cream was an instant NEW favorite of mine! It is nearly as good as it's apparent predecessor, the dearly departed Oatmeal Cookie Chunk! Way to go Ben & Jerry!

author: CookieLover598
title: Amazing!
text: I love this flavor so much! The base has a lot of tasty cinnamon and I agree with other reviewers that there are a ton of chocolate fudge flakes but I actually like them because they seem to be darker chocolate and they balance all the sweetness and richness of the buttery ice cream and cookie swirl. I also love the texture of the swirl--it's a little gritty (in a good way) and super sweet. All around amazing flavor!

author: dre1018
title: Really good but could be better!
text: I was also a fan of Oatmeal Cookie Chunk but I also agree that this is just slightly better bc of the cinnamon crunch. But there should be cookie dough-like chunks, similar to Cinnamon Buns or Cookie Dough and this would be over the top amazing!

author: Bellaandjerrys
title: Amazing flavor
text: Super underrated flavor. Will forever be one of my favorites. Perfect balance

author: KirstenBuckeye
title: Eating it right now!
text: I decided to try something new--so glad I did! Might be a new favorite.

author: emilyg
title: Good, but
text: I tried this one because everyone raved about it, and i wanted to too! it's a good ice cream. it's not bad it's not ohmygosh amazing but it's good. I've recently been obsessed with taste testing ice creams and i'm a cinnamon/spice fan and this flavor reminded me exactly of halotop's oatmeal cookie. like to a T. which one being a kinda "diet" icecream and one being a full blown icecream i was sad they were so identical. by all means i'll keep eating it until it's gone, but i just expected something more from my pal's ben and jerry.

author: ShellyJ
title: Love this flavor
text: I just recently cane across this flavor. It did remind me of the punt that had chunks of oatmeal cookie, which was the best cream ever, then it was no longer in stores which sucks. This flavor is good, I just wish there was more of the swirl in it. I love the big chocolate chips. Please do not discontinue this flavor it please bring back the oatmeal chunk flair.

author: msmoirai
title: I'm usually a chocolate gal, but...
text: Typically when I buy ice cream, I want chocolate. I typically go for Phish Food, or the older Smores flavor, or even the chocolate brownie. I was SO shocked to find that I LOVE this flavor! The brown sugar and oatmeal are just amazing and the chocolate flakes give it enough chocolatey flavor. This is now one of my new favorites and in the top 4 of B&J choices.

author: Yediza
title: ABSOLUTE PERFECTION
text: I pride myself on my oatmeal chocolate chip cookie recipe. My go-to dessert is often an oatmeal chocolate chip cookie with a tall glass of milk. But when I want ice cream too I'm pushing it. Oat of This Swirled is the answer to my prayers! The brown sugar ice cream base is simply delicious on its own. Sweet and creamy without ever tasting too heavy. The oat taste comes in just afterward with a warm and rich note. The chocolate chips in addition to all this really ties it together. Amazing! Please keep this flavor around!!!

author: imurph22
title: The name says it all!
text: This is the best B&J flavor going. If you’ve ever had the Oatmeal Raisin Cookie flavor that no longer exists, you’re in luck. The base of Oat Of This Swirled is very similar. It’s just one of those things where the flavors and textures all come together perfectly in every bite. It’s a scoop of heaven (ok, make mine two scoops)!

author: Furbycat
title: Best flavor I have ever had.
text: I am a huge ice cream fan and especially love very intense flavors. I found Oat of This Swirled about a month ago and WOW. This is honestly the greatest ice cream flavor ever. The cookie swirls are very reminiscent of Christmas cookies I’ve made and pair perfectly with the buttery ice cream. 10/10. Dare I say, perfect!

author: Asbeee
title: So yum!
text: I had a friend come and visit from out of town and we went to target to get snacks. We both love ice cream, so we went to the Ben and Jerry’s section to get some. I read “oats” in the grocery store , I immediately walked past it. I grabbed my strawberry cheesecake and kept moving. When we got to my house , she convinced me to try hers. It was so good , and it ended up being this one! I have bought it about 5 times since December! The flavors compliment each other well. On the sweeter side, but worth every bite!

author: Sammyjo242
title: Oat of this Swirled.. where are you???
text: I bought this flavor initially because I had read it helped with mil production while breastfeeding. I was instantly hooked! They don’t carry it in my grocery stores, but I am surrounded by Targets and Walmart’s that NEVER have it in stock anymore. Where have you gone??? Come back!

author: The Ice Cream Bride
title: Compelled to write a review...
text: We bought various flavors for our small wedding this past weekend, and I grabbed the Oat of This Swirled for my personal stash. It was so good, my Maid of Honor and I ate the entire pint while decorating. Typically not something a Bride wants to do the day before her wedding, but I couldn't put it down. It was delicious. I'm not a big chocolate chunk fan, but I push them to the side and dig for the swirls. This is by far the BEST ice cream I've ever had. Definitely worth a taste!!!

author: jamie1192
title: Viva Oatmeal Cookie Ice Creams!
text: Oatmeal Chocolate Chunk was my favorite ice cream ever. I was so devastated when it went to the Flavor Graveyard (RIP). Now this. THIS ice cream is unreal and even better than its predecessor. The brown sugar and cinnamon make it. I have nothing bad to say about this ice cream, although more oatmeal cookie chunks never hurt anymore. I crave this ice cream and I hope it never makes it to the Flavor Graveyard! Viva Oat of This Swirled.

author: rissadiann
title: New favorite
text: I read on Pinterest that this ice cream could increase milk supply for breastfeeding so I thought I’d try it as I’ve had low supply issues. It didn’t work for that but it did work for getting me hooked on a new ice cream. This stuff is delicious and I can’t stop eating it. I’ve never been a big Ben and Jerry’s fan (mostly because I thought it was overpriced and just didn’t buy it) but I’ve splurged too many times buying this stuff. I love the combination of flavors in this ice cream. It’s so delicious!

author: vbucci216
title: BEST ICE CREAM FLAVOR EVER !
text: I have probably eaten at least 11 pints of this! It tastes exactly like an oatmeal cookie with just the right amount of chocolate! It is definitely a comfort treat and the best flavor Ben & Jerry's makes! I hope it stays forever!

author: Icecream lover
title: Love love love
text: I bought this flavor a month ago because it reminded me of my all-time favorite oatmeal cookie chunk. My heart was broken when I found out that that flavor in a longer existed. After trying this flavor I definitely had flashbacks to the good days! Love the flavors. Wish I could get everywhere but still limited ( at least in New York City). Thank you Ben & Jerry’s for this flavor! I hope one day oatmeal cookie chunk comes back, but until then this definitely will stay stocked in my freezer.

author: Chris Colby
title: Out of this world!
text: I need to preface by stating that I have never tried B&J's Oatmeal Cookie Chunk, so I have no idea how this flavor compares to it's ancestor. That said, if OCC tasted anything like Oat of this Swirled, NO WONDER fans have been begging for its return for so long. This flavor is absolutely delicious! The swirl perfectly captures that baked cinnamon and oat taste you'd expect from the cookie but without any oats as far as I can tell. The buttery brown sugar base, which has always been one of B&J's best, perfectly compliments the swirl, cementing the cookie theme in taste. And the fudge flakes, while a bit strong, add a nice contrast.

author: ArtaShamarta
title: Pass.
text: I miss the Oatmeal Cookie Chunk flavor that was discontinued. I heard about this being a close replacement but it most definitely is not. I like the cinnamon, I like the chocolate chunks, but I miss the oatmeal cookie bits, and despise what they've done with the brown sugar. It kind of melts and sticks to the ice-cream creating this texture that reminds me of cookie dough. This is at something I never enjoyed. And the flavor is kind of like a butter-scotch. Also not for me. What is 'for me' is gone; The oatmeal cookie without any of this gooey gross stuff that reminds me of every other gimmicky approach Ben and Jerry's takes with their icecream. I may be in the minority but the only flavor they ever made that I like is gone. My taste buds may be in a minority but that is the way the cookie crumbles.

author: Niki3549
title: OMG
text: I literally ate this stuff for dinner. It's absolutely amazing and so satisfying. I was glad there were pieces of dark chocolate rather than fudge swirls. That made it so much better.

author: marie12
title: amazing
text: I almost never leave reviews but for this I had to. I've never had the original flavor others are talking about, but within the first few bites of this it instantly became my favorite ben & jerry's flavor. I don't know if I picked a good pint or they've improved it, but the swirl was perfect from top to bottom and the brown sugar base is yummy. While the chocolate flakes are small, I think if they were half the current size they would be even better. Other than that it's delicious!!

author: KemMD
title: Almost greatest ever...
text: I've read the reviews of others and like everyone else Oatmeal Cookie Chunk was my favorite ice cream ever... I appreciate the close second of this one but I miss the cinnamon base ice cream and the more present oatmeal cookie from the best one. I disagree with the less chocolate chunks though. I just think adding more cinnamon oatmeal cookie would balance it out to be a new favorite for all oatmeal cookie chunk lovers.

author: Bmj922
title: So tasty!
text: I think the ratio of chocolate chunk to oatmeal is just right. The cinnamon ice cream base is flavorful, but not too heavy. I can't buy enough of these pints!

author: Cosmodiva274
title: Bomb.com
text: I usually don't eat Ben and Jerry's ice cream, but this flavor intrigued me. And it did not disappoint!!! It is sooooo good, it has become my new favorite!

title: HOLY COSMOS
text: This has to be my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor yet. It's bursting with flavor that sends me rushing to when I was a kid after school sneakin' oatmeal cookies in my room to snack on! Definitely nostalgic in the most perfect way. The only negative thing I do have to say about it though is like a few people have stated already, the chocolate chunks are BIG. Some people enjoy that, but I feel like it upstages the oatmeal cookie. I want more of that than the chocolate. Thank you!!!

author: Yummmm
title: Best Flavor!
text: Amazing oatmeal cookie tasting ice cream, smooth and creamy, with generously sized chunks of chocolate. Hands down best flavor.

author: cierrajs
title: the best ice cream in the world
text: tried this ice cream once and i hardly ever buy another pint. the oat swirls are so good, it’s literally the perfect ice cream.

author: Meggers
title: Best flavor
text: In the pandemic, my husband and I have been systematically trying all your ice creams- this is THE BEST!!

author: Natalie3
title: The best flavor ever.
text: This is honestly the best flavor I have ever had. It is amazing but not overwhelming sweet.

author: uzuri09
title: A taste of Heaven!
text: Oatmeal Cookie by far was my absolute favorite ice cream of all times! I was in tears when it mysteriously disappeared out of grocery store freezers. But low and behold, dog on Ben & Jerry’s does it again! Oat of this Swirled is a taste from heaven above! I would say, however my last purchase had way too many fudge flakes for my liking but I just ate around them... I agree with the other reviewers would definitely like more cookie crunch! Nonetheless, thumbs up B&J!

author: Shawn from Chicago
title: One of the best ice creams I've ever had.
text: It took every inch of my will power not to eat the entire container in one sitting.

author: BJLUVER
title: Incredible.
text: This is my second favorite B&J flavor. Its creamy delciousness is not too cinnamon-y, which was the only thing holding my back from choosing this over cherry garcia. The chocolate chunks are large which matters a lot as well and the oats are the perfect consistency-- not grainy and chalk like. I'm so impressed with the geniousness of this flavor. It's superb and rich enough to enjoy but not so rich that you'll be doubled over in sugar agony. Absolutely wonderful.

author: Kim653
title: So thankful it’s back!
text: My favorite flavor growing up and now I can enjoy it once again

author: AYEMARJAY
title: BEST FLAVOR IN THE HISTORY OF MAN KIND
text: LOVE THIS FLAVOR. PLZ NEVER DISCONTINUE THIS FLAVOR.

author: Jesse
title: No Oatmeal At All
text: Went away from my favorites of the Cinnabon one, the Milk & Cookies one, and the best one ever - the new Truffle Kerfruffle one (personal fav). Very disappointed in my decision, as this one tasted sort of bland. I mean the brown sugar flavor was good dont get me wrong, but I guess I'm used to chunks, lots of them (like the Kefruffle one), the swirl just doesn't do it and it isn't enough. Glad I tried it though so I know, but back to the Kefruffle one!!!

author: SEM9788
title: Yummy
text: This is absolutely my favorite ice cream from Ben & Jerry's!! After I had my last son 2 weeks early and my milk was not yet in, I gave this ice cream a try from what others had said about it and it definitely help my milk come in. I ate it just about everyday the first week and my milk supply came in more then with my first son. Unfortunately the Walmart I get it from is always out, now! This stuff is so amazing it's gone before you know it.

author: ruggro12
title: My Favorite Ice Cream EVER.
text: When my girlfriend and I saw this we couldn't have been more excited to purchase! Her favorite B+J's ice cream was the oatmeal cookie crunch and this was so so so good. I agree with other people on maybe more oatmeal cookie/swirls inside but I can't get enough of this ice cream. It's incredibly dangerous to have in the freezer! Thank you for a great ice cream that we'll be purchasing -- and please don't put this in the graveyard!

author: Kelly78
title: Delicious!!!
text: Wasn’t sure about it when i first bought it....but then fell in love. Absolutely my favorite so far! But HARD to find now!! I was devastated when brownie batter disappeared and had not found another one I liked as much. I see people talking about an oatmeal cookie one that was made??? I missed that one. Maybe it will come out again. But love this flavor. Just hard to find. Like the elusive lochness monster. Lol.

author: Flowingink
title: Misleading
text: I was so excited to see an oatmeal cookie ice cream, my fave!! But although the name starts with "Oat," there's barely anything oat about it. In a blind taste test, I would say it's a chocolate chunk in a creamy vanilla base with a hint of cinnamon and caramel. I can not detect any oatmeal cookies. I wanted to love it; I am 90-95% dairy-free but made an exception for this. Won't eat the rest of the pint.

author: treasure hunter
title: I hunger for more
text: I bought a pint a week after I broke my arm. Even after 10 sequential pints this flavor doesn't get old. I must admit I even ate it for breakfast. The only disappointing aspect of this product is the lack of its presence on my local grocery stores' shelves. My arm healed quickly and is now strong, I accredit this to the hope packaged in a pint. Thank you from my past, present, and future self.

author: RachelS901
title: All time favorite ice cream
text: I've never had an ice cream that I was so excited about or was my go to flavor. Since trying oat of this swirled, I have found my favorite flavor. I love the slight caramel flavor of the ice cream, and the chocolate chunks that perfectly balance the cinnamon cookie swirl. The only crunch I got was from the chocolate chunks, which was the perfect balance of crunchy and creamy. Soo good!!

author: ktski2
title: MMMM Brown Sugar
text: Greatness was popularized with the takeover of overnight Oats. Oats and Oatmeal cookies have always been a favorite of mine, but have been scoffed at for most of my life. THey have typically been thought of as Grandma cookies because they likely contain raisin. Ben & Jerry's did this cookie justice by adding large chocolate chunks and capitalizing on the cookies brown sugary goodness.

author: Smands
title: I do love this a lot, but...
text: I was obsessed, absolutely obsessed with the oatmeal cookie chunk, and Oat of this swirled has nearly mended my broken oatmeal/cinnamon loving heart. I've had this 4 or 5 times now and there's hardly much of a cookie swirl at all. Maybe I'm just having bad luck, but mine have had little to no cookie. You really need to beef it up, and this flavor would truly be out of this world!!

author: mrshouston
title: Love it!
text: I stumbled upon the Oatmeal Cookie Crumble or Crunch and was so sad when it randomly disappeared. I've been looking here and there to see if they brought it back. I found this yesterday while at Target and my heart smiled. It's yummy! Would love more oatmeal cookie pieces but overall I love it. I'm going to buy more. So if you'd like to bring back the original that would be GREAT to.

author: sashak
title: THE MOST DELICIOUS ICE CREAM ON THE PLANET
text: Oat of this swirled is seriously out of this world! This is my favorite ice cream of all time. The abundance of snappy chocolate flakes! And the oaty, cinnamony swirls! YUM! I just wish this was carried in more stores! Luckily they've been stocking it at my nearby Star Market in Somerville, MA, but I have yet to see it in any corner stores or drug stores. I'm a forever fan!

author: VaBelleinTN
title: I LOVE this stuff.
text: So, years ago another ice cream brand made a flavor called Oatmeal Cookie. You could only get it in their ice cream shops (at least where I live) and I was obsessed with it. Sadly it disappeared around 2014. When I saw this in stores, I got excited because it sounded like the same ice cram and it pretty much is. It is sooooo good. Please don't even stop making this flavor.

author: Dr Bob
title: Needs less chocolate chunks and more oatmeal swirl
text: There's just too many chocolate chunks in this ice cream it tends to overpower the ice cream itself. It needs more of the cookie bits instead. Also, how about raisins?

author: Hondaman247
title: Good but still not oatmeal cookie chunk
text: I like this ice cream and it's close to my all time favorite oatmeal cookie chunk. Everytime I go to the store I go to the ice cream isle hopefully to find the best ice cream of all time, oatmeal cookie chunk. I've been doing this since Ben and Jerry's stop making it. I just wish you guys would stop messing with my ice cream emotions and make oatmeal cookie chunk again.

author: OatmealCookieMonsterCMS25
title: Such a heavenly mixture!
text: I bought this at Wawa and when I saw it had oatmeal cookie dough in it I HAD to try it. I'm an oatmeal cookie monster, its my favorite! and this flavor hits it on the head!! The brown sugar ice cream and the mixture of oatmeal cookie dough and then to top it with the chocolate chips.... literally amazing!! I hope this flavor doesn't go anywhere because this is delish!!

author: Rarepupper
title: The best flavor ever
text: I love this flavor so much. Everything is in perfect harmony. I'm very picky with ice cream flavors, but I'm a huge fan of brown sugar and I love how it's incorporated into this flavor. "Oat of This Swirled" really is out of this world.... It's heavenly! I'm hoping the grocery store keeps selling this flavor forever because I plan on buying it over and over again.

author: Annoyed
title: Love it IF I eat around the massive chocolate bars
text: It's a great flavor! I love it! BUT THOSE MASSIVE CHOCOLATE PIECES DRIVE ME CRAZY!!!! I've never had an oatmeal cookie with chocolate in it and don't like the combo. I pick them out. I like chocolate....I like oatmeal cookie but not together!

author: SarahSS
title: SO much better than I expected!
text: I was craving ice cream but B&J's was pretty much wiped out at my local grocery store. This was one of the only flavors left, but it's not something I'd typically go for. I got it anyway and oh my goodness, I'm so glad I did!!! It is so delicious, from the flavor of the brown sugar ice cream to the chocolate and cookie swirls. Will definitely purchase again.

author: thejackelynb
title: OUT OF THIS WORLD, yes. 10/10
text: Amazing ice cream, real creamy and buttery, love the oatmeal cookie added in. Best flavor in my opinion... One thing I suggest is not adding so many chocolate chip chunks, it kind of got in the way of the brown sugar buttery oatmeal cookies ice cream I was trying to enjoy. Eventually started picking them out of the ice cream, other than that, great flavor

author: Love oatmealcookiehunk
title: YES! YES! YES!
text: I went looking for the new bob Marley flavor and found this one! I couldn't believe that you brought something back similar to oatmeal cookie chunk. Even though that flavor was retired, I still went looking for it. Made my trip to the jersey shore worth it today! Posted it on Facebook right away. Brought me back to when my husband and I dated, love it!

author: bsals
title: A Gift From God Himself.
text: This miraculous flavor has the ability to get you a significant other, ace your exams, water your crops, clear your acne, do your chores, call up your distant relatives and tell them how much you love them (because you don't do it as often as they would like), give you 20/20 vision and bless your soul... There is nothing Oat of this Swirled cannot do.

author: Melissa
title: Holy moly!
text: I recently had my wisdom teeth out and when ice cream was an approved food, I went straight to the store. I bought this because I just to love the Oatmeal Cookie flavor Ben and Jerry's used to have and holy smokes is this amazing. Please make this a permanent flavor because I'm not sure how long I can make the four pints last! So tasty! I'm in love!

author: Honeyglow
title: So delicious!
text: I've never had the flavor I keep seeing everyone compare this to, so I can't make a comparison. However, I think this has quickly become my new favorite flavor, and I've been a ride or die for Cherry Garcia for half my life. The buttery brown sugar ice cream part is the perfect background for the chunks of chocolate and swirls of sweet cinnamon

author: Knowitall
title: From yours truly addicted
text: I can’t stop eating this ice cream. As a former scooper, I would think I would get sick of it but nope I keep coming back for more. I do agree with the earlier reviewers suggestion - more cookie swirl less chocolate chunks. The chunks are quite large and overwhelm the taste of the ice cream and the cookie mix. It hasn’t stopped me yet though.

author: Cjh25
title: Sweet tooth satisfying!
text: I wasn’t looking to try a new flavor but this one peaked my taste buds and oh my gosh, so good, so perfectly blended. I saw a lot of complaints about too much chocolate but I love the bitterness and crunch of the chocolate. It balances out the sweet cinnamon and brown sugar. Overall one of the best flavors! Creamy, crunchy and sweet!

author: AJK97
title: Amazing
text: I’ve tried many flavors but this one by far is the best. I personally think there needs to be a little more cookie pieces but don’t overdo it all of the components complement each other so well. I hope this ice cream stays as a “forever flavor”. Everybody loves it so much it’s the first flavor to sell out in my town in all stores. ❤️

author: JordanofIowa
title: A love story
text: Sometimes it takes losing something to know how much you loved it. Tragically, all the local grocery stores ran out of this flavor. It’s been three weeks now! It pains me to open my freezer and see the empty slot where Oat of This Swirled used to sit. Please, don’t take this flavor for granted. Enjoy every bite like it’s your last.

author: lexaylu
title: I LOVED IT
text: I bought this because of course, I am always down to try new flavors from B&J. I loved this ice cream with all of my heart, and I really hope it is here to stay forever! This ice cream is a definite favorite due to my love for oatmeal cookies, and it actually tasted like the oatmeal cookie dough and an actual cookie!!! Love it :)

author: Cris56
title: More Cinnamon Cookies less chocolate chuncks!
text: I tried Oat of this Swirled this weekend and really enjoyed it! The brown sugar base was delicious and such a unique flavor. However, I was disappointed by the large amount of chocolate flakes versus actual oatmeal cinnamon cookies. It made the overall flavor more chocolatey than the cinnamon/brown sugar flavor I was hoping for.

author: Chelshay
title: My favorite!
text: I love this flavor! I loved the Oatmeal cookie chunk flavor that they discontinued awhile back and was always so sad they got rid of it. When I saw this flavor and knew it was a lot like the old one I was so happy!!! My husband and I love it and can't put the tub down till it's empty haha please never get rid of this flavor!

author: ariicecream5
title: The greatest of them all
text: Oat of this Swirled has all the elements . . . it's got those classic B&J chocolate chunks, it's got those perfect cookie bites, it's got a nice, subtle, creamy base, it's got swirls of sugary deliciousness. I LOVE THIS FLAVOR! It's unseated Chunky Monkey after maybe half a decade as my FAVORITE OF THEM ALL!

author: Brianna
title: No cookie, lots of chocolate
text: There is barely any oatmeal cookie in this ice cream which is really disappointing since Ben and Jerry’s always has lots of good stuff in their ice cream. There are WAY TO many big pieces of fudge flakes. I was so upset I MADE MY OWN OATMEAL COOKIES TO SWIRL IN!!! When you do get a rare piece of cookie it is good.

author: McCaulley Culkin
title: Best Flavor in the World!
text: It is my favorite ice cream flavor of all time. BUT I do think that there needs to be more oatmeal cookie chunks and less fudge chips - or at least make the fudge chips smaller. Definitely more cookie chunks though! But it is delicious and if you ever stop making it.. I. WILL. NEVER. FORGIVE. YOU. BEN. & JERRY. :)

author: RedSoxRoxMySox
title: I don't even like oatmeal
text: A die-hard half-baked fan, i have seen the light. If Jesus got bored with plants and animals and peoples and decided to make an ice cream, it would be brown sugar. Beyoncé named the twins after this flavor. This was Victoria's Secret. I don't even like Oats and this ice cream still gave me a reason to live. Amen.

author: Baby
title: Too much fudge
text: I just bought this because I like the idea of oatmeal cookies in ice cream, but every spoonful was just fudge flakes. The ice cream itself is very good, but there are simply too many fudge flakes. I can understand putting a few in for texture, but this just made the ice cream too crunchy and was a disappointment.

author: PhantomFears685
title: Serious Love
text: This ice cream tastes like someone took an oatmeal cookie and made it into ice cream without being overbearing with the oatmeal or the cinnamon. Then, just for fun, they put chocolate in it.

author: lunedeclaire
title: The. Best.
text: I am loving this flavor so much: the oatmeal cookie chunks paired with the slabs of chocolate are just perfect. Is this flavor being discontinued? I am not able to find it as much as I used to be able to!

author: Smhayes
title: It turned me into "that girl"
text: I have never sat on the couch and ate ice cream before but after sampling this flavor that's exactly what I was doing 2 days later. I love this! I've bought it 3 different times now. Each time it's a bit of a surprise to see what the fudge flake to cookie swirl ratio is and I kind of enjoy that.

author: Scott
title: New Favorite Flavor
text: Never sure what flavor I want to get when in the mood for ice cream, but I enjoy new things. I was extremely surprised at how delicious this one was! Over the past several months, this has been my go to flavor! If you're unsure, go ahead and give it a try. You might be as surprised as I was.

author: rledoux
title: New Favorite Ice Cream
