text: This is hands down the best ice cream flavor Ben & Jerry's has. The oat meal cookie dough swirls with chocolate chunks mixed with the brown sugar ice cream makes for an unbeatable combination. This is like everything I love wrapped up in an ice cream flavor! Please say this is here to stay!

author: brandi3
title: FINALLY A REPLACEMENT
text: I absolutely loved the Ben and Jerry's Oatmeal Cookie Chunk ice cream. Definitely the best flavor of all time! I'm so glad there's finally a replacement. Oat of This Swirled is so close to the old flavor and does not disappoint. Happy to say I've finally got my favorite ice cream back!

author: aidenborealis
title: About to Be Discontinued?
text: What happened? This flavor is nowhere to be found. I checked the locator and no stock is found within a 100 mile radius. I live in a big city so this is kind of ridiculous! Please start stocking this flavor again! It was bad enough that you had to discontinue Oatmeal Cookie Chunk.

author: MegLatour
title: DELICIOUS
text: Oh My Lanta!! This flavor is beyond amazing... I was absolutely and pleasantly surprised at how delicious this ice cream ended up tasting. The buttery flavor DEFINITELY comes through in this, and the chocolate and oatmeal bits are just the cherry on top! LOVE THIS ONE!

author: Mommyof2
title: Absolutely love
text: I ate this icecream like every other day when I was breast feeding my son it helped with my milk supply and was super tasty but I haven't been able to find it anywhere for like a year now and I'm so upset please bring it back to my stores in Wilmington or hampstead

author: Jade
title: A Keeper!
text: All in all an oat-standing flavor that meets the need I didn't know I had for oats in ice cream. Even my roommate with impossibly high ice cream standards said this might be one of her favorite Ben & Jerry's flavors! I just wish there was twice as much swirl!

author: Robyn
title: New Favorite Ice Cream!!
text: I bought this flavor because I wanted to try something new and I am so happy I did! This is now my favorite flavor because it is a mixture of all the things I love! I hope this flavor stays around because if it does not I do not know how I will finish collge.

author: Lswizzle
title: Delicious!!
text: This was by far my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor. I usually have my few favorites and keep to them, but once I tried this, my mind was literally blown! I don't see this flavor around much anymore, but I'm hoping they keep making more of these!!!

author: McKenna
title: AMAZING!!!
text: I breastfeed my daughter and was told by a couple different people that eating this flavor of Ben and Jerry’s would help boost my milk supply, so I decided to try it out and it definitely works! The flavor is amazing as well! Super addicting!

author: Tennisman
title: Best. Ice cream flavor. Ever
text: I tried this in scoop shop and loved it spring 2017. Bought a pint and brought it home. My son saw it , tried it, finished it. So I bought another pint. My wife saw it, tried it , finished it. Had to buy more just so I could have some!

author: Gemmy
title: Just AMAZING
text: This has to be one of my favorite flavors. The fudge chunks and oatmeal cookie swirls just go so good together. I never tried Oatmeal Cookie Chunk so I can't say how it compares but I can't stop coming back to this one. Good job B&J :)

author: Kate
title: Mouth Watering!
text: This is the best of the new flavors! It's so creamy and lip-smacking sweet, and the flavor and integrity of the cookie swirl is divine. My usual favorite is Chunky Monkey, but I will be picking up Oat of this Swirled a lot more often!

author: Cait5
title: Tastes like an actual oatmeal cookie!
text: Melted in my mouth like the real thing. My boyfriend and I both love oatmeal cookies, and accordingly, both loved this flavor. The cinnamon & cookie swirls were fabulous, and the chocolate shards were plentiful. Great product.

author: Kimster
title: less fudge flakes
text: I would rate this higher if you would remove or reduce the chocolate flakes!! No need for chocolate flakes when there is so much other great flavor going on. It is too much with the extra chocolate. Sometimes less is more.

author: CCB68
title: Love This Flavor!!
text:
My favorite flavor was Oatmeal Cookie Chunk and was disappointed when it made it to the Graveyard. I was beyond excited when I saw Oat of This Swirled. Thank you, thank you, thank you
for bringing it back!!!

author: Madcali
title: One of my top 5!!!
text: I wished I had bought this by the case before it disappeared last time. So happy its back! I'll be stocking up just in case. It's a change from my usual chocolate favorites, cinnamony, with the chew oatmeal cookie- so good!

author: Sophiak117
title: Don't be fooled..its not the same
text: You played with my heart! I was hoping this would compare to the discontinued Oatmeal cookie Chunk but...... IT DID'NT. Please please bring back the Oatmeal cookie Chunk flavor, you will make millions of people so happy.

author: lyssi0407
title: The Best Flavor
text: I'm typically just a chocolate person, and would never even look at an Oatmeal flavor. However my friend got this flavor and I hate more of her pint than she did. It is beyond delicious! I turn all of my friends onto it.

title: Taste great, but..
text: Bought this flavor yesterday and I do agree with the other reviewers that are saying it needs more oatmeal cinnamon cookie swirl and less fudge flakes. Glad I'm not the only one thinking this. However I will buy again.

author: Oscar
title: Not as good as I expected!
text:
There was a lot of hype for this flavor being similar to oatmeal cookie chunk
The base brown sugar ice cream is kind of like a milder vanilla. It's decent, but there are many ben and jerrys flavors that are better!

author: Fuchsia
title: Pretty Good
text: I LOVED the now dead Oatmeal Cookie Chunk, so I was hoping this flavor would be similar. It is very yummy, and I love the flavor combo... But it isn’t as amazing and delicious as OCC. I still really like it though.

author: Meganlodon
title: Left me wanting more.
text: The mix ins are amazing I love the dough and the fudge flakes but the flavors of the ice cream was bland. Vanilla has a stronger flavor. Added cinnamon to it and it was AMAZING but sad I had to alter it at all

author: RRobb5897
title: My new best friend...
text: For years, my "go to" has been Cherry Garcia. And then out of the blue I decided to try Oat of This Swirled. I'm so glad I did! I do believe this is my new favorite! Well done B&J....well done. And thank you!

author: Russy
title: Wow!!
text: I love this flavor stumbled upon this while staring blankly in the freezer section. The taste us rich and comforting, tastes like my grandmothers homemake ice cream and cookies in the summer time. Thank you

author: LindaT
title: Nice
text: I'm not a fan of chocolate based flavors so was happy to try this one. It's pretty good. I was hoping for more oatmeal cookie taste and more vanilla tasting ice cream and less cinnamon. Still good though.

author: Cookiemunster
title: Close, but not quite!
text: I was excited when I saw this in the store yesterday! It is very close to my all time favorite, "Oatmeal Cookie Chunk", that was discontinued years ago; however, it definitely needs more oatmeal cookie!

author: jkkj1289
title: Thank you, thank you! My absolute favorite!
text: Thank you, thank you. My absolute favorite was always oatmeal cookie dough chunk and then it was gone. No warning. Just gone. This is it, slightly different but so very delightfully similar. Love it!

author: Emmaleee
title: YESSS!
text: F A V O R I T E! I always get the same flavor all the time but this once I go out on a limb and get this flavor and now I am embarking on a journey to try all different flavors! AH-MAZ-ING! sa good.

author: AnneM
title: Not good!
text: This might be one of the worst ice cream flavors I've ever had. So disappointed. Totally bombarded by cinnamon. I was hoping for more of an oatmeal cookie, and it just tasted like not good cinnamon.

author: Scraps
title: Finally something different
text: My boyfriend is amazing but very basic when it comes to ice cream, and always forces me to get Phish Food or Half Baked when we get ice cream. FINALLY we got something new and it was pretty great.

author: Lacey F
title: Don't ever leave me!!
text: I bought this on a whim to try something new and it has changed my life! Occasionally it's out of stock at my store and panic ensues. Please don't ever leave me! The cinnamon swirl is to die for!

author: Emilyns115
title: Disappointing!
text: I was so excited to see oatmeal cookie Ben and Jerry’s but was very disappointed with this. The flavor of the ice cream was good but there was no oatmeal cookie and way too many chocolate chunks.

author: Louisa
title: The Greatest Ice Cream in the Universe
text: I've been searching for the perfect ice cream and this is it. Love the brown sugar, cinnamon, and semisweet dark chocolate. Not too sweet & perfectly textured. Please don't ever discontinue it!

author: karlj2043
title: Yummy, but a bit boring
text: I wish this flavor had actual oatmeal cookie chunks as stated in the description on the pint. Also, the ice cream base tastes like vanilla, not "buttery brown sugar". It is still yummy though.

author: KMA10
title: Disappointed
text: This is a great flavor, however, there’s not enough oatmeal cookie swirl especially in comparison to the overwhelming amount of fudge flakes. Did anyone sample this before it was brought back?

author: SarahDee
title: Keep this one forever
text: This reminds me of an old ben and jerrys flavor that instead had cinnamon ice cream with oatmeal chunks that I used to get all the time and absolutely loved! This one is now my new favorite.

author: IceCreamPrincess
title: Top 5
text: I was hesitant to buy but lucky I did. I thought it would have been a hardcore oatmeal taste but I was pleasantly surprised it wasn't . It is now in my top 5 or maybe top 3. It's a must try

author: m8307
title: SO good
text: This caught my eye this week at the store and I picked it up. It is absolutely delicious. I wish the cookie chunks were a little bigger but the flavor is amazing. Definitely a new favorite!

author: Susieanna
title: Good Second
text: I too was hoping for something close to Oatmeal Cookie Chunk and was pleasantly surprised. It's my new go to ... but nothing will replace OCK as the all time favorite!!! #pleasebringitback

author: CW23
title: soooooo good
text: Tastes like a fresh baked oatmeal chocolate chip cookie. The brown sugar ice cream is to die for. It is perfectly sweet and cinnamony. Bliss in every bite. Please never stop making this.

author: Josh from VT
title: Surprisingly good
text: Not usually a huge oatmeal cookie fan, but combined with the brown sugar base and fudge flakes, Oat of This Swirled is very very good and surprisingly one of my favorite flavors of B&J.

author: niemasade69
title: the best ice cream EVER !!!
text: please please please dont ever stop making this favor. Started eating this after a had my son to help me with breastfeeding...it works!! But what really did it was the taste is amazing.

author: Rosie14
title: Deliciously addicting
text: A must try. The flavor of the brown sugar ice cream is to die for. Pair it with that sugar swirl and chocolate chunks and it'll win over your heart. Definitely a new favorite of mine!!!

author: Jess1984
title: Still miss the old version
text: Delish- there is no doubt but I still miss my all time favorite oatmeal cookie chunk!!!!! Is it possible to believe it will be brought back from the flavor graveyard?!? Please say yes!

title: BEST FLAVOR EVER
text: I'm really quite embarrassed to say how much ive bought since giving birth. Went to Wal-Mart and they didn't have it i was so dissapointed. I hope you always keep THIS FLAVOR PLEASE

author: Happy
title: Thanks
text: I thank you for bring back my "Oatmeal cookie chunk" in a different name "Oat of theswirled." I have been waiting on this flavor for years after several request on this same website!

author: Jennifer726
title: New favorite flavor
text: I tried this a week ago and OMG this is my favorite ice cream flavor. I never had something so addicting. I am not so proud top say i have had this everyday for the past 7 days.

author: IcecreamNick
title: Yummy
text: It is very good I love that buttery, creamy, cinnamon that is in Ben and jerries, I must say I like Ben and Jerry’s Cinnamon buns ice cream a little better but this is still good!

author: IceCreamGirlVa
title: Newest favorite
text: Tried this two days ago!! It is amazing. Usually I prefer chocolate above all others but this one knocks everything else out. The dirt spoonful reminded me of Christmas. Love it!!

author: Kittygirltx
title: Needs more oatmeal
text: I was an oatmeal cookie chunk addict so was very excited to see this today!! It is excellent but very little oatmeal, I would love to see bigger chunks of oatmeal in the future!!

author: Hawkadoodledoo
title: Simply the BEST
text: No combination of this anywhere and it is amazing!! The chocolate chunks add a nice crunch texture and the oatmeal flavor is heavenly!! My favorite, thank you Ben and Jerry’s!

author: Justice93
title: Best. Ice cream. EVER
text: It is seriously so good. Tastes just like Mexican fried ice cream in my opinion. The brown sugar base ice cream is pure deliciousness. Please never get rid of this flavor!!!

author: Amber2134
title: Favorite Flavor
text: My absolute favorite flavor! The swirls of brown sugar make my heart swoon. I’d like it even more with smaller chocolate chunks but will continue buying over and over again.

author: bridgespo97
title: SO GOOD.
text: I love this flavor. It's basically like an oatmeal chocolate chip cookie dough mixed in with vanilla ice cream. Put this on top of a waffle, and you got heaven girl friend.

title: Thank for blessing me with this
text: This flavor is amazing. The brown sugar ice cream is beautiful and the chocolate chunks have just the right crunch to them. Needs more oat cookie swirl! It's the best part!

author: SOuthernOat
title: Better than grandmas warm oatmeal cookies
text: I've been a fan for a long time and am always trying the latest new flavors. This by far tops the any of the classics. . This hits the sweet tooth just right. Delishhhhhh!

author: Marie6436
title: Breastfeeding lifesaver!!
text: Helps increase supply tremendously because of the oats , and tastes absolutely amazing. What more could you want during that 4 am feeding session. Wish it came in gallons

author: Lexx
title: Delicious!
text: I usually don't get anything besides my favorite Coffee Coffee buzz buzz buzz but I love oat anything so I decided to give it a try. This is delicious!!! 10/10 recommend!

author: Jamk989
title: My absolute favorite
text: Ever since I discovered this flavor I haven’t bought another one. It’s my absolute favorite. If the store doesn’t have this flavor or One Love I usually skip ice cream.

author: Heidi
title: OMG
text: This is like you brought back Oatmeal Cookie Chunk, the best Ben & Jerry's flavor! You have no idea how happy I am now. Thank you, Thank you.

author: vicky
title: great name for a great icecream flavor
text: Im not a big fan of icecream until I cam across the flavor. I'm wondering where this particular flavor of icecream has been in all my life. Good work Ben and Jerrys !

author: Tess
title: Love it but...
text: Love everything about this ice cream BUT I wish it had some bits of chewy oatmeal cookie in it. I think it would really elevate the ice cream experience over the top.

author: Nik12
title: Good flavor!
text: I bought this for the first time last night. It has good flavor. I would like to see it have a little more of the oatmeal cookie but I do like the chocolate flakes!

author: EL52
title: Excitement followed by letdown
text:
LOVED the Oatmeal Cookie Chunk flavor.
Was beyond excited when I saw this one. Great Ice cream NOT EVEN CLOSE to enough oatmeal cookie though. Beef it up please!

author: Tiff25
title: Best ice cream ever
text: I stumbled upon this ice cream while having a chocolate craving and decided against the chocolate and man was I so happy I did!! It was like a party in my mouth!

author: Queenie
title: OMG
text: This ice cream is SO DELISH. I do echo the other reviews asking for more cookie goodness, that cinnamony crunchy stuff is addictive!! Please more cookie crunch!

author: groovebot3000
title: My favorite flavor returns!
text: To this day I miss Oatmeal Cookie Chunk, and while this new incarnation is something slightly different it's still very much the flavor I loved and missed!

author: Suzie
title: My favorite.
text: I can’t get enough of this ice cream! Ever since I first tried it I am head over heels. It will be my go-to flavor until I find something better than this.

author: Headero5
title: Yummmm!!!
text: Uhhh my biggest weakness is ice cream and this is my favorite EVER!!! Wish it was easier to find!!! Nothing i could complain about and nothing compares!!

author: AnnaOatmealBanana
title: Absolutely Amazing!!!!
text: I've been craving Ben & Jerry's Oatmeal cookie ice cream ever since it went off the market a few years ago. This new flavor hits the spot. Must try!!!!!

author: Nycmarie89
title: So delicious!
text: This happens to be my favorite ice cream from Ben and jerrys! It taste exactly like brown sugar and oatmeal raisin cookies. Definitely worth the money!

author: Tdietrich
title: Delicious Swirls of Cookie Dough
text: I bought this ice cream and I fell in love. The brown sugar ice cream with the oatmeal cookie dough was a perfect combo. It was gone in 2 sittings.

author: Ssnyd715
title: Can’t live without this
text: This is probably one of the most amazing flavors out there! The perfect combination of oatmeal and cinnamon!!! Pregnancy cravings 100% satisfies!!!

author: Sue11
title: Good combo
text: Delicious flavor....love this combo, except the waxy chocolate. Salted caramel with the oatmeal cookie dough....that would hit it out of the park.

author: Juff
title: Delicious!
text: This stuff is great. Chocolate chip oatmeal cookie flavor! They even left out the nasty raisins that have ruined oatmeal cookies for SO LONG!

author: Katie12345
title: THE BEST
text: This is now mine and my husbands favorite flavor. I wish it had less chocolate chunks and more cinnamon cookie, but PLEASE DON'T DISCONTINUE IT!

author: Jes1972
title: My favorite!
text: Every time I find this in the store I buy at least 3 to have in stock! It is the BEST B&J flavor out there! Please keep it around forever!!!

author: Andrea22
title: My Favorite!
text: I don't eat much ice cream, but this flavor has me hooked. Don't change a thing about it! AND I'm happy to see it always in stock at my store.

author: JessRexx
title: Perfection in a pint!
text: This ice cream is perfect. It's my favorite. It's all I can think about when it's in my freezer. Great job Ben & Jerrys! This is a home run.

title: I hate this
text: I’m normally a big fan but the fudge was to much and I couldn’t find any oats just brown sugar. The brown sugar was very over powering.

author: watercrazed
title: Amazing!
text: If you loved the oatmeal cookie chunk like I did, you'll love this ice cream! It's everything I want in a pint of ice cream and more.

author: Drew
title: Addictive
text: Wow, cookies and ice cream, such a great combo. Even better is to make toll house cookies and put the ice cream between two cookies!

author: Haley
title: Amazing!
text: I have had so many pints of this! It’s soooo good! Unfortunately I can’t find it at my local Walmart anymore. I will keep searching!

author: crissy100
title: THE BEST
text: Im so happy i tried this flavor. it tastes incredible! so cinnamony & creamy. i 100% recommend it if you're into cinnamony things!!

author: Augatino
title: Oatmeal cookie
text: This used to be my first favorite ice cream until they came out with the s'mores limited edition. I would switch between the two.

author: Btfly54
title: So Good!
text: I bought this yesterday hoping it would be like the Oatmeal cookie one you had before. Not quite the same but I really loved it!

author: HaleyElise120120
title: My favorite!
text: It's the best! I'm currently breast feeding and it increases my supply!! Benefits the baby and mommy gets the best treat ever!!

author: Chae
title: Breakfast for dessert and dessert for breakfast
text: Bought it to try, and it was soo delicious!!! I loved the oat taste and it came through beautifully with the brown sugar. Yum!

author: SUNKISSES26
title: SO GOOD!
text: MY FAVORITE FLAVOR!!! IF YOU HAVE NEVER TRIED IT GIVE IT A CHANCE, I DON'T LIKE OATMEAL COOKIES BUT THIS ICE CREAM IS AMAZING

author: LoveAmazin
title: Love This Unique Taste
text: The Oatmeal part is sensational. The only thing I don’t like is the chocolate chips. The ice cream really can do without that

author: Stephie1981
title: My All-Time Favorite
text: I absolutely LOVE this and hoard it every time I find it. Just wish it was in more stores near me! It’s perfect!!! :) :) :)

author: Krisi
title: It's Back!
text: I was so sad when oatmeal cookie chunk was taken from my world. Now I am the happiest person ever, my world is complete!

author: jwall64
title: Great Taste
text: Brown sugar, cinnamon and oatmeal, What a combo! With the success of Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough this just made sense.

author: M4sSh3ph3rs
title: This flavor changed my mind on Ben and Jerry!
text: This was absolute bliss. I literally told everyone l talked to the next day after trying it that it was a life changer.

author: Scooby
title: My life is better now!
text: My life is so much better with Oat of this Swirled in it! I’m quite the ice cream snob but this right here....heaven!

author: tellymonster
title: Perfect Balance
text: This is the perfect balance of ice cream, oatmeal, and chocolate. I wish I could find more stores that carried it.

author: Calvin
title: Out of this World!! Lol
text: Best Flavor of ice cream I've ever Had!! over all the brand's! #nevergetridofit #icecreamhevan #toogoodtobetrue

author: twing
title: Best Ben&Jerry’s Flavor
text: This is the absolute best Ben&Jerry’s ice cream flavor ever! Great do people who love cinnamon and chocolate. :)

author: HelloMyLove143
title: Fantastic!
text: Perfect combo of my favorite swirl from Oatmeal cookie mixed with large chunks of chocolate chip! I'm obsessed!

author: KimPossible
title: Absolutely fantastic
text: 100% to die for. This beats my old favorites by a landslide. This is dang terrific. Its perfect. Im salivating.

author: Alynicole18
title: Large hole in bottom of pint
text: I bought a pint and there is a large hole in the bottom I’m disappointed because I didn’t get the full product

title: Absolutely Delicious!
text: Oat of the Swirled is a wonderful flavor! The chocolate chunks are perfect...please don't change the formula!

author: Jackie54
title: OMG - please don’t take this flavor away
text: Please Please Please keep this one. I am totally addicted to it. Just the right balance of all the flavors.

author: Lisa538
title: Oh wow!
text: This may just be the perfect ice cream!! I'm so glad I took a chance and tried it, what a great combination!

author: Gsxr
title: Not worth it.
text: Vanilla ice cream swirled with light cinnamon and fudge flakes. That is all it is. Mad I spent $5 on this.

author: DMP Oatmeal Lover
title: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaamazing!
text: I bought this for the first time yesterday. I want to marry this ice cream. Holy Moly, it is delicious!

author: Melle
title: Amazing!
text: This was my first experience with trying Ben & Jerrys ice cream and I am totally addicted to this flavor

author: AmberLoren
title: I could literally cry!
text: When Oatmeal Cookie Chunk was taken away I was devastated! I am so happy it's sort of "back" in a way!

author: JohnMuir
title: Not bad. Please, less fudge flakes and a bit....
text: Not bad. Please, less fudge flakes and a bit more cinnamon cookie swirl. It would be a perfect pint.

author: Savanna
title: I'm obsessed with this flavor
text: Everything about Oats of This Swirled is right. I have a hard time not eating an entire pint at once.

author: Megz
title: Oh my god delicious!!
text:
Yum yum yum!!! Best flavor ever. Have only bought four so far, (lol) but I'll be back for much
Nore

author: cassmolass
title: Top notch pun: Top notch ice cream
text: Literally the best ice cream I've had in ages! Why is this not in every grocery store (YET)???

author: ImpeccableEats
title: Oat(ta) this Sw(orld)
text: Im usually skeptical of new flavors but the description was too good to pass up. And i love it

author: Sassy
title: In love!!
text: I bought it last night and then had a dream about it when I went to sleep. Sooooo delicious!

author: OOTW
title: ABSOLUTELY Oat of this Swirled!
text: This Ice cream flavor is what gets me through my bad weeks and honestly just makes me happy!

author: Holeinmyshoe
title: Please sell more of this flavor! I love it
text: It’s the only flavor I’ll eat from Ben & Jerry’s and I can’t seem to find it anymore in NYC

author: Happywoman
title: Best ever!
text: I tried this today and it is my new favorite! Odd combination but the result is delicious!

author: Cfurney
title: WOW jusy WOW
text: This is probably my new favorite flavor. It has great flavor throughout and was so good.

author: Mindy
title: Delicious!
text: This is my absolute favorite ice cream! I could eat it everyday and never get enough!!

author: Micmaculous
title: Mmmm
text: So good! Like a delicious oatmeal cookie fresh from the oven- but in an ice cream.

author: Tori_nic
title: Absolute favorite
text: My husband and I can’t get enough of this flavor it’s definitely our favorite one.

author: Jo Hanna
title: Please keep this!!
text: Love this new flavor! Reminds me of the old oatmeal cookie which I still miss!!

author: Michelledvm2010
title: Omg!! Are you serious?!?!
text: This is the most amazing Ben and Jerry's ever. Please never stop making this!

author: Gabby93
title: The bomb
text: Omg the best flavor ever. Will be so disappointed if it’s ever discontinued

author: Luckdragon
title: Omnomnomnomnom
text: It's like a frozen oatmeal chocolate chunk cookie milkshake! SOOOOO GOOD!!!

author: Jlott
title: Taste like heaven
text: Will never buy another flavor of ice cream , by far the best I've ever had

author: taxidayy
title: Yum!
text: Love the cookies & brown sugar ice cream! Definitely one of my favorites ~

author: MarkChana
title: Oatmeal Cookie Chunk Lite
text: No flavor can replace Oatmeal Cookie Chunk, but this is a solid option.

author: Rika
title: So good
text: Delicious! It just needed more oat cookie swirl and less fudge chunks.

author: J0SH
title: Best Flavor Ever!
text: Felt like trying something new and now I don't want any other flavor!

author: Mackey
title: Best Ice Cream Evah!!!!!!!!
text: I had this ice cream yesterday and will be buying it again very soon!

author: Indi
title: amazing
text: bought this flavor on a whim and LOVE it great paired with a brownie

author: Zshaplaflare
text: Best they have please do not get rid of this. Needs to be permanent.

author: KittyPurry24
title: Close to perfect!
text: I just don't think it needs chocolate. Otherwise it's so delicious!

author: Joeshmo
title: So Good!
text: Currently eating this for breakfast! I believe this is my new fav!

author: Jacksmom
title: One of my favs
text: The combination of flavors are great and the texture is awesome!

author: Mblzer
title: Love it!
text: This ice cream is amazing! I wish it wasn't so hard to find!

author: Kelcy
title: Love this flavor
text: Love this flavor. Like that it is new a different flavors

author: Courtneyc1985
title: AMAZING
text: This is the BEST flavor they make!!! Absolutely sinful!

author: Jv12345678
title: Best one.
text: I'm super picky but this one is light and delicious !!

author: Marcus
title: Totally Oaty
text: Over at first swirl and please except my short review.

author: Starchile
title: Good try but NOT ENOUGH OATMEAL COOKIES
text: B&J skimped on the cookie dough! Oatmeal nonexistent

author: Grayclick
title: The best
text: This is the best Ben and Jerry’s flavor of all time.

author: Bear
title: Oatmeal is back!
text: Sooo Glad the Oatmeal Cookie Ice Cream has returned!

author: ice_cream_fanatic
title: Very satisfying at any hour of the day!
text: Amazing texture: creamy and solid chocolate chunks.

author: Trent
title: Love this flavor
text: I’ve been getting this flavor everyday for a month!

author: ksmays14
title: One of the best ice cream combinations ever!
text: This is definitely on my favorites list! AMAZING!!!

author: Joeylee83
title: Move over Cherry Garcia
text: My new favorite flavor. I love Oatmeal cookies!!!

author: GinaP
title: Amazing!! My new favorite flavor
text: Love this!! This flavor is definitely my new go-to

author: Clarke92
title: Great!
text: Has to be one of my new favorite flavors!!!!!!!!!!

author: Isa G
title: Amazing!
text: One of the best flavors! I hope it sticks around:)

author: BJLUVER
title: Peanut butter goodness
text: Now you have to be in a peanut butter mood to have this ice cream, but when you are, it's the best. I'm impressed. It would be easy to make the rookie mistake of going for the cream when you're only feeling somewhat ~nutty~ but this is a flavor that makes you commit. So before you purchase, ask yourself, am I feeling nuts enough for this today? If the answer is yes, then taking home a pint of this ice cream will probably be the best decision you make all day. This is not necessarily my favorite flavor, but it is a fantastic one.

author: Jackie3
title: Good flavor but big chunks
text: Love the peanut butter flavor but the peanut butter cups are too big. They should be more broken up. With them being so big it makes it overpowering.

author: FuzzyGut
title: Peanut butter cup magic
text: What can I say about this one? It’s a simple concoction: peanut butter ice cream loaded with little peanut butter cups, and it is SUBLIME! As per usual, the ice cream flavor and texture are perfect and the pb cups are also. It’s also very dense and heavy so you feel good n’ full after you polish off a full pint (if you manage it). This is one amazing pint that always makes me feel better. I could eat this every night!

author: Fanny
title: Thank you for this ice cream
text: I love peanut butter ice cream an d an never find it. Peanut butter cups are also my favorite candy. This combination is the absolute best. I hope you consider changing your pint slice to the peanut butter ice cream instead of the vanilla.

author: angelofsa
title: WOW
text: Addict since the first time i tasted. WAY TOO PERFECT!!!

author: Kelltini5
title: My favorite!!
text: If you love peanut butter, this is the one for you!! Sometimes there's not enough peanut butter cups, but the peanut butter ice cream is good all on it's own.

author: yaacov
title: Great flavour!
text:
Really enjoyed this flavour of ice cream! though I have to say that the peanut butter cups were usually whole or half... I think quarters would prob be better as they would be distributed more evenly through out the pint and allow more ice cream to be eaten with them.
Also, I love the fact that because it's peanut butter, I (personally) can't eat a whole pint in one go, so it makes pace it out and last longer (very important in exam period) :)

author: Pietro
title: The absolute best
text: This is as good as it gets. My absolute favorite B&J flavor, as well as probably my favorite flavor of icecream. It broke my heart when they stopped producing it in my country.

author: Intcel
title: Love it!
text: I am addicted to this ice cream. The only negative thing I can come up with is when there are too many butter cup chunks are in the same pot. They are just too hard and too sweet to be eaten without a sufficient amount of that smooth and mild peanut ice cream.

author: richy
title: smooth and delicious
text: After trying the magnum peanut butter flavour last week, I had to try this and its just as good! Smmoth peanut butter gives texture to the ice cream (and you can still taste the cream!) and the chunky chocolate gives the contrast.

author: susaneatsalot
title: big cups!
text: woo what a flavor! super peanut butter sugar goodness in the cream. but the cups? huge. like really chunky cups... which is cool if you're into that kind of thing! but my boyfriend and i felt like we were just eating Reese's with frozen Milk. Also.. kind of wish it had a social justice kick to it.. i really loved the one ice cream with the pictures of the young people on it! so awesome,

author: Victoria_gr
title: The ice cream of my dreams
text: Really even if you are not a fan this ice cream will blow your mind !!!!!

author: McKayla
title: Perfect
text: I have eaten this many many times... It is literally perfection.

author: DC24
title: Peanut Buttery Goodness!
text: One of my all time favorite ice creams, which is saying a lot because I usually do not go for peanut butter ice creams! The perfect blend of chocolate and peanut butter. Unlike most peanut butter cup ice cream flavors, they do not skimp on the peanut butter cup pieces. There are generous hunks of peanut butter cup throughout the pint! If you like peanut butter cups and you like ice cream, then you should definitely give this one a try.

author: IceCreamConnoisseur
title: Ratio off, HUGE PB cups. Still yummy.
text: The packaging of this product reflects that the peanut butter cups are chopped up and distributed evenly. The pint I got had huge PB cups, like they were only chopped in half once and they were all near the top. Now this wasnt a terrible thing but sadly as we got past the halfway point there was no more delicious chocolate PB cups for us to enjoy. Made the last of it disappointing.

author: Marenghi
title: Peanut butter cups too large
text: The picture on the pint shows chopped up peanut butter cups distributed throughout the ice cream, but the pints I've tried had full or halved pieces in the middle of the pint and no smaller pieces throughout. Not a good mix-in.

author: linds
title: Great flavor, not enough cups
text: I bought this expecting a lot of peanut butter cups like I received the last three times I bought the product, but was disappointed when there were barely any. The ice cream was still very tasty, but it was a slight let down.

author: Bri L
title: Best flavor ever!
text: I continue to buy this flavor, it's amazing! The balance of peanut butter ice cream to large chunks of PB cup pieces makes this masterpiece true perfection! I am not a huge peanut butter fan, but from this first time I tried it, I knew I was hooked. This is the only ice cream I buy! Good job Ben &Jerry for making the best (in my opinion), flavor in the whole world! Two thumbs up and 5 stars!!!

author: Ookami
title: LOOVEE IT
text: I bought this for the first time here in holland and oh god it's soo good!! I'm not even a peanut butter fan but this is delicious!

author: cjlaw
title: The Absolute Best
text: I cannot stop eating this one! Cannot walk into the grocery store and not buy 5 pints or more at a time. I love it.

author: BlueberryJonez
title: My faaaaaavvvvv
text: I'm eating some now thinking why is there no peanut butter sauce? Or what about just having peanut butter ice cream by itself? Just some ideas to add to the best ice cream ever

author: karmixxy
title: My favorite!
text: I am buying this ice cream for my cheat meals after heavy leg days, because I looove peanuts, I believe this ice icream is healthy, but it could contain less sugar :) Also our stock in Slovenia is so small, and we have like 6 different tastes, and they are almost 7 eur, which is expensive in comparison with American price.

author: Baldone007
title: Very grainy
text: Getting married in 3 days. Cooked my Fiance lovely dinner followed by Strawberry 's dipped in Chocolate and this icecream. $13 for half litre. Purchased from Charlies in Bassendean . Very grainy/ gritty. Perhaps had been thawed & refrozen. Bugger, Sue loves those boutique icecreams & this one missed the mark

author: cupcake1221
title: Delicious!
text: This is definitely one of my favorite ice cream flavors! The peanut butter ice cream has the perfect sweetness to it, and the peanut butter flavor is not too overpowering. I personally enjoy the larger chunks of peanut butter cups mixed with the smaller chunks. It is overall very delicious!

author: WorldPeace
title: Mouthwatering!
text: I’ve never been a huge fan of peanut butter, but Ben and Jerry, you did it again. When I took my first chunky scoop- Pure. Magic. Creamy, chunky, and chocolatey all rolled into one. I do recommend a chocolate swirl just so it’s balanced out. Otherwise, delicious.

author: daddypgh
title: PB Cup - My favorite B&J Flavor
text: I get a pint of this about every other week, it's AMAZING. If you're a peanut butter lover, this is the one you've been looking for. Peanut butter ice cream with generous sized chunks of peanut butter cups. They taste super delicious too! The best.

author: Kitty87
title: Too good to keep in the house!
text: I lose all control around this ice cream. I have to be careful about having it in the house because sometimes I can't stop myself from eating the whole pint in one sitting. It is so balanced and perfectly sweet. Well done Ben and Jerry!

author: Mek0060
title: Delicious!
text: I hadn't had Ben & Jerry's in years. My husband brought home several different pints last night and OH WOW the peanut buttery, creamy indulgence of Peanut butter cup! I'm not even a big ice cream fan but this flavor is my new weakness!

title: Give me the PB Cups!!!
text: I have GOT to know how to get my hands on JUST the pb cups. They’re so much better than Reese’s cups And those are my favorite guilty pleasure. I buy the icecream just so I can pick the cups out and eat just them! Ha

author: amyjo
title: Peanut Butter Cup Heaven!
text: One of my top favorite go-to flavors! Each pint I've purchased is jammed packed with peanut butter cups. The cups have a nice balance of chocolate and peanut butter, which gives it a nice chocolate crunch texture.

author: nnarely
title: Absolute Favorite
text: This is the ice cream flavor that really sold me on Ben and Jerry’s. The ice cream is sweet and peanut buttery and then there’s just loads of chocolatey peanut butter cups. The ratio is just perfect.

author: Marky
title: Disappointing quality for the price
text:
A bit artificial flavor. Very powdery. Tastes like a not very good processed powder milk with just a hint of peanut taste.
Chocolate bits to big.
However, not the worst ice cream I’ve had.

author: SirWased
title: No peanutbutter cups for me
text: I'm not one for peanut butter cups and certainly not in ice cream, so my review may suffer for it on that account, but that's the way it is.

author: Melposer012
title: Pint
text: I had a whole pint with not one peanut butter cup. Plus it was so grainy. It was like it had thawed and been frozen again several times...

author: Keyl
title: I wish I could purchase a gallon!
text: This is by far my FAVORITE ice cream in the world. I usually have to purchase 2 at a time. I wish these came in gallon sizes!

author: eliz13413
title: Suggestion to make this good flavor GREAT.
text: This is very good ice cream. Tasty, reliable. However, it would be GREAT with a peanut butter swirl added to it!

author: Bellaandjerrys
title: Delicious
text: The flavor is amazing but I'm only giving 4 stars due to the size of the peanut cups. Makes it difficult to eat

author: Jetblack11
title: Best Ice Cream I’ve Ever Had
text: Perfect creamy peanut butter flavored ice cream with PB cups spread throughout. Dangerous stuff.

author: JJ_riptide
title: Amazing taste
text: I bought this yesterday and it’s already gone I love so much

author: hyruler
title: BEST FLAVOR
text: makes me never want to eat another ice cream flavor ever

author: Ohbootyy
title: The best
text: Buy far the best brand of peanut butter cup icecream.

author: Goldensmiles
title: TOTALLY ADDICTED!!!
text: This ice cream actually had me spend a whole Sunday afternoon going to 3 different Targets to purchase it! I finally found some at the 3rd Target but was fully prepared to go to a 4th if necessary. THAT is how good this ice cream is!! The chocolate is rich, the peanut butter is perfectly blended in but then you get COOKIES TOO?? It just makes your mouth happy! I was addicted from the first spoonful and buy it in 3's whenever I find it. I almost hate to tell people about it because then it's less for me!!! Don't ever stop making it or we will be picketing in front of your factory!! LOL

author: Kdub
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVERRRRRRR
text: NOTHING ELSE MATTERS. TARGET RUNS OUT. HELP! RUINED FOR ALL OTHER ICE CREAM

author: Phish Food Fan
title: Good flavor but ...
text: This is a tough one for me. I’ve tried 3 pints of this and the flavor is great. The chocolate ice cream base is perfect. It’s rich and creamy. The flavor of peanut butter and cookie swirls is also really really good. My problem is with how hard the swirls are. In my 3 pints, they were so hard that I could barely crack them with my spoon and they come out in one really big mass which makes eating the ice cream a bit of a wrestling match. But it all tastes SO good! It’s really decedent and rich and extremely filling. I will continue to buy it, I just wish it was easier to eat.

author: FuzzyGut
title: Why does this keep happening?!
text: So this is the second pint of a peanut butter focused flavor (the first being peanut buttah core) where the swirls are rock hard and jammed in the middle of the pint! I don’t get it. I have had countless Ben and Jerry’s pints and most have been perfect but I have to admit this is really starting to bother me! It isn’t supposed to be this way. I don’t to stop exploring new flavors but I feel like maybe I should just stick to my tried-and-true favorites. I’m sorry to be a downer but I’m really not happy that 2 out of 2 peanut butter pints had inedible swirls and cores! I usually give gushing, glowing reviews on here and I’m not a hard to please jerk. I just want ice cream I can eat.

author: Janie96
title: Best ice cream ever
text: PLEASE sell this product in other places aside from target. Half the time they are out. If you haven't tried it, you must. Love, love love.

author: JessU
title: The BEST Ben & Jerry's flavor to date!!
text: Im addicted!! Target shows this is an "exclusive & limited" flavor...PLEASE...dont get rid of this!!!

author: Jojo
title: Heaven on Earth
text: I can only find this at Target. From the first bite I immediately consumed the whole pint. Totally worth it. I love peanut butter Swirls and ice cream and the nice cookie crunch was a pleasant surprise. This is the only ice cream I will eat from now on

author: Paulb2112
title: Greatest I’ve Cream Flavor Ever?
text: Yes. I can’t stop eating this even though I promised I was done with ice cream. It’s like the crumbly cookie from a Carvel Birthday Cake, and salty peanut butter. It’s become my favorite all time ice cream. Please sell it in all stores.

author: Rms48
title: Best Ice Cream Ever
text: This ice cream is amazing. Never ever get rid of it!!

author: jeffjen2112
title: OMG B&J ur awesome
text: I was shopping at target about 3 weeks ago, and I'm a peanut butter junkie, seen thus out of the corner of my eye. that night tried it the peanut butter infused, with cookie crunch, and chocolate ice cream, holy moly... my only upset is they only had 2 and since then I have not been able to find at either Meijers, Wal-Mart's, and target has not received more so I'm dieing over here. If ur a peanut butter, chocolate with a cookie crunch person this is the best combo to date

author: fishdork74
title: Simply Wonderful!
text: What a wonderful combination! I thought you couldn't beat the combination of chocolate and peanut butter, but you totally did when you added chocolate cookie swirls to the mix. Thank you! Please keep making this flavor, it is my favorite by far!

author: Maggie5
title: Amazing! Best ice cream ever!
text: This flavor is incredible! Please take this off the special edition list and make it a regular flavor. It is perfection! Perfect blend of chocolate and peanut butter are delicious, and the PB swirls are exactly what I’ve been looking for. No other company makes an ice cream flavor like this. I have been buying it every time I go to Target. In fact it has increased my overall ice cream sales significantly. Thank you!! Please keep this flavor in circulation.

author: hm509
title: My favorite B&J flavor
text: Every time I need a peanut butter fix, this is my first thought

author: JennA
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!
text: I got this randomly when I was at target one day and I'm in love! Hands down the best chocolate peanut butter ice cream ever. I do usually get it at target because it's cheaper there... but the grocery store next to my house does sell it!

author: NLK1
title: OMG - Beyond Yummy
text: This is a MUST. I tried it for the first time about a month ago. I've been looking for it ever since. EUREKA!!! I found it again yesterday and bought two. I so love this flavor! THANK YOU for being so wonderful.

author: LibrarianLynn
title: Wowza!
text: SO good! I would make a special trip to Target just to get this. VERY glad that B&J resisted putting hard chunks in this flavor like they do in so many of their flavors. This is rich and chewy and perfect.

author: Mackkwalkk
title: Awesome
text: I love all Ben and Jerry’s and this is my absolute favorite! I’ve been stocking up since it’s an exclusive. I would hate to see this flavor go, definitely should be added to the list of full time flavors!!

author: EDVaughn
title: Best Ben and Jerry’s Flavor
text: And it’s not even close! Just wish it was everywhere instead of just at Target. Three times I have planned on making it last multiple evenings. All three times I finished the whole pint in one sitting.

author: Bruce
title: Absolutely perfect!!!!
text: This might be the best flavor of ice cream ever!! Please consider selling it at non Target locations so everyone can get their hands on this! At the very least, don't stop selling it there!

author: Peanut Butter Lover
title: Misleading Flavor Name
text: How can this flavor be called "Peanut Butter World" when 2 out of the 3 ingredients listed in the description of the ice cream are chocolate? And in the ice cream itself, it's 95% chocolate. Is this a joke? The title makes no sense. Where's the peanut butter in this peanut butter world? The description says "Milk Chocolate Ice Cream with Peanut Buttery Swirls & Chocolate Cookie Swirls". How did you come up with the title from those ingredients? I love Ben & Jerry's ice cream, but y'all put chocolate in almost every flavor, even when it doesn't belong and it's so unnecessary. I love peanut butter flavored everything and most peanut buttery treats aren't peanut buttery enough for me. I just don't like chocolate that much and because of that I was very disappointed with this flavor.

author: You can call me David
title: This is the. Perfect. Ice. Cream.
text: This is the only flavor I buy anymore. It is the epitome of ice cream. I dare anyone to try it and say otherwise.

author: sarahsicecream
title: Please never leave me, Peanut Butter World
text: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. I go out of my way to Target to buy it and no other ice cream compares. Please make this one full time and expand it to Walmart or something!! It's the perfect combination of salty and sweet, peanut butter and chocolate. The cookie crunch is the icing on the... ice cream. Anyway, it's wonderful.

author: Lashawn
title: My new best Ben and Jerry's flavor!!!!
text: I saw this flavor on the website and went to my local Target to get it. I was in love after my first bite. I love the combination of the peanut butter and rich chocolate ice cream. The cookie swirl is so good! Please don't stop making this flavor. It is one of your best in my opinion. This is my new favorite flavor!

author: Loonat64
title: Yum!
text: It's. So. Good. Definitely the best flavor to come out in a long time! But please make it available in places other than Target. It's inconvenient to get to and they never stock enough of this flavor. Give the people what they want! More Peanut Butter World!

author: Natasha
title: Perfect Amount of Peanut Butter
text: I'm always searching for ice cream with peanut butter and often disappointed by the sparse amounts of peanut butter. The peanut butter world ice cream has the perfect blend of peanut butter and chocolate. I hope this flavor remains available!

author: pb_choc_lover
title: Best. Ice. Cream. Ever.
text: I never have to think about it if someone asks me my favorite ice cream flavor - it's Peanut Butter World, hands down! I really wish I could find it in more stores than Target. It is the perfect ice cream flavor. Please never stop making it!

author: Ahaley73
title: Amazing!!
text: Made a special trip to target just to try all the new flavors and so far this is my favorite! If you like peanut butter you will love this! I think I’m going to need to make another hour trip to target again to get more!

author: Stephbdvm
title: Amazing
text: This is the best ice cream ever. It’s the only flavor I eat. The peanut butter is the very best flavor and the cookie texture is the bomb. I wish it wasn’t exclusive and I could find it more places. Love love love this.

author: Momma J
title: OMG
text: Just found this flavor today and ate the whole pint already. I love Peanut Butter Fudge Core and this is soooo much creamier and the cookies add a nice texture. Please don’t take this one away!!!

author: PBisForMe
title: Amazing!!
text: This flavour is amazing! It’s like my favourite parts of the Tonight Dough, in its own pint. Can you please bring this one to Canada? I promise we love PB in the great white north.

author: dmhrdh
title: Favorite!
text: This is, without question, the best ice cream flavor in the world....and I consider myself an expert. I only wish I could find it at other spots besides Target.

author: Akd76
title: I need more of this in my life.
text: PB World is my favorite ice cream flavor ever. It's hard to find on my town! If I can't find it, I go with my #2--Chocolate Fudge Brownie.

author: AK21
title: AMAZING!!!
text: Had never seen this one before but it changed my life. Been a B&J's fan for as long as I can remember and this is definitely my new #1!

author: DrAmanda
title: The best
text: This is my favorite ice cream flavor ever, and I’m addicted to ice cream! Only wish it was sold in more stores than just Target!!

author: SundaeSundays
title: Heaven in a pint!
text: This is my new favorite! I hope Ben & Jerry's always carries Peanut Butter World because it makes the world a better place :)

author: ilovethisflavor
title: DefreakingLicious
text: This was an example of heaven on Earth. By far the best ice cream flavor yet to be invented. 14/10 recommend.

author: kacey20
title: amazing icecream
text: please never take this flavor away its amazing im so inlove with it please keep it 10/10

author: Aham2
title: Amazing
text: This is the best flavor Ben and Jerry's has come out with!

author: melia29
title: Best PB ice cream there is!!!
text: I love peanut butter in general and have tried many peanut butter ice creams. From the moment I tried Peanut Butter World, I knew I had found a favorite. What makes it different (and freakin delicious) is the crunch of cookie in every bite. There was a period of time when Target was sold out and I was seriously going through withdrawals! If you love peanut butter, do yourself a favor and try this ice cream. You’re welcome.

author: lauren327
title: Please don't EVER stop making this!
text: I've been buying this flavor for about three years now, and while I'm not a fan of ice cream typically, this is DIVINE. I buy it 4 canisters at a time at any Target I can find. Some may say it has too much peanut butter in it (or something similarly insane), but this is really the only ice cream on the planet that I enjoy. I only wish I could find it at more places.

author: WickedAnnabella
title: Best Peanut Butter Swirls!
text: This is the #1 best chocolate-peanut butter ice cream you can buy. Ben & Jerry's other peanut butter ice creams are not as good due to the inclusion of mini peanut butter cups, which lack the peanut butter flavor you get from the swirls in this flavor. As far as I know you can only buy Peanut Butter World at Target, and I've made special trips just for this!

author: Marisa
title: Siren's Call
text: Every time I think I have shaken off my love for this ice cream the combination of sweet chocolate and salty peanut butter drags me back in. The chocolate is sweet without being cloying, and the peanut butter offsets that perfectly. This is the ice cream I choose to splurge on (eat an entire container of) for my birthday.

author: Kristenmarie211
title: By far my favorite flavor
text: My favorite part about Ben & Jerry's is that they don't have corn Syrup in the ingredients. At least not with this flavor. I think their ice cream has remained the same and most wonderful and as corn syrup does horrible things to my skin, Ben & Jerry's gives me the ice cream i crave, without the breakouts.

author: LaLaLady
title: My new fave flavor
text: im a huge pb fan and this was done so well! Ribbons of peanut butter and then cookie crunchies add delicious texture to the creamy chocolate ice cream. Thanks B&J! Only downside is being exclusive to Target, my first trip there they were out. Managed to score a pint second time around.

author: HollyG79
title: Best. Ice Cream. Ever.
text: This is the best ice cream in the history of ice creams, ever. That is all. It is a party in your mouth. If you like peanut butter and chocolate, eat this. You will not regret it. Except possibly after you look down and realize you ate the entire pint in a euphoric daze.

author: Icecreamdream17
title: THE BEST ICE CREAM!!
text: This is hands down my favorite flavor that B & J has ever made. Creamy chocolate, THICK peanut butter ripples, and chocolate cookie ribbon soooooo good. My only complaint is that you can only purchase it at Target. PLEASE make it available at other retailers!

author: kd93
text: This is one of the best Ben and Jerry's I've ever had (peanut butter half baked is up there too)!!! I hope they have plans to expand it to other stores, not just a target exclusive. I bought 3 pints just in case. Delicious!!!!!!

author: Imobeseandloveicecream
title: My new favorite flavor!
text: I saw on here that they came out with this new flavor and I had to try it. I go to find it and I got the LAST one! I am blessed. This stuff is delicious and my new favorite type of ice cream. Highly recommend. This slaps!

author: Stephyb
title: BEST FLAVOR
text: This is hands down my FAVORITE flavor - and I have tried a lot! The combination of milk chocolate ice cream with the peanut butter swirls is amazing... then you add the chocolate cookie in there - to die for!!!

author: kathkard
title: Peanut Butter World is the bomb
text: I have loved this ice cream the minute I read about it and found it at Target. I haven't been able to find it for several months now, though. Please make it available other places!

author: Denvergurl
title: Should be called Peanut Butter Rock Your World
text: From the first bite I was in heaven! I LOVE the "chew" of the slightly salty peanut butter with the crunch of the cookie crumble. I seriously obsess about this ice cream.

author: Scoobydrew
title: Best Flavor Yet!
text: I love a good chocolate peanut butter combination and this is the best ice cream combo I've ever had. Please make this a standard flavor and sell it everywhere!!

author: LL325
title: Perfection
text: This is by far my favorite flavor and I wish they were sold places other than target. The ice cream is perfect and creamy, and the peanut butter is just right.

author: Yummyinmytummy
title: Mouth full of goodness
text:
It’s so good I couldn’t put the spoon down. I ate the whole pint . I couldn’t get enough of the flavorful goodness, bite after bite. Yummy in my
Tummy!

author: Peanutbutterlover89
title: The Absolute BEST
text: I tried this a few months ago and have been addicted ever since. This has that perfect combo of chocolate and peanut butter. Amazing. <3

author: TYera
title: My favorite!!
text: I can only purchase this at a Target store a few towns over, and when they have it in stock, I load up! By far the best flavor ever!!

author: johnnynunya
title: Insanely good
text: I am somewhat of a connesseuir of peanut butter and chocolate ice cream. This is hands down the best store bought I've ever had.

author: JadaMiss9
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER!!!
text: If you love chocolate and peanut butter you will LOVE this ice cream!!! The chocolate cookie pieces take it to a next level.

author: Lizzie2009
title: Love it!
text: I have bought it twice in the last month and have ate it within a day! Best ice cream flavor i have ever had! Hands down!

author: Madsyd
title: BEST FLAVORS
text: Parent Trap would be proud. Chocolate Cookie and peanut butter dream. My favorite ben and Jerry’s yet!

author: Nikki64
title: Amazing n
text: This product is perfect! The peanut butter and the cookie swirls go so well with the milk chocolate.

author: Fizlstik
title: Go-to exclusive flavor
text: It’s just so good. While we try all the flavors, and have our favs, this is our default flavor.

author: Ice Jerry
title: Great
text: I love peanut butter and this ice cream is the best peanut butter ice cream I’ve ever tasted.

author: Lindsay33
title: One of my favorite flavors ever!
text: I love chocolate ice cream with peanut butter and the cookie adds a great mix!

author: Targetshopper
title: Best of all time
text: Totally addictive- incredibly rich. Our new all time favorite

author: Cwillglo
title: Amazing
text: Favorite ever. Do yourself a favor and get this flavor.

author: Scooter
title: Peanut buttery deliciousness
text: This one is delicious and has great flavor and texture

author: Cate621
title: So good!
text: I thought it would be to rich, but it was perfect!!

author: Lilbitsweets
title: Hi I'm Linda and I'm a Phish Food Addict!!
text: I feel like I'm literally addicted to Ben and Jerry's Phish Food! It seems as if I can't get enough of the super creamy chocolate ice cream with the heavenly swirls of Marshmallow and Carmel throughout it and the wonderful little bonuses of fudge fish that are so "chocolatey" that they quench my desires & cravings!! But then as I start to see my spoon scraping the bottom of the container I rush to my freezer just to make sure I've got 1 more pint of Phish Food in there for later!!! Phish Food has all the "bells & whistles" that will please any ice cream chocohlic!!! My final words: Ben and Jerry's Phish Food Ice Cream is DAMNDIDDLYICIOUS!!!!!!! (my made up word for very delicious)

author: joannenicole89
title: Still unrivalled as my favourite ice cream
text: I cannot speak more highly of this flavour. I love that it has the perfect balance of both taste and texture: The sweet and soft marshmallow swirls, offset by the mildly bitter and crunchy fudge fish, and tied together with caramel. I usually eat a whole pint on my own, and would save each "phish" so I get one in each spoonful towards the end. I always wish there was more! Nevertheless, it's still my favourite flavour, and I hope it doesn't get forgotten or overshadowed by the newer products. This brand is so expensive in my country, but I still save up and buy it as often as I can. It's THAT good.

author: dtk9
title: Absolutely perfect
text: Sometimes I think, man, Ben and Jerry's is kinda expensive... then I see this flavor on the shelf and I'm ready to go in debt. Let me just say, you guys need to put marshmallows in your ice cream more often (in recipes that make sense of course lol). The texture for this ice cream is wonderful and I really think it's because of the marshmallows. I have never bought Phish Food and been unsatisfied. And the thing is: I don't even care for chocolate ice cream. It's the flavor I always come back to, even when I swear to try something different.

author: maddyluvscookies
title: Not your average chocolate ice cream
text: I have never been a fan of any chocolate-based ice cream, but phish food (& b&j fudge brownie) is the exception. It is the perfect combination of ingredients. Best dessert I've even had.

author: Dinabobina
title: Pregnant women loves phish food
text: I tried this for the first time last week and holy cow!! This pregnant girl is never getting another dessert

author: Janaenae
title: My gosh!
text: This is our favorite flavor in our household!!! I'm obsessed w the ooey gooey marshmallows with a scoop of a phish and a Carmel swirl mmmm.... if only I can buy a bag of the chocolate fish they put in there!!' That would be even more amazing! Is there anyway to just get the little chocolate fish?? ;) my fiancé would be ecstatic! Haha he's always digging for the fish in my pint

author: Ken 1
title: My Favorite Flavor!!!
text: One day I was in an extra curricular activity and a friend of mine was placing Phish Food in the freezer. It was a hot day and I am basically okay with any kind of ice cream so I asked if I could have it and she said, 'Sure'. I went and grabbed a plastic spoon from the cabinet, opened the pint, and stuck the spoon in scooping up some ice cream. Before that moment I thought all ice cream was more or less similar. Boy, was I wrong! After tasting that first spoon full, I knew it was the most amazing ice cream I ever tasted!

author: FuzzyGut
title: The greatest of all pints!
text: Oh my god! My new favorite! I cannot say enough about how good this one is. The fudgy chocolate ice cream, the fudge chunks and the copious amounts of marshmallow and caramel! I’m making myself hungry for it so I need to stop typing this. IT. IS. SO. GOOD!

author: Dina Z
title: The World's Perfect Ice Cream
text: Ben and Jerry's ice cream has always been a source of Unique flavors, but none as uniquely perfect as Phish Food. I've been eating Phish Food ice cream since I can remember. No flavor has yet to match it and I've tried a lot of ice cream.

author: Phish Food Fan
title: The best flavor ever produced by anyone
text: You can fight me on this but you’re wrong. Phish Food is the best flavor ever made. And not just by Ben and Jerry’s, but any company in the history of the freezer case. Nothing comes close to this ridiculous combination of chocolate, fudge, marshmallow and caramel. I am so thankful for this ice cream!

author: samw98
title: A classic!
text: This ice cream is so amazing with the marshmallow swirls and fudge fish! Please make a Non-Dairy/Vegan Phish food so I can enjoy this creation but as a vegan!

author: Jen00
title: Absolutely Wonderful!
text: Arguably the best Ben and Jerry's flavor, it's possible to eat an entire pint alone and not notice until the spoon scrapes the bottom. It's that good. The little fish are adorable, AND they taste like the best chocolate ever. I wish I could buy them by the bag, their perfectly melt in your mouth amazing. Add the caramel and marshmellow and it's super sweet, but doesn't pass the line of Too Sweet. Much love to Ben & Jerry for their amazing ice cream!

author: ColoradoAsh
title: My Go-To flavor
text: I always check for "new" flavors or "limited batch" selections, however Phish Food is my go-to! My absolute favorite flavor....the gooey caramel and marshmallow swirls and the fudge fish are magical!

author: Ally6995
title: Best Ice Cream ever!
text: I absolutely love the caramel, marshmallow and chocolate chunks! I've eaten so much of this ice cream and I dont regret it! This makes me so happy!

author: Lorysha
title: My favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor
text: I’m addicted to this Ice cream it is sooo good the chocolate and marshmallow is not too sweet and the fudge “phish” is my favorite part.

author: Sadie
title: Absolutely Exquisite
text: Phish food is the most amazing tasting ice cream I have ever had. Even better than homemade ice cream from the ice cream parlour. The chocolate ice cream base is rich and creamy, with just the perfect amount of marshmallow and caramel swirls. The chocolate fish are amazing, they a a slightly darker flavor than the chocolate ice cream making for a tasty chocolaty combination that is not too sweet, but sweet enough to satisfy my insasasionable craving for chocolate.

author: SuzanneW
title: MY ABSOLUTE FAVORITE!!!!!
text: This is my ALL TIME most FAVORITEST ICECREAM!!!!!!

author: MHA77
title: The Best Ice Cream Ever.
text: I am completely addicted to this ice cream. This was the first Ben and Jerry's ice cream I ever tried and I have tried others but none compare to this masterpiece. I don't see it in the case everytime I go to the grocery store so whenever I happen to pass by it and notice it's there it's a MUST BUY! The combination of the chocolatey ice cream and thick marshmallow swirls with the fudge fish is enough to send anyone over the edge. Amazing!

author: AmyBizzle
title: I wasn't always a Ben & Jerry's lover but I am now
text: My husband was trying to do something nice for me and buy me ice cream while I was busy trying to eat "healthy food." He came home with Phish Food and I said: "naw, I don't think I'll like it. You can eat it." And then he opened it and shoved it in my hands with a spoon. I tried two bites I was sold. Now I have dreams about this ice cream and won't buy or eat anything else. I'm hooked for life!

author: Josh from VT
title: A classic
text: Very sweet, but great combination of flavors and textures.

author: TayKamp
title: A Classic!
text: My go-to flavor when ever I'm sick, sad, grumpy, or just in need of a pick me up! The marshmallow swirls come up and are like sweet little Angel kissed. The caramel swirls are sticky gooey globs of yummmmm and the chocolate chunks - shaped like fish - can make anyone giggle.

author: Genie with a Throttle
title: Absolute Favorite <3
text: This has been my favorite ice cream for years. They did away with those little cylindrical problematic marshmallows and replaced it with dreamy fluff. The caramel is always physics defyingly gooey, and the soft crunchy fudge fish are always a delightful surprise.

author: Mackkwalkk
title: Awesome combination
text: I love all ben and Jerry’s but somehow always end up going back to this one!! The caramel and gooey marshmallow mix together way better than I would have thought and the crunch of the frozen chocolate breaks it up for another added flavor.

author: JaviJavi
title: Amazing!
text: the flavour was so good that i had to buy it again! strongly recommended.

author: lolly88
title: Heaven on Earth
text: I was introduced to Phish Food about 4 years ago. I absolutely love it! It is the only flavor of B&J's Ice Cream I have tried and I have no desire to try others because I am pretty sure this is the best. Won't you agree with me?

author: Alice1
title: Absolutely amazing!
text: This is my favourite ice cream in the WORLD! I love the chocolate phish, I wish you could buy a bag of them separately so I can keep adding extra to the ice cream. PLEASE bring out bags of phish chocolates!! X

author: Dragonborn
title: .....can't talk....so overwhelmed
text: Probably the most amazing mix of flavors in 1 pint. This mix is every possible thing you could want in ice cream. Believe me when I say if you haven't tried it, it should be 1st on your bucket list.

author: sarahm
title: Everything you could want!
text: This ice cream is my everything. Once ate a gallon In a month. It is so amazing and you will not regret buying a pint (or 50)!!!!! It is so incredibly good, and eating it is indescribable euphoria.

author: IrishRider70
title: My First Love
text: Seriously. . . I was NEVER an ice cream fan. Didn't like it. Never craved it. That all changed when I was introduced to Phish Food! *Game Changer*!! Love this ice cream. Love, Love, Love.

author: Monica
title: Bring back Phish on stick!!!
text: YEARS ago Phish Food came as a novelty ice cream on a stick. It was somehow even better this way! I loved it because when I had a craving for it, no waiting, unwrap and devour!!!

author: Chelsea
title: Phish food is a childhood favorite for me!
text: I’ve been getting this flavor since I was a little girl. I love the chocolate fish and the marshmallow cream. So yummy it will always be a special flavor to me

author: artkittie
title: my kryptonite
text: I always thought chocolate ice cream was a pale imitation of the real thing until I tasted Phish Food. This stuff should be considered an opioid, its so good.

author: SNK1
title: Great memories.
text: I’ve been getting phish food ever since I was little, and every time I get it I get flashbacks of when I was a child. Phish food is by far my favorite flavor.

author: phish_food_is_life
title: Best ice cream of all time
text: This is my favorite ice cream, and I honestly believe that the world will end of this is ever discontinued. Plus, those little fudgey fish are cute as heck.

title: A must-try deliciousness
text: Huge favorite of both me and my three sons! (they are triplets.) Delicious chocolate ice cream with some caramel. The chocolate fish are also delicious!

author: Andrew1989
title: By far the best flavor for chocolate lovers.
text: This has been my favorite flavor for years. I have never had a quality control issue with a pint, and it always satisfies my chocolate cravings.

author: MsBluewings
title: Chocolate Loverz Unite!
text: This has been my go to chocolate getaway combination. Solid chocolate fish and chocolate and caramel oh my! #2 on my top #10 list for sure!

author: sam347
title: New Favorite!
text: I've been wanting to try this one for a while and I am SO glad I finally have. This one is loaded with all the good stuff, so super good.

author: Audbohl5
title: Amazing combination
text: Awesome combination of flavors. I'm satisfied with the generous amount of marshmallow and the perfect ratio of chocolate ice cream!

author: mere12345
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER
text: I get this all the time since a kid. The chocolate flavor is so pure and delicious, I crave it! Totally worth the try. Yum yum yum

author: iDonZie
title: 10/10 Girlfriend Loves it
text: No really she left me for this ice cream. I told her she had to choose between Phish Food and me and I guess its that good.

author: Jerr99
title: Delicious!
text: This is one of my absolute favorite flavors! It tastes delicious and I would eat it every night if I could!

author: MrzLaw
title: I love everything about this !!
text: Best ice cream ever ! There is absolutely nothing that will make this better than it is !!

title: Mouth explosion
text: I love this icecream so much. So in love with this delicious ice cream! Nom nom nom

author: fahiller
title: love phish food
text: forever the only ben and jerrys flavor i have tried because I'm addicted to it

author: jonnyy1221
title: Amazing
text: very good tasty and yummy it was amazing!!! i cannot imagine something better

author: Phishfoodlover69
title: The best flavor ever
text: If aliens came to earth and we had to feed them phish food would be the movw

author: Dogmom21
title: Great flavor.
text: I have bought this flavor recently and I have to say it’s become my favorite

author: vixenswirework
title: OBSESSED
text: YASSS!! I love this flavor!!! I love ice cream! I LOVE BEN AND JERRY'S!!!

author: Logan47
title: Phish Food Is The Best
text: The best mix I've ever had, nothing beats Ben and Jerry's Ice Cream..

author: Ketsystar
title: My favorite
text: Its really good and addictive, i am in love with this ice cream

author: Tommy
title: Indulgence
text: Has to be my favorite, everything your dreams are made of

author: frazja15
title: Sooooooo Good
text: Whenever I eat this, I can’t get over how delicious it is

author: PriscilaPamela
title: I FINALLY FOUND MY SOUL MATE. #PhishFood
text: Officially my favorite ice cream in the WORLD. Wow!!! ♥️

author: KellyCrayon
title: My favorite as a kid!
text: When I was younger, this was my absolute favorite!

author: Tlen334
title: So delicious!!!
text: My favorite flavor ever!!! The combination is perfect!

author: Jess1208
title: No Carmel Please
text: OK I know this is gonna sound crazy but when I first started eating phish food there was no Carmel in it. I have been looking for years to find phish food that does not have Carmel. Everyone I ask insist that it always had caramel in it, which is not true. Phish food was the 1st Ben and Jerry's ice cream I ever ate I haven't eaten it since they started putting Carmel in it does anyone know how I can get phish food without Carmel Please.

author: Dani
title: The Truth about Phish Food
text: I love everything about it. The caramel and marshmallows make the ice cream so smooth and delicious, but my favorite part is the cute little fish-shaped chocolate pieces! Not only are they cute, but the chocolate itself is amazing. Thanks Ben and Jerry's for creating such an awesome flavor!

author: Baespos
title: Very good, very rich
text: This flavor was the first ever flavor I bought of B&J. It is very, very good but very,very rich. I typically only buy this if I am craving chocolate (which I never do, go figure). It's overall, very good but it's so rich. I really wish there was a vanilla option, or maybe a little more Marshmallow swirl to mellow out the chocolate.

author: Emily1210
title: My favorite ice cream!
text: I love Phish food ice cream, it’s my favorite ice cream of all, and I’ve had a lot in my short lifetime. I did recently get a tub that only had about 4 fudge fish in it. :(( the fudge fish are my favorite part of this ice cream, if y’all made a chocolate bar out of that stuff I would buy it allllll the time. Upset that I didn’t get many in this tub, so hopefully there’ll be more in the next.

author: Fifi
title: Divine
text: Cherry Garcia was my absolute favorite of all ice creams until I tasted Phish Food. With apologies, I have had to move C.G back to second place. Phish Food is creamy, chocolatey, caramel heaven (not to mention those nifty little chocolate fish) and it's all I can do to stop myself from eating the entire pint at one sitting. Thank you for your Divine Creation.

author: Katie22
title: I’m addicted!
text: This flavor is perfect! I first tried this a couple months ago and I was so happy I did. I was a little skeptical because I don’t usually like marshmallow but this taste great. The chocolate and caramel with marshmallow complements each other very well, and the chocolate fish chunks are so cute and tatsty. I eat the whole pint at once. I highly recommed!!!

author: Chewbacca
title: If you wanna go off the deep end, here ya go!
text: I didn't know what to expect when I bought this pint since there were so many ingredients, but the chocolate ice cream is not too bitter, and the caramel & mallow swirl are maddeningly delicious. I catch myself "phishing" the container just for the swirls. The fudge fish aren't redundant like you might think they'd be. Excellent flavor.

author: Puck
title: My go-to flavor
text: Of all the Ben & Jerry's flavors, this is the one that when I'm looking over a grocery store selection and I'm uncertain what to have that I'll most often choose. It's quite sweet between the chocolate ice cream and the caramel, but the addition of the little fish and the creamy marshmallow allow for a very pleasant textural element.

author: BBluvr
title: Addictive
text: Gooey marshmallow with caramel in a chocolate ice cream and fudge fish, I’m glad the ice cream isn’t too intensely chocolate cause the other flavors come through with each bite. I’ve been getting this pint for over a decade and I’ve loved it since I first tried it, above all other favorites like Americone Dream or Cherry Garcia.

author: Tamsy
title: Phantastically phantastical phlavour
text:
In 2005 I travelled to London and I tasted Ben and Jerry's ice-cream for the first time. I stumbled across the Phish food variety and I fell in love. I was obsessed!
I live in South Africa and you don't get Ben and Jerry's here (why????!!!), but it is something I still think about 14 years later! I loved it THAT much!

author: Briar
title: My favorite flavor!
text:
Hands down my favorite flavor of ice cream! The mixture of the caramel, marshmallow, chocolate, and fudge fish is delightful, and it’s helped me through many a last ditch attempt at completing NaNoWriMo! I usually keep a few pints of it on hand to enjoy or share with friends!
Try it- you won’t regret it!

author: lin03
title: great flavor
text: ive been getting this flavor of ben & jerrys ice cream since i was younger, and ive always enjoyed it. I can’t get if very often tho since where i live its $5-6 or more, but when i do im always glad i did. its my favorite flavor of ice cream and i would always recommend it to a friend :’)

author: Misty
title: DELICIOUS
text: Tried this chocolatey, gooey, luscious ice cream the other day and OMG this has to be the best ever it’s so scrummy I can’t stop talking about it ( is that sad oh well ) will be filling the freezer for sure, please don’t ever stop making this it’s definitely a make you feel good wonder.

author: Kathryn2244
title: Greatest Ice Cream Flavor of All Time
text: I try very much to avoid the frozen food section at the market because if I do go there I will undoubtably purchase at least 2 pints of B&Js Phish Food. And if I want my jeans to fit I can not eat a pint of the greatest ice cream every night-even if I want to (maybe when I’m old and gray?)

author: TracyD
title: Wonderful!
text: I hadn't had this in a while and bought a pint, I forgot just how good it is and I was only going to eat a quarter of it but I just couldn't put down the spoon! I ate the whole thing with absolutely no regrets! Thank you for making such wonderful products!

author: person
title: Good but didnt like the chocolate
text: The chocolate fishes tasted a bit like dog food, and i would have liked more Mallomars and caramel swirls

author: ZDub
title: Best Ice Cream I’ve ever had
text: This is the one, and the only one. It’s absolutely perfect, and everything I want in a scoop of ice cream. This is more than ice cream, it’s happiness and satisfaction. I have not found anything else that comes close to Phish Food.....you will be addicted.

author: screamforcream
title: Disappointed
text: The chocolate ice cream was bland. It should have had a rich or fudgy flavor. The phish should have been more like the chunky monkey fudge chunks.

author: HappyTummyTimia
title: There is little I wouldn't do for Phish Food.
text: I tried it for the first time, and when I tell you I fell in love, I'm hardly exaggerating. The consistency of the marshmallow is to die for, gooey and perfectly swirled through creamy chocolate goodness dotted with rich fudge fish- I need a pint.

author: ceeuhxo
title: New Favorite
text: I bought this last night and I’m going back for more ! It’s so chocolatey, love the marshmallow swirls and fudge fishes there are so many in just one pint ❤️❤️ Definitely recommend this flavor if you haven’t tried it !!

author: Memer
title: Not as advertised
text: I was disappointed when I opened the cup and it was nothing like the packaging! I only tried it because it was new to me! It was pretty bad! I will go back to Dairy Queen!

author: Clare11
title: Disgusting
text:
This is painfully sweet. Not much ice
