cream to enjoy either. Just HUGE globs of marshmallow and caramel. Tastes like straight sugar, and this is coming from someone who really likes dessert food.

author: uniqueunknown
title: Loved Going Phishing!
text: I absolutely loved this flavor. I felt like a big kid eating it. I will be buying more of this kind. The phish food is my new favorite flavor!!!

author: Koni
title: One of the BEST flavours ever!
text: This was one of my first flavours ever ( along with Strawberry cheesecake and Cookie dough). When I ate it it was the best moment in my life.

author: chloeg47
title: THE BEST ICE CREAM
text: My grandpa always ate this ice cream which led to my obsession with this flavor. Have eaten too many pints in one sitting to count...

author: Ang444
title: Needs 5 stars
text: This is my die-hard-go-to-save-the-Day flavor the only thing I craved when I was pregnant, and I needs a full 5 stars ⭐️

author: carolll
title: yessss
text: i thought'd i hate this flavor bc I don't like carmel or marshmallow that much, but this was a greattttt combo ugh

author: Nanabanana
title: Phish Food
text: 9 months pregnant and I LOOOVE the phish food ice cream but the little chocolate fish give me such bad heartburn

author: Pattimelt
title: My favorite!
text: Best.ice cream.ever. Phish Food is a family favorite, but we also want to try many others.

author: Emmi
title: ITS MY FAVORITE ICECREAM
text: Its so yum. The different textures make it fun to eat. Its srumdillilyumpshous

author: Cappy22
title: Perfect!
text: Phish food is perfect. My favorite and the best ice cream,ever!

author: bigdog
title: very good
text: its good..... very very very very very very very very very good

author: Cohleressesayelet
title: It’s my favorite ice cream!!
text: I love this Ice cream so much! It’s so good! I love chocolate!

author: jackieb
title: Hands down my favorite ice cream out there
text: This is my absolute favorite ice cream, no matter what!

author: dani3
title: Best ever
text: This is my absolute favorite ice cream of all time!!!

author: Damian
title: The best in the world.
text: Phish Food is the best ice-cream in the world. Ever.

author: Benji
title: Best flavor you guys make!!!
text: Been eating this flavor for over 18 years the best

author: DianaCAFLQC
title: Perfection for Pistachio Lovers!
text: I have had great, mediocre, and yucky ice cream/gelato all around the states and several different countries, and this is by far my very, very all-time favourite as the quality creamy ice cream has a cool subtle pistachio flavour and it is loaded with tons of toasted perfect nuts! What could be better than that? Sadly, I now live in Montreal, and have checked every ice cream selling market/deppaneur/etc. and cannot find this flavour anywhere! I need my fix! This is torture! (....and I don’t understand how we have such a huge French and Italian population here, why this is not one of the few flavours sold here!). :(

author: DianaCAFLYUL
title: Perfection!
text: This is my all-time favorite store-bought ice cream/flavor! Having been to Italy several times, I've had my share of amazing pistachio gelato. B&J's does it even better as you have the smooth, creamy lightly pistachio-flavored ice cream and lots of toasted pistachios for that great crunch within the creamy......perfection! Sadly, I've never been to a B&J's that offers this flavor, and it is pretty difficult to find in grocery stores and drug stores. So....when you do.....nab them all! :D You're welcome! (.....everyone always thanks me for turning them onto this flavor!)

title: Vanilla ice cream with hard pistachio nuts
text: I have high expectations for Ben and Jerry's as they make fantastically wild flavors so when I saw they had a pistachio available I picked it up immediately. Before I even got home from the store I felt assured that I had found my new favorite ice cream (love pistachios), something to rival the pistachio gelato I get from my local coffee shop. Unfortunately, once I broke that bad boy open I was dismayed that what should've been a culinary treat was in fact plain, non-flavorful ice cream with hunks of rather hard pistachios in it. I was very disappointed with the experience and hope to never run across a similarly disappointing flavor again.

author: DianaK
title: The Very Best!
text: This is our family’s favorite I’ve cream EVER! It has the perfect lightly nutty flavouring and a delicious, satisfying crunch of toasted pistachios throughout! Every bite is as good as the first! Sadly, I have not found this anywhere in my new home of Montreal, Quebec as the stores always only of the same few flavours (I’m guessing as branding for both French and English up here is costly). However, it surprises me that this is not one of the few options uphere as we have a huge European population (that, of course, loves pistachios). I would think it would be a huge hit! Sadly, B&J’s can’t ship time either? Sincerely, Heartbroken in Canada (a.k..a. Diana ;) )

author: Cranberryred2001
title: Trying something new?
text: I went to one of my local grocery stores and picked up a pint of Pistachio Pistachio. I was looking forward to it all day. But when I finally tried it, it was not the same ice cream I was used to. The pistachios were soft and chewy and the ice cream did not taste like pistachio ice cream. I went to the same store again to buy another pint 2 days later and I was rewarded with the same bland tasting ice cream with soft pistachios. Plus once the ice cream melted a little, it was a little too frothy like there was extra milk or something in this particular batch. So very disappointed with Ben & Jerry's. I love this flavor, but not sure I want to risk a 3rd time.

author: Stego
title: Heaven
text: OK guys, I put on 30 pounds because of this stuff. It was worth it on one hand, because it's so amazingly delicious, but now I'm huge. Oh well. I'll lose some weight as long as this is waiting for me as an occasional treat.

author: Arslan
title: Taste of Bitter almonds
text: I bought My first Ben & Jerry ice cream thinking it would compete Haagen daz but i left with disapppintmemt. The ice cream had wierd taste of bitter almonds. Rest it is plain vanilla ice cream with some pistachio in it. Not upto the mark. The bitter taste was horrible

author: raynedrop
title: It's only as good as the nuts
text: I've consumed about 10 pints of this over the past 5 years. When it's good, meaning all the nuts are healthy, it's very, very good. It's pretty good when one or two nuts are a bit 'off'. But tonight I chewed into the most rancid, putrid pistachio of my entire life. Nearly hurled. Will not purchase again.

author: Dawn0719
title: Always Top Notch!
text: B&J's Pistachio Pistachio is my all-time favorite ice cream - ever!!! The creamy smooth flavored ice cream and the crunchy salty nuts always give me exactly what my taste buds are craving. I remember the first time I ever tried this - I thought I died and went to heaven! <3 True Perfection <3

title: All time favorite ice cream!!
text: This is the ONLY ice cream I buy and I have tried all the pastachio flavors of different brands. I will drive the extra couple miles just to get this stuff. I don't see how anyone could rate this one star.

author: Naboo
title: This is my favorite, my GO-TO for ice cream.
text: I have been eating Pistachio-Pistachio for several years and never grow tired of it. My favorite and before that is was New York Super Chunk. It takes a great deal to pull me away from good chocolate

author: Kittykate88
title: Yeasss
text: Anything less than 5 Stars don’t appreciate pistachios.. the guy who compliains that the nuts are too hard... Obviously is not a nut lover. This is a must if you enjoy crunch and nuts

author: lbcgav
title: Ok if you like almond extract
text: Here's the irony: "The name alone shows how much we love pistachios. But don't just take our word for it - let the flavor speak for itself!" The most forward flavor is almond extract, not pistacchio. Too bad, because there's not much better than a good pistacchio gelato. This is nowhere near that.

author: herbgreen
title: A Private Joy
text: This ice cream falls into the category of private joy for me. The superb flavor and variety of texture between the silky ice cream and chewy pistachios elevate me to another plane. My ultimate indulgence is to sip a glass of scotch along with a bowl (I try to keep it small!) of this wonderful confection. An adult treat!

author: Never Again
title: Great if you like DISAPPOINTMENT
text: Horrible! Judging by the taste they have never had a proper pistachio dessert . You're better off spending extra money on another brand of pistachio. Or just getting a different flavor. This is my first time trying ben and Jerry's and I apparently picked the worst flavor of theirs imaginable. If I were to name this flavor it would be Pathetic pistachio. I'd give a constructive review but clearly they have been okay with the atrocity for this long and I dont believe it would help. 1 star for the fact that its icecream

author: augieke
title: Had several pints and loved them all so far
text: I guess everyone can make a lemon, but I haven't encountered one yet in the Pistachio Pistachio flavor. Especially like the salted pistachio mixed with the vanilla. The pistachios were good and fresh in all the pints I've had. Always look for it on the shelf now. Keep up the good work!

author: mitzie
title: HORRIBLE ICE CREAM
text:
I bought this yesterday from whole foods and all day thought, that a company like Ben and Jerry's would make the finest pistachio ice cream ever.
This ice cream is tasteless and seems to have been made for the sake of making it marketable. the ice cream does not even taste of vanilla ice cream. It tastes like "paper ice cream" if ever someone were to make paper a taste.
Such a waste of time and money. !

author: FuzzyGut
title: Another great Flavor from Ben and Jerry’s
text: I’m mean, here I am about to dig into another pint for the first time, and of course it’s excellent, just like the majority of the other ones. The ice cream itself is delicious; creamy and pistachioey and the pistachios are perfect. Killer pint! Thanks again guys!

author: purdybirdy
title: Has potential but not as good as I'd hoped
text: I appreciate the use of real pistachios in the ice cream because you don't see that too often. But because the pistachios are whole aaand there's so many in there, it's just a little too much. Maybe if they were smaller pieces and a tad bit less frequent. The ice cream flavor is nice though. Not too strong and artificial tasting like some pistachio ice creams are.

author: Fish
title: Something went wrong
text: My favorite!! I would never give less than five stars for Ben and Jerry's, however I think the last batch of this amazing ice cream was light on the pistachio... Usually full of them this one only had maybe ten total!! Still the best around.

author: KJoPistachio
title: Pure happiness
text: I didn’t have really high expectations when I bought this today but after tasting it just now I am headed back to the store to buy all of the containers. I’m pretty sure that if everyone ate some of this then there would be peace on earth!

author: Kyle
title: Frozen Gold!
text: I’m a picky eater. Especially when it comes to nuts. Often you’ll buy a batch of pistachios, and a handful will be sour or off. When I buy Pistachio Pistachio, I never get a nut that is off. I’ve purchased this flavor COUNTLESS times. It is my favorite Ice Cream. I have never had a Pistachio that is less than amazing in these magical pints. I swear by this flavor. Do yourself a favor and enjoy this heavenly treat!

author: yfu002
title: no pistachio taste
text: The pistachio chunk is real, but the ice cream itself does not have any pistachio flavor. Put together it is a blank ice cream with pistachio chunks. I can buy a pint of regular vanilla flavored ice cream and eat with some pistachio on the side instead of this.

author: Mommyx2
title: Love
text: Everyone in my house has their own ice cream and this is my all time fav. I love that i dont have to share lmao. Plus my 5 year old knows what to get me when she and daddy go to the store. # MyGuiltyPleasure

author: Berkley
title: Addicting!
text: I always stick to the same kind of ice cream but recently I decided to try something new and now I'm addicted. I buy a pint of Pistachio Pistachio at least twice a week if not more and I don't care :)

author: winterdestiny
title: Favorite Flavor
text: This is my favorite flavor ever! Ever since I tried this flavor, I rarely pick another. It has a great sweet flavor to balace it out with the roasted pistachios. It's indulgent without being too rich.

title: Simply the Best Pistachio Ice cream!
text: I usually buy pistachio gelato at the local ice cream store but I was in Publix at the time. This pistachio is by far the BEST I have ever had! You will not be disappointed!

author: Peacelover9
title: This is one of my favorite flavors.
text: I always use to buy Karmel Sutra. But I thought I try this one. Its great!!!

author: Jules
title: Bland flavor
text: I was excited to try this flavor since it was gluten free (one of the few B&J options I can have) and Ben & Jerry's is my favorite ice cream-with quality ingredients and great flavors. But, was disappointed-felt like the pistachio flavor was weak and the base almost icy in texture.

author: Mamma Kate
title: Not Pistachio Ice Cream
text: This flavor should be named “Almond Extract Ice Cream with Pistachios”. I was disappointed by the flavor profile. There is a generous quantity of pistachio nuts throughout the pint, but their flavor is overwhelmed by the almond extract, which by the way, has a bitter and lingering finish. Good consistency and mouth feel.

author: Lars
title: What Happened?
text: Used to be heavenly. When I could find it, it was the best of the best. Six on a five star scale. It was pistachio through and through. Generous portion of pistachios nuts embedded in a delicious body of pistachio flavored ice cream. Then somebody in the last year went and spoiled the recipe with coconut oil. Now it's pistachios in coconut ice cream. Who messed with perfection?

author: Bloomable
title: Best Pistachio Ice Cream
text: This is my favorite pistachio ice cream. The ice cream tastes simply like real pistachio with the roasted pistachios being the perfect added texture. I have purchased many pistachio ice creams from other brands and when Ben and Jerry’s came out with this one I have never looked back. Other favorites for me are Netflixed and Chilled, Cherry Garcia, and the discontinued Creme Brûlée.

author: ccoco
title: All I taste is almond extract
text: I honestly dont know what I was expecting with this being my first taste of any pistachio ice cream, but all I could taste was almond extract. Even the smell of the icec ream smells like almonds?

author: Kim94
title: Love pistachio but too much
text: I love pistachios so I thought I would love this ice cream. Unfortunately the pistachios overwhelm the ice cream so it’s too savory for me. I thought way to many nuts, maybe if they were halved or crushed, the flavor would go into the cream. Very disappointed and won’t get again. The amount of nuts (I know, you’re supposed to get at least one nut per spoonful, but way to much.

author: Geouhread
title: Overpowering Almond taste
text: The icecream itself had a very strong bitter almond flavor taste, the texture of the cream also was very gritty. We expected the product was expired but it wasn't.

author: Kjlee85
title: almond almond pistachio
text: I'm ok with almond but it disappointed my wife who is a pistachio lover but an almond hater. This tasted more like almond ice cream with pistachio nuts. Compared to pistachio ice creams we have had, this falls far short for any nutty, strong pistachio lingering fragrance and taste we were expecting from a name like "pistachio pistachio"

title: Best ice cream EVER.
text: This ice cream by far beats any other brands. The ice cream has a perfect creamy taste, with whole pistachios. It's just hard to find because the stores by my house are always sold out of this flavor. But any time I do buy ice cream I will drive the distance just to get this.

author: japanese girl
title: Umm...
text: I bought pistachio ice cream because I like pistachio flavor. But this vanilla's flavor is like Dr. Pepper. So, weird. I expected it taste really pistachio.

author: jeffery
title: this is not pistachio ice cream
text: All this is, i just vanilla ice cream with pistachio nuts just thrown into it. i paid for pistachio ice cream but all i got was a peace of garbage.

author: Scootl
title: Vanilla ice cream with large chunks of pistachio
text: Basically vanilla ice cream with large chunks of pistachios. The nuts are not broken up. I understand if you don't want to use artificial coloring, but the pistachios should be broken up into smaller pieces! That would make it tastier.

author: Dallas16
title: Beyond Delicious
text: This is my favorite. So glad that the ice cream is also pistachio flavor, not just vanilla ice cream with pistachio nuts added. The nuts are whole and big, not just pieces and slightly salty. Worth the price. Love it !

title: A great ice cream ruined by hard, salty pistachios
text:
I want the pistachios removed and this ice cream labeled "Amaretti for More!"
Then I'd eat it and never stop. As it is, I spit out the pistachios and enjoy this almond extract flavored ice cream immensely.

author: Pistacho
title: Almondy pistachio
text: I like the flavors going on in here. The ice cream has a taste reminiscent of marzipan and pistachio mixed and there is a generous amount of crunchy pistachios. This was quite tasty and I'll buy it again.

author: Meryl
title: My go-to food!
text: I love this ice cream. It's the fifth food group for me. It's my snack, my treat, my comfort food! Yes, the nuts are fresh and yummy. Actually, it is the only ice cream I eat. Need I say more?

author: jesujesu
title: Tastes like weird powder
text: I love the fact that they had actual pistachios in the ice cream, but the "pistachio" ice cream tastes like powder. It doesn't taste like an actual pistachio ice cream. Frankly, it was disgusting.

author: Soundchicmic
title: Pistachio Pistachio Pistachio!
text: Fan freakin tastic! So good. My favorite! I loved pistachio pudding as a kid, but this is just out of this world. Chock full of plump pistachios and held together by creamy goodness. Love it!

author: Leopold
title: Good but not pistachio
text: I have high expectations for B&J icecream. However, this flavor disappoints. The icecream tastes more like almond/marzipan and the pistachio flavor is lost among these overpowering flavors.

author: Miss Jess M
title: They do not sell this flavor at enough places!
text: I would like to think of myself as an ice cream enthusiast. I literally eat ice cream every day. Ben & Jerry's never let me down. This flavor, Pistachio Pistachio, is an easy 5-star rating.

author: Fish11
title: Only flavor I buy at the store!
text: This is an amazing Ice cream! I love the ratio of nuts to ice cream. However, a pint is usually a single serving for me. PP is my favorite B&J flavor! And I have tried many!

author: LauraBB
title: My favorite ice cream. Ever.
text: I love the flavor of the ice cream and the fact that the pistachios are whole. This ice cream is so good I don’t want to settle for any of my old favorites now.

author: kolliaskat
title: interesting
text: If you're looking for pistachio flavored ice cream, this isn't it... it's good don't get me wrong, but it just doesn't strike me as "pistachio tasting".

author: LilMizLatina
title: Absolute favorite!
text: This has always been my all time favorite flavor. Its a shame I can only get it in the US and not anywhere else in the world. This is the best!

author: Philip
title: Love Pistachio!
text: Love this ice cream...light but really tasty and great pistachio flavor. Unfortunately my local grocery chain stopped carrying this flavor :(

author: Sweet_love0803
title: Pistachio pistachio
text: I absoulty love pistachios and when I seen this I knew I'd have to try it. OMG! I think I'm in love with an Ice Cream nothing but the truth!!

author: sunshinee626
title: Love love love pistachio pistachio
text: Delicious every time I’ve had it. I could go for some hard pistachios and more of them but I’m not picky its delicious how it is y’all

author: PATRICIA
title: I LOVE IT
text: I CAN FIND IT ANY WHERE I'M IN NEW ORLEANS AND ITS MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM THE ICE CREAM IS SO SMOOTH THE RIGHT COMBINATION OF FLAVORS.

author: Artfuldodger702
title: Delicious Addiction
text: Oh my goodness Pistachio Pistachio is so delicious! My favorite flavor with a nice supply of crunchy pistachios in every bite.

author: Max3811
title: Best Flavor
text: Since the first time I tried this flavor it was my favorite. Sometimes its hard to find because not all stores stock that kind.

author: Hweathers
title: The best
text:
Love at first taste! Pistachio Pistachio got me
through pregnancy..........and still helping me muddle through motherhood :)

author: Sartzer
title: Name says it all
text: The ice cream and nuts complement each other perfectly. I thought Chunky Monkey was the best flavor, this ties with it.

author: CMiller
title: Favorite Flavor
text: This is my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's! The ice cream tastes wonderful. Once you start eating it you can't stop.

author: Mikar
title: Favorite Flavor!
text: This is my go to flavor. EVERYTIME. I'm obsessed. I moved to Brazil a couple months ago, and I definitely miss it.

author: Maze
title: My favorite
text: I’m a huge pistachio lover....and I love this ice cream!! I even use it to make my pistachio pound cake

author: cquirke
title: Love Love Love
text: I absolutely love this ice cream. Simple but amazing. Perfect light flavor loaded with pistachio nuts.

author: Bart
title: My new favorite!
text:
Butter pecan, you are dead to me now.
Ben and Jerry's Pistachio Pistachio is my new favorite!

author: MARISELA
title: Love this ice cream
text: Omg I love pistachios and this is one of my favorite ice creams lol I love it ! its delicious

author: Robjay
title: Life changing good
text: This is my favorite ice cream hands down. I was they had it in the gallion

author: CheeseMan
title: Worst Ice cream in my life
text: Cant even take a spoonful of it. Tastes just like maraschino cherry. -5/10

author: Dotty
title: Great flavor
text: Pistachio Pistachio is wonderful..Don't buy any other flavor for myself.

author: Chauncey
title: My favorite flavor
text: Definitely worth the price but I wish I can buy this is a larger size.

author: Breezy
title: My new favorite flavor
text: Can’t get enough of this flavor! Sooo many pistachios packed inside!

author: Patti
title: best ever pistachio
text: yum- what else can I say- good flavor and pistachios are authentic

author: djackson
title: My favorite indulgence
text: This is my favorite ice cream. bar none. All time favorite.

author: Nikilower73
title: Perfect!
text: If you love pistachio pudding you will love this even more!

author: Leeyen
title: Misleading
text: It's more like vanilla ice cream with pistachio nuts inside

author: anyknd
title: The best
text: In spite all the busy new flavors - this is still the best!

author: CCpistachio
title: Love it!
text: I love it but its hard to find. Please keep it coming.

author: kassidy18
title: Favorite Flavor
text: First flavor I look for when I get ben and jerrys.

author: Jenny
title: My favorite!
text: I love the toasted pistachio's in it! It is yummy!

author: Kjk0
title: Pistachio
text: Best flavor out out there! FABULOUS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

author: LBOCK
title: Fall Party in my MOUTH!
text: I absolutely love the blueberry cheesecake but can't find it anymore. I stumbled across Pumpkin Cheesecake at Albertsons in Wildomar, CA and this has to be the best Ben & Jerrys yet! My husband said he's ready to spend a ton of money to stock up. It's identical to actual pumpkin cheesecake! During the 110 degree temps it's sooooo good! I'll be raving about this! Thank you for bringing back another amazing cheesecake flavor!

author: Sandy
title: In My Life!!!!!
text: This has been my favorite ice cream since 2008 when I first tasted this flavor. Since then, finding it was the worst experience ever! It is made in limited batches, and was NEVER in the same store every year, so you became an explorer to find it each year! Was it in Walmart, Wegman's, Shop Rite, CVS, or where every September? I knew this was the time the first batch was delivered! FINALLY, this year they have a specific page on their website for Pumpkin Cheesecake. All you have to do is put in your zip code, and it will tell you where is the nearest establishment to purchase this in incredibly, tasty, scrumptiously delicious frozen treat!!! Good luck, and be careful of brain freeze! You're gonna love it!!!

author: Mama Fig
title: Heaven is here
text: This is my favorite ice cream flavor ever. I usually buy dozens of pints to stock up every fall!

author: bridgespo97
title: COULD BE AMAZING IF....
text: I bought this last weekend, I am not sure how but it was still available at a local Walmart. I have been wanting to try this flavor, and figured it was long gone, but to my surprise I was able to find it, so I figured it was a sign from above. Overall, the pumpkin flavor tastes familiar... But over seasoned... It is a bit boring, and honestly this ice cream could be amazing. The graham cracker swirl is more of a.... occasional chunk. Honestly, the graham cracker swirl was to die for!! It was the highlight of this ice cream... If they could just add more swirl, I would be much more impressed overall. The swirl definitely breaks up the boredum of the ice cream, it is a bit repetitive. I think a huge glob of swirl would be amazing.

author: Miercoles
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER
text: I just bought this flavor from target.. i went there to get chunky monkey but they were all out. Ive tried every other flavor and this was the LAST pint of this flavor. I like pumkin pie but its not my favorite... i love all of B&J’s cheesecake flavors so i thought i mayyyyy like this one.......

author: Sammie826
title: Amazing!!
text: I Baught this in Brattleboro Vermont while looking at their delicious ice cream! & oh my gosh! It's a complete favorite! Can't get enough!!

author: Trippex123
title: Best ever!
text: I couldn't believe it! Who would have thought something so simple in a pint would be heaven in your mouth? Omg amazing!!

author: VWilson
title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!!
text: This is the BEST ICE CREAM EVER!!! Taste like real pumpkin pie! So amazing, I have never had anything this good before!

author: SweetsAndTreats25
title: I love pumpkin ice cream!
text: This taste great. I wait every year for the pumpkin ice cream to come out. So glad it comes out a little bit early. Pumpkin ice creams are my favorite and this one is delicious.

author: ShelB
title: Pumpkin Love!
text: Hands down the best pumpkin ice cream I’ve ever tasted! My dad introduced me to pumpkin ice cream at Baskin Robins when I was a kid and although he passed away, every time I eat this B&J flavor, I think of him. Your pumpkin ice cream doesn’t have a weird after taste I’ve experienced in other pumpkin ice creams. (Which I only bought out of desperation when I couldn’t find B&J.) The graham cracker swirl is heavenly and like an extra blessing of happiness! I look forward to autumn every year so I can eat your Pumpkin ice cream and think of my dad.

author: Addicted101
title: Addictive
text: So smooth and and delicious every chance I had I bought 4 of them!

author: MikeL
title: My Favorite!
text: Simply the best! I wish this was available year round

author: Oscar
title: Great flavor
text: Great flavor. Tastes like pumpkin cheesecake blended into ice cream. The swirl is gritty and has great texture.

author: sj100
title: In love
text: I had this icecream years ago, it was immediately my favorite, and was upset when they stopped carrying it in my local stores the next following years. I hadn’t seen this icecream in about 3 to 4 years in my local stores. I checked so hard for it every year when fall hit. I even checked stores when I was out of town, ect. I finally found it this year at the store it’s been missing from, and I’m so happy. It is just as amazing as I remember. Wish it wasn’t a limited batch! Hope to see it next year!

author: Rafa
title: Absolutely the best
text: Last time I had it bought the last 2 pints @ Walmart in Puerto Rico a couple of years ago. It was the last time since never seen it again anywhere.

author: lmrobby24
title: Great for all seasons!
text: Came across this gem in Walmart and fell in love. The one thing that would make it perfect is a little more of the graham cracker crust.

author: Chibes
title: BEst flavor!
text: Makes Pumpkin spice season worth it! I always try to buy tons but it never lasts :/

author: Icecreamfan4life
title: Unexpectedly Good
text: Just picked this up a couple of days ago. Figured since it was my year to try out some of these much beloved pumpkin spice and pumpkin flavored items, that come out. I would give this ice cream a try. I'll be the first to admit pumpkin flavored anything is not a go to favorite flavor for me during the Fall or otherwise. So I had low expectations going in. But once I tried out a little bit that was inside the lid....have to say I fell in love with this super light pumpkin flavor. Even enjoyed the light graham cracker swirl. Just the further down I went into the pint, not sure if it was do to the larger the swirl became or the mix of the graham cracker with the spice in the pumpkin in the base. But the taste of the swirl just got real nasty throughout the middle section of the pint. But it got better again towards the end though.

author: Makinna
title: Best ice cream I’ve ever had
text: I thought I would never find an ice cream to replace One Love that they killed off a few years ago (I’ve seen it back randomly for short periods, but it never lasts), but finally I have. Naturally the one ice cream I love is limited batch. Anyway, it’s amazing. It tastes exactly like pumpkin cheesecake and the graham swirl is awesome. I could eat this all year. I would eat this all year if it was available.

author: Laine
title: PLEASE Make This a Full-Time Flavor
text: This is my all time favorite flavor and I am already having trouble finding it in stores! Like said in the description, it's not pumpkin spice flavored so I do not feel like it would go out of taste at other points in the year. I am in love with the graham cracker crunch in it, and the ice cream is so incredibly creamy (probably from the real pumpkin). Please please please make it a full time flavor!

author: Gerry
title: Great if you can find it!
text: This is truly a flavor everyone should try. Unfortunately this can only be found in a few big box stores or super marts. The B&J locator shows what stores have it in stock. But when i get there, i find a messy freezer with flavors all over the place. When i ask the staff for help , they are clueless and defiantly not on target. I hope to find this ice cream some day but for now i will keep looking

author: piercedxangel
title: A Fall Favorite!
text: I look forward to this amazing flavor every fall. It’s like spooning into a fresh, creamy pumpkin cheesecake, the graham cracker swirls make it absolutely perfect! My only issue is trying to get my hands on a few pints, they sell out super fast, so if you see them? Grab ‘em! If you’re like me & love pumpkin EVERYTHING, you’ll absolutely love this ice cream. It’s worth stocking up on :)

author: JennaDanika
title: Got an old one
text: This is my absolute favorite!! I hunt it every year. Well I bought my first one of the season today... it was gross and so sad. Have hunted the last couple years and couldn’t find it, so I was beyond excited when I found it today. But to open it and it have zero flavor because i think it was not stored properly..it was all mushy and had crystals and wouldn’t harden.. ughh

title: The gram cracker
text:
This is actually my favorite ice cream but the last few years I noticed it's hardly any Graham cracker. You guys use to put a thick layer of crackers in the ice cream m that's what make it so good. What happened. Is it to save money. I almost don't wanna buy without the
thick Graham cracker. I feel the same about strawberry cheesecake also

author: Britms6133
title: Just like actually pumpkin pie
text: Perfect for those that enjoy pumpkin flavors. Amazing for the fall, but I could enjoy this year round. The ice cream was creamy, good balance of sweetness, with a good ratio of ice cream to graham cracker swirl. I wish there was more of a cheesecake flavor, maybe add some cheesecake bites. I would buy again.

author: SarahSS
title: This is a must-try for Fall!
text: I'm usually not one for the trend of all pumpkin-flavored or pumpkin spice-flavored things, but I saw the Pumpkin Cheesecake B&J at the store and I had to try it. Oh my goodness, I'm so glad I did! The flavor is delicious and the graham really brings it to a 5/5. I've already purchased 3 pints!

author: Animal Whisperer
title: Pumpkin cheesecake ice cream
text: I love this ice cream I give it 4 stars because it is expensive for that little container instead of 5 stars :-*

author: emilyg
title: Dissapointed white girl
text:
I love everything pumpkin,
So when I saw this AND saw it was ben and jerrys I was in! However when I tried it it was kinda underwhelming in pumpkin taste. The cheesecake was there but the pumpkin taste was little to none. Maybe it was just a bad pint pick but I'm still super sad about it.

author: jodyh3
title: Best flavor they make
text: I'm SO sad this is only out during fall. This is so good, it should be out year round. It doesn't have much of a cheesecake flavor but it has the light and buttery accents. The graham cracker swirl makes this pint what it is, AMAZING! Make this a regular flavor!!!

author: KatB
title: Not sure if I got a bad pint or not...
text: I bought this a few months ago, and I think it might have been old, because the ice cream was incredibly frosted and I couldn't distinguish any sort of graham cracker swirl at all. Definitely disappointed.

author: Kelseylovesicecream
title: Absolute Favorite
text: I tried this for the first time in October.. haven’t stopped eating it since. I literally CRAVE this ice cream!! I really, really hope they make this a permanent flavor instead of just the limited batch

author: Drowsy
title: Great but can't eat it lol
text: I love pumpkin flavored things, and have trouble finding ones that I can eat because I am allergic to Ginger. I did get to try this ice cream before realizing it had ginger in it, and it is amazing.

author: La Salsera
title: Thes best ice cream I've ever had
text: I've been buying this ice cream for a few years now. I check the supermarket freezers even in the off season. It's the best ice cream I've ever had. My props to Ben and Jerry for this creation!

author: The Metal Man
title: The Best!!!
text: The Ben & Jerry’s Pumpkin Cheesecake is the absolute best Ice Cream from a store I have EVER had!!!! I wish this was made year round but I will be stocking up on it so I have it for months!!!!

author: Dustybucket
title: Pumpkin cheesecake ice cream, yummy
text: I tried this last night and it is delicious. It captures the flavors of autumn perfectly. I wish this would be a permanent flavor offering though. It is that good.

author: nicolet
title: OMG
text: every time I find this ice Cream in the stores i end up buy atleast 10 pints of it bc it is soo hard to find. wish is would be avail. all year round

author: BCJPP
title: My favorite flavor
text: This is my Thanksgiving dessert (and dinner) when I end up having to work the holiday. Has all the right flavors and a nice blend of pumpkin spice.

author: Lailaann
title: Amazing and perfect for fall
text: I bought this 3 weeks ago and already had theee of them. It is the perfect amount of sweet with a bit of salty from the graham crackers. I LOVE IT

author: FuzzyGut
title: Delivers on its name!
text: Tastes exactly the way it should. Real, fresh pumpkin flavor and a very nice graham swirl. I have 6 more of these in my freezer and I’m glad I do.

author: Maddie
title: Incredible
text: My favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor EVER. Everyone I have told about it is hooked too. Please please please just make this a permanent flavor!

author: austintoller
title: Yum! I LOVE this flavor! Please keep it!
text: I am addicted to this, you beacons of yummy evil. Not too sweet, the graham cracker swirl is perfect. Please keep this one on permanently.

author: Vthillbilly
title: Delicious!!
text: I love it!!! I hope they make it a permanent addition to their lineup!!! Oh, and bring back Willie Nelson's peach cobbler!!!

author: Insurancealdo
title: My favorite flavor!
text: My favorite, the best!!! Every fall I look for this flavor, I wish they would make it all year long instead of seasonally.

author: Devotee
title: Flavor is incredible, lack of availability stinks
text: Pls, pls produce more. I think I got ONE last year, can't find any yet this year - supply is always sold out. :(

author: IceCreamy
title: New favorite
text: I usually don't like anything g cheesecake flavored but this was amazing! Should make it a permanent flavor.

author: IceCreamGoddess
title: Can't eat just a scoop!
text: Super tasty! As a fan of 1. ice cream 2. pumpkin 3. Graham Cracker pie crusts this is heaven in a pint!

author: MarkChana
title: Excellent but hard to find
text: I love this flavor. But it is really hard to find in my area. Wish it was stocked in more supermarkets.

author: TCM2022
title: Delicious!
text: The flavors are fantastic, so complementary! Wish this wasn’t a limited flavor it’s that good!

title: Amazing fall or winter choice
text: If your looking for something amazing that makes you think of fall then this is the perfect.

author: Kristay
title: It has little crust swirls !!
text: The flavor is creamy and good and it has soft pie crust swirled into the recipe, love it !!

author: Puff
title: Pumpkin Spice Everything
text: #PumpkinSpiceEverything I love this!!! I wish they can have this flavor all year round!!!

author: Blavkrose0548
title: Loved it+
text: Extremely good has a light pumpkin taste. It doesnt over power your taste buds

author: Renee12
title: Best ever keep flavor please
text: This pumpkin cheesecake is so good I have to buy more the best ice cream

author: Misspammyc
title: Yummy
text: Loved a homemade version but couldn’t get more saw this. Delicious

author: Michzel
title: Keep this forever!
text: Wait for the fall to buy and stock up this at a local store.

author: Heatherh
title: The best!
text: My favorite by far. Wish I could get it year round. Love it.

author: Jesserae88
title: The Best
text: I love pumpkin. I love cheesecake. Fantastically addicting

author: Nathalier12
title: it has potential.
text: i give this icecream a 3 star. because 5 js licking spoon to its core. 4 is not enough chunks but yummy creamy icecream flavor. 3 is.... well this. def not enough cookie or strawberry. and not enough blueberry icecream flavor. needs LOTS more. tasted like vanilla icream with very rare moments of tastebud excitement when the tiny chunks of shortbread were finally dug up. Did i eat it in 2 days? yes. Did i enjoy eating it? yes. Did i look forward to wating it in the future? no i forgot about it which means it wasnt great. Will i buy again? if they advertise it after this review " with an overload of added chunks".... ps.. looks nothing like the picture smh :(

author: metalpasta
title: Where's the raspberries?
text: I read the description of this flavor and thought this might be an instant classic. Raspberry and blueberry ice cream? And strawberries too? Ooh! But I have to say this flavor was a disappointment. All I could taste was vanilla and the shortbread. Now blueberry isn't the strongest flavor in the world, but you would think it could be amped up at least a little. And maybe it's just me but I could not taste the raspberry at all. And the pint I purchased had only a few bites of strawberry. The flavor was not bad, but it was nothing like i was expecting. Instead of "wow!", all I experienced was "meh". I'll stick with my old favorites and keep hoping for a resurrection of "That's My Jam".

author: Icecreamfan4life
title: Totally unexpected willy wonka experience!
text: Okay as I said in another review. I bought this with 2 other flavors(Sammie flavor and the sweet like sugar flavor), and I was the most leery of this flavor. As I tend to enjoy fresh blue and raspberries as opposed to having them in ice creams. As they just don't taste right or good to me. But in this flavor. I'm not sure if it was the fact that there was the vanilla swirl and short bread cookies, that balanced things out or what. But this turned out to be a lot better than I expected. Again, I know others may not like it, because it's not one of B&J's chunck induced, fudge freckled classics. But it's definitely a step in the right direction in balancing out more natural even flavors, with deep, rich, and sometimes too salty flavors as well. So definitely keep mixing it up for sure.

author: Dandani8
title: AhhhhhMazing
text: I love this flavor !!! The bursting flavor blueberry and raspberry and little fireworks of strawberries and shortbread pieces is a delicious way to make any day better, but not only that but every bite is so satisfying and gets better bite after bite!!! Definitely my new favorite!

author: mer13
title: Lacking flavour
text: The vanilla itself isn't even that great tasting and vanilla is all this ice cream flavour really is. The blueberry and raspberry portion of ice cream taste just like the vanilla, the strawberry pieces are few and far between, and the short bread chunks were about the same. The ice cream could be a great flavour if they reworked it and added some more flavour to the blue ice cream portion and adding a little more chunks of fruit and cookies.

author: Mmemimsmom
title: Major Disappointment
text: I was so excited to find this flavor (raspberries, blueberries, strawberries, shortcake! ! ) and so disappointed when I tasted it. First off, grayish purple ice cream is just NOT RIGHT! Second, flavor. It doesn't taste like anything but overly sweet vanilla. I found 3 threads of red that, if you squinted, might have been strawberry. The globs of shortcake were a disgusting greenish color and again, too sweet. No fruit flavors. Would I buy this again?? No. Will I finish the pint? No. Will I buy B&J's again? Meh.

author: RaeRaeMae
title: Not enough shortbread!
text: If you tripled the amount of shortbread, at least, I could give this a 3 star rating. But it also hardly had any strawberry; maybe 5 tiny little pieces(but that's a stretch) Raspberry? Where? That was non existent. And the blueberry could also be kicked up a notch... Also, just take out the vanilla all together. Other than the name, there is no need for it.

title: I Want a Painting of This on My Wall
text: I bought this on vacation expecting nothing but then I ate it and the texture reminded me of Play-Doh in all its glory (without the smell, which is still awesome in its non-edible glory) and it was SO GOOD. This is the first time in over 10 years I sat down and almost ate the entire pint and it had nothing to do with any kind of appetite stimulating...um...recreational activities. YUM is the three letter word that a Jeopardy question would ask and this would be the answer. More of this all day, at all times.

author: MirandaR
title: My favorite
text: I have bought 3 of these! So delicious. Sometimes I find the flavors overwhelming so this is a great one for people like me who enjoy ice cream but not crazy amounts of different flavor.

author: Sky77
title: Mild, vanilla flavor
text: If you ate this with your eyes closed, you would swear it’s vanilla with an occasional chunk of something that you couldn’t really place. Good vanilla, but...vanilla.

author: Shmeezy
title: Just ok
text: Wasn’t gross because it’s ice cream. :-p. However I was very disappointed. Tasted very plain like vanilla. Not a lot of chunks either. Not fruity at all.

author: Zeus1995
title: Good but could be better
text: I enjoyed it but could be better. more shortbread chunks, more strawberries, and stronger blueberrie taste

author: ems247
title: Underwhelming
text: Usually love Ben and Jerry’s so I Thought this would be great but ended up being kind of tasteless.

author: marijajjj
title: so yummy
text: the best ice cream ive ever had! i bought it once and couldn't find it again

author: Vnessa
title: LOVED IT!
text: Almost like eating a berry pie! I love this. I have been waiting around for this type of flavor/texture since another company launched a similar flavor YEARS AGO but with graham cracker crust! They only had it through summer and i haven't seen it since! I really enjoyed this because it wasn't chocolate, caramel, candy, etc. This is my FAVORITE! Please do not discontinue this flavor!

author: Goldie
title: Disappointed!
text: I only had white and blue ice cream that lacked flavor. No strawberries or shortbread pieces. This definitely is not an ice cream I would purchase again.

author: Briarhopper
title: Just tastes like vanilla
text: Usually love Ben and Jerry’s but this was the most bland ice cream I’ve ever eaten from them

author: Vivicart
title: I wish it had more flavor
text: I picked this up with the new Ice cream Sammie flavor and I have to admit this flavor was underwhelming for me. I’d like to see more of the raspberry and cookies pieces inside. Unlike like the Ice cream Sammie flavor this one is flavorful enough for me. I wanted more but really loved the idea of the flavors all together.

author: Hoop
title: Mhh
text:
Tried this tonight and found it tasteless and boring. There were some little reddish dots of something, with some pale violet swirls that were tasteless. There were some gritty cake-like bits in the colored swirl. B&J make such great ice cream...this is not one of them.
I wish I had purchased some other flavor.

author: Emilysmimi
title: Big Disappointment
text: I bought this flavor because I loved the Maine Blueberry ice cream that Ban and Jerry’s used to make. All I tasted was vanilla with what seemed to be something like pound cake globs. I even tried tasting the flavors separately but no berry flavor to be found. Also, MIA were the strawberries. So sad

author: pixellkitten
title: Meh I wouldn't get it again
text: Was super excited about this one, but all i taste is vanilla and even though my pint looks filled with blueberry, theres no flavor, no berries and no shortbread! I feel like this was a waste to buy I should have bought my go-to flavor of phish food instead.

author: qazy
title: Lacking ingredients, maybe just a bad batch.
text: The pint had around 6 strawberry pieces in the entire container. The shortbread was also lacking in quantity and in texture and flavor. The shortbread was soft nasty no flavor blobs, thank goodness only a few pieces made it into the pint.

author: Keekkeek
title: SO YUM!!
text:
One of my favorites that I can’t seem to find :(
The taste is for someone who doesn’t want the overwhelming globs of chocolate or caramel type tastes & instead like a light airy tasting ice cream. Tastes really fresh.

author: Bondservant888
title: Tastes great but missing ingredients
text: There were very few and very tiny bits of shortbread and raspberries. Doesn’t look like the picture on the container. Tastes good, but disappointing considering other bj ice creams have loads of stuff in them.

author: Mimi116
title: So sad...
text: Sounds amazing, tastes bland. Not a single strawberry or ANYTHING red was found in my pint. Also missing from this pint was flavor! It had an odd overly sweet vanilla flavor and that was pretty much it!

author: Sunnyinor
title: Not what it claims
text: Just bought the red white and blueberry and was very disappointed, no raspberry at all. Mostly vanilla and very little shortbread. Won't buy again. Usually Ben and jerrys is amazing. Not this one.

author: Weebsamy
title: My new fav don’t discontinue!!
text: I love this ice cream! Totally addicted to the little blueberry shortbread pieces- this is a berry lovers dream! An alternative for ya folks who aren’t chocolate and caramel people.

author: Cavewmn
title: Not to much and not to little
text: This is my favorite ever. Sadly it's an exclusive to one store. Now it's not even for delivery. This was getting me through Covid19 and now I have to find something new.

author: Andyh
title: Fantastic!
text: I bought this today from a Walmart in Evansville IN! It was a fruity ice cream which I’m not always a fan of, but for some reason this did it for me! Highly recommend!

author: Joyful1
title: Not as good as it sounds
text: Not very flavorful & the shortbread adds a gritty/mushy texture. I couldn’t taste raspberry, the blueberry was dull & the strawberry just didn’t work in the mix.

author: Emmysue
title: Delicious!
text: I love this flavor! It is subtley berry flavored and I really like it! Love the strawberries and the shortbread pieces. One of my favorites!

author: Smileszim
title: Loved It
text: Just tried new flavor and really enjoyed. It was not overly sweet and the shortbread gave it a nice texture.

author: Lacee
title: Absolutely delicious
text: We love this one! Its not sweet but, yet has so much flavor. Try it out you won't be sorry!

author: esofresh
title: Delicious
text: Favorite ice cream ever. It’s delicious. Come out with a bigger size to enjoy for days

author: Smacklet
title: Best flavor ever!
text: Best flavor you have! Love it. Reminds me of Royal Britannia which I miss a lot.

author: Cakes
title: Best flavor evah
text: Delicious scrumptious tasty awesome lovely delightful love it❣️Thank you ❤️

author: Trish
title: My favorite!
text: This is my favorite flavor but it’s hard to find at the grocery stores!

author: sarahnicole
title: Yummy
text: Really yummy! But could have more strawberry pieces.

author: Brandon5689
title: New Favorite
text: Awesome combination, the blueberry and shortbread.

author: jnewbio
title: Best flavor, but hard to find!
text: This has long been my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor - the chocolate ice cream in it is deep, dark and delicious, the graham crumb swirl adds just the right bit of texture, the "toasted marshmallow" is more complex than the straight-up marshmallow in Phish Food, and the chunks of chocolate are of the highest quality. Sadly it is hard to find in my area - I look for it in any store I go into and when I find it, buy as many cartons as can fit in my freezer! I tried the new Limited Edition "Gimme S'More" flavor and found it very disappointing. I certainly hope Ben and Jerry's isn't planning to replace the classic S'mores with this new flavor - I'd be heartbroken!

author: Elizcady
title: All Time Favorite Flavor
text: I could eat ice cream everyday and am a bit of a chocoholic, so naturally this is my go to flavor for Ben and Jerry's. Although there are several other chocolate based flavors, its hard to compare and I went through serious withdraw when I couldn't buy it when living in the U.K. While this used to be easy to find in my local grocery stores, I've recently seen it replaced with the new Gimme S'more flavor on the shelves. I am hoping that it isn't going to be discontinued, as the new flavor is completely different. Never one to write reviews, but I feel so passionately that I wanted it to be stated that some of us out there love this one, despite the lower rating.

author: Cait5
title: All-time favorite, but so hard to find!
text: This is my all-time FAVORITE ice cream flavor--period. Ben & Jerry's is terrific, but they have far outdone themselves with S'mores. Nothing else compares. It's been my favorite ice cream since I was a kid, and nothing has ever come close to replacing it. Unfortunately, it also happens to be the MOST DIFFICULT flavor to find. There are no retailers near me that still carry it--it seems to have been phased out, and I hope not in favor of "Gimme S'more," which can't hold a candle to the original S'mores. The rich chocolate flavor, punctuated by fudgy chocolate chunks; paired with velvety toasted marshmallow and delightfully crunchy, textured graham cracker swirls--nothing compares!

author: Matthart82
title: My favorite of all time
text: This is by far my favorite ice cream ever. I don't know what it is, but I am totally addicted to it and will pretty much eat the entire pint in one sitting, even though I don't like eating ice cream that much. I've driven long distances to buy this and was on the website right now just to find out where I can buy this since I just moved to a new state. I was shocked to see that this has some negative reviews and I felt that I should pay the ice cream back by writing this review. But anyway, best ice cream ever.

author: Livy
title: In serious need of an overhaul
text:
The main problem with this flavor is that it has a very poor balance between the three components of a s'more: graham cracker, chocolate and marshmallow. In its current iteration, the chocolate ice cream base completely overpowers everything else to the point where you're left with what tastes like plain chocolate ice cream.
I would suggest completely reinventing this flavor with a graham cracker flavored ice cream base, with chocolate chunks and a much more generous amount of marshmallow swirl.
I think this flavor has the potential to be a fantastic, stand-out flavor, but as it stands I will not be buying it again.

author: Phish Food Fan
title: The Melter
text: I love Ben and Jerry’s. There are a few flavors in particular that I call Melters. This is because I melt into euphoria at the first bite. There are a few that are so good that with the first spoonful I am in heaven. This S’mores ice cream is perfect in my opinion. The chocolate base (B&J does chocolate better than anyone) is dense, rich, sweet, and decedent. The graham and toasted marshmallow play perfectly together and create layers that come apart while spooning, and with the fudge chunks, and this effect makes the pint ridiculously delicious! Just FYI, the other melters are Chocolate Fudge Brownie, Phish Food, Chocolate Therapy, Half Baked, Gimme Smore, Tonight Dough, Peanut Butter World and Chubby Hubby.

author: SarahSS
title: Favorite!
text: S'mores is by far my favorite B&J's flavor. I was upset to see the other reviews saying they were so disappointed! Maybe it was something in a recent batch or whatever, but anytime I get it, it's always perfect! The graham cracker swirls are the best part. So delicious!

author: DeeDee_BakedZiti
title: The best of the best
text: I'm in love with S'mores. In fact, I fell in love with my husband over a pint of S'mores. As teenagers, we shared spoonfuls of the richest chocolate, creamiest marshmallows and bites of graham cracker perfection. 15 years later, we still go "gaga" when we spot it in a store. My only wish is that we could find it more often--it's certainly hard to come by in the tristate area.

author: l0lu47smores
title: My Very favorite and that's saying something
text: Ever since I was a baby I have loved this flavor. When we did a vote in our family about who was the messiest ice cream eater I was voted number one but especially with this flavor. I find this flavor my very favorite and I think that no other flavor is even close in the good range. You're in heaven when you eat it. It has the perfect amount of every flavor. I love it! Definitely a must in your freezer!

author: SugaHG
title: For Chocolate Lovers Only...Unfortunately
text: This flavor was a disappointment. The chocolate ice cream with chocolate chunks over powers the marshmallow swirl and the graham cracker has yet to be tasted. This flavor needs a revision. In the summer when you bite into a s'more you are instantly hit with the graham cracker taste that is followed by the marshmallow and then warm chocolate. This ice cream should be the same. Graham cracker flavored ice cream with an ample amount of marshmallow swirl followed by chocolate chunks and graham cracker bits would do this flavor justice. As it is now, I will never buy again, I won't even finish this pint!

author: Michele
title: If anything happens to this flavor I will die...
text: There aren’t enough stores that carry this flavor! There aren’t nearly enough chocolate based b&j flavors but this one is perfect! The roasted marshmallow is so good & the graham is delicious. The only thing I might recommend would be to add more graham ... and to get more stores to carry it!

author: mooksT
title: Awesome flavor! Impossible to find.
text: This is my wife's all time favorite flavor of B&J (going back to when it was called Marsha Marsha Marshmallow), but we cannot find it anywhere near us even though the Flavor Finder says 2 different chains in our area carry it. I've been to all of those stores in ~10 mile radius and they don't even have a slot for it on the shelf. B&J's online store doesn't even carry it. I would be willing to pay a hefty premium to have it delivered at this point. I did see it recently at a Safeway in California when I was there on business, but was not in a position to try and haul it home with me on a plane. WE WANT THE S'MORES!

author: JenR
title: FAVORITE
text: My absolute favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's! The chocolate ice cream as always is delicious. S'mores ice cream should always have a chocolate base. I love the texture of the chunks of chocolate and graham crackers. I'm glad they chose to go with a whipped marshmallow rather than fluffy marshmallow chunks. This flavor really can't be beat!

author: Smores4lyfe
title: The literal best flavor
text: It's not like I can find it anywhere anymore but, it's still my favorite. Hopefully B&J will get with the program and have it more widely available in NYC again!

author: Sarah4
title: Plain chocolate ice cream
text: Cannot even taste the graham cracker or marshmallow. I taste more marshmallow in the Phish Food. Chocolate should not be the base of this ice cream it completely overpowers anything else that could be there. I'd recommend a graham cracker ice cream with ample swirls of marshmallow and fudge as a remake of this flavor

author: Zoid
title: I officially have a new favorite flavor...
text: Phish Food used to be my favorite, until I first had S'mores. Now I can't get enough of it. For some reason it only appears to be sold in Publix in my area, so I have to make the extra trek to Publix just to get me some S'mores. The problem is they sell out of it frequently so I have to check back often. Very well balanced and frankly addictive. Please expand the retail distribution so all the s'mores fans in my area don't have to fight for the limited inventory at Publix. THANKS!

author: Doug
title: Love it
text: I look for the S'mores every time I hit the grocer. Now to find the ever elusive S'mores Ice Cream bar!

author: TheFoodie21
title: Delicious flavor that keeps me coming back!
text: This particular flavor has to be one of my favorites I absolutely love the marshmallow swirl and the graham cracker pieces.The chocolate chunks were good too though I wish the pieces were a little bit smaller, still, won't stop me from getting this ice cream.

author: Christy
title: Best flavor on earth!
text: This is my addiction! I love it's more a semi sweet chocolate with the marshmallow and graham cracker... I have no idea what I will do if they ever stop making this ice cream. I call dibs on the recipe if you ever discontinue!

author: trashpanda1971
title: Legit the BEST
text: I die of sadness every time I’m in the mood for B&J, but the store doesn’t carry this flavor...it has ALL THE THINGS...delish chocolate ice cream, graham cracker crack bits, and sweet, sweet toasted marshmallow swirls. One of the few foods in life that is worth the calories...when I see people give this flavor a low score I literally want to fist fight them.

author: RS30
title: Best ice cream ever!!!
text: So this was my favorite ice cream ever!!! all the flavors match so well and the combination of the chocolate ice cream with the graham cracker is great. If I could ask for anything would be to have a little more graham cracker in it, but is still absolutely delicious. However I'm deeply sad to see that this flavor is no longer available... just so disappointing and now I'm struggling to find another ice cream to substitute my favorite ever S'mores! :(

author: kpwr
title: best ice cream in america
text: head and shoulders the best of the bunch. why so hard to find?

author: Nowan
title: Chocolate AGAIN?
text: I tried this a week ago then just now put it up against Phish Food. Here's the deal, imagine your a the S'mores flavored ice cream for a moment...then you looks at yourself and essentially you realize you've been created as a competition to Rocky Road ice creams and your own sibling Phish Food. Someone else offered an amazing idea of making this a graham cracker ice cream GAME CHANGER!, lets take it onestep further,..Making it a CORE then my freinds you've done it, A S'mores in a pint, the outside consists of a Graham Cracker Ice Cream and a Marshmallow & Fudge core. idk food for thought.

author: allisonlovesicecream94
title: My favorite flavor! But so hard to find :(
text: When I was living in NYC, I found this flavor one time in my local bodega. Ever since then, it's been my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. I recently moved back to Michigan and cannot find it anywhere! The graham cracker swirls balance out the decadent chocolate flavors and the toasted marshmallow adds this gooey element that is perfectly complex and sweet. Luckily, when I visit my boyfriend who is stationed in North Dakota, his store carries it and I'm able to get my fix. I hope this flavor never gets discontinued!

author: FuzzyGut
title: Really good stuff.
text: I just melt when I dig into certain B&J flavors and this is one of them. Everything about S’mores is great, I just wish the marshmallow and graham swirls were thicker. This is a great pint and I will definitely be buying it again.

author: Stacey
title: Best Flavor Ever!!!!
text: My husband and I drive all the way across town to buy this ice cream at least twice a week! It is the BEST! I love that is is very chocolatey with a hint of marshmallow and graham cracker. It's perfection!

author: bluethreads
title: lacks s'mores flavor
text: I was excited to see a few brands of ice cream offering s'mores flavor at my supermarket! S'mores is one of my favorites! I thought the flavor might be difficult to capture in an ice cream and decided my best bet was to go for Ben and Jerry's. It seems I made the wrong choice, as their ice cream tasted like chocolate chocolate chip. There were a few graham cracker swirls, but I couldn't detect any marshmallows. I don't know if the marshmallows were supposed to be flavored within the graham cracker swirl, but the taste never came together as anything but chocolate. The ice cream was a super delicious chocolate chocolate chip ice cream, but if you are expecting an ice cream resembling s'mores, I'd try another brand.

author: bmhansen513
title: S'mores Lover's Dream
text: If you are like me and enjoy S'mores, you will not be disappointed with this pint. I have read some of the bad reviews and I think people have come across some imbalanced pints, but that it no way should take away from what this flavor is at its best. I have had imbalanced pints in every flavor and chalk it up to nuances in the manufacturing process. This one may be slightly more prone to imbalances, but the flavor is so good that I am more than willing to put up with a few "misses" from time to time.

author: nickmemyself
title: SAVE THIS FLAVOR
text: PLEASE, this is my favorite flavor and if it went away I don't know what I would do, the graham cracker chunks are heaven and everything about this spells happiness.

author: Rhirhi
title: Best flavor!!
text: I love this ice cream. I wish they sold it in a bigger size. I would literally buy gallons of this stuff. Best flavor ever!

author: Lolly
title: Best Chocolate Ice Cream
text: I love chocolate ice creams and this is my favorite of them all..

author: Tracy1975
title: Better flavor than the new S'mores
text: I accidentally bought the "new" s'mores flavor thinking it was this one. This one has much better flavor. It tastes like Smores because it has marshmallow and Graham cracker and chocolate. The new one tastes like vanilla ice cream with Oreo cookie pieces. Nothing Smores about it.

author: BriBri
title: My Favorite!
text: This is one of my favorite flavors. So chocolaty! I love the marshmallow and graham cracker flavor too!

author: BC1226
title: Camp In A Pint
text: Love the toasted flavor in the marshmallow and overall is one of my favorite flavors!

author: jdodge23
title: Amazing
text: First time trying s'mores ice cream and I love it!

author: maya3
title: What s'mores?
text: I was craving s'mores on a hot day, which naturally led me to the perfect idea: s'mores ice cream! I was so excited to try this flavor that I bought two tubs of it at the store, only to be sorely disappointed. This doesn't even taste like s'mores, it's basically just chocolate ice cream. The chocolate ice cream base overpowers all the other flavors... such a disappointment.

author: Sarah
title: Disappointed
text: I'm a long time Ben and jerries fan, and I've never been let down by any of the flavors, until this one. In the entire pint I only got one bite of marshmallow, which is not what I expected from and ice cream named smores. It would have been an excellent flavor if it had more marshmallow and graham crackers in it.

author: pollosmoky
title: My Favorite
text: My favorite, but suddenly I can't find it! I am overcome with grief at this development. Other chocolate/marshmallow-y ice creams suffice, but it's the slightly salty graham-y flavor that really makes S'mores fabulous. Phish Food is much too sweet, and all those dang fish are in the way. Please tell me you're not retiring this flavor. If you must retire it, I demand Glampfire Trail Mix be put in regular rotation, bc if I can't have a graham cracker swirl, then a pretzel swirl will have to do.

author: j12345
title: Favorite flavor ever!!
text: I don't understand all the bad reviews for this flavor. It is my all time favorite, and I think it's perfect. The marshmallow and graham swirls give it a nice soft texture, with the chocolate chips giving it just a bit of crunch. It is a little heavy on the chocolate flavor, but then again, so are real s'mores. Graham and marshmallow are subtle to begin with and come through great here. I haven't tried the newer flavor that has graham ice cream, but don't know how it could improve on this!

author: Debra
title: LOVE the strong chocolate flavor and mix ins
text: Oh my goodness this is my favorite ice cream ever. The chocolate ice cream base tastes dark, which is so rare and hard to find. I absolutely love it and can't get enough. Thank you! I hope you never change the recipe.

author: foodie29
title: Amazing Flavor!
text:
This ice cream combines everything I love about smores. The chocolate ice cream is a perfect choice for the base--creamy, rich, delicious. Ben and Jerry's has managed to create an amazing gooey marshmallow with a real toasted marshmallow flavor. I go crazy over that marshmallow swirl. I'm also crazy for the graham cracker bits--they add some amazing texture to the ice cream that I love, and have great flavor. Then, to top it all off, the crunchy chocolate bits. This is a great ice cream if you like texture in your ice cream, and I do. This is fun to eat, and totally delicious. This is an ice cream you have to stop after the first bite (and the 20th!) to say "Wow, that's good."
Side note--I tried "Gimmie Smores" and found it frankly dull. It tasted like generic cookies and cream ice cream. It wasn't rich and decadent and exciting like this. S'mores is a far superior ice cream. Also, the Campfire ice cream hits some similar notes but still isn't as good. I don't like nuts, and I appreciate having some amazing ice creams that don't rely on those for interest. This is the real winner.

author: NSEGS
title: Best flavor ever!!
text: This is the best combination of flavors! We love this ice cream so much and it is impossible to find. Really hoping it is not replaced with the new Gimme S’mores flavor which is not great.

author: Tyra
title: One Word. Amazing!
text: I took one spoonful of this and fell in love. I could not stop eating until I reached the bottom. Hope this never goes away. Did not have any marshmallows, but I was too in love to care.

author: Lexx
title: Very disappointing :(
text: I LOVE Ben and Jerrys ice cream. I LOVE anything s'mores flavored so I thought this would be my new favorite B&J flavor but unfortunately I was disappointed. It really did not taste like s'mores at all and tasted pretty much like plain chocolate ice cream. I was really rooting for this one because I love s'mores but this did nothing for me :( it would be the perfect ice cream if it tasted like actual s'mores!

author: Mickfrogger
title: Very disappointed
text: What makes me sad is ben and jerrys has the ability to make this a great ice cream, but they didn't. It tastes like chocolate chocolate chip ice cream. I actually thought I got a dud pint because i couldnt taste any graham. If they did a separate thick graham cracker swirl a la their pumpkin cheesecake ice cream and a thicker toasted marshmallow swirl it could be what it claims to be. Won't buy this flavor again.

author: Eric15
title: Best Flavor!
text: This is the best flavor in my opinion but it not stocked very well in the KY area. Makes it very hard to find!!! Please fix guy!

author: tyler321321321
title: My Favorite Flavor
text:
Ben and Jerry's Smores is my favorite flavor of not just b&j but ALL ice cream in general. It's AMAZING! Smores ice cream should always have chocolate as a base and the toasted marshmallow creme tastes JUST like real toasted marshmallow.
I found this flavor a few months ago and haven't had another flavor of ice cream since. I am super sad I can't seem to find this one anymore since it seems to have been replaced with the "more s'mores" flavor (which is infinitely worse)

author: Smoresgirl31
title: I love it but I’m so disappointed!!
text: This is my FAVORITE flavor Ben & Jerry’s offers. It’s my go to ice cream in the supermarket. The only problem is that it’s so inconsistent! Lately I’ve only gotten mostly chocolate ice cream, barely any marshmallow inside the pints (which is my favorite part). Last batch I had didn’t have any graham cracker or marshmallow. I don’t want to give up on this product but I just wish they could get it right! Will not be buying for a while, maybe the wait will be worth it..

author: MusicPhan
title: Yummy! Yummy! Yummy!
text: My favorite flavor! Lately I haven’t been able to find it anywhere. I want s’more!!!

author: janderson
title: S’mores
text: Amazing, miss this flavor so much. All things s’mores from B&J I miss desperately

author: zackbrown322
title: Tastes Nothing Like S'mores
text: I honestly don't know what Ben and Jerry's was thinking with this concoction. The balance between the traditional s'mores flavors (graham cracker, chocolate, and marshmallow) in this pint is completely off. It ends up tasting like plain chocolate ice cream. Now Ben & Jerry's has come out with an additional s'mores flavor. But why? Just revamp this one! Probably the most disappointing pint of ice cream I've ever bought.

author: Em77
title: Love it!
text: I love this ice cream SO much! By far my favorite!

author: Tali
title: Not their best...
text: I'm a die-hard B&J's fan, but they really got it wrong with this one. When I got it I first thought something was wrong because it only tasted like chocolate ice cream with nothing else -- but then I saw the rest of the reviews here and I guess it's just the flavor! I was really excited for the graham crackers but I they're practically non existent. I'm pretty disappointed, hopefully the rest of the flavors don't lose their character like this o

author: Jlcchavez
title: Is this s'mores?
text:
First off, I love Ben and Jerrys.
I always love trying all your different flavors and was pretty excited to try this! But I could not taste anything but chocolate, good chocolate ice cream nonetheless. I would consider tweaking this recipe I could visibly see all the marshmallow swirl which seemed abundant but the chocolate ice cream base is to strong to even taste the other flavors.

author: goldcrab
title: Something feels wrong
text: Usually this is my favorite flavor, have been treating myself every few months to S'mores for years. The one I bought today though, I almost thought it was a different product. Could barely see any marshmallow, the chocolate was overpowering, and I got a feeling I was eating condensed milk or something at times instead of anything s'mores related. I hope this was just a bad batch and not a permanent change :\

author: Bren2424
title: the *BEST* ice cream flavor ever
text:
This is the only ice cream I'll eat. It's literally my favorite. I would eat it all the time if it were easier to find in stores! They stocked it where I used to live and ever since I moved I haven't been able to find It which makes me so sad. Ben and Jerrys, distribute it more! it's heaven in a pint and I miss it SO MUCH.
(p.s. "Gimme S'mores is NOT as good AT ALL. Pales in comparison.

author: ejav
title: Good chocolate ice cream, but not much else
text: I was really excited to get this for my wife since she loves chocolate and marshmallow and I thought this would be a match made in heaven with B&J being her favorite ice cream brand, but lo and behold this was probably the most underwhelming flavor to date. Tasted like a decent chocolate ice cream but other than that it was generic and didn’t have much of a s’mores taste to it.

author: Mnoa
title: Literally soooo disappointed with this flavor.
text:
I just bought this thinking I’d love it and it could not be the furthest thing from s’mores. It’s pure chocolate ice cream; very strong and dark chocolate to say the least. Cannot even even see, let alone taste, the marshmallow or the graham cracker.
Did not like this one bit. Chocolate was a bad idea for this ice cream. The picture and description are very deceiving. P

author: Amy77
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!!!!!!!
text: Omg! This is the BEST ice cream you’ll ever have. It’s hard do find. They don’t even have it at their own ice cream shop. Gimme s’more is nothing like it - I wouldn’t even buy that. “S’mores” is the best! I hope they keep making it. It’s smooth and not too sweet. The chocolate flavor is awesome combined with graham crackers and marshmallows!! I LOVE this ice cream!!!

author: ColoradoKate
title: More S'mores I Implore
text: Been buying this chocolaty delight since my daughter was a toddler.....and she's now a licensed driver. This decadent flavor is my before-bed ritual. Smooth rich deep chocolate flavor with delicious fudge chunks and swirls of lip-smacking goodness. None of your other flavors compare to this delight. S'mores will always have a place in my heart.....and freezer.

author: Shaina
title: A bit sad
text: I have been a Ben and Jerry’s lover since childhood. With that being said it is rare that I come across a flavor that I am not a fan of. Being that I love Ben and Jerry’s as well as s’mores, I was really excited to try this. The base flavor was fine but I was not reminded of s’mores while eating this. I actually didn’t even finish the pint, which never happens.

author: Voltages230
title: Not the flavor you're expecting
text: I would expect a S'mores flavored ice cream to taste like my favorite dessert ever, a S'more. What I ended up getting was an overpowered chocolate flavor with tiny hints of graham cracker and even more chocolate in the form of the fudge chunks. I'm pretty disappointed in this flavor as usually I love B&J ice cream. Definitely won't be purchasing this again.

author: jennk83
title: Best flavor
text: This is my all-time favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor. They changed it up a bit sometime in the last couple of years, but it’s still very delicious. It has become increasingly difficult to find since the introduction of “Gimme S’more” (which I do not enjoy half as much), so when I do manage to find it, I stock up. Perfect flavor combination, not to be missed.

author: Vonnie
title: Not What I Was Expecting
text: I am a S'mores fanatic, so once I saw this in the grocery store, I went crazy! Lol I was expecting a marshmallow based ice cream with a fudge swirl and Graham cracker and fudge chunks. Unfortunately, I found myself eating chocolate flavored ice cream. The Smores flavor was overpowered by the chocolate smh I tried, but it was nothing that I was expecting.

author: vtmmm
title: Taste of Summer with Lots of Chocolate
text: My current favorite flavor! I love the creamy marshmallow swirls and the sandy texture of graham cracker crumbs, plus chocolate chunks. Some people feel it's not "balanced" enough, but as a chocolate person I'm perfectly happy to have my s'mores be more chocolate than anything! It's as if you took your s'more and crumbled it in chocolate ice cream!

author: sublimecls
title: Amazing flavor, my fav!!
text: This flavor is just PERFECTION for me! The dark chocolatey ice cream base is stellar, the gritty swirls of almost wet sand textured graham cracker is SO GOOD and the touches of toasted marshmalllow swirled throughout just top it off perfectly. I will never survive if they get rid of this flavor. I hat when I can’t find it in stock!

author: JakeJr9
title: SPECTACULAR SMORES
text: Hey stores in Delaware - if you want my grocery business you had better start stocking this flavor. My favorite used to be chocolate and peanut butter ice cream. But once I tried Smores I find myself driving around until I find a store that carries it. Do yourself a favor - if you have not tried this flavor - do so now.

author: Penelopetm
title: Most addictive flavor of all!
text:
I absolutely love everything about this flavor. The chocolate base is the best. B&J has very few flavors with chocolate base and no nuts.
My only problem is that NONE of the stores around me carry it anymore. They all carry the new S'mores flavor - which isn't chocolate ice cream. Sad ice cream-less summer for me.

author: Bryant
title: Best I have ever had!!!
text: My wife and I treat ourselves to Ben and Jerry’s on Friday nights. We used to buy S’mores and share it every Friday for 8 years!!! We can’t find it anywhere in North Carolina anymore. None of the other flavors are even close to comparing. Very sad that we can’t get it. It’s not even available in the online store.

author: Gustine
title: Disappointed
text: I was excited to see my store finally selling the s’mores flavor so I obviously bought it. I started eating it today and it’s just chocolate ice cream with a little bit of graham cracker and almost no marshmallow. I won’t be buying this again but I will recommend my favorites: Cherry Garcia and The Tonight Dough

author: Nicky91
title: Disappointing
text: I feel like they really dropped the ball with this flavor. The marshmallow and Graham crackers are entirely overpowered by the chocolate ice cream and chunks of fudge.
