I had really high hopes for this one. I think it would be so much better with a Graham flavored ice cream or even a marshmallow one.

author: momo9324
title: Poor S'more Flavor
text: I had high expectations for this ice cream as I love anything s'more flavor, but this ice cream just didn't cut it. It literally just tasted like chocolate ice cream. No graham cracker or marshmallow flavor at all. Sorry Ben & Jerry's, love your ice cream, but this flavor could use some work

author: Lauren14
title: I LOVE S'MORES
text: This flavor is my favorite because of the graham cracker swirls; they are to die for. This is always my ice cream go to and I am so sad that s'mores isn't sold at most ben&jerrys retailers. I have such a hard time finding it these days that I usually am forced to settle for other flavors.

author: Vali
title: Too much chocolate
text: Insanely chocolatey. Needs more marshmallow and graham crackers because all I could taste was chocolate.

author: Adrienne
title: Lack of S'mores
text: Not your typical summer treat flavor...the chocolate ice cream is overpowering and the taste of graham cracker and marshmallow bits is non-existent. Very disappointed by our choice of ice cream. Ben & Jerry's is known for exceptional and creative flavors, but this one misses the mark.

author: Mbrown80
title: Yuck
text: Tastes nothing like s'mores. Such dark chocolate ice cream...i don't understand why it has fudge, as s'mores do not...the marshmallow is not enough to help the overpowering darkness of the ice cream, and the graham doesn't taste at all, just contributes a sandy texture. Hard pass.

author: morganutley
title: Favorite Flavor!
text: The Dutch chocolate base is DELICIOUS, and the occasional bites of crumbled graham cracker, marshmallow, and chocolate just make it that much better. Purists may prefer more "S'mores" flavor, as the chocolate ice cream is really bold, but I think it's beyond excellent as is.

author: Stine70
title: Love, love, love this flavor
text: I am always on the hunt for this flavor when we visit a grocery store. I can’t get enough of the rich chocolate, buttery graham cracker, marshmallow swirl and chocolate pieces. I try so hard to ration it out, but I’m usually done in 4-5 nights. Thx for the yummy creation!

author: Brandy35
title: Ehhh
text: I was excited to try the smores....but the chocolate overpowered everything.

author: av3rros
title: Drowning in Chocolate
text: This is one of Ben & Jerry's most disappointing flavors. It tastes like nothing but chocolate ice cream. I didn't taste a single fudge chunk or roasted marshmallow it it. and that graham cracker swirl was non-existent. I'm shocked this hasn't made it to the graveyard yet.

author: tiredfrom work
title: Isn't all that much different from Phish Food
text: As a chocolate ice cream, it's OK, but if you're going to call an ice cream smores, it should at least taste like smores. This is nothing but chocolate. I barely see any marshmallow,and I don't know where the graham crackers are supposed to be. Pretty disappointing.

author: SmoresLover
title: BEST FLAVOR EVER
text: S'mores has been my favorite flavor for YEARS. I love the chocolate base and the surprise of the marshmallow and graham cracker swirls within. Lately I haven't been able to find it in stores very often. Please don't send to the flavor graveyard. I would seriously cry.

author: Krystle
title: Only chocolate
text: I just opened my pint, when I took off the lid, I saw marshmallow, I was excited. But after I got threw that small layer of marshmallow, I couldn't find anymore. I didn't see or taste any Graham cracker. And I only saw a few chocolate chips. I think I got a mistake!

author: TammyC
title: Not worth the cost
text: I bought this yesterday and I went to 4 differrrnt stores until I found it! I was so happy then when I tasted it I didn't see any marshmallow until I reached the middle and it was too much chocolate I spent over 8 bucks because I got two and I was very disappointed.

author: johanna
title: favorite
text: this is my fave b&j flavor!!! however i have been seeing less and less of this flavor in stores. i hope they are trying to replace it with that horrid “gimme s’more” flavor...that flavor could never compare to this classic. please keep this flavor ben and jerry’s!!

author: Nickolaix
title: Favorite Flavor
text: I read other reviews that claimed that the chocolate overpowers the other components, but I think that is what I like. Chocolate ice cream is my jam, and S'mores brings chocolate ice cream to a new level with the addition of some marshmallow and graham cracker.

author: JennP
title: This is so chocolately...Best flavor
text: This is my FAVORITE B&J ice cream. The chocolate ice cream is so rich. The crunchy graham cracker part is yummy too. This ice cream is so hard to find in the stores so if you do find it, stock up like I do. I'm so sad that I don't have any right now.

author: Catie
title: Poor mixture
text: I bought this flavor to try because of the amazing reviews. However, I was really disappointed. There was maybe one or two graham cracker chunks and that was it. The ratios were very off. However, if you like chocolate ice cream, this is the pint for you

title: Favorite Flavor, ATM.
text: I agree with a lot of reviewers that this is mostly chocolate...and could use more marshmallow...but it's still awesome. I love the flavor and texture of the graham cracker swirl. I allways get excited when I see this at my store and never pass it up.

author: Mhoss
title: Best Flavor Ever!
text: This is by far my favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor! The chocolate ice cream with the graham cracker crumbs and toasted marshmallow is the perfect combination and taste just like biting into a s’more! If only it was available at more locations...

author: Epersha
title: Favorite ice cream ever!!!
text: This is what happiness tastes like. I freakin LOVE B&J s’mores! I’m pregnant right now and am so sad that I can’t find it in my local grocery stores because I am seriously craving it!!! I am mystified why Regis isn’t a Moreno popular flavor!

author: invalid username
title: my favorite, perfectly balanced
text: So delicious, but hard to find around these parts. It is perfectly balanced between the chocolatey icecream, the marshmallows and the best of all, the graham swirls which to me seem to have a bit of saltiness... altogether, it's just yum.

author: Angela94nj
title: Just chocolate ice cream
text: It just tasted like chocolate ice cream. I got a couple chocolate chunks but no marshmallows or graham crackers. I would never have called it was s’mores. For the price I pay, I’d like a decent amount of toppinggs mixed in. Disappointed.

author: AJ105
title: By far the best!
text: This is my favorite Ben and Jerry’s variety, no question. I don’t generally like chocolate base, but this is just perfection. Love the complements to the rich chocolate base. I could buy this every visit to the grocery store.

author: Purple Lb
title: One of my 2 favorite B & J flavors!
text: Been buying this flavor for years. My favorite part is getting a big glob of marshmallow. Been having a hard time finding it in the usual stores recently but maybe they were just waiting for the weather to warm up here in PA.

author: Mace
title: Delicious!!
text: This is my favorite flavor of ice cream! It got me through many hard nights of studying in college, and now I’m a successful engineer. It was clearly the S’mores!!

author: moorejennie78
title: So much better the new Gimme S'mores
text: This is my all time FAVORITE flavor. I go to the shop in Glenview just to buy it. The new version does not remind me of S'mores at all. This one does! Don't stop making it, even if it's just in the shops!!! Please!

author: Rika
title: Almost perfect
text: I love anything s’mores and this was so close to being perfect. I thought it just needed more marshmallow and graham cracker so it would taste more like s’mores and less like a straight up chocolate ice cream.

author: bslpeace
title: I am literally obsessed with this flavor
text: I love this flavor so so so much. I, however, can not find it ANYWHERE. This is really upsetting for me because it definitely deserves to be a more mainstream flavor, so it can be more accessible. Love it.

author: Frange
title: All time Favorite
text: This is my #1 pick ! I have to have it every other night. The graham cracker crunch and the chocolate chunks with the marshmallow taste just like s’mores and gives you that PERFECT CRUNCH ! I LOVE IT

author: sweetmel
title: S'More's Ice cream!
text: I remember baskin robbins having a s'mores ice cream and me wishing it had more graham crackers in it. This is what is should have been! I love,love,love this flavor so much! One of the best.

author: jcates9
title: My absolute favorite B&J!
text: This is hands down my favorite of all the Ben and Jerry's, I just wish it wasn't so hard to find! Also, don't be fooled by the new s'mores flavor, "gimme s'more" it isn't the same at all!

author: Alyssa731
title: BEST ICE CREAM
text: This is my all-time FAVORITE ice cream of all time! I'm not usually a S'mores type of person but this ice cream is my favorite! It is so smooth, goo-ey and delicious, just like a S'more!

title: Amazing!!!!
text: This ice cream is amazing!!!! I love s'mores and this ice cream hits the spot everytime I eat it. I wish this ice cream was near me. Whenever I find it, I buy it. It's hard to find it.

title: FAVORITE FLAVOR
text: It's been my favorite flavor for years, and I used to be able to find it at my local Wawa or Quick Check. I haven't been able to find it in months and it makes me so sad.

author: Lewsfancy
title: So hard to find!
text: I loooove this ice cream flavor! It’s just so hard to find. I literally drive 38 miles for it. Gimme s’mores is carried near me but it’s such a disappointment.

author: Char27
title: Graham crackers as you’ve never had them
text: I’ve always liked Ben and Jerry’s but typically went for more traditional flavors but now this is the only one I ever want! It’s awesome 10/10 would recommend

author: gin_
title: Literally the best
text: Not even kidding this is the best ice cream in the entire world but it is so hard to find :( I ate a half of a pint of this stuff a night for like 4-5 years.

author: tdoubled03
title: My favorite!
text: This is my favorite! I love the swirls of toasted marshmallow in it, it could use a tad bit more graham cracker, but overall it is extremely delicious!!!

author: Robin62
title: just chocolate
text: Bought this last Sunday. It tastes like Chocolate Ice Cream. If there was Marshmallow or Graham Cracker in it, must be tiny amount. I can't find it.

author: KDH92
title: S’mores minus everything
text: I was excited to try this and highly disappointed that it was basically all fudge. I’ve always wanted to try B&J but I think I’ll stick to Blue Bell

author: senseievan
title: Unmatched.
text: My absolute favorite flavor. I hunt for it. I’m addicted to the toasted marshmallow. I wish my grocery store would stock it but they don’t respond.

author: sammy5
title: Best flavor
text: I just recently tried S’more for the first time. It is amazing! By far my favorite flavor. Doesn’t seem to be in many stores around me though:(

author: Asa17
title: Chocolate too much
text: The chocolate ice cream over powers everything else. I was really hoping for gobs of marshmallow and chunks of Graham. Really disappointed:(

title: Perfect Name
text: This is my Favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor. It flows so perfect the melted marshmallows the graham crackers. I’ve been in love since 2011.

author: Kathy
title: My favorite...
text: S'mores is the best,and I can't find it anymore!! They use to have "Marsha,Marsha Marshmellow" and I loved that one but its discontinued.

author: smith_z0301
title: Delicious
text: This has been my favorite ice cream for years! No other brand seems to make s’mores flavored ice cream as good as Ben and Jerry’s does.

author: Kayla1027
title: Perfect Convo
text: My Favorite combo ice cream in the world. I use to get this when it was called Marsha Marsha Mashmello! So happy they brought it back.

author: Gimmiemore
title: Love this!!!
text: Just bought this on a whim and fell in love with it only thing would be more gram cracker that crunchiness is amazing thank you

author: Jamie76
title: Best flavor ever
text: This is the best ice cream flavor ever!!! I have zero interest in trying any other flavors. It’s smores or nothing for me!!

author: Nicole63
title: The best ice cream ever
text: This is my favorite ice cream ever! I am a chocolate lover and the mix of marshmallow cream and gram cracker is so yummy♥️

author: Stillannoyed
title: This should be a flagship flavor.
text: This should be a flavor found in every store that sells B&J. It’s easily the best flavor. Nothing like it in the world.

author: jj212
title: No marsh or graham
text: I bought this last night and was disappointed. Just tastes like chocolate ice cream- no marshmallows or graham taste.

author: KrissyP
title: Doesn’t taste anything like s’mores
text: More like cookies and cream than s’mores. Disappointing. No marshmallow chunks or graham cracker, no toasty flavor.

author: Gaby
title: All-Time Favorite
text: This is my absolute favorite flavor of ice cream, not just Ben & Jerry's! So hard to find, but absolutely amazing!

author: Florida
title: My favorite!
text: This is my absolute favorite flavor! It has the best graham cracker (taste and texture) and great chocolate!

author: JennD
title: Best Ice Cream
text: This is my absolute favorite flavor. I hate that it’s impossible to find in stores or online. Bring it back!!

author: Barry
title: I love it
text: My favorite. I buy all I can find when I go to the grocery store. As a result I keep buying bigger shirts.

author: denverdelish
title: Best flavor ever!!
text: This is the most delicious ice cream flavor I’ve ever tasted, Ben and Jerry’s or otherwise! Must try!!!!!!

author: Angie Mottk
title: One of my top faves
text: This is my go to ice cream when I can’t decide a flavor. I love the graham cracker and marshmallow swirl.

author: nugget
title: Disappointment
text: I love smores everything but this ice cream just tastes like chocolate. So disappointing, what a waste.

author: kitkatsanz
title: My favorite flavor!
text: This has to be one of my all time favorite flavors! But it's now totally impossible to find now :(

author: Augatino
title: Better than them all
text: When this was in stores I bought it all summer long. I'm hoping this will come back on the market

author: Jenn1245
title: My absolute favorite
text: The perfect s'mores ice cream, it is a great late night snack and I never want to share my pint

author: Lexiiii
title: 10/10 would buy
text: I loveeeee this ice creammmmm. Please gettt! I love the flavor and there ice is just the best!

author: Cubzilla
title: Favorite B&J flavor
text: This is my absolute favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor. This dethroned Chubby hubby as my fav.

author: n7cmmndr
title: Best Flavor
text: This flavor is my absolute favorite. It is my go-to pick and I'm so glad it exists.

author: DPhillips
title: Best flavor ever!
text: I wish they would bring this version back to the stores or sell it in gallon tubs!

author: Mkcarsi11
title: The best ice cream I’ve ever had
text: This is my favorite ice cream of all time. I’ve been obsessed with it for years.

author: Jason99
title: New favorite!
text: This is one of the most addictive to date. The graham cracker swirl is heavenly

author: Bbygrl
title: Fav
text: This is my favorite flavor, I hate how hard it is to find but my god I love it

author: MonthColor
title: DELICIOUS
text: This is hands down one of the best flavors I’ve had. I could eat it every day.

author: WillR
title: The Best
text: By far my favorite flavor. I'm always bummed when it's sold out at the store.

author: Smores lover 311
title: Best flavor ever!
text: It's the only ice cream I like. The bad reviews are just freak bad batches.

author: Chels90
title: Straight and to the point.
text: Love this flavor!! Love the marshmallow graham cracker combo.

author: mab15
title: My favorite flavor!
text: Perfect blend of chocolate, marshmallows and graham crackers.

author: RebmaRae
title: The BEST. ****Not to be confused with Gimme S'more
text: This is my favorite! Only thing is its soooo hard to find :(

author: MUNE4ME
title: Best Ice Cream EVER!
text: So super love this! My favorite in the ENTIRE world!

author: Jenjo
title: Awesome!
text: One of my top favorite Ben and Jerry's icecream!!!

author: taco
title: wish was different
text: It was way to much chocolate I hated it !!!!!!!!!!

author: PamPammiePamela
title: Most Incredible Flavor Ever - nothing compares
text: This is absolutely the best ice cream flavor ever - from B&J or any ice cream company, period. I believe it has been discontinued because I cannot find it at any of my area grocery stores.

author: Naomi
title: Please meet this flavor!!!!
text: I bought this a couple days ago and am obsessed! However I'm scared because it says exclusive flavor and I've never loved one of your flavore this much (which is saying something!!!!) What can I do to make sure you keep it???

author: Libby
title: IN LOVE!!!!
text: I just bought this today! The most perfect Ben and Jerry blend and I have been trying all of them! Im also sad/scared that its an exclusive flavor. Please don't take it away from me.

author: Peanut
title: New favorite flavor
text:
I love this flavor! I got it on a whim and I'm so glad it paid off!! I hope they come out with slices next! This is hands down my favorite one!! I'm over here trying not to eat the whole thing in one sitting.
Only suggestion is a little more almond flavor/slices (or chocolate covered almonds) in the pint. Either way, I love it!

author: Kimmist13
title: Yum-mazing!
text: This was reccomended to me last night at a store in napa and I don't write reviews for much but I had to for this one. Hands down the best ice cream I've ever had. Sweet, salty, creamy and crunchy and the best flavor ever. I hope I can find it in stores! Love love love it!

author: gjrosinski
title: Spectacularly Delicious!
text: First Time Trying This Flavor and Must Again Say, "Spectacularly Delicious!"

author: itsicecreamtimd
title: Thank you for listening
text: I sent a request in for an ice cream similar to this one (except I named it Rich n Thicc) and ending up stumbling into this flavor while on vacation in Colorado and it made my heart so happy but most of all it was absolutely DELICIOUS!!! thank you for this amazing flavor, please make it a permanent one!!!

author: Clairissr
title: Absolute best flavour!
text: I bought this flavour for a friend who loves salted caramel and fell in love! I feel like the name just doesn’t do justice to the deliciousness within. Crunchy almonds, crispy chocolate, and caramel swirls that aren’t overly sweet - just perfection!

author: Retrac
title: Best flavor since Mudslide
text: This is my first review and honestly I never thought that I'd ever write a review on a Ben and Jerrys flavor. However, this flavor is awesome. Great flavor of the salted caramel, texture from the almonds and all around awesome. Keep it.

author: evie1234
title: BEST FLAVOR I'VE HAD!!!
text: I bought this a few weeks ago, and I became obsessed! I went back to the store though, and it wasn't there (exclusive flavor?) Hope they bring it back... it's the only one I like!!!!

author: Charlie
title: Must Have
text: Wanted to try something other than my favorite coffee flavor and I was shocked at how much I loved this ice cream. I honest would choose it over coffee flavor which has been my fav for 10+ yrs. I wish I could buy stock in this flavor just to make sure you never stop selling it. Please keep this flavor. I can't express enough how happy I am to have something I know will always please me. KEEP THIS FLAVOR AVAILABLE!

author: xxerii
title: PERFECT!
text: Found this Diamond in Safeway Kauai, Hawaii

author: CatNamedIceCream
title: The Ultimate B&J Flavor
text: I have always enjoyed Ben & Jerry’s ice cream, but most of the time, they are a bit too sweet for my taste. The Salted Caramel Almond is perfect. It is sweet, obviously, but not overwhelming. I almost couldn't stop myself from eating the whole pint in one sitting. This flavor needs to be added to the regular rotation!

author: One For the Road
title: Hmmmmm
text: Not sure what to make out of this flavor. The ingredients say almond slivers. What I got was more like crushed almonds or small almond pieces. They gave the ice cream a 'gritty' texture which was not pleasing to my tongue nor teeth. Not sure if I got a 'crazy' batch but doubt if I will try again.

author: Lover of the SCA
title: Where has this been all these years??
text: I've been quite reluctant to try B&J ice cream, because it always appeared to have flavors that didn't quite appeal to me. Well...you got me, you finally got me! This Salted Caramel Almond...whew!! Awesomeness!!! Please don't take this away.

author: aldahl
title: Amazing!!
text: This is my absolute favorite flavor! Great combination. I would even be happy without the chocolate bits in there because the ice cream with almonds paired with the caramel is amazing on its own. PLEASE never get rid of this flavor!!!

author: DES1980
title: Disappointing!
text: I bought the salted caramel almond because I love salted caramel. The one I purchased really lacked caramel. It was more vanilla ice cream with slivered almonds and chocolate chunks. Did I just purchase a dud?

author: Dimarie16
title: Love everything about this flavor!
text: This is the ONLY flavor I ever buy, and over the past 2 weeks NOWHERE has it anymore and I am sooo upset! I’m assuming it was discontinued since its an exclusive flavor?? Please keep it forever!!!!

author: PaladinJasmine
title: My favorite so far!
text: Perfect amount of everything. Not too much caramel, not too much chocolate. But best of all are the almonds. Just slivers but they make a big impact.

author: Amic1250
title: Amazing!
text: This might be my new favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor. I love the big chocolate chunks and lots of almonds!

author: policyman
title: KEEP THIS FLAVOR!
text: This is a fabulous one! My absolute favorite flavor, hands down! Send it to more places in San Francisco!

author: Trav
title: Best ice cream I’ve ever had.
text: Ben and Jerry’s really got this one right. By far my favorite that they’ve ever made. Keep it up guys!!

author: Fuchsia
title: Simple But Delicious
text: I love this one. The caramel and almonds are so yummy, and it’s not too chocolatey. So good.

author: yeeyee69
title: Terrific ice cream
text: This tastes great. wonderful product. 10/10 i would definetly buy this product again

author: janetec
text: I give it a 4 star only because I think they should put more strawberries . Flavor is very good but lacks the fact that is strawberry cheesecake and it is a bit pricey.

author: brandymaria
text: This ice cream is breath takingley good!! It taste just like a cheesecake with fresh strawberries in it. I'm so happy to have found this kind because I make a lot of homemade shakes for my family especially on the weekend and when I brought this home for the first time I fixed them some on a Friday night and I looked and it was gone on Saturday night. That's how much they liked it and still like it, I put it in the back part of the freezer and put something in front of it so it will last longer than a day. Lol! I would highly recommend this brand and flavor of icecream to everyone and I will definitely be buying more of it!

author: Kuhree
title: My Second Favorite B&J Flavor
text: Strawberry Cheesecake flavor was one of the first I ever tried from Ben and Jerry's, and I loved it.

title: STRWBRY CHZCKE !!!!
text: I’m convinced this flavor of ben and jerry’s will create world peace. I hope it comes in slices/bar form or any other kind! NEED TO STOCK MY FREZER FULL! i eat this while binging netflix!

author: tom_s
text: Im a Huge Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream fan! Its been my favorite brand for as long as i can remember and Im lucky enough to be one of the few places with a B&J's ice cream shop. But this flavor in particular has been my go to for years. Very rarely do i switch it up( unless its a different cheesecake flavor) . they really hit the nail on the head with this one. I have yet to find another brand of cheesecake ice cream that even comes close to comparison with B&J's. Their ice creams are usually around 5-7 bucks for a pint depending on if you get it at a grocery store or a convenience store but its worth the money.

author: Beth1981
title: The Best Strawberry Cheesecake Ice cream!
text: I have been absolutely in love with this stuff every since the first time I tried it about 7 years ago. I have tried other brands of strawberry cheesecake ice cream when the store was out of ben & jerry's brand, and Ben & Jerry's is far superior to those because most of them use a strawberry jelly-like swirl instead of actual chunks of strawberry like Ben & Jerry's.

author: ChrisColby
title: Strawberry, not so cheesecake.
text: I love the idea of a strawberry cheesecake ice cream, but only one of those components really shine here. The strawberry flavor greatly overpowers the cheesecake, resulting in what tastes like a sweeter strawberry ice cream than a true hybrid. The graham cracker crumbs are a stand out, but even then, there's not quite enough. A decent flavor.

author: catjthis
text: Oh my God this is a problem! This ice cream is sooo freaking good I wanna cry! I've walked past this flavor so many times thinking it would be blah. Well is not... it doesn't taste super intense like cheesecake, it a more creamy and sweet taste that's slightly different but way better. Almost like a strawberry milkshake. It has frozen dry strawberries in it and huge chunks of tasty Graham crackers. I literally can't get enough!

author: E172
title: What happened to the cheesecake pieces?!
text: This used to be my favorite. I haven't had it in 5 years so when I saw that it had come back I didn't waste any time splurging on it. It tastes almost the same but feels really thick and weird. That's probably because the cheesecake pieces were replaced with cheesecake flavored ice cream. I'm so disappointed.

author: Mmbates
title: Absolutely LOVE it
text: I'm a huge Ben & Jerrys fan, half baked was always my go to flavor since I'm a chocolate fan. However, my boyfriend started getting strawberry cheesecake and after one bite, I'll never get any other flavor again. It's delicious, the graham crackers complete it. Would definitely recommend trying it! So refreshing.

author: Tim1
title: Delicious flavor
text: I agree, very yummy, but need to double the amount of Graham cracker in it! Would be 5 stars if that happened!

author: Rachie
title: Totally tastes like cheesecake! Love this flavor
text: I am a huge cheesecake fan, so obviously had to try this flavor. And I gotta say, I was definitely not disappointed. The base tastes so much like cheesecake..there's the perfect amount of strawberries throughout..and the graham swirl is just enough to be like a crust. Everything about this flavor is perfect. I'm one who almost always adds some type of syrup for a topping, but this one doesn't need anything!

author: DeniseJack87
title: Yummy
text: This is my favorite but I would love it even more if there was more crust in the ice cream. Sometimes I may get a pint and there is really no crust at all in it...

author: jmarsenault1982
text: I'm in love with the crust part like little crumbles with strawberries and a vanilla ish ice cream, so it's like heaven in your mouth. I wish there was a little more of the crumble part in the ice cream cause it's not proportioned right. Keep killin it. Hope this helps

author: LBeez
title: The best!
text: I usually go for Chocolate Fudge Brownie or Half Baked because I'm a chocolate freak. My husband brought home Strawberry Cheesecake for me, because our store was out of the other two, and OMG, this stuff is amazing! Definitely my new favorite! I ALWAYS have a pint on hand because I can't live without it! This ice cream seriously makes me happy when I'm down!

author: Jadicorn
title: I LOVE this flavor
text: I’ve been eating the same flavor of ben & jerry’s ice cream for the last five years, with the occasional pint of chunky monkey, and the strawberry cheesecake flavor is my absolute flavor. it’s never done me wrong i just love the little bits of graham cracker. keep doing what you’re doing ben & jerry’s

author: Mandelay
title: Could be better
text: This is good, but the graham cracker isn't very thick and it no longer has the cheesecake pieces. When eating it, it feels like it's missing something.

author: Whyamihere
title: Use to be my favorite
text: This use to be my favorite. Lately it seems like they have no graham cracker though. Disappointing....

author: okayevelyn
title: Makes my mouth water just thinking about it
text: This is the best Ben and Jerry’s flavor in my opinion. Oh my gosh, I have to buy it a lot because it’s heavenly! However, I wish there were more strawberry bits.

author: Soccerdad
title: So delicious!
text: I love the flavors soaring through this wonderful ice cream! Fresh strawberry and graham crust swirls all in a tasty cheesecake ice cream. So delicious!

title: Favorite
text: This is my absolute favorite ice cream. It's delicious. I especially love the graham cracker swirl. I don't know how they do it but I'm glad they do. :D

author: Darkphoenix18
title: My current favorite
text: One day I had a craving a strawberry cheesecake and was gonna get a shake that would have sufficed but was meh. We went to the grocery store and I found this. Next thing I know I was stocking up on this flavor. It’s sooo goood! Omg!

author: abbym
title: NEEDS TO BE AVAILABLE IN PINTS IN CANADA
text: THIS IS BY FAR THE BEST FLAVOUR I HAVE EVER TASTED. I NEED THIS TO BE AVAILABLE IN PINTS IN CANADA. I BELIEVE IT WOULD SELL WELL. BY SELL WELL I MEAN I WILL PROBABLY BUY EVERY SINGLE PINT AVAILABLE IF I COULD.

author: Eyajc
title: Freaking delicious
text: I bought this yesterday and managed to finish the wholle pint. This is by far one of my favorite Ben And Jerry's Ice cream flavors so far. If I could change anything I would add more strawberries.

author: Danni M
title: Strawberry and Graham cracker bliss!!!
text: I've been eating this for years and each time I eat this ice cream I fall in love all over again. Strawberry Cheesecake Ice cream is the very best. My favorite, I love this Ice Cream!!!!!!!

author: Carla
title: Strawberry?
text: I was really excited to try this flavor because I've never met a Ben and Jerry's product I haven't loved. Unfortunately there is a first time for everything. The graham cracker and cheesecake flavors are so over powering you get no strawberry flavor. The result is so sickly sweet. There is no balance. Really bummed out!

author: Boowhoo
title: My fav but
text: I bought this at target and at first I was overjoyed with how tasty it was but then I realized that my ice cream was half empty literally the bottom half was air

author: buzz
title: Not Enough GRAHAM CRACKER SWIRL, Please ADD MORE!
text: The flavor and premium quality ingredients are definitely superb except for the strawberries. They suck! Horrible texture! They gotta go! I spit them out when I eat this flavor.

author: Breezymiss
title: My new fave
text: I'm usually go with Half-baked or American Dream Cone, but this one wins. The graham cracker swirl is it brings it all together.

author: Nanalove
title: Sooo Good
text: I love everthjng about this ice cream I actually wish it had more graham cracker swirl in it it’s so perfect highly addictive

author: Vsalas2
title: Delicious
text: Cheesecake flavor isn’t very strong but the strawberry and crust crumble is delicious

author: CaptainKitten
title: My favorite!
text: My #1 go too! I'd eat it all in one sitting but then I'd be sad when it's gone. ;)

author: FuzzyGut
title: Great ice cream
text: This is a great flavor! The ice cream base is rich and sweet without being over the top, and the flavor is natural, not cheap and artificial like some other brands going after the same cheesecake profile. The strawberry mix-Ins are very yummy. It really hits the spot when you’re looking for strawberry cheesecake without wanting to eat actual cheesecake, unless you have a few scoops next to a slice of cheesecake... that sounds good so I’ll be back a little later :)

author: Mack
title: Love It!
text: Favorite Ice Cream of theirs. Tastes vary good. Try it.

title: Amazing
text: Its so delcious and super amazing and sooooo gooddd

author: Danyel
title: My FAVORITE
text: By far my favorite Ben & Jerry’s. Truly delicious.

author: Dapper Dan
title: Where's the strawberry?
text: Ate about a quarter of this. So far i got the cheesecake and grahams. Still no strawberry, kinda missing the main ingredient.

author: ashrod26
title: Disappointing
text: I love love love cheesecake flavored ice cream but this strawberry cheesecake did not live up to my standards at all. I was disappointed in this flavor as I love Ben and Jerry’s ice cream!

author: DianaLeigh128
title: Where's the Cheesecake?
text: This would be my favorite flavor if it actually had cheesecake bits or cheesecake flavor ice cream... all you get are strawberries and graham crackers. Not my idea of cheesecake at all.

author: Rebel of Mars 81
title: Great Cheesecake Flavor
text: The very first flavor of Ben & Jerry's, will always be a favorite. I think a lightly sweeten strawberry puree swirled in would be great compared to the strawberry chunks.

author: zoey
title: life changing
text: this is my new favorite ice cream. tbh it doesn’t have an extreme cheesecake flavor, but the strawberry and the graham cracker swirl is to die for. the graham cracker tasted like a real pie crust. the ice cream does taste a little bit like cheesecake but it’s not overpowering. everything about it is delicious.only suggestion would be to add more strawberries.

author: PhoenixRises
title: Another old favorite!
text: This one is another old favorite from B&J. I just wrote about how I first fell in love with B&J because of chocolate fudge brownie, so this is probably the second flavor I fell in love with. I also forgot how good this was until I got it on a Royal Caribbean cruise a few years ago and I started getting it again. It's a flavor that I will always come back to.

author: tickldkfiifo
title: Delicious
text: This is exactly how I remember it! Cheesecake and graham crackers bring this to life.

author: strawberrycheesybabe97
title: If this gets discontinued I'll probably die
text: If grass is green and the earth is round, then this is Ben and Jerry's...nay...the world of dessert's best flavor of all time. OF. ALL. TIME. The truth is, no one else makes anything like this - the strawberry is juicy and the graham cracker bits are buttery. If heaven were a place on earth, it would be found at the bottom of this pint.

author: natassjag
text: This is the best ice-cream ever!!! Strawberry Cheesecake is my favorite flavor and not too many brands make this flavor or does it taste this great. But Ben & Jerrys has the best tasting Strawberry Cheesecake flavor ice-cream ever with really cheesecake chunks in it. I highly recommend this flavor and brand because its the best!!!

author: taylormarriiee
text: The only ice cream I really like is Ben & Jerrys, their ice cream is just the best to me. This flavor which I dont even know if they make anymore as its not sold by me anymore and the chocolate chip cookie dough are my favorite. This one definitely tastes like a strawberry cheesecake in ice cream its so so good and I miss it

author: indiac4f44
text: This remains one of my all time favorites. The texture of this ice cream is amazing and Ben and Jerry's gets it right with the mixture of flavors. The sweet cream of the cheesecake ice cream. The cool strawberries combined with the saltiness of the graham cracker crust is an amazing flavor profile and the perfect spoonful.

author: jaida_johns
text: Probably my favorite ice cream flavor to date. It's hard to resist eating the entire tub when it's so delicious. I love the bits of strawberry and cheesecake in this; in particular, the cheesecake is so freaking delicious. The ice cream itself is sweet and creamy and is really good overall. Would absolutely buy again.

author: whittybitty247
text: I really like Strawberry Cheesecake in any ice cream but this was delicious if you enjoy real tasting strawberries. I get this product regularly because of it's simple small size, but I prefer others over this as I don't care for seeds so often. Sometimes I feel like there is no cheesecake which is also disappointing.

author: MandyLou
title: THE BEST OF THE BEST
text: This is my all-time favorite flavor from B&J! It has the perfect taste and balance of flavors. The only thing that I could say would improve this flavor is more of the graham cracker swirl as that is the best part and I am a “tunnel-digger” when it comes to eating this ice cream! Following the graham cracker swirl!

author: Tricia
title: Very disappointing!!! No strawberries!!!
text: What happened to the pieces of cheesecake? Will never purchase this again - big mistake. It appears we just overpaid for graham cracker crust cheesecake “flavored” ice cream. :( NOTHING like the pics on the container. Not something we EVER expected from Ben and Jerry‘s - shame in you - you can do SO MUCH better. :(

author: Hananhf
title: Love it!
text: Ben and Jerry’s is more on the expensive side. So I either wait till it goes on sale or unless I REALLY want it. When I buy this flavor, the pint is ONLY for me. I live that there’s real cheesecake in there. As I’m writing this review, I can taste the ice cream. One of my favorite Strawberry cheesecake ice creams,

author: Lexa
title: What happened to the Cheesecake Pieces!???
text: Strawberry cheesecake used to be one of my favorites.... but what happened to those gooey yummy sweet chunky pieces of the cheesecake!? Digging the graham cracker swirl but really miss the cheesecake pieces. It complimented the ice cream so well. Still got love for you B&J. New favorite.... Netflix and Chilled.

author: morganh7c3a
text: O.M.G. I didn't think I would like this as much as I do, but it's so good!!! Has the right amount of strawberry pieces, cheesecake ice cream, and Graham cracker swirls, which are my favorite!!! Honestly, my favorite cheesecake ice cream. I would definitely recommend if looking for something different. So good!!

author: jammin0127
text: This is my all time FAVORITE ice cream. It's so rich and smooth. The graham cracker swirl add the right amount of texture to the ice cream and the strawberry chunks are a nice treat. When I was pregnant, I literally ate this ice cream for breakfast. It's just the right amount of sweetness to curb the craving.

author: alexjftz
text: This is one of my favorite ice cream flavors - great graham cracker swirl throughout plus strawberry and cheesecake pieces. It is sweet and creamy, but feels like such a treat. I have to pace myself and try to make a pint last a few times. I actually got to try this FRESH at the factory in Vermont

author: widowvenus
text: Frozen heaven in a tiny little tub. Every one has their very own favorite Ben and Jerry's Ice cream flavor and this one happens to be mine. That being said. No I don't like sharing. It's a little bit pricey depending on where you buy it but when something taste's this good who cares what it cost.

author: fashunscape
text: I have never been someone who could finish any ice cream serving in one sitting. But let me tell you, I can go through this within one Hour. It is truly my favorite ice cream, I am constantly repurchasing this flavor. Its not too sweet and the cheesecake bits are heavenly. Absolutely obsessed.

author: aleonard0228
text: Ben & Jerry's Strawberry cheesecake is delicious. It's the right amount of sweet and the graham cracker crust mixed in is my favorite part of this ice cream. It is a bit high priced so I usually only buy it once in awhile but it is definitely worth the money if you like strawberry cheesecake.

author: memberefe9a
text: I was recommended this ice cream many times and I finally got the chance to try it. It is sooo good. It has a nice strawberry flavor and the crust that is in it is so delicious. The crust tastes like real crust that is on a strawberry cheesecake. This is now one of my favorite ice creams.

author: aymar1
text: This flavor was my go to flavor to treat myself after exams. I love how they have mini cups since some brands don't have single serve cups. These can be affordable, but look out for sales. Overall satisfied with the flavors they carry. If you haven't had Ben & Jerry's yet, go try some!

author: brymeshaf
text: I literally went to the 711 store and bought this ice cream for 2 weeks straight while in college lol. It is so amazing!! I love the frozen strawberries and the cheesecake pieces. It literally taste just like your eating new your style cheesecake. So yummy and my all time favorite!

author: MMoyer
title: Delicious!
text: So I hate strawberries but love strawberry flavored things and my gosh- this hits the spot. The real strawberries in it don’t even matter to me. The rest of it is so freaking good

author: katie_scoville
text: Ben & Jerrys will forever be my favorite brand of ice cream and this flavor will ALWAYS be my go to when I dont care about the calories! Lol but everything in moderation! This flavor has the perfect amount of cheesecake chunks to go along its the strawberry swirls. So yummy.

author: kelsr10
text: This is by far my favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream flavor. I'm a little sensitive to dairy, so I try to avoid it, but I would gladly endure a night of stomach pain for this ice cream. The day Ben & Jerry's makes a non-dairy version of this will be the best day of my life.

author: garyc8
text: This is the one icecream I can say Ive been purchasing for YEARS. Both in store and in the grocery store. Its perfect honestly. Its not too sweet, the strawberries taste fresh every time. No artificial flavor to it. Its just a great brand and this is my favorite flavor

author: brittanys214
text: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream! I love this ice cream soooo much! My favorite part is the real pieces of cheesecake throughout the tub! This is an ice cream where it is hard to not eat the whole pint in one sitting. Highly recommend trying this ice cream!

author: beautifulatanyage
text: What can I say about this Ben & Jerry's Ice cream creamy delicious!! the (strawberry swirl and vanilla Ice cream) just melts into your taste buds. I'm a big fan of this Ice cream Ben & Jerry's is my all-time favorite Ice cream easy on the wallet heavenly on the tongue

usually get at the supermarket when they are 2x$5 and I try to make it last a week but with these flavors is so diffuclt to resist, just please know that the size of the container is not 1 portion, you have to split it or you will be eating a week worth of calories!

This is by far my favorite icecream EVER. And I've eaten allot of icecream. I've tried other brands of "strawberry cheesecake" and none even came close. It is well worth the few dollars extra. Ben and Jerry's absolutely know how to please their customers taste buds.

author: gisellera9b7
text: I really like strawberry flavored ice cream terralina sweet and hits the spot after dinner or when I'm having a sweet tooth I would improve this product but making a bigger container and it's my favorite ice cream brand as of forevers and it's going to stay that way

author: sarahg256
text: How can you go wrong with Ben and Jerrys?! They never disappoint! If you are a cheesecake lover you have GOT to try this flavor! There are HUGE chunks of cheesecake and a perfect amount of strawberries! You wont regret cracking this open after a long day at work!

author: addinew1
text: I LOVE ice cream and these are AMAZING. These are a current favorite. I wish i had them now. I love that B&J is coming out with new candies and flavors. They are definitly affordable. I have a huge sweet tooth so this is amazing for those late night cravings.

author: jennys42
text: It literally tastes like a chilly strawberry cheesecake! I love this flavor so much because its not too sweet like the other Ben and Jerrys where its a lot of chocolate and baked goods filled in. This flavor is complex and unique yet simple at the same time.

author: lyoung0110
text: Ben & Jerry's straw berry cheese cake ice cream is a strong, solid offering from them. Slight hint of cheesecake and a moderate amount of strawberry. The cheese cake bits in the ice cream make it great. Would be better with more graham crackers throughout.

author: operadivainthemaking
text: This is just ADDICTIVE! If you have an incredible sweet tooth like me, you'll love this. There are chunks of cake and smaller pieces of strawberry in between the vanilla ice cream that will just rock your world. Highly recommended to those who love sweet.

author: marissap15
text: I can definitely say Ben and Jerry's as a whole is an amazing brand of ice cream. My favorite flavor is without a doubt, Strawberry Cheesecake and the seasonal flavor, Pumpkin Cheesecake. I love the Strawberry Cheesecake flavor because I love cheesecake.

author: Drewski23
title: Best I've ever had!
text: I used to get either Americone Dream or Half Baked but as soon as I tried Strawberry cheesecake I feel inlove and won't buy anything else... The graham cracker squirrel it's absolutely amazing I just wish they all had equal amounts. 10/10 my favorite!!!

author: yeseniav15
text: So many great choices! This is my all time favorite! I actually having some as I write this review! I usually get mine from Stater Brothers, and I get the mini sizes as well. I can wat a whole pint no joke!!!! They make the best ice cream!!! A must try!

author: jeennnnv
text: Satisfy cravings when on period. Truly in love with strawberries and cheesecake. My go to aside from the plain old vanilla. I highly recommend this flavor to the lovers of ice cream and strawberries... even though I am lactose intolerant but oh well...

author: KellieB74
title: Love it But now it's Ginger!!!
text: If you could still buy it... It would get 10 stars. Only strawberry ice cream that doesn't make me sick. I can't believe there would discontinue a classic after 15 yrs. No more Ben and Jerry's from me until they bring it back!!! Not one penny for them

author: amgoddess_
text: Our favorite brand of ice cream or frozen yogurt. It can be kind of pricy but you get what you pay for. Always a lot of options as far as flavor goes; which is always a plus. We buy this a few times a month and its what we want for birthdays as well

author: martinisweets
text: The only kind of Ben & Jerrys I buy. I love the way the graham crackers mix with the strawberrys and the sweet ice cream. If youre into strawberry cheesecake it doesnt really taste like one but it has a really good flavor for an ice cream version

author: alwayslindseyxoxo
text: Hands down my favorite flavor! It is sooooo good! Ive been buying this since I was in college and the flavor has stayed the same over the years. Super creamy, rich, real strawberries. It is amazing! A must try if youre a strawberry lover like me!

author: jasminea43e5
text: I think that Ben & Jerrys is delicious ice cream specially the strawberry cheesecake when I need a late night fix for my sweet tooth I go for this ice cream strawberry cheesecake Ben & Jerrys I am over all satisfied with this delicious ice cream

So rich creamy and decadent!!! I love it! Its so delicious with pieces of cream cheese& crust! Its absolutely perfect the way that it is!! I would always catch it on sale BOGO! I would definitely recommend buying it if you want a decadent treat!

author: cassandrai4
text: This is my absolute favorite B&Js ice cream flavor. My second favorite is Tonight Dough. Not too sweet, has the graham cracker swirl, and is so creamy and rich. This flavor reminds me of mid-west summer nights on the porch with a glass of ros.

author: theonly_ali
text: I LOVE this ice cream! The graham cracker swirls mixed with an almost cake batter like base is divine. Soon as you add the frozen strawberries it really sets it off. I can eat the whole thing in one sitting and wont feel a lick of guilt lol

author: karissalauren
text: I love this flavor of Ben and Jerrys. I do not like chocolate that much, so I try to go for vanilla based ice creams. But usually they have bananas in them and I hate bananas, so this was the perfect flavor for me and its not super sweet.

author: mgdaviss
text: Addicting!!!! I love me some strawberry cheesecake and this ice cream is about as good as actual cheesecake of you cant find any or dont want to make it! Amazing. Definitely a problem because I eat the whole thing, well half it. Try it!!

author: jenniemackie_
text: One of my all time favorite ice cream flavored and Ben and Jerrys just does it so right. There is not too much strawberry nor too much cheesecake. It is a great combination and the ice cream makes it even better. I definitely recommend.

author: Sugar rush
title: No cheesecake. No strawberries. What is this??
text: No cheesecake pieces. No strawberries. I’m not sure what I just ate. Tasted like old yogurt. No thank you.

author: bexissick
text: Literary my favorite ice cream. They smell alone is amazing and the taste is perfection. They have real chunks of cheese cake and strawberry in it. It is expensive but for ice cream this good I'd say it's completely worth the money.

author: nayelid11
text: Ive tried several Ben & Jerrys flavors and this one is by far my favorite. The crunchiness of the cheesecake with the strawberry flavor is just perfect. This ice cream isnt as sweet as all the others which is probably the best part.

author: nicolec7247
text: I absolutely love Ben and Jerrys ice cream it is expensive for the amount you get but it is delicious and it has a huge variety of flavors to choose from. Compared to other brands this has more cheesecake bites then ice cream bites.

author: katys0275
text: This is the best ice cream Ive ever had. The cookie parts and the strawberry are all just so perfect. I cant even explain how amazing this stuff tastes. I have it stocked in my freezer at all times!! Highly recommend trying it out

author: jbxby
text: Honestly it was amazing, went on great and gave an overall amazing effect! It is better than others Ive tried so I recommend! I am a first user so it took some getting used too but other than that I would be buying again soon!

author: sheilamf76a
text: Omg this was soooo delicious. Bought it on a whim and glad I did. There are even bits of graham crackers swirled in it. Very smooth and light. Pricey but worth it once in a while. If you like strawberries then this is a must.

author: maryama1a01
text: This is my favorite ice cream ever to exist. It has the most rich buttery cheesecake taste with the sweetness of strawberry complimenting it and the yummiest graham cracker ribbon completes it. It's hard to find this though

author: rayfidalgo
text: I LOVE STRAWBERRIES! Thats my favorite fruit, ever! I tried this one and Im soooo in love, cant live without it! Ive got eat at least twice a month so I can be happy! I bought at Walmart and its really cheap, and yummy!!!

author: brionap
text: Ben and Jerrys cheesecake ice cream is my all time favorite ice cream. It tastes just like strawberry cheesecake which is also my favorite I used to walk to the store and get this all the time and I still enjoy it today.

author: ardenr1
text: Never would I have ever believed that a strawberry ice cream would be one of my favorites, but this ice cream is great. Theres just swirls of this good graham-crackery goodness and its amazing. Would recommend for sure.

author: nardiaa
text: This is my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerrys. One of the reasons I took a trip to Vermont, was to visit the factory there, so yes Im a fan. Its great, just enough cheese cake and authentic strawberry taste. Id buy again

author: hawm
text: Tastes just like a strawberry cheesecake but in a frozen form. This ice cream love is happy with cheesecake flavors in my mouth. Its sweeter than the typical ice-cream because of the cheesecake but an occasional treat!

author: clarar30
text: I love the graham cracker crumble with strawberries in this delectable treat! I have yet to find a Ben and Jerrys I dont like although I tend to stick to what I know I like Im confident that Id like most all flavors.

author: natalief57c3
text: The strawberry cheesecake flavor of Ben & Jerry's is by far my favorite! It tastes exactly like strawberry cheesecake. It can be hard to find in some stores but the next time you see it you should definitely try it!

author: Koni
title: One of the BEST flavours ever!
text: One of the 1st Ben & Jerrys ice cream I ate, along with Phis food and Cookie dough (which are great to). It was the best feeling I ever had. Personaly, I think its even better then a normal strawberry cheescake.

author: merissak2
text: This is my favorite ice cream. It tastes just like strawberry cheesecake and I love that they sell it in small individual tubs. If I'm having a bad day i just swing by the store and get a whole one for myself.

author: nanah6
text: Probably the best ice cream brand out there, incredibly accurate and rich flavors. Nice blends of graham cracker mixed in, and a good amount too. As well as strawberry chunks that help tie the flavor together.

author: smcwriter
text: This is one of my top favorite ice creams. When I want something besides chocolate this one is perfect. I love the quality strawberry ice cream and the swirls of graham cracker crust are unique and delicious.

author: ianp
text: This ice cream has the perfect combination of graham cracker swirl and cheesecake chunks throughout it. You definitely will not want to share this one, and if you do, im sure its your not taking it lightly.

author: alexias18
text: I hate actual cheesecake but I live this strawberry cheesecake ice cream. It doesnt taste like actual cheesecake so if thats what you are looking for then Id skip on this one. Its creamy and full of flavor.

author: mijalc
text: I try to be careful with what I eat and not eat too much sugar but when Im craving something sweet Ice cream is my go to specially different flavors like this I enjoy the most! Totally recommended to try :)

author: sophiagrace05
text: 100 percent my favorite ice cream by them. This tastes amazing and I could literally eat the whole thing in one setting. It is a good price too. I highly recommend trying this product if you havent before!

author: nataliemarie19
text: Forever my favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor! The pints are usually on the pricey side but trust me its so worth it. The ice cream itself is always so creamy and the additional flavors just make it even better!

author: hitomijd
text: This has been my fav Ben & Jerrys flavor since I was a kid!! The price retails at about $4-7 depending on where you live. I dont get it as much as I used to but when I want ice cream I usually get this one

author: andibrn7
text: Amazing!!! I eat so much of this ice cream, I just can not stop once I start! It tastes just like cheesecake, and then the addition of strawberry mixes in with gram cracker crust is perfect! So so good!

author: laurennreadyy
text: This ice is perfect for a midnight snack! Not too sweet, just sweet enough! It is so yummy and my niece also loves it, when she gets to eat aunties ice its definitely a treat for her! We love it so much!

author: cassiebrahh
text: This is my guilty pleasure when it comes to the ice cream aisle. I love going to froyo places but this is the next best thing and its sooo tasty. A bit healthier than normal ice cream and just as good!

author: Bearsie
title: Best Ben & Jerry’s Flavor!
text: This is THE BEST B&J flavor ever. I only wish I had tried it sooner!! The ice cream has an extra creamy texture. The strawberry is natural tasting and refreshing. Perfect ratio of graham cracker swirl.

author: meghannk0041
text: My one and only best strawberry cheesecake ice cream out there. The cheesecake parts are perfect and the crumbliest graham cracker is throughout the whole tub. So delicious!!

author: nootimusprime
text: The best ice cream ever! Jam packed with so many beautiful things, every bite is an adventure. The cheesecake,is,definitely one of my favorite flavors because of the small cheesecake chunks in it

author: heathersellershender
text: This is one of my biggest guilty pleasure snacks. I can sit down and eat the whole thing. The graham cracker running through it is amazinggggg. Always a winner especially when I find it on sale.

author: angel_mariieee
text: First tried this flavor at the Ben & Jerrys store on Haight-Ashbury in San Francisco when I lived their, and was immediately hooked. My favorite flavor and continue to recommend it to others!!

author: zipsbitaheaven
text: The globs of cheesecake pieces are to die for! Strawberry delightful pieces really add the taste of a true cheesecake to ice cream to make the ultimate dessert! It is a go to ice cream for me!

author: laceem2
text: SO unhealthy but my favorite ice-cream ever. The reason I give 4 stars is because of the price, I choose to skip out sometimes because it is very pricey compared to other ice-cream products.

author: shelbyh49
text: ALL TIME! If you love cheesecake, and love ice cream - you have to try it! Ive had multiple cheesecake ice creams before and nothing compares! Hey-Vee grocery stores often have then in sale!

author: Beannie25
title: My favorite ice cream and brand
text: I have tried other strawberry cheesecake ice cream but nothing beats Ben and Jerry’s. Even if I’m on a diet this has to be my go to for my cheat day. Only wish there came in bigger amounts.

author: taylord71
text: I do not eat dairy often but when I do want a little something I will 9/10 times get this, I love cheesecake too much so the only reason it got a 4 is because I wish it had more cheesecake

author: cassandrad3866
text: Wow of my favorite flavors from Ben and Jerrys. It tastes delicious. Like a strawberry cheesecake in ice cream form. What more could you ask for. I would recommend to anyone its worth it.

author: erikam76
text: It has a great taste. I do enjoy when I buy but I dont buy often to due to the fact that it is pricey for a small container. The only improvement is the price cause it tastes great.

author: izziwilko
text: Another favorite ice cream. Very creamy and tastes exactly like cheesecake. I love how Ben & Jerrys incorporated pieces of actual cheesecake and pieces of graham crust! Delicious.

author: chloec37
text: This is my favorite ice cream EVER. So good real chunks of strawberry. The pieces of cheesecake taste amazing and ofc the vanilla ice cream in it is to die for. I would recommend.

author: mocah_pocahontas
text: this flavor has been my go to for years now. It is a little pricey for the amount so I only buy it every now and then. they used to have the $1.00 snack cups I'd bring them back!

author: megand115
text: This is my favorite ice cream for sure. It is so thick and creamy and has the perfect mix of strawberry and cheesecake. It is probably really bad for my body but is so indulgent.

author: Ann26
title: Where's the strawberry?
text: The small size has strawberries so I purchased the pint size. There is almost no strawberries. The graham cracker swirls are good, it just shouldn't have Strawberry in the name.

author: nishitaa
text: This is my favorite ice cream flavor. I usually either go with this brand or chocolate shoppe but chocolate shoppe isnt as well known as this. Love this amazing company as well!

author: ceethrufashion
text: This is one of my favorite flavors next to the chocolate fudge brownie flavor! I wish they had a dairy free option for this one too but I make the sacrifice anyway lol! So good!

author: Tiff76
title: 2 die 4!
text: I absolutely love this ice cream! I'm assuming it's a fav here in San Antonio, Texas bc everywhere I go, the supply is low! I usually buy as many as I can. Thanks Ben n Jerry!

author: xtalvcu
text: Ben & Jerrys Strawberry Cheesecake Ice Cream is my absolute favorite. I even have my husband hooked on it. It is creamy and sweet with gentle surprises of cheesecake pieces

author: diamondh2535
text: My favorite ice cream! No one in my house is allowed to eat this or wed have a problem. Lol I love the cheesecake/ crust swirls in it. The perfect portions in each spoonful

author: marrrre
text: Omg yum! Ben and jerrys cheesecake is abaolutly amazing, its a lottle pricy but the favor makes up for it, i cant find another cheesacake icecream that is better than this!

author: teresam25
text: Ben and Jerry's icecream has always been my all time favorite. The flavors are amazing and loaded with goodies. The only downfall is, they contain a boat load of calories.

author: jamesw11
text: A good treat to get when its hot outside or your just craving ice cream. Good chunks of cheesecake and that graham cracker ribbon is to die for. Always a recommended item!

author: jerryj0c51
text: This ice cream worth every penny !! The cheesecake bites is amazing . I buy this ice cream often when it fits my budget. When I run out I immediately go buy more.

author: mariahcer24
text: This is my favorite ice cream ever by Ben n jerry! I love the flavor and its alittle expeinve for someone on a budget but Im pregnant so it doesnt matter I love it.

author: betsabelr
text: Ben & Jerrys ice cream is so good. It comes in your own personal size cup of ice cream. If you love strawberry cheesecake youll love this ice cream. Its delicious

author: heidi_xo
text: Great texture and lovely strawberry flavour, sometimes I find the cheesecake part can taste a bit artificial with some brands but that isnt the case with this one

author: angelae16
text: This is another favorite of mine. I love the texture and creaminess of this brand and flavor. Its my second favorite type of ice cream. Ice cream is always good.

author: spengza
title: Disappointing
text: Was looking forward to trying this. The strawberries were the tiniest little specks and the graham swirl was overpowering. No balance at all. Very disappointing.

author: colleenm17
text: This is my all time favorite ice cream. It is so creamy its the best ice cream I have ever had. So when I get ice cream this is what Ill buy nothing else.

author: ashleyxmaries
text: My absolute favorite ice cream in the whole world so obsessed with this flavor so good wish I had some right now wouldnt change a thing about this product

author: kryssm
text: This is one of my favorite flavors they make my first was the@cotton candy! The taste of the strawberry is amazing and really does taste like cheese cake!
This is one of my favorite strawberry cheesecake ice creams! Always has a creamy texture, isn't overly sweet, and has a good amount of cheesecake bits!
One of my favorites from Ben and Jerry's! I love the Graham crackers swirl, it's my favorite part, and how actually get bites of real strawberry in it!

author: destinyg43
text: This was the best thing ever created. Whoever came up with this idea is a genius. If youre a cheesecake and ice cream lover youll love this ice cream.

author: csongy1
text: Ahhhhhhhhhh my EVERYTHING!!!! This stuff is addictive. Definitely a repeat consumer. I buy these when they go on sale cause they exxxxpensivvveeee!!!!

author: aaliyah56
text: Super good! This brand is a little expensive but is completely worth it because of the many good things the brand supports and the ice cream itself.

author: paolav1
text: Fire!! This right here is my favorite ice cream in the world. Its my go to! Its very affordable and delicious. Highly addictive never disappointed!!

author: katstar34
text: This is soo delicious. There are big chunks of strawberries and big pieces of graham cracker crust. Definitely worth trying if you loves cheesecake.

author: tiffdipp315
text: My brother brought this and its one of my new favorites! I love chess pans I didnt even know this flavor existed through Ben & Jerrys. Love this !

author: haleyrosemc
text: My favorite ice cream hands down!!! Its such a good summer dessert. The strawberry ice cream with the chunks of graham crackers is to die for!

author: britanyp8e09
text: I am quite an ice cream connoisseur. One of my all time faves is strawberry cheesecake Ben and Jerrys! Its a little pricey, but it is so good!

author: genevieb
text: This is amazing if you like cheese cake your going to love this icecream. It's very sweet and creamy with chunks of strawberry cheesecake. :)

author: heatherrae1988
text: 10/10 super delicious! I love any ice cream from Ben and Jerry's. I wish they weren't as pricey as they are but then again, it's worth it.

author: jennyh17
text: My favorite ice cream! I love the chunks of graham crackers! The only thing I #would# change is the ice cream needs more strawberry flavor

author: rubzz404
text: Im basically addicted to this. The pieces of cheesecake in there just does it all. I love that its dairy free too! I love Ben and Jerrys

author: brookr4
text: Omg this strawberry cheesecake is to die for! Soooo delicious! I would recommend to anyone who loves ice cream or strawberry cheesecake

author: baileym50
text: THE BEST BEN & JERRYS FLAVOR HANDS DOWN! The strawberry chunks? Delicious. The graham cracker? Amazing. The over all flavor? To die for

author: Pastel poetess
title: Memorable & Special
text: First time I tried a shop sample. I never forgot it. Beautiful taste of real strawberries plus Graham cracker crust swirled in . Yummy

author: pat09
text: I LOVE THIS ICE CREAM! I think is cause I love cheesecake when I lived in the dorms in college, I could eat the whole pint by myself

author: madelinec6137
text: One of my top 3 favorite Ben & Jerrys flavors! The strawberry in here is so fresh tasting and the graham cracker swirl is heavenly!

author: kd26
text: It tastes exactly like what you expect. It has real Graham cracker crust swirled in it. The ice cream tastes like good cheesecake.

author: laurieu1
text: This is one of my favorite flavor - the graham cracker and strawberries running through this is so so yummy! Favorite indulgence!

author: kimberlynmb938
text: Im obsessed with this flavor! Its good all year round . Has the prefect amount of strawberries and cheese cake , nothing beats it

author: christineh45
text: This ice cream is SO GOOD. The texture of the graham cracker is perfect and soft, and the ice cream itself is such a great flavor

author: jenniferwf19d
text: I love this it has cheesecake pieces in it and it tastes like your eating a piece of cheesecake but better because its icecream

author: dominiquegc98c
text: I love this ice cream it has real pueces of strawberry qnd cheese cake and its so good I buy it all the time and a fair price.

author: marcellao
text: This is one of my favorite ice cream substitutes you can never go wrong with be and jerrys a great brand a delicious products

author: tiffanyb46
text: Tried this because the grocery store I was at was out of my all time favorite flavor..... honestly can say this was amazing.

author: britnyc1
text: I LOVE this flavor if you love cheesecake you will too! It is such a great flavor and definitely unique compared to others.

author: karaf9569
text: They always have the best flavors to choose from and do not last long in my house! I have some ice cream fanatics here!!!

author: alexandram185
text: Absolute favorite ice cream. I honestly wish I could get it in a bigger size - but then I am sure Id eat all of that too!

author: mrsleandro0923
text: This brand of ice cream is so good. One of my fave ice cream and really good. Never a disappointment with this ice cream.

author: rubynf997
text: I love this ice cream its my absolute favorite. It taste just like a strawberry cheesecake. They hit the flavor spot on.

author: jessin
text: I really love this flavor. The graham cracker swirl is to die for. So so good. Ill buy this one again sometime for sure.

author: anaa524
text: My favorite little splurge purchase! I love this ice cream it is delicious and creamy! I like the Graham swirls in it!

author: sarahfda64
text: I ate this all the time in college! The serving sizes are small so you always end up eating more but it is delicious!

author: mhinojales
title: Meh
text: me and my family all agreed this tasted like powder, kinda tastes like polvorone. it does taste pretty sweet though
I love this strawberry cheesecake ice cream. It actually has a decent amount of strawberry to cheesecake pieces.

author: Jaeaaa
title: I love it!
text: This is the only flavor I’ve tried from Ben and Jerry and it is soo good, definitely the best I’ve tried so far

author: paulizzle
text: The absolute best flavor there is. Its so good it has pieces of strawberries and crackers and its just amazing.

author: knkobelak
text: This is so tasty! Truly a great snack. Its so hard not to eat the whole pint in one sitting. I cant get enough!

author: jennychoiii
text: my second favorite flavor from ben and jerrys its soooo delicious !! has big chunks of cheesecake which i love

author: bella0869
text: They put cheesecake... inside of ice cream. What's left to say? This stuff is delicious and you should try it.

author: marias41
text: It truly tastes like strawberry cheesecake. There arent giant graham cracker parts which I am appreciative of

author: ravenceyonne_95
text: Omg its so good. I love the chunks of strawberries and the graham crackers crumbs. Its my favourite ice cream

author: ashleas6f68
text: I love strawberry cheesecake, and even more in this ice cream. It's one of my favorites from Ben and Jerry.

author: jblb521
text: This is the best ice cream Ive ever had expensive but worth it . I love the graham cracker swirl is amazing

author: sandymam92
text: My ultimate favorite and i love anything that is strawberry flavored. It's so good and and so delicious!

author: Amanda the Great
title: Absolutely delicious
text: One of my favorite flavors ever. The crumbs are not overwhelming but add texture and taste to each bite.

author: gonzalezg002
text: My absolute favorite of all times ! I love Ben and Jerrys especially the strawberry cheesecake flavor !

author: gladysa9
text: Omg my favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor! It so good! Love the cheesecake chunks inside the ice cream! Yum!

author: sierrau
text: This flavor is very good. I like it and its hard not to eat the whole pint. Its a great fruity flavor.

author: hollyb7
text: This is my favorite flavor. The best part in my opinion is the graham cracker swirl throughout. Love!

author: itzelj1
text: This was the first Ben&Jerrys flavor Ive had and Ive got to say Im HOOKED! Didnt disappoint at all!

author: danielles139
text: Creamy goodness sent down from the gods! I love this flavor and all that they make. Will always buy

author: ashleyc458
text: Best ice cream ever. I cant eat it all the time cause of my stomach issues but I love it when I can

author: jass_smiles
text: Hands down one of the best flavors and the best brand to make this flavor of ice cream. Its amazing

author: veror2
text: Love buying the little jugs of these can est it as a snack or just graving something cold and sweet

author: Cpretty
title: YUM
text: The best flavor ever!!! The graham cracker is the best part; I could eat this ice cream every day!
So yummy!! Its hard to not want to eat the whole pint!! Definitely my go to when I want to splurge

author: rye94
text: Loving Ben & Jerrys strawberry cheesecake ice cream. Definitely going to buy more in the future.

author: catherinek9154
text: Glad it comes in a pint, because it it was a half gallon I would still eat it all in one sitting

author: baileyp25
text: super cheap & literally tastes like youre eating a strawberry cheesecakes. yum. best brand ever

author: isabellec23
text: This ice cream is so good!! My favorite flavor besides chunky monkey I highly recommend this!!!

author: anahiandrade396
text: Love this!! Maybe mine didnt have enough strawberries but other than that it was totally good!!

author: zhyan92
text: I love ice cream so Ben & Jerrys taste amazing. Ive always been a huge fan of there ice cream!

author: kaylal71
text: My fav ice cream! Always grabbing these when I get a sweet tooth. Every flavor is so great

author: aniya28
title: Amazing
text: I love this ice cream might be their best ice cream. Tasty just like starwberry cheesecake

author: justabbz
text: Strawberry cheesecake core is the best but I can never find it anymore it makes me so sad

author: michelegcc95
text: So delicious super creamy and sweet. Doesnt taste like artificial flavored strawberries.

author: Mya26
title: My favorite
text: I brought this at my local drug store and I just can’t get enough, it’s my new favorite

author: isabelled1
text: My second best favorite strawberry cheesecake ice cream. Comes with chunks. Its creamy.

author: dianaababy_
text: Obsessed!!! It has pieces of cheesecake inside the ice cream! Yes inside! So delicious

author: natalieb10
text: Best cheesecake I e cream around!!!! Its a must try if you havent had it already!

author: MzJordan30
title: Best yet!
text: Everytime I go to Walmart I buy 3-4 at a time my family loves this ice cream ❤

author: Bellaandjerrys
title: Favorite
text: Whenever I can't decide on a flavor I pick this boy. Never disappointed

author: Icecreamjunkie85
title: Everything but the strawberry
text: It would of been a lot better with huge chunks of strawberries

author: Zeus1995
title: Great but...
text: Delicious but would amazing if had real cheesecake chunks

author: China907
title: Delicious
text: I buy one every other day. Wish they made it in gallons

author: Sarahmarie
title: In love
text: I've been a huge fan of Phish food for 15 or more years. It's been my favorite. But this blew me away. I saw another reviewer state the cookie swirl was too coarse or possibly crystallized. I love the courseness of the cookie swirl it tastes amazing and adds a different texture to all the soft goeyness. I bought and finished this ice cream in the same day. THANK YOU! I always go back to Phish Food. But this I will definitely be going back to.

title: Best icecream I've ever had
text: Haven't been big on icecream in my life time. Only flavor I cared for was cookies and cream. Had no idea I'd LOVE Choc flavor, and mixed with the carmel, such a divine combination. The cookie swirl is mouth watering. The cookie dough is exquisite; although țhe peanut butter dough is also scrumptious, I could live without much of it in the pint. I've gotten pints with very little of the PB dough, which is heavenly. I've also gotten pints with lots and lots of PB dough, which I find to be a bit overwhelming. Still, it's the flavor I always reach for. Still consider my FAV of all time. Thank you Ben & Jerry's, & Jimmy Fallon for perfecting a flavor so awesome.

author: Brittany
title: Ohhh emmm geeeee
text: Honestly all I have to say is this is the best icecream I've ever had. It had gobs of amazement in it. Like wow.

author: MeInSBC
title: My new go-to
text: Look, I just bought this for the first time yesterday, and I have to say, I’m already addicted. This stuff is JUST. SO. GOOD. I love the cookie swirl and the peanut butter dough, I love the ice cream flavor, I love everything is what I’m saying - it’s perfect and B&J please don’t change a thing!! Everything But The... used to be my favorite flavor but they have definitely changed the formula there and I stopped buying it because all I could taste was my bitter memories of how it used to be. So glad I have a replacement flavor that I love even more!!

author: dough believer
title: Sooo Good
text: I cannot stop talking to myself with my mouth full of ice cream saying, "O my gawd, sooo good!"

author: austin1chase
title: Why did they change the flavor :( :( !!
text: This ice cream is to be our favorite. We probably right once a week for a year. However the last five we have purchased have had a new taste to it of some sort of fruit, and it has ruined the flavor. We waited A few weeks to that that that sent out, and then we went and bought some more , But it was still the same weird through the aftertaste. For the aftertaste doesn't belong anywhere near brownies or cookies or chocolate ice cream or Oreos. It's gross. Please change the recipe back to the original !!!!!!! We have switched to a different brand of ice cream for now.

author: LLHh
title: Excellent...except for weird PB cookie dough
text: I purchased tonight dough a few months ago and everything about it was great. This time the PB cookie dough was horrible. It tastes almost like an artificial banana flavor or how I would image nail polish would taste. Here is a photo of the batch numbers.

author: Andarra
title: THE BEST ICE CREAM ON EARTH
text: I love this ice cream more than any other ice cream on planet earth. There has never been an ice cream that compares to this... If I could keep a giant deep freezer full of The Tonight Dough I would be pretty happy. Eating it makes me feel like Unicorns Dolphins Glitter are flying around my tastebuds. This may be dramatic but it's my addiction.... I can eat it in one sitting.... Its even better as a milkshake using vanilla oat milk. I love it so much. I actually hate chocolate ice cream but this is my major exception...I used to buy this every other day.. so yeah its PERFECT. Also the money goes to a good cause when I buy.

author: nyfluttergirl
title: I really want to love it :(
text: The first time I bought this flavor it was amazing! But the last few times the peanut butter dough has ruined it. It tastes rancid. I keep giving it chances because I love everything else about it. But I had one last night that was rancid tasting PB again and my pile of PB chunks in the end was about 1/4 of the container worth. I don't believe I'll be giving it any more chances this time.

author: Katrina
title: Cold Heaven
text: This ice cream is what I would heaven if it were a flavor. Send me truck loads, ASAP! Contact me for my info. :)

author: Kait11
title: What is Wrong with that “Peanut Butter” Dough?
text: This ice cream is great except for the disgusting peanut butter dough chunks that taste like eating a ball of Splenda mixed with dish soap. Seems like maybe there is a bad batch going around? The rest of the pint is great... not sure what’s up.

author: TonightDoughisthebest
title: The greatest flavor ever!
text: I purchased Tonight Dough in a Ben and Jerry's shop hefe in Hawaii a few months ago... OMG it is the greatest flavor I have ever tasted! I am not even an ice cream person, but when I found out that my local grocery store carried the Tonight Dough in pints- I was hooked! The base of this ice cream is mostly chocolate with some caramel ice cream. Then you have globs of chocolate chip cookie and peanut butter cookie dough. There is also swirls of thick chocolate fudge and tiny chuck of chocolate sandwich cookie pieces! The best way to eat this is to let it melt a bit and swirl it all around to mix up the choclate fudge and chocolate sandwich cookie peices. Great Job Ben and Jerry's - and Jimmy Falon! Honestly the only ice cream I will eat!

author: Arliffy
title: Awesome except for "peanut butter" dough
