text: This is a great ice cream in almost every way: the ice creams are delicious and the crunchy cookie swirls are awesome. The regular cookie dough with mini chocolate chips is also delicious. I was taken aback by the "peanut butter dough" though - it tasted really artificial, almost a bit rancid? I ate a few and had to pick the rest out. One of my friends was eating it too and felt the same. Please consider changing the PB dough or removing it altogether.

author: Dizzy
title: Best Flavor Ever!
text: It's like heaven in my mouth from the first spoonful to the last.

author: TylerJNA
title: Usually one of the best
text: This is usually one of my favorite flavors. Bought some yesterday, and when I went to try it the texture was icey and rough, as though it had melted and been refrozen. Little bit disappointing.

author: Brownbombshell
title: My new favorite !!!
text:
Natural, yet yummy.
Hands down, my new favorite.
If I was a food, I'd be this!

author: ChrisColby
title: So much to love!
text: I'm still amazed that so many components can fit into one pint. The varied cookie dough pieces have the perfect chewiness. The rich chocolate base compliments the dough, and the cookie crumbs complete the overall theme. If I can find one flaw, it's in the caramel ice cream, which is so minimal and over-powered by the chocolate base that it might as well have just been just chocolate. Still, one of B&J's best.

author: JaeDAAp
title: Love the Cookie swirl
text: I love this flavor so much, the chocolate cookie swirl is so good. The two icecream flavors are sooo good! But i did not like the peanut butter dough I had way to many chunks and not enough chocolate Chip cookie dough pieces.

author: beck33
title: AMAZING
text: okay so for a while now i’ve been buying this ice cream as my comfort food and it is WONDERFUL!!! sometimes i eat the entire pint in one sitting because it just tastes so good. the tonight dough is probably the best ice cream i’ve ever had and my dad says the same! both of us eat a lot of ice cream too hahaha so you know it’s a big thing when we both think it’s the best ice cream ever. my dad expected it to be overwhelming bc there’s a lot in it but we both agree everything works together harmoniously. my boyfriend loves it too!!! amazing ice cream, never gonna stop buying it :)

author: Grover15
title: WOW!!!
text: Words cannot describe how delicious this flavor is. The cookie swirl along with the never ending chunks of cookie dough is absolutely amazing!

author: ahhvenlee
text: The Tonight Dough from Ben and Jerrys is super sweet and 100% for cookie dough lovers! It is a little bit too rich for my liking but its still freaking delicious! They price isnt terrible depending where you get it either.

author: Littleredindy
title: My New “All Time Favorite”!
text: I used to be a Chubby Hubby or nothing kind of ice cream fan...this topped it. I’m so glad I gave it the opportunity. I chose to try it because of the ingredients and for Jimmy Fallon, he’s awesome! Great creation!

author: sonicfox
title: Peanut butter? I think NOT!
text: I'm so disappointed because I wanted to try this one for a long time. Well, I'm gonna have to agree with everyone who complained about the peanut butter cookie dough. I can't even describe the taste, but it's certainly not peanut butter. Yuck!

author: FuzzyGut
title: Almost awesome
text: I really liked most of this one. The ice creams taste great as do all the mix-ins, except the peanut butter cookie dough, which has an extremely strange flavor, and not peanut buttery. It’s kind of frustrating because the rest of it is SO good. I’ll probably stick with Half Baked instead of getting this one again.

author: AwesomeAvian675
title: Yummy and Delicious! Especially the Cookie Dough!
text: My mom bought this for me and I love the flavors, especially the cookie dough. It has a nice soft feel in your mouth and goes well with the chocolate and vanilla.

author: A_rose
title: Meh
text: This flavor didn't live up to my expectations. I did taste any caramel ice cream flavor, and the peanut butter cookie dough had a weird artificial flavor.

author: Golfer Girl
title: This was more PB Dough Than Ice Cream
text: I have been trying really hard to stay away from ice cream but saw this on the shelf and thought I have to try it. Boy was I disappointed. First I almost bent my spoon in half trying to break into the ice cream but that was because the cookie dough took over everything. There was hardly any ice cream in this. The dough pieces were very dry and not tasty at all. I really wish I could have liked this one. $5.00 in the garbage.

author: emilyg
title: Heaven in a pint
text: I've been dying to try this flavor and after trying a couple not so great flavors i decided it was time. it was the best decision of my entire life. if you only eat one ice cream for the rest of your life, let it be "the tonight dough". the dough chunks are not "chunks", they're insanely huge, like nearing nestle Toulouse premade dough size. the ice creams are so good and it's just amazing. i wish they sold this one in a barrel because one pint is just not enough!

author: Cldowns81u
title: Peanut butter ?
text: I bought this with high hopes but the peanut butter cookie dough is disgusting. Everything else is fine with it except that. It tastes NOTHING like peanut butter cookie dough. Pretty unhappy considering how much this stuff costs....

author: Renaat
title: Wow!!
text: Tasted this flavor today @ the factory in Vermont. Hope they introduce it in Holland!!!

author: Mary Lu
title: Great flavor but inconsistent
text: The first time I tried this ice cream it was amazing! I thought it was my new favorite. The second time I tried it it hardly had any cookie dough in it at all and was mostly ice cream. Then the third time I bought it it was loaded with cookie dough (yay) but was mostly all the peanut butter dough which made it too peanut buttery for me. I'm not sure why it would be inconsistent because I've never had that experience with other Ben and Jerry flavors.

author: icecreamlover123
title: AMAZING TASTE!
text: I was never really a big fan of ice cream but that was long before I bought my first pint of 'The Tonight Dough'. Ever since I took a spoonful of this heavenly creation, I've been addicted to eating it. Being a girl is tough for about a full week, once a month. I can now happily spend that week eating this ice cream. It's my guilty pleasure. Thank you, Jimmy Fallon for helping to create the single best thing that makes life worth living.

author: Pugmom37
title: Heaven in a pint of ice cream
text: Had a craving for some ice cream and hadn't had some B&J's in a while...picked up 'The Tonight Dough' at my local Walmart...when I cracked it open and took my first bite, I fell in love!! I love Jimmy Fallon and I love ice cream...you took my 2 favorite things and put them together!! Quick question: Did he REALLY come up with this combo, cuz if he did, tell him he hit a home run with it!!....and please don't stop making/selling it!!!

author: Cree28
title: Mostly Good
text: It was mostly good except the peanut butter cookie dough had yucky aftertaste. My husband agreed. Unfortunately most of the chunks were peanut butter so we both had significant collections at the bottom of our pints. Normally I like anything sweet but they really were a bit nasty. The rest was delicious.

author: jshellenberger
title: Deliciousness in a bowl
text: Tried this one for the first time tonight after many glowing recommendations from my girlfriend. I can't believe I waited so long to try this batch of heaven! The cookie dough and peanut butter offer a delightful chewy texture and flavor alternate with the ice chocolate and caramel ice cream.

author: Keewester
title: Absolutely my favorite!
text: I can’t find this in my stores for the last week! It’s constant,y sold out. I may have to put on a disguise and sneak into another county! I need more!

title: Yum except for the PB cookie dough
text: This ice cream is soooo great! It would almost say it is my favorite however the PB cookie dough has an add taste to it that makes it undesirable. Almost a freezer burnt taste. I would recommend a new recipe for the dough. Otherwise, it is great!

author: leazf913
text: This was my first ever Ben & Jerrys ice cream and I am definitely a repeat customer of this ice cream! I dont think this ice cream could get better! Its is sooo delicious and I recommend it to everybody! I had first seen this Ice cream on the tonight show and I kinda thought it was a joke until I saw it at a gas station I quickly picked it up, purchased it, and on the way home with a plastic spoon I found (still in its plastic) I opened it up and enjoyed on the way home. It was sooo good! I have since bought 3 more containers.

author: LiloLink
title: Good, except for the peanut butter dough :(
text: I was really enjoying this one up until I tasted a bit of the peanut butter dough. It tastes rancid. :( I thought perhaps it was that one piece, but sure enough it tasted the same when i found another piece! Bummer. It would've gotten 5 stars from me had it not been for those funky PB dough bits, yuck! Everything else in it was fabulous.

author: Erikaaaa
title: Heaven?
text: Is it? Heaven in a pint? Seriously... Best icecream I have ever had. I Really hope it never gets discontinued... I live in Kauai, Hawai'i only Walmart sells It. Its now the only icecream I'll eat!

author: wanderlust
title: Horrible, doesn't taste like peanut butter!
text: I bought this to try as my store was out of my usual flavor and it was absolutely horrible. The chunks with peanut butter in it were gritty (like sand gritty) and tasted nothing like peanut butter, they made me gag and I had to spit it out. I spent the rest of my time eating this, picking out and trying to avoid the nasty peanut butter bits but eventually threw out about half of a container. I'm a peanut butter addict and this tasted nothing like any peanut butter I've ever had! Will not repurchase ever.

Favorite. Flavor. Ever. This pint is for those ultimate ice cream lovers. This isnt for a cheat meal...save this for a cheat DAY, because you will not want to stop eating it once you break the seal. It is gloriously excessive in all the right ways: every single bite has loads of cookie dough, peanut butter, brownie, or chocolate cookie chunks, and the ice cream itself is swirled with more chocolate indulgence. Me and my husband buy a pint apiece because we have failed many times to share nicely!

author: sweetbluerose3
title: Bomb
text: Absolutely my favorite Ben and Jerry's ice cream flavor so far. I have yet to find another mouth-watering ice cream flavor that will impress me. I will be trying your new non dairy products very soon. Thanks for the creativity.

O love this ice cream sooo much is sooo good the only thing I hate is the peanut butter in it but the rest is all good I love the chocolate flavor the cookie dough in it and vanilla ice cream is just delicious

author: Noel
title: Not what I was expecting
text: Pb cookie dough was terrible. Had to force it down

author: pintgobbler2000
title: Muddled flavors.
text: Really strange. I thought this sounded great, but the textures and flavors don't compliment each other at all. The major problem is how overpowering the chocolate is: too much raw cocoa flavor. It's way too rich for all those mix-ins. The peanut butter dough is floury and almost sickly sweet, very artificial. There's absolutely no flavor to the chocolate chip cookie dough after being doused in their chocolate base. The cookie core is oddly coarse and, in places, kind of icy.

author: victor
title: Cookie Doughs Best Ever
text: The cookie doughs in this pint are better than I've ever tasted in other flavors. I think in particular it's the peanut butter cookie dough that WOWed me to death. The sweet caramel ice cream and the less sweet chocolate ice cream balance quite nicely. Before I tried it, I wrote "The Tonight Dough" off as too busy and probably not good, but now it's def like my favorite Ben & Jerry's. I can't get enough of the two cookie doughs with the chocolate ice cream.

author: michellebdf9b
text:
In love
I've been a huge fan of Phish food for 15 or more years. It's been my favorite. But this blew me away. I saw another reviewer state the cookie swirl was too coarse or possibly crystallized. I love the courseness of the cookie swirl it tastes amazing and adds a different texture to all the soft goeyness. I bought and finished this ice cream in the same day. THANK YOU! I always go back to Phish Food. But this I will definitely be going back to.

author: meetig94
text: My all time favourite Ben & Jerrys ice cream is the [product:ben-&-jerrys-the-tonight-dough-ice-cream]! It is jam packed with goodness. How can someone go wrong with cookie dough, chocolate cookie swirls, and peanut butter cookie dough? I love cookie dough and this ice cream satisfying my random cookie dough cravings. I would love tubs of ice cream as a #voxbox. Definitely try it out! #sweet #sweettooth #icecream #cookie #cookiedough #peanutbutter

author: carlyk19
text: Well I usually dont choose peanut butter in any of my desserts, I tried the Tonight Dough flavor because I loved Jimmy Fallon! With caramel & chocolate ice creams with chocolate cookie swirls & gobs of chocolate chip cookie dough & peanut butter cookie dough, the peanut butter flavor isnt overpowering, and the caramel ice cream is dreamy! When you feel like eating an entire carton of ice cream to make your chocolatey dreams come true, try this.

author: Thepopcornking
title: The most amazing ice cream EVER!!!! ♡♡♡♡♡
text: This flavour is hands down my most favourite ice cream! Any time I have enough money, I always try to grab a pint or two because its just so dang delicious. I can't remember what turned me onto Tonight Dough, but it's been my soulmate for nearly 2 years now. If I can't find my baby, I usually settle for Half Baked, but The Tonight Dough will always be at the top of the totem pole for me. ♡♡♡♡♡

author: Lanes7
title: The Best Flavor of Ice Cream EVER!!!
text: I’m kind of a middle of the road ice cream person, I like it but not something I crave regularly... until now! I had Tonight Dough for the first time at a work function where Ben and Jerry’s catered desert . I cannot stop thinking about this ice cream. I crave it and get myself 1 pint as a treat when I grocery shop, but I could eat it every day! It’s been almost a year now and my love has only grown for this treat!

author: Maddiejunk
title: Not enough dough
text: I always buy ben and Jerrys and I tried this new type of pint and I am very offended. There was not enough ice cream as I expected in my pint. It was around half full and I was very upsset. This pint was not worth as much as I spent on it. I am a very good customer and this is my favorite ice cream and I wish this was prevented.

author: Tanguera
title: Tastes a little weird
text: I’m a big B&J fan, but The Tonight Dough doesn’t work for me. The peanut butter cookie dough tastes like it’s gone bad which is shocking because I love all things peanut butter. I also usually like having a blend of flavors, but the combo is just weird.

author: narayaesub
text: Okay so when I was young I thought Ben and Jerrys was just so expensive and a treat I could not indulge in. I love ice cream and this is hands down the best store bought for me. Ben and Jerrys has a great mission and they strive to bring awareness to various social justice causes and they back it up with donations etc. anyway back to the cream man the mix ins are great salty sweet just amazing all in all

author: Shorty31
title: Goodness Me, the Ice Cream is oh so Good!
text: I have legit converted 4 of my friends into craving and loving The Tonight Dough. The mix of cookie, brownie, and ice cream hits every checkmark. I have conflicting emotions in wanting and also not wanting this to come in gallon size. Not wanting a gallon cause it wouldn't last three days and wanting because it wouldn't last three days...lol

author: Sunshine
title: Dough Addiction
text: OMG this is hands down the best flavor ever! I have bought out every pint in about a mile radius from my house. I know the shipment days. I started at 1 pint a day and now 2, I've had to compensate by adding more time at the gym but it's worth it. I love that there's no pieces of nuts they are too hard for me. I love to let it melt and sip it then eat all the dough that sunk to the bottom. Mmmmmm!

author: juliad87
text: The cookie swirl is mouth watering. The cookie dough is exquisite; although he peanut butter dough is also scrumptious, I could live without much of it in the pint. I've gotten pints with very little of the peanut butter dough, which is heavenly. I've also gotten pints with lots and lots of peanut butter dough, which I find to be a bit overwhelming. Still, it's the flavour I always reach for.

author: saras0df0
text: ALL TIME FAVORITE ICE CREAM HANDS DOWN!!! It says its a caramel w dutch chocolate ice cream but it tastes like vanilla and the most delicious chocolate nice cream I have ever eaten. It has chunks of peanut butter cookie dough and chocolate chip dough. It also has chocolate cookie ribbons throughout which is the best chocolate ive ever tried. Its so creamy and rich tasting. Im addicted!!!

author: SadSkinnyB175h
title: Many years later still the best ice cream
text: The only ice cream I think surpasses rocky road in taste, texture and how well the flavors compliment each other. I recently had this because it was offered by a friend and it taste just like I remember. I haven’t bought in years because these days I only by low calorie ice cream made for dieters/slimmers. I had forgotten just how indulgent a classically US made ice cream could taste haha

author: kapleski
text: I always told myself I would NEVER buy an ice cream that costed as much as this one especially for the amount of product you get... that was until I came across this product on sale at sobeys one day. And wow, am I ever grateful for that day, this is my favourite ice cream by far! Great quality and great taste! I definitely recommend this product! Also you can often catch it on sale!

author: ThePurplePerp
title: Unbelievably good
text:
I dunno what more you could want from your ice cream.
I bought chocolate syrup when i bought this flavor cuz I was in the mood for chocolaty awesomeness but I didn't even end up using the syrup because the ice cream disappeared before I remembered it was there. Now I can't stop thinking about buying more. It's addictive. Which is what led me here. Yes. yes. and yes. and yes.

author: BrendaNoraG
title: Literally the best flavor of ice cream Ever
text: Please don’t ever discontinue this flavor, it’s the absolute best. I tell all my friends and family to try Tonight Dough. If you love sweets and chocolate and peanut butter, this is for you. You have to try it and you will instantly be hooked. I can’t explain to you the happiness I get from opening the lid and getting the chocolate cookie crumble on the top layer. Heaven!!!!!

author: badesim
title: THE LOVE OF MY LIFE
text: After the first time I ever tried this ice cream, I was unable to crave any other ice cream. It honestly changed the whole game for me. I love the texture and the flavor combination. I always recommend it to all my friends and wish It was easier to find in grocery stores. Honestly, can you just sponsor me? I promise you won't find anyone more passionate about this than I am.

author: TyTheIceCreamGuy
title: WOW HOLY COW
text: Okay! Ben? Jerry? Whose wacky idea was THIS? I flippin LOVE IT. From the very first bite (wow! I shouldn’t bite ice cream it’s very COLD)

author: abscog
text: This ice cream combines all the best parts of Ben and Jerry's including chocolate, vanilla, cookie dough and brownies. I love everything about this ice cream and there is absolutely NOTHING that I feel needs to be changed about it. I only wish that it wasn't so popular because it is sold out every time I go to the store. (kidding) keep up the excellent work Ben and Jerry.

author: katieg108
text: Ben and Jerrys is known in my family as the best Ice cream around. When a carton of half baked is placed in my freezer I know it will not last more than a week! I absolutely love this flavor! It has a perfect hint of saltiness in the dough and creamy sweetness in the ice cream! This is far superior to half baked because the different doughs in this mixture are much better!

author: ABigBnJFan26
title: Fav Ice Cream
text: This is by far my favorite ice cream. Super creamy, not too rich, loads of delicious big chunks of cookie. I was surprised by the swirls of chocolate cookie. It can be a bit sandy at times but I don't mind the texture so for those adverse to it maybe it's not for you. Thank you for the wonderful ice cream B&J, this is my special go-to treat every time I want a pick me up.

author: BWash007
title: AAA- Ma-Zing
text: How could you not love? perfect blend of all ingredients added! Not too much of anything. I seriously have left all my other favorites behind and purchase EVERYTIME I pass the ice cream aisle and see it in stock. This satisfies every craving. I also love how vanilla is the base and everything else complements. WHO GAVE THIS ICE CREAM 1 or 2 STARS?!?!?!?! HOW!?

author: jessica_n
text: The tonight dough is the SUPERIOR flavor out of all of the Ben and Jerry's flavors. If my family is getting ice cream, the tonight dough is definitely our first option. It is disappointing though because this flavor is always sold out (because it is so good). There is so much going on in one container. You must try it. You (probably) won't regret it :)

author: sourninja
text: This is my favorite ice cream of all time. Legit I get a little irrational when there isnt any left at my local store. I dont care what it costs, if I have a craving this will be put into my mouth as soon as I can possibly get it. The peanut butter chunks are enough to write your grandmother and tell her you found your soulmate. And its an ice cream.

author: ekenzzz
title: the best!
text: i usually stick with "if i had 1,000,000 flavours" because let's face it, it's a piece of art... however i went to my local store and tried this out for size. OMG i don't think i'll ever turn back. it makes me upset when i go to grab some and there's every other flavour other than this one! i'm addicted, please please please never get rid of this

author: Lucky
title: No cookie dough :(
text: I bought this yesterday and I was so excited to eat it because I bought it before and loved it, but this time around there was barely any cookie swirl and there was only PB dough chunks, no cookie dough chunks. Very disappointed, might have to start sticking to half baked instead. :( not only that but this time the pb dough had a weird flavour.

author: mdvnielle_
text: i’m a cookie dough type of girl. cookie dough ice cream is definitely my guilty pleasure. i’ve tried every brand of cookie dough ice cream. this one was alright. although it isn’t labeled as cookie dough, it’s still dough in it. i though this this one was little too sweet for me and i would prefer the dough chunks to be a little bit smaller.

author: rainbowbee3
text: Cookie dough ice cream is one of my favorites. I love this variation of it. It has chocolate chip and peanut butter cookie dough. The chocolate mixed in with the caramel and chocolate ice cream just makes this wonderful. I usually eat this in one or 2 sittings. There is no sharing when it comes to Ben & Jerry's The Tonight Dough Ice Cream

Its nice and creamy and the chunks give it an added boost of flavor. I usually try to control myself and tell myself that I will only get a scoop but next thing I know the pint is gone. Its reasonably priced so you can afford to stock up on a few of the favs for later. They keep really well unlike some that tend to get freezer burn easily.

author: shelbyg2189
text: Let me get this off my chest: Jimmy Fallon is my soulmate. He just gets me. So it's only fitting that his face would be plastered on my favourite ice cream as well. This is the best combination of wanting to add all the toppings at the dessert bar but not wanting to go too far and ruining the flavour. It's the perfect balance of flavours

title: One of my favorites
text: This is one of my absolute favorite ice creams! Every time I see it in the store I have to buy it! My boyfriend will even surprise me with a pint of it sometimes because I love it so much. When I was really sick recently (with a sore throat) I pretty much lived off of this stuff because it was the only thing that didn't hurt to eat!

Oh my goodness! So delicious and the perfect treat any time of the day! Some days you just need to come home and binge watch your favorite Netflix rom-coms and eat ice cream! This ice cream will make your insides feel better than any man ever could it tastes like you landed on the moon filled with all kinds of cookie dough goodness

author: bgdl26
title: MY favorite ice cream ever!
text: I love this so much, however, the last few pints I have had the regular cookie dough has not been good. I've gotten pints at different stores just to see if it was that stores batch. Have you changed the consistency of it? It was always soft and melted in your mouth. It's now kind of hard and crumbles. (does that make sense haha)

author: drinkswithnadia
text: Every once in awhile Ill treat myself to a Ben and Jerry's Ice Cream The Tonight Dough - 16oz ! Something about this particular flavor stands above the others in my opinion ! Theres so many textures and flavors coming from the two different cookie doughs! If you like chocolate, peanut butter and cookie dough... this is for you!

author: Ms Kentucky
title: OMG... One Mouthwatering Good
text: While on vacation in Atlantic Beach, We stopped at the Ben & Jerry's store. My eyes were speaking to me... what's this wonderful ice cream flavor. Fresh and in a waffle bowl, PURE delight. Since we have been home. I have been looking for a place where I can get more. Because this was an awesome flavor! Thank you Ben & Jerry's

author: jasonrob79
text: This is a good flavor if you are a fan of cookie dough as it has two different kinds in it and its actually done correctly and taste great. Its not my first choice but I do enjoy it when I dont have my usual brand in stock at my local store. As Ive said if you are a fan of cookie dough this might be your next favorite flavor

author: leslies65a5
text: This is the best combination of vanilla chocolate and cookie doughI love cookie dough. I can sit and eat an entire pint. Youre able to taste and savor each flavor. You can never go wrong with a little tiny pieces of chocolate bits so good. It is a little pricey about 4 to 5 dollars for a pint but definitely worth it.

author: michelleb3082
text: Ben & Jerry's tonight dough is basically one of the only ice creams I will eat, it is to die for. It combineschocolateandcaramelice creams withchocolate chip cookie dough,peanut butter cookie doughand a crunchychocolatecookie swirl. It is so good! if you haven't tried it you definitely need to get some immediately!!

author: yai_martinez17
text: This would definitely be my favorite Ben and Jerry's ice cream. I got it once to try and see if I liked it, since I'm not really an ice cream person, and I fell in love. It's one of the best flavors Ben and Jerry's offers. The two ice cream flavors and the two types of cookie dough just really complement each other.

author: roshh1
text: Let me start by saying WOW!! I had to force myself to stop eating this, or I would have consumed the whole pint. This flavor has now become my favorite! I had been looking for a tasty dairy free ice cream (Im lactose intolerant) but what the heck, Ill just take my pill before enjoying this deliciousness! Buy it!

author: tarlanella
text: This flavor is a party in your mouth. Whoever thought to blend a mixture of so many chocolate favorites is a genius and deserves an award. I am a repeat customer and have purchased this pint of cream 20+ times in my lifetime. I recommend to ALL my friends. I love this flavor so much. Its 100% a guilty pleasure.

author: Mya788
title: Absolutely to die for!!!
text: I’ve been buying this same ice cream for years. It’s the perfect mixture of cookie dough and cookie pieces. It’s not too salty or too sweet. I can’t keep my hands from buying it off the shelves which is probably why my New Years resolution isn’t going to great lol. Nonetheless, I hope they never get rid of it.

author: faspee
text: This is the second time I've bought this brand and it was also well worth the money. I will buy this again for sure! It's very good for that girls night out and you need that comfort food. So many yummy chunks cookie dough and peanut butter cookie dough. Satisfaction was achieved after this was consumed.

author: jennyw50
text: I got to try this for my first time recently. I love the variety in there with chocolate, caramel, COOKIE DOUGH!! Anything with cookie dough has my vote. The peanut butter conflicted with the caramel just a bit too much for me, but overall super delicious. Im happy whenever I can find B&J on sale for $4!

author: stephaniem100
text: The perfect alternative to regular cookie dough ice cream! This has your standard chocolate chip cookie dough and peanut butter cookie dough mixed with chocolate and carmel ice cream. I gotta say my favorite part is the cookie crunch swirled in, gives you a nice crunch of texture every once in a while.

author: Icecreamfan4life
title: Interesting Mix
text: Bought this a couple nights ago on a whim. Had seen it plenty of times when I was looking at other flavors to try out, as I'm not typically a real big chocolate ice cream fan do to the bitter taste it can have at times. But I've found that I really enjoy B&J's chocolate ice creams. Very smooth and light flavor. So I finally opted to break down and chose to buy this flavor. And have to say that I wasn't quite unsatisfied with it. I mean the chocolate and caramel ice creams came together beautifully with the chocolate chocolate chip cookie swirl. But I have to admit there was something off with the peanut butter cookie dough. I have no idea, if they taste off, do to possibly being made from a vegan recipe. But, I could very faintly taste the peanut butter as well as some kind of floral-esque note at the end. Was kind of strange tasting. I think maybe if the recipe was adjusted a bit or maybe just adding a peanut butter swirl or core to this pint, would really make everything come together.

author: AJ42
title: BEST FLAVOR!!!! :)
text: I recently went to a Ben & Jerry's store and purchased The Tonight Dough but in a milkshake and although I am lactose intolerant, this was one of the best decisions I made. This ice cream is AMAZING, and I would defiantly be buying it. Hope they make this flavor dairy free one day to help me out.

author: girlwithnoclue
text: Ben & Jerry are my two favorite men because not only are they SMASHING the patriarchy, but theyve been killing the ice cream game for years. This flavor is the most packed with toppings so be aware if you like simple ice creams! A cookie dough lovers dream, the cookie swirl is my favorite!

author: sambutneversammy
text: I never thought I would be a fan of peanut butter cookie dough in an ice cream as I am really picky about where I taste peanut butter. However, they balance the flavors so well that I really enjoyed it! The carmel ice cream soon made me realize my love for caramel ice cream in genereal!

author: jasminemaewith
text: I have had sooooooo many flavors of Ben & Jerry's throughout my life. It is an amazing brand. There's always so many goodies jam packed into one container! And there's an insane amount of choices available. This one is pretty memorable due to Jimmy Fallon's face being on the container.

author: kimsparkle
text: Tonight Dough is my all time favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor. The mix of ingredients is the best. It has both chocolate and caramel ice cream along with chocolate chip cookie dough, peanut butter cookie dough, and a chocolate cookie swirl. It has a lot of texture and tastes great!

author: sallyw12
text: This is by far my favorite flavor! I've tried so many different flavors and they're all good. But I like this one the best because it has some saltiness along with the sweet chocolate, cake and cookie dough flavor. I don't care about the cost, I'll pay anything for this yummy treat.

author: MattScoops
title: Love from Canada
text: Hello! Long time scooper, first time writer. The Tonight Dough is a revelation. Many flavours that blend so well together! I especially enjoy the peanut butter dough, it surprises me every time a gob finds its way into a spoonful. Next time I'll try a different flavour... maybe...

author: taylorb9
text: My favorite Ben & Jerrys ice cream! I love a cookie dough period but this is a cut above just cookie dough. They give you caramel, chocolate chip cookie dough, peanut butter cookie dough and creamy well blended vanilla ice cream. This is crack in a cup and Im here to be drugged

author: awes0me14
title: Yes Sir Yes Sir Yes Siiiiiiiiir
text: Oh my WOOOOOOOORD. BEST. ICECREAM. EVER. Sick? Buy this. Tired? Buy this. Happy? Buy this. Binge watching? Buy this. This Ice cream suits your every need!!! It is the best ice cream. All other companies should really learn from Ben & Jerry's. Would give it 100 stars if I could.

author: Nephritis
title: Pretty great flavor
text: I bought this tonight after a long period of contemplation, and I love it! The only thing is, the chocolate cookie swirls that other reviews referenced is the single best ingredient in existence, and I personally thought it should have had more...like a separate pint of it!

author: alicer9
text: Love the creaminess and all the toppings in the ice cream. This is my go-to pint to buy at grocery stores. It's loaded with the toppings, doesn't cheap out. The price for this product is decent but is amazing when it's on sale. Delicious and would recommend this to others.

author: leahro
text: Im not supposed to eat dairy, but this is worth it. its delicious ice cream with doughs in it. cold, chewy, rich (but not too rich), creamy, and everything that makes it amazing. I tried this when it first came out years ago and its still my go to. Big fan, its a must try!

author: Blondie95
title: Absolutely perfect!
text: I have probably tried about every ice cream Ben and jerrys sells in stores and this is the best one. The chunks of cookie dough throughout the ice cream along with the cookie crumble swirl is the best combination. It's so good that it's now the only ice cream I buy ever!!

author: tgunnlaw
text: Always Crowd pleaser, what am I saying I never share this ice cream, go hey your own! Creamy, delicious and except ice cream to chocolate chip cookies ratio.

author: rossrikki
text: I love ice cream with a lot of stuff in it. Ice cream might even be more about texture than flavor for me. If you feel the same way, it really doesnt get better than Ben & Jerrys. The Tonight Dough is my favorite but there are so many delicious Ben & Jerrys ice creams.

author: haleymarie23
text: I absolutely love this ice cream!! It has so many different flavors all in one. I like that it has cookie dough pieces in it. Its kind of on the expensive side but its well worth it. I definitely recommend trying it if you havent and you like all the flavors it has in it.

author: erikal63
text: This is my favorite flavor of all the Ben and Jerrys flavors! They put so much cookie dough in them which is the best part since most dont! You can buy it almost anywhere and its not expensive! You gota try it! [product:ben-&-jerrys-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-ice-cream]

author: stephaniew80
text: 5 stars all day long. I ate this Ben and Jerry's flavor every single day while I was pregnant and still continue to love! No other ice cream company fills their flavor with as much goodies like b&j does. Every bite you have cookie dough and brownie swirl. Omg. The best.

author: brittanyv6f03
text: I love Ben and Jerry and their ice cream. I gave this one a 4 because yes, it's delicious, but it's not my favorite. If I remember correctly, it has two types of cookie dough- chocolate chip and peanut butter. This one will fill my craving when I can't find phish food.

author: jamiesc69b
text: Delicious! There is a great chocolate to vanilla ratio. I love the fudge mixed into the chocolate, but not too rich. There are lots of cookie dough bites so you can nearly get one in every other bite. No need to search. Perfectly mixed leaving very little to be desired.

author: Kirsten28
title: Really Might Be The Best Ever
text: This one really might be the best flavor ever. There are SO many chunk pieces and the cookie doughs are the best tasting cookie dough bits compared to any other brand. The caramel and chocolate ice cream is a good pair, and the texture of the cookie swirls are AMAZING.

author: kima62
text: This caramel and chocolate ice cream is truly heavenly! It is not only filled with chocolate swirls, it also contains two different types of cookie dough, peanut butter and chocolate chip! Every bite contains each of these items making for a sweet and delicious treat!

author: kaitmeadows
text: The price of Ben and Jerrys has always scared me away, but this ice cream is 16 oz of everything good in the world. It is heaven in a pint. Ben and Jerrys is revolutionary both in social causes and in phenomenal ice cream flavors. Thanks for bringing heaven to Earth.

author: legitcolleen
text: Its been too long since I had this or any Ben & Jerrys ice cream. Their ice cream is just that amazing. Except for cherry, because I do not like fruits in my ice cream, I would probably try all their flavors if I had the chance and money to. Highly highly recommend

author: kenzieebritt
text: I'm a huge Ben and Jerry's fan. I really like this flavor, it's not my favorite but still delicious! I don't reach for it every time I'm in the mood for a sweet treat, but sometimes I am just really craving it! I really love the fun, creative collaboration flavors!

author: mottagiu
text: The dairy free Ben and Jerrys ice cream is the best in my opinion. The texture is and flavor is just like regular ice cream. I think Ben and Jerrys is a bit overpriced but its totally worth it considering that they support great causes and the flavor is immaculate

author: sjm1
text: Another great flavour from Ben & Jerry's, the Tonight Dough has an amazing combination of cookie dough, chocolate, peanut butter cups and so much more. I feel guilty when I go into the tub for a 3rd and 4th scoop ... until I eat them and know that is is great.

author: kidjo22
text: If I want to indulge this is my go to! (Insert mouth water) its so good with the caramel ice cream and cookie dough bits and then you have chocolate Icecream with chunks of peanut butter cookie dough. AND the cookie swirl throughout it all, Seriously sooo good.

author: shangreen
text: Love the flavor of this ice cream. It has a great mix of tastes and fix-ins that add a good texture to the ice cream. I always purchase this product when my local Giant Eagle runs a sale on Ben and Jerrys. Otherwise, price can be a little steep for this product.

author: chrisg31
text: This is one of my girlfriend and my favorite ice creams! We purchase it anytime there is a sale on Ben and Jerry's. Loaded with cookie dough and chocolate this ice cream satisfies any craving. Ben and Jerry's has always been one of my favorite ice cream brands!

This is my favorite ice cream! Very chunky-which is a cookie dough lovers dream! The only thing to make it better would be to add more of a fudge component to the ice cream. I also wish that I could find this flavor in the mini-size, rather than just the pint

author: adriannae4
text: My favorite Ben and Jerrys go to ice cream if Im watching a movie or just need to have a moment. The chunky chocolatey ice cream is what I seek in all of the ice creams I buy and this one is perfect. I like the pb cookies too its a different flavor in the mix.

author: keriannhb95d
text: My friends and I often like to take part in taste tests, and this one won out of the 6 brands we tried! Not only is the ice cream itself very creamy and delicious, they have a good amount of chunks and goodies in them. It is expensive but well worth the cost.

author: tessm17
text: The tonight dough is my go to for Ben and Jerry. I mean who doesn't love brownie, cookie dough and Jimmy Fallon. Im always down to try a new flavour but usually find myself reaching for this or the half-baked flavour. Can't go wrong with what you know, right?

author: theresah29
text: Ben and jerrys ice cream is so good! They have so many wonderful flavors its hard to choose just one. My absolute favorite is the tonight dough. This ice cream never disappoints my taste buds. The only thing is i always finish the whole tub! Its just so good.

author: Nicg63
title: Use to love it
text: I’ve had this a few times and it was beyond heavenly but unfortunately the last few times the peanut butter cookie dough has tasted realllllyyy weird and not good. It makes me so sad cause this is the best flavor in the world, or use to be. Please fix it!!!

author: Awhite
title: Eh
text: Too much of a chocolate flavor and not enough cookie dough chunks. Not sure if it's freezer burned or an old batch but often the cookie dough chunks will break apart like powder with a terrible taste. Not a bad flavor if cookie dough is like it should be.

author: millervolt
text: This. Is. The best. Ice cream I've ever had. It has everything you could want in ice cream. It has vanilla, rich chocolate, caramel, peanut butter, cookie crumbles, and cookie dough. Just simply amazing. I will be buying more of this as soon as I get home.

author: pineapplesp
text: Love this flavor. Its filled with different types of cookie dough and its tastes heavenly. Each spoonful of ice cream will contain a type of cookie dough and ice cream. I would 100% recommend if cookie dough is your favorite part of cookie dough ice cream.

author: my2babies11
text: The flavor is delicious, the size perfect. Whether it's the "I just broke up with my boyfriend" ice cream, or the "tonight's a special event, here's a treat" or the "just because" ice cream, you cannot go wrong with the Tonight Dough from Ben and Jerry's.

author: iluvujennay
text: When I am craving cookie dough ice cream, this is always the brand I go for. The chunks of Cookie dough are large and worth the money. Its like having an ice cream store in your freezer. I would highly suggest trying this brand if you have an already yet.

author: Eve_
title: Weird PB dough
text: I’ve had this flavor before and it was so good, I bought it again. This time, the PB dough chunks taste rotten. I’ve seen some similar reviews on this page. I don’t know what happened because I had it before with no issues. Seems like a bad batch??? Yuck.

author: madiem7
text: This is hands down my all time favorite ice cream flavor. The dough bites in the ice cream are larger than all other brands and have the perfect level of sweetness. If you are a cookie dough fanatic buy this it will satisfy all your cookie dough cravings

author: Yaskween
title: The best
text: They were having a sale at my neighborhood grocery store so I thought I would branch out and pick up a new flavor. After trying this I went back for more!My ultimate favorite ice cream now. You get a bunch of cookie dough it's addicting in a good way lol

author: sabrinasmash
text: 100000% my absolute favorite ice cream flavor. I absolutely love all of the different flavors in the ice cream and it is full of the different cookie doughs! The texture of the peanut butter dough isnt my favorite, but it doesnt deter from the product

author: aniburk
text: i have had this product multiple times and it is always so tasty, however after eating it a lot it can get kind of sickening. also due to cookie dough in it, it can be hard to scoop. but the texture is amazing and i love the flavor of the cookie dough.

author: Trina
title: For people who don't like chocolate ice cream
text: I'm eating this ice cream as I write this review only because it's amazing and I wish I could share this pint with the world! I HATE chocolate ice cream but decided to give this a try, and let me tell you!! Best decision ever! I'm in ice cream heaven.

author: jennyi2
text: This is my favorite flavor because it has everything- chocolate, peanut butter, cookies, etc. I love ice cream but its hard for me to choose a flavor so this one is perfect. The small pints are a good size and you can get multiple servings out of it.

author: ecapelorac
text:
Ben and Jerrys get 10/10.
They hire felons, pay living wage, donate, have been arrested when protesting for the greater good. They may be on the expensive side but when you find out all the good they do it is absolutely worth it.
This flavor is good.

author: samanthab37bf
text: My favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor to date. All kinds of ice creams and cookie doughs and flavors in this one. Including those awesome cookie crumbles that are always in ice cream cakes. Pretty much everything that is great about ice cream in a pint.

author: msnyder2
text: One of my favorite B&J flavors. Not only do I love Jimmy Fallon, but this flavor has a great mix of caramel, chocolate ice cream and chocolate chip and peanut butter cookie doughs. DELICIOUS. Its like taking cookie dough ice cream to the next level.

author: anne02
text: The best ice cream ever! I remember craving some sweets one night during my pregnant days. I asked my husband to go pick up some ice cream. It was on sale so he picked one up to try. Omg! Love! We have this in our freezer at all times! So delicious!

THIS IS THE BEST!!!!! I love this ice cream with everything in me!! it combines all the best sweets into one and is so creamy but has a fun texture with the brownie and cookie dough. My whole family loves this flavor so it goes quickly in our house.

Such a yummy flavor combination and who doesnt love the tonight show!? Ben and Jerrys is the fried and true girls night ice cream and this is my top flavor pick every time! Not to mention, Ben and Jerrys is a B-Corp and advocates for social justice!

author: edenmetz
text: This is my favorite ice cream of all time! Ben & Jerry's is so creative and has so many great flavors throughout their entire line. Tonight Dough or not, you will not go wrong with choosing any single one of their flavors! I highly recommend this!

author: mikafalciola
text: Their ice cream is good, but have you seen their stance to abolish white supremacy? That is what makes their flavors pop! I will now buy more Ben & Jerrys. This flavor is really good though, all of the sweets you like in one combined flavor! BLM!

author: emilyc403
text: Immaculate flavor. This company has become well known for their political stance over the last few weeks which has sparked many to go and buy their product. It is delicious and serves its purpose very well!! A tasty, cold treat after a long day!!

author: hollandm
text: Hands down the best ice cream. If you love sweets this has it all. A step up from your typical cookie dough ice cream, this one has peanut butter and chocolate chip cookie dough chunks along with even more. Every bite will be filled with cookie.

author: denisec16
text: I absolutely love Ben & Jerry's ice cream it is the smoothest creamiest ice cream I have ever tried it is pretty expensive so I wait for it to go on sale but I love love this ice cream and it is loaded with ingredients well worth the indulgence

author: lipkit99
text: This ice cream is actually my favorite comfort food. Warning it is very sweet and heavy. So if you like plain flavors this is NOT the ice cream for you, but if you live to chocolate this is a must buy! Ben & Jerry's® The Tonight Dough Ice Cream

author: amazinggracematthew
text: I am a huge ice cream fan I usually dont buy a pint or whatever I usually go out to ice cream shop a little mom and pop shop since thats an option during quarantine I love Ben and Jerrys the only one better than the tonight dough is half baked

author: justicem8
text: No matter what flavor I choose Ive never gone wrong with Ben and Jerrys. One of the best ice cream brands, Ill admit its a bit pricy for its small container but its overall worth it. You wouldnt be disappointed with any flavor from this brand.

author: mariaz15
text: Okay I get it there's a famous person on the package yes of course I bought it. But I was very disappointed it's not as flavorful as it should be considering what favorite Parts he likes in the ice cream. Very disappointing will not buy again

author: Emsicecream
title: Tasted stale
text: I got a few of these at 7 11 thier was almost no cookie dough and the piece I did eat tasted very stale and gross. Not what I was expecting for the price didn't eat the other pint at all so gross and a waste of money also it wasn't expired.

author: clairep2
text: This is my absolute favorite Ben & Jerrys ice cream flavor. I love cookie dough and cookies in ice cream, and this has it all and more. So many of my favorite flavors packed into one pint. I never buy any other flavor anymore, only this one.

author: katpereira21
text: My best friend from high school and I would buy a whole pint of the tonight dough after every choir concert to celebrate one a trimester. We loved how similar it was to half baked but the added peanut butter cookie dough made it even better!

author: sarahc354
text: All time favorite ice cream!! Perfect cookie dough pieces, chocolate and caramel ice cream make for the richest and most delicious ice cream!! Ben and Jerrys always does the best when it comes to their ice cream and makes it worth the money

author: alyssam251
text: This one is probably my absolute favorite ice cream all the different tastes and textures in it I love them it goes very well together I was very sad when one of my stores got rid of it because this is like I said my favorite ice cream ever

Dangerously delicious. Its my familys favorite flavor by far. Its hard to put down once you pick it up. It has all my favorite flavors and would definitely be my first choice as a dessert. Im a sucker for the cookie dough and brownie in it!

author: jackien33
text: Ahhh its sooo good ! It has everything in it ! Chocolate chip cookie dough, peanut butter cookie dough, caramel, and a chocolate cookie swirl . Its cookie dough ice cream but richer in flavor . Its pricey for the size but worth the flavor .

author: jeffreyb66c1
text: This is one of Ben and Jerrys best ice cream flavors, like all Ben and Jerrys ice creams this is loaded with cookie pieces. If you are lucky you can sometimes get these 3 for 6 but if you arent lucky youre stuck spending anywhere from $3-$5

author: hilaryb4
text: This is my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry's! It has chocolate, it has cookie dough and cookie pieces so what's not to love! I have recommended this ice cream to everyone I know and have even converted some of my friends from other brands.

author: jasmineo25
text: EVERY single Ben and Jerrys ice cream flavor is absolutely amazing Im in love! Its a little on the pricey side but theres always so many ingredients so its definitely a special treat Ben and Jerrys is definitely my favorite ice cream brand!

author: kate5098
text: Oh my gosh this is my favorite ice cream!! Its very affordable. It has multiple doughs in it that are delicious!! I love how its not too sweet and too doughy. Every time I go to the store this is the ice cream I grab when I want ice cream.

author: angelasc911
text: Not my favorite Ben and Jerrys, there is a lot going on with the crunchy cookies and peanut butter. Wouldnt ever be my first choice but hey its still good and I finished it. If I was offered it, I would say yes but I wouldnt buy it again.

author: saras79
text: My fave by Ben and Jerry. Like the different cHunks of dough. I havent bought any in a while. Sometimes I notice my cups were loaded with goodies and other times not so much. Kinda inconsistent, but its been years. I should go buy a pint.

author: trelawneye
text: I prefer some of their other flavours. Personally I feel like this one has a little too much going on. Also I love Ben and Jerrys but can get more ice cream from other brands for much less, so I can only afford this as a sometimes treat.

author: themayaabdulr
text: Super yummy and love Jimmy Fallon, Im just not a huge peanut butter person so it definitely threw me off when trying this. Still super delicious and I would eat it if I was in the mood for it, love the cookie dough and brownies as well!

Best grocery store ice cream. The peanut butter cookie dough bites with the brownies makes the perfect combination of sweet and salty. Although the ice cream is very heavy, it is a delicious dessert to have a spoonful of every so often.

Ugh so good. The combo of caramel, brownie, and whatever else is in there (can’t remember at the moment) is so great. It’s a little high calorie but so good. I also only buy this on sale because it’s like $6 at rite aid which is insane.

author: callmeladymary
text: One of the few flavors at the 7/11 across the street from me, so Ive had this one a few times when Im craving ice cream late at night. All textures and flavors I enjoy in this one, so I dont mind that its one of the only options I have.

author: katld4a6
text: This pint is one of my favorites! All the mix-ins I could want. I always find the ice cream base of Ben & Jerrys to be perfectly creamy too! It is a bit pricy so I try to find it on sale or 2-for-1! If youve not tried it, pick one up!

author: jasminer629e
text: This is my favorite ice cream. Nothing else to say. It's hot perfect chunks of choclate and peanutbutter it is my guilty pleasure. Although ben and Jerry's can get super expensive, sometimes I treat myself to this wonderful creation.

author: katietabisz95
text: This ice cream literally makes me weak because its so good haha! The tonight dough is the best flavor of ice cream ever created, and it is impossible to not eat the whole thing in one sitting! Absolutely delicious and would recommend

author: nicolen97
text: This ice cream is HEAVEN. SOOO good with chocolate chip cookie dough and peanut butter cup together its a great mixture of both. Good balance. Im not one for an overly heavy kinda chocolate ice cream but this one is a good treat.

author: JordanB23
title: Changed the Recipe???
text: I’ve had this flavor a few times and usually love it.. this last pint was alarmingly devoid of cookie dough. There were 3 huge chunks of cookie dough, the rest was just plain chocolate ice cream. I don’t know exactly what happened

author: melissaf3e07
text: I love this ice cream. The cookie dough is so good and the ice cream has the perfect texture. Its nice that is has a combination of flavours of ice cream and cookie dough. It’s a little pricey, but it’s definitely worth the money.

author: yoselinz
text: Tried this ice cream for the first time a few days ago and it didnt disappoint. I loved the peanut butter and cookie dough mix. The caramel and chocolate ice cream didnt give it an overwhelming sweetness to it. Must try ice cream!

author: billb
text: This I've cream is perfect for people who like a lot of "stuff" in their ice cream. It honestly had a great Balance of stuff to ice cream. I love that it has everything in it... Great when you can't decide what you exactly want.

author: emilys456
text: This product is a chocolate cookie dough lover dream. The amount of cookie dough in this product is phenomenal. Its my main go to when I am craving raw cookie dough. Its definitely a product I would recommend and would buy again.

author: suttono
text: This is my favorite flavor from Ben & Jerrys. Everytime I get a different flavor, I realize it just doesnt add up to this flavor and I always go back and get this one. It has everything you want thats sweet in one pint! So good!

author: aliciac25
text: Ben and Jerrys is my absolute go to ice cream. In my opinion it is worth the price tag on it. I really really wish they made bigger sizes though. All flavors are amazing I would definitely recommend there ice cream to everyone.

author: melanieh8801
text: This flavor is sooo delicious! It has a little bit of all the doughs/cookies and brownies that everyone loves. The caramel and chocolate ice creams combine very well with all the flavors of doughs and make for one tasty treat.

author: Ansssss
title: Amazing
text: Every single Friday me and my boyfriend each get a pint of this amazing ice cream. This is by far the only Ice cream I eat and I will drive to 4-5 different stores just to find this flavor. 10/10 would recommend it is amazing.

author: hrburdo05
text: This is my absolute favorite ice cream ever. I love love love Ben and Jerrys and this flavor is soooooo good!!! May be a little expensive for just a pint but still the flavor makes up for the price. 11/10 rating if possible :)

author: kaitlyng6
text: My husband turned me onto this flavor and it is super good. Its very expensive for a small bit though so we definitely dont buy often. I found that HEB has a flavor very similar so we constantly buy that one instead for price

author: geniuswithADD
title: Literally Heaven
text: I'm not a huge ice cream person. I don't really buy it on my own - just eat it when offered from other folks. However, after my friend gave me a taste of this, I've been searching for it ever since!

author: Finfid
title: Sympathy for my tummy
text: Overall the flavor is good. You just have to avoid looking at the label when eating it, otherwise seeing that smug face might make you queasy.

author: emilys25a0
text: This was pretty good! It has all the flavors I love in ice cream. It was rich but also so satisfying. Anyone who is a fan of chocolate and baked goods in your ice cream are certainly going to love this just as much as I did!

This is my favorite Ben & Jerrys. I only get it when Im splurging as the price is very high, and I can get a whole gallon from most other brands for this price. But the flavors of this one are good and they are very balanced

author: erin_holl
text: This is one of my favorite ice cream flavors! It is packed with chocolate chip and peanut butter cookie dough, chocolate cookie crumbles mixed into chocolate and caramel ice cream. Everything you could want in an ice cream!

author: emrenick33
text: This is my favorite Ben & Jerrys ice cream EVER; plus Jimmy Fallon makes me giggle. It has all my favorites, cookie dough, chocolate fudge chunks (similar to the Dairy Queen ice cream cake filling), and peanut butter balls!

author: caroandgmom
text: My all time favorite flavor. Ben & Jerrys has been around a long time. I think the Price is similar to other pint sized ice cream packages. And this one is responsibly produced. Delicious and socially responsible. Win Win

author: dawng006c
text: This is my favorite flavor of the Ben & Jerrys ice cream. I love cookie dough and the pieces are a pretty good size as well. It is rather pricey but in this case its absolutely worth it. Every chance I get I treat myself.

author: member9e45e1
text: Soooo good. Chocolate therapy is my go to when my therapist isn't available haha, but The Tonight Dough is a close second for favorite. I love all the different treats you find in this flavor! Especially the cookie dough.

author: skyeleer
text: This is one of my favorite ice cream flavors because it has two delicious cookie dough flavors, peanut butter and chocolate chip! All the flavors mix so well together. The flavor is also fun because Jimmy Fallon is great!

author: Ginny
title: AMAZING!
text: I bought this for the first time a couple weeks ago and now i can't stop buying it!! I love the different textures. It's definitely my new favorite!! Is this flavor going to be around awhile or is it a limited time thing?

author: sarahatoms
text: One of my favorite go to ice creams to eat! I love eating thing with some wine or on a date night as I dont eat ice cream too often but when I do, I get the tonight dough flavor! So good! I binge eat this once I open it!

author: jamiesonwhisky
text: My fav Ben and Jerrys flavor. Im not a huge ice cream fan but i do love this flavor. It is really sweet so Im only able to have like 4 bites at a time which is really random but hey i did say Im not a huge ice cream fan.

author: Vivbelle
title: Haa everything you need in an ice cream!
text: This has everything you need in a great ice cream flavor. It's like i went to an ice cream shop and had them make something special for me. I've never had a better flavor! I would add a pic, but it's all gone. So yum!

author: mainstreamdiy
text: By far my favorite flavor ice cream. However, I could do without the peanut butter flavor. Nonetheless this packaging and concept is literally everything and I tell everyone to get this anytime they have an opportunity.

author: ___thelittle1
text: By far the best ice cream I have ever tasted! The mix in this ice cream is perfection and you can’t get enough of it! It’s expensive, but when it’s on sale it worth every penny! You won’t want any other ice cream again.

author: meaghank27
text: I would die for this ice cream! Although it is on the more expensive side, it is worth it. It is rich in flavor and creamy, added with amazing snacks such as cookie dough. I would buy this ice cream over and over again.

author: Amber
title: Best ice cream ever.
text: Honestly. I hope this never goes away. It's amazing! I love the many different flavors and gobs of cookie dough and the cookie swirl and everything else. It's like the ultimate ice cream flavor. Definitely my favorite.

author: ah240
text: Not bad. I dont see it too many places. But its something that I would get like once in a blue moon isnt something Im crazy about. And there are better ice creams out there and I would only buy it if I had nothing else

author: lorim63
text: This one is ok. Nothing for me to write home about. But as an avid Ben and Jerrys lover, I felt this one to be a bit lacking. Still tasty which is why I gave it 3 stars instead of less. I still love you Ben and Jerry!

author: aarond765d
text: The tonight dough is to die for! If you love ice cream and chocolate this is your pint. I would post pictures if I would of resisted eating it in time. Alittle more pricier than others but worth the extra investment!

author: sierrasaxhet
text: This is my FAVORITE ice cream in the world. So many insane flavors and dough inside. I try not to buy to often but when Im feeling down or its that time of the month that whole thing is downed in 10 minutes . Love!

author: katelynf5822
text: This ice cream quite literally captures the essence of what I call desert! I love cookie dough in any desert, and this is quite perfect! I have tried many other flavors and I have decided that this is my favorite!

author: as85
text: I think these ice cream individually packaged are expensive. This flavor is not my favorite at all. I dont think it is worth the money spent. You can get a lot more ice cream with a lot better options for cheaper.

author: muppethans
text: One of my favorite ice cream flavors ever. Usually my go to Ben and Jerrys. I love anything with cookie dough and this one is delicious. So good I usually eat the whole thing in one sitting. Definitely recommend!!

author: MBring04
title: PB Heaven
text: I am obsessed with this. The chunks of cookie dough and peanut butter make this so amazing. Just the perfect amount of everything swirled into one amazing pint. Plus it's Jimmy Fallon, so how can you not love it!

author: alissabe874
text: this is the best flavor that Ben and Jerrys has to offer, its filled with all of these chucks, and perfect if your treating yourself, only thing is I wish they had healthier options since its so high in calories

author: britdric
text: Another great flavor from Ben and Jerrys! The peanut butter cookie dough isnt my favorite so I dont get this one anymore. Only downfall to Ben and Jerrys is the price but youre paying for quality to some degree.

author: laurent76
text: You cannot go wrong with any of the Ben and Jerrys flavors. They are all delicious and extremely satisfying. Their flavor filled bites make a little go a long way. I am a huge fan of them and their social@stance

author: vanessagkelly
text: My go to ice cream when I want to mix it up from vanilla. Its not too much chocolate. Just enough and has the crunchy chips and perfect bite sizes of cookie dough too. Pint size is perfect! Love this ice cream!

author: mykaelasc3e5
text: Wonderful, delicious ice cream for when your just binge watching Netflix and you just want to have a night to yourself! This ice cream has such great flavor combos that allows you to just fall in love with it!

author: ridasaqib7
text: I really like this brand. It tastes natural and creamy. Smooth and crunchy ice cream. Very delicious. The texture is thick and just perfect. The prices are reasonable and can buy it from any store. Recommended

author: dthulin_
text: This is my favorite ice cream in the world. It has such a good flavor and texture. It is a little pricey compared to other ice cream brands at the grocery store but is definitely worth the extra dollar or two.

author: maybeamakeupaddict
text: This is one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys ice creams. It is a wonderful option for cookie dough lovers who want something a little more interesting or different. I definitely recommend purchasing this flavor.

author: legse
text: Ur not gonna get anything but 5 stars for 99% of Ben and Jerrys flavors and this one really delivers. It has huge chunks of cookies and brownie ... what more could you ask for ?? I would highly recommend this

author: Ryguy
title: Best ice cream I've ever had in my 33 years...
text: Duuuuuuuude! It sounded a little over the top with all l the cookies, but this is by far the best. Jimmy Fallon must have sold his soul to the devil to have come up with this devilish concoction... well done!

My absolute favorite flavor. I love the mix between the different flavors in it. I cant think of anything that would improve this flavor. I buy this all the time, I would definitely recommend this to others!

author: xzarial
text: This ice cream is the perfect size for you and a friend to share its yummy and doesnt melt fast the flavors really come through with its creamy goodness it is an affordable price and overall I purchase again

author: jordanl84d3
text: The Tonight Dough is my absolute favorite ever! I could eat this all day everyday. I have to limit myself though because there are a lot of calories in this ice cream. Its so hard not to eat the whole pint.

author: baileyr8
text: If I could rate this 20 stars I would. THIS IS LIFE CHANGING FLAVOR! The cookie bits? Chewy, decadent, wow factor. The swirls? Rich, sugary goodness. The ice cream? Picturesque Jay Gatsby-esque luciousness.

author: avad12
text: I have purchased this a couple of times. It captures a mix of ingredients that just make the perfect combination which is really hard to describe. My only complaint is that the cookie dough is really big.

author: kristens79
text: Love this ice cream! I love the cookie dough chunks and cookie crumble. Yum! This is a little expensive for what you get, but I love getting it to not share with anyone. Its a fun personal size. Its yummy!

author: skylakea01
text: Literally addicted to this flavor. The cookie crumbles throughout are something great that I look forward to . Im not a big fan of peanut butter so I do wish the cookie was a diff flavour but still great.

author: Jen Berry
title: What up Dough!
text: Despite Jimmy Fallon's betrayal of Jay Leno to get the Tonight Show gig, I gave this one a try. WOW!! One of my favorites! I'm praying for the day Conan O'Brien dethrones Jimmy & we get a #TeamCoco flavor

author: simrenb
text: I love this ice cream flavor. It has every thing a chocolate lover dreams of: choc ice cream, choc cookie swirls, choc chip cookie dough, AND peanut butter cookie dough. Absolutely brilliant, *chefs kiss*

author: typical tor
title: The Perfect Cream
text: This is the perfect cream of the ice variety. The only thing that could possibly make it better would be to add brownie bites and/or peanut butter cups but that might be overkill with the toppings. 10/10.

author: LisaK
title: Probably my favorite ice cream of all time.
text: And I have tried a lot of ice cream flavors. This ice cream flavor is dang near perfect, please whatever you do, never get rid of this flavor. I was a fan of half baked for years, but this is EVEN BETTER.

author: miriuhhh
text: This is such a good flavour from the Ben and Jerrys ... line? Haha. Its so delicious and such a treat. The texture and craziness of the ice cream is unmatched to other brands. I could eat this every day!

author: siennag0b68
text: It has to be one for my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavors! The cookie dough with the crunchy cookie swirl. Chocolate and vanilla ice cream really top notch but you really can only except the best from B&J

author: MK2730
title: Best flavor I've ever had
text: This is just amazing! It incorporates all my favorite flavors without being overwhelming - vanilla, chocolate, peanut butter and cookie dough. Honestly probably the best ice cream flavor I have ever had!

author: ticketsforfive
text: Yum! Im not a huge fan of chocolate ice cream but this is so good because of all the other goodies mixed in with it. Ben and Jerrys are some of my favs bc I love the size, I dont mind trying new flavors.

author: indiap6002
text: I am such a freaking fan of Ben and berries ice cream they are just so yummy Aarhus texture full. The flavors are just amazing! My personal favorites are brownie batter, half baked and the tonight dough!

author: isobeldm
text: This ice cream is the best! I love cookie dough and Ben and Jerrys quality of ice cream no matter which flavor you pick up is gonna make you taste buds explode! But the cookie dough one is just heavenly

author: Jess08
title: Just so good
text: Honestly the best ice cream you can buy in the frozen food aisle. After this no other ice cream that claims to have chunks of cookie dough will do. Y'all set the bar super high with this one. Nice job!!

Best ice cream ever. I'm a sucker for cookie dough and this is filled with it. The ice cream has a smoothe texture and filled with mix ins. The only downside is that this ice cream and very expensive.

author: idks
text: This is such a good midnight snack! I always get it. Its one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavors. Its a bit pricey but its on sale a lot. Its also such a good splurge. The flavors combine very well.

I love this product, it is one of my favorites. This product takes the best out of other products and combines them. I would not change anything about this product. I would recommend this to everyone.

author: daablauren
text: I am not a sweets personal but ice cream is my GUILTY pleasure. This is by far my favorite. It has chocolate and cookie dough and peanut butter and all the good things. I wish I didnt like it so much

author: 77_cupcake_77
text: So yummy!! When I have a sweets craving I have a few spoonfuls of this ice cream, ok ok I usually eat like half the jar haha i am a huge Ben and Jerrys fan and this is just one of my many favourites

author: abbys51
text: This is hands down one of my favorite ice creams. It is so decadent and delicious. It is a bit pricey, but it's sooo good. I will buy this again and again. It will satisfy your sweet tooth for sure.

author: teddyandlaur
text: This ice cream falls in the treat your self category. If you like love chocolate chip cookie dough and are craving peanut butter too, this should be the flavor you reach for on the freezer section.

author: staceyr6
text: One of my most favorite ice creams! Has a little bit of everything and definitely satisfies all your sweet cravings. Perfect for that time of the month. A little pricey but definitely worth the buy

author: allysonp8
text: This has quickly become a favorite in our household. The different flavors and textures work together nicely and we have to make ourselves put it away before we eat it all in one sitting! Must try!

author: nicolel36
text: I love Ben and Jerrys! Its a little pricey but its sooo good! This is my absolute favorite flavor. Its full of cookie dough and brownie bits, and the vanilla chocolate swirl is great for any mood!

author: Purple77
title: My #2 favorite by a tiny margin!
text: So delicious, I have a hard time stopping myself from eating the whole thing. The chocolatey crunchy swirl stuff is simply amazing, andas I eat I hope to get some in every bite. Sooooo yummmmy!

author: kierraapratt
text: This is the best flavor of Ben and Jerrys! Not only is their ice cream perfectly creamy and decadent but the brand is active in speaking up for injustices that are taking place in todays society!

author: ashleyr55555
text: I love this ice cream. I have not been able to find an ice cream that I like better. I personally would change the fact it has peanut butter. But other than that it's perfect. Overall I would re

author: livaukerman
text: THE BEST ICE CREAM EVER!! It has both peanut butter cookie dough and chocolate chip cookie dough with delicious chocolate cookie swirls. Its hands down the absolute best Ben & Jerry flavor ever.

author: lizzi05
title: Love this so much!
text: I've been in love with Ben and Jerry's ever since I tasted my first bite. My first bite of Ben and Jerry's was The Tonight Dough. I fell in love with it ever since! In my opinion it is the best!

author: pilargomesf
text: My favorite ice cream of all times, I love the cookie dough pieces in it. Is very affordable compared to similar brands, and is just delicious. Ive been a consumer, and I will be buying it again

author: vv21
title: This Ice Cream Flavor Is Life Changing
text: Seriously, I had this ice cream flavor for the first time two weeks ago and I have bought it 10 times since. It is so good and I cannot stop eating it. I hope they never get rid of this flavor.

author: David 456789
title: Amazing
text: It looks and sounds like a kitchen sink type of flavor, but it works. It is so good. both times i went to the store i was lucky enough to grab the last tub left on the shelf. I cant get enough.

author: haleigho1
text: I love this ice cream! Cookie dough is my weakness and this cookie dough ice cream is no joke. Its so dang good. Whenever I get this ice cream I never want to share because it is just so good!
Another amazing Ben & Jerry's flavor! Recommend this flavor to everyone! It's got a little bit of everything that makes amazing ice cream. Plus it's inspired by Jimmy Fallon! We love that guy!

author: Lyssa136
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER!
text: This is one of the best ice cream flavors ever! I'm so in love with this flavor that I had to search every store until I found it again! I buy two every time I find it!! Please keep making it!

author: morganh7289
text: This is my all-time favorite ice cream. Creamy, chunky, sweet, savory. It is the best and I can eat a whole pint in a sitting. Love that every bite is a little different. Will always recommend

author: klhammell
text: These are amazing. I love The Tonight Dough pints but always end up eating way too much. You look down and the pint is gone. These are great for portion control. Plus its covered in chocolate!

author: samanthao56
text: You can never go wrong with Ben & Jerrys flavor, but this is my go to always it never fails to fulfill my sweet tooth! I would recommend this to anybody when trying a flavor of Ben & Jerrys!

author: Alan
title: Hate Jimmy Fallon but love this ice cream!
text: I'm a big chunky monkey guy but this is one of your best. And the fact the money goes to charity is even better. Why couldn't you name this after the Roots. You know Quest? loves this stuff!

author: mindyybraga
text: This is my ultimate favorite ice cream flavor! Heaven bless ben and jerry's for creating this flavor with jimmy fallon. All of the cookies are combined in this flavor and it's simply amazing

author: beck35
title: SO AMAZING
text: this is my favorite ice cream. whenever i’m down, i eat this and it makes me feel so much better. the flavors come together just perfectly, and i will never stop buying this ice cream. 15/10

author: lcook23
title: BEST ICE CREAM YOU WILL EVER EAT IN YOUR LIFE
text: Just buy the ice cream. Honestly. It is so good. Everyone I’ve ever talked to about Ben and Jerry’s ice cream says this is their favorite and I’m sure it will be yours too after you try it.

author: zoek8
text: I love Ben and Jerrys Ive cream. My go to flavor is the chocolate chip cookie dough. There are so many amazing flavors to choose from. I definitely recommend trying this brand of ice cream.

author: emilya352b
text: Best ice cream, my personal favourite is the half baked but this is a second hands down. They dont rip you off of chocolate chunks peanut butter chunks but they do over do it. Its the best

author: hayleyf4
text: Ben & Jerrys always keeps it interesting. You get a different bite every time. The tonight dough has been a recent flavor of mine. Although it is kind of pricey.... it doesnt keep me away!

author: tanisha
title: best flavour yet!
text: this is my favourite ice cream! i bought it 2 weeks ago for the first time and i always pick some up when I'm grocery shopping! never stop making this flavour ... its beyond delicious!!!!

author: kroulina
text: I bought that for me and my mom, we didn’t like much, I think we were expecting more of this as we love other brands (same flavor). I felt a little bit of coffe and not much of chocolate.

author: Amberlesque
title: Thank Jimmy Fallon
text: This by far the best I've had although many flavors are extremely good the tonight dough is the best, thus far I am hooked... thank You Jimmy Fallon for your late night contribution...

author: AnnaT
title: The perfect cookie dough ice cream
text: I love the flavors of the cookie dough and the combination of the ice cream are a perfect match. I used to like Half Baked, but I'm not a fan of chocolate chips. I love this ice cream.

author: memberd23bb
text: This is my favorite ice cream. It is basically the only ice cream I will eat. If they ever discontinue this specific flavor or whatever you want to call it I do not know what I will do
Ben & Jerrys flavors are all fantastic and theres so much variety to choose from. Plus, theyre a great company that does a lot of impressive work on social issues. Worth all the money.

author: stoneyr
text: Love love love this ice cream! Loaded with stuff! Flavor is so good! Very affordable! No need to improve the ice cream :) very delicious! Not disappointing! I highly recommend this :)
Ben and Jerrys Ice cream is so good! Like its so delicious. Definitely my favorite brand of ice cream. They have so many delicious flavors and this one is one of my personal favorites

author: dkuhl
text: Love the combo of this ice cream! So good and so flavorful! I have bought this on multiple occasions and enjoy it every time. Its affordable and worth every penny. I would recommend!

author: sammy loves icecream
title: my favorite flavor ever!
text: so i tried this for the first time over the summer and i literally have my mom buy it every time we go to the store. it’s had just the right amount of the cookie dough and ice cream

author: michfluenster
