text: Bought this when I was craving a new chocolatey ice cream & it did not disappoint, Ben & Jerrys is a bit expensive for my liking but when they go on sale, its definitely worth it!

author: vibewbai
text: This ice cream is really good. It has brownie chunks and peanut butter cookie chunks with vanilla and chocolate. I gave this 3 stars because it had a lil too much chocolate for me

author: marisar12
text: You can't go wrong with Ben and Jerrys ice cream and this flavor is among the best flavors they have my only criticism is that I will they would make this one in their vegan line

author: kamilleleigh
text: This is my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry's! It is amazingly good. I highly recommend buying it if you haven't. It is kinda pricey but really worth it compared to other brands.

author: lovelymeggs
text: These things are amazing! I love everything about these. So much chocolate and the outer chocolate shell makes it perfect. Again these are kind of pricy so I dont get them often.

author: Erik
title: Please tell me this isn't for a limited time only!
text: For the love of everything holy, please tell me this wasn't a limited run. I got hooked on this amazing flavor and now I can't find it anywhere! This ice cream is the bomb!!!!!

author: sarahm3
text: Honestly, I really g day not think you can go wrong with any Ben and Jerrys ice cream. The ice cream is rich and creamy and the toppings are perfectly added in with every bite.

author: kellyc187
text: The Tonight Dough is so delicious. The peanut butter dough balls surprise you and are so awesome. It has chocolate chip and peanut butter dough pieces, and chocolate crunchies.

author: Tierra
title: Favourite all time ice cream
text: There will be days where I just need a good pint of Tonight Dough. It never fails and always does the trick!! <3 <3 it's my favourite ice cream and is the best of all worlds!!

author: evaz5
text: Wow this ice cream is amazing! There are so many amazing ingredients and they all go really well together. It is super creamy, affordable, and amazing! I would recommend this!

author: laurens260
text: This is my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. Its just so good. The cookie dough chunks are the best. The only issue with it is trying to not eat the entire pint in one sitting.

author: ronnideann
text: Ive tried multiple different flavors of Ben and Jerrys but I keep coming back to The Tonight Dough. It has the perfect amount of chocolate chip and peanut butter cookie dough.

author: lindsayj3239
text: THIS IS MY FAVORITE!! I love this as a treat, not keen on keep large amounts of ice cream in the house, so I love the little pints of Ben & Jerrys & this flavor is the BOMB!!

author: tarynananthony
text: So delicious it's so bad but yet too good to say no to. I love how many different kinds they have to try . These aren't go to ice cream. Love wit when they go on sale deals

author: Rosie
title: Love it
text: I love it. Bought it earlier today and it’s great! A bit too sweet for me but I would recommend someone to get this. Even though it’s a bit sweet for me, this is my favorite

author: meltargaryen
text: This is one of my favorite flavors of ice cream - I once had my friend take out all the dough in this ice cream to attempt to bake it and it did in fact bake into a cookie.

author: adrial8697
text: Hands down the best ice cream flavor for lovers of chocolate and cookies! We go back and forth between this and Half Baked and decided this one is better by a small margin.

author: beckier3
text: You can never go wrong with Ben&Jerrys!!! Its pricey but worth every penny. Stores often have sales so it isnt too bad. Its delicious and very easy to eat the whole thing!!

author: meganh151
text: THE BEST ICE CREAM!! Big chunks of cookie dough, tasty ice cream and perfect flavors! I love the size because if you eat the whole container its not too much 10/10! Love!

author: missvanidee
text: Best Ben&Jerrys Ice Cream ever! Seriously you have to try this! The little cookie dough bits is a sweet surprise! They werent stingy too! I could eat a tub in one sitting!

author: Jamie18
title: One of my favorites!!
text: This is one of my favorites! I love everything except the peanut butter cookie dough. The peanut butter cookie dough is ok but I wouldn’t miss it if it was not in there.

author: shanpagnemarie
text: The BEST, most indulgent ice cream of all time!! This is my go to b&j flavor, its so delicious. Peanut butter, cookie dough, fudge swirls... you cant go wrong with this.

author: laurettepp
text: Really good ice cream, it is a nice desert, usually during summer time when it's really hot oustide. You have different flavour which is nice when you try something else

author: eme4usa
text: If you are craving cookie dough ice cream this is it! It has the perfect cookie dough to ice cream ratio, you dont have to dig through the pint to get the perfect bite.

author: courtneyg100
text: This is the best cookie dough ice cream you could get! As with most Ben & Jerrys ice cream, its a little pricey, so more of a treat! But its one of my favorite flavors!

author: sarahm9987
text: Every single flavour of Ben and Jerrys is to die for. Idk what secret ingredient is in these but if you havent had Ben and Jerrys before you should definitely try it!!

author: jpaiva90
text: If I could give this flavor 10 stars I would. This combination is so good. Sweet and chewy combined with the great texture of Ben and Jerry's ice cream. Cant go wrong.

author: Christina
title: Great!
text: My favorite ice cream of all time! Everything about it is delicious and perfect! I’ve always loved chocolate chip cookie dough but this takes it to a whole new level!

author: amanda_day
text: I was underwhelmed with this flavor. I was expecting BIG cookiedough flavor but it was definitely lacking. Perhaps I'm a ice cream snob or maybe I just know my stuff.

author: jessw65
text: So yummy. I wish they had this flavor in the dairy-free version but its still an occasional treat. Love the messaging Ben & Jerrys has been putting out recently too!

author: arielhasasecret
text: What a great flavor. My local corner/convenience store has these in stock. I deducted a star because its a little messy since the shell cracks when you bite into it.

author: nesmetb
text: My favorite ice cream I literally love this ice cream so much its my go to ice cream when Im upset and when Im happy and when Im just normal just because its so good

author: brandyd23
text: LOVED IT!! If you enjoy cookie dough and peanut butter and chocolate welcome to your new favorite ice cream treat!! I had make myself ration the tub its that good!

author: melissarff26
text: This is one of my favorite combos. I love anything with peanut butter and chocolate. Its very similar to like Oreo cookie and Reeces but masterfully mixed together.

author: Ceonnie02
title: Great features

author: kaylab259
text: Definitely enjoyed this ice cream, could have done without the peanut butter cookies pieces thats just me. Loved the ice cream base and regular cookie dough pieces

author: memberdf92d1bcd
text: Best Ben & Jerrys flavor ice cream! I can eat the whole tub. It has the perfect amount of mix ins and the ice cream itself is so rich. The price is reasonable too.

author: brenie
title: What happened???
text: Tonight Dough was my favorite B & J flavor til this last one. Absolutely NO chocolate swirl in the whole carton. Very disappointing. Did you change the recipe?

author: IAteTheWholeThing
title: Seriously good
text: I’ve never written a review on ice cream, but this one deserves one! Perfectly balanced cookie dough to ice cream ratio, the cookie pieces were plenty. Delicious!

author: erikav26
text: I absolutely love this ice cream. I dont know about you guys but this is the best ice cream Ive ever had. A little of everything that I love in just one spoonful.

author: emmalinemary

author: Sophie
title: Best ice cream ever!!

author: dawnnadeaulewis

author: Jen25
title: Amazing New Flavor

author: grscevirginia
title: Amazing!
text: I buy this every once in a while to treat myself and they're so amazing. Perfect if you just want a little bit of ice cream or if you're craving something cool.

author: sportslove
text: I love this ice cream so much! I love the flavor and the texture. You dont have to get this flavor though because all of Ben and Jerrys ice cream is wonderful.

author: belladoll94
text: This is my favorite B&Js flavor because I love ice cream with a lot of stuff. The price point is a little high but its worth treating yourself every now & then.

author: annwhitakermessman
text: My son's favorite! Plenty of chunks of yummy goodness! The flavors blend together nicely. He can't get enough of it and will eat the entire pint in one sitting.

author: sarabearycanny
text: This is a pretty solid offering from Ben and Jerry's. They just have other flavors that I prefer. It is definitely tasty but it's not the flavor I reach for.

author: beatrixrforkids
text: Probably my favorite B&J flavor. It is such a good mix of textures and flavors. I dont know if Jimmy Fallon had anything to do with development, but its great.

author: AliDoodle
title: i'm going to gain 100 lbs before my wedding.
text: This ice cream is amazing. I wish I was never offered to taste it because I am most definitely addicted to The Tonight Dough. It is so chocolately wonderful.

author: sarahp293
text: When Im having a cheat day or half day, this is my goto. It is everything you could want in an ice cream and more! Salty, sweet, crunchy, soft. It has it all

author: Hvfun
title: First B&J flavor I've ever liked
text:
Very good. Nothing chunky like other BJ ice cream.
Could be reason i loved it is because i waited 2 hours out of freezer before eating... Perfect smoothness

author: tanyaa5d6a
text: The Tonight Dough is one of the only flavors of Been & Jerry's that I can have, but that's ok because it's delicious. It has the perfect mix of ingredients.

author: Peg4sis
title: Awesome, I love all the ingredients!
text: Sometimes I eat this every night! I just wish it came in larger quantities, i.e., bigger than pint-sized. Because I buy 3-4 pints at a time, just in case.

author: Kgow
title: Best of the best
text: A step up from phish food and half baked the peanut butter cookie dough is the perfect way to add a small taste of PB instead of globs of overpowering PB

author: susanl34
text: This ice cream is everything!! Its the best I have ever had. I could eat it all the time. Its expensive but totally worth it. The best flavor hands down.

author: nicolinah
text: Sooooo good. My only complaint is that it has vanilla and chocolate ice cream and I wished they made something comparable with only chocolate ice cream.

author: lisas245
text: Love this ice cream and its one of my go-to flavors. Its delicious and I dont need to eat the whole thing, because it hits the sweet spot a few bites in

author: monicadnowf
text: oh god! this ice cream is the devil because it is so good. i legit have to stop myself from eating this whole thing in like seconds. it tastes so good!

author: _laurenester_
text: This is good because I live for this flavor BUT it pails in comparison to a pint of the tonight dough. If your into sandwiches then you may enjoy this.

author: katelyneca49

author: ogrose
text: Tonight dough is the best Ben and Jerrys flavor. There I said it. Not the biggest fan of jimmy fallon but he did come up with a great ice cream flavor.

author: Crw89
title: Ew

author: Sugarbliss
title: Delicious!!
text: One of the best ice creams I’ve ever had! I love the big chances of cookie dough! Once in a while I will splurge and buy a pint for myself. Delicious!

author: emmaro1397
text: Perfect mix of cookie dough and brownie batter. I love raw cookie dough and batters, which i know is not recommended. This is a delicious alternative!

author: khummel
text: This is my absolute favorite flavor and these bars sized treats are the best, they help with portion control and are packed with bits of cookie dough!

author: rhyanl2
text: This is the best flavor Ben and Jerrys has hands down. Its affordable, good ice cream. You cant go wrong. A definite win in the ice cream department.

author: kabeach87
text: By far my favorite flavor. Im a huge Jimmy Fallon fan so I had to try it when it came out. Then all the cookie dough and chocolate its just perfect.

author: christyc50

author: KatB
title: Delicious!
text: This is one of my favorite flavors! It has everything I'm looking for! Large mix-ins, a rich base, and lots of chocolate cookie swirls... so yummy!
Ben & Jerry's The Tonight Dough Ice Cream! Is AMAZING it has such a good flavour and you can really tell it's real ice cream and not "iced dessert"

author: matts86bd
text: Theres no greater ice cream or flavor than this guy! If youre counting calories keep walking. But if its deliciousness you seek, you better buy it!

author: chelbyc1
text: Ben and Jerry’s ice cream is amazing. My other downfall with it, is that it is expensive so we can only get at specific times when it goes on sale.

author: theblogista

author: Gasmanz
title: Almost Great

author: apinto

author: ndrrslbnzslrz

author: tiffanycookhm
text: This is my holy grail ice cream! I have been eating this for a year now ! I have to get it every time I go to Safeway! Very creamy and tasteful!

author: hailyann
text: I love Ben and Jerrys! I would die for Ben and Jerrys. What a gift to this world they are and their ice cream is delicious. Love them five stars

author: imairisiha

author: kaylynh1

author: teresar
text: So yummy! Ben and jerry is alway my go to@ice cream. Not your typical flavors but thats why I love about them. There is something for everyone

author: sarahl4c0a

author: angelapb797

author: phoebec14

author: carmenn
text: I love the flavor. This is a great brand i can remember since i was a kid. Their flavors are always yummy and the quality is always great.

author: jairal2

author: courtneyr33
text: Best ice cream out there. Pretty expensive for the size. But my god is it ever good! Its nice for a special treat every now and again.

author: eliz13413

author: kellys4605

author: morgancheyenne96

author: caileyw1

author: yasmeeni1

author: smburrus

author: Lindsey D
title: Best thing EVER
text:
So, I want to start off by saying my addiction to this started on my birthday 2 years ago, I was like " OH! I'll try this it sounds good." And the rest was history. This ice cream has got to be my all time favorite over all other ice creams ever, from marble creamers to mom and pop stores, large brands to small brands. ALL TIME FAVORITE! I've always been the kind of girl that's more like 'Ice Cream in my toppings,' not toppings in my ice cream. This totally hits the spot! It's like Vanilla/Chocolate ice cream with "chocolate cookie" ribbon like swirls, and chunks of both chocolate chip cookie dough and PB cookie dough. IT IS AMAZING, so amazing that when my local grocer puts it on sale by even 0.25 its sold out before any other flavor.
As to some of the reviews saying the favor changed, I think its more the retailer your buying it from. I don't get mine from Target any more b/c they let the ice cream melt a bit before they can get it stored again. I'm pretty sure that ruins it a bit b/c it mushes the flavors all up and makes things wonkie. That's probably what happened to some of you all. When i got a few like that over a couple of months the PB tasted off, not bad, just off. Kinda like switch from JIF to Skippie or whatever they are called. Either way, I'd say try this flavor if you like Ice cream with your toppings, and are a fan of cookie dough in general.

author: tonightdoughlover5
title: DELICIOUS LITERALLY THE BEST THING IN THIS WORLD
text: this ice cream singlehandedly provides me with 3 days worth of seratonin. every bite is pure joy, ecstasy, and transcends all human taste possibility. let’s get real here ladies THREE TYPES OF COOKIE DOUGH!!! and it’s not like most cookie dough ice cream where you’re eating for a while and go, “where’s the cookie dough??” NO!!! THERE IS COOKIE DOUGH IN EVERY BITE BRUH!!! the distribution of the cookie dough within the ice cream is my favorite part however, the ice cream itself is beautiful. because it’s not all chocolate it makes me feel a little better about stuffing it into my esophagus. The Tonight Dough is NOT just an ice cream it is a way of LIFE!!! in fact i have spent TWO YEARS searching for an ice cream that gives me the same RUSH as a spoonful of this heaven, alas none quite do the trick. If i had a chance to time travel i would travel back and give whomever came up with this concept for ice cream a BIG OLE SMOOCH!!! they truly outdid themselves. i no longer buy any any ANY other ice cream at stores because this is the ONLY ice cream worth eating. A song once said “I scream, you scream, we ALL scream for ice cream”. i will personally guarantee you NO SCREAM can match the pure HAPPINESS that RUSHES through my veins when i open the freezer and see jimmy fallon there. NOT because i love jimmy fallon but because of the pure adrenaline coursing through me at the thought of the cookie dough confection that is the TONIGHT DOUGHHH!!!! i now have a pavlovian response you mr fallon’s face. It causes me to salivate profusely. In all seriousness THIS IS THE BEST THING YOU WILL EVER EAT. I LOVE YOU BEN I LOVE YOU JERRY THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR THE PURE HAPPINESS!!!!! <3

author: Melisa
title: My all time favorite
text: I love the surprise in every bite! Caramel and chocolate are a marriage made in heaven!! The caramel ribbons and the caramel covered chocolate bites are sinful! This is by far my all time favorite ice cream!! I drive past 5 grocery stores that carry other Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream just to go purchase this particular flavor!

title: Life Changing Experience
text: I bought this the other night thinking there were no good flavors, and let me tell you. BEST decision of my life. I will NEVER go back. Thank you to the wonder minds who created this flavor and the hard working people who made and packaged my pint. Last but not least the kind soul who was generous enough to deliver my pint to the store I bought i from.

text: Oh boy, this flavor is the trifecta. I love it so much it's going to be the end of a waistline. Thank you B&J's!!!

author: FuzzyGut
title: So good
text: So I just polished off my first Triple Caramel Chunk and I’m very happily stuffed! The caramel ice cream, the swirl and the chocolate fudge chunks; all awesome and perfectly balanced. There is just something so enticing about pulling off the lid of a B&J pint to reveal that glassy smooth ice cream underneath, just begging to be spooned.

author: Phish Food Fan
title: A lot of happy feelings
text: This is just plain ol’ fashioned good! I love it! The caramel ice cream: great. The caramel swirl: delicious. The caramel-filled truffles: silly yummy! If you need lots of caramel flavor with several different textures (and some nice chocolate, too) as I often do, then this is the ice cream for you! It’ll put a nice big smile right on that mug of yours, and when was the last time you turned down a little extra happiness?

author: RB2020
title: Ice cream is good, but where is the caramel?
text: I would expect a flavor called "Triple Caramel Chunk" to have more of a pronounced caramel flavor. The chunks were few and far between and the caramel swirl was pretty much absent. I wanted something that looks like the picture used in your glamor shots, but got something a lot closer to plain light-brown ice cream with a vague caramel0sh taste. Nothing at all like it's advertised to be.

author: Sara H
title: Bland
text: I purchased this ice cream thinking it might tast great , reading the title, but i was very dispappointed by it!! The ice cream did not taste like caramel , infact it was tasteless. I will never purchase from ben and jerry again,coz there description does not actually match with the flavor.

author: barryf
title: where are the chunks?
text: First off, the ice cream tasted great. The problem is with the quantity of the chunks. In the pint I bought there were 4 chunks and i expected much more since many of the other great Ben and Jerry ice creams are loaded with treats. Plus I like the contrast between the ice cream and candy treats

author: AK Catherine
title: Good flavor, gritty texture.
text: I was very excited to try this flavor of ice cream, however I was saddened that the ice cream wasn't rich and creamy like Ben & Jerry's usually is. The flavor was there, but it had a gritty texture. I tried to power through but after 1/4 of the pint I gave up, I couldn't get past the texture. :(

author: EZ Doesit
title: Savor Suggestion
text: I read the review by Sara H. I recommend that she and others spoon a moderate amount of caramel from the center and with the balance of the spoon capacity, scoop a significant amount of vanilla, then allow those proportions to melt in your mouth and prepare for ecstasy.

author: Odie McGoo
title: My New Favorite
text: I recently found this at my local grocer and was a little skeptical since I like bourbon (I'm from KY so by law I have to) but I'm not a big fan of caramel. I decided to give it a try but still bought my go-to flavor, Chunky Monkey, just in case this bourbon and caramel infused ice cream wasn't my cup of tea. Despite my reservations I instantly fell in love with this ice cream and now keep a pint stocked in my freezer at all times. the caramel bourbon flavor is smooth, not to rich, and the almonds pieces pair well with the flavor and chunks of chocolate. Well done Ben & Jerry. I reall hope this flavor stays in the lineup for a long while.

author: GuiltyVargoIceCreamLover
title: Wow...omg wow!
text: It is SO good! I've been trying out new flavors instead of my stand by of chunky monkey or mint chocolate cookie. I have liked most and loved 3. But this one knocks my number one out! im not usually a Carmel fan especially the gooey kind (i usually go fudge) but wow! The only thing that I would have done differently is the nuts, i think pecans would have been in keeping with the southern theme ihis has going. But yes, I know, there is aways the pecan pie, which was just a like in my book.

author: ksgirl79
title: Yum!
text: On a particularly lonely Sunday while I was shopping I decided to grab my normal flavor "Everything But The..." to give myself a little treat. Then I saw this flavor staring at me. Carmel, Almonds, and Bourbon oh my! SOLD! I hurried thru dinner so I could rip open the container to get my first spoonful. Its creamy burnt carmel taste hit me first and I couldn't stop. The almonds and chocolate made for great trio of flavor but then it happened... I hit the bourbon carmel center. Oh my goodness my mouth waters just thinking of it. I promptly took a pic and sent it to several friends telling them to find some for themselves right away. Thank you B&J for yet another addiction.

author: Ja_Ja_jason
title: OMG!!
text: Yet another amazing flavor to come out of the Ben & Jerry's flavor laboratory. I had to hide it from the wife so she wouldn't eat mine.

author: Sweettooth
title: Disappointed
text: I normally love B&J, even if I don't love a flavor I try, I can still appreciate it. But not this time. First of all, the almonds are like flavorless splinters. The bourbon swirl tastes like bananas. And generally I like ice cream with chunks in it, but this was so overrun you can't even enjoy the ice cream. I'm whining about it because B&J might want to count the votes when deciding whether to keep making this flavor. I'm sure lots of people will try it, but I doubt you'll get a lot of repeat customers. But thanks for making such awesome ice cream (aside from this) and by the way my boyfriend LOVES your chocolate cherry Garcia. I do to. Hope you'll keep making it!

author: bikelvrgirl
title: FABULOUS
text: This flavor is simply not your ordinary ice cream. I enjoy a good helping of Boom Chocolatta Cookie Core now and then, but sometimes I just don't feel like something super sweet and chocolate-y. This flavor has a little bit of everything. Chunks: check. Sweetness: check. Saltiness: check. Rich, dark undertones of something mysterious: check. I love the balance of the darker, rich flavors with the salty, sweet flavors. This is the BEST! All I can say is, they better not ever get rid of it! It's addicting!

author: Curlysea87
title: Yum yum yum!!
text: I was a little worried about buying a new flavor because I have bought a few lately that I haven't liked and I didn't want to be let down again. But my favorite flavor is no longer available so I took a risk on this one and boy am I glad. I can't put my spoon down! The almonds, fudge flakes and caramel swirl dance in your mouth and while sometimes you get a bit of the bourbon taste it is not overpowering! Great work guys!!

author: Nance
title: Just what I needed!
text: So happy my husband got this for me to try! He knows I love bourbon. I really love this flavor! I think u did it just right! Don't think I will share this pint. Maybe the next one. Which there will b plenty of because this is hands down my new favorite!!!! I am not a huge fan of caramel either so I was a little skeptical. But this is the perfect blend of the caramel and the almonds and the chocolate and the bourbon flavor all together. Yummmmmmmmm Nice job <3

author: One For the Road
title: To many nuts
text:
I bought this yesterday thinking I would try a 'new' flavor for Sunday dessert. I returned it today minus the spoon or two letting me know this is not a flavor for me. The first spoon was so overrun with almond 'bits' that I could not get a good taste of the ice cream. The second spoon did not prove any better. Needless to say I did not make it to the 'swirl' before deciding it had to be returned.
This was the first time I shook my head in wonder at a B&J product (wondering who came up with this; how did it make it to market as a B&J product).

author: Evan
title: I really want to like it, but I can't...
text: I love Ben & Jerry's, and I've never been disappointed by a flavor until now. The burnt caramel is pretty unpleasant and the bourbon is definitely lacking. The almonds killed it for me though. After each bite the ice cream was long gone and I was still chewing up an unnecessary amount of almonds. After about six spoonfuls I couldn't take it anymore and had to scoop myself some store-brand vanilla to get the taste out of my mouth. Sorry Ben & Jerry, I love you guys but this flavor is not for me. I'll stick to my Phish food.

author: Arianna
title: Disappointed :(
text: I was bugging my mom about how much I wanted Ben & Jerry's so when my mom took me to the store I was staring at the frozen doors drooling and I was looking at all the flavors and my usual "half baked" wasn't there so I grabbed Urban bourbon because it sounded delicious!! I went home and started eating it and it didn't have any flavor, all it tasted like was coldness overwhelmed by the tiny almond shreds. The only pleaseant part about this ice cream was the Carmel swirls. I wish I bought the bob Marley ice cream !! But I still love Ben & Jerry's no hate

author: Ashley547
title: The best Ice cream I have ever had!
text: My stepmom first introduced me to this flavor of Ice cream, and after my first taste I fell in love. I’ve been buying this flavor for about a year I think now and it never gets old! Recently I’ve heard some rumors saying that the Urban Bourbon flavor is going to be discontinued? Since I’ve heard that, I’ve been buying 3-4 tubs of it every time I go to the grocery store. I know there are thousands and maybe even millions of reviews out there, but if you happen to stumble across mine I would like to ask...could you could possibly keep Urban Bourbon as a permanent flavor? Thank you Ben and Jerry!

author: BigT03
title: More Bourbon
text:
I think Ben and Jerry ice cream is a superior ice cream to most. When I saw urban bourbon I was really excited to combine 2 of my favorite things. I tried 2 pints, and neither had much of a bourbon flavor to them. The little bits of bourbon that I did get were very good, would have been nice to have more of it
I would have hoped for the price of a pint, the flavor would have better matched the name, feel a little taken.

author: Sharon2802
title: OMG -- my new favorite since Dublin Mudslide
text: I instantly got addicted to this new flavor. I've been sad about Dublin Mudslide going to the graveyard for years, but I may have just found something at least equally good. Yes, it's sweet (caramel swirls), but not as sweet as any of the 'core' pints or Phish food that I do not like at all. Urban Bourbon is such a delicious combination of flavors! With the crunchy almonds, and chocolat bits it is really perfect to me. Chillin' the Roast and New York Super Fudge (one of my go-to's) seemed bland after Urban Bourbon.

author: bingobungo
title: The Best Caramel Ice Cream Flavor
text: The ice cream is what counts - all the extras thrown in aren't going to compensate for ice cream with no flavor. This ice cream has a complex, full bodied, intense caramel/bourbon taste and is loaded with flavor notes. The thick dark chocolate flakes and almond bits accent the flavor. This was excellent - so much better than the grainy flavorless taste of the coconuts for caramel flavor. I love it.

author: Traumatized by Bourbon
title: Had me gagging!
text: The flavor sounds great in theory but it seems like it's a challenge to make consistent flavoring and distribution of ingredients. My point contained too much of a large center swirl of bourbon that was overly sweet and had me gagging. I couldn't even enjoy the perimeter and ended up tossing the entire pint before guzzling almost a liter of water! Definitely has kinks that need to be worked out.

author: stupidhobbits1
title: Tasty but there's no alcohol
text: I love the flavor and texture but was a littke annoyed when i did some research and found there wasn't any real alcohol in it even though it lists whisky as one of the ingridients. Was hoping to at least get a little buzz but was disapointed. Thought it was ice cream for grown ups but i guess not.

author: JunypersDream
title: Spectacular!! Hits the spot!
text:
I haven't eaten ice cream in months-trying to get into a health kick-but I saw this and didn't think twice before grabbing it up to by it guilt free. I am obsessed with bourbon-one of the only liquors worth drinking-so seeing an ice cream with it made my day.
If you make it into a milkshake you get more of the bourbon flavor even distributed!
Totally need to buy more!

author: Youshouldtrustme
title: Yuuuuummm
text:
New favorite.
If it goes, I go too!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

author: clarione
title: My FAVORITE!
text: This has all the flavors and textures I love do when I tried it, it was perfection! Unfortunately, I can no longer find it in grocery stores :(

author: jules23
title: FAVORITE FLAVOR EVER - But so hard to find :(
text: I found this flavor a few years ago and have loved it ever since! Unfortunately it is EXTREMELY hard to find in stores.

author: Mdmom
title: Alcohol in it?
text: So far so good, but I just wanted to know if it had alcohol in it? My son wants to try it lol

author: Red66climb
title: Extraordinary, delicious and worth dying for.
text: The store was out of Chunky Monkey, but when I saw this I had to try it. I never expected it would be my new favorite. I have actually doubled my ice cream consumption because of it.

author: itisb4me
title: Excellent move Ben&Jerry's
text: Ever since Heathbar was removed from your ingredients, I have been searching for a new favorite icecream. The replacement toffee just wasn't the same. Well I can say that I am glad I remained loyal because this is my new favorite icecream. This could definitely be the difference for me :)

author: Paxeth
title: nice combination of flavors
text: despite the name there is no "alcoholy" flavors. the base ice cream is delicate, the fudge chunks are rich in flavor as always, I wish there was a bit more almonds in it though as you don't get nuts in every bite and I LOVE almonds but the creamy caramel swirl smoothed me over. delicious!

author: Casey k
title: Best Ever!!!
text: I purchased this a few days ago and now I'm hooked! This is my FAVORITE ice cream! I used to go to Bruster's a lot to buy ice cream but this one puts everything they have to shame! Thanks so much for this wonderful new flavor and I hope you keep this one on the market!!! :)

author: Suzanne
title: I will never know
text: Let me begin by saying that I am a serious B&J fan, lately consuming whole pints in a day. Unfortunately, as far as this flavor is concerned, epileptics like me don’t dare try it because of the whiskey (even in tiny amounts, alcohol is a very potent seizure trigger). A recovering alcoholic friend of mine said the same thing, that it could trigger a craving that could undo all his work. Delicious ice cream is not a good reason to spend a night in the hospital. Assurances from B&J isn’t enough, folks, how about an alcohol-free version? (I don’t even like bourbon very much, but a gin-flavor will probably do me in, LOL.)

author: Chenson
title: Awesome taste!!
text: I am loving the new flavors. By far this ia my favorite. im not big on chocolate in my ice cream so i was skeptical on this flavor. To my surprise its perfect! Tiny little flakes and perfect amount of almonds. The bourbon taste is spot on not to overwhelming but noticable.

author: handerson286
title: So yum!
text: Just found this in the freezer at my in-laws' and I gave it a try. Usually caramel is so sweet in ice cream but this was unlike anything I've had before. The balance of flavor was perfect. The chocolate flakes and almonds were plentiful in every bite. Highly recommended!

author: Brodiecat
title: Addiction in a pint
text: This stuff is amazingly good. And addictive. I chose this new flavor on a whim, not to my boyfriends liking. He is now addicted. I agree, it's probably a new favorite. But he can't stop eating it... Great blend of flavors. Whoever came up with this needs an award.

author: Jodi143
title: Mmmm Sultry
text: My absolute favorite. My local stores aren't selling this anymore! I'm so sad.

author: stezeph
title: Amazing
text:
I don't understand some of the not so great reviews...I'm not even a fan of ice cream without a lot of chocolate in it...but this...wow...What an awesome difference from something totally chocolate.
Go for it. Can't miss with this. YUM.

author: Yvonne
title: Perfection!
text: I tried this flavor when it arrived on the shelves at my grocery store. I am HOOKED!! The amount of almonds and chocolate chunks pairs exactly with the burnt caramel and bourbon. I can't imagine a more perfect icecream!!!!

author: Bostbosox
title: Addicted!!
text: Can't get enough! Love it. The burnt caramel base flavor is awesome, almonds and fudge the perfect mix ins, but the whiskey flavor is the straw that stirs the drink. Awesome

author: jessh
title: Not your typical ice cream fix
text: I bought this flavor on a whim one time when stocking up on my most recent favorite the Tonight Dough. I was shocked, the burnt caramel flavor mixed with chocolate and bourbon flavors was an instant hit the minute it hit my taste buds. I am normally a chocolate ice cream kind of gal through and through. But this was sooo good and different from anything I had ever had and it still cured that sweet tooth of mine. I've already bought this several more times and introduced it to so many friends who love it as well! In this case change is a good thing!!

author: Ima Scooper
title: Soooo Happy!!!
text: While I still mourn the passing of Tennessee Mud long ago my new boozy ice cream headache fix is Urban Bourbon. It's a fun mix of sweet, burnt and boozy!

author: Mary44429
title: Yum
text: I was so excited to try this and i love it. Probably because it Has all my favorite things in it- nuts, caramel, bourbon. Mmm :)

author: Phish Food Fan
title: Different and really good
text: I had this one once and didn’t like it, but I wanted to give it another chance and bought it again, and I’m glad I did. It’s really actually quite good when it gets a little melty. The ice cream flavor itself is somewhat subtle and the fudge chunks are really great. The bourbon caramel swirl is delicious! I will definitely buy this flavor again.

author: Icecream fan
title: Delicious
text: Just ate this for breakfast. Great way to start the day. Not being sarcastic

author: KellyDEN
title: Love it!
text: LOVE this flavor. Ben & Jerry's knocked it out of the ballpark. I picked this up at the grocery store because it's new and I like caramel. When I got home I attempted to take a taste of it and ended up eating half the pint! I love the unique bourbon and caramel flavors and the crunch of the chocolate and almonds.

author: Dejota
title: If I could give zero stars
text: If I could give zero stars, I would. I love Bourbon but this ice cream was gross. I got barely a quarter of a pint done and had to throw it out. Luckily I went out the next night and found gen and jerry's One Love and that made up for it.

author: Tinkerbelle
title: I'm so addicted!!
text:
After trying this ice cream nothing can compare..no other flavors, not gelato, nothing!! I cannot eat just a scoop. Once I start eating it the next thing you know I'm at the bottom of the container. Only thing that would make this better is a larger size container!!
The last two times I went in my Kroger the shelf was empty..no Urban Bourbon! Today when I went they had a sign saying it was on closeout. I bought all 8 containers they had. Please Ben & Jerry's don't send this flavor to the graveyard!!!

author: Puck
title: Too much burnt flavor
text: I wanted to love this flavor. EVERYTHING in the ingredients were things that I liked individually. Except... the 'burnt caramel ice cream'. All I can taste is that burnt flavor, sadly, and it overwhelms everything else. I understand wanting to try a combination that isn't so sweet in every aspect... but sadly, the burnt aspect of it drowns out the other elements to the point I can't taste anything else in much the same respect that several of their coffee flavored iced creams do for me. A shame.

author: Paul55
title: No distinct flavor
text: I bought this for my husband who loves anything bourbon flavored. He couldn't wait to try it and was very disappointed. He said it had no flavor at all that he could tell, it was just overly sweet. There was certainly no flavor of bourbon.

author: Nannerama
title: What I've been looking for!
text: I just bought this tonight and am happily surprised. I have been going from flavor to flavor and brand to brand looking for just the right chunky and carmelly combo. And the bourbon is the cherry on top! Thank you for making the best out there.

author: Kimberly
title: It's OK
text: It's fine, but it didn't wow me. The flavors are all just too muted, for some reason. But, it was 90 degrees in the city today, so I'm not too unhappy about it. I'm just glad I have ice cream to cool me down.

author: Pattynoone
title: Very out of the ordinary!
text: This has everything I look for in an ice cream, but more! I've never had this flavor of ice cream. My only complaint is, I actually think it has too many almonds! But that's better than having too few!

author: LadyD
title: A tweak could make it better
text: This ice cream is ok. I think if it was made with salted caramel and a few less almonds it would be great. The bourbon swirls are tasty. I was a little disappointed in this flavor.

author: Beekeeni
title: Too sweet and too burnt
text: At about the second bite, on top of the extreme sweetness, there's a strong overly "toasty" taste. I felt that they overplayed the burnt caramel. At least there's soft notes of nuttiness at the end.

author: Aj_mac
title: Masterpiece of flavor
text: This one is a keeper, so good. The bourbon and the caramel go together so well. Almonds come through too. Chocolate chunks should be smaller.

author: Radzach
title: Nothing special
text: I love ben and jerry's however i was not a fan on this. I didnt taste much bourbon and did not enjoy the "burnt caramel"

author: Karinalyn
title: Meh
text: I wanted to like this one but it is missing something.

author: Cerie
title: Please keep this one!
text: This is my absolute favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor. I'm worried with some of the negative reviews that this flavor might get pulled, but please don't! I don't really understand some of the other reviews that are basically calling for this to be pulled from the shelves because some of the flavors are more unique. Everyone has different tastes, and I'm sure they would be perfectly satisfied with something like triple caramel chunk, why does that mean urban bourbon has to go? Part of the reason I love Ben and Jerry's is because they have more creative flavors than the typical chocolate, vanilla, caramel etc. you find with other brands. There's nothing wrong with liking basic caramel and cookie dough flavors, they're a classic for a reason, but I don't understand why everything on the market has to fit into that cookie cutter mold.

author: Dawnatella
title: Is 2.5 an option?
text: Omit the almonds and this would be a 4.5! The almonds are tiny and get in the way. The hinder the flavor. I like when ice cream is smooth going down. Now it feels grainy. The flavor otherwise is good and the bourbon caramel is amazing. The chocolate is slightly too dry. I think they need to use the phish food fudge recipe instead.

author: Reese
title: Great flavors, but...
text: Bought a pint 3 days ago, love the flavors, but the almonds are too finely chopped for me, they get stuck in the corners of the mouth & in between teeth. I found myself focusing on trying to avoid the annoying almond pieces (impossible) instead of really enjoying the great taste of the ice cream, fudge, & bourbon Carmel swirl.

title: Sooooooo goood!
text: My wife brought this home. She drinks bourbon, I do not. This is by FAR our favorite flavor ice cream! Even though I don't drink, you can really taste the bourbon in the caramel. But it's not a bitter alcohol taste. And the dark chocolate chips are the perfect sweet/bitter combination to compliment the burnt caramel and bourbon. Not too overly sweet like most ice cream. I really hope this flavor is around for a really long time!

author: Dana
title: Disappointed
text: I usually love Ben & Jerrys but I was disappointed with this one. Everything in the ice cream including the bourbon flavor had actually sank to the bottom of the container. So 95% of it was basically pretty blah tasting and the other 5% was overwhelming, which of course you couldn't eat.

author: Ice cream maven
title: It's mine!
text: I was standing in front of the refrigerator debating over what flavor ice cream to get when Urban Bourbon caught my eye. I love alcohol flavored sweets and warned the family that they might have to get their own pint. "It has caramel" they said "You don't like caramel" but it's Ben & Jerry's I replied. They didn't listen and now they wish they had because this perfectly blended flavor frenzy is only mine!

author: laurie
title: My first taste of Ben & Jerry's
text: So my first taste of Ben & Jerry's was Urban Bourbon ice cream. I ate the whole thing in one sitting! I have tried to say away from it because it is soooo good and I have no will power to put it down. Luckily for me the stores around me have stopped carrying this flavor but, I still look for it when I am out shopping. I know if I happen to come across it again it will be coming home with me.

author: Andres
title: tastes so good!
text: my coworker has been raving about this ice cream for a while now and she really described the flavor well enough to make me want to try it so i did...and it was awesome! loved how many and how big the chocolate chunks are and the flavor of that ice cream to match the caramel. and the nuts are a nice texture combined with it all. awesome new flavor, will definitely be buying more in the future

author: belhud
title: Just okay...
text: Just tried your new flavor, it's just okay, not my cup of tea. I didn't get any bourbon flavor at all, would have been better with roasted almonds, way too many fudge "chunks". Still a B&J fan though!

author: CrabbyTater85
title: Such a surprise!
text: My husband bought this flavor and made the mistake of leaving it unattended for a few days. I honestly didn't have high hopes based on the flavor description, but then I tried it and wow! Definitely my new favorite flavor! I thought all of the elements worked really well together and felt that the "burnt " caramel flavor wasn't overwhelming like I had initially feared. Great work!

author: Saucydragonfly
title: its My favourite flavour and I’m a connoisseur!
text: This is absolutely my favourite Ben and Jerry’s flavour...I can’t tell you how mn\any pints of this I’ve packed away in the past two years! It’s not overly sweet but the flecks of almond and perfect crunch to the dark chocolate. I’m addicted to the caramel swirl... I’m telling you as a Ben and Jerry’s fan - YOU MUST TRY THIS FLAVOUR okay I’m off to buy some more okay thanks bye

author: forest sprite
title: "Urban Bourbon" is delicious!
text: We absolutely love this new ice cream-and hope you guys will keep Urban Bourbon as a permanent flavor! Its the best caramel ice cream out there and we can't get enough of it!

author: jjcovarr
title: Not the best flavor
text: I was really when I saw this flavor. I was debating between Phish Food and this one. I have had Phish Food before, so I gave this one a try. There seemed to be a lack of flavor and it didn't really have an ice cream taste to it. It was not horrible, I was just nor impressed with it. I usually like the new flavors that Ben & Jerry's release, but this one just did not cut it.

author: Yackersmaren
title: HOLY YUM!!!! DID I SAY YUM??? YES YUM!!!
text: Urban Bourbon is my new favorite. The flavors just melt together in a happy little dance in your mouth. It was all gone before I knew it!!YUM YUM YUM!!!!

author: shirley
title: urban bourbon
text:
I thought I was going to love this. Unfortunately my stomach did not agree. I was up overnight & the next day spending a lot of time in the bathroom. That was only a half pint. When I finished it a few days later, same thing happened. Ha, ha. I learned my lesson.
I have eaten many of your other flavors without an issue. But Urban Bourbon, i'll steer clear of.

author: Rwntree
title: Not perfect, but well worth a try
text: Not a perfect replacement for my old favorite, Bonnaroo Buzz. But it's still great. In reality this is a 4.5 stars for me, but that's not an option. The reason: not enough Bourbon flavor. It's there, but you really have to try to find it. That really is the only downside for me. All things considered, this is a nice blend and I hope it stays around a while.

author: Two Spoons Johnny
title: Best Caramel Ever
text: I am not an avid caramel consumer, but this product has converted me, at least for ice cream. There is something magical about the combination of flavors here. I am a huge fan of New York Super Fudge Chunk flavor and can't find that any longer. This one is my new go-to flavor at any point. My second is tongue twister Truffle Kerfuffle.

author: Jacki921
title: Boring
text: Did not have the flavor intensity I expected. Quite frankly, it was boring.

author: Love BandJ
title: Love This!!!
text: I found this flavor several months ago and I absolutely love it!!! But, I just noticed that the grocery store in my area has it on closeout....:( I am so obsessed with it that I bought the last 5 cartons that they have so I could enjoy for a couple more weeks!! Hope you aren't stopping the production of this flavor!!!

author: FuzzyGut
title: Not my thing but I can see it being for others
text: I did not love this flavor but it’s not because of a defective pint. I just personally didn’t care for it but I can see why other people would love it. It sounded perfect to me but for some reason, it just did t do it for me. But hey, everyone has their tastes and I can understand why people love this one. Just not me.

author: musicalmystic
title: Not what the title suggests
text: I was really looking forward to this flavor. I am a huge fan of Ben and Jerry's and a huge fan of bourbon, so it seemed like a dream come true. Unfortunately it was not at all what I'd hoped. It was so different than I expected that I actually bought a second one just to make sure; alas, both were the same. First off the ice cream didn't have that caramel taste one associates with bourbon; to me it tasted like coffee ice cream. It wasn't bad tasting, it just wasn't bourbon flavored. Also there were a LOT of chopped almonds in it, so many that it completely dominates the taste and texture of the ice cream. It seemed as though half the volume of the carton consisted of almonds. Now if they had labeled this "Almond Ice Cream with mild coffee flavor", at least I wouldn't have gotten my hopes up. Again, it's not bad (if you like nuts in your ice cream, which I don't), but it's not bourbon either. There are lots of Ben and Jerry's flavors I crave; this is not going to be one of them.

author: kabrion
title: What a flavor.
text: I bought this because it sounded weird enough to be good and it was way better than good. It is nutty, sweet, slightly burnt but not overwhelmingly so, the chunks and swirls were perfectly balanced with each other and the ice cream. 12/10. I will cry myself to sleep id it should ever be pulled from shelves.

author: SquamLoon
title: My new favoriite flavor
text: Not too sweet; not too burnt; not too bourbony—but enough of all of the above to taste decadent. Having happened upon it elsewhere and immediately fallen in love, I requested this in my local grocery store, and I'm happy to say that it;'s been selling like hotcakes, so I think they'll keep ordering it.

author: AmyM
title: Urban Bourbon Oh How I Love You!
text: Just bought it today. Tried a spoonful and was skeptical it wasn't going to really taste like Bourbon. I was proved wrong. It's deliciously sinful. I do wish you could omit the almonds and add more bourbon. Well done!! Maybe B n J should try something with Bailey's or a Tequila Margarita ice :)

author: ShawnCHI
title: Best one yet!
text:
This is probably my favorite flavor from Ben & Jerry's. I've pretty sure I've single-handedly bought all the Urban Bourbon from my local grocery store.
The nutty flavor paired with the bits of nuts and chocolate just absolutely makes my day at the end of a work day.
MORE LIKE THIS PLEASE.

author: SuzanneRae
title: All-time favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor!
text: I'm in love with the burnt caramel ice cream in this flavor! The bourbon caramel swirls, chocolate chunks, and almond pieces put it over the top. The ice cream is complex and sophisticated. Probably not for kids. ; ) It was all I could do not to eat the whole pint in one sitting!

author: Invain63
title: More! More!
text: I have been looking for a replacement for my dearly departed Oatmeal Cookie Chunk and then out of the blue came Urban Bourbon! It is a wonderfully complex and not too sweet pint of delight. On the down side, now I can't find it any more either. Is B&J trying to make me crazy?

author: petri33
title: Unique flavors, great combination
text: This might be my new favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor! The burnt caramel ice cream is fantastic, and you can really taste the bourbon in the caramel swirls. The chocolate chunks are an excellent combo with the caramel, and the almond bits add a last bit of nice texture.

author: Connie1217
title: Love Love Love It!!
text: This may be my new favorite flavor. I usually go for the Chunky Monkey, but saw this at the grocery store the other day and decided to give it a try, since I have recently switched from vodkas to whiskey and bourbons. Absolutely love everything about this flavor.

author: Pris13ie
title: Great Blend of Sweets
text: This is my new favorite B&J!! The Bourdon swirl is perfect and I am quite surprised by how well the textured complimented one another. I do, however think the chocolate pieces could be smaller pieces and less portion of the pint. Otherwise, what an amazing mix.

author: Kate
title: Totally Unexpected
text: Just tried this flavor and it is great! Unlike some caramel ice cream it's not overwhelmingly sweet... there were fudge chunks and almonds in every bite and the caramel swirl was so well flavored that it had me checking the carton for alcohol content! Loved it!

author: Princesca
title: Angels showed up!!
text: Okay, not really...but close. It was the best ice cream I've ever had!! And I'm a very good judge of ice cream. Not to sweet, well balanced. Great size of chocolate chunks & almond pieces. Smooth bourbon flavor. Delish!! Please don't EVER get rid of this!!

author: adelina
title: Sounded great, but dissapointed.
text: The ice cream & swirl were good. But the almond bits were like little annoying tasteless splinters. And what kind of chocolate flakes are these? The chocolate in chunky monkey is great. This chocolate barely has a chocolate taste and no chocolate feel at all.

author: Kmiller
title: I am in love!
text: This might be my favorite ice cream ever! I am addicted! I have always liked Ben & Jerry's but I've never been a regular consumer until this one. The crunch of the almonds and the chocolate with the caramel ice cream is perfect. Please don't let this one go!

author: nyishaj123
title: Caramel Love at 1st Taste
text: I usually hate caramel flavor ice cream because it's extremely sweet. However, this made me a believer. It has the perfect balance of sweet and alcohol and nuttiness with pop of dark chocolate. I love love love this flavor. Please don't discontinue it.

author: sydney
title: Awful
text: I didnt like Urban Bourbon AT ALL. IMO there were way too many chocolate pieces. They were too big, they didn't melt and they had no flavor. And the texture of the almonds was terrible. They made the ice cream taste gritty. The carmel was cloying.

author: Elle
title: Bestest EVER!
text: Went out on a limb, usually I stick with my peanut butter ice creams. Holy cow!!! Seriously! THE MOST AMAZING ice cream EVER! The whole thing is the best concoction ever put together! Absolutely in LOVE! Please never stop making this flavor!

author: Makeupmom
title: Really good
text: It's good but I'm more a chocolate gal. Too much almonds. Which isn't a bad thing if it came with almond joys. ;) it IS good but not MY cup of tea. For the person who ventures outside the chocolate and coconut and creams, you'll love it.

author: Chelle
title: Not satisfied.
text: I just purchased this about 30 minutes ago to try. I do not like it. It tastes bitter and the after taste is worse. It’s too bad I can’t take it back to the store for a refund. Have to throw it away, like my money to purchase this.

author: Mrvampire
title: Will never cheat again!
text: As a huge b&J fan I have gone through so many of flavours and continue to keep it mixed up and varied but since trying this one - I think I’m going to settle down! Absolutely gorgeous - I could spend the rest of my life with this one

author: Curly
title: Urban Bourbon...Best Flavor Ever!!!
text: First bite and it was love!! Please... I beg you... never ever stop making Urban Bourbon!! Happiness is just a spoonful away in my freezer! Friends and family love it too. We all agree this is the best ice cream we ever tasted!!!!

author: Drsuzannec
title: Love it!
text: Urban Bourbon has the best texture! The nuts are chopped really small which enables you to get some in every bite. It took me a little while, but the bourbon caramel totally grew on me and now this flavor is one of my favorites.

author: SWLiver
title: Top sweet and little flavor
text: I have an enormous sweet tooth, and I rarely think anything is too sweet. I've also never been disappointed with any of the many B&J flavors I've eaten. That said, this was too sweet and had VERY little flavor. Cloyingly sweet.

title: Do not purchase if you like Almonds
text: This has too many fudge flakes, which I thought is was dark chocolate. What Almonds? They just have chopped almonds that you will think are tiny pieces a fudge flakes/dark chocolate. The caramel ice cream and caramel were fine.

author: babybunnychrissy
title: Oh, NO!
text: We bought this with the new Truffle flavor. First bite it taste burnt as all get out. 2nd bite was a burnt alcohol taste. I couldn't stand it. And neither could my 3 year old who loves all flavors if ice cream- even coffee!

author: Gabby
title: Too many nuts
text: I tried this since my fav flavor was out of stock. At first I liked it but as I took each bite I realized how I disliked all the nut slivers that were in each spoonful. There wasn’t enough bourbon caramel and too many nuts!

author: Jilly123
title: Amazing!
text: I absolutely loved Urban Bourbon! I had every intention of eating just one serving but surprisingly when I looked down it was gone. Had to stop on the way home the next night to get more. Thanks for another great flavor!

author: Yumm
title: New fave, but...
text: Got this when it was on BOGO because I love borboun and Ben and Jerrys. Oh man was it amazing! Only had a few bites with borboun flavor though... wish there was more. Otherwise, the combination of flavors was spot on!

author: Elise
title: Awesome!
text: I took a chance on this flavor as I don't eat ice cream very often. IMHO I absolutely loved this flavor. The bourbon is very mild and the flavors came together very well. I had to stop my self from eating half a pint!

author: Emily56757
title: Whoa. Second best flavor after Coffee Toffee
text: All you need to say is “burnt caramel” and I’m sold. Though I don’t taste much bourbon the chocolate flakes, almonds and caramel pair wonderfully for a wonderfully interesting depth of flavors. Thank you Ben and Jerry

author: Josh from VT
title: Dissapointed
text: Great idea for a flavor, but unfortunately too many+too small almond pieces. The base and fudge flakes are nice, but it's still kind of plain. The swirl is very good, but there was almost none present in my pint.

author: Micaela
title: Really tastes like bourbon
text: When I usually try things labeled bourbon, I assume it will be kind of bourbony. The first bite I took of this I got the hints of "burnt" smoky flavor off the top and then the splash of bourbon and caramel. SO GOOD

author: Suri
title: No bourbon taste
text: I don't taste any bourbon at all. It was just an overly sweet unpleasant caramel flavor. My family did not enjoy this. The fudge flakes are a distraction and too large and hard. Good idea, but not a unique taste.

author: K2rite
title: Love at first site
text: I was excited to try this flavor because I never buy Ben&Jerry but this is my new favorite. Every bite I took was exciting. All of the ingredients were equally amounted. I hope this flavor sticks around!

author: Kati
title: Oh My!!
text: Just now tried the Urban Bourbon flavor that I bought 2 weeks ago. It is BEYOND amazing. I may just have to find something to binge watch so I can eat the whole pint! I will be going back for more.

author: AJWoS
title: Best ice cream I've ever had. Period.
text: This needs to stick around as a regular flavor! Everyone I've had try this thinks it's incredible. The slight taste of burbon in the swirls is out of this world!! Hands down my favorite of all time.

author: Tonks
title: Bourbon?
text: When I opened the pint there was a huge blob of caramel at the top and then....nothing. A few chocolate chunks, but no more caramel, a few chocolate chunks and no "bourbon". It was disappointing.

author: Neeecola
title: AMAZING This ice cream saved my life
text: Literally one of the best things to ever go into my mouth. Honestly everything you do in your ice cream ventures is inspiring. You paint masterpieces for the taste pallet and for that i thank you

author: Unsatisfied
title: Not that great
text: The burnt caramel ice cream was soo overwhelming at first and not very pleasant at all. It left a horrible aftertaste. I won't be buying this flavor again but I'm excited to try other flavors.

author: Fleurfairy
title: Just no
text: The ice cream itself is very grainy. Almost a sherbert texture. Not creamy at all. Way too much bittersweet chocolate chips and not enough caramel. I didn’t taste any bourbon either. Big fail.

author: ZionzMom
title: This hits ALL sides of the sweet tooth!
text: I literally eat this just about EVERY night. It's delicious & had the perfect blend of smooth/crunchy. I don't even typically like chocolate ice cream, but Urban Bourbon is put of this world.

author: Dee dee
title: Hooked
text: My favorite flavor used to be in New York New York now it's urban bourbon I love the caramel center the fudge this is the best ice cream I have ever eaten I eat it at least once a week

author: Meemee
title: Delicious!
text: This is my new favorite flavor, since I can't peach cobbler anywhere anymore. I'm a sucker for ice cream with nuts and appreciate the meld of caramel, chocolate, and walnut flavors.

author: Kaylan
title: The best Ben and Jerry's flavor!
text: All the flavors go so well together. The chocolate and especially the almonds both have different hardness which means the crunch is so satisfying. Easily my favorite flavor so far.

author: Cammie
title: Somewhat disappointed
text: My first taste was great, but the ice cream had too much almond meal in it, and not enough burnt taste or bourbon taste. I loved the chocolate flakes, but I wouldn't buy it again

author: Redhead7000
title: Great texture
text: So, I'm not a big fan of ice cream but when my husband brought this home I decided to give it a try. I finally found an ice cream that I LOVE! It has great texture and flavor.

author: Chippie
title: Most yummy!
text: For me replaces the previous bourbon flavor that i feel that was just to hard fpr people to pronounce! Seems that they got a good one w/this one! I hope its a keeper for awhile!

author: CMclaughlin83
title: Urban yum
text: I'm really enjoying this ice cream but I'm wondering if I should worry about the whiskey, I am pregnant. I'm sure its not a big deal but curious couldn't find any warnings.

author: Cmmcleod
title: New favorite
text: I eat A LOT of B&J...this is hands down my new favorite. Texturally, I’m not sure it needs the almonds AND fudge chips, but the flavor more than makes up for it. Cheers!

author: bonfirebo
title: Flavor perfection!
text: I love that the almonds pieces are small and fully incorporated! The "burnt" caramel is absolute perfection and the bourbon swirl....well, it doesn't get any better!

author: Twinkle toes
title: Disappointing texture
text: Delicious new flavor but the almonds are pulverized and in every bite. It pretty much ruins the creaminess I want from ice cream. It's a bummer. I won't buy again.

author: AngieP
title: Fell in love at the first bite.
text: Bought this tonight at Walmart. The ice cream actually tastes like hazelnut to me. It had luscious chunks of chocolate in every bite. Will definitely buy again.

author: Abigail224
title: All time favorite
text: The Tonight Dough was a long running favorite until I sank my spoon into a pint of urban bourbon. Hands down the best ice cream I’ve had from Ben & Jerry’s.

author: Island Girl
title: Why Barley ?!
text: So sad this contains Barley so it's a no go for a celiac. So many of your flavors have Barley now. Guess I'm just out of luck with my old favorite brand.

author: ihlini
title: Pleasant..not exciting
text: Bought mostly for a different taste; not exciting, lotsa almond slices. These, made me happy though. Good caramel and not overly chocolate (big bonus) :)

author: danashopgirl
title: By Far, the best!
text: I decided to give this a try and fell in love! This has the right mix of caramel and Chocolate pieces and the flavor is JUST right. Highly recommend!

author: Harbingerdc
title: Happy Accident
text: My husband picked this up by accident and I'm so glad he did. This is my new favorite flavor. It sweet, toasted, and a little boozy - just perfect!

author: Juju
title: Sweet Lord!
text: Crunchy almonds and perfectly sized chocolate chunks...bourbon swirl...heavenly flavored ice cream. Sweet Lord, pleeease never retire this flavor!

author: Pirate_Princess
title: OMG!
text: I just bought this tonight and it has to be my new favorite! Its not super sweet and has plenty of crunch. I had such a hard time putting it down.

author: starkrawzen
title: Love Toasty flavor
text: Love this so much. The toasty burnt flavor of the ice cream is awesome and nice balance with the gooey swirl. I hope this never goes away

author: Redshoes56
title: Delicious!
text: Very decadent and a perfect treat. The bourbon flavor is not too strong (fine by me). Love the deep caramel and the crunch from the nuts!

author: sarahann
title: Omg
text: So good! Please don't discontinue! Wasn't sure about it on the shelf but gave it a try and so happy I did! Perfect "grown up" ice cream!

author: CJMTESV
title: What happened?
text: I had this flavor a few months ago and loved it. Call me crazy...but I swear it didn't have almonds before. I hate almonds in ice cream.

author: rebakay
title: My absolute favorite
text: I was a little skeptical on seeing a bourbon flavored ice cream... but wow! This is amazing! They can't keep it in the stores here!

author: Debb
title: Don't think I'll get this again
text: The Almonds are very small and soft. Not very enjoyable. I had bought it for my Husband but he doesn't like nut so he took mine.

author: Audrey
title: Heaven
text:
This the best! Salty, sweet with distinct bourbon Carmel flavor. Love it. I usually only find it at Safeway.
More please!!

author: 3169cosmic
title: Yummm!!!
text: This is amazing,the Carmel is so good!!! Lots of chunks and Carmel,no need to go mining for the good stuff.I love it !!!

author: Wendy908527
title: LOVE IT ❤
text:
Perfect mix of caramel, almonds and bourbon, but my favorite part was the dark chocolate slivers.
My new favorite!

title: So delicious!
text: By far the best flavor yet, so hooked! Though not many flavors I've tried aren't delicious from Ben and Jerry's :)

author: Nick3199
title: Absolute best
text: Highly upset that I cannot find this anymore. One of the absolute best flavours to come out of B&J in a long time.

author: Svetlana_Han
title: AMAZING.
text: Honestly the best ice cream ever. I️ love the carmel with the bourbon and the almonds and it’s just so delicious.

author: Lex1
title: Yum!
text:
Just found this and wow! It's crime brûlée mixed with yummy chocolate goodness, Amazing gooeyness!
Thanks!

author: MikaMamas
title: I love this ice cream - PLEASE don’t ever stop
text: We started buying this about two months ago, and absolutely love it! PLEASE make it for every!! You’re the best

author: Fuchsia
title: Really Good
text: I like this one a lot. The burnt caramel ice cream is super tasty, and I always love the addition of liquor.

author: Dave27
title: Simply amazing
text: I ama new York chocolate chunk guy but I tried this one and I truly believe I have found a new favorite.

author: Jeepchick
title: Yummmm!
text: New & already one of our favorites! If you like a sweet bourbon flavor, definitely give it a try!

author: Pinkie
title: Best EVER
text: Wow best ice cream ever. Please never stop making it. Please please please don't change a thing!

author: Lunar
title: Delicious
text: Nice bourbon flavor going on with the caramel. You also can't go wrong with chocolate chunks.

author: Lynz
title: Yummy!
text: Really love this flavor! The ratio of everything is perfect! Please continue making this one!

author: Dawnita
title: OMG
text:
I bought this a few weeks ago and I love love love it!!!
Great flavors and plenty of almonds

author: Ash20
title: The nuts
text: The ice cream is so good. All the flavors come together and the nuts make it tast the best.

author: Chuchica
title: I can't stop eating it!
text: My favorite. I eat it in like a minute, especially when it is a little bit melted!!!!

author: nikpcjlicb2012
title: love it!
text: Usually my husband likes one flavor and I like another but we both love urban bourbon

author: hotpinkpanda15506
title: Urban Bourbon
text: I saw that there was a new flavor and I decided to try it so glad that I did amazing

author: Belle
title: Delicious!
text: My new favorite flavor-yum! I kinda wonder what it would taste like with pecans....

author: bourbon babe
title: Sooooooooooooo Delicious
text: I've only found this flavor once and I'm obsessed now! I can't find it again :(((

author: MJGsuperinc
title: Really Truly Delicious
text: After I was done with my pint that hour, I went to the store and bought another

author: AdrienneK
title: Delicious!
text: We keep buying it over and over! The flavor and textures inside are perfect.

author: CARMEN A
title: OMG, MY NEW FAVORITE!!!
text: So good that I wrote a review, I never do this!! It's is my new favorite!!!

author: Page
title: Just enough!
text: I really recommend this one. It tastes like bourbon but sweeter! So good!

author: IceCreamaholic
title: Absolutely the best
text: I eat the entire tub in one sitting because it’s that good and addicting.

author: TheDoctor
title: Great flavor
text: The ice cream has great flavor great taste live the burbon swirls in it

author: Mhall
title: Love love love
text: It’s so amazing. I sent my husband out for another for dessert tonight!

author: spanda
title: delicious!
text: This might be my favorite flavor of all. It's a caramel bourbon dream

author: dogman1
title: urban burbon
text: everthing i like in my ice cream just didn't know until yall made it

author: Windy
title: OMG
text: Bought this and was amazed. Had all the flavors I was looking for.

author: Giglet
title: This flavor rocks
text: I totally consumed the whole pint! Better than a raspberry cosmo.

author: Sjsj
title: Loveeeee
text: It's soooo good. The chocolate chips are my favorite part. Buy it!

author: Julie569
title: Super Delicious!
text: One of my favs. Everything about this ice cream is perfection.

author: Orangutan man
title: New Favorite
text: Sooooooo delicious! My new favorite. You gotta try this one!

author: Heritage farms
title: What a complete flavor
text: There is equal greatness in every bite. The flavor is great.

author: EnglishLitDoc
title: What a delicious surprise!
text: So, so good, and so unexpected. One of my favorite flavors!

author: Sfsfsf
title: Best flavor since Bovinity Divinity
text: Great flavors great chocolate amazing texture! Thank you!

author: Fessaafamous
title: Amazing!!!
text: One of the best kinds I have ever tried.. really amazing.

author: Ashtrees13
title: Delicious!!!!
text: Just bought this today at Kroger and it is amazing Good!

author: AL0526
title: Soooo good!
text: One of my new favorites! So good! Go ahead and try it.

author: Jim S
title: Great new flavor!
text: I love the balance of Bourbon, caramel and chocolate.

author: Jmoody
title: My new favorite
text: I love this ice cream flavor! Don’t ever discontinue

author: Vegas diva
title: Delicioso!
text: I spotted this the other day...now my new favorite!

author: Kitty
title: Amazing!
text: Best Vanilla Ice cream ever! And I have tried quite a number of them

author: FuzzyGut
title: The best Vanilla you’ll ever eat!
text: I mean it, folks! This is by far the best Vanilla ice cream available. It doesn’t get better. It’s creamy, dense, sweet, rich and very natural tasting. It’s the essence of Vanilla; very intense. It also has a great mouth feel. Yes, it isn’t full of chunks, swirls and mix-ins but that doesn’t mean it’s boring. On the contrary, each bite is an exploration of what it means to taste true Vanilla. Honestly it’s the best.

author: joank
title: Best vanilla ice cream out there
text: My favorite ice cream flavor is vanilla. Simple, sweet, savory, creamy, delicious vanilla. I've tried dozens of fancy/gourmet brands of vanilla and always come back to Ben & Jerry's. It's got great vanilla flavor and just the right amount of salt to the cream to make this savory and not bland at all.

author: KimPete
title: The BEST
text: The best vanilla ice cream ever! It doesn't need anything added, it's great all by itself.

title: True Vanilla
text: Great Flavor! Vanilla Beans! Nothing else added. Its a great flavor when you want something simple.

author: mai432
title: Excellent taste, texture, and appearance!
text: My favorite flavor is vanilla that has vanilla bean. Almost every evening after dinner, I have one-third pint of Ben & Jerry's vanilla ice cream. In my mouth, it feels creamy and melts at a medium pace allowing me to savor the full vanilla flavor. This vanilla ice cream is perfect in every way. Thank you.

author: Dee Me
title: Please leave out the Guar Gum. Locust and Caragean
text: I am thrilled that you have Non GMO choices. Thank you. But guar gum, locust beans and caragean are still off limits to most of us allergic people. Can you please make one choice just milk, sugar and vanilla?

author: Ambee10
title: So great!!
text: The best vanilla ice cream I’ve ever had! Super soft and creamy!

author: Roger Kincaid
title: Example: Great features!
text: Taste it once in Singapore. I'll never forget that taste.

author: Yelper2034
title: Rather rich for my taste.
text: Well it's too thick because it's packed with sugar and cream.

author: GiGiT
title: Mine wasn't swirled
text: I must have gotten a bad batch. Mine looks nothing like the photo. I got vanilla ice cream with a glob caramel core. It was awful. I ate a little to see if the swirls would show up, but no. It was just vanilla ice cream. I threw the rest away. Complete waste of money. Very disappointed.

author: FlavorFinder
title: Stay Away...... It’s all Mine!
text: I’m 62 and have loved B&J ice creams since first invented. I’ve probably cut a year or two off my life and don’t mind abit. Why? Because of this particular flavor combination. It’s the bees knees & the cats meow all rolled up into one sweet swirl. Once you try this, your flavor dreams will be fulfilled forever. This is the only B&J flavor combination I’d every want to be stranded on a desert island with, just me and my Vanilla-Caramel-Fudge Swirl! This is the creamiest, fudgiest, carameliest, tastiest, smoothest ice evermade. Dont wait, just go get some and enjoy every last lick!

author: FuzzyGut
title: Simply perfect!
text: I LOVE this flavor. It is flawless with just the right amount of caramel and fudge against the vanilla ice cream. Please never alter or retire this flavor!

title: Simple and delicious!
text: Nothing fancy, but definitely one of my favorites! If you are thinking of trying it you'll be glad you did!

author: Ice cream lover
title: Best Flavor Ever!!
text: This was my favorite years ago and was discontinued. I found it in my local grocery store and have been happy ever since. No chucks! I just don't like chewing my ice cream. The fudge and carmel is loaded in the ice cream. Pure awesomeness!!

author: dejie
title: dont ever discontinue!
text: dont ever ever ever! you knocked it out of the park and if you ever get rid of this flavor i will cry endlessly and be depressed until the end of my days. its amazing. so SO amazing.

author: geefran
title: Yesss!!
text: Whenever I look for Ben and Jerry's, this is what I seek.

author: Prdavid21
title: Love this flavor but is
text: Love this flavor but it is not available in my area. According to the web site it should be at. A certain store but the store does not have it

author: Carabeaner526
title: No match for perfection!
text: I have loved this flavor for as long as I can remember, although now it is very hard to find in stores now, only a Wawa I work close to carries it and maybe shop rite...now that there is a perfect ice cream, when can I get some coupons so I can actually afford it and eat it more often....I tried many other flavors and nothing compares to vanilla caramel fudge....NOTHING!!!!

title: THE BEST vanilla fudge EVER
text:
i always look for this flavor, once i had it I couldnt stop! Reminded me of the VANILLA FUDGE ice cream i had as a child.
BUT now, Shoprite near me, in Southern NJ., doesn't carry it, Was told that it was discontinued!!!!
Please advise.

author: 1WavyGravyFan
title: I Luv This Flavor!!!
text: I will always mourn Wavy Gravy, but this flavor has been a long-time favorite of mine. This is the only B&J's flavor that I continue to eat....haven't liked the new flavors for many years, and some of the older flavors now lack quality (ex: Cherry Garcia, NYSFC, and CC Cookie Dough). Please do not retire Vanilla Caramel Fudge!!!

author: Rosebud635
title: My first Ben & Jerry Ice Cream!!
text:
It tried it while in Paris for my studies many moons ago and fell in love with it instantly. It's been canceled in France and Switzerland for many years and I'm waiting desperately for it to come back.
The simple mix of caramel and chocolate sauce with the vanilla ice cream is just perfect.

author: Icecream10
title: Most Perfect Flavor
text: I found this flavor in my local market about a month ago and it instantly became my all time favorite!! Creamy vanilla ice cream and caramel and fudge rippled all through it smooth creamy perfection straight out of the container!! Ice cream dream come true thank you Ben & Jerry’s

author: Terri
text: The greatest flavor, so creamy with lovely fudge and caramel generously infused. Only problem can never find it at the local grocery store which I don’t understand because they NEVER have it. Did B&G quit making this flavor? The only flavor I like and it’s never available :(:(

author: Gotta Have It
title: Nothing but the Best
text: This is my all time favorite B & J ice cream. I was very disappointed when it ended up in the Flavor Graveyard, but was then resurrected. I like to think it was because of me and my diligent feedback to B & J to resurrect it. Probably not, but one can think.

author: nd0067
title: My favorite!
text: Not a fan of chocolate chunks in my ice cream, which takes a lot of B&J's flavors out of the running, but this is my all time favorite! Real FUDGE and caramel with the creamiest vanilla. I can't find it everywhere, so when I do, I stock up.

author: myvice70
title: Best Combination and Mindful of the Ying and Yang
text: I love many Ben & Jerry's flavors but this is by far my favorite. Vanilla base of goodness with it's simple yumminess complimented by generous amounts of two of the greatest flavors ever combined, caramel and fudge!

author: florida20
title: Amazing Flavor
text: I found this 2 months ago and can't get enough. Has nice amounts of both fudge and caramel. Reminds me of the old vanilla fudge swirl ice creams that you can't find anymore. But this one gives you caramel too!

author: Bluemoon
title: My New Favorite
text: I have always been a Cherry Garcia fan, and tried others here and there, but this is the best ice cream that I have ever tasted. I had to stop myself from eating the whole pint in one sitting.

author: Lynnie50
title: Smooth and Creamy Deeeeliciousness
text: Whenever I'm eating B&J Vanilla Caramel Fudge ice cream I feel a song in my heart ..."If Loving You Is Wrong, I Don't Want To Be Right". This is good stuff...no chunks!

author: Chersie6
title: My absolute favorite of all time
text: Wish I found it much sooner absolutely my all-time favorite ice cream wish it came in a larger size absolutely the best flavor ever perfect combination of everything!

author: Jennywhiskers
title: Excellent
