text: I love love love this ice cream and buy it every week and try not to eat the whole pint in one sitting. It is the best ice cream I have ever eaten.

author: Jerry 1234
title: Excellent
text: I love this flavor but haven't been able to find it at the store I normally got it was just wondering if it has been out of stock or discontinued

author: LL325
title: Perfect!
text: I wanted a pint with no chunks, so I tried this one. I think it’s my new favorite! There’s a ton of caramel and fudge swirls in it.

author: Tabfro
title: The perfect ice cream
text: I’m normally a Cherry Garcia lover but wanted something more simple. Spotted this and took it home. It’s now my new favorite!

title: Favorite Ben & Jerry’s Flavor
text: This is by far my favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor. Smooth vanilla ice cream with fudge and caramel ribbons. Delicious!

author: KimberlyB
title: Yum
text: I'm eating this right now!! It's like a sundae in a pint! Have you considered adding whipped cream?

author: EMR007
title: Quality issue
text: I bought this product little fudge and Carmel. Quality control.

author: Nangirl
title: Favorite by far!
text: This is my husband's favorite, for sure. I love it, too.

author: princessmimi
title: Cookie core is my favorite but.....
text: So I typically buy these a lot! I’m actually kinda obsessed, this is my absolute favorite. Although I’ve noticed lately the cookie “core” isn’t much of a core anymore rather than just a little piece. I’m pretty disappointed as I’ve gone far enough to write a review. I posted a picture to show how small it’s become. This is with me eating around it, by the way.

author: BJLUVER
title: Fun consistencies, good flavors
text: Now this is one of the few cores I've taken a liking to. The consistency of the cookie core is in an interesting one....smooth enough, but not exactly "cookie-like," however, this does not mean it is not good. This ice cream can become quite a bit as you move towards the bottom of the pint, but I think if you're a seasoned ice cream veteran you could power through to the end. I do however wish there was a bit more vanilla to counteract the cookie core and mocha flavors, but this isn't exactly a complaint; perhaps my pint had a somewhat skewed ratio of vanilla:cookie:mocha.

author: ANDRE
title: boomchocolatta with brownie core
text: THIS ICE CREAM IS THE BEST YET OUT OF THE B@J'S SMOOTH DECEDANT COOKIE CORE COLLECTION! I TRIED THE BROWNIE BATTER BUT THERE WASN'T ENOUGH BATTER TO PLEASE! BUT THIS ONE HAS THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF EVERYTHING IN IT AND THE CORE IS A BUTTERY CHOCOLATY COOKIE BONANZA!! TRY IT AND U WON'T STOP! I'VE EATEN A PINT EVERY NIGHT FOR TWO WEEKS! BE CAREFUL YOU'LL GET HOT AND HUNGARY FOR THIS ONE AND IF U HAVE TO YOU'LL PAWN A DIAMOND RING FOR THIS ADDICTION! HEHE! ANDRE'

author: KJ92
title: Thank you for the locator!
text: This is my all time favorite flavor from B&J, and after an exceptionally grating day, I went to my local grocer to find this pint, only to find (for the third visit this month) that it wasn't there... Defeated, I searched the flavor and came across the locator page on the website and found not one, but ten different places nearby had it! Tears were shed, angels sang, the day was quite literally saved by Ben and Jerry, and their Boom Chocolata flavor. Thanks so much

author: FuzzyGut
text: I love both sides of the ice cream! Both absolutely delicious! The mocha is to die for and the chocolate cookie and fudge flakes make for great textural and flavor components. That’s the first ‘50’ in the title of my review. The second ‘50’ is the core. While it was thick and went all the way to the bottom, the flavor is just frankly very unpleasant in my opinion. The texture of the core is also strange; gritty, grainy, hard and pasty. If this were a standard pint, not a Core, it would be a total knockout 100% awesome pint which I would buy regularly. As it is though, I think I’m done.

author: Jlhluvsbnj
title: Phenomenal dual ice creams & delicious cookie core
text: I just tried this for the first time and I am absolutely hooked! I could live without the fudge chips, but the rest of the concoction is above reproach. The caramel side is delicate & flavorful all on its own, the mocha side is a fantastic coffee kick with subtle notes of rich chocolate. The chocolate cookie core is very true to delicious cookie consistency, I did not find any issue with the texture or taste, and I'm very sensitive. This may well be my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor ever. I'll weep hysterically in the streets if it is discontinued. 11/10 stars

author: Juju_H
title: SOOO awesome!
text: My all-time fave!!! Please don't ever discontinue!

author: vanna
title: Beautifully Designed Flavor
text:
When I took my first bite of mocha, caramel, and cookie core all on the spoon together my eyes closed and it was like I was one of those actors on a commercial that lick their lips, and the backdrop is clouds. Then I kept eating, and the cookie core never ended. It was the the best ice-cream-eating experience I've ever had.
Thank you for this flavor Ben & Jerry's. Thank you for your ice cream.

author: Michael
title: Decent But Needs Work
text:
This ice cream flavor is great but there are a few problems with it.
Overall it's quite delicious, but quickly turns the smile into a frown.

author: Megan
title: AMAZING!!!
text: I just recently found this ice cream and I absolutely love it but I can't find it anymore in stores. Please tell me it's not going away?

title: Keep this flavor forever
text: Didn't know what to expect when I bought this about a month ago but know I crave it all the time. Best flavor so far

author: Dragonborn
title: Acrid flavor in cookie core
text: This particular flavor was disappointing because the cookie core and cookie chunks were an acrid flavor. I've been trying to finish the pint not wanting to be wasteful but the cookie is def off. Never had to leave anything less than 5 star for every other flavor tho. Love you guys!!

author: Herheatherness
title: My all-time favorite in the history of ice cream!
text: I buy this two or three times a week. I absolutely love it! I’m concerned though. The local drug store quit carrying it a few months ago and now my local grocery store has a “close out” sign on the display. PLEASE don’t tell me this flavor is being discontinued! I don’t want to live in a world without Boom Chocolatta Cookie Core!

author: IceCream4eva
title: AH-MAIZ-IIIIINNNNNGGGGG
text: This is my absolute favorite ice cream flavor. I will choose it over every other flavor time and time again. I cannot imagine ever getting bored of this ice cream. It has the perfect ratio of chocolate to coffee and the core!!!!!! Oh, the core... it is exquisite. I can eat this by the bucket loads. Ben and Jerry's won me over with this flavor. They have other good ones too but they pale in comparison to my beloved Boom Chocolatta!

author: emlittle89
title: New favorite flavor!!
text: This is hands down my favorite flavor! I go through phases every few years where I am extremely loyal to one flavor and will refuse to venture out. Eventually a flavor comes out that might sound like it could be good and I’ll give it a shot. Oh this was SO worth it. I am currently going through minimum a pint a week! AHH!

author: Karah
title: Cookie core gets me every time
text: I feel so bad for all the other flavours because I can't go past this amazing combo. The cookie core is hard but crumbly when applied with enough pressure and the texture is kind of gritty - it's fantastic! i try hard not to eat it all in one go but I can't stop the cookie train once it's started.

author: Fire1180
title: Exquisite
text: The Exquisite taste as well as texture all goes so smoothly with each other that it makes the perfect combination of an extreme delightful explosion of taste in your mouth. It almost has a hint of like a coffee type of flavoring but not to a broad of a taste it's just exquisite.

author: MissChocolatta
title: Where are you boom chocolates?
text: Have you guys stopped making these? I can't find these any stores here in Cary, NC. I love this ice cream and this is the only icecream I have been eating for that past 5 years. Please don't stop making it. The cookie core is the best of the best part. From your most loyal fan.

author: hola
title: Meh.
text:
I never thought I wouldn't like one of B&J ice creams, but this one might be the one. The cookie core has a sandy texture and a weird flavour I cannot describe. It doesn'e even taste like cookies.
The ice creams themselves (minus the cookie core) are great.

author: uniqueoverly
title: ABSOLUTELY THE BEST
text: i can't explain how happy i am that you guys have created this magnificent flavor. the burst of chocolate chunks and mocha flavor and the oh so wonderful cookie core. there's nothing more perfect that i'd rather put in my mouth

author: CharlieBone
title: My favourite
text: By far the best flavor you guys have ever produced but I haven't been able to find it in Australia for a while now. Why did you guys discontinue it?? :( Is there any way at all I can get more, I am desperate here!!! </3

author: Pete
title: Where did the core go?
text: Flavor is on point. When "Boom Chocolatta" first came out the core was huge and went straight to the bottom, now it's like a narrow funnel. Starts small and get's smaller with every bite. Bring back the full cores!

author: AtomicHoney
title: Totally in love with this flavor
text: As someone who loves coffee and chocolate, this ice cream rocked my world. The cookie core is addicting and the subtle gentleness of the caramel ice cream marries every element of this flavor perfectly.

author: Marr
title: My all time fav !
text: Had to special order a case . This is by far my all time favorite ice cream !!! Everything about it is just amazing ! Please never discontinue . I drove all over Florida looking for this flavor

author: kennykinns
title: The best
text: Seriously this has been a favorite for a long time. Lots of flavors and textures and the cookie core is AMAZING LIKE BLENDED OREOS BUT BETTER. Really fantastic ice cream, that never gets old.

author: cookielover28
title: AMAZING
text: This is my all time favorite, anytime I see it I have to buy! I personally LOVE the cookie core, it’s so smooth. Always recommend this flavor in particular to friends because I’m obsessed.

author: Phanie
title: My absolute favorite!
text: I could eat this flavor everyday forever! It has just the right flavor combination and the cookie core is by far the best core out of them all. The texture is just right! Yum!

author: KatB
title: One of the best core flavors!
text: I love this core flavor! The center tastes just like ground up oreos, and it compliments the mocha and caramel ice creams very well. Highly recommended!

author: Icecreamlover
title: Best idea ever
text: My husband or kid? Leaves me the ice cream while my favorite textured cookie core is no where to be found! More CORE pleeeeease!!!

author: Milkshak3
title: Best Boom Ever!!!
text: This is my number one favorite ice cream ever! Please do not discontinue. When I bought this for the first time, I just couldn't stop buying it. The caramel ice cream with the chocolate mocha ice cream is such a perfect combination. It's so good to the point where I couldn't even make it home to freezer I had to eat it on the way. I would purchase it everyday if I could but it's so hard to find where I live in the country. I'm exaggerating a bit okay at least every week.

author: BravoBear
title: My new favorite ice cream
text: Just like another reviewer said, it's mud pie in a pint. Officially hands down my favorite ice cream ever

author: WhydoIneedauniquenickname
title: This is my favorite ice cream! Favorite favorite!
text: This is my favorite of all the ice creams. Or at least it's the one that I buy every time I see it, because it's hard to find in my area. I've always gotten it at Target, but they seem to have replaced the cookie core flavors with the new cookie dough core flavors. Don't get me wrong, I am loving these new cookie dough core flavors too. But I miss my Boom Chocolatta. :( I was getting nervous they might have retired it. :O Thank goodness it appears that's not the case!

title: Sooo yummy!
text: I have bought this flavor more times than I can count. I love the gritty texture of the chocolate cookie core and pretty much carve it out and save it until the very end. I LOVE the caramel ice cream, and though I enjoy the coffee half pretty well, I have a sensitivity to caffeine so it amps me up a little too much. Obviously, that doesn't stop me from buying it and eating the entire thing! Very yummy! It was my go to before I found my love, milk and cookies.

author: Lyndsay89
title: Disappointed
text: This is my favoritie flavors from Ben and Jerrys, but i have one problem. I love the caramel flavoring but not so much the mocha. I wish you guys would sell each flavor separately as well as together in order to satisfy both cravings. This way customers like me will be able to have a whole container of ice cream rather than buying the cookie core for one flavor and throwing the other half away.

author: Madylikesdairy
title: Love this! But caffeine?
text: This flavor is my absolute favorite! Recently I’ve developed an intolerance to caffeine (I can have some, but not much). I just bought boom chocolatta for the first time since this development, but I can’t find anything about this ones caffeine content specifically. It’d be wonderful you guys would be willing to post the caffeine content if you ice creams, if there is any. Thank you!

author: CWick
title: The Best!
text: I mean it quiet literally when I say that this is the best Ben and Jerry's ever. It's the only reason I would continuously pay the high prices of this brand. Unfortunately it has disappeared from my area (Monmouth county, NJ) over the past few weeks and I've been so disappointed. Please bring it back

author: LuLu
title: MMMy mouth loves this flavor!!!
text: I like the combination of ice cream flavors. I also like that there is not My only suggestion would be to change the chocolate cookie pieces to chocolate chip cookie pieces, as the core is pretty much the same flavor as the chocolate cookie pieces. It is so good! More chocolate chips please!

author: atik
title: Solid flavor
text: The cookie core is great. It's thick and smooth with a slightly sandy texture (not a bad thing). I'm not a huge fan of coffee ice cream, but this was still enjoyable. The mocha ice cream won't take away from the other flavors in here. I wish there were more chocolate cookie mix ins.

author: Jai_
title: Couldn't stop eating it
text: This was the first Ben and Jerry's flavor that I've tried and it's so good. The mocha ice cream goes well with the Caramel ice cream, even though it looks like it is classic vanilla and chocolate. That core is golden. It's delicious and smooth. I would eat just the core if I could.

author: Lena
title: Boom Chocolatta!
text: My husband found this in the store along with another flavor. By far the best discovery in the ice cream section in a long time. This had a perfect amount of everything not too much not too little and has me wanting more!! Thanks Ben & Jerry’s, I know I can count on you!

author: Wren
title: Favorite. Flavor. EVER!!!
text: I love this flavor! It can be hard to find sometimes (it seems really popular) but I get it nearly every time. The taste is AMAZING!!! I love the way the mocha and caramel work together, and with the fudge and chocolate? Incredible. Great work with this one, guys!

author: dreamer103
title: What happened to the core?
text: I just bought this ice cream for the first time, and was sort of disappointed. The core only lasted about 1/3 of the way down the pint and the base of the ice cream was extremely bland. I had heard good things about this ice cream so I'm not sure what happened.

author: Miss Riley
title: Where's the core?
text:
This is the BEST ice cream ever, I buy it every week, its my favorite because of the huge core... but lately the last several I have bought have had either no core at all, or a very tiny spoonful of core at the very bottom.
Not happy with it lately.

author: Monica3477
title: The best!
text: I don’t typically write reviews but I hope this flavor sticks around! Between this and The Tonight dough, I’ve never been disappointed. This is my go-to whenever I need a little pick me up after working long hours with children who have special needs.

author: JiantJon
title: Love the Cookie core with the coffee ice cream!
text: This is one of my new favorite Ice Creams. The only things that would make it better, is if the core were a little bigger, and they only put the coffee ice cream in. The caramel ice cream, while delicious, doesn't meld as well with the cookie core.

author: Elliebelly
title: Most addictive thing I've ever eaten
text: This has been my fave for a few years now. It's like chocolate heaven with a cookie core. It's not too rich like the brownie and fudge flavors. For some reason Boom chocolatta is getting hard to find. Please don't discontinue this one Ben and Jerry!

author: seffie
title: Not enough stuff
text: Eating this right now and so disappointed. There is barely any cookie in here and the ice cream is very bland. Too smooth, needs more chunks. This is basically just coffee ice cream with a couple small pieces of cookie that barely even register.

author: Dejota
title: One of my go to's
text: When gen and jerry's doesn't have a new ice cream out, I have 2-3 go to Ben and jerry's and cycle between them and this is one of the,. I love the cookie core. It's delicious and has two different ice cream flavors wrapped around it? Awesome!

author: kimi326
title: This is the Best B&J Flavor EVER
text: The flavor mash-uo is absolutely incredible—the mocha flavor is paired perfectly with the vanilla and melt-in-your mouth chocolate cookie core. It is drool-worthy. Thank you B&J—please never discontinue it!

author: missyd03
title: the best ever
text: Im not a huge ice cream fan. I am however a huge cookie fan and this hits the spot. it's got the right balance of flavors and the cookie is nice and smooth. on my bad part is its so hard to find in my area.

author: Mary Lu
title: My new favorite
text: This is amazing!!!!! The cookie core is so much better than traditional cookies and cream ice creams. I also love the chocolate flakes. It is really hard to find at the stores around me though :(

author: Jlee82
title: My all time fav!!!
text: I am addicted to this flavor! It is a mixture of delicious and frankly, feel it’s the best flavor Ben &Jerrys ever made. I’m super happy with this flavor and will not be switching anytime soon.

author: Thunderpaws
title: All time favorite
text: Love love love this flavor! The ice cream is so good and I love the core. Please don't change it! The cookie core reminds me of the cookie crumble in Carvel ice cream cakes growing up.

author: CooneyFam
title: Love love love it but....
text: This is one if my favorite of your ice creams but the past two points I have bought, the cookie core stopped about 1/4 way through... do you know why this is? We love your ice cream!!

author: DarlaBel
title: Nothing can top this flavor!!!
text: I am obsessed. This ishands down the best iced cream flavor I've every had. Noone can convince me other wise. If this ever were to be discontinued I legit would cry over it.

author: Ilovecream
title: Good
text: The store was out of the Tonight Dough so I bought this flavor instead. I am not sure if the Tonight Dough just set a really high bar or if this flavor really is mediocre.

author: lalalizzo
title: Fugue state
text: This ice cream was amazing. The flavor and the texture were perfection. Do yourself a favor and buy this ice cream immediately. Especially if you are PMSing.

author: BCornwall
title: Yummmm
text: This is one of my favorite flavors. I go to a specific grocery store just because they carry this flavor. The cookie core and mocha ice cream is delicious!

author: Bryanna
title: My favorite icecream!
text: Once I found this icecream, I never went back. The flavors are amazing and this flavor has the best core of all the other core icecreams. Nothing compares!

author: 1sl3
title: Best flavor of all time
text: I buy this flavor whenever I can find it. It’s hands down the best one but so difficult to find anywhere. Please never, ever discontinue Boom Chocolatta!

author: iscreamuscream
title: May never go back to Chocolate Therapy
text: Couldn't find Chocolate Therapy, so decided to try Boom Chocolatta! Cookie Core. Wow, I may never go back. The substitute therapist was awesome.

author: Syd527
title: Ehhhhh
text: This flavor is pretty simple, vanilla and chocolate ice cream with chocolate chunks. My favorite part is the core, it tastes like and Oreo

author: Mtkw313
title: Core was lacking
text: I love this ice cream and my favorite part is the core, but to my surprise the core quickly ran out about 1/2 of the way down. Very sad.

author: icecreamsmuggler
title: The best Ben & Jerry's I've ever tried
text: To my surprise, this has been the best ice cream flavor I have ever snuck into the movie theaters. It was so good... I wrote a review

author: Emily
title: Core issues
text: Pretty disappointing, core doesn’t go pretty far down like the others and cookies were kind of dry. There is room for improvement.

author: jessicaa
title: loveeeeee it
text: i'm crazy about ben and jerrys caramel ice cream and with thur mocha it's a perfect mixture plus that alcoholic core omg!!!

author: lali0415
title: the best thing in my life
text: It's my go-to ice cream when I'm sad and need to watch a good chick-flick...but is also great for other occasions!!

author: Kacey
title: Sweetness
text: Love it! I think the cookie part could be a little less sweet, it crunches; but other than that...great!

author: Bsblmom
title: I wish I could find Boom Chocolatta
text: Best yet however it’s like it was a tease because I haven’t been able to find in over a year in Rogers Arkansas

author: Al28
title: Heaven in Your Mouth
text: Pure bliss. 11/10. If I had to choose 2 ice creams before I died I would choose this one as one of them.

author: Lizzie
title: A little bit of heaven
text: How can so much deliciousness be packed into a pint? So good, they should sell it by prescription.

author: heidis76
title: The BEST FLAVOR ever!
text: This has me hooked and no other flavors will do. I hope this is NEVER discontinued. Best B&J EVER!

author: Oohreallyystephaniee
title: Delicious
text: I just bought this the other day and I had my sister go out and buy me more because I’m addicted.

author: SydLP
title: Perfect
text: This is such a perfectly balanced pint of ice cream! Textures and flavors together are so good!

author: Thebadasscupcake
title: Best flavor
text: Obsessed with this flavor! The cookie core is the best part and I wish there was more of it.

author: Lilsistr88
title: Boom
text: Best flavor ever. Great anxiety and stress reliever. Do not ever get rid of this flavor

author: mrbdove
title: Mud Pie in a pint! Finally!!
text: I've been looking for Mud Pie for years. Finally I've found it, in a pint of Ben & Jerry's!

author: Josie7044
title: Taste super duper yummy
text: This was the ice-cream I would usually buy with my parents at the store, and It’s my go to.

author: YonE
title: This flavor is amazing
text: Love the cookie core all the flavors and ingredients work well together my favorite by far

author: nicvic1000
title: favorite ice cream of all time
text: the cookie core with the mocha and caramel ice cream surrounding it is truly phenomenal

author: leeb
title: its yummy to eat.
text: we got it a week ago and we enjoy very much and we will got it again.

author: Maga2020
title: The best flavor there has ever been
text: There has never been a better flavor. This is the best. Period. That’s it. The end.

author: TEM33
title: Mocha!
text: Love this flavor! And would love the mocha ice cream as a base for a new flavor!

author: Raesinoz
title: So yum
text: I had a whole tub of this to myself it’s that good - it’s my new favourite

author: Kabasden
title: Amazing
text: Best ice cream I ever ate! If I could get just the core Is the best part

author: Amazingingrid
title: Favorite Flavor
text: best ice cream ever I'm normally a chocolate lover but this is a new fav

author: Brittles42
title: Amazing
text: This is pretty much the best thing I've ever had in my entire life

author: Tcham
title: Amazing flavor
text: First time trying this & it tasted amazing !! Love the cookie core

author: Kylieg
title: I love chocolatta!!!
text: I eat this ice cream at least 3 times a month I am I love with it

author: lily14
title: Delicious!
text: This ice cream is full of fun flavors and textures. 5/5 stars.

author: MamaO
title: My all time favorite
text: This ice cream is so hard to put down and impossible to share.

author: Marleighbob
title: Amazing core!
text: I look for this flavor everywhere I go. Absolutely delicious

author: addylovatic
title: cookie core baby
text: i buy this solely for the cookie crisp core- it’s so good.

author: southernshores
title: Ohhhhhh myyyyy this is my new fav!
text: This flavor is amazing! You guys rock. Thank you so much

title: MY FAVOURITE
text: I literaly just finished a pint before writing this!

author: Gcinna
title: Amazing mix, my favorite!
text: I've bought it every day since I first tried it!!!

author: boom chocolatta cookie
title: Best ice cream flavor ever!
text: This is by the far the best ice cream flavor ever!

author: Amb123
title: Tiniest amount of cookie dough of all time
text: I love Ben & Jerry’s which is why I am writing this review - I feel they would care to know how disappointing this flavor is! The core in the pint I purchased was super small, making it a total disappointment. I kept digging hoping it would get bigger and it just ended up almost disappearing. The ice cream as always was delicious, but I felt I would’ve been more satisfied with my old favorite standby, half baked.

author: ramsey92
title: soo disappointed
text: i am so upset that this didnt meet any of my expectations. the cookie “dough” is just grainy sugar! not to mention i get more cookie dough out of a regular ben & jerry’s cookie dough or even half baked than what i got in this. this needs a reboot! please consider making the core out of your oringinal cookie dough recipe!

author: Tillamookicecreamisbetter
title: Is this a joke?
text: I was so excited for this because I love cookie dough but there’s never enough. I thought the core would look how it’s advertised. Spoiler alert: It didn’t. Barely any dough. Didn’t go all the way through consistently and couldn’t even be in the center. Also the dough didn’t taste great? Idk why but I like the vanilla better. Should have read the reviews first it was such a let down and I feel like I wasted my money.

author: abclementine
title: wish it was better
text: Even after reading all the reviews that said it wasn't good I still went and bought it anyways because it looked & sounded so good, but sadly the reviews are right. most of the time with cookie dough ice cream I wish there was more cookie dough (i thought this would be the super cookie-doughy flavor i always dreamed of.. theres not even that much in it), but with this pint i actually prefer the part around the core that doesn't have any. ben & jerry if u see this please re-make this flavor with better quality cookie dough, it had so much potential

author: Phish Food Fan
title: Heartbreaker
text: I preordered this as soon as they announced that it was available in the online store. I was so excited to dig in but while the ice cream is delicious, the cookie dough core is terrible. Rock hard, gritty, sandy, and very inconsistent in size from the top of the pint to the bottom. I hate having to write this review, especially because the other 2 new cookie cores were pretty good, but this one is REALLY dreadful! I’m really bummed because I wanted badly to love it.

author: APMNSNW
title: Disappointed
text: I waited and waited for this to be available at my local store. Yuck. Hard, grainy cookie dough core? This is nothing like cookie dough. Don’t be fooled, the cookie dough core is SMALL! I’m a Ben and Jerry’s fan, but you lost me here. So disappointed!

author: Icecreamlover1
title: Let down
text: Such a let down from Ben and Jerry’s. The cookie dough core was hard, dry, and basically tasted like granulated sugar. I am so underwhelmed by all the cores but this one was by far the most disappointing. Stick to the regular pints: my opinion best flavor is Gimme S’more.

author: Mickey4
title: Tasted like sweet sand.
text: Bought this last night and was incredibly disappointed. Never write reviews but don’t buy this. The cookie dough was literally like sweet sand. It was gritty and grainy. Threw us away after about 5 bites. I’ll stick to the original Cookie Dough.

author: Magnus
title: The core was a disappointment!
text: I bought this, excited to try it as cookie dough is my favorite. Well the core was rock solid. It had to be eaten in 1 huge chunk instead of mixing with the ice cream. Very disappointed!

author: Deanne
title: An overhyped disappointment
text: I will not buy this again. It's good ice cream, but the "core" is a joke. People buy cookie dough ice cream for , surprise... the cookie dough. This "core" tastes like grainy sugar and shortening and not like cookie dough at all. And there's less than ever. The company found a way to give customers less if what they want with the hopes that all the hype about "new and improved" sways people. Well, I'm not fooled and I believe most others won't be either. It's overpriced and a big disappointment. I repeat, I will not buy again.

author: anghearts
title: Good if you like eating brown sugar
text: I just bought this with very high expectations because the regular Cookie Dough flavor is amazing. The cookie dough core tastes like pure brown sugar. I would definitely not buy this again unless they made it taste like the original cookie dough flavor.

author: BNJ4LYFE
title: Simply AWFUL - Who signed off on this?
text: The idea sounded so amazing, so I did not think it could possibly be as bad as the reviews said it was...Well I was wrong, it is actually worse. The ice cream itself is fine, but the core tastes like just brown sugar crystals. Not even remotely the same flavor or texture as their normal cookie dough. Did someone actually taste this before signing off on it? This is a total miss and anyone who was fooled into buying it should be provided a refund.

author: ePtiOnO
title: Huge disappointment
text: This is not the same flavor as the well known Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough.

author: Mandie
title: Not much cookie dough
text: I bought this at target because they didn’t have the original cookie dough I liked. It’s not good y’all. The dough seems like a new recipe. It’s got an odd texture, like sugar grains didn’t mix well and the chocolate chips are weird. The worst part is there’s not enough weird dough compared to the vanilla ice cream. I hope the old cookie dough hasn’t been replaced with this!

author: John A
title: Great concept, horrible execution
text: I was really excited to see this in my grocer’s freezer. Having had karamel sutra core with its strong ratio of caramel to ice cream, I thought it would be great to get a nice glob of cookie dough going down the center of the pint. Instead, I was left incredibly disappointed with hardly any cookie dough in the entire container. Even worse, the dough included seemed to be dry and crumbly compared to what I’m used to in regular cookie dough. Very disappointing, I won’t be buying this one again unless they improve the formulation and increase the cookie dough. Worst b&j pint I’ve ever purchased.

author: Happy wife happy life
title: This is horrible
text: The regular chocolate chip cookie dough is my favorite and has been for YEARS, its soooo BOMB!! This iteration of it is absolutely disgusting the cookie core is not dough its literally just sugar, and it doesnt even go throughout the entire pint, not even half, not even in the center , its the grossest thing .Some of the other cores are really good which is why i gave this one a try but how could you get chocolate chip cookie dough wrong . I dont normally write reviews but I felt like i HAD to warn someone.

author: pirple
title: Could've been better.
text: When I first heard this flavor was coming out I was so excited. I waited 4 weeks to get my hands on one of these and finally found one yesterday at Wawa. I read the reviews before purchasing this, but decided to give this the benefit of the doubt. Unfortunately, everyone was right. The cookie dough has a sandy texture and crumbles to pieces and it doesn't taste very good either. Plus the core didnt even go all the way to the bottom of the container...definately wasn't worth the $5.99 I paid for it. :(

author: Lyss27
title: Extremely disappointed
text: Wow I love ben and jerrys but this one is sad. I debated between this one and another core one but chose this one due to my love of cookie dough. Well I wish I read the reviews first because they were incredibly right. Grainy cookie dough and the core in mine didn't even go half way down!!!

author: bjoy917
title: Good ice cream, subpar dough
text: At first I thought my taste buds were off, but no...the dough really just tastes (and feels like) brown sugar. Also, the bottom part of my pint had an air bubble, so it was hollow. Overall very disappointing. I'll just stick to the B&J's regular cookie dough ice cream!

author: Mns1275
title: Save your money for a better pint
text: I was soooooo excited to try this!! Then I did and immediately wished I got something else. The ice cream was good but the supposed cookie dough core was like eating brown sugar and chocolate chips. It was so nasty that I ate around it. Truly disappointed....I have never been let down before so I guess there is a first time for everything.

author: Hv234
title: Disappointing Core
text: I've never gotten a cookie dough core pint from Ben and Jerry's, but I'll never buy this again. I was expecting it to look the way the caramel core does when you open it, but instead there is such little cookie dough it would've been better to just get a regular cookie dough or half baked pint. If I'm going to spend $5 for a pint, I would at least like to get what is advertised. The same happened with my boyfriend's brownie batter core so this is not just a one time thing, but a consistent problem.

author: Sammykr
title: Disappointed
text: I have been waiting for this to come out at my grocery store. The minute I could buy it I got it. I was really upset. Like many others have said the cookie dough core is sandy and grainy. I was thinking it was going to be like the cookie dough in the normal ice cream. Really upset about this.

author: Katsad
title: Grainy and barely there.
text: I am a loyal fan and this is the one and only flavor I have thrown away. The pictures make it look amazing and I understand it’s for marketing so variation is expected. That being said the “core” is almost non existent. The bottom half of the ice cream had absolutely no core. The top half had a small chunk. The cookie dough that I did get was grainy and had a funky taste. It wasn’t cookie dough that’s for sure. The ice cream itself was creamy and had a nice flavor but I’m so disappointed that this was such a flop.

title: Cookie dough is very grainy
text: Not at all like non core cookie dough which is soft and tastes really good. The core tastes terrible and has a very hard grainy texture. Not good!

author: j12345
title: Boring, almost disgusting flavor!
text: This is the first time I haven't been able to finish a pint of Ben & Jerry's. Tried it and threw the rest away! I love cookie dough ice cream and thought this would be great, only to be extremely disappointed! The vanilla ice cream is almost tasteless, and the cookie dough "core" was absolutely gross. It had none of the flavors I would expect from cookie dough, basically just sugar with a few chocolate chips. Plus, the core was half the size of the other flavors! This flavor is a HUGE miss, save yourself the trouble and try the sugar cookie core flavor instead!

author: FuzzyGut
title: Chocolate chip cookie dough core! a big yes!
text: My order of these new pints was delivered yesterday from the Ben and Jerry’s online store and last night was Chocolate Chip Cookie dough core. it’s awesome! The ice cream really does taste like cookie milk. I’ve never had anything like it; so yummy. but the star is the core. PERFECT texture and EXCELLENT flavor. The ice cream and the core together are a match made in heaven. It’s sublime. I hope this stays for a long time.

author: APMNSNW
title: Disappointed
text: I wait and waited for this to be available at my local store. Yuck. HARD, grainy, gritty cookie dough core. This is nothing like cookie dough. Don't be fooled the cookie dough center is SMALL. I'm a Ben & Jerry's fan, but you lost me here. So disappointed in my purchase.

author: aniya28
title: Cookie Dough Core
text: I brought this Ice cream because I love the ben and jerry’s cookie dough, so I thought more or the goodness cookies dough. WRONG the cookie dough is not in the middle( which is not a big of a deal) and the cookie dough is gritty and taste like sugar it’s horrible. The reason it has a 3 stars is because the cookie milk ice cream is to die for, it’s just the cookie do is disgusting. This best thing if you do get this is eat around the cookie dough core

author: Kiersten
title: Love B&J, hate this flavor
text: I literally stalked the grocery stores for this to come out and was so excited to snag it. Super disappointed. I’m a huge fan of B&J and cookie dough ice cream but this was terrible. Agree with other reviewers, the cookie dough was grainy and gritty. I didn’t want to throw it out so I kept eating it, but it took me well over 2 weeks to finish a pint. For context, I’m lucky if a pint lasts three days.

author: Cari
title: Core is Nasty
text: I bout the NEW COOKIE DOUGH CORE. Was not good at all when I think of cookie dough it’s soft creamy just like normal cookie dough. It’s like eating sand very big disappointment honestly and I ben&jerrys. Work on this please!

author: Sadmomma13
title: Buy the regular cookie dough version!!
text: Bought this today and was so disappointed! Cookie dough is nothing like in the reg chocolate chip cookie dough. I thought at first maybe it was supposed to have some kind of swirl in it and never found the cookie dough core like you find with the brownie batter version! It’s awful esp if you thunk your getting the cookie dough like in the reg or the bites. I would give it one star but it won’t let me.

author: liz5419
title: Great if you like grit
text: I bought the Cookie Dough Core ice cream because I usually love chocolate chip cookie dough. While the ice cream itself was delicious ( the only reason I didn't give this 1 star), I was completely disappointed by the cookie dough core part. It was gritty and just not good. I ended up eating around it and don't even want to bother with the rest of the pint. No good!

author: Coley00
title: Meh. Nothing special.
text: I gave this product a 3 just because I like cookie dough. I felt like this was no different than the regular chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream. I would have liked to see more cookie dough, like maybe a chocolate chip cookie dough with a cookie dough core, maybe a half chocolate half vanilla.. I think then that would have made more sense. All the other core pint flavors are more special and different this one was boring and basic... not my favorite unfortunately.

author: Jen96
title: Cookie core not good
text: I bought the cookie dough core and the cookie dough was crumbly when I tried to scoop it out. It was hard, had a grainy texture and didn't taste very good at all,nothing like the cookie dough in the half baked. The icecream part was good though

author: Adpqwe
title: DO NOT BUY
text: my brother picked this up on accident instead of the regular one. This was horrible. Absolutely the worst thing I’ve tasted in my life. Grainy dry sand as “dough”. Ice cream below par. Horrible choice all around. I’ll never get that 7$ back. ROBBERY!

author: hockey15
title: Good but could be better
text: I was so so excited to try this because I love cookie dough ice cream. On one hand I want to give this product five stars because the ice cream was delicious and I personally loved the cookie dough in the middle. On the other hand I want to give it one star because it was not what I was expecting and I was still disappointed. I was really hoping for a bigger cookie dough core and I expected for there to still be chunks of cookie dough in the ice cream portion. I was hoping that this new product would finally be ice cream stuffed with cookie dough that I’ve been waiting for.

author: SLange
title: Should have trusted the bad reviews
text: Totally disappointed in this flavor. I love Ben & Jerry’s cookie dough. But the cookie dough core was terrible. First of all the core was more like a cone getting smaller the more you dug down and it didn’t go all the way down to the bottom of the pint. And the cookie dough itself was terrible it was grainy and didn’t have the same taste the cookies dough usually has. It tasted like it was heavy on brown sugar or something. It just wasn’t right. Anyway I was sorely disappointed.

author: Jesspttn
title: Taste very good but....
text: This is really good ice cream and I've had a few. However they need to put more cookie dough in the core. There is never enough. Never goes to the bottom of the carton or very little amount

author: SadMomma
title: Love hate relationship
text: I love Cookie Dough Core but so disappointing when you eat one and it has an inch of core. This was my third time buying one like the one seen in the photo.

author: Chad123
title: Bad
text: I just bought this today and when I opened it the cookie dough wasn’t even in the middle and there was barely any

author: SimplyWiehl
title: More like cookie butter
text: We love all Ben and Jerry's ice cream. Any with cookie dough are our favorite. We were so excited to hear about this new flavor, however once we tried it we were disappointed that the core isn't cookie dough at all, but rather more like a cookie butter. It's sugary and not doughy. This was a disappointment, however it still taste good. The cookie dough ice cream is better. In addition, the dough part is not even in the middle like the photos nor does it go all the way through. Suggestion would be to have a core made out of cookie dough bites piled in the middle.

author: PedNurse
title: Disappointment
text: Nope, Nope, Nope! You cannot fool a cookie dough expert. I had my heart set on this having a REAL cookie dough core. Much to my dismay, the core was nothing like the cookie dough in your other ice creams. :(

author: MarsTheMartian
title: Pretty good!
text: I bought this Yesterday and immediately dug into it once I was finish eating my food, I had read some views about this before and notice they were pretty awful so I decided to never buy this until the reviews change. Well yesterday, I asked my mom could she buy me any Ben and Jerry’s I’ve Cream that had cookie dough in it and this is what she brought me, my immediate reaction was “oh no.” But hey, I didn’t mind trying it! Fast forward to when I opened the pint, there was cookie dough in the center and pretty thick(obviously you can see it in the picture) and was like, oh wow! So I decided to eat the ice cream first and I noticed it really tasted like a cookie had been soaked in some milk for about three minutes, and I was shocked because it tasted amazing! I got to the dough and remembered how one person stated it had a grainy texture, so I dug in and it did, but it didn’t really bother me THAT MUCH, it still tasted a bit like cookie dough, so I just scooped some of the dough and icecream together and that kind of made it better, I also remembered how some people said there was barely any in there but mine was PACKED with dough and it was so much that in some areas, the dough was showing more than the icecream itself! I would totally buy this again and put some of their cookie dough bites inside to make the ultimate cookie dough core flavor there is! 4/5 rating!

author: ChrisColby
title: D'oh!
text: After a month of waiting for this flavor, it didn't quite meet my expectations. The cookie dough core, which was supposed to be the highlight, was disappointing. The texture is too grainy while the flavor tastes off. On top of that, the core wasn't spread evenly from the top to bottom of the pint I tried.

author: vickiwmi
title: Worst cookie dough EVER!!
text: Now let me just say that chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream is my favorite B&J flavor. I bought this new flavor about a week ago thinking it would be great. How can you go wrong with a choc chip cookie dough core I thought. Boy was I wrong. I took one bite of that cookie dough core, and went "Blech!" The ice cream with chocolate bits was good. That was it. What recipe they used to make this cookie dough core is not even close to the taste or consistency of the classic original. The taste is vile. I would not waste your time buying this flavor.

author: Catz228
title: Cookie dough taste is disgusting
text: If you love the cookie dough from the regular ice cream don't buy this! I don't think I've ever been this disappointed in a Ben and Jerry's flavor. The cookie dough they use for the core is completely different in the worse ways. It's mushy and taste like garbage. It's salty and weird tasting. I like lots of different kinds of cookie dough. I don't think I've ever tasted any kind of cookie dough that I've hated before. Until now. How did this pass taste testing? Good thing there was hardly any core anyway so I can still eat the ice cream part.

author: wookiecookielover
title: Great Cookie Dough; Needs more of it
text: Kept an eye out for this in the store as soon as I heard it was coming out and bought the first one I could find. The ice cream flavor was good and the fudge chips added much needed interest to the pint. The cookie dough was delicious, although there wasn't enough of it. The core was off center and didn't go all the way to the bottom of the pint. Could be remedied by adding cookie dough chunks to the ice cream or increasing the size/quality of the core.

author: reen
title: Dissapointing
text: Like most other reviewers i found the core terrible. Bad texture and bad taste.

author: Jhutch12
title: Disappointed
text: I bought this with so much excitement, when I took that first bite into the core, yuck! The cookie dough is just straight sugar, when you chew it your feel the grinds on your teeth. I love the chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream and that is the cookie dough I expected the core to be filled with and boy was I wrong! Do not purchase this kind, you will just end up throwing it away like I did

author: AnnieD
title: That's not dough!
text: I was really disappointed with the cookie dough in the core. It was dry and crumbly, not creamy and doughy like the regular CCCD. It also has an off flavor...like they spilled the vanilla when making this crusty old dough. The ice cream part was decent. I saw somebody else noted a big air bubble at the bottom. I'm had the same experience. I do not recommend and will not purchase again.

author: HanC
title: Bad Mistake
text: My family bought this on accident thinking it was the regular cookie dough recipe. I tried it anyways and it was way too sweet. The cookie milk was not a smart move, there was nothing to offset the sweetness of the cookie dough. Cookie dough with just vanilla is much better in my opinion. Also, the cookie dough was very grainy and mostly tasted like straight up sugar.

author: Mrs050716
title: Mixed feelings on mix-ins
text: The core is very gritty and tastes odd on its own, but tastes good with the ice cream. The sugar in the cookie dough wasn’t beaten long enough to get rid of the graininess and could’ve been so much better. The base is unique and creamy and the chocolate flakes are solid, though I wish there were more of them. Overall, a bit underwhelming with a disappointing core.

author: whydoyoudothisjerry
title: Not enough cookie dough
text: I loooove cookie dough ice cream. When I saw the core on the package I was like “heck yes! Extra cookie dough!” Psych! There’s like NONE and it’s impossible to scoop out. Then, the cookie dough itself is disgusting! It tastes like how I imagine literal fish food would. I absolutely hate it and I genuinely think it was a waste of my money.

author: bgdl26
title: Very disappointed
text: I was so excited to try this as I love cookie dough. Literally went to multiple different grocery stores all over NYC for weeks to find this. What a let down. The cookie dough core is not good. Very crumbly and grainy, like sand is in it. No where near the creaminess and taste of cookie dough used in Tonight Dough, Half Baked or the regular Cookie dough. Ice Cream was good at least. If you're a fan of cookie dough, skip this and hopefully they revisit the recipe.

title: So disappointed
text: I’m so sad I wasted $12 on this ice cream, I am in Australia and I was so excited to try this and i am so let down I didn’t even eat it. The cookie dough is grainy and tastes nothing like the cookie dough that’s in the rest of the flavours, and the “fudge” pieces are just dark chocolate. Do not waste your money!

author: Chefscott
title: The worst cookie dough!
text: One of my favorite flavors is the cookie dough. Expectations were highly disappointed when the same cookie dough recipe was not in this cookie dough core flavor. I’m not even sure it’s cookie dough. I think it’s pure brown sugar. Will not buy this flavor again unless they put the original cookie dough in it!

author: Ghost
title: Ehh
text: Im eating this flavor as we speak and the other reviews are right! Tastes NOTHING like the cookie doigh in the other flavors. It has a sandy, gritty texture like chewing on sugar. Im going to finish it though because the rest of it is alright. But yeah i’ll just stick to my favorite one , Half Baked!!!

author: Doglover88888888
title: Extremely dissappointed! Don't waste your money!!
text: I've bought this a few different times, each time hoping it would be better than the last. I kept thinking "okay, I must have had bad luck and gotten a bad batch". Unfortunately after buying approximately 5 to 6 pints, I've come to the conclusion that this just isn't good in any way. The "cookie milk" ice cream just tastes like regular old vanilla but with a slightly weird taste and extremely weird aftertaste. The "cookie dough" core (which, in my opinion, is supposed to be the best part and main attraction) was horrible! Did NOT taste like cookie dough AT ALL! Even the texture was so, soooooo off! Just like all the other reviews say - TASTES LIKE SWEETENED SAND! Now don't get my wrong - I am usually a HUGE fan of B&J's - however this particular flavor just is completely so far off from the quality I've come to know and love, and expect from this brand. This could have been an amazing and wonderful flavor but unfortunately this missed the mark. Extremely dissappointed, B&J's!! Do better!!

author: kelly1234
title: awful texture
text: Was so excited to try this because I love Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough. I experienced disappointment at the first bite. The Cookie Chip Dough Core was like eating super gritty sugar sand. I am hoping Ben & Jerry will switch and use their original Cookie Dough recipe in this new "core" ice cream.

author: Shaysha
title: Not quite dough texture
text: The first flavor I've been disappointed with. The "cookie dough" core has the texture of brown sugar. When you chew it you can feel the sugar crystals. Its not the same as the cookie dough balls in the regular cookie dough pint. I did still polish off the pint though since the ice cream is good

author: Seb10
title: Stick to Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text: The ratio of cookie dough to ice cream is off. By the time you get to the bottom of the pint, all that's left is the vanilla ice cream with little chocolate bits. You're better off getting chocolate chip cookie dough which is more consistent and has a better cookie dough-to-ice cream ratio.

author: Brinababy
title: Cookie core is nasty
text: I just had this ice cream a hour ago, the actually ice is not bad at all but the cookie dough just ruined it for me. It tasted so gritty , I thought maybe I should mix it up and it made it even worse. I ended up scooping as much of the cookie dough out that I could. Smh

author: addison20
title: Ice cream: GREAT Core: BLEH
text: The ice cream part is so good!! I was so excited to try this, my favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor is half baked mostly because of the cookie dough haha. So a COOKIE DOUGH CORE I was pumped. I was so so disappointed it tasted like nothing honestly, just pure sugar and very very grainy. If they would have replicated the regular cookie dough balls into the core it could’ve been fantastic, but this just isn’t good I really wish it was :/

author: Mtan89
title: Not what I expected
text: Listen to the bad reviews. the core does not taste like their regular cookie dough. It tastes grainy, like brown sugar. And the rest of it is just chocolate chip ice cream. So nothing exciting. The wake and bake ice cream core was the same. Super grainy.

author: Lania
title: Disappointed
text: The cookie milk ice cream was the only thing I liked about the product. As a cookie dough lover, I was very disappointed in the cookie dough core. It tasted nothing like cookie dough, just grainy like sugar. I’ll stick with other cookie dough varieties.

author: Lena327
title: A pint that I ate in one sitting
text: I'm not the hugest fan of cookie dough in ice cream, so I'm going to be honest I ate around the cookie dough core and OH MAN the cookie milk flavored ice cream is probably the yummiest ice cream flavor I've ever had! YUM

author: SantaMonicaGirl
title: Amazing
text: I love the cookie milk ice cream. I wish they would use this as the base for more flavors. The chocolate chips are also delicious and I’ve always had plenty of cookie dough in my pints. This flavor is the best!

author: Catguy
title: Waste of money
text: AWFUL. I’m a huge fan of Ben & Jerrys cookie dough and this was such a disappointment. The cookie dough core crumbles and is as hard as a rock. It’s grainy and tastes terrible, too.

author: Celine
title: No core
text: I bought this for the cookie dough core and there is no cookie dough core.. this is the second pint of "core" I've cream that didn't even have a core. I'm really disappointed.

author: wren1021
title: Terrible
text: Ice cream tasted like artificial sweeteners and the core was nothing like cookie dough in taste or texture. Was very disappointed, totally not worth the price (or calories)

author: trippo
title: the core is quite awful...
text: The cookie dough core taste terrible, like it has some kind of sweeteners in it. the after taste lingers like sour milk...don't buy this!

title: Kind of a Bummer
text: The ice cream is nice but could use something besides just chips. The core is grainy and sugary totally unlike the regular cookie dough.

author: ALC25
title: Grainy cookie dough
text: I was looking forward to trying this, but it was a let down. The ice cream was decent, but the cookie dough core was grainy and sad.

author: Diamond248
title: HORRIBLE DISAPPOINTMENT
text: I was excited to get Ben&Jerrys ice cream after a long time. I expected it to be another amazing experience. I brought this Pint of I cream only to find that the cookie dough core was small, it wasn’t EVEN A CORE! It was off to the side, fell apart. It’s a whole scam idk why they even continue to sell this Ice cream in this condition. I should have checked the reviews. Y’all obviously don’t pay attention to customer reviews cause you would notice this is unacceptable. Smh

author: Bay boo
title: Grainy “cookie dough” core
text: This is terrible! The cookie dough core is basically brown sugar with chocolate. I wish I could get my money back.

author: M and M
title: Yummy
text: I love every ice cream they put out. I particularly love this flavor and I recommend it to everyone.

author: Pennerr689
title: More cookie
text: I’m pretty sure there is less cookie dough in throw then there is in the regular one

author: IceCreamIsSpecial
title: No cookie dough in this version
text: Tried this for the first time and the other reviews summarized it perfectly.

author: disappointedbythecore
title: Something is very wrong
text: I regularly purchace and enjoy the Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough ice cream so I thought I'd try the new Core version that had just arrived in NZ. What a big mistake, it is disgusting. It does not taste the same and the cookie dough is awful, its grainy and basically inedible. I deeply regret straying away from the normal version and strongly recommend people read and heed the advice of the majority of other reviews here and avoid this strange disastrous flavour!

author: Crayolaphile
title: Too Sweet!
text: I took it upon myself to try every new flavor with chocolate in it and rate it. You’re welcome. I find the cookie dough core so sweet. IMHO the ice cream base should be vanilla. In addition, the cookie dough core should either have salted butter in it or add a little salt to mimic butter. That would cut the sweetness. Do not salted caramel or chocolate sea salt, YUCK! Anyway, just my take on it. Also, please bring back Dublin Mudslide! It was my favorite.

author: cookiedoughlady
title: Its a cookie dough lovers dream come true!
text: Its a dream come true. Just when I thought it couldn't get better, there's more cookie dough than before. Continue to make the core as large as possible- never short change the core.

author: DonnaBella
title: Plenty of Dough
text:
I've had this a few times now and there's plenty of cookie dough in the pints I've had. I love that I don't have to go searching for the dough in these pints!
My only issue is it's not sold at my local Giant Eagle, which has B&J Core pints but there's not even a spot on their shelf for the chocolate chip cookie dough core flavor. I only get it when I'm at my mom's lol.

author: heatherglow29
title: Great Potential -- Poor Exection
text: My all-time favorite ice cream is, hands down, original cookie dough by Ben and Jerry's. So I was thrilled to see they had a core version featuring cookie dough as its magical center. Boy was I disappointed to taste the grainy, overly sugary, poor substitute they chose to use in place of their original cookie dough recipe. Ben and Jerry, please rework this product and try using your original winner of a recipe for the cookie dough core!

title: Bad Texture!
text: I bought this today at my local HEB, and thought I would try it since I love the chocolate chip cookie dough, honestly because I love cookie dough, but the cookie dough in this ice cream is grainy. It is hard to scoop because of the grainy texture, making it hard to actually enjoy the ice cream. The ice cream itself is amazing, but what’s the point of buying chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream, if you don’t enjoy the cookie dough.

author: Kelcie
title: This girl needed ice cream better than that :(
text: I'm sick and all I wanted was cookie dough ice cream. I couldn't find the classic that I could always count on, so I went with this. The core was a crumbly texture and it tasted like I was eating clumps of brown sugar. The ice cream flavor just tasted like milk with unsweetened chocolate and I am not a fan of solid milk. I recomend bringing back the original cookie dough ice cream. :( Seriously so sad and disappointed.

author: SueP
title: Ice Cream Failure
text: My husband loves all ice cream. But not this one. I gave it to him after I decided I couldn't eat it. We both agree the ice cream tastes like rice pudding with a lot of water and the cookie dough core does not taste anywhere near as delicious as Ben and Jerry's cookie dough. We haven't had a bad Ben & Jerry's flavor until this one! If you're craving cookie dough, go with any of their other cookie dough varieties.

author: Homie
title: Disappointed
text: I bought this because the store i went to didn’t have my favorite chocolate chip cookie dough pint. I figured it may be just as good since it still is cookie dough. I was wrong and extremely disappointed. The core was crispy and broke every time I tried to scoop it. The flavor was more like toasted piece of bread than cookie. I will stick with the original chocolate chip cookie dough which has never let me down.

author: Potterd8
title: Cookie milk ice cream
text: I loved the flavor of the cookie milk ice cream! I actually came to the website to see if any other flavors had that type of ice cream. Like many other reviewers I’m very disappointed by the cookie dough core. I was expecting it to be like the cookie dough ice cream but instead it was very gritty. I’m very torn on if I’d get this flavor again. I loved the ice cream flavor but really didn’t care for the “core”

author: LINDZ Loves Ben
title: Googled to make sure it wasn’t just me
text: Bought this instead of my regular go tos (half baked or brownie batter core) since it was new! I am so disappointed because the cookie dough actually does just taste like brown sugar and is gritty. I ended up here on the reviews because I googled to make sure it wasn’t just my taste buds or that there was something wrong with my purchase. Sure enough others have posted the same thing :(

author: megan04
title: My absolute
text: This ice cream is AMAZING. The flavor of the ice cream is extremely light and is loaded with chocolate chips. The core itself has a gritty texture but tastes almost identical to raw cookie dough.

author: Spacecadet1
title: Horrible- Gritty and Grainy and Gross
text: This was a perfect example of a marketing bumble. If I get a spoonful of ice cream I want each bite to have a little bit of goodness in it. I shouldn’t have to go digging for it. The “core” is nothing but a grainy sugar that is flavoured with something that vaguely represents dough. I can actually imagine the assembly line pumping out this stuff. Soooo disappointing.

author: Gbizzy91
title: Cookie milk ice cream is worth it, by itself
text: You have to try the ice cream in this one... worth it!

author: Dnwells526
title: My Absolute New Favorite Flavor
text: I love the texture of the cookie core; it’s soft enough to eat without difficulty. The taste is AMAZING...the cookie milk ice cream is spot on.

author: Daelijon
title: Love it but with there was more!
text: I bought the cookie dough core, and I loved the fact that there was dough all the way down to the bottom, however not all of them are the same. It seems like not enough dough to be a core of the ice cream and it’s sometimes a very thin core as well. Cookie dough ice cream is something we crave.. I would assume a product came out sooner than later that does that.

author: Icecream372593
title: So disappointed
text: I saw the ad and went to the grocery store that night to buy some. I ate around the cookie dough core bc it was so grainy and sugary and not anything like the cookie dough in the other ice creams that it wasn’t even worth it. Let’s be honest - there’s so many calories in these pints that if I’m going to eat it I need to love it and this was way below par

author: Abbey96
title: Ben & Jerry never let me down!!
text: Perfection in every dreamy creamy cookie dough-y bite!

author: Danielle123
title: Disappointing
text: I bought this pint despite the reviews because I was excited to try it for myself. All the reviews are accurate though. The ice cream itself is delicious! But the cookie dough core is not good at all. It has an almost fruity taste to it and is extremely gritty in texture. It's nothing like their normal cookie dough. Definitely won't be buying again.

author: JLDJTmom
title: Be warned!
text: I was so excited for this ice cream as chocolate chip cookie dough it my favorite..I was expecting a core of cookie dough with the same taste and texture of the bits in the regular ice cream. Instead it is gritty and doesn't even taste like cookie dough. I am extremely dissatisfied. Even my 11 year old son thinks it's terrible. Please reformulate!

author: Kim123
title: Off Texture
text: Ben and Jerry's Ice cream has been my favorite since I was a little kid, however...this one the textures were off. The cookie dough was grainy and tasted like flour or another ingredient was missing. The ice cream was icey in texture, not creamy. I had to double check I didn't get a frozen yogurt version. Wondering if the batch was off?

author: icecream456
title: the core is terrible.
text: i tried this thinking that the cookie dough would be like the chunks in half baked. it was not. it was very gritty and it almost had a liquor flavor. i hated it. although it did not taste good, the core went all the way to the bottom. the ice cream was great though. that is the only reason why this is getting 2 stars instead of one.

author: Cousin Vinnie
title: Huge Disappointment for Life Long B&J Fan
text:
Everyone expects a core of cookie dough throughout, when buying it. Unfortunately, you only get a small gob in the middle. Pretty sure you get more (quality and quantity) from the regular cookie dough flavor than this core flavor.
The only reason why it didn't get a 1 star was because the cookie milk ice cream was pretty tasty.

author: Windysmile
title: Let down
text: This was the first time I was ever disappointed by a Ben and Jerry’s pint. The milk and cookies flavor icecream was just rather plain and very sugary. I wish there was more texture going on. And the core just tasted like a ball of sugar. It was anything I couldn’t eat, but it also wasn’t anything I was enjoying eating.

author: BabyBullet
title: Where is the cookie dough??
text: I was expecting to be overwhelmed with cookie dough deliciousness however I am left wondering what went wrong. There was no “core” and really no cookie dough. The ice cream in my opinion is ok but the lack of cookie dough was super disappointing. There is way more dough in the original. My advice skip this one.

author: Joyce
title: Not what I expected
text: I tried this thinking it would be as good as regular cookie dough. I was highly disappointed. The "core" was not anything like the regular cookie dough. It was very grainy and sugary. Also, the pint was not fully filled. There was an empty space about 2/3 the way down. I will not buy this product again.

author: JRobertson
title: Delish But Disappointing
text: I was soooo thrilled that it would be a core of the same cookie dough they use in Half Baked and the Tonight Dough. But it really just tasted like granulated brown sugar. I’m soooo sad about that. Because their regular chocolate chip cookie dough is the best you can find. Oh man I hope the replace it.

author: Caitlyn1269
title: Disappointed
text: I was so excited to try this ice cream since cookie dough ice cream is my favorite. I was very disappointed in the cookie dough "core" it was very chalky and almost sand like. The flavor of cookie dough was not there at all. And the core was more of a sliver. Really hoped this would have been better.

author: Brooke567
title: Not the same as their cookie dough ice cream
text: I bought this thinking that it would be the same cookie dough as what's in their regular ice cream that I like but this cookie dough tastes like watery sand. I would love to see this product made with the same cookie dough in the core as what's in the regular chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream.

author: cookies
title: So Sad
text: This had great potential - you guys should have stuck to your regular cookie dough... no cookie dough lover would enjoy this... the "dough" core is gritty, the texture is horrible, its like eating sand in your ice cream. nasty. I love ben and jerrys but this is a big let down remake the recipe!!!

author: Asa17
title: Unfortunately not good
text: I eat a lot of Ben and Jerry's, like a lot. And I was so stoked to see this flavor because I love the cookie dough in your other ice creams. Unfortunately mine was as everyone else described. The cookie dough was too runny, and tasted like melted butter. The ice cream itself was great as always.

author: Sad Mary
title: So so bad
text: I bought this since there was no choc chip cookie dough in stock and figured it would be similar. The dough is like eating unprocessed brown sugar, grainy and way too sweet. The ice cream is fine, but I still threw it all away because the dough is so bad. DO NOT BUY THIS FLAVOR, EEEEEKKKKK!!

author: Sofía_1st
title: So good and better than original
text: I’m living for the cookie milk ice cream. It is sooooo goood and I need more of it asap. It got me through finals too

author: Alexis2019
title: Ice cream, delicious! Core, yuck!
text: The ice cream is the best part. Tastes like cookies and cream. Delicious! But the core...tastes nothing like their regular cookie dough. I can’t find the words to describe the taste but it is not good and leaves a weird aftertaste. Exactly like the other reviews.....texture is like wet sand.

author: Ashley03
title: Cookie dough core is gross
text: I wanted to try the core ice cream so bad so even though it wasn’t on sale I went ahead and bought it cause it looked soooooo good, honestly it’s the most nastiest ice cream I’ve ever tried!!! The core has such a weird texture to it, and taste nothing like cookie dough, super disappointed

author: Matt420
title: Mehh
text: This really shoulda been flippin amazing. The icecream and fudge chips are great but the texture of the core does knock it down a few pegs. If it had the texture of the cookie dough used in the regular chocolate chip cookie dough/half baked it would be amazing. Overall I'd say 2.8 outta 5

author: J4de777
title: Awesome
text: Definitely one of my most favourite ice cream flavours just wish there was more Cookie Dough in it!!!

author: Steph66
title: So disappointed
text: I just picked this up and was excited to have more cookie dough... But I almost couldn't find any. I had three small little spots of cookie dough and it was very grainy, not like the cookie dough in the original cookie dough ice cream. Will NOT be buying this one again. Wasted my money

author: Court1991
title: Texture is off.
text: Cookie dough ice cream is my favorite. While the flavor is fine, I don’t enjoy the texture of the cookie dough core. It’s almost just like flavored sugar, and doesn’t really provide the cookie dough feel. Overall, it’s not bad, I was just craving cookie dough and this missed the mark.

author: Tgreens
title: Expected so much more
text: I have been anxiously waiting for this flavor to hit stores near me, and I finally found it today. Was soooo excited to try it out! However, was extremely disappointed when the “cookie dough” core didn’t even taste like cookie dough! Not even close on texture or flavor unfortunately.

author: Dls20
title: Not great
text: I was so excited to try this as I have such a love for cookie dough and love the globs of cookie dough in the normal cookie dough ice cream. It was such a disappointment though, the ice cream part was good but the cookie dough core was incredibly grainy and had an off flavor.

author: Melissa829
title: Surprised by the negative reviews!
text: I really love this one and buy it often. I have never experienced a “tiny” amount of cookie dough like many of the reviews state. However, I would give 5 stars if there were also some cookie dough pieces in the vanilla sides or chocolate chip cookies or something like that

author: Chryflavantacids
title: Worst flavor ever
text: I bought this a week ago at Walmart Neighborhood Market and I was so excited to try it. But then the moment came that I did and it was terrible! There hardly any cookie dough pieces and the core was grainy and gross. Do not buy this flavor it is the worst I’ve ever had.

author: gdnmtravel 786990
title: Great texture
text: My and my family loves Ben and Gerry ice cream 5 star ice cream

author: xnadiva67
title: it's not cookie dough
text: got this Sunday and was so excited to try it, as my local store was out of the kind my boyfriend likes (chubby hubby) and it was like eating brown sugar bombs. there was no cookie dough. maybe the ice cream box got mixed up when it was being packaged. I was NOT a fan

author: Liv0
title: To plain
text: I bought this flavor and was really excited about the cookie dough core but when I bought it the cookie dough wasn’t very good, it was hard and difficult to scoopand there wasn’t enough of it, not to mention the actual cookie milk ice cream didn’t taste like much

author: Bacho1234567
title: Great icecream, bad dough
text: It is disappointing, because the actual ice cream is quite delicious! However, the cookie dough itself is as if they forgot to add flour; it's like a heavy sugar stick. If it were the same dough from the cookie dough ice cream, this ice cream would EASILY be 5/5!

author: Loveleigh
title: Disappointing
text: The cookie dough core is a grainy sugar mess! The ice cream itself is also a huge letdown. It tastes nothing like the delicious chocolate chip ice cream in the usual cookie dough flavor. I have no desire to finish the carton, and I’ll never purchase it again.

author: nic14
title: Amazing Flavor
text:
I bought this a couple days ago and it is the best ice cream I have ever purchased. Tastes
EXACTLY like chocolate chip cookies dipped in milk! I hope this flavor is never discontinued!! I plan on purchasing all the remaining ones at my local grocery store!!

author: Jewells
title: Bring back the original!
text: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough used to be my FAVORITE B&J ice cream. I just tried the NEW Cookie Dough Core. The Cookie Dough in the new version has a strange taste and texture (not strange good). Please bring back the previous product. Pretty please.

author: abimaybe
title: Gross
text: This was disgusting. I expected the cookie dough from the normal ice cream or half baked and what I got was a gritty mess. The ice cream wasn’t terrible but the cookie dough solidified my feelings. Skip this. Get the normal cookie dough instead.

author: amurer
title: Grainy Cookie Dough
text: At first I thought I had a bad batch but after seeing other reviews it sounds like I’m not the only one. The cookie dough core is like eating sweet sand. The ice cream was great as always but something is very off with the cookie dough recipe

author: Abohzh
title: Good
text: Fantastic game good graphics good music own good way to its addictive gameplay and

author: jhirst
title: YUM!!
text: I love the chocolate chunk and vanilla ice cream.  Unfortunately I cannot find vanilla chocolate chunk anymore, I also like chunky monkey, but the the big chunks of dark chocolate in vanilla were the best!! This is the next best thing!!!

author: Amarie
title: Nope!
text: I was so excited for this to come out! Ben & Jerry's cookie dough is my favorite. However, the cookie dough core was just a gritty disappointment. The cookie dough core is so grainy and sand-like. I hope they reformulate and try again!

author: midnitestich
title: Save your money
text: I hope this isn't going to replace the regular chocolate chip cookie dough. It's more like a container of chocolate chip with hardly any cookie dough. The cookie dough doesn't even taste the same. I won't be buying this again

author: Disappointed1
title: Recipe changed
text: I bought this 4 days ago because I couldn’t find my regular chocolate chip cookie dough. Not only does the cookie dough recipe taste different but so does the ice cream I’m so disappointed. I will be going back to Hagen Diaz.

author: Goatgirl01
title: Least favorite flavor
text: This is my new least fave, even worse than Schweitzer’s Balls. The ice cream doesn’t have much flavor, just sweet. The core is puny: maybe 2-3 bites. The flavor of the core is ok (the only redeeming feature) but grainy

author: 37oz
title: Weird cookie dough
text: A big letdown. The cookie dough was completely different than you would find in the non-core offering - to the point that I almost wondered if something was wrong with it. The ice cream portion was very tasty.

author: Fadedtimekeeper
title: It works
text: The cookie dough itself is sandy ans grainy, it has an odd taste I can't really lay my finger on. But if you eat enough of the ice cream with the core it balances out a lot better and isn't as noticeable.

author: martya25
title: Disappointed with the core
text: I bought this flavor on 10/15/19. I love cookies and ice cream so I was excited to try this cookie dough center. I was expecting an actual cookie dough texture but really it’s just grainy and sugar like.

author: Beth828
title: Ewww
text: Should have read the reviews first. I don’t even mind the grainy texture of the cookie dough. But it tastes horrible! Not like cookie dough at all. This could have been amazing. Super disappointed.

author: Albie
title: Just gross.
text: This ice cream tastes cheap and gross. I usually love all their stuff but this one was just nasty. The "icecream" tasted like they just froze a cup of milk and the cookie dough was grainy and crumbly.

author: Ar124
title: pretty disgusting
text: the cookie milk ice cream is okay, chocolate chips are chocolate chips...but wow that cookie dough core is gross. so horribly grainy and not a good flavor. they should really offer people a refund

author: Bossmoose96
title: The ice cream flavor it’s self was good chips not
text: The ice cream flavor itself was delicious but the chocolate chips were gross they need to be milk chocolate the core was tasty but the texture was very grainy needs to be cooked a little bit more

author: Niece
title: The worst one i ever had!!
text: I bought one because i love cookie dough. Ben and Jerry's is my favorite icecream after one bite I was so disappointed! The texture of it was the worst I couldn't eat I throw it in the trash.

author: Jody 33
title: Sorry I bought it
text: The cookie dough core tasted more like a scoop of brown sugar with some chip chunks in it. I’m sorry but there was nothing cookie dough about it. Totally disappointed and a waste of money.

author: Lacey
title: Ice cream good cookie dough not so
text: The ice cream favor was good but the cookie dough itself didn't taste like cookie dough had grainy like texture due to too much sugar. Not what I expected out of Ben and Jerry's

author: Megan411
title: Great Idea with a Terrible Execution
text: This is the ice cream everyone dreams, but alas, a dream it will remain. The “cookie dough” is basically just brown sugar, about the size of dime throughout. Pass this one up!

author: Radzach
title: Amazing idea mediocre execution
text: The cookie dough was grainy and there was less than any other flavor containing cookie dough. The ice cream was great but I was expecting an amazing cookie dough core.

author: Nonnahs402
title: Where is the cookie dough!?
text: I was excited to try this ice cream. I was very disappointed. The cookie dough “core” was tiny. I think I get more cookie dough in regular chocolate chip cookie dough.

author: Djal
title: Barely any cookie dough
text: This pint tastes great but feels like it has way less cookie dough than the regular one. I waited months for this and was really disappointment.

title: nasty
