text: This is hands down my favourite flavour. The only way it could be improved is by replacing the vanilla ice cream with more chocolate haha! BUT the Australian Ben and Jerry's has stopped selling it here so now it exists only in my dreams..... No other flavour matches up in my opinion

author: jakevett9
title: AMAZINGGGGGGGGG
text: I just had this flavor last night! The core was so thick and gooey just like brownie batter! My core ran all the way to the bottom. I had lots of brownie chunks in mine and they were delicious and chewy!!!! Best ice cream I have ever had. If you're a brownie lover, eat this.

author: JamieG2020
title: Where is the core?
text: Fudge Brownie is my absolute favorite flavor as well as the boom chocalata cookie core one so I decided this flavor would be the holy grail!! But only 1/3 of the pint had the core part opposed to the other flavors that I’ve tried having core in the whole pint! Why is this?

author: Stevi
title: Love the core till it was gone
text: I love several flavors of Ben and jerrys ice cream I just recently tried this flavor and fell in love but all 3 pints I have eaten i too have missed the core not even half way through. It ls amazing but not near as amazing without the core!!! Definitely needs more!!!

author: PapaSmurf
title: Good but not great
text: It’s hard to ever give a bad review on Ben and Jerry’s ice cream, but I am going to try. As far as brownie goes, I only got little hints, but the core was great. The brownie flavor was good, just not enough of it. As always, the ice cream was still very enjoyable.

author: lilianna
title: Amazing!!
text: I love this ice cream!! I have actually never had a problem with the core because whenever I buy these the core goes all the way to the bottom. Anyway if you like chocolate and vanilla and brownies separately you’re gonna LOVE them all together with this flavor!

author: c_pro
title: Gimme more core (and brownies)!
text: Man, I wanted to love this but I was completely disappointed by the core which did not go all the way to the bottom (not to mention the lack of brownie pieces). Ugh, Ben and Jerry’s, please fix ASAP as this pint has the potential to knock it out of the park!

author: tmarie14
title: NEW FAVORITE FLAVOR
text: The first and only time i’ve had it i absolutely loved it. Im impatiently waiting for my local publix to restock it i might try my local walmart to see if they have it though. i ate it on it for 2 days and i couldnt get enough of it. it’s my new favorite!!!

author: maggiep
title: Great Flavor, not enough core!
text: I love this flavor, but I've gotten it twice and both times the core has disappeared about halfway through the pint. I haven't had this issue with other core flavors, so it seems to be unique to this flavor. It would be perfect if it reached the bottom!

author: liyah21
title: Upset customer
text: I buy brownie batter core about 3-4 times a week and for about the past month every batch has dried out brownies and it’s literally disgusting. Haven’t had a good batch in a month! And i hate chocolate and this actually made me like chocolate.

author: Elaine B
title: I can't get rid of all these muffin stubs!
text: This is a great ice cream. The only negative is the brownie batter core only goes 3/4s the way down. Leaving the 1/4 usually going the dog. Still well worth the purchase. Thank you guys for making the best ice cream in the world.

author: Karen
title: Best Flavor Ever
text: The year 2017 has been all about Brownie Batter when l find it on Sale l buy all the store has twice. Unfortunately, l have to have one every night and my weight shows it. So, l decided to give up food so l could have my ice cream.

author: Iceeeeeeekreamm
title: Bland
text: Tried this out hoping for a little bit of a variety in the chocolate and vanilla taste. All I got was a bland chocolate with not much else. If the texture and chocolate flavor itself had even a slight variation it would be ok.

author: mpg1904
title: Not enough core
text: I decided to try a new flavor and while the flavor was delicious, the core did not go to the bottom of the container. It ended about 2/3 of the way down which was disappointing because that was the best part of the ice cream.

author: Sydsm
title: DISGUSTING
text: Please tell me why the brownie core is probably the worst taking brownie batter possible? First of all the viscosity is wayyyy off! No brownie batter is that this/ taste like the fakest chocolate on earth. Never getting again

author: Jake3469
title: So good
text: I don’t know why this one is rated around only 3 1/2 - 4 stars, it is honestly so good! It’s basically a hot fudge sundae mixed with brownies. Honestly one of their best flavors, I absolutely love it, and recommend highly

author: PhoenixRises
title: Love the Brownies & the Brownie Batter Core!
text: This is probably my second favorite out of the Cores. I love brownies and I love Brownie batter so this was a win for me! The vanilla balances it all out so it won't be too much chocolate. I hope they keep this flavor.

author: Eleah911
text: This is my fave flavor. The core tastes more like fudge than brownie batter, but I love it! Sometimes the core doesn't always go all the way to the bottom though, wish it would! Aside from that, I could live off it.

author: Mads
title: Bring back the brownie batter swirl
text: I bought this one after not seeing the brownie batter flavor out anymore, which was clearly made with real brownie batter. This tastes more like and has the texture of a brownie that went soggy then got froze :(

author: Dejota
title: pretty good
text: Pretty good ice cream but overall could be better executed. I love most of the core ice cream lines even though each series seems to be a re-run of previous series. Still a good product and will buy in a pinch.

author: MegS
title: Great potential!
text: I loved loved the bites that had some of the core or brownie bits. Sadly, those bites were limited. The core was short lived and I maybe found 2 brownie bites. It was more just vanilla and chocolate ice cream.

author: Banana1128
title: No core
text: This is the second pint that I’ve bought and both times there was no brownie batter core. Just small amounts here and there. The ice cream was still good but I was looking forward to the brownie batter core!

author: dcol
title: Don't Ever Leave Me Again!
text: I love this ice cream and am so thankful you brought it back from the B&J graveyard. I know it's a little different blend the original Brownie Batter but the flavor is just as good. Don't ever go away again!

author: Mikayla2242
title: Good concept
text: I agree with several of the other reviews. The flavor was great, but really disappointed in the lack of the core that was in my container!! It was very thin and ran out half way through the container.

author: IzzyBella
title: Sad
text: I knew I was taking a chance on this bc of the mixed reviews. The core only went 1/3 of the way thru and the brownie chunks were too hard. I love Ben & Jerry's but I'm disappointed with this one.

author: AshK
title: few brownies and no core!!!
text: Was very excited to try this flavor since I love chewy bits in my ice cream but there were very few brownies bits and the core was barely in there. Disappointed because I wanted to love it:(

author: Valy
title: Perfect!
text: I have never found a combination as amazing as this one. It's got everything I want. Chocolate, vanilla, brownie chunks and a fantastic brownie batter to amplify its flavour. I love it!

author: sydney13
title: My favorite core flavor!
text: I have tried several of the core flavors and this is my favorite by far! It is a chocolate lovers dream. The brownie batter core is so decadent, and I love the brownie chunks!

author: Tsd8
title: Still no core
text: Great ice cream flavors but the core ratio is horrible its more Like a topping. The same for the karamel sutra core is gone before you even get to the middle of the pint

author: Jason04
title: Really good, but...
text: Great ice cream, as usual from Ben & Jerry's, but the core was only in the top third of the pint. Too bad, it really made this flavor work. Just not enough of it.

author: Msavage
title: My Lord it's good
text: So good I haven't been able to find it since! I have gone to multiple stores and still nothing... but i wil pmm remain diligent..ty for making my mouth happy!

author: Jadaboo
title: Yummmmmm
text: I bought 2 pints at once. First pint was perfect. The second had maybe 4 pieces of brownie in it. (Which is the best part for me) I was highly disappointed!

author: Milo
title: Best flavor for a chocolate lover
text: I love chocolate. Especially dark chocolate. If you love chocolate as well - get this ice cream. The vanilla mixed in is the perfect amount.

author: Rachlen34
title: Great flavor, but poor core!
text: LOVE THIS FLAVOR!!! But the core doesn’t reach past the top third, you miss brownie batter towards the end of the pint. Bit of a bummer :(

author: Terri2
title: Core doesn't go to bottom
text: Started wonderfully at the top--lots of core but 1/3 down the core was barely visible--DISAPPOINTED--started so good WHAT HAPPENED???

author: Devv
title: The best
text: I love this flavor, it’s my absolute favorite. It’s literally a mix of brownie batter and ice cream together. What could be better

author: Kaybaby
title: The core..
text: I'm extremely disappointed as I love the flavor but I only got a few bites of the core and it was gone before I was even halfway!!

author: Teeny
title: No core
text: As a whole it was really good but the core disappeared after literally 3 bites, it didn't go even close to 1/4 of the way down.

author: TDOT
title: MY FAV FLAVOR... BUT I NEED MORE BATTER
text: for the most part this does not disappoint unfortunately today i got 4 spoons in and the core was gone!!!!! I need more CORE!!!

author: Vivi
title: Where’s the core
text: I get this ice cream SEVERAL times a week it’s great but the last two times I got it the core ended after the first bite!

author: Bria9142
title: Just needed a bit more...
text: I loved this ice cream and I would have it again, but there wasn't really much core in it... was kinda disappointing

author: Humph
title: Meh
text: The core was too much and the ice cream didn't have the chunky goodness I've come to expect from Ben and Jerry's

author: Dvlbear
title: The core
text: I got this 2 weeks ago and I loved the flavor. Love the core it's so tasty. I will buy it again repeatedly.

author: tinaaa
title: Good but missing most of its core
text: Probably one of my favorite flavors but not even halfway through the pint and the core was completely gone!

author: erikav00
title: The brownie batter in the middle
text: I BOUGHT THIS LAST WEEK AND IVE NEVER BEEN MORE IN LOVE W AN ICE CREAM. THAT BROWNIE BATTER IS BEAUTIFUL

author: brownieloverrrr
title: WHAT A GENIUS MOVE
text: Um... Ben, Jerry, MY DUDES. This is heaven in a pint. Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you go.

author: Megs77
title: Core
text: The core didn't taste anything like brownie batter. It just tasted like fudge sauce. Disappointed!

author: Rosey885
title: Best of both worlds.
text: You get both vanilla and chocolate with brownie chuncks and a fudge batter in the middle. Love it!

author: MsBluewings
title: Brownie GALORE!!
text: I really like the combination and really wanted more brownie batter in the core. Keep it up. YUM!

author: ancilla89
title: Delicious!
text: I was just introduced to Cora ice cream, and as someone who loves brownie batter, I love this!!!

author: BrownIEto89
title: Hands down favorite flavor
text: This is definitely my go to flavor, with the peanut butter core coming in very close second...

author: kj027
title: Core disappeared
text: I love this flavor of ice cream but every time I’ve bought it, the core runs out halfway :(

author: Shelekene
title: Favorite Ice Cream
text: This is my go to flavor. It is the perfect blend of vanilla, chocolate, and brownie bites.

author: ILoveBJs
title: Chemical Taste
text: The brownie batter core had a chemical taste to it. It was VERY sweet and acrid.

author: soccerdadcol
title: My favorite but needs more core
text: Core should be filled all the way to the bottom but it's still amazing.

author: Nolan
title: Review title
text: This is my favorite flavor, it's a perfect mix of chocolate and vanilla

author: Parkor123456789
title: Great taste,But nog enough core.
text: There never enough,never goes to the bottom but Hase the best taste!

author: uwu9
title: Delicious
text: I go through the pint so fast when I buy it, you should make quarts!

author: beezerbunny
title: One of my favorites!!!
text: Love the fudge, nice and gooey. Perfect for a chocoholic like me.

author: LaRock0972
title: Best ever
text: Always has been my favorite flavor to eat. Make sure you keep it.

author: maggie
title: Really good!
text: I love anything brownie and this is great. The core is delicious.

author: Kit1487
title: Great
text: I love that ice cream it was so good Loved it Will buy it again

author: Ashley
title: Amazing
text: This is by far the best ice cream I've ever had. So good.

author: Juliette0127
title: Amazing
text: It tastes so good! I love it, it’s one of my favorites

author: Ggc1234
title: My all time favorite flavor of ice cream
text: The brownie batter core is the best. Unbeatable flavor

author: No name
title: My favorite
text: It's my favorite it's simple but very delicious!!!

author: FatCatLady13
title: So good even my 4 cats want it
text: I'm 8 months pregnant and this was all I wanted so I walked all the way across town to buy it at the grocery store. It's super expensive there but I HAD to have it. I've never been so happy in my whole life. I want this ice cream everywhere in my life from now on.

title: So good, I'm going to start going to church again.
text: If Jesus made ice cream, and not, like, carpenter-y things, he would make this. If God made this ice cream, I promise he wouldn't have bothered with the rest of creation. He'd just sit on his God couch and get wicked fat eating this all the time, except there wouldn't be time, because you know... no creation needed after the crowning achievement of the cheesecake core. Yup.

author: Kimberly02
title: Delicious!!!
text:
I was in a bad mood all day, nothing was going right, was so stressed out, was watching my weight. Just a typical mom having a bad day, well late that night went in the fridge, and wanted to try the ice cream I got, never have I tried it before, can I say I couldn't put this down. This made me in such a happy mood, I can't stop telling my husband and everyone else about this delicious ice cream, it was so good that I went and got another. I hope I don't get too big, that's my worry now! Try this flavor ONLY
if you like cheesecake and cookies and cream ice cream, I promise you, you will love it. Thanx again for making this one. Great job! P.s. I'm super picky!

author: Sweetestfusion
title: Sweetestfusion
text:
I had this at a sample at Winco & since then We've purchased about 2 pints per week. & we're not typically ice cream people. This is THE BEST ice cream creation ever. The cookies & cream with chunks of cheesecake make this such a wonderful combo of dessert. & prior to this, I would only eat
Dryer's rocky road when I eat ice cream or Venchi gelato in Italy. But now, I am in love w Ben & Jerry's.

author: Icecreamluva83
title: Misleading Description
text: The description of the is ice cream says it includes chocolate cookies. Per the graphic on top of the pint lid, the cookies are supposed to be distributed throughout the whole pint. To my surprise, while I was eating this ice cream their were ZERO cookies on the cheesecake side and only a few on the chocolate side. As a seasoned Ben and Jerry’s eater, I was highly disappointed.

author: FuzzyGut
title: Sorry
text: Like most other reviewers, I am a huge Ben and Jerry’s fan and will be through good and not so good pints. I really didn’t like this one. The ice cream was grainy on both sides and the cheesecake ice cream was not so tasty and I ate around it. The chocolate side was good, albeit not smooth. The cheesecake core tasted great but it was very hard and there was very little of it. I ended up throwing half the pint away. Oh well, onto another new Ben and Jerry’s flavor to try.

author: bigsteveokay
title: This is the best flavor I've found so far
text: This is the best flavor of B&Js I've found so far. I can't do nuts or bananas and this one is excellent and won't kill me!

author: Starr588
title: Favorite ice cream ever!!!!
text: Can't stop eating it once I've started!!! It's the best. Only wish there was a little more cheesecake filling it's so tasty!!!

author: The Jellyman
title: Awesome core!
text: I got this at Walmart and it was epic! The chocolate ice cream is sweet and the cheesecake ice cream tastes similar to vanilla. The chocolate cookies add a really good crunch and texture to the creamy ice cream. The core was the bomb though. It tastes exactly like actual cheesecake and is rich and dense. I 100% APPROVE THIS FLAVOR TO ANYONE AND EVERYONE.

author: Spayne201
title: I liked the chocolate and cookie part...
text: I was so excited to find this flavor! I was then disappointed by a very artificially tasting attempt at cheesecake for the ice cream and the core tasted more like thick baking glaze with too much confectioners sugar. Very disappointing. The chocolate ice cream and the cookie pieces were yummy though.

author: Dejota
title: Good ice cream but not the flavor inside
text: I was excited to buy this when I saw it. I love cheesecake! I love cookies and cream! Great combo especially in a core Ben and jerry's. I was sorely disappointed. Don't get me wrong. The ice cream was good but... it was literally cookies and cream ice cream with a vanilla core. Vanilla. Core. That was it. No cream cheese. No cream cheese core. Nothing. Just vanilla ice cream. Very very disappointing.

author: LeiraTheBestest
title: BOMB DOT COM
text: Aloha from Hawaii! Lol, I always get this flavor when I'm at the store and this would TOTALLY get 5 stars if there was just a liiiiittle bit more cheesecake in the middle! I love scooping some of the middle with some ice cream around it, just wish there was more core!

author: mixxa
title: I like this!!!!
text: I like this!!!! I like this!!!! I like this!!!!I like this!!!!

author: KatB
title: Doesn't taste like cheesecake.
text: I bought this flavor a couple months ago, and never again. Cheesecake is one of my favorite flavors, but this just doesn't taste like cheesecake. It doesn't taste bad, but definitely a weaker flavor in the core line up.

author: Ale123
title: More core please!
text: I love this ice cream. However, it is sometimes a little disappointing to get close to the bottom and see there is no more core left. I buy it 2-3 time a week and sometimes the amount of cheesecake core is a little low. I love this flavor so much, please don't short the core!

author: Cheesecakelover1
title: This is the best icecream I've ever had
text: Do not ever discontinue this flavor. I plan on snacking on this when I'm pregnant in a few years. Good stuff.

author: Andria
title: The best!!!
text: Love it; The best ice cream ever! Just delicious.

author: OompaLoompa49
title: This is the straight dope!
text: I was at my local grocery store, wasn't really planning on buying ice cream and there was a special. I love cheesecake and in my old age I am loving chocolate ice cream and cookies more and more. Well you get all of this in one pint. Real cheesecake. I meant to take one bite to just taste it and oops, just like that it was gone. I had to go buy more.

author: Angelfeather
title: Best ice cream ever
text: I'm not a fan of ice cream. This flavor is the best ice cream I've ever had. My favorite part is the cheesecake core. If anything, I wish it was distributed more evenly. Usually towards the bottom, there is little to no cheesecake left. You've converted me, this ice cream is great.

author: Ercaderc
title: My all time favorite flavor
text:
So I've been eating this specific one for about a month or two once or twice a week. Meaning I would eat like 1-2 pints a week LOL if you love ice cream try this flavor. All of their ice creams
Are to die for in general.

author: Echat
title: Not enough core
text: I got a pint of this tonight and was super disappointed with how little of the core was. It tasted amazing but it didn’t last throughout and was pretty disappointing.

author: Jackieflorez13
title: This is my favorite
text: But needs more core! Why does it end not even half way unlike the other cores, the cheese cake core is the best part and best core, pleeeaseeee more core!

author: Lain
title: PURE HEAVEN
text:
Please.
Don't ever take this away. It is the greatest flavor since you discontinued my Fudge Central

author: Brandy31
title: Greatness
text: I buy one twice a month so delicious the cheesecake core is the best !

author: Jody
title: Soo good
text: My new favorite flavor. The flavor was amazing. Absolutely love it

author: alfinger1234
title: SLAPS
text: the cheesecake? the cookies? is the best it really slaps

author: Austin98
title: Really?
text: I'm the type of person to never write a review, especially when it's for some ice cream... As i put the first spoon in my mouth i waited for the great taste of Ben & Jerry's but instead got the weakest flavor i think i've ever tasted. If this was repackaged and sold as a single spoon of nesquik in a gallon of water flavour i might have actually thought twice about paying for this super overpriced rubbish. It's not like i went into it wanting it to be bad. I'm the least fussy eater i know, and i don't think i've ever disliked Ben & Jerry's, or ice cream in general. It's not that the flavour is bad it's just so weak. The bargain supermarket brand chocolate ice cream tasted more like chocolate than this. Also the core tastes about as much like cheese cake as Gatorade tastes like almond milk... Guess what it doesn't. This ice cream is great if you find mayonnaise spicy. 0/10.

author: queen23
title: disappointed
text: I bought this and my core didn’t even start at the top. Then when it did appear it was only about 1 inch down and then dissapeared. It wasn’t even in the middle!! Do not buy this, I bought this for the core and it wasn’t even there. It was a decent flavor though.

author: caylab
title: New Favorite!!!
text: Tried this a few days ago because the store I went to never had the flavors I would normally buy (Phish Food or Cherry Garcia). I was bummed until I tasted it!! Oooh my gosh, this is my new obsession!!! It’s so good. Like someone else said, I wish it had a little more filling in the center just because it’s so delicious!! This ice cream is so addictive!

author: Chae96797
title: Yummy
text: I don't really buy ice cream maybe a cake once s year for a friend or family but my aunt was food shopping there was a sale she grabbed me this flavor I love cheesecake OMG I tell myself little bit put it away for later lol before I knew it I was at the bottom I'm happy to report I buy ice cream now and have 3 of these in my freezer

author: Cathy84
title: Cookie and Cheesecake Core
text: My son and I love this! We purchased it because I accidentally grabbed it along with the brownie core by mistake. The best mistake I ever made. A friend bought me the Ben and Jerry’s Ice-cream Dessert book, can’t wait to try. Loved reading the story of how the two of you persevered and didn’t give up.

author: Bridgespo99997
title: Could be improved but overall amazing!!!!
text: Really an amazing core! I love it! The mocha ice cream is delicious! I wish they had a tub of the mocha, the vanilla is just ok! The cookie chunks are a bit different then the usual chucks they've done in other batches, but overall. This flavor is amazing.

author: PhoenixRises
title: Good
text: It was good, but it wasn't a favorite. It didn't wow me like the others. It's the only Ben & Jerry's flavor (out of all the flavors I tried) that I only had once. I didn't buy it again, only because the others were so good. I still liked it though.

author: Iknowgoodicecream7
title: Great combination of flavors
text: I tried this one on a whim today. My all time favorite is the Salted Caramel Core. But I must say, this one is pretty great too. The chunks of cookie throughout and the cheesecake core from top to bottom makes this a delight through and through.

author: Cmill
title: Amazing!
text: So happy I picked out this flavor at the store! It is great. I love that it has half chocolate ice cream and half vanilla. The cheesecake core gives it even better flavor. I will definitely buy this flavor again.

author: Colorfulcammie
title: Awesome ice cream
text: I love every flavor I have ever had and I have had A LOT of flavors. My absolute favorite is the "Cookies & Cream Cheesevake core" now I can not find it anywhere!! But all Ben & Jerrys are awesime!!!

author: JerryLL
title: The BEST Ben and Jerry's Flavor.
text: If you ever discontinue the Cookies and Cream Cheesecake Core, I will light myself on fire and throw myself off of the Golden Gate Bridge. Do you want to be responsible for that? No? Excellent.

author: Bigaim75
title: My current fave
text: Thr cheesecake core is heavenly. My only complaint is my local grocery store has stopped carrying it or sold out. It's been several weeks. Fingers crossed they will get it back in stock soon.

author: Emely007
title: used to be my favorite
text:
Please make this better :(
Usually my go-to ice cream but something about the last one i bought was too icy and lost major flavor. Very little cookie pieces and small amount of core.

author: Ajsza95
title: The best !
text: This flavor is amazing! I love it, when I have started eat that ice cream i couldn't stop. I was eating eating and eating. This taste made me happy. You have to try it!

author: Lua89
title: Simply the best!
text: I have tried a lot of flavors but this one beat them all, so delicious! The cheesecake core is out of this world. This is the only flavor I buy now. Perfection!

author: mayo23
title: Great gift
text: I bought this as a gift for my teacher as I had been trying to get him to eat some for four months. He took one bite and he was an instant Ben and Jerry's fan

author: marcel
title: used to be my favorite
text: Usually my go-to ice cream but something about the last one i bought was too icy and lost major flavor. Very little cookie pieces and small amount of core.

author: Jhoop
title: Best flavor ever!
text: This is literally the best Ben and jerry's flavor ever. I don't know who came up with a cheesecake core, but they derserve a nobel peace prize.

author: Jenga
title: Savory!!
text: Super amazing flavor - one of my favorites! The ‘cookies’ are not too chunky or hard and the cheesecake creates a mouthwatering experience.

author: Nancy
title: Ice cream heaven
text: Tried this ben and jerry's for the first time and have not touched any other ice cream flavor since. Hands down the best

author: Melyy28
title: Amazing !
text: It’s the perfect combination. Wish they added a little more cheesecake core though. Always seems to end too soon! Haha

author: SLSC
title: SO darn good
text: My husband and I were fighting over this ice cream even though it was MINE! Very good, and a unquestionable favorite!

author: JKemp
title: My favorite ice cream!
text: I recently started to eat it for a while but haven't seen it in Walmart for a long time. I enjoy eating this flavor.

author: Devin
title: Best tasting!
text: Vanilla always compliments chocolate and with the cookies and cheesecakes just makes it outta this world!

author: unclelynda
title: Handsdown my favorite Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream
text: I've tried almost all of them and this is the one I crave I crave the most. OMG, sooooo gooood!

author: Bean1
title: My new favorite
text:
Love! Love! Love!
Delicious flavor. Cream Cheese is not overly sweet. Love the cookies too.

author: Em_mars
title: What I imagine heaven taste like.
text: This is by far my favorite ice cream of all time and does not disappoint.

author: Lulu87
title: Best flavour ever
text: Please bring this to England. I had it in Arkansas and I dream about it.

author: Chey96
title: Everything I Need
text:
It contains everything i love dessert wise
Amazing comfort food

author: natalie
title: HOLYYYYY
text: L I T E R A L L Y HEAVEN IN A CUP IM IN LOVE WITH THIS

author: kyle00023
title: The best of all
text: Best flavor yet..... for real each bite is a dream

author: EmmaWhoLostToday
title: Favorite but missing the most important part..
text: So, this is by far the best ice cream we've ever had. Like, literally the best one. I like the vanilla, husband likes the chocolate and we fight over the core. It gets intense.

author: Cookie123
title: Not a core just a small plug
text: I've read all the reviews and they are correct the core does not go all the way through this product it is more like a caramel plug. Was disappointed

author: Cows
title: My Reason for Living
text: I love this so much that I’ve honestly considered moving to VT to work in the factory so I can be so close to the creation of pure goodness. The only possible way to improve this would be to invent a time machine that comes with it so you can always go back and taste it for the first time and see the moment your life changes.

author: Brandi
title: So delicious, but...
text: I bought this from Publix a few days ago and I loved it, until I noticed the core stopped half way through. It was very disappointing, the caramel core was my favorite part :(

author: Susan8081
title: Love the taste
text: I tried this and i love the combination, im just disappointed in the caramel " core" . I wish it went all the way to the bottom and not just half way through.

author: Cait5
title: Good flavor, but not enough caramel
text: The caramel flavored ice cream is ok--it would be better as vanilla. But the combination of the chocolate flavor, the chocolate chunks, and the soft caramel core is delightful!! The only problem is that the caramel core *always* stops halfway through the pint, rendering the other half of the pint completely and totally worthless. The last pint I got, my boyfriend grabbed one small bowl of it, and there was no caramel left at all after that--there should be way more caramel since this flavor can really only be enjoyed by one person, one time before the rest of the pint is ready to be tossed. Again, good flavor, but poor execution. I would highly recommend it if there were more than a dollop of caramel.

author: lottybee91
title: Disappointing
text: I used to love this but the last few times ive bought a tub the core stops halfway down! :-( so disappointing as the core is the best bit. The bottom half of the tub is boring! Wont be buying it anymore.

author: Kjeffersk
title: My favorite flavor but
text: This is my favorite flavor. I love the Caramel ice cream with the caramel core and the chocolate ice cream with the chocolate chunks. But the last two times I have bought this the chocolate chunks have been in the caramel ice and not the chocolate ice cream. So you can’t the caramel ice cream flavor and I’ve have very disappointed. I hope this isn’t the new normal and it’s just a quality control issue.

author: Carolina
title: Disappointed
text: Bought this for the first time expecting the core to go all the way down. It didn’t, it stopped about 1/4 of the way in. So I did research and i found it was meant to go all the down so again I bought it along with a friend who also bought the same and to our disappointment the core AGAIN stopped 1/4 of the way in. I only purchased it for the caramel centre therefore will not be buying again as I do not want just chocololate ice cream. As the was 2/3 chocolate ice cream 1/3 caramel ice cream.

author: veggierap86
title: all time fave, however...
text: PLEASE MAKE A DAIRY FREE VERSION! I've loved this since high school when it first came out however I am lactose intolerant and it has gotten worse with age lol I love all of Ben&Jerry's dairy free products though, keep it up! :)

author: Melask
title: The core issue
text: Obviosly when you read all reviews it becomes clear that it is not your intentions to have the core go all the way to the bottom. Considering how much they cost, that is really not okay. Other than that (which is quite major though), the icecream is good but the chocolate ice cream lacks a lot of taste and is quite hard and not at all as creamy as the caramel one. It could be amazing, but you have a lot to fix.

author: Jenna321
title: No caramel in "karamel sutra"??
text: I've frequently purchased the karamel sutra core iced cream from ben and jerry's, so when i bought one to find there was absolutely no caramel, as in not even a single drop of caramel in the pint, i was highly disappointed. I've seen alot of other comments from people having similar experiences with karamel sutra ranging from only 1/2 the amount of caramel the pint should have all the way to what i experienced which was absolutely no caramel. Ben and Jerry's definitely makes some good iced cream, but they need some serious quality control.

author: MsLizzy
title: Love Karamel
text:
Being gluten free it's difficult to find great flavors in ice cream. I was disappointed that the caramel didn't go to the bottom, the whole reason I purchased the ice cream.
I would like to continue buying the GF flavors and really hope you can add the caramel to the entire pint!
Maybe some coupons will inspire me to try this flavor again!

author: Ana123
title: Super tasty, but no caramel!
text: I bought a pint a few days ago and was super excited to try a new flavor! The ice-cream itself was delicious as always, but there was only a tiny bit of caramel at the top of the pint. The "core" aspect of this ice-cream was nonexistent. I think this was just a fluke, but for 5 bucks, it was disappointing.

author: MandyHope
title: No caramel, great ice cream
text: Yesterday we just bought a pint of this from an Earth Fare grocery. It is well within date, and the chocolate and vanilla ice creams inside were nice. BUT the supposed "core" of caramel was no more than a tablespoon-sized dollop at the top. No more caramel in the whole pint if "karamel" sutra ice cream.

author: itsaoliveira
title: It would be the best if...
text: ... it was all caramel ice cream with the caramel core. The chocolate half is delicious but it overpowers the caramel ice cream. Also, I wish I knew what brand or how B&J makes their caramel. I could eat that alone! I always purchase this flavor. Wouldn’t trade it for anything.

author: EastCoastGen88
title: My FAVORITE Core Flavor!!!
text: I have been eating this since it came out and love it! Recently moved to NW Minnesota from the east coast and no one sells it here! I was literally crushed because I thought it was discontinued like my other old favorite That's My Jam, was. I finally found one random pint of it today and I am so excited to try it.

author: Denise21
title: Great Flavor!
text: This is absolutely my favorite flavor as of now. The only problem is the caramel core doesn't go all the way to the bottom. How disappointing! The one I just finished the caramel core barely went halfway down. Other than that, it is absolutely delicious.

author: Lf123456
title: Caramel Core In bits
text: Just indulged a small tub of this but the caramel ran and bits and stopped im the middle. Wasn't all the way through in the centre. Really wish I had the perfect balance each time instead of only chocolate and caramel icecream and no centre

author: rose
title: disappointed about the core
text: The core does not go all the way through and is truly disappointing because that's why I buy this! It stops about a third of the way through. Second time in a row recently this has happened.

author: ajoshua
title: So yum but..
text: First, I love Ben and Jerrys. And I love all these flavors, the core is great. But it ended like a quarter of the way into the pint, which was disappointing cause it was the best part.

author: Ruthgrace
title: Disappointing
text: Brought this last night, flavour is amazing, just a shame that the core only goes down half way. Considering they cost $13 each here in Australia, not happy.

author: LucyS
title: Love half of it
text: The caramel ice cream half is amazing but the chocolate doesn't have enough flavour and the caramel core stops halfway. Salted caramel core is way better.

author: Rebecca
title: Get in my belly
text: This flavor is absolutely amazing and they really load up on the caramel. It is a perfect treat. I would give it more stars if I could.

author: Anm8410
title: Tasty for the first half
text: This ice cream is great for the first half, but there’s no caramel core in the bottom half. Major disappointment.

author: rmulli502
title: It's my favorite but...
text: The last 3-4 times I've purchased, the core stops mid, or 2/3 of the way through.

author: fsumom
title: So delicious but
text: the core does not go all the way to the bottom. It stops maybe half way through.

author: Jadees22
title: Opened the door for me to try something new!!!
text: I just bought this today, from Publix and felt compelled to leave a review. This ice cream is perfect for those that only stick to one kind of thing, but want to venture out and try something new. Karamel Sutra, is that new exciting flavor that has familiar vibes. Which is why I decided to try it. I haaaaaate trying new ice creams. But as good as this one is, I feel like I’m missing out of a world of flavors! I excited to buy again and then try some other flavors.

author: Schribt
title: Would be my favorite, but...
text: Everytime I get this one, it doesn't have the carmel center :(

author: S McG
title: An unforgettable experience!
text: I have been faithfully addicted to Karamel Sutra since it was originally introduced. At times it is difficult to find. I have tried other flavors and brands and nothing comes close to this decadent delight. Karamel Sutra Core isn’t just an incredible taste; you dream of it, and fantasize there is more as you reach the bottom. When I finish one, I can’t wait to go buy another. Karamel Sutra rocks you to the core as an unforgettable experience.

author: ellen
title: my Karamel Sutra ice-cream came without caramel
text: I bought two Ben & Jerrys Karamel Sutra and both were missing the Soft caramel core. Such a disappointment im so sad, I eat the Karamel sutra all the time and im very upset. =/

author: KS4Life
title: Say It Ain't So
text: I'm in Nashville, TN and I'm being told by the local stores that Karmal Sutra is no longer being produced. I am devastated by this news as Karmal Sutra is the most amazing ice cream that I have ever tasted and it is the only one that I eat. Say it ain't so! Please tell me there'd an error somewhere and let me know how I can still partake in the wonderful experience of your Karmal Sutra ice cream. Anxiously awaiting to hear from someone.

author: Milofield
title: My favorite
text: Frankly I don't care if the caramel doesn't go all the way to the bottom - it's very good & there's plenty. And the best part is the chocolate side anyway, love the chocolate bits in it too, but the vanilla is great as well.

author: Ben Cross
title: Pint Sized Perfection!
text: Karamel Sutra is an incredible blend of creamy, rich flavored ice cream with fudge chunks and mouth watering caramel core. It possesses the power to crush a person’s attempt to diet while making them perfectly happy to do so! While it is fair to say on occasion the caramel core does not reach the bottom of the pint, it won’t stop you from savoring every last bite! Go out and get this ice cream today before I eat it all.

author: Dakota
title: The Only Ice Cream I'll Ever Eat Again
text: Karamel Sutra is by far my most favorite ice cream I have ever had. I would be fine never having any other kind of ice cream. I have honestly had a disgusting amount of this flavor since my discovery. I know sometimes the core doesn't go all the way down, but I just eat a little off the top, then scoop out the rest in one giant scoop and flip it upside down. Then the core can be saved for last!!

author: Siren
title: Good idea...
text: I love this flavor! Who doesn't want a thick gooey glob of caramel in the middle of their ice cream?! Only problem is about have way through the container the core is no longer there. The first time I thought maybe I just got a bad batch. It happens. Although I'm currently eating my third on (over a few months period of time I promise) and here I'am in the middle of the pint with no more core

author: FuzzyGut
title: How I love thee
text: This stuff... this stuff here. The caramel ice cream does taste like caramel. Rich and creamy like all Ben and Jerry’s. The chocolate side with fudge flakes is my favorite half. But the best part is that thick, sweet caramel core! It’s perfect caramel, flowing like honey through the ice cream, daring me to eat the core out of it and leave the ice cream for seconds. This is GREAT ice cream!!

author: Bream
title: WHERE DID IT GO?
text: This is the only flavor I've ever been able to find that's gluten free so it's been my go-to for several years... then out of nowhere it has disappeared from the 3 places I have been buying it from. A couple of months ago our Kroger stopped carrying it and then our small local grocery store ran out a few weeks later and last week I went to Whole Foods and thought I had found it but I got home, opened it up and took a bite without paying much attention and it had DISGUSTING Coconut in it. Trust me when I say that gluten free people have their absolute FILL of two flavors in every other thing they eat - almond and coconut - and I absolutely do NOT want it in my ice cream too.

author: Jennnnnn1112
title: THE BEST!!
text: This is the best ice cream I’ve ever had. Have to make sure I always have one(or more) in the freezer. The core definitely never reaches the bottom, but I just make sure to push the caramel sound so I can save some for the bottom. Also, sometimes the chips are in the caramel and sometimes they’re in the chocolate?? Confusion! But I will always buy this flavor.

author: Georgie
title: Get rid of the s-xual innuendos
text: The ice cream is pretty good, not very remarkable but not boring as far as caramel-chocolate ice cream flavors go. However, what I can't appreciate is the name and description of the flavor. I don't want to be reminded of s-xual activities whenever I see this product, and I don't want it to create awkward situations between curious children and their parents.

author: Jill
title: Very tasty..but
text: I recently purchased this product and it started off good; expect for the fact that the caramel core disappears halfway through. Very disappointed and the caramel ice cream was lacking the caramel, it tasted more like a vanilla ice cream with a tang to it. Please improve your caramel ice cream and add more caramel core.

author: Esor
title: The Bomb!
text: This IS ( period ) the best of the best. Been addicted from the first time I tried it over 10 years & counting. Never had a problem with the caramel core. I will literally go to different stores until I can find it. Crazy me went to 4 stores in a storm. LOL! Some days I have it for breakfast & dinner.

author: TD31
title: This ice cream should be illegal...
text: I told my husband he should have never brought this ice cream home, because now it is the only ice cream I want! It is absolutely amazing I can’t believe it’s real! It’s dangerous how good it is and it really tests my self control. One request... PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE MAKE A DAIRY FREE VERSION OF THIS!!!

author: Ginkgo
title: The only reason I eat Ben and Jerry’s ice cream
text: This flavor is the BEST. I didn’t even crave ice cream until my mother in law brought this to our table and now, HELP. It’s so good that I can eat a pint in a day. However, I can’t find it anymore! Since moving from Brooklyn, I have not been able to locate this flavor. Has it been discontinued?!?!

author: Enerlalem
title: Best ice cream ever
text: The blending of flavour inside every pint of this one is so good. I refuses to eat ice cream is not the karamel sutra. Caramel is so soft not too sweet. The chocolate ice cream are so creamy as the caramel ice cream and chocolate tidbits are just bonus that makes this ice cream the best.

author: Sean84Irish
title: Great tasting but faulty core
text: This ice cream and mixture taste great. It's one of my favorite go tos. I would give it a 5 but the last couple times I've purchased this ice cream the core stops halfway through which is a little disappointing considering that the feature name of its series is "core"

author: Mojitomami
title: This flavor gives me life!!
text: I was not impressed with Ben & Jerry's ice cream until I saw this flavor and its ingredients. From the first spoonful, I was in love!! The only drawback is that Karamel Sutra's hard to find in my city. So whenever I come across it, I usually buy at least four pints.

author: EmmaD23
title: Asking for a customer
text: We have a customer in our store who loves this flavour but has been saying that it is very soft in our freezing. After getting checks on the freezers they are fine and so are other Ben and jerry flavours but we are cursious if this is due to the soft middle.

author: Dustybucket
title: Karamel sutra.
text: I love this flavor when I was able to find it I’m my local Walmart super Center but now I am not able to find it there. Your product locator just confirmed to me that it could not find it in my area . Please bring it back to Elkins,WV Walmart super Center.

author: Kenz
title: Was way better before changing
text: Not a huge fan of the new fudge chips on the caramel side. It was my favorite flavor before this addition. I enjoyed having one side of the icecream that was perfectly creamy with the chunks remaining on the chocolate side. Not nearly as good now.

author: tshoreview
title: Name speaks for itself!
text: Karamel Sutra is SO delish! The texture & flavor are unmatched and the smooth rich caramel core is such a WONDERFUL surprise to your taste buds. Superior quality and dedication to the best ice cream ever! My all-time favorite. Kudos Ben & Jerry!

author: Nat09
title: Good at anytime!
text: I'm always looking for this flavor in store but when I find it...OH YES! This is my favorite flavor. From the caramel icecream to the core to the chocolate icecream and back....loveeeeeeee

author: Lordbuffington
title: My Favorite
text: I cannot let this flavor have anything less than 5 stars. This is my all time favorite Ben & Jerry's! The center caramel is perfection. I like to save as much of it as I can till the end!

author: Ke no y
title: Best by far
text: I have been eating Karamel sutra ice cream when the grocery I shop at put it on the freezer shelf. If it was available by the gallon, I would buy at least 3 at a time.

author: Emily JT
title: PLEASE make it vegan!
text: My nr 1 fave that is avaivable in Sweden! I have noticed that the core doesn't go all the way to the bottom :( And I WISH it was vegan </3 but overall SOSOSOSO GOOD!

author: Rhonda
title: All time Favorite
text: I used to buy this regularly at the Giant Eagle stores in Ohio. I've not seen it in stock lately. I'm hoping the flavor doesn't drop into the graveyard.

author: Jenny55
title: Core or a Topping?
text: Disappointed that the Karamel Core was only a third of the way down the center of the pint. I expected it to be all the way through to the bottom.

author: Layna
title: Love it!!!!!
text: Love it!!!!! One of my favorites. Awesome blend of ice cream, chocolate and caramel. Just wish the caramel core went all the way through.

author: Aski
title: OMG
text: It's the best ice cream ever! Karamel Sutra has the best texture and flavor. The perfect amount of chocolate and I love the caramel core.

author: Aini
title: My Fav Ice cream
text: Love it..... Personally I love the Caramel Core but it's very hard to find this flavor I don't know why rite aid don't have this flavor.

author: Cassidy526
title: It’s great but...
text: This ice cream is absolutely delicious, the best part is the caramel core. Unfortunately the core doesn’t go all the way to the bottom.

author: STK76
title: The Best
text: A soft caramel core flowing between caramel ice cream and rich chocolate ice cream. The dark chocolate fudge chips are sublime.

author: Akiteonacloud
title: Team change!
text: First I was in love with New York super fudge chunk but then I got a taste for this Karamel Jar of 7th heaven and I was sold!

author: igloofn68
title: Top Dog!
text: This is my favorite. Many of these new ones are terrible! I can't stand the Jimmy Fallon pints at al to name a couple.

author: Glittery bohemian
title: Pretty delicious!!
text: One of my favorite combos !!! Creamy and caramelly !!! Love!! S/o to BNJ for standing up for racial issues too !!

author: Leslie55
title: Simply Heavenly!
text: I've been eating this ice cream for about a year now. It is simply wonderful. I really love the caramel core.

author: KellyCrayon
title: Mixed Feelings
text: It's a Ben and Jerry's creation, so it's automaticly tasty, but nothing about it made me want to try it again

author: Matt W
title: By far the best of all worlds
text: My go to, EVERYTIME. You can really tell the quality of ingredients in this pint by its superb taste. Bravo!

author: Shadow12
title: So good!!
text: Love caramel and this just brought it over the edge, absolutely in love with this!!! Simple but amazing :)

title: Absolutely My Favorite
text: I may buy other flavors but not without including this one in the mix. Caramel and chocolate, enough said

author: Katmandu
title: One of my absolute favorite ice cream flavors!
text: One of the best ice cream flavors ever made! Once you start eating it, it's almost impossible to stop!

author: MsBluewings
title: Caramel GALORE!!
text: If you love caramel, you will love this combination. I would love more caramel in the core. YUM!

author: J4yb0n35
title: I would marry this ice cream
text: This is the best ice cream ever. I love eating around the core until that's all that's left.

author: GabbyDoll
title: My favorite flavor!
text: I can’t get enough of this flavor! My only issue is that it’s rarely available in my area.

author: jsnadow
title: The Best
text: This is by far the best Ice Cream I ever had! And the tast and consistency is outstanding

author: Ron1542
title: Love it!!!
text: By far my favorite one!!! Just have a hard time finding it in the stores around me!!!

author: BennysMom
title: Omg amazing
text: Amazing amazing. Only prob was core didn't go to the bottom. It's the best part. Sad.

author: heatherk79
title: Yum... yum yum
text:
If I believed Ice Cream could be sinful.
.this one is so decadent, it might qualify!

author: Blueroses
title: Carmel core
text: This is the best flavor of the family I hope it never goes to the flavor graveyard

author: natelise
title: My Favorite Ice Cream Ever
text: This ice cream *literally* saves my life every time I eat it. The best. Period.

author: cminor
title: heavenly!
text: loved it! could have had more caramel through the ice cream but still amazing

author: MommaQ
title: My favorite flavor!
text: You can’t go wrong with this delicious treat! This is my all time favorite.

author: Gram
title: Delicious to the core!
text: Just downright yummy & delicious. One can eat the whole pint in one setting

author: BR76
title: Top Notch
text: The absolutely best flavor combination. The dark chocolate is sublime.

author: Cattt
title: MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM
text: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor!! Please never get rid of it

author: Maud
title: I’m sad
text: My favorite ice cream only had a caramel core barely halfway down :(

author: Jackie28
title: The only cure for that time of the month.
text: I would truly die without it. it’s the only ice cream I care about.

author: Klaudert
title: Love it!
text: This is hands down my favorite flavor! So delicious and decadent

author: Irene
title: Is it discontinued
text: Have loved it for awhile now. But can’t seem to find it anymore.

author: abby
title: FAVORITE BEN & JERRYS!!!
text: I always buy this ice cream whenever I go to the grocery store!

author: MorenitaSunshine
title: My Karamel Krack
text: I love this one so much that I buy it when it’s not on sale.

author: Sportsnut1962
title: Best tasting caramel ever!
text: This flavor has been one of my favorites for over 9 years!

author: Melba
title: AWESOME!!
text: It’s good. That’s it. Just GOOOOOD!! Every single time!

author: Stef
title: Delicious
text: It's great. Caramel core is the best part. I love it.

author: Chocluvr
title: Don't ever stop making this Ice Cream flavor!!!
text: This is by far one of the best Ben & Jerry's flavor ever created. I found this flavor in my supermarket a few weeks ago & being a chocoholic peanut butter fanatic I had to try it. A delightful swirl of ice creams,a rich chocolately and creamy peanut butter core , and tons of chocolate peanut butter cups!!! Keep up the good work Ben & Jerry's!!!

author: SusanR
title: THE ABSOLUTE BEST
text: It's hard to even find the words to describe how much I LOVE this ice cream. If ever it gets sent to the graveyard, I am not sure I would want to continue existing on such a cruel planet. Please, please, please never get rid of PEANUT BUTTER FUDGE CORE!

author: LitaLo
title: Peanut Butter delight
text: I have been buying this guy over and over. My freezer is always stocked with this flavor. The only bad thing Ihave to say is that not all contents of containers are created alike. Some have a lot of pb cups and some others lack those mini peanut butter cups that I love so much. I wish for more pb cups and less fudge core. Otherwise this is perfection

author: Wizkid
title: The BEST Peanut Butter/Chocolate combo ice cream
text:
I’m not a huge ice cream eater EXCEPT for this one! The PB Fudge Core strikes the perfect balance of both the peanut butter and chocolate to create a heavenly pint of pure yumminess.
My only complaint is that it is getting harder to find! It has been unseated by more weak-kneed, lower calorie, younger siblings. They can only DREAM of being this good.

author: FuzzyGut
title: OMG!!
text: I just crushed my first pint of this one and WOW, I may have a new favorite flavor! Everything is amazing from the ice cream flavors to the mini cups and the core. It’s really a triumph of Ben And Jerry’s research and development, truth be told! Buy this, eat it and be happy!

author: chocho22
title: Chocolate and Peanut Heaven
text: I bought the Peanut Butter Fudge Core yesterday and the moment the ice cream touched my tongue I was in heaven. This ice cream is now one of my favorite ice creams ever!! Thank you for creating this ice cream.

author: Brittbrat
title: Lacking
text: I eat ice cream for the yummy things that are in it (pieces of peanutbutter cups in this case) unfortunately I might have had in total 1 whole peanutbutter in the entire pint. Very disappointed as I love peanutbutter cups but with so very little in it I don't think I'll be getting this one again.

author: slogirl
title: Could be better
text: I have bought this 3 times now, so you could say I'm a fan. I love the two different ice-cream flavors, but the core tastes fake and processed to me. I was hoping that maybe I just got a bad batch but now that my third one tastes the same I think this is the real flavor. Re-invent the core flavor and this would be a 5-star.

author: Lyss24
title: New favorite flavor
text: I bought this today after trying the cookie dough core pint which was highly disappointing. This one is 1000 times better and my new flavor. Two things I would change- more pb cups because when are there too many pb cups?? And the core didn't go all the way down

author: TreeDancer
title: Holy cow, so good
text: I wasn't expecting something this satisfying, it's perfectly balanced and no peanut butter cup will ever be worth it ever again, this ice cream has ruined me for any other brand.

author: Jolty
title: In love!!
text: I love this ice cream!! Anytime I need something sweet I grab a pint of peanut butter fudge core, Plz dont ever stop making this flavor!!!

author: Jdacld1224
title: The best flavor!!
text: I could die for this flavor. The peanut butter fudge core is so amazing I could eat theee pints in a day.

author: Sanford
title: The Best Flavor
text: This is my favorite ice cream flavor -- if this is in the store, I will never walk out with another flavor. If they don't have it, sometimes I'll walk another block to check another store or two. It's that good. Great balance, so it feels very rich instead and never too sweet. Both sides of the ice cream are equally compelling, so there are no disappointing bites. I hope this flavor sticks around for a long long time.

author: Marley
title: Awesome Flavor
text: I can eat peanut butter, but I'm not a huge fan. In the store one day, they were out of my favorite (Half Baked). One of the few remaining flavors on the shelf, I bought the Peanut Butter Fudge Core. This stuff is so addictive, and I just can't get enough. I love the fudge core, and I love the tiny peanut butter cups. It's a perfect blend of flavors and textures. Beyond YUM!

author: Shellyshellzs
title: Peanut butter fudge heaven
text: Oh man I use to be a whatever was on sale girl but my now fiance brand me this ice cream when I wasn't feeling good and it quickly became my favorite. It's is the perfect combination. It hit the spot when you get the craving. I am always in the look out. I since tried other flavor. I'm found of fish food but this is delicious....please sell more shoprite in linden NJ lol

author: Or1234
title: The best Chocolate Ice Cream Combo
text: This is the first chocolate ice cream I’ve tried and actually liked. The peanut butter cups and the combination of all the flavors along with the smooth core texture makes for a dreamy ice cream!

author: ava21
title: PERFECT!!
text: This is the best pint of ice cream I've ever had!! If you like chocolate or peanut butter or ice cream or have any taste at all you'll love this flavor!!!!

author: yeee
title: My favorite!
text: This is my favorite ice cream ever! Can't get any better than that. Everyone who loves chocolate/peanut butter combination should try it.

author: Ellehcar
title: The Best
text: This is my favorite flavor...I can just buy one!! Highly recommend
